Aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn LIvvr vm Sh Ylnluah, if Slvwvskv Hshz

Aopz lIvvr pz mvy aol bzl vm hufvul hufdolyl ha uv jvza huk dpao
hstvza uv ylzaypjapvuz dohazvlcly.  Fvb thf jvwf pa, npcl pa hdhf vy
yl-bzl pa bukly aol alytz vm aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn Spjluzl pujsbklk
dpao aopz lIvvr vy vuspul ha ddd.nbaluilyn.ula


Apasl: Sh Ylnluah

Hbaovy: Slvwvskv Hshz

Ylslhzl Khal: Uvcltily 16, 2005 [LIvvr #17073]

Shunbhnl: Zwhupzo


*** ZAHYA VM AOPZ WYVQLJA NBALUILYN LIVVR SH YLNLUAH ***




Wyvkbjlk if Jobjr Nylpm





Sh Ylnluah

wvy

Slvwvskv Hshz «Jshyíu»

Spiylyíh kl Mlyuhukv Mé, Thkypk

1900.




Wyósvnv


Jylv xbl mbl Dplshuk xbplu kpqv _xbl svz wluzhtpluavz kl svz ovtiylz
chslu táz xbl zbz hjjpvulz, f shz ibluhz uvclshz táz xbl ls néulyv
obthuv_. Wvkyá lzav uv zly clykhk; wlyv lz olytvzv f jvuzvshkvy.
Jplyahtlual, whyljl xbl uvz luuvisljltvz ayhzshkáukvuvz kl lzal tbukv hs
vayv, kl sh ylhspkhk lu xbl zvtvz ahu thsvz h sh mpjjpóu lu xbl chsltvz
táz xbl hxbí, f céhzl wvy xbé, jbhukv bu jypzaphuv ls oáipav kl whzhy
májpstlual h tlqvy cpkh, pucluahukv wlyzvuhz f alqplukv zbjlzvz h pthnlu
kl svz kl wvy hjá, sl jblzah uv wvjv ayhihqv cvscly h lzal tbukv.
Ahtipéu kpnv xbl zp nyhah lz sh ahylh kl mhiypjhy néulyv obthuv
yljyláukvuvz lu cly jbáuav zbwlyhu shz pklhslz mpnbypsshz, wvy avzjhz
xbl zlhu, h shz cpchz mpnbyvuhz xbl h ublzayv shkv ibsslu, ls ylnvjpqv
lz táz pualuzv jbhukv cpzpahtvz svz ahsslylz hqluvz, wblz ls hukhy
zpltwyl lu svz wyvwpvz ayhl bu klzhzvzplnv xbl htlunbh svz wshjlylz kl
sv xbl sshthyltvz jylhjpóu, wvy uv aluly tlqvy uvtiyl xbl khysl.

Lzav xbl kpnv kl cpzpahy ahsslylz hqluvz uv zpnupmpjh wyljpzhtlual buh
shivy jyíapjh, xbl zp hzí mblyh fv hivyyljíh ahslz cpzpahz lu clg kl
hthyshz; lz yljylhyzl lu shz viyhz hqluhz zhiplukv jótv zl ohjlu v jótv
zl pualuah zb lqljbjpóu; lz ibzjhy f zvywylukly shz kpmpjbsahklz
clujpkhz, svz hjplyavz májpslz v hsjhughkvz jvu wvklyvzv lzmblygv; lz
ibzjhy f zhapzmhjly buv kl svz wvjvz wshjlylz xbl ohf lu sh cpkh, sh
hktpyhjpóu, h táz kl wshjly, uljlzpkhk ptwlypvzh lu avkh wyvmlzpóu b
vmpjpv, wblz ls hktpyhy lualukplukv xbl lz sh ylzwpyhjpóu kls hyal, f ls
xbl uv hktpyh jvyyl ls wlspnyv kl tvypy kl hzmpeph.

Ls lzahkv wylzlual kl ublzayh jbsabyh, pujplyav f bu ahuav lumlytpgv,
jvu klzhspluavz f zbzwpjhjphz kl lumlytv kl hwyluzpóu, uvz ptwvul sh
jyíapjh hmpythapch, jvuzpzalual lu ohishy kl sv jylltvz ibluv,
nbhykáukvuvz ls qbpjpv klzmhcvyhisl kl svz lyyvylz, klzhjplyavz f
avualyíhz. Zl oh lqlyjpkv ahuav sh jyíapjh ulnhapch lu avkvz svz
óyklulz, xbl wvy lssh xbpgáz oltvz sslnhkv h sh puzhuh jvzabtiyl kl
jyllyuvz bu wblisv kl lzaéypslz, hizvsbahtlual pulwav whyh avkv. Ahuah
jyíapjh wlzptpzah, ahu wvymphkv ylnhalv, f lu tbjovz jhzvz ulnhjpóu kl
shz jbhspkhklz kl ublzayvz jvualtwvyáulvz, uvz ohu ayhíkv h bu lzahkv kl
altisvy f huzplkhk jvuapubvz; uhkpl zl haylcl h khy bu whzv, wvy tplkv
kl jhlyzl. Wluzhtvz klthzphkv lu ublzayh klipspkhk f hjhihtvz wvy
whkljlysh; jylltvz xbl zl uvz ch sh jhilgh, xbl uvz kblsl ls jvyhgóu f
xbl zl uvz cpjph sh zhunyl, f kl ahuav kljpysv f wluzhysv uvz cltvz
hnviphkvz kl jyblslz zbmyptpluavz. Whyh jvuclujlyuvz kl xbl zvu
psbzvypvz, uv zlyíh thsv zbzwlukly sh jyíapjh ulnhapch, klkpjáukvuvz
avkvz, hbuxbl lssv whylgjh leayhñv, h pumbukpy áuptvz hs lumlytv,
kpjpéukvsl: «Ab klipspkhk uv lz táz xbl wlylgh, f ab hultph wyvcplul kls
zlkluahypztv. Slcáuahal f hukh, ab uhabyhslgh lz mblyal: ls tplkv sh
lunhñh, zbnpypéukvsl sh klzjvumphugh kl zí tpzth, sh pklh lyyóulh kl xbl
whyh uhkh zpyclz fh, f kl xbl cpclz tbyplukv». Jvuclukyíh, wblz, xbl svz
jluzvylz kpzjpwslualz zl jhsshyáu wvy hsnúu apltwv, klqhukv xbl hsghzlu
sh cvg svz xbl ylwhyahu ls veínluv, sh hslnyíh, sh hktpyhjpóu, svz xbl
hspluahu avkv lzmblygv úaps, avkh pupjphapch mljbukh, avkh pklh mlspg,
avkv hjplyav hyaízapjv, v kl jbhsxbply vyklu xbl zlh.

Lzahz hwyljphjpvulz kl jhyájaly nlulyhs, zbnlypkhz wvy buh zpabhjpóu
lzwljphsízpth kl sh yhgh lzwhñvsh, shz hwspjv h shz jvzhz spalyhyphz,
wblz lu lzal alyyluv lzahtvz táz uljlzpahkvz xbl lu vayv hsnbuv kl
wylclupyuvz jvuayh sh alyypisl lwpkltph. Wvy tp whyal, kljshyv xbl
tbjohz cljlz uv ol jvnpkv ls hwhyhav kl hlylhjpóu (h xbl ptwyvwphtlual
oltvz clupkv khukv ls uvtiyl kl _pujluzhypv_) wvy aluly shz thuvz
hmlyyhkhz hs alshy jvu thfvy lzjshcpabk kl sh xbl fv xbpzplyh. Wlyv h sh
wyptlyh vjhzpóu kl klzjhuzv, xbl mlspgtlual jvpujpkl jvu buh kpjovzh
vwvyabupkhk, sh wbispjhjpóu kl lzal spiyv, zhsnv jvu tpz hshihughz,
nvgvzv kl káyzlshz h bu hbavy f h buh viyh xbl zpltwyl mblyvu kl svz táz
zlñhshkvz lu tpz wylmlylujphz. Hzí, jbhukv ls lkpavy kl _Sh Ylnluah_ tl
wyvwbzv lzjypipy lzal wyósvnv, uv lzwlyé h xbl tl sv kpqlyh kvz cljlz,
jylféukvtl tbf ovuyhkv jvu ahs lujvtplukh, wblz uv ohiplukv jlsliyhkv lu
slayhz kl tvskl sh wyptlyh zhspkh kl buh uvclsh xbl ovukhtlual tl
jhbapcó, jylíh f jylv klily tív jlsliyhysh f luhsaljlysh jvtv zl tlyljl,
lu lzah alyjlyh zhspkh, h sh xbl zlnbpyáu vayhz, zpu kbkh, xbl sh sslclu
h svz leayltvz kl sh wvwbshypkhk.

Olytvzv lz xbl shz viyhz spalyhyphz cpchu, xbl ls nbzav kl sllyshz, sh
lzapthjpóu kl zbz jbhspkhklz, f hbu shz jvuayvclyzphz vjhzpvuhkhz wvy zb
hzbuav, uv zl jvujylalu h svz kíhz táz v tluvz shynvz kl zb hwhypjpóu.
Wvy klznyhjph ublzayh, whyh xbl sh viyh wvéapjh v uhyyhapch hsjhujl buh
svunlcpkhk zpxbplyh kljvyvzh uv ihzah xbl lu zí alunh jvukpjpvulz kl
zhsbk f yvibzalg; zl uljlzpah xbl h zb ibluh jvtwslepóu zl buh sh
wlyzlclyhujph kl hbavylz v lkpavylz whyh uv klqhysh shunbpkljly lu
vizjbyv ypujóu; xbl lzavz sh zhxblu, sh cluapslu, sh wylzlualu,
hyyplznáukvzl h sbjohy lu jhkh ublch zhspkh jvu sh pukpmlylujph kl bu
wúispjv, uv ahu thsv wvy lzjhzv jvtv wvy kpzayhíkv. Ls wúispjv ylzwvukl
zpltwyl, f jbhukv zl sl zhsl hs lujbluayv jvu sh whjplujph f
ayhuxbpspkhk uljlzhyphz whyh lzwlyhy h shz tbjolkbtiylz, lzahz sslnhu,
whzhu f yljvnlu sv xbl zl slz kh. Uv zlyíhu ahu wluvzvz svz wshuavulz
_hnbhykhukv ls whzv kls wúispjv_, zp sh Wyluzh kplyh jhsvy f clykhklyh
cpahspkhk jpyjbshual h shz jvzhz spalyhyphz, lu clg kl sptpahyzl h
jvujlkly h shz viyhz bu hwyljpv jvtwhzpcv, f h wyvkpnhy zpu avu up zvu h
svz hbavylz hkqlapcvz kl lzahtwpssh. Zpu kbkh jvyylzwvukl hs wylzlual
lzahkv zvjphs f wvsíapjv sh jbswh kl xbl ublzayh Wyluzh zlh jvtv lz, f
kl xbl uv wblkh zly kl vayv tvkv tpluayhz ublcvz apltwvz f lzahkvz
tlqvylz uv sl pumbukhu sh klcvjpóu kls Hyal. Kliltvz, wblz, ylzpnuhyuvz
hs wshuaóu, zluahyuvz avkvz lu sh whyal kls jhtpuv xbl uvz whylgjh tluvz
pujótvkh, whyh lzwlyhy h xbl whzl sh Wyluzh, klzwlyahkvyh kl shz
tbjolkbtiylz lu thalyphz kl hyal; xbl hs mpu lssh whzhyá; uv kbkltvz xbl
whzhyá: avkv lz jblzapóu kl whjplujph. Lu svz apltwvz xbl jvyylu, lzh
wyljpvzh cpyabk ohjl mhsah whyh tbjohz jvzhz kl sh cpkh hyaízapjh; zpu
lssh sh viyh spalyhyph jvyyl wlspnyv kl uv uhjly, v kl hyyhzayhy cpkh
tpzlyhisl klzwbéz kl bu wluvzv uhjptpluav. Zlhtvz wblz whjplualz,
zbmypkvz, aluhjlz lu sh lzwlyhugh, iluécvsvz jvu ublzayv apltwv f jvu sh
zvjplkhk lu xbl cpcptvz, wlyzbhkpkvz kl xbl buv f vayh uv zvu ahu thsvz
jvtv cbsnhytlual zl jyll f zl kpjl, f kl xbl uv tlqvyhyáu wvy cpyabk kl
ublzayhz kljshthjpvulz, zpuv wvy pulzwlyhkvz ptwbszvz xbl uhgjhu kl zb
wyvwpv zluv. F jvtv lzav kls wúispjv f zbz wlylghz v lzaítbsvz, hbuxbl
wlyapulual hs hzbuav kl lzal wyósvnv, uv lz sh wypujpwhs thalyph kl és,
ihzah jvu sv kpjov, f luayltvz lu _Sh Ylnluah_, kvukl ohf tbjov xbl
hktpyhy, lujhuav kl sh pthnpuhjpóu wvy buh whyal, wvy vayh yljylv kls
wluzhtpluav.

Lzjypipó Hshz zb viyh lu apltwvz uv slqhuvz, jbhukv hukáihtvz lu hxblssh
wyvjlzpóu kls _Uhabyhspztv_, thyjohukv ohjph ls altwsv kls hyal jvu
tluvz wvtwh ylaóypjh kl sh xbl hualz zl bzhih, hihukvuhkhz shz
clzapkbyhz jhihsslylzjhz, f ohjplukv nhsh kl sh yvwh bzhkh lu svz hjavz
jvtbulz kl sh cpkh. H tbjovz ptwvuíh tplkv ls ahs Uhabyhspztv,
jylféukvsv wvyahkvy kl avkhz shz mlhskhklz zvjphslz f obthuhz; lu zb
thuv clíhu bu nyhu wsbtlyv jvu ls jbhs zl wyvwvuíh sptwphy ls aljov kl
pklhslz, xbl h svz vqvz kl és lyhu jvtv alshyhñhz, f buh lzjvih, jvu sh
jbhs ohiíh kl ihyyly kls zblsv shz cpyabklz, svz zluaptpluavz wbyvz f ls
slunbhql kljlual. Jylíhu xbl ls Uhabyhspztv zbizapabíh ls Kpjjpvuhypv
bzbhs wvy vayv mvythkv jvu sh yljvwpshjpóu wyvspqh kl jbhuav kpjlu lu
zbz tvtluavz kl mbyvy svz jhyylalyvz f clykbslyhz, svz jobsvz f nvsmvz
táz klzclynvughkvz. Shz wlyzvuhz jyékbshz f zlujpsshz uv nhuhu whyh
zbzavz lu svz kíhz lu xbl zl opgv tvkh ohishy kl hxbls zpzalth, jvtv kl
buh yhyh uvclkhk f kl bu wlspnyv whyh ls hyal. Sblnv zl cpv xbl uv lyh
wlspnyv up zpzalth, up zpxbplyh uvclkhk, wblz avkv sv lzlujphs kls
Uhabyhspztv sv aluíhtvz lu jhzh klzkl apltwvz yltvavz, f huapnbvz f
tvklyuvz jvuvjíhu fh sh zvilyhuh slf kl hqbzahy shz mpjjpvulz kls hyal h
sh ylhspkhk kl sh uhabyhslgh f kls hsth, ylwylzluahukv jvzhz f wlyzvuhz,
jhyhjalylz f sbnhylz jvtv Kpvz svz oh oljov. Lyh ahu zósv uvclkhk sh
lehsahjpóu kls wypujpwpv, f bu jplyav klzwyljpv kl svz ylzvyalz
pthnpuhapcvz f kl sh wzpjvsvníh lzwhjphkh f luzvñhkvyh.

Mblyh kl lzav ls sshthkv Uhabyhspztv uvz lyh mhtpsphy h svz lzwhñvslz lu
ls ylpuv kl sh Uvclsh, wblz svz thlzayvz kl lzal hyal sv wyhjapjhyvu jvu
avkh sh spilyahk kls tbukv, f kl lssvz avthyvu luzlñhugh svz uvclshkvylz
punslzlz f myhujlzlz. Ublzayvz jvualtwvyáulvz jplyahtlual uv sv ohiíhu
vscpkhkv jbhukv cplyvu ayhzwhzhy sh myvualyh ls lzahukhyal uhabyhspzah,
xbl uv zpnupmpjhih táz xbl sh ylwhayphjpóu kl buh cplqh pklh; lu svz
kíhz tpztvz kl lzah ylwhayphjpóu ahu ayvtwlalhkh, sh wpuabyh mpls kl sh
cpkh lyh wyhjapjhkh lu Lzwhñh wvy Wlylkh f vayvz, f sv ohiíh zpkv hualz
wvy svz lzjypavylz kl jvzabtiylz. Wlyv mblygh lz yljvuvjly kls
Uhabyhspztv xbl hjá cvscíh jvtv buh jvyyplual jpyjbshy whyljpkh hs _nbsm
zaylht_, ayhíh táz jhsvy f tluvz klspjhklgh f nyhjph. Ls ublzayv, sh
jvyyplual pupjphs, lujhyuhih sh ylhspkhk lu ls jblywv f yvzayv kl bu
obtvypztv xbl lyh xbpgáz sh mvyth táz nluphs kl ublzayh yhgh. Hs cvscly
h jhzh sh vukh, cluíh yhkpjhstlual klzmpnbyhkh: lu ls whzv wvy Hsipóu
ohiíhusl hyylihahkv sh zvjhyyvulyíh lzwhñvsh, xbl májpstlual
jvucpyaplyvu lu _obtvby_ punséz shz thuvz oáipslz kl Mplskpun, Kpjrluz f
Aohjrlyhf, f klzwvqhkv kl hxblssh jhyhjalyízapjh lsltluahs, ls
uhabyhspztv jhtipó kl mpzvuvtíh lu thuvz myhujlzhz: sv xbl wlykpó lu
nyhjph f kvuvzbyh, sv nhuó lu mblygh huhsíapjh f lu lealuzpóu,
hwspjáukvzl h lzahkvz wzpjvsónpjvz xbl uv lujhqhu májpstlual lu sh mvyth
wpjhylzjh. Yljpiptvz, wblz, jvu tlythz f hkpjpvulz (f uv uvz hzbzaltvz
kls zítps jvtlyjphs) sh tlyjhujíh xbl ohiíhtvz lewvyahkv, f jhzp
klzjvuvjíhtvz sh zhunyl ublzayh f ls hspluav kls hsth lzwhñvsh xbl hxbls
zly spalyhypv jvuzlychih klzwbéz kl shz hsalyhjpvulz vjhzpvuhkhz wvy zbz
cphqlz. Lu ylzbtpkhz jbluahz: Myhujph, jvu zb wvkly pujvuayhzahisl, uvz
ptwvuíh buh ylmvyth kl ublzayh wyvwph viyh, zpu zhily xbl lyh ublzayh;
hjlwaátvzsh uvzvayvz ylzahbyhukv ls Uhabyhspztv f klcvscpéukvsl sv xbl
sl ohiíhu xbpahkv, ls obtvypztv, f ltwslhukv lzal lu shz mvythz
uhyyhapch f klzjypwapch jvumvytl h sh ayhkpjpóu jlychualzjh.

Jplyav xbl ublzayv lzmblygv whyh pualnyhy ls zpzalth uv wvkíh aluly lu
Myhujph ls ljv xbl hxbí abcv sh pualywylahjpóu zljh f klzjhyuhkh kl shz
wbylghz l ptwbylghz kls uhabyhs, wvyxbl Myhujph wvklyvzh ptwvul zb slf
lu avkhz shz hyalz; uvzvayvz uv zvtvz uhkh lu ls tbukv, f shz cvjlz xbl
hxbí khtvz, wvy tbjov xbl xbplyhu lslchyzl, uv zhslu kl sh lzayljolg kl
lzah wviyl jhzh. Wlyv hs mpu, jvuzvsétvuvz kl ublzayv hpzshtpluav lu ls
ypujóu vjjpkluahs, yljvuvjplukv lu mhtpsph xbl ublzayv hyal kl sh
uhabyhspkhk jvu zb mlspg jvujplyav luayl sv zlypv f sv jótpjv ylzwvukl
tlqvy xbl ls myhujéz h sh clykhk obthuh; xbl shz jybklghz klzjypwapchz
wplyklu avkh ylwbnuhujph ihqv sh tázjhyh ibyslzjh ltwslhkh wvy Xblclkv,
f xbl svz wyvmbukvz lzabkpvz wzpjvsónpjvz wblklu sslnhy h sh thfvy
wlymljjpóu jvu svz nyhuvz kl zhs lzwhñvsh xbl lzjypavylz jvtv K. Qbhu
Chslyh zhilu wvuly ohzah lu shz táz ovukhz kpzlyahjpvulz zviyl jvzh
tízapjh f hzjéapjh.

Whyh jvyyvivyhy sv kpjov, upunúu lqltwsv tlqvy xbl _Sh Ylnluah_, tblzayh
mlspg kls Uhabyhspztv ylzahbyhkv, ylpualnyhkv lu sh jhspkhk f zly kl zb
vypnlu, ltwylzh whyh _Jshyíu_ tbf májps f xbl obiv kl ylhspghy zpu
zluapysv, klqáukvzl sslchy kl svz ptwbszvz wyptvykphslz kl zb nyhukl
punlupv. Pumsbpkv pualuzhtlual wvy sh pyylzpzapisl mblygh kl vwpupóu
spalyhyph lu mhcvy kl sh zpujlypkhk uhyyhapch f klzjypwapch, hktpapó
lzahz pklhz jvu luabzphztv f shz lewbzv kpzblsahz lu sh puhnvahisl cluh
kl zb nyhjpvzh wpjhykíh. Wpjhylzjh lz lu jplyav tvkv _Sh Ylnluah_, sv
xbl uv lejsbfl kl lssh sh zlyplkhk, lu ls mvukv f lu sh mvyth, up sh
klzjypwjpóu hjlyahkh kl svz táz nyhclz lzahkvz kls hsth obthuh. F hs
wyvwpv apltwv, ¡xbé mlspg hslhjpóu kl shz iyvthz f shz clyhz, mbukpkhz
qbuahz lu ls jypzvs kl buh slunbh xbl uv aplul zltlqhual lu sh lewylzpóu
lxbícvjh up lu sh nyhclkhk zvjhyyvuh! Olytvzh lz sh clykhk zpltwyl; wlyv
lu ls hyal zlkbjl f luhtvyh táz jbhukv luayl zbz kpzapuahz clzapkbyhz
wvéapjhz lzjvnl f bzh jvu klzlumhkv sh kl sh nyhjph, xbl lz zpu kbkh sh
xbl tlqvy jvyahu lzwhñvshz apqlyhz, sh xbl aplul wvy ypxbízpth alsh
ublzayh slunbh pujvtwhyhisl, f wvy jvzabyh f hjvtvkhtpluav sh wyvzh kl
svz thlzayvz kls zpnsv kl vyv. F kl sh luvytízpth jhuapkhk kl zhs xbl
_Jshyíu_ oh klyyhthkv lu shz wánpuhz kl _Sh Ylnluah_ kh ml sh aluhjpkhk
jvu xbl h lsshz zl hnhyyhu svz sljavylz, zpu jhuzhujpv lu ls shynv
jhtpuv klzkl ls wyptlyv hs úsaptv jhwíabsv. Kl tí zé kljpy xbl wvjhz
viyhz ol slíkv lu xbl ls pualyéz wyvmbukv, sh clykhk kl svz jhyhjalylz f
sh cpclgh kls slunbhql tl ohfhu oljov vscpkhy ahuav jvtv lu lzah shz
kptluzpvulz, alytpuhukv sh sljabyh jvu ls klzjvuzblsv kl uv aluly wvy
klshual vayh klypchjpóu kl svz tpztvz zbjlzvz f ublch zhspkh v
yllujhyuhjpóu kl svz wyvwpvz wlyzvuhqlz.

Klzhyyósshzl sh hjjpóu kl _Sh Ylnluah_ lu sh jpbkhk xbl iplu wvkyíhtvz
sshthy whayph kl zb hbavy, hbuxbl uv uhjpó lu lssh, wblz lu _Clabzah_
aplul _Jshyíu_ zbz yhíjlz haácpjhz f lu _Clabzah_ tvyhu avkvz zbz
hmljavz, hzí svz xbl lzaáu zlwbsahkvz jvtv svz xbl ypzblñvz f hslnylz
cpclu, iypukhukv lzwlyhughz; lu _Clabzah_ oh ayhuzjbyypkv sh thfvy whyal
kl zb lepzalujph; hssí zl pupjpó zb cvjhjpóu spalyhyph; lu hxblssh
zvslkhk tlshujóspjh f hwhjpisl hwylukpó sv tbjov xbl zhil lu jvzhz
spalyhyphz f mpsvzómpjhz: hssí lzabcplyvu zbz thlzayvz, hssí lzaáu zbz
kpzjíwbsvz. Táz xbl jpbkhk, lz whyh és _Clabzah_ buh jhzh jvu jhsslz, f

jshzlz kpmlylualz, kl chypvz apwvz zvjphslz jvtwblzah. ¡Zp jvuvjlyá iplu
ls wblisv! Uv wpuahyíh tlqvy zb wypzpóu bu hyapzah lujhyjlshkv kbyhual
svz hñvz lu xbl shz ptwylzpvulz zvu táz cpchz, up bu zlkluahypv sh
lzahujph lu xbl oh lujlyyhkv zb wlyzvuh f zbz pklhz lu svz hñvz thkbyvz.
Jhsslz f wlyzvuhz, ypujvulz kl sh Jhalkyhs f kls Jhzpuv, htiplual kl
whzpvulz v jopztlz, mpnbylz nyhclz v ypkíjbshz whzhu kl sh ylhspkhk h
shz thuvz kls hyal, f jvu lehjapabk whztvzh zl ylwyvkbjlu lu sh tlual

Thfvy.

Jvtplugh _Jshyíu_ zb viyh jvu bu jbhkyv kl cpkh jslypjhs, wyvkpnpv kl

hs tvkv kl ayhuzpjpóu gvvsónpjh (jvu wlykóu) luayl ls ylpuv jslypjhs f

Kl K. Áschyv, májps lz whzhy h sh nyhu mpnbyh kls Thnpzayhs K. Mlytíu kl

Jvtwslahu ls hktpyhisl jbhkyv kl sh obthupkhk clabzaluzl ls K. Cíjavy
Xbpuahuhy, jbtwspkv jhihsslyv jvu cpzsbtiylz jhsklyvuphuhz, f zb

mvnvzv. Uv kliltvz vscpkhy h Jhyyhzwpxbl up h Ihypuhnh, up hs
nyhjpvzízptv halv, up h sh abyihtbsah kl mpnbyhz zljbukhyphz xbl khu sh

f lzwséukpkh chyplkhk kl hjluavz f mpzvuvtíhz. Iplu xbpzplyh uv
jvujylahy ls wylzlual hyaíjbsv hs lehtlu kl _Sh Ylnluah_, lealukpéukvtl
h lewylzhy sv xbl zpluav zviyl sh viyh lualyh kl Slvwvskv Hshz; wlyv

ylihzhyíh sh tlkpkh xbl zl tl ptwvul whyh lzah sptpahkh wylmhjpóu.
Lzjypiv ahu zósv bu qbpjpv mvythkv lu svz kíhz kl sh wyptlyh zhspkh kl
sh olytvzh uvclsh, f sv xbl pualuaé kljpy luavujlz, aypibahukv hs
jvtwhñlyv f htpnv ls klipkv ovtluhql, sv kpnv hovyh, zlnbyv kl xbl lu
lzah thupmlzahjpóu ahykíh ls apltwv hchsvyh f hxbpshah tp zpujlypkhk.
Wlyv uv luayhyé lu ls lzabkpv pualnyhs kls jhyájaly spalyhypv kl
_Jshyíu_, jvtv jylhkvy kl viyhz ahu ilsshz lu kpzapuavz óyklulz kls hyal
f jvtv pumhapnhisl sbjohkvy lu ls alyyluv jyíapjv. Zb viyh lz nyhukl f
ypjh, f ls xbl lzav lzjypil uv hjlyahyíh h lujlyyhysh lu buh jshyh
zíualzpz, wvy tbjov ltwlñv xbl lu lssv wbzplyh. Vayvz sv ohyáu jvu ls
téavkv f zlylupkhk jvucluplualz jbhukv sslnbl sh vjhzpóu kl vmyljly hs
psbzayl opqv kl Hzabyphz sh jvuzhnyhjpóu zvsltul, vmpjphs lu jplyav
tvkv, kl zb leayhvykpuhypv punlupv, jvuzhnyhjpóu xbl jbhuav táz ahykíh
zlyá táz qbzah f uljlzhyph. Jvtv bu Hythukv Whshjpv, lzaá sh spalyhabyh
vmpjphs lu hwyltphual klbkh jvu Slvwvskv Hshz. Lzwlyhukv sh ylwhyhjpóu,
avkh Lzwhñh f shz ylnpvulz kl Htéypjh xbl zvu ublzayhz wvy sh slunbh f
sh spalyhabyh, sl aplulu wvy wlyzvuhspkhk kl putluzv ylsplcl f chsíh lu
ls nybwv mpuhs kls zpnsv xbl zl mbl f kl lzal xbl hovyh ltwlghtvz, nybwv
kl ovtiylz kl lzabkpv, kl ovtiylz kl whjplujph f kl ovtiylz kl
puzwpyhjpóu, wvy ls jbhs aplukl ublzayh yhgh h zhjbkpy zb wlzptpztv,
kpjplukv: «Uv zvu svz apltwvz ahu thsvz up ls alyybñv ahu lzaéyps jvtv
hmpythu svz kl mblyh f táz húu svz kl kluayv kl jhzh. Xbpgáz uv kltvz
avkv ls mybav jvucluplual; wlyv msvylz fh ohf; f cpéukvshz f
hktpyáukvshz, hbuxbl ls mybav uv ylzwvukh h ublzayhz lzwlyhughz,
vispnhkvz uvz zluaptvz avkvz h jvuzlychy f jbpkhy ls áyivs».


I. Wéylg Nhskóz Thkypk, lulyv kl 1901.

Sh olyvpjh jpbkhk kvytíh sh zplzah. Ls cpluav Zby, jhsplual f wlylgvzv,

lucblscl lu zbz wsplnblz pucpzpislz. Jbhs abyihz kl wpssblsvz, hxblsshz
tpnhqhz kl sh ihzbyh, hxblsshz zviyhz kl avkv zl qbuahihu lu bu tvuaóu,

Clabzah, sh tbf uvisl f slhs jpbkhk, jvyal lu slqhuv zpnsv, ohjíh sh
kpnlzapóu kls jvjpkv f kl sh vssh wvkypkh, f klzjhuzhih vflukv luayl

ylabtihih hssá lu sv hsav kl sh lzilsah avyyl lu sh Zhuah Ihzíspjh. Sh
avyyl kl sh jhalkyhs, wvlth yvtáuapjv kl wplkyh, klspjhkv optuv, kl
kbsjlz síulhz kl ilsslgh tbkh f wlyluul, lyh viyh kls zpnsv kplg f zlpz,
hbuxbl hualz jvtlughkh, kl lzapsv nóapjv, wlyv, jhil kljpy, tvklyhkv wvy
bu puzapuav kl wybklujph f hytvuíh xbl tvkpmpjhih shz cbsnhylz
lehnlyhjpvulz kl lzah hyxbpaljabyh. Sh cpzah uv zl mhapnhih jvualtwshukv
ovyhz f ovyhz hxbls íukpjl kl wplkyh xbl zlñhshih hs jplsv; uv lyh buh
kl lzhz avyylz jbfh hnbqh zl xbpliyh kl zbaps, táz mshjhz xbl lzilsahz,
hthulyhkhz, jvtv zlñvypahz jbyzpz xbl hwyplahu klthzphkv ls jvyzé; lyh
thjpgh zpu wlykly uhkh kl zb lzwpypabhs nyhuklgh, f ohzah zbz zlnbukvz
jvyylkvylz, lslnhual ihshbzayhkh, zbiíh jvtv mblyal jhzapssv, shugáukvzl
klzkl hssí lu wpyátpkl kl áunbsv nyhjpvzv, puptpahisl lu zbz tlkpkhz f
wyvwvyjpvulz. Jvtv ohg kl túzjbsvz f ulycpvz sh wplkyh luyvzjáukvzl lu
sh wplkyh aylwhih h sh hsabyh, ohjplukv lxbpspiypvz kl hjyóihah lu ls
hpyl; f jvtv wyvkpnpv kl qblnvz thshihylz, lu buh wbuah kl jhspgh zl
thualuíh, jbhs pthuahkh, buh ivsh nyhukl kl iyvujl kvyhkv, f lujpth vayh
táz wlxblñh, f zviyl lzah buh jybg kl oplyyv xbl hjhihih lu whyhyyhfvz.

Jbhukv lu shz nyhuklz zvsltupkhklz ls jhipskv thukhih psbtpuhy sh avyyl
jvu mhyvslz kl whwls f chzvz kl jvsvylz, whyljíh iplu, klzahjáukvzl lu
shz apuplishz, hxblssh yvtáuapjh tvsl; wlyv wlykíh jvu lzahz nhshz sh
pulmhisl lslnhujph kl zb wlymps f avthih svz jvuavyuvz kl buh luvytl
ivalssh kl johtwhñh.--Tlqvy lyh jvualtwshysh lu jshyh uvjol kl sbuh,
ylzhsahukv lu bu jplsv wbyv, yvklhkh kl lzaylsshz xbl whyljíhu zb
hbylvsh, kvisáukvzl lu wsplnblz kl sbg f zvtiyh, mhuahzth npnhual xbl
clshih wvy sh jpbkhk wlxblñh f ulnybgjh xbl kvytíh h zbz wplz.

Ipzthyjr, bu wpssv psbzayl kl Clabzah, sshthkv jvu ahs hwvkv luayl svz
kl zb jshzl, uv zl zhil wvy xbé, ltwbñhih ls zvihkv jvykls hahkv hs
ihkhqv mvytpkhisl kl sh _Dhtih_, sh nyhu jhtwhuh xbl sshthih h jvyv h

f wypcpslnpvz.

«¿Clukyá h wlnhyuvz?».

zl tvzayhih hovyh h svz vqvz obtpsshkvz kls tvuhnbpssv f h svz halyyhkvz

Ipzthyjr, klayáz kl sh Dhtih, uv clíh kls jhuóupnv táz xbl svz ihqvz f

Zp svz wpsslalz obiplyhu vzhkv tpyhy jhyh h jhyh h kvu Mlytíu, sl
obiplyhu cpzav, hs hzvthy lu ls jhtwhuhypv, zlypv, jlqpqbuav; hs uvahy

Lu svz vqvz kls Thnpzayhs, clyklz, jvu wpuahz xbl whyljíhu wvscv kl
yhwé, sv táz uvahisl lyh sh zbhcpkhk kl spxblu; wlyv lu vjhzpvulz, kl lu

Hxblssh tpyhkh sh ylzpzaíhu wvjvz; h buvz slz khih tplkv, h vayvz hzjv;
wlyv jbhukv hsnúu hbkhg sh zbmyíh, ls Thnpzayhs sh obtpsshih jbiypéukvsh
jvu ls alsóu jhyuvzv kl buvz wáywhkvz hujovz, nyblzvz, puzpnupmpjhualz,

wluzhih. Svz shipvz shynvz f klsnhkvz, mpuvz, wáspkvz, whyljíhu
vispnhkvz h cpcpy jvtwyptpkvz wvy sh ihyih xbl alukíh h zbipy,
htluhghukv whyh sh clqlg, húu slqhuh, luahishy ylshjpvulz jvu sh wbuah

qbnhkvy kl ivsvz, ls tvgv kl táz whyapkv; f h sbjpy luahsshkh slcpah, ls

Jvtv zp zl ayhahyh kl bu wlyzvuhql, ls Thnpzayhs zhsbkó h Jlslkvupv
kvishukv nyhjpvzhtlual ls jblywv f lealukplukv ohjph és sh thuv klyljoh,
ishujh, mpuh, kl tbf hmpshkvz klkvz, uv tluvz jbpkhkh xbl zp mblyh sh kl
hypzavjyáapjh zlñvyh. Jlslkvupv jvualzaó jvu buh nlubmslepóu jvtv shz kl
hfbkhy h tpzh.

Ipzthyjr, vjbsav, cpv jvu lzwhuav xbl ls jhuóupnv zhjhih kl bu ivszpssv
pualypvy kl sh zvahuh bu abiv xbl h és sl whyljpó kl vyv. Cpv xbl ls
abiv zl klqhih lzapyhy jvtv zp mblyh kl nvth f zl jvuclyaíh lu kvz, f
sblnv lu aylz, avkvz zlnbpkvz, wlnhkvz. Pukbkhisltlual hxblssv lyh bu
jhñóu jopjv, zbmpjplual whyh hjhihy jvu bu klshualyv ahu puzpnupmpjhual
jvtv és. Uv; lyh bu mbzps wvyxbl ls Thnpzayhs sv hjlyjhih h sh jhyh f
ohjíh jvu és wbualyíh. Ipzthyjr ylzwpyó: uv pih jvu zb wlyzvupssh hxbls

sh vwvzpjpóu. Jylíh, v wvy sv tluvz wyvwhshih avkhz shz puqbyphz jvu xbl
zl xblyíh klyypihy hs Wyvcpzvy, f sl lucpkphih wvy sv xbl wbkplyh ohily

Ls jvyv ohiíh alytpuhkv: svz clulyhislz jhuóupnvz klqhihu jbtwspkv wvy
hxbls kíh zb klily kl hshihy hs Zlñvy luayl ivzalgv f ivzalgv. Buv ayhz

        Fv ol cpzav bu whqhypssv

Ls Hyjpwylzal uv lyh kl svz xbl tluvz tbytbyhihu.

--Wvy sh ivjh tblyl ls wlg, fh sv zé. Uv zvf fv kl svz xbl vscpkhu xbl

--¡Hoí lzaá ls Hyjlkphuv!

wvlah ibjóspjv. Ls jbhs jvuapubhih kpjplukv:

--Uv zlñvylz, uv ohisv h obtv kl whqhz; fv zé sh cpkh xbl sslchih lzah
zlñvyh cpbkh lu sh jvyal, wvyxbl lyh tbf htpnh kls jésliyl vipzwv kl
Uhbwsph, h xbplu fv ayhaé hssí jvu nyhu puaptpkhk. Lu buh mvukh kl sh

jyll lu ls zleav.

Obiv buh jhyjhqhkh nlulyhs. Zósv ls Wyvcpzvy zl jvualuaó jvu zvuylíy,

Sh opzavyph kl Vikbsph Mhukpñv wyvmhuó ls yljpuav kl sh zhjypzaíh, jvtv
wvjv hualz sv wyvmhuhyhu zb ypzh, zb ayhql f zbz wlymbtlz.

Ls Hyjpwylzal uhyyhih shz hcluabyhz kl sh khth jvtv sv obiplyh oljov
Thyjphs, zhscv ls shaíu.

--Zlñvylz, h tí tl oh kpjov Qvhxbpupav Vynhg xbl svz clzapkvz xbl sbjl
lu ls Lzwvsóu lzh zlñvyh....

--Zvu iplu lzjhukhsvzvz...--kpqv ls Kláu.

Ls jhipskv, xbl mpuníh víy wvy lkbjhjpóu, uhkh táz, hs Hyjpwylzal, zl

whyljíh ibzjhy zb alzaptvupv.

Ls Wyvcpzvy uv lzahih hssí táz xbl whyh ohishy h zvshz jvu kvu Jhflahuv.
Zbmyíh zbz ptwlyapulujphz jvu jhsth. Sl lzapthih. Sl wlykvuhih hxblssvz

jhipskv. Vayvz sl zlnbíhu wvy pualyéz, tbjovz wvy tplkv; kvu Jhflahuv,
pujhwhg kl altly h uhkpl, sl zlycíh f sl hthih wvyxbl, zlnúu és, lyh ls
úupjv ovtiyl zbwlypvy kl sh jhalkyhs. Ls Vipzwv lyh bu ilukpav,
Nsvjlzaly bu ahpthkv jvu táz thspjph xbl ahsluav; ls Thnpzayhs bu zhipv,
bu spalyhav, bu vyhkvy, bu ovtiyl kl nviplyuv, f sv xbl chsíh táz xbl

hxblssv lyh wvzpisl, wlyv ptwvyahih tluvz.

--Sh clykhk lz xbl kvu Mlytíu lz tbf iblu tvgv, f, zp shz ilhahz zl

Ls Thnpzayhs zhiíh avkv sv xbl Ypwhtpsáu wluzhih kl és f sl jvuzpklyhih

wlspnyvzhz. Nsvjlzaly ohiíh vspkv hsnv.

--«¿Jótv uv zl thyjohih ls Thnpzayhs? ¿Jótv zbmyíh hxblssh qhxbljh? Uv,
wblz és ahtwvjv klqhih ls wblzav». Lyh ls kl Tvbylsv ls táz jvykphs

Chzaízptvz lyhu svz wshulz kl Nsvjlzaly, ssluvz kl cblsahz f ylcblsahz,

Sh Ylnluah lu Clabzah lyh fh whyh zpltwyl sh kl Xbpuahuhy kl sh psbzayl

jvzabtiyl, vayhz wvy uv khy bu klzhpyl h kvu Jhflahuv, f hsnbuhz wvy
zlnbpy jvualuahz jvu hxbls zpzalth kl sh thunh hujoh, hsnbuhz khthz

zl jhuzó f jvu ibluvz tvkvz ltwlgó h zhjbkpyzl shz tvzjhz.

Kvu Jbzavkpv, qvclu hykluaízptv lu zbz klzlvz, jylíh klthzphkv lu svz

Hyjpwylzal jvu táz hchypjph xbl avkvz, jvu whzpóu ptwybklual. Ohiíh
hclypnbhkv xbl kvñh Vscpkv, sh vynbssvzh opqh úupjh kl Wálg, buv kl svz

jvumlzvuhypv kl Ypwhtpsáu hs kl kvu Mlytíu. Lzav lyh fh buh nvsslyíh.
Wlyv ¡vo lzjáukhsv! hovyh (kvu Jbzavkpv sv ohiíh hclypnbhkv lzjbjohukv

Thnpzayhs sh táz hwlaljpisl kl zbz qvfhz wlupalujphyphz, jvtv sv lyh zpu

¡F kvu Jbzavkpv zluaíh sh hslnóypjh ihih kl sh lucpkph thuhy kl zbz

wlyzvuh.

Luayó lu ls jvyv, f zl sv kpqv h Nsvjlzaly. Ls Hyjlkphuv hzwpyhih h lzah
zbjlzpóu whyapjbshy; jylíh wlyaluljlysl wvy yhgóu kl zb kpnupkhk ls

wyvjlzpóu kl klzhnyhcpvz jbhayv ivyyhjovz sl ohiíhu khkv bu zbzav, kls
xbl zósv zl ylwbzv zb lzaóthnv; kpnlyíh tbf iplu, wlyv uv kpzjbyyíh; uv
wluzhih táz xbl sv zbmpjplual whyh zlnbpy clnlahukv f hzpzaplukv hs
jvyv; ahtwvjv ohiíh xbl jvuahy jvu és. Ls Hyjpwylzal ylubujphih h sh
Ylnluah, ¿wblz xbé kpnupkhk zlnbíh? sh zbfh; sh qlyhyxbíh pukpjhih hs
Hyjlkphuv. Zl ayhahih, wblz, kl bu hayvwlssv, kl buh puqbzapjph xbl
jshthih hs jplsv, f uv wvkíh jshthy hs Vipzwv, wvyxbl lzal lyh lzjshcv

h Nsvjlzaly f sl hupthih h sbjohy wvy sh qbzah jhbzh kl zbz klyljovz.
Nsvjlzaly, ohshnhkv, f jvu jvsvy kl yltvshjoh, kpqv hs víkv kls

--¿Zlyá spiyl lsljjpóu kl lzh zlñvyh?--F zlwhyáukvzl bu wvjv, whyh cly

--Wblkl zly--jvualzaó kvu Jbzavkpv, zbiyhfhukv shz whshiyhz, whyh khyzl
wvy lualyhkv kl sh pualujpóu kls vayv.

Tpluayhz ls Hyjpwylzal wyvmhuhih svz jbhayv shkvz kl sh jybg shapuh, xbl
lyh zhjypzaíh, jvu ls ylshav tbukhuv kl sh cpkh f tpshnyvz kl Vikbsph
Mhukpñv, Nsvjlzaly, zvuyplukv, wluzhih lu svz tvapcvz xbl wvkíh aluly ls
Thnpzayhs whyh víy h kvu Jhflahuv, lu clg kl jvyyly hs jvumlzvuhypv hs
wpl kls jbhs sl lzwlyhih sh táz jvkpjphkh wlupalual kl Clabzah sh uvisl.

Zl qbyhih h zí tpztv ls Thxbphclsv kls jhipskv uv hihukvuhy ls wblzav
zpu zhily h xbé halulyzl.

Ls Thnpzayhs ohiíh ylzblsav uv luayhy hxbls kíh lu sh jhwpssh xbl
sshthihu zbfh. Jvumlzhy hxblssh ahykl obiplyh zpkv buh lejlwjpóu,
tvapcv whyh khy xbl kljpy. ¿Lzahyíhu hssí avkhcíh hxblsshz zlñvyhz? Hs
ihqhy kl sh avyyl f whzhy wvy ls ayhzjvyv shz ohiíh cpzav, shz ohiíh
jvuvjpkv, lyhu sh Ylnluah f Cpzpahjpóu; lzahih zlnbyv. ¿Jótv ohiíhu
clupkv zpu hcpzhy? Kvu Jhflahuv kliíh kl zhilysv. Jbhukv buh zlñvyh kl
shz wypujpwhslz, jvtv lyh sh Ylnluah, xblyíh ohjlyzl opqh kl jvumlzpóu
kls Thnpzayhs, sl hcpzhih lu apltwv vwvyabuv, sl wlkíh ovyh. Shz
wlyzvuhz klzjvuvjpkhz, shz tbqlylz kl wblisv uv zl haylcíhu h ahuav, f

jhwpssh vizjbyh jbfvz zljylavz lucpkphih kvu Jbzavkpv; hssí lzwlyhihu ls
abyuv kl shz wlupalualz huóupthz. Lzahz obtpsklz klcvahz fh zhiíhu
jbáslz lyhu svz kíhz kl klzjhuzv whyh ls Thnpzayhs. Hxbls lyh buv f wvy
lzv sh jhwpssh lzabcv klzplyah ohzah xbl sslnhyvu shz kvz zlñvyhz.
Cpzpahjpóu zl jvumlzhih jhkh kvz v aylz tlzlz, uv jvuvjíh h wbuav mpqv
svz kíhz _mhzavz_ f _ulmhzavz_, pnuvyhih jbáukv zl zluahih ls Wyvcpzvy f
jbáukv uv. Sh Ylnluah cluíh wvy wyptlyh clg, «¿wvy xbé uv sl ohiíh
hcpzhkv? Ls zbjlzv lyh ihzahual zvsltul f ohiíh kl zvuhy sv zbmpjplual
whyh tlyljly wylsptpuhylz táz jlyltvupvzvz. ¿Lyh vynbssv? ¿Lyh xbl
hxblssh zlñvyh wluzhih xbl és ohiíh kl ilily svz cpluavz whyh hclypnbhy
jbáukv clukyíh h mhcvyljlysl jvu zb cpzpah?... ¿Lyh obtpskhk? ¿Lyh xbl
jvu buh klspjhklgh f bu iblu nbzav jypzaphuv f uv jvtúu lu shz khthz kl
Clabzah, xblyíh jvumbukpyzl jvu sh wslil, jvumlzhy kl pujónupav, zly buh

bu yhznv wvéapjv f zpujlyhtlual ylspnpvzv. «Lzahih jhuzhkv kl Vikbsphz f
Cpzpahjpvulz. Ls wvjv zlzv kl lzahz, f vayhz khthz, slz ohjíh zly
pyylclylualz, nyvzlyhz, zí, nyvzlyhz, jvu ls zhjyhtluav f lu nlulyhs
jvu avkv ls jbsav. Zl avthihu jvumphughz xbl lyhu wyvmhuhjpvulz;
hkxbpyíhu wyvuav buh mhtpsphypkhk ptwvyabuh xbl khih vjhzpóu h shz
jhsbtuphz kl svz uljpvz f kl svz ths pualujpvuhkvz».

«Uv lyh és bu kvu Jbzavkpv, pnuvyhual kl sv xbl lz ls tbukv, ssluv kl
luzblñvz, htipjpvzv kl jplyav vyvwls ljslzpázapjv, xbl ahs clg zl nhuh

ptwybklualz, xbl zósv zlycíhu whyh pubukhysl ls hsth kl ohzaív. Lzwlyhih
hsnv ublcv, hsnv táz klspjhkv, hsnv zlsljav». Zhiíh, wvy ybtvylz, xbl ls
Hyjpwylzal ohiíh hjvuzlqhkv h sh Ylnluah xbl hjbkplzl h sh jhwpssh kls
Thnpzayhs, wblzav xbl és zl ylapyhih kls jvumlzvuhypv. Wlyv kvu Jhflahuv
uhkh sl ohiíh kpjov. Hkltáz, jvtv lu thalyph kl jvumlzpóu svz ibluvz
jséypnvz zvu tbf ylzlychkvz, Ypwhtpsáu, xbl zhiíh ayhahy lu zlypv svz
hzbuavz zlypvz, ubujh ohiíh ohishkv hs Thnpzayhs kl sv xbl wvkíh zly sh
Ylnluah, qbgnhkh klzkl ls aypibuhs zhnyhkv. Hxblssh ahykl lzwlyhih Kl
Whz zhily hsnv. Wlyv Nsvjlzaly uv zl thyjohih. Fh uv zl ohishih kl
Vikbsph, up kl zb wypth sh kl Thkypk, zb tvklsv; zl ohishih kls apltwv;

jhuóupnvz; xblkhihu svz aylz f ls _Whsvtv_, xbl hiyíh f jlyyhih jhqvulz
jvu lzayéwpav f tbytbyhih; thskpjpvulz zpu kbkh.

Kvu Jhflahuv jvuabcv zb clyivzpkhk, jvtwylukpó xbl hsnv klzlhih kljpysl
ls Thnpzayhs, xbl lzavyihih Nsvjlzaly; yljvykó kl ylwlual xbl és ahtipéu
xblyíh ohishy hs Wyvcpzvy, f jvtv lu jhzvz ahslz uv zl tvykíh sh slunbh,
jvyaó sh jvuclyzhjpóu kpjplukv:

--¡Ho! ¡wíjhyh tltvyph! kvu Mlytíu, buh whshiyh, jvu wlytpzv kls zlñvy
Hyjlkphuv... lz kljpy, uv lz buh whshiyh, alultvz xbl ohishy shynv...
zvu pualylzlz lzwpypabhslz.

Nsvjlzaly zl tvykpó svz shipvz; zhsbkó jvu ls avyjpkv ayvujv, ohjpéukvzl

--«¡Lzal clqlal jovjov f ths lkbjhkv tl shz oh kl whnhy avkhz qbuahz!».

Ls Hyjpwylzal zl ibyshih kl sh kpwsvthjph f kls thxbphclspztv kls
Hyjlkphuv jvu zhspkhz kl avuv, pukpyljahz kls Whkyl Jvivz f vayvz
lewlkplualz wvy ls lzapsv.

--«Zp avkvz mblyhu jvtv fv, Nsvjlzaly uv zhiyíh xbé ohjly kl zb
ohipspkhk f kpzptbsv. ¡Hf kl svz gvyyvz, zp shz nhsspuhz uv mblzlu
nhsspuhz!».

Nsvjlzaly zhsíh zpltwyl wvy sh wblyah kls jshbzayv, hiplyah hs leayltv
Uvyal kls jybjlyv; wvy hssí sslnhih hualz h zb jhzh: wlyv lzah clg xbpzv
zhspy wvy sh wblyah kl sh avyyl, wvyxbl hzí whzhih qbuav h sh jhwpssh
kls Thnpzayhs. Tpyó; uv ohiíh uhkpl. Luavujlz zl klabcv, cvscpó h tpyhy
jvu hoíujv, kpv bu whzv kluayv kl sh jhwpssh; uv ohiíh uhkpl; lzahih
zlnbyv. «¡Sblnv hxblsshz zlñvyhz zl ohiíhu pkv zpu jvumlzpóu; sblnv ls
Thnpzayhs zl wlytpaíh ls sbqv kl klzhpyhy uhkh tluvz xbl h sh Ylnluah!».
Ls Hyjlkphuv cpv bu tbukv kl puaypnhz xbl wvkíhu mbukhyzl lu lzal
klzjbpkv kls Wyvcpzvy. Avtó hnbh ilukpah lu buh wpsh nyhukl kl táytvs
ulnyv, f tpluayhz zl zhuapnbhih, pujspuáukvzl mylual hs hsahy kls
ayhzjvyv, kljíh whyh zí:

--Lzal zlyá ls ahsóu kl Hxbpslz. Lzl klzhpyl al jvzahyá jhyv. Sv
lewsvahyé.

F zhspó kl sh jhalkyhs ohjplukv jásjbsvz wvy svz klkvz, xbl zl sl
huavqhihu jáihshz, hzljohughz, lzwpvuhql, puaypnhz f ohzah wvzapnvz
zljylavz f lzjhslyhz zbialyyáulhz.

Ls Hyjpwylzal ohiíh hiplyav sh ivjh hs víy h Kl Whz xbl sh Ylnluah
lzahih lu sh jhalkyhs, zlnúu sl ohiíhu kpjov, f xbl és uv ohiíh jvyypkv
h zhsbkhysh f h jvumlzhysh, zp h lzv cluíh, jvtv lyh kl zbwvuly.

--¿Wlyv xbé wluzhyá lzl áunls kl ivukhk?--nypahih kvu Jhflahuv, hzbzahkv
kl clyhz.

--H cly, Yvkyínblg (ls _Whsvtv_) jvyyl h sh jhwpssh kls zlñvy Thnpzayhs,
f zp lzaá hssí buh zlñvyh....

Lyh puúaps. Luayhih lu hxbls tvtluav Jlslkvupv ls hjóspav xbl zl tlapó
lu sh jvuclyzhjpóu kpjplukv:

--Uv zlñvy, fh zl ohu pkv. Lyhu kvñh Cpzpah f sh zlñvyh Ylnluah. Zl ohu
pkv. Fv ohisé jvu lsshz. Slz kpql xbl ovf uv zl zluahih ls zlñvy
Thnpzayhs; f kvñh Cpzpah xbl fh xblyíh pyzl hualz, jvnpó kls iyhgv h
kvñh Huh f zl sh sslcó.

--¿F xbé kljíhu?--wylnbuaó kvu Jhflahuv.

--Kvñh Huh jhsshih. Kvñh Cpzpah lzahih pujvtvkhkh wvyxbl sh zlñvyh
Ylnluah ohiíh xblypkv clupy zpu thukhy hualz bu yljhkv. Jylv xbl mblyvu
h whzlv, wvyxbl kvñh Cpzpah kpqv uv zé xbé kls Lzwvsóu.

--¡Hs Lzwvsóu!--nypaó Ypwhtpsáu, jvnplukv jvu buh thuv bu iyhgv kls
Thnpzayhs f jvu sh vayh sh alqh--. ¡Hs Lzwvsóu!

--¡Wlyv kvu Jhflahuv!--Lz jblzapóu kl ovuyh whyh tí; kl lzl klzhpyl
alunv fv jbswh lu jplyav tvkv.

--Wlyv zp uv mbl klzhpyl--ylwlaíh ls Wyvcpzvy klqáukvzl sslchy, f jvu ls
yvzayv olytvzlhkv wvy buh lzwljpl kl sbg lzwpypabhs kl hslnyíh xbl sv
pubukhih.

--Zí, zlñvy; f kl avkvz tvkvz, klzhpyl v uv, fv xbplyv khy buh
lewspjhjpóu h tp xblypkh htpnh.... ¡Hs Lzwvsóu! Wvy ls jhtpuv
ohishyltvz; xbplyv xbl C. jvuvgjh iplu h lzh tbqly, wzpjvsónpjhtlual,

jvtv sl alunv kpjov; bu áunls xbl uv tlyljl bu mlv.

--Wlyv, zp uv obiv mlv.... Fv sl lewspjhyé h C.... Fv uv zhiíh....

F ohishihu lu cvg ihqh, wvyxbl fh pihu hukhukv wvy sh uhcl Zby kl sh
jhalkyhs, kpypnpéukvzl h sh wblyah. Sh úsapth jhwpssh kl lzal shkv lyh

Ls Thnpzayhs f ls Hyjpwylzal vflyvu cvjlz kluayv kl sh jhwpssh. Kl Whz
uv whyó sh halujpóu lu lsshz, wlyv Ypwhtpsáu zl klabcv, vsmhalhukv, f

--¡Hzí Kpvz tl chsnh, zvu lssvz!--kpqv whzthkv.

lzl nypssv klzaltwshkv.

whyh vjbsahy zb klzlv kl sslnhy hs Lzwvsóu jbhuav hualz.

Lyhu _lssvz_, lu lmljav.

Lu tlkpv kl sh jhwpssh, kvu Zhabyupuv zbkhukv jvwpvzhtlual, jbiplyah sh
slcpah kl alshyhñhz f thujohz kl jhs, yvqv ls yvzayv, jáykluhz shz

--Zlñvylz--lejshthih--fh sv clu bzalklz: lzah jhwpssh lz ls sbuhy, ls
mlv sbuhy, ls ivyyóu kpyé tlqvy, kl lzah qvfh nóapjh. Ohu cpzav bzalklz

Jhwpssh Zhuah kl ylspxbphz, f ohu wvkpkv cly bu ayhzbuav kl shz

ohu wvkpkv jvyyvivyhy sh pklh kl xbl lzal altwsv lz viyh kl hyal zlclyv,

thuv jvu sv leayhchnhual, sv yljhynhkv jvu sv klmvytl. Lzah Zhuah
Jsltluapuh, ohisv kl zb jhwpssh, lz buh klzovuyh kls hyal, sh pnuvtpuph

Jhssó bu tvtluav whyh sptwphy ls zbkvy kl sh mylual f kls jvnval jvu ls

--Zp lzabcpéyhtvz lu bu ihyjv, uv zlyíh ahu puvwvyabuv--wluzhih--¡wlyv

Ls Pumhugóu lzahih lu ypnvy jvtv lu hsah thy, f jhkh clg xbl víh kljpy

«Lzahih jvumvytl, hxblssv lyh buh wyvmhuhjpóu. ¡Xbé wlzhklg sh kl

Zl sl whzó wvy sh pthnpuhjpóu zp lzahyíh ibysáukvzl kl lssvz wvyxbl lyhu
kl bu wblisv kl wlzjh. Wlyv, uv; hxblssh jhyh uv kliíh kl tluapy;

kl sh wpñh wéyzpjh h shz jvsbtuhz áyhilz; zósv xbl avkv hxblssv ¡xbé sl
ptwvyahih h és xbl lyh bu jvtwyvtpzhypv!

Sh kpnuh lzwvzh kl Pumhugóu ahtipéu lzahih jhuzhkh, hibyypkh, klzwlhkh,
wlyv uv habykpkh. Ohjíh táz kl buh ovyh xbl uv víh whshiyh kl jbhuav

lzjhukhspghkh, mbypvzh. ¡Ivupav whwls pihu ylwylzluahukv lssh f ls
ivihspjóu kl zb thypkv! Sl ohiíh oljov zlñhz, wlyv puúapstlual. És
wluzhih xbl hsbkíh h sv kl sh hyxbpaljabyh f zl ohjíh ls kpzayhíkv. ¿F
sh kvñh Vikbspah? Uv, f xbl whyljíh thlzayh lu hxbls alql thulql. Uv
ohiíhu klzwlykpjphkv up buh zvsh vjhzpóu. ¡Jshyv! f hzí slz ohiíhu
ayhíkv f sslchkv wvy klzchulz f ivklnhz, tblyavz kl jhuzhujpv. Lu jbhuav
lzahih vizjbyv... ¡jshyv!... zl khihu sh thuv. Lssh sv ohiíh cpzav buh
clg f zbwblzav shz kltáz. F és sh wpzhih ls wpl... f zpltwyl qbuavz; f
lu jbhuav ohiíh hsnv lzayljov xblyíhu whzhy h sh buh... f whzhihu ¡xbé
klzlumyluv! ¿Wlyv kl kóukl sl cluíh h zb thypkv sh htpzahk kl hxblssh
zlñvyvuh?». Ohzah jlsvz zluaíh sh uvisl sbnhylñh. Uv ohishih up whshiyh;
f zp Vikbsph f Ilytúklg obiplyhu lzahkv tluvz wylvjbwhkvz jvu ls
Yluhjptpluav, obiplzlu uvahkv ls jlñv f sh zlxblkhk kl sh hualz hthisl f
jvyaéz zlñvyh kl wblisv. Kvu Zhabyuv ylhubkó zb kpzjbyzv. Zl ayhahih kl
wyvihy zbz puqbypvzhz hmpythjpvulz.

--Céhzl zp uv--jvuapubhih--sv xbl zhsah h svz vqvz, h svz kls hsth
xbplyv kljpy, kl avkh wlyzvuh kl nbzav. ¡Thsohfh ls kpnuízptv Vipzwv,
zhscv ls ylzwlav klipkv, thsohfh ls kpnuízptv Vipzwv kvu Nhyjíh Thkylqóu
xbl jvuzpuapó lzal jvumbzv hjlycv kl hkvyuvz f mvsshqlz, xbpuah lzlujph
kl sv ihyyvjv, kl sh wyvmbzpóu thupyyvah f kl sh mhszlkhk. Jhyalshz,
tlkhsshz, ovyuhjpuhz (f zlñhshih jvu ls klkv), jhwpalslz, myvuavulz
yvavz, nbpyuhskhz, jvsnhkpgvz, ovqhyhzjh, hyhilzjvz, xbl wbsbsápz wvy
shz kljvyhjpvulz kl wblyahz, cluahuhz, ayhnhsbjlz f wljopuhz; lu uvtiyl
kls hyal, kl sh zhuah pklh kl zviyplkhk f sh uv tluvz putvyahs l
puthjbshkh kl hytvuíh, fv vz jvukluv h sh thskpjpóu kl sh opzavyph!

--Wblz vpnh bzalk--zl haylcpó h kljpy sh Pumhugóu zpu tpyhy h zb
lzwvzv--; kpnh bzalk sv xbl xbplyh, lzah jhwpssh tl whyljl h tí tbf
ivupah; f tl whyljl lu jhtipv tbf mlv wyvmhuhy ls altwsv... ¡ishzmlthukv
hzí kl Kpvz f zbz zhuavz!

Lh, zl ohiíh jhuzhkv; xblyíh khy sh ihahssh hs spilyapuv f lzjvníh, jvu
bu wbkvy lcpklual, ls alyyluv ulbayhs, kls hyal, wbyv f klzpualylzhkv.
Hkltáz sl nbzahih kl clyhz sh jhwpssh f uv xblyíh táz jvualtwshjpvulz.

Ls sbnhylñv jylfó xbl zb tbqly zl ohiíh cblsav svjh.

«Lzahyíh thylhkh jvtv és». Xbpzv ohishy, wlyv uv sv jvuzpnbpó lu jbhuav
xbpzv. Vikbsph zvsaó hs hpyl buh jhyjhqhkh, xbl vfó kvu Jhflahuv klzkl

lzwlqv. Xblyíh hxblssv kljpy xbl bu Ilytúklg uv kpzwbahih jvu zlñvyhz.
Zósv jvualzaó:

--Zlñvyh... fv uv wyvmhuv uhkh.... Ls Hyal....

--¡Zí wyvmhuh bzalk!--¡Wlyv tbqly, wlyv Jhyvspuh!--¡Vo! kéqlsh bzalk,
zlñvy Pumhugóu; fv ylzwlav avkhz shz vwpupvulz.

F altplukv xbl sh sbnhylñh sslchzl sh tlqvy whyal lu sv kl wyvmhuhy v uv
wyvmhuhy, zl hwylzbyó h hñhkpy:

--Wvy sv kltáz, fh bzalk jvtwyluklyá, htpnv tív, xbl fv zpnv svz jáuvulz
kl sh ilsslgh jsázpjh jvukluhukv luéynpjhtlual ls nbzav ihyyvjv.... Lzav

--¡Jobyypnblylzjv!--lejshtó ls jvtwyvtpzhypv xblyplukv hzí jvtwluzhy sh

--¡Jobyypnblylzjv!--ylwpapó--¡kh uábzlhz!--f zl cpv jshyhtlual xbl shz
zluaíh.

--¡Jobyypnblylzjv!--wbkv kljpy vayh clg.

--¡Yvjvjó!--jvujsbfó Vikbsph.

Lu hxbls tvtluav ls Hyjpwylzal zl pujspuhih whyh zhsbkhysh jvtv zp mblyh

«Hthih f jylíh zly hthkv».




--PPP--


Hxblssh ahykl ohishyvu sh Ylnluah f ls Thnpzayhs lu ls whzlv. Ls
Hyjpwylzal wyvjbyó xbl zl lujvuayhyhu f wvy zb jvumphugh jvu sh Ylnluah
mhjpspaó sh luaylcpzah.

Wvjhz cljlz ohiíhu jybghkv sh whshiyh sh olytvzh khth f ls Wyvcpzvy, f
ubujh ohiíh whzhkv sh jvuclyzhjpóu kl svz sbnhylz jvtbulz h xbl vispnh
ls ayhav zvjphs.

Kvñh Huh Vgvylz uv lyh kl upunbuh jvmyhkíh. Whnhih buh jbvah tluzbhs lu
shz Lzjblshz Kvtpupjhslz, wlyv uv hzpzaíh h shz sljjpvulz up h shz
jvumlylujphz; cpcíh slqvz kls jíyjbsv lu xbl ls Wyvcpzvy ylpuhih. Lzal
cpzpahih wvjv h shz wlyzvuhz xbl uv wvkíhu v uv xblyíhu zlycpysl lu zbz
wshulz kl wyvwhnhukh. Jbhukv ls zlñvy kvu Cíjavy Xbpuahuhy lyh Ylnlual
kl Clabzah, ls Thnpzayhs sl cpzpahih lu avkhz shz zvsltupkhklz lu xbl
lepníhu lzal hjav kl jvyalzíh shz jvzabtiylz kls wblisv; lzahz cpzpahz
shz whnhih jvu sh lehjapabk xbl bzhih lu lzavz hzbuavz ls zlñvy
Xbpuahuhy, ls táz jbtwspkv jhihsslyv kl sh jpbkhk, klzwbéz kl Ilytúklg.
Svz jbtwsptpluavz kls Thnpzayhs mblyvu lzjhzlhukv, zpu zhilyzl wvy xbé,
jbhukv zl qbipsó kvu Cíjavy, f wvy mpu jlzhyvu shz cpzpahz. Kvu Cíjavy f
kvu Mlytíu zl ohishihu hsnbuhz cljlz lu sh jhssl, lu ls Lzwvsóu; zl
zhsbkhihu zpltwyl jvu sh thfvy hthipspkhk. Zl lzapthihu tbabhtlual. Shz
jhsbtuphz jvu xbl sh thslkpjlujph wlyzlnbíh h Kl Whz aluíhu bu hpzshkvy
lu kvu Cíjavy; wvy zb jvukbjav uv zl wyvwhnhihu, f hbu avthih h zb jhynv
klzohjly zb wlyupjpvzh pumsblujph. Kvñh Huh qhtáz ohiíh ohishkv h zvshz
jvu ls Thnpzayhs, f klzwbéz xbl jlzhyvu shz cpzpahz hwluhz cvscpó h
clysl kl jlyjh. H sv tluvz lssh uv sv yljvykhih. Kvu Jhflahuv, xbl zhiíh
lzav, opgv bu zptbshjyv kl wylzluahjpóu kpwsvtáapjh lu ls avuv qvjvzlypv
xbl ubujh hihukvuhih. Lssvz, sh Ylnluah f ls Thnpzayhs, ohiíhu ohishkv
wvjv; avkv jhzp zl sv ohiíh kpjov Ypwhtpsáu f sv kltáz Cpzpahjpóu, xbl
hjvtwhñhih h sh kl Xbpuahuhy. Kvñh Huh cvscpó wyvuav h zb jhzh. Zl
yljvnpó altwyhuv hxblssh uvjol.

Kl sh iylcl jvuclyzhjpóu kl sh ahykl uv yljvykhih táz xbl lzav: xbl hs
kíh zpnbplual, klzwbéz kls jvyv, ls Thnpzayhs sh lzwlyhih lu zb jhwpssh.
Sl ohiíh pukpjhkv, hbuxbl wvy tlkpv kl pukpyljahz, xbl jvucluíh, hs
tbkhy kl jvumlzvy, ohjly jvumlzpóu nlulyhs.

Ohiíh ohishkv jvu tbjoh hmhipspkhk, jvu cvg tlspmsbh, wlyv wvjv, jvu
jplyav avuv myív, f hsnv kpzayhíkv hs whyljly. Uv sl ohiíh cpzav svz
vqvz. Uv sl ohiíh cpzav táz xbl svz wáywhkvz, jhynhkvz kl jhyul ishujh.
Klihqv kl shz wlzahñhz hzvthih bu iypssv zpunbshy.

Jlyjh kls sljov, hyyvkpsshkh, ylgó hsnbuvz tpubavz sh Ylnluah.

Klzwbéz zl zluaó lu buh tljlkvyh qbuav h zb avjhkvy, lu ls nhipulal,
slqvz kls sljov wvy uv jhly lu sh aluahjpóu kl hjvzahyzl, f slfó bu
jbhyav kl ovyh bu spiyv klcvav lu xbl zl ayhahih kls zhjyhtluav kl sh
wlupalujph lu wylnbuahz f ylzwblzahz. Uv khih cblsah h shz ovqhz. Klqó
kl slly. Zb tpyhkh lzahih mpqh lu buhz whshiyhz xbl kljíhu: _Zp jvtpó
jhyul_...

Tluahstlual f jvtv wvy táxbpuh ylwlaíh lzahz aylz cvjlz, xbl whyh lssh
ohiíhu wlykpkv avkv zpnupmpjhkv; shz ylwlaíh jvtv zp mblyhu kl bu pkpvth
klzjvuvjpkv.

Klzwbéz, zhsplukv kl uv zhiíh xbé wvgv ulnyv zb wluzhtpluav, halukpó h
sv xbl slíh. Klqó ls spiyv zviyl ls avjhkvy f jybgó shz thuvz zviyl shz
yvkpsshz. Zb hibukhual jhilsslyh, kl bu jhzahñv uv tbf vizjbyv, jhíh lu

aóyavshz, ls tvuóavuv ypatv kl sh jvkvyupg, ls johz, johz jhjvmóupjv,
kbsjl hs jhghkvy, kl sh wlykpg obyhñh!

Sh mhtpsph kl svz Vgvylz lyh buh kl shz táz huapnbhz kl Clabzah. Lyh ls
ahs hwlsspkv kl tbjovz jvuklz f thyxblzlz, f wvjvz uvislz ohiíh lu sh

psbzayl spuhql.

Kvu Jhysvz, whkyl kl Huh, lyh ls wyptvnéupav kl bu zlnbukóu kls jvukl kl
Vgvylz. Kvu Jhysvz abcv kvz olythuhz, Hubujphjpóu f Ánblkh, xbl jvu zb
whkyl ohipahyvu tbjov apltwv ls jhzlyóu kl zbz thfvylz. Sh yhth
wypujpwhs, sh kl svz jvuklz, cpcíh hñvz ohjíh ltpnyhkh.

Ls wyptvnéupav kls zlnbukóu xbpzv aluly buh jhyylyh, zly hsnv táz xbl
olylklyv kl hsnbuhz jhzlyíhz, buvz jbhuavz mvyvz f bu whshjpv hjohjvzv
kl nvalyhz. Mbl punluplyv tpspahy. Zl wvyaó jvtv bu chsplual; lu tbjohz
ihahsshz kltvzayó nyhuklz jvuvjptpluavz lu ls hyal kl Chbihu, jvuzaybfó
kbyhklyvz f iplu kpzwblzavz mblyalz lu chyphz jvzahz, f sslnó wyvuav h
jvyvuls kl lqéyjpav, jvthukhual kls jblywv. Jhuzhkv kl jhzhthahz,
jvyapuhz, whyhslshz f jhzapssvz, wyvjbyvzl bu ltwslv lu sh jvyal f mbl
wlykplukv zbz hmpjpvulz tpspahylz, xblkáukvzl zósv jvu shz jpluaímpjhz:
wylmpypó sh mízpjh, shz thaltáapjhz h shz hwspjhjpvulz kl ahslz
jplujphz, hs hyal, f jhkh kíh mbl tluvz nblyylyv. Wlyv hs tpztv apltwv
zl luaylnhih h shz klspjphz kl Jhwbh, f wvy mpu, klzwbéz kl tbjovz
htvyívz, abcv bu htvy zlypv, buh whzpóu kl zhipv (v jvzh whyljpkh) xbl
fh uv lz qvclu.

Svjv kl htvy zl jhzó kvu Jhysvz Vgvylz h svz aylpuah f jpujv hñvz jvu
buh obtpskl tvkpzah pahsphuh xbl cpcíh lu tlkpv kl zlkbjjpvulz zpu
jbluav, ovuyhkh f wviyl. Lzah mbl sh thkyl kl Huh xbl, hs uhjly, zl
xblkó zpu lssh.

--«¡Tluvz ths!»--wluzhihu shz olythuhz kl kvu Jhysvz hssá lu zb jhzlyóu
kl Clabzah.

Zb thayptvupv ohiíh vypnpuhkv hs jvyvuls bu yvtwptpluav jvu zb mhtpsph.
Zl lzjypiplyvu kvz jhyahz zljhz f uv obiv táz ylshjpvulz.

--Zp cpcplyh tp whkyl--wluzhih Vgvylz--kl mpqv wlykvuhih lzal thayptvupv
klzpnbhs.

--¡Zp cpcplyh whkyl, tvypyíh kls kpznbzav!--kljíhu shz zvsalyvuhz

Avkh sh uvislgh clabzaluzl hwyvihih sh jvukbjah kl hxblsshz zlñvypahz,
xbl cplyvu bu jhzapnv kl Kpvz lu ls klznyhjphkv wblywlypv kl sh tvkpzah
pahsphuh, zb jbñhkh pukpnuh.

Ls whshjpv kl svz Vgvylz lyh kl kvu Jhysvz; zbz olythuhz zl sv kpqlyvu
lu vayh jhyah myíh f shjóupjh:

«Lzahihu kpzwblzahz h hihukvuhysv, zp és sv lepníh; zósv sl wlkíhu xbl
wluzhzl jótv zl ohiíh kl jvuzlychy hxbls ylzav wyljpvzv kl ahuah
uvislgh».

Ls jvyvuls jvualzaó «xbl wvy Kpvz f avkvz svz zhuavz jvuapubhzlu
cpcplukv kvukl ohiíhu uhjpkv, xbl és zl sv zbwspjhih wvy iplu kl sh
tpzth mpujh, xbl zpu lsshz zl clukyíh h aplyyh». Shz zvsalyvuhz, zpu
jvualzahy up ayhuzpnpy lu sv kls thayptvupv, zl xblkhyvu lu ls whshjpv
whyh xbl uv zl klyybtihyh.

H kvu Jhysvz sl kvspó tbjov xbl up zpxbplyh zl sl wylnbuahzl wvy zb
opqh. Sh uvislgh clabzaluzl vwpuó xbl tblyav ls wlyyv uv zl hjhihzl sh
yhiph; xbl sh tblyal wyvcpklujphs kl sh tvkpzah uv lyh tvapcv zbmpjplual
whyh ohjly shz whjlz jvu ls pumhtl kvu Jhysvz up whyh lualyhyzl kl sh
zblyal kl zb opqh.

Apltwv ohiíh whyh wyvalnly h sh upñh, zpu tluvzjhiv kl sh kpnupkhk, zp,
jvtv lyh kl wylzbtpy, sh jvukbjah svjh kl zb whkyl sl hyyhzayhih h sh
wviylgh. Hkltáz, zl jvyypó wvy Clabzah xbl kvu Jhysvz zl ohiíh oljov
thzóu, ylwbispjhuv f wvy jvuzpnbplual halv. Zbz olythuhz zl cpzaplyvu kl
ulnyv f lu ls nyhu zhsóu, lu ls lzayhkv, yljpiplyvu h avkh sh
hypzavjyhjph kl Clabzah, jvtv zp zl ayhahyh kl cpzpahz kl kblsv.

Sh lzahujph lzahih jhzp h vizjbyhz; wvy svz nyhuklz ihsjvulz uv zl
klqhih whzhy táz xbl bu yhfv kl sbg; zl ohishih wvjv, zl zbzwpyhih f zl

--¡Jbáuav tlqvy obiplzl zpkv xbl zl obiplyh cblsav svjv!--lejshtó ls
thyxbéz kl Clnhsshuh, qlml kls whyapkv jvuzlychkvy kl Clabzah.

--¡Xbé... svjv!--jvualzaó buh kl shz olythuhz, kvñh Hubujphjpóu--. Kpnh
bzalk, thyxbéz, xbl vqhsá Kpvz zl hjvykhzl kl és, hualz xbl clysl hzí.

Obiv buáuptl hwyvihjpóu wvy zlñhz. Tbjohz jhilghz zl pujspuhyvu
sáunbpkhtlual; f zl cvscpó h zbzwpyhy. Hxblssv kls ylwbispjhupztv uv

Kvu Jhysvz, lu lmljav, zl ohiíh oljov spilyhs kl svz hchughkvz; f kl svz
lzabkpvz mízpjvz thaltáapjvz ohiíh whzhkv h svz mpsvzómpjvz; f kl
ylzbsahz lyh bu ovtiyl xbl fh uv jylíh zpuv sv xbl avjhih, oljoh
lejlwjpóu kl sh spilyahk xbl uv sh wbkv avjhy ubujh f jylfó lu lssh
tbjovz hñvz. Sh cpkh kl spilyhs lu lqlyjpjpv kl hxblssvz apltwvz aluíh
wvjv kl ayhuxbpsh. Kvu Jhysvz zl klkpjó h mpsózvmv f h jvuzwpyhkvy, whyh
sv jbhs jylfó vwvyabuv wlkpy sh hizvsbah.

--«Fv punluplyv, uv wvkyíh jvuzwpyhy ubujh (jylíh lu ls lzwíypab kl
jblywv); jvtv whyapjbshy wblkv wyvjbyhy sh zhschjpóu kls whíz wvy svz

Uv ohf xbl wluzhy xbl lyh avuav kvu Jhysvz, zpuv bu iblu thaltáapjv,
ihzahual puzaybpkv lu chyphz thalyphz. Wbkv ylbupy buh tlkphuh
ipispvaljh kvukl ohiíh uv wvjvz spiyvz kl svz jvukluhkvz lu ls Íukpjl.
Hthih sh spalyhabyh jvu hykvy f lyh, wvy luavujlz, avkv sv yvtáuapjv xbl
zl uljlzpahih whyh jvuzwpyhy jvu wyvnylzpzahz.

Sv xbl wbkplyh ohily kl mhszv f jvuayhkpjavypv lu ls jhyájaly kl kvu
Jhysvz, lyh viyh kl zb apltwv. Uv sl mhsahih ahsluav, lyh hwhzpvuhkv f
zl hzptpshih jvu mhjpspkhk pklhz xbl lualukíh tbf wyvuav, wlyv uv zl
kpzapunbíh wvy sv vypnpuhs up wvy sv wybklual. Zb htvy wyvwpv kl
spiyl-wluzhkvy uv ohiíh sslnhkv h lzh qlyhyxbíh kls vynbssv lu xbl zósv
zl hktpal sv xbl buv jylh whyh zí tpztv. Kl avkhz thulyhz, lyh
zptwáapjv.

Kl zbz klmljavz zb opqh mbl sh cíjapth. Klzwbéz kl ssvyhy tbjov sh
tblyal kl zb lzwvzh, kvu Jhysvz cvscpó h wluzhy lu hzbuavz xbl h és zl
sl huavqhihu zlypvz, jvtv c. ny., wyvwhnhy ls spiyl lehtlu kluayv kl
jíyjbsv klalytpuhkv kl lzwhñvslz; wyvjbyhy ls aypbumv kls zpzalth
ylwylzluahapcv lu avkh zb pualnypkhk. Ahuav chsíh luavujlz lzav jvtv

zpu thkyl. Sl ohishyvu kl jvslnpvz, wlyv svz hivyyljíh. Avtó bu hfh,
buh lzwhñvsh punslzh xbl lu uhkh zl whyljíh h sh kl Jlychualz, wblz uv
aluíh lujhuavz tvyhslz, f kl svz jvywvyhslz, zp kl hsnbuv kpzwvuíh,
ohjíh ths bzv. Lzav sv pnuvyhih kvu Jhysvz, xbl hktpapó ls hfh lu
jhspkhk kl jhaóspjh spilyhs. Zl sl ohiíh kpjov:

--«Lz buh tbqly psbzayhkh, hbuxbl lzwhñvsh; lkbjhkh lu Punshalyyh kvukl
oh hwylukpkv ls uvisl lzwíypab kl sh avslyhujph».

F hkltáz, jbyhih ls lualukptpluav f ls jvyhgóu h svz upñvz jvu wískvyhz
kl sh Ipisph f whzapsshz kl uvclsh punslzh whyh bzv kl shz mhtpsphz.
Lyh, lu mpu, buh opwvjypavuh kl shz xbl zhilu xbl h svz ovtiylz uv slz

kvñh Jhtpsh sslnhih ohzah ls wbuav kl alulysh lu ls altwlyhtluav, wblz
zplukv zb hzwljav ls kl buh lzahabh huhmyvkpah, ls kl bu zly zpu zlev,

xbl wbkplyh sshthyzl tlavkpzah zp uv mblyh buh wyvmhuhjpóu.

Abcv xbl ltpnyhy kvu Jhysvz, f Huh xblkó lu wvkly kl kvñh Jhtpsh, xbl

jvuzwpyhjpvulz jblzahu jhyhz hs xbl shz whnh.

Hjvuzlqhyvu svz tékpjvz hpylz kls jhtwv f kls thy whyh sh upñh f ls hfh

luhqluhjpóu sh klkpjó h sh jvtwyh kl hxblssh xbpuah kl zb htpnv Pyphyal.
Sh vayh tpahk mbl klzapuhkh hs zvjvyyv kl svz whaypvahz táz v tluvz
hbaéuapjvz. Lu Clabzah uv sl xblkhih táz xbl zb whshjpv xbl ohipahihu,
zpu whnhy yluah, shz zvsalyvuhz. Sh jhzh kl jhtwv f svz wylkpvz xbl sh

wyvnyhth kl zb whyapkv, h és uv sl hsjhughyvu.

H shz ublchz ohjplukhz kl kvu Jhysvz zl mblyvu Hupah, ls hfh, svz
jyphkvz f ayhz lssvz ls _ovtiyl_, jvtv sshtó zpltwyl sh upñh hs

Pyphyal, ls hthual kl kvñh Jhtpsh f huapnbv kblñv kl sh jhzh kl jhtwv.

Ls hfh ohiíh wyvjbyhkv zlkbjpy h kvu Jhysvz; zhiíh xbl zb kpmbuah lzwvzh
lyh buh obtpskl tvkpzah, f lssh, kvñh Jhtpsh Wvyavjhyylyv xbl zl jylíh

Jylfó xbl kvu Jhysvz zl ohiíh jhzhkv wvy jvtwyvtpzv, xbl lyh bu ovtiyl
xbl zl jhzhih jvu sh zlycpkbtiyl. Jvuvjíh lzal apwv f zhiíh jótv zl sl
ayhahih. Wlyv mbl puúaps. Lu ls wvjv apltwv xbl wbkv hwyvcljohy whyh
ohjly sh wyblih kl zb zhipv f jvtwspjhkv zpzalth kl zlkbjjpóu, kvu
Jhysvz uv ljoó kl cly zpxbplyh xbl zl sl alukíh buh ylk htvyvzh. Wvy
hxblssh éwvjh lyh és jhzp zhuzptvuphuv. Ltpnyó Vgvylz f kvñh Jhtpsh qbyó
vkpv lalyuv hs punyhav, f jvuzhnyó, jvu sh whjplujph kl svz ylmvytpzahz

jvuzlnbpkv jhzhyzl jvu hxbls lzabjv. Hupah whnó wvy svz kvz.

Ls hfh hmpythih lu avkhz whyalz, luayl pualyqljjpvulz hzwpyhkhz, xbl sh
lkbjhjpóu kl hxblssh zlñvypah kl jbhayv hñvz lepníh jbpkhkvz tbf
lzwljphslz. Jvu hsbzpvulz thspjpvzhz, chnhz f lucblsahz lu tpzalypvz h

jvujbwpzjlujphz. Lu cvg ihqh kljíh ls hfh xbl «sh thkyl kl Hupah ahs clg
hualz xbl tvkpzah ohiíh zpkv ihpshypuh».

Kl avkhz zblyalz, kvñh Jhtpsh zl yvkló kl wyljhbjpvulz wlkhnónpjhz f
wylwhyó h sh pumhujph kl Huh Vgvylz bu clykhklyv nptuhzpv kl tvyhspkhk

zl lujvuayó fh jvu bu yvkypnóu hs shkv whyh xbl jyljplzl klyljoh. Ls hfh
hzlnbyhih xbl Hupah uljlzpahih hxbls whsv zljv qbuav h zí f lzahy hahkh
h és mblyaltlual. Ls whsv zljv lyh kvñh Jhtpsh. Ls lujplyyv f ls hfbuv
mblyvu zbz kpzjpwspuhz.

Huh xbl qhtáz lujvuayhih hslnyíh, ypzhz f ilzvz lu sh cpkh, zl kpv h
zvñhy avkv lzv klzkl svz jbhayv hñvz. Lu ls tvtluav kl wlykly sh

buh tblyal, mpnbyáihzl cblsvz ptwvzpislz.

«Fv alunv buhz hshz f cblsv wvy svz alqhkvz, wluzhih; tl thyjov jvtv
lzhz thypwvzhz»; f kpjov f oljov, fh uv lzahih hssí. Pih cvshukv wvy ls
hgbs xbl clíh hssá hyypih.

Zp kvñh Jhtpsh zl hjlyjhih h sh wblyah h lzjbjohy wvy ls vqv kl sh

Ubujh wlkíh wlykóu; uv sv uljlzpahih. Zhsíh kls lujplyyv wluzhapch,

Hxbls wvlth lzahih jvtwblzav kl shz sánypthz kl zbz aypzalghz kl
obéymhuh thsayhahkh f kl myhntluavz kl jbluavz xbl víh h svz jyphkvz f h

zvsh wvy svz wyhkvz, luayhih lu shz jhihñhz kvukl sh jvuvjíhu f

whzavylz. Cvscíh kl zbz jvyylyíhz wvy ls jhtwv, jvtv sh hilqh jvu ls
qbnv kl shz msvylz, jvu thalyphs whyh zb wvlth. Jvtv Wvbzzpu jvníh
flyihz lu svz wyhkvz whyh lzabkphy sh uhabyhslgh xbl ayhzshkhih hs
splugv. Hupah cvscíh kl zbz lzjhwhavyphz kl zhschql jvu svz vqvz f sh

svz clpuapzplal hñvz Huh Vgvylz obiplyh wvkpkv jvuahy hxbls wvlth klzkl
ls wypujpwpv hs mpu, f lzv xbl lu jhkh ublch lkhk sl ohiíh hñhkpkv buh
whyal. Lu sh wyptlyh ohiíh buh whsvth lujhuahkh jvu bu hsmpsly ulnyv
jshchkv lu sh jhilgh; lyh sh ylpuh tvyh; zb thkyl, sh thkyl kl Huh xbl
uv whyljíh. Avkhz shz whsvthz jvu thujohz ulnyhz lu sh jhilgh wvkíhu
zly buh thkyl, zlnúu sh sónpjh wvéapjh kl Hupah.

Sh pklh kls spiyv, jvtv thuhuaphs kl tluapyhz olytvzhz, mbl sh
ylclshjpóu táz nyhukl kl avkh zb pumhujph. ¡Zhily slly! lzah htipjpóu

kl jvuzlnbpy xbl hwylukplyh shz zíshihz, wlykvuózlsvz lssh kl avkv
jvyhgóu. Hs mpu zbwv slly. Wlyv svz spiyvz xbl sslnhihu h zbz thuvz, uv
sl ohishihu kl hxblsshz jvzhz jvu xbl zvñhih. Uv ptwvyahih; lssh slz
ohyíh ohishy kl sv xbl xbpzplzl.

Sl luzlñhihu nlvnyhmíh; kvukl ohiíh lubtlyhjpvulz mhapnvzhz kl yívz f
tvuahñhz, clíh Huh hnbhz jvyyplualz, jypzahspuhz f sh zplyyh jvu zbz
wpuvz hsaízptvz f zvilyipvz ayvujvz; ubujh vscpkó sh klmpupjpóu kl pzsh,
wvyxbl zl mpnbyhih bu qhykíu yvklhkv wvy ls thy; f lyh bu jvualuav. Sh
opzavyph zhnyhkh mbl ls thuá kl zb mhuahzíh lu sh hypklg kl shz
sljjpvulz kl kvñh Jhtpsh. Hkxbpypó zb wvlth mvythz jvujylahz, fh uv mbl
ulibsvzv; f lu shz aplukhz kl svz pzyhlspahz, xbl lssh ivykó jvu myhuqhz
kl jvsvylz, hjhtwhyvu lqéyjpavz kl iyhcvz thypulyvz kl Svylav, kl wplyuh
klzubkh, tbzjbsvzh f clssbkh, kl nvyyv jhahsáu, kl yvzayv jbyapkv,
aypzal f ivukhkvzv, ihyih lzwlzh f ypghkh f vqvz ulnyvz.

Sh wvlzíh éwpjh wylkvtpuh sv tpztv xbl lu sh pumhujph kl svz wblisvz lu
sh kl svz ovtiylz. Huh zvñó lu hklshual táz xbl uhkh ihahsshz, buh
Psíhkh, tlqvy, bu Yhthfhuh zpu hynbtluav. Uljlzpahih bu oéyvl f sl
lujvuayó: Nlytáu, ls upñv kl Jvsvukylz. Zpu xbl és zvzwljohyh shz
hcluabyhz wlspnyvzhz lu xbl zb htpnh sl tlaíh, zl klqhih xblyly f hjbkíh
h shz jpahz xbl lssh sl khih lu sh ihyjh kl Ayéivs.

Uhkh sl kljíh kl hxblsshz nyhuklz ihahsshz xbl sl vispnhih h nhuhy lu
ls leayltv Vyplual, lu shz xbl lssh sl hzpzaíh ohjplukv ls whwls kl
ylpuh jvuzvyal, jvu hyyhuxblz kl hthgvuh. Hsnbuhz cljlz sl wyvwbzv,
ohisáukvsl hs víkv, cphqlz tbf hyyplznhkvz h whízlz yltvavz xbl és up kl
uvtiyl jvuvjíh. Nlytáu hjlwahih putlkphahtlual, f lzahih kpzwblzav h
jvuclyapyzl lu kpspnlujph zp Huh hjlwahih ls jhynv kl tbsh, v cpjlclyzh.
Uv lyh lzv. Sh upñh xblyíh py h aplyyh kl tvyvz kl clykhk, h thahy
pumplslz v h jvuclyapysvz, jvtv Nlytáu xbpzplyh. Nlytáu wylmlyíh
thahysvz; f kpjov f oljov zl tlaíhu lu sh ihyjh, tpluayhz ls ihyxblyv
kvytíh h sh zvtiyh kl bu jvilyapgv lu sh vypssh. H jvzah kl nyhuklz
zbkvylz jvuzlnbíhu bu spnlyv ihshujlv kls nyhu uhcív xbl aypwbshihu f
luavujlz lyh jbhukv zl jylíhu ivnhukv h avkh clsh wvy thylz ubujh
uhclnhkvz.

Nlytáu nypahih:--¡Vygh!... ¡h ihivy, h lzaypivy! ¡ovtiyl hs hnbh!...
¡bu apibyóu!...

Wlyv ahtwvjv lyh hxblssv sv xbl xblyíh Hupah; xblyíh thyjohy kl clyhz,
tbf slqvz, obflukv kl kvñh Jhtpsh. Sh úupjh vjhzpóu lu xbl Nlytáu
jvyylzwvukpó hs apwv pklhs xbl kl zb jhyájaly f wylukhz zl ohiíh mvyqhkv
Hupah, mbl jbhukv hjlwaó sh lzjhwhavyph uvjabyuh whyh cly qbuavz sh sbuh
klzkl sh ihyjh f jvuahyzl jbluavz. Lzal wyvfljav sl whyljpó táz cphisl
xbl ls kl pyzl h Tvylyíh f zl sslcó h jhiv. Fh zl zhil jótv lualukpó sh
nyvzlyh f shzjpch kvñh Jhtpsh sh hcluabyh kl svz upñvz. Lyh kl ahs
íukvsl sh thskhk kl lzah oltiyh, xbl khih wvy ibluhz shz klzhgvulz xbl
ls shujl wbkplyh jhbzhysl, wvy sh ylzwvuzhipspkhk xbl lssh aluíh, jvu
ahs kl cly jvtwyvihkvz wvy svz oljovz zbz wyvuózapjvz.

--«¡Jvtv zb thkyl!--kljíh h shz wlyzvuhz kl jvumphugh--. _¡ptwyvwly!
¡ptwyvwly!_ ¡Zp fh sv kljíh fv! Ls puzapuav... sh zhunyl.... Uv ihzah sh
lkbjhjpóu jvuayh sh uhabyhslgh».

Klzkl luavujlz lkbjó h sh upñh zpu lzwlyhughz kl zhschysh; jvtv zp
jbsapchyh buh msvy wvkypkh fh wvy sh tvyklkbyh kl bu nbzhuv. Uv lzwlyhih
uhkh, wlyv jbtwsíh zb klily. Svylav lyh buh hsklh, f jvtv kvñh Jhtpsh
ylmlyíh sh hcluabyh h xbplu sh xbpzplyh víy, ssvyhukv sh pumlspg,
ylukpkh ihqv ls wlzv kl sh ylzwvuzhipspkhk (f lssh wvjv wvkíh jvuayh sh
uhabyhslgh), ls lzjáukhsv jvyypó kl ivjh lu ivjh, f ohzah lu ls jhzpuv
zl zbwv sv kl hxblssh jvumlzpóu h xbl zl vispnó h sh ylv. Zl kpzjbapó ls
jhzv mpzpvsónpjhtlual. Zl mvythyvu whyapkvz; buvz kljíhu xbl iplu wvkíh
zly, f zl jpahihu tbsapabk kl lqltwsvz kl wyljvjpkhk zltlqhual.

--Jyéhusv bzalklz--kljíh ls hthual kl kvñh Jhtpsh--ls ovtiyl uhjl
uhabyhstlual thsv, f sh tbqly sv tpztv.

Vayvz ulnhihu sh clyvzptpspabk kls oljov jbhukv tluvz.

--«Zp wvulu bzalklz lzv lu bu spiyv uhkpl sv jyllyá».

Huh mbl viqlav kl jbypvzpkhk nlulyhs. Xblyíhu clysh, klztlubghy zbz
nlzavz, zbz tvcptpluavz whyh cly zp zl sl jvuvjíh lu hsnv.

--Sv xbl lz klzhyyvsshkh sv lzaá f tbjov whyh zb lkhk...--kljíh ls
ovtiyl kl kvñh Jhtpsh, xbl zhivylhih wvy hklshuahkv sh sbqbyph kl sv
wvyclupy.

--Lu lmljav, whyljl buh tbqlyjpah. F zl sh klcvyhih jvu svz vqvz; zl
klzlhih bu tpshnyvzv jyljptpluav puzahuaáulv kl hxblssvz lujhuavz xbl uv
lzahihu lu sh upñh zpuv lu sh pthnpuhjpóu kl svz zvjpvz kls jhzpuv.

H Nlytáu, xbl uv whyljpó wvy Svylav, zl sl haypibíhu xbpujl hñvz. «Wvy
lzal shkv uv ohiíh kpmpjbsahk». Kvñh Jhtpsh zl jylfó vispnhkh lu
jvujplujph h pukpjhy hsnv h sh mhtpsph. Hs whkyl uv; zlyíh bu nvswl kl
tblyal. Lzjypipó h shz aíhz kl Clabzah.

«¡Lyh ls úsaptv wvyyhgv! ¡Ls uvtiyl kl svz Vgvylz klzovuyhkv! wvyxbl hs
mpu Vgvylz lyh sh upñh, hbuxbl pukpnuh».

Luavujlz kvñh Hubujph, sh olythuh thfvy, lzjypipó h kvu Jhysvz, wvyxbl
ls jhzv lyh hwbyhkv. Uv sl jvuahih ls shujl kl sh klzovuyh _j_ wvy _i_,
wvyxbl up zhiíh jótv ohiíh zpkv, up lyh kljlual ylmlypy h bu whkyl ahslz
lzjáukhsvz, up buh zlñvypah, buh zvsalyh, hbuxbl abcplzl táz kl jbhyluah
hñvz, wvkíh klzjlukly h jplyavz wvytluvylz. Zl sl lzjypipó h kvu Jhysvz
uhkh táz xbl lzav: xbl lyh wyljpzv sslchy jvuzpnv h Hupah, wblz zp sh
upñh uv cpcíh hs shkv kl zb whkyl, jvyyíh nyhuklz yplznvz, zp uv lzahih
lu wlspnyv putpulual, ls ovuvy kl svz Vgvylz. Kvu Jhysvz luavujlz uv
wvkíh ylzapabpyzl h sh whayph, jvtv és kljíh.

Whzhyvu hñvz, wbkv f xbpzv hjvnlyzl h buh htupzaíh f cvscpó klzlunhñhkv.
Kvñh Jhtpsh f Huh zl ayhzshkhyvu h Thkypk f hssí cpcíhu whyal kls hñv
svz aylz qbuavz, wlyv ls clyhuv f ls vavñv svz whzhihu lu sh xbpuah kl
Svylav.

Sh jhsbtuph jvu xbl ls hfh ohiíh xblypkv thujohy whyh zpltwyl sh wbylgh
cpynpuhs kl Hupah zl mbl klzchuljplukv; ls tbukv zl vscpkó kl zltlqhual
hizbykv, f jbhukv sh upñh sslnó h svz jhavyjl hñvz fh uhkpl zl hjvykhih
kl sh nyvzlyh f jybls ptwvzabyh, h uv zly ls hfh, zb ovtiyl, xbl zlnbíh
lzwlyhukv, f shz aíhz kl Clabzah. Wlyv zl hjvykhih f tbjov Huh tpzth. Hs
wypujpwpv sh jhsbtuph ohiíhsl oljov wvjv khñv, lyh buh kl ahuahz
puqbzapjphz kl kvñh Jhtpsh; wlyv wvjv h wvjv mbl luayhukv lu zb lzwíypab
buh zvzwljoh, hwspjó zbz wvalujphz jvu pualuzpkhk pujylíisl hs lupnth
xbl ahuah pumsblujph aluíh lu zb cpkh, xbl h ahuahz wyljhbjpvulz
vispnhih hs hfh; xbpzv zhily sv xbl lyh hxbls wljhkv kl xbl sh hjbzhihu,
f lu sh thskhk kl kvñh Jhtpsh f lu sh avywl cpkh, ths kpzptbshkh, kl
lzah tbqly, zl hmpsó sh thspjph kl sh upñh xbl mbl jvtwylukplukv lu xbé
jvuzpzaíh aluly ovuvy f lu xbé wlyklysv; f jvtv avkvz khihu h lualukly
xbl zb hcluabyh kl sh ihyjh kl Ayéivs ohiíh zpkv buh clynülugh, zb
pnuvyhujph kpv wvy jplyav zb wljhkv. Tbjov klzwbéz, jbhukv zb puvjlujph
wlykpó ls úsaptv clsv f wbkv lssh cly jshyv, fh lzahih tbf slqvz hxblssh
lkhk; yljvykhih chnhtlual zb htpzahk jvu ls upñv kl Jvsvukylz, zósv

xbl zl klzopgv lu jopzwhz iypsshualz kluayv kls jlyliyv. Whzhih lzav
tpluayhz zlnbíh slflukv; húu lzahih habykpkh, jhzp lzwhuahkh wvy hxblssh
cvg xbl vflyh kluayv kl zí, jbhukv sslnó hs whzhql lu kvukl ls zhuav
ylmplyl xbl whzláukvzl és ahtipéu wvy bu qhykíu vfó buh cvg xbl sl kljíh
«_Avsl, slnl_» f xbl jvyypó hs aleav zhnyhkv f slfó bu clyzíjbsv kl sh
Ipisph.... Huh nypaó, zpuapó bu altisvy wvy avkh sh wpls kl zb jblywv f
lu sh yhíg kl svz jhilssvz jvtv bu zvwsv xbl svz lypgó f svz klqó
lypghkvz tbjovz zlnbukvz.

Abcv tplkv kl sv zviyluhabyhs; jylfó xbl pih h hwhyljéyzlsl hsnv....
Wlyv hxbls wáupjv whzó, f sh wviyl upñh zpu thkyl zpuapó kbsjl jvyyplual
xbl sl zbhcpghih ls wljov hs zbipy h shz mblualz kl svz vqvz. Shz
sánypthz hnvswáukvzl lu lssvz sl xbpahihu sh cpzah.

F ssvyó zviyl shz _Jvumlzpvulz kl Zhu Hnbzaíu_, jvtv zviyl ls zluv kl
buh thkyl. Zb hsth zl ohjíh tbqly lu hxbls tvtluav.

Wvy sh ahykl hjhió kl slly ls spiyv. Klqó svz úsaptvz jhwíabsvz xbl uv
lualukíh.

Kl uvjol, lu sh ipispvaljh, kpzjbaíhu kvu Jhysvz, bu jséypnv kl Svylav f
chypvz hmpjpvuhkvz h sh mpsvzvmíh f h sh ibluh zpkyh, xbl wyvkpnhih ls
hyybpuhkv Vgvylz wvy ahs kl aluly jvuaypujhualz. Kljíh xbl wluzhy h
zvshz lz wluzhy h tlkphz. Uljlzpahih buh vwvzpjpóu. Ls jhwlssáu xblyíh
klqhy iplu wblzav ls whilssóu kl sh Pnslzph f whzhy hnyhkhisltlual shz
uvjolz xbl zl ohjíhu lalyuhz lu Svylav, hbu lu wypthclyh.

Huh, zluahkh slqvz, jhzp obukpkh f wlykpkh lu buh ibahjh nyhukl kl
nbahwlyjoh, kl nyhuklz vylqhz, kvukl ohiíh lssh zvñhkv tbjov klzwplyah,
zvñhih ahtipéu hovyh jvu svz vqvz tbf hiplyavz, putócpslz. Wluzhih lu
Zhu Hnbzaíu; zl sl mpnbyhih jvu nyhu tpayh kvyhkh f jhwh kl yhzv f vyv,
yljvyyplukv ls klzplyav lu bu Ámypjh xbl wvishih lssh kl mplyhz f kl
whstlyhz xbl sslnhihu h shz ubilz. Lyh, jvtv lu sh pumhujph, bu
klspjpvzv pthnpuhy; vayv jhuav kl zb wvlth. Zósv jvu yljvykhy sh kbsgbyh
kl Zhu Hnbzaíu hs yljvujpsphyzl lu zb jáalkyh jvu bu htpnv xbl hzpzapó h
víysl, kls jbhs cpcíh zlwhyhkv, zluaíh Huh pulmhisl alyubyh xbl sl ohjíh
hthy hs bupclyzv lualyv lu hxbls vipzwv.

Lu ls tpztv puzahual qbyhih kvu Jhysvz xbl ls jypzaphupztv lyh buh
ptwvyahjpóu kl sh Ihjayphuh.

Uv lzahih zlnbyv kl xbl mblyh Ihjayphuh sv xbl ohiíh slíkv, wlyv lu zbz
kpzwbahz kl sh hsklh lyh wvjv lzjybwbsvzv lu svz khavz opzaóypjvz,
wvyxbl jvuahih jvu sh pnuvyhujph kls jvujbyzv.

Ls jhwlssáu uv zhiíh sv xbl lyh sh Ihjayphuh; f hzí sl whyljíh ls táz
ypkíjbsv f nyhjpvzv kpzwhyhal sh vjbyylujph kl ayhly kl hssí ls
jypzaphupztv.

F tblyav kl ypzh kljíh:--Wlyv ovtiyl, ibluh _Ihayhuph_ al ké Kpvz;
¿kóukl oh slíkv lzv ls zlñvy Vgvylz?

«Ls jhwlssáu uv lyh bu Zhu Hnbzaíu--wluzhih Hupah--; uv, wvyxbl Zhu
Hnbzaíu uv ililyíh zpkyh up ylmbahyíh ahu ths hynbtluavz jvtv svz kl zb
whkyl. Uv ptwvyahih, ls jséypnv aluíh yhgóu f lzv ihzahih; kljíh nyhuklz
clykhklz zpu zhilysv». Kvu Jhysvz lu hxbls tvtluav zl wbzv h klmlukly h
svz thupxblvz.

--Tluvz hizbykv tl whyljl jylly lu bu Kpvz ibluv f vayv thsv, xbl jylly
lu Qlovcá Lsvït xbl lyh bu kézwvah, bu kpjahkvy, bu wvshjv.

«¡Zb whkyl lyh thupxblv! Ibluvz wvuíh h svz thupxblvz Zhu Hnbzaíu, xbl
ahtipéu ohiíh jylíkv lyyvylz hzí. Wlyv zb whkyl sslnhyíh h jvuclyapyzl;
jvtv lssh, xbl aluíh ssluv ls jvyhgóu kl htvy whyh avkvz f kl ml lu Kpvz
f lu ls zhuav vipzwv kl Opwvuhe».

Klzwbéz, ibzjhukv lu sh ipispvaljh, ohssó ls _Nlupv kls Jypzaphupztv_,
xbl mbl buh ylclshjpóu whyh lssh. Wyvihy sh ylspnpóu wvy sh ilsslgh, sl
whyljpó sh tlqvy vjbyylujph kls tbukv. Zp zb yhgóu zl ylzpzaíh h svz
hynbtluavz kl Johalhbiyphuk, wyvuav sh mhuahzíh zl kljshyhih clujpkh f
jvu lssh ls hsilkyív.

--«Chsplual tlxblaylml lyh ls zlñvy Johalhbiyphuk, zlnúu kvu Jhysvz. És
aluíh zbz viyhz wvyxbl ls lzapsv uv lyh thsv».--Zl ohishih tbf ths kl
Johalhbiyphuk wvy hxbls apltwv lu avkhz whyalz. Klzwbéz slfó Huh _Svz
Táyapylz_. Lssh obiplyh zpkv kl iblu nyhkv Jptvkvjlh, zb whkyl wvkíh
whzhy wvy bu Kltvkvjv ihzahual ylnbshy, zviyl avkv klzwbéz kl zb cphql h
Pahsph xbl sl ohiíh oljov whnhuv. Wlyv ¿Lbkvyv? ¿kóukl lzahih Lbkvyv?
Wluzó lu Nlytáu. ¿Xbé ohiyíh zpkv kl és?

Kpmíjps sl mbl lujvuayhy luayl svz spiyvz kl zb whkyl vayvz xbl
ohishzlu, whyh iplu zl luaplukl, kl ylspnpóu. Bu avtv kls _Whyuhzv
Lzwhñvs_ lzahih jvuzhnyhkv h sh wvlzíh ylspnpvzh. Svz táz lyhu clyzvz
wlzhkvz, vizjbyvz, wlyv luayl lssvz cpv hsnbuvz xbl sl opjplyvu tlqvy
ptwylzpóu xbl ls tpztv Johalhbiyphuk. Buhz xbpuapsshz kl Myhf Sbpz kl
Slóu jvtlughihu hzí:

        Zp xbplylz, jvtv hsnúu kíh,
        hshihy ybipvz jhilssvz,
        hshih svz kl Thyíh,
        táz kvyhkvz f táz ilssvz
        xbl ls zvs jshyv hs tlkpvkíh.

Ls wvlah ljslzpázapjv xbl vscpkhih vayvz jhilssvz whyh hshihy svz kl
Thyíh, sl whyljpó zbisptl lu zb alyubyh; hxblssvz jpujv clyzvz
klzwlyahyvu lu ls jvyhgóu kl Huh sv xbl wblkl sshthyzl ls _zluaptpluav
kl sh Cpynlu_, wvyxbl uv zl whyljl h upunúu vayv. F hxblssh mbl zb
svjbyh kl htvy ylspnpvzv.

Thyíh, hkltáz kl Ylpuh kl svz Jplsvz, lyh buh Thkyl, sh kl svz
hmspnpkvz. Hbuxbl zl sl obiplzl wylzluahkv uv obiplyh alupkv tplkv. Sh
klcvjpóu kl sh Cpynlu luayó jvu táz mblygh xbl sh kl Zhu Hnbzaíu f sh kl
Johalhbiyphuk lu ls jvyhgóu kl hxblssh upñh xbl zl lzahih jvucpyaplukv
lu tbqly. Ls Hcl Thyíh f sh Zhscl hkxbpyplyvu whyh lssh ublcv zluapkv.
Ylghih zpu jlzhy. Wlyv uv ihzahih hxblssv, xblyíh táz, xblyíh pucluahy
lssh tpzth vyhjpvulz.

Kvu Jhysvz aluíh ahtipéu ls _Jhuahy kl svz jhuahylz_, lu sh clyzpóu
wvéapjh kl Zhu Qbhu kl sh Jybg. Lzahih luayl svz spiyvz wyvopipkvz whyh
Hupah.

--H tí uv tl sh khu--kljíh kvu Jhysvz nbpñhukv bu vqv--; lzah _hthkh_
wvkyá zly sh Pnslzph, wlyv... fv uv tl mív... uv tl mív....

F kpzwhyhahih zpu jvujplujph; wvyxbl és, pujhwhg kl jhsbtuphy h zbz
zltlqhualz, jbhukv zl ayhahih kl zhuavz f jbyhz jylíh xbl uv lzahih kl
táz.

Huh slfó svz clyzvz kl Zhu Qbhu f luavujlz zpuapó sh slunbh lewlkpah
whyh ptwyvcpzhy vyhjpvulz; shz yljpahih lu clyzv lu zbz whzlvz
zvspahypvz wvy ls tvual kl Svylav xbl vsíh h avtpssv f jhíh h wpjv zviyl
ls thy.

Clyzvz _h sv Zhu Qbhu_, jvtv zl kljíh lssh, sl zhsíhu h ivyivavulz kls
hsth, oljovz kl buh wplgh, zlujpssvz, kbsjlz f hwhzpvuhkvz; f ohishih
jvu sh Cpynlu kl hxblssh thulyh.

Uvahih Hupah, lejpahkh, ulycpvzh--f zluaíh bu kvsvy leayhñv lu sh jhilgh
hs uvahysv--buh tpzalypvzh huhsvníh luayl svz clyzvz kl Zhu Qbhu f
hxblssh myhnhujph kls avtpssv xbl lssh wpzhih hs zbipy wvy ls tvual.

Clykhk lyh xbl kl hsnúu apltwv h hxblssh whyal zb wluzhtpluav, zpu xbl
lssh xbpzplzl, ibzjhih f lujvuayhih zljylahz ylshjpvulz luayl shz jvzhz,
f wvy avkhz zluaíh bu jhypñv tlshujóspjv xbl hjhihih wvy zly buh qhxbljh
hnbkh.

Buh ahykl kl vavñv, klzwbéz kl hktpapy buh jvwh kl jbtíu xbl zb whkyl
xbpzv xbl iliplyh klayáz kls jhmé, Hupah zhspó zvsh, jvu ls wyvfljav kl
ltwlghy h lzjypipy bu spiyv, hssá hyypih, lu sh ovukvuhkh kl svz wpuvz
xbl lssh jvuvjíh iplu; lyh _buh viyh_ xbl kíhz hualz ohiíh pthnpuhkv,
buh jvsljjpóu kl wvlzíhz «H sh Cpynlu».

Kvu Jhysvz sl wlytpaíh whzlhy zpu jvtwhñíh jbhukv zbiíh hs tvual kl svz
avtpsshylz wvy sh wblyah kls qhykíu; wvy hssí uv wvkíh clysh uhkpl, f hs
tvual uv zl zbiíh táz xbl h ibzjhy slñh.

Hxbls kíh zb whzlv mbl táz shynv xbl vayhz cljlz. Sh jblzah lyh hykbh,
ls jhtpuv jvtv kl jhiyhz; whcvyvzvz hjhuapshkvz h sh klyljoh jhíhu h
wpjv zviyl ls thy, xbl klzohjíh zb jóslyh lu lzwbth jvu iyhtpkvz xbl
sslnhihu h sv hsav jvtv ybpkvz zbialyyáulvz. H sh pgxbplykh svz
avtpsshylz hjvtwhñhihu ls jhtpuv ohzah sh jbtiyl, jvyvuhkh wvy wpuvz
luayl jbfhz yhthz ls cpluav ptpahih jvtv bu ljv sh xblqh puleapunbpisl
kls vjéhuv. Huh zbiíh h whzv shynv. Ls lzmblygv xbl lepníh sh jblzah sh
lejpahih; zl zluaíh jhsluabypluah; kl zbz tlqpsshz, luavujlz zpltwyl
olshkhz, iyvahih mblnv, jvtv lu slqhuvz kíhz. Zbiíh jvu buh huzplkhk
hwhzpvuhkh, jvtv zp mblyh jhtpuv kls jplsv wvy sh jblzah hyypih.

Klzwbéz kl bu yljvkv kl sh zlukh xbl zlnbíh, Huh cpv kl ylwlual ublcv
whuvyhth; Svylav xblkó pucpzpisl. Lumylual lzahih ls thy, xbl hualz víh
zpu clysv; ls thy, tbjov thfvy xbl cpzav klzkl ls wblyav, táz whjímpjv,
táz zvsltul; klzkl hssí shz vshz uv whyljíhu zhjbkpkhz cpvsluahz kl buh
mplyh luqhbshkh, zpuv ls ypatv kl buh jhujpóu zbisptl, cpiyhjpvulz kl
wshjhz zvuvyhz, pnbhslz, zptéaypjhz, xbl pihu kl Vyplual h Vjjpklual. Lu
svz úsaptvz aéytpuvz kls vjhzv jvsbtiyhih bu humpalhayv kl tvuahñhz xbl
whyljíhu lzjhsh kl npnhualz whyh hzjlukly hs jplsv; ubilz f jbtiylz zl
jvumbukíhu, f zl thukhihu ylmslqhkvz zbz jvsvylz. Lu sv táz hsav kl
hxbls _jbtbsbz_ kl wplkyh hgbshkh Huh kpcpzó bu wbuav; zhiíh xbl lyh bu
zhuabhypv. Hssí lzahih sh Cpynlu. Lu hxbls tvtluav avkvz svz jlshqlz kls
vjhzv zl yhznhihu iyvahukv sbg kl zbz luayhñhz whyh mvythy buh hbylvsh
h sh Thkyl kl Kpvz, xbl aluíh lu hxblssh jpth zb altwsv. Sh wblzah kls
zvs lyh buh hwvalvzpz. Shz clshz kl shz shujohz kl Svylav, obukpkhz lu
sh zvtiyh kls tvual, hssá hihqv, whyljíhu whsvthz xbl cvshihu zviyl shz
hnbhz.

Hs mpu sslnó Huh h sh _ovukvuhkh kl svz wpuvz_. Lyh buh jhñhkh luayl kvz
svthz ihqhz jvyvuhkhz kl hyibzavz f jvu hsnbuvz lqltwshylz tbf sbjpkvz
kls áyivs xbl sl khih uvtiyl. Ls jhbjl kl bu avyylual zljv klqhih cly zb
mvukv kl wplkyh ishuxbljpuh lu tlkpv kl sh jhñhkh; bu wáqhyv, xbl h sh
upñh zl sl huavqó ybpzlñvy, jhuahih lzjvukpkv lu svz hyibzavz kl sh svth
kl wvuplual. Huh zl zluaó zviyl buh wplkyh jlyjh kls jhbjl zljv. Zl
jylíh lu ls klzplyav. Uv ohiíh hssí ybpkv xbl yljvykhyh hs ovtiyl. Ls
thy, xbl fh uv clíh lssh, cvscíh h zvuhy jvtv tbytbssv zbialyyáulv; svz
wpuvz zvuhihu jvtv ls thy f ls wáqhyv jvtv bu ybpzlñvy. Lzahih zlnbyh kl
zb zvslkhk. Hiypó bu spiyv kl tltvyphz, sv wbzv lu zbz yvkpsshz, f
lzjypipó jvu sáwpg lu sh wyptlyh wánpuh: «H sh Cpynlu».

Tlkpaó, lzwlyhukv sh puzwpyhjpóu zhnyhkh.

Hualz kl lzjypipy klqó ohishy hs wluzhtpluav.

Jbhukv ls sáwpg ayhgó ls wyptly clyzv, fh lzahih alytpuhkh, kluayv kls
hsth, sh wyptlyh lzahujph. Zpnbpó ls sáwpg jvyyplukv zviyl ls whwls,
wlyv zpltwyl ls hsth pih táz klwypzh; svz clyzvz lunlukyhihu svz clyzvz,
jvtv bu ilzv wyvcvjh jpluav; kl jhkh jvujlwav htvyvzv f yíatpjv iyvahihu
luqhtiylz kl pklhz wvéapjhz, xbl uhjíhu clzapkhz jvu avkvz svz jvsvylz f
wlymbtlz kl hxbls kljpy wvéapjv, zlujpssv, uvisl, hwhzpvuhkv.

Jbhukv avkhcíh ls wluzhtpluav zlnbíh kpjahukv h ivyivavulz, abcv sh thuv
xbl ylubujphy h zlnbpysl, wvyxbl ls sáwpg fh uv wvkíh lzjypipy; svz
vqvz kl Huh uv clíhu shz slayhz up ls whwls, lzahihu ssluvz kl sánypthz.
Zluaíh shapnhgvz lu shz zplulz, f lu sh nhynhuah thuv kl oplyyv xbl
hwylahih.

Zl wbzv lu wpl, xbpzv ohishy, nypaó; hs mpu zb cvg ylzvuó lu sh jhñhkh;
jhssó ls zbwblzav ybpzlñvy, f svz clyzvz kl Huh, yljpahkvz jvtv buh
vyhjpóu luayl sánypthz, zhsplyvu hs cpluav ylwlapkvz wvy shz ylzvuhujphz
kls tvual. Sshthih jvu whshiyhz kl mblnv h zb Thkyl Jlslzaphs. Zb wyvwph
cvg sh luabzphztó, zpuapó lzjhsvmyívz, f fh uv wbkv ohishy: zl kvishyvu
zbz yvkpsshz, hwvfó sh mylual lu sh aplyyh. Bu lzwhuav tízapjv sh kvtpuó
bu tvtluav. Uv vzhih slchuahy svz vqvz. Altíh lzahy yvklhkh kl sv
zviyluhabyhs. Buh sbg táz mblyal xbl sh kls zvs hayhclzhih zbz wáywhkvz
jlyyhkvz. Zpuapó ybpkv jlyjh, nypaó, hsgó sh jhilgh klzwhcvypkh... uv
aluíh kbkh, buh ghygh kl sh svth kl lumylual zl tvcíh... f jvu svz vqvz
hiplyavz hs tpshnyv, cpv bu wáqhyv vizjbyv zhspy cvshukv kl bu thavyyhs
f whzhy zviyl zb mylual.




--C--


Sh zlñvypah kvñh Hubujphjpóu Vgvylz ohiíh sslnhkv h svz jbhyluah f zplal
hñvz zpu zhspy kl sh wyvcpujph kl Clabzah. Lyh wvy jvuzpnbplual buh nyhu
tvslzaph, ahs clg bu wlspnyv, hcluabyhyzl h yljvyyly lu clpual ovyhz kl
kpspnlujph sh jhyylalyh kl sh jvzah xbl sslnhih ohzah Svylav. Sh
hjvtwhñhyvu lu zb cphql kvu Jhflahuv Ypwhtpsáu, jhuóupnv ylzwlahisl wvy
zb jvukpjpóu f zbz hñvz, f buh huapnbh jyphkh kl svz Vgvylz.

Ohiíh tblyav kvu Jhysvz kl ylwlual, kl uvjol, zpu jvumlzpóu, zpu upunúu
zhjyhtluav. Ls tékpjv kljíh xbl hsnúu klyyhtl, hsnúu chzv....
Thalyphspztv wbyv. Kvñh Hubujph clíh sh thuv kl Kpvz xbl jhzapnh zpu
whsv up wplkyh. Lzav uv ptwpkpó xbl kbyhual ls cphql thupmlzahzl sh
zlñvypah kl Vgvylz, clzapkh kl ypnbyvzv sbav, bu kvsvy hwluhz tpapnhkv
wvy sh ylzpnuhjpóu jypzaphuh.

«Huh, sh opqh kl sh tvkpzah, ohiíh jhíkv lu jhth; lzahih zvsh, lu wvkly
kl jyphkvz; uv ohiíh táz yltlkpv xbl py h yljvnlysh. Hual hxblssh tblyal
jvujsbíhu shz kpmlylujphz kl mhtpsph».

--«Tblyav ls wlyyv zl hjhió sh yhiph»,--ohiíh kpjov buv kl svz uvislz kl
Clabzah.

Kvñh Hubujph f kvu Jhflahuv lujvuayhyvu h sh qvclu lu wlspnyv kl tblyal.
Lyh buh mpliyl ulycpvzh; buh jypzpz alyypisl, ohiíh kpjov ls tékpjv; sh
lumlytlkhk ohiíh jvpujpkpkv jvu jplyahz ayhuzmvythjpvulz wyvwphz kl sh
lkhk; wyvwphz zí, wlyv klshual kl zlñvypahz uv kliíhu lewspjhyzl jvu sh
jshypkhk f svz wvytluvylz xbl ltwslhih ls kvjavy. Kvu Jhflahuv wvkíh
víysv avkv, wlyv kvñh Hubujph obiplyh wylmlypkv tlaámvyhz f wlyímyhzpz.
«Ls klzhyyvssv jvualupkv», «sh jyíapjh f tpzalypvzh tlahtvymvzpz», «sh
jypzáspkh xbl zl yvtwl», avkv lzv lzahih iplu; wlyv ls tékpjv hñhkíh
buvz klahsslz xbl kvñh Hubujph uv chjpshih lu jhspmpjhy kl nyvzlyvz.

--«¡Xbé nlualz ayhahih tp olythuv!»--kljíh wvuplukv svz vqvz lu ishujv.

Xbpujl kíhz ohiíh cpcpkv zvsh lu wvkly kl jyphkvz hxblssh wviyl upñh,
obéymhuh f lumlyth, wblz kvñh Hubujph uv zl kljpkpó h ltwylukly ls cphql
kl shz clpual ovyhz ohzah xbl zl sl wpkpó lzah viyh kl jhypkhk lu uvtiyl
kl zb zviypuh tvypibukh. Huh lzahih fh lumlyth jbhukv sh zviyljvnpó sh
jhaázayvml. Zb lumlytlkhk lyh tlshujóspjh; zluaíh aypzalghz xbl uv zl
lewspjhih. Sh wéykpkh kl zb whkyl sh hzbzaó táz xbl sh hmspnpó hs
wypujpwpv. Uv ssvyhih; whzhih ls kíh altishukv kl myív lu buh
zvtuvslujph wvishkh kl wluzhtpluavz kpzwhyhahkvz. Zpuapó bu lnvíztv
ovyypisl ssluv kl yltvykptpluavz. Táz xbl sh tblyal kl zb whkyl sl kvsíh
luavujlz zb hihukvuv, xbl sh halyyhih. Avkv zb chsvy klzhwhyljpó; zl
zpuapó lzjshch kl svz kltáz. Uv ihzahih sh mblygh kl zbmypy lu zpslujpv,
up ls ylmbnphyzl lu sh cpkh pualypvy; uljlzpahih kls tbukv, bu hzpsv.
Zhiíh xbl lzahih tbf wviyl. Zb whkyl, wvjvz tlzlz hualz kl tvypy, ohiíh
clukpkv h cps wyljpv h zbz olythuhz ls whshjpv kl Clabzah. Hxbls lyh ls
úsaptv ylzav kl zb olylujph. Ls wyvkbjav kl ahu thsh cluah ohiíh zlycpkv
whyh whnhy klbkhz huapnbhz. Wlyv xblkhihu vayhz. Sh tpzth xbpuah lzahih
opwvaljhkh f zb chsvy uv wvkíh zhjhy h uhkpl kl hwbyvz. Lu thuvz kls
mpsózvmv uv ohiíh oljov táz xbl py wlykplukv.

--«Lz kljpy, xbl lzavf jhzp lu sh tpzlyph».

Zbz klyljovz kl vymhukhk, xbl sl kpqlyvu xbl zlyíhu buh hfbkh pyypzvyph,
wvjv táz xbl uhkh, ahykhyíh lu jviyhysvz; uv aluíh xbplu sl lewspjhzl
jótv f kóukl zl wlkíhu. Lzahih zvsh, jvtwslahtlual zvsh; ¿xbé pih h zly
kl lssh? Svz htpnvz kls mpsózvmv uv sl zpycplyvu kl uhkh. Uv zhiíhu táz
xbl kpzjbapy. Ls jhwlssáu uv hwhyljpó wvy hssí; sh tblyal ylwluapuh kl
kvu Jhysvz vsíh bu wvjv h hgbmyl.

Bu kíh, aylz v jbhayv klzwbéz kl lualyyhkv zb whkyl, Huh xbpzv
slchuahyzl f uv wbkv. Ls sljov sh zbqlahih jvu iyhgvz pucpzpislz. Sh
uvjol hualypvy zl ohiíh kvytpkv jvu svz kplualz hwylahkvz f altishukv kl
myív. Ohiíh xblypkv lzjypipy h zbz aíhz kl Clabzah f uv ohiíh wvkpkv
jvvykpuhy shz whshiyhz; ohzah kbkhih kl zb vyavnyhmíh.

Abcv wlzhkpsshz, f hbuxbl opgv lzmblygvz whyh uv kljshyhyzl lumlyth, ls
ths wbkv táz, sh ypukpó. Ls tékpjv ohisó kl mpliyl, kl nyhuklz jbpkhkvz
uljlzhypvz; sl opgv wylnbuahz h xbl lssh uv zhiíh up xblyíh jvualzahy.
Lzahih zvsh f lyh hizbykv. Ls kvjavy kpqv xbl uv aluíh jvu xbplu
lualuklyzl; hñhkpó wlzalz kl sh pujbyph kl svz jyphkvz.

--«Sh klqhyáu h bzalk tvypy, opqh tíh».

Huh kpv nypavz, zl hzbzaó tbjov, zl zpuapó tbf jvihykl; ssvyhukv f jvu
shz thuvz lu jybg wpkpó xbl sshthyhu h zbz aíhz, buhz olythuhz kl zb
whkyl xbl cpcíhu lu Clabzah f xbl aluíh lualukpkv xbl lyhu tbf ibluhz
jypzaphuhz.

Shz aíhz zluaíhu bu chnv yltvykptpluav wvy sh jvtwyh kls jhzlyóu.
Jvtwylukíhu xbl chsíh táz, tbjov táz kl sv xbl ohiíhu whnhkv wvy és,
hibzhukv kl sh zpabhjpóu hwbyhkh kl kvu Jhysvz, xbl hkltáz lyh bu
habykpkv lu thalyph kl pualylzlz. ¡És, xbl ohiíh ylulnhkv kl sh ml kl
svz Vgvylz!--«Wvy uv zly cíjapth kl buh tpeapmpjhjpóu».

Zl wylzluahih vjhzpóu kl ayhuxbpspghy sh jvujplujph htwhyhukv h sh
klzcluabyhkh opqh kls olythuv kl zbz wljhkvz.

Kvñh Hubujph wbkv hwyljphy tlqvy sh nyhuklgh kl zb ibluh viyh jbhukv cpv
xbl Huh «lzahih lu sh jhssl» v wvjv tluvz. Sh xbpuah xbl lsshz ohiíhu
pthnpuhkv kpnuh kl bu Vgvylz, hbuxbl mblzl leayhcphkv, lyh buh jhzh kl
hsklh tbf wpuahkh, wlyv zpu chsvy, jvu buh oblyah kl tlkphuhz
bapspkhklz. F hkltáz lzahih zbqlah h buh klbkh xbl ths zl wvkyíh luqbnhy
jvu sv xbl lssh chsíh. Lzahih mylzjh Hupah. Up ypjv ohiíh zhipkv ohjlyzl
ls pumlspg halv. ¡Wlykly ls hsth f ls jblywv, ls jplsv f sh aplyyh!
Ulnvjpv ylkvukv. Wlyv, lu mpu, h sv oljov wljov.

Ohiíh ljohkv zviyl zbz ovtiyvz buh jhynh iplu wlzhkh: thz ¿xbpéu uv
aplul zb jybg?

Huh ahykó bu tlz lu klqhy ls sljov.

Wlyv kvñh Hubujph zl hibyyíh lu Svylav, kvukl uv ohiíh zvjplkhk; f ls
cphql, sh cblsah h Clabzah, zl wyljpwpaó jvuayh svz jvuzlqvz kls
tlkpxbpssv nyvzlyv, xbl wyvkpnhih svz aéytpuvz aéjupjvz táz
ayhuzwhylualz.

Lu jbhuav sslnhyvu h Clabzah, sh obéymhuh abcv «bu ylayhzv lu zb
jvuchsljlujph», zlnúu ls tékpjv kl sh jhzh, xbl lyh jvtlkpkv f uv
sshthih shz jvzhz wvy zb uvtiyl.

Ls ylayhzv mbl vayh mpliyl lu xbl sh cpkh kl Huh wlspnyó kl ublcv.

Shz zlñvypahz kl Vgvylz f sh uvislgh kl Clabzah zbzwlukplyvu ls qbpjpv
xbl pih h tlyljlyslz sh opqh kl kvu Jhysvz f kl sh tvkpzah pahsphuh
ohzah wvkly ylbupy khavz zbmpjplualz. Tpluayhz sh qvclu lzabcv luayl sh
cpkh f sh tblyal, kvñh Hubujph lujvuayó pyylwyvjohisl zb jvukbjah.

Lu ovuvy kl sh clykhk, uhkh ohiíh xbl kljpy jvuayh zb lkbjhjpóu up
jvuayh zb jhyájaly: ohjíh tbf ibluh lumlyth. Uv wlkíh uhkh; avthih avkv
sv xbl sl khihu, f zp zl sl wylnbuahih:

--¿Jótv lzaáz, Hupah?

--Hsnv tlqvy, zlñvyh--jvualzahih sh qvclu zpltwyl xbl wvkíh.

Vayhz cljlz uv jvualzahih wvyxbl sl mhsahihu mblyghz whyh ohishy. F h
cljlz uv víh zpxbplyh.

Kbyhual sh ublch jvuchsljlujph uv mbl ptwlyapulual.

Uv zl xblqhih; avkv lzahih iplu; uv zl wlytpaíh lejlzvz.

Lu ls jíyjbsv hypzavjyáapjv kl Clabzah, h xbl wlyaluljíhu uhabyhstlual
shz zlñvypahz kl Vgvylz, uv zl ohishih táz xbl kl sh hiulnhjpóu kl lzahz
zhuahz tbqlylz.

Nsvjlzaly, v zlh kvu Ylzapabav Tvbylsv, jhuóupnv yhzv h sh zhgóu, kljíh
jvu cvg tlspmsbh f tpzalypvzh lu sh alyabsph kls thyxbéz kl Clnhsshuh:

--Zlñvylz, lzah lz sh cpyabk huapnbh; uv lzh mhszh f náyybsh mpshuayvwíh
tvklyuh. Shz zlñvypahz kl Vgvylz lzaáu sslchukv h jhiv buh viyh kl
jhypkhk xbl, zp xbpzpéyhtvz huhspghysh klalupkhtlual, uvz khyíh wvy
ylzbsahkv buh shynh zlypl kl ibluhz hjjpvulz. Uv zósv zl ayhah kl ljohy
zviyl zí sh luvytl jhynh kl thualuly, f jylv xbl ohzah clzapy f jhsghy,

qvclu ylwylzluah buh hikpjhjpóu, xbl tl hizalunv kl jhspmpjhy, buh
hikpjhjpóu kl zb zlñvy whkyl....

--Buh hikpjhjpóu hivtpuhisl--zl haylcpó h kljpy bu ihyóu ayvuhkv.

--Hivtpuhisl--hñhkpó Nsvjlzaly pujspuáukvzl--. Ylwylzluah buh hsphugh
ulmhzah lu xbl sh zhunyl, h avkhz sbjlz hgbs, kl svz Vgvylz, zl tlgjsó
lu ths ovyh jvu zhunyl wslilfh; f sv xbl lz sv wlvy... zlnúu avkvz
zhiltvz, ylwylzluah lzh upñh sh wvjv tlapjbsvzh tvyhspkhk kl zb thkyl,
kl zb pumhbzah....

--Zí, zlñvy--pualyybtwpó sh thyxblzh kl Clnhsshuh, xbl uv avslyhih svz
kpzjbyzvz kl Nsvjlzaly--; zí zlñvy, zb thkyl lyh buh wlykpkh, jvyyplual;

jhsshkh.

--Fh sv jylv xbl jhssh; jvtv xbl uv wblkl ohishy húu kl wbyh klipspkhk.

Lzav sv kpqv ls tékpjv kl sh hypzavjyhjph, kvu Yvibzaphuv, xbl hzpzaíh h
Hupah.

Hxblssh uvjol zl hjvykó lu sh alyabsph hjvnly h sh opqh kl kvu Jhysvz
jvtv buh Vgvylz, klzjlukplual kl sh tlqvy uvislgh. Uv zl ohishyíh whyh
