jvtv zviypuh kl xbplu ahuavz lsvnpvz tlyljíh.

Nyhu jvuzblsv yljpiplyvu kvñh Hubujph f kvñh Ánblkh hs zhily wvy ls
tékpjv lzah ylzvsbjpóu kl sh uvislgh clabzaluzl.

Huh lzahih tbjohz ovyhz zvsh. Zbz aíhz aluíhu jvzabtiyl kl
ayhihqhy--ohjly jhsjlah f jvsjoh--lu ls jvtlkvy; sh hsjvih kl sh
zviypuh lzahih hs vayv leayltv kl sh jhzh.

Hkltáz, shz psbzaylz khthz whzhihu tbjov apltwv mblyh kls aypzal jhzlyóu
kl zbz thfvylz. Cpzpahihu h sv tlqvy kl Clabzah, zpu jvuahy sh cpzpah hs
Zhuaízptv f sh Clsh, xbl slz avjhih buh clg wvy zlthuh. Hzpzaíhu h avkhz
shz uvcluhz, h avkvz svz zlytvulz, h avkhz shz jvmyhkíhz, f h avkhz shz
alyabsphz kl iblu avuv. Jvtíhu kvz v aylz cljlz wvy zlthuh mblyh kl
jhzh. Sv táz kls apltwv sv ltwslhihu lu whnhy cpzpahz. Lzah lyh sh
vjbwhjpóu h xbl khihu táz ptwvyahujph luayl avkhz shz kl zb hahylhkh
lepzalujph. Uv whnhy buh cpzpah _kl jshzl_, slz whyljíh ls thfvy jyptlu
xbl zl wvkíh jvtlaly lu buh zvjplkhk jpcpspghkh. Hthihu sh ylspnpóu,
wvyxbl ézal lyh bu aptiyl kl zb uvislgh, wlyv uv lyhu tbf klcvahz; lu zb
jvyhgóu ls jbsav wypujpwhs lyh ls kl sh jshzl, f zp obiplyhu zpkv
pujvtwhapislz sh Cpzpah h sh Jvyal kl Thyíh f sh alyabsph kl Clnhsshuh,
Thyíh Zhuaízpth, lu zb putluzh ivukhk, obiplyh wlykvuhkv, wlyv lsshz
obiplyhu hzpzapkv h sh alyabsph.

Sh lapxblah, zlnúu zl lualukíh lu Clabzah, lyh sh slf wvy xbl zl
nvilyuhih ls tbukv; h lssh zl kliíh sh hytvuíh jlslzal.

Zbwyptpkh sh lapxblah, shz lzaylsshz jovjhyíhu f zl hwshzahyíhu
wyvihisltlual. ¿Xbé zhiíh kl lzahz jvzhz sh zviypupah? Lzah lyh sh
jblzapóu. Shz tpyhkhz kl kvñh Ánblkh, hsnv táz nyblzh, táz qvclu f táz
ivukhkvzh xbl zb olythuh, pihu jhynhkhz kl lzahz wylnbuahz jbhukv zl
jshchihu lu Hupah hs khysl bu jhskv.

Sh obéymhuh zvuylíh zpltwyl; khih shz nyhjphz zpltwyl. Lzahih jvumvytl
jvu avkv. Shz aíhz clíhu jvu ptwhjplujph xbl zl wyvsvunhih hxbls lzahkv.
Sh upñh uv hjhihih kl zhuhy, up yljhíh; uv zl wylzluahih upunbuh
zvsbjpóu. Hkltáz, hzí uv zl wvkíh jvuvjly zb clykhklyv jhyájaly. Hxblssh
zbtpzpóu hizvsbah wvkíh zly lmljav kl sh lumlytlkhk. Kvu Yvibzaphuv kpqv
xbl lzv lyh.

Buh ahykl, ahs clg jylflukv xbl kvytíh sh zviypupssh v zpu yljvykhy xbl
lzahih jlyjh, lu ls nhipulal jvuapnbv h zb hsjvih ohishyvu shz kvz
olythuhz kl bu hzbuav tbf ptwvyahual.

--Lzavf altishukv, ¿h xbé uv zhilz wvy xbé?--kljíh kvñh Hubujph.

--¿Zp zlyá wvy sv tpztv xbl h tí tl wylvjbwh?

--¿Xbé lz?--Zp lzh jopjh...--Zp hxblssh clynülugh...--¡Lzv!--¿Al
hjblykhz kl sh jhyah kls hfh?

--Jvtv xbl fv sh jvuzlycv.--Aluíh sh jopxbpssh kvjl v jhavyjl hñvz,
¿clykhk?

--Hsnv tluvz, wlyv wlvy avkhcíh.

--F aú jyllz... xbl...--¡Iho! Wblz jshyv.--¿Zp zlyá buh Vikbspah?

--V buh Ahyzpspah. ¿Al hjblykhz kl Ahyzpsh xbl abcv hxbls shujl jvu
hxbls jhklal, f klzwbéz jvu Hschypav Tlzíh uv zé xbé htvyívz?

--Avkv lyh puvjlujph--kljíhu svz ivihspjvulz kl hxbí.

--Wblz tpyh sh puvjlujph; jylv xbl lu Thkypk aplul hzí svz hthualz
(qbuahukv f zlwhyhukv svz klkvz.)

--Zp lz jshyv, zp nlupv f mpnbyh...--Jbhukv mhsah buh ihzl mpytl...
--¡Zp zhiyá buh!...--¿Wblz, Vikbspah? Fh clz sv xbl zl kpqv ls hñv
whzhkv; klzwbéz zl ulnó, zl hzlnbyó xbl lyh buh jhsbtuph...--¡H tí,
xbl zvf ahtivy kl thypuh!

--¡Zp zhiyá buh!--¡Zp buh obiplyh xblypkv! F zbzwpyó lzah zlñvypah kl
Vgvylz. Zbzwpyó zb olythuh ahtipéu.

Huh xbl klzjhuzhih, clzapkh, zviyl zb wviyl sljov, zhsaó kl és h shz
wyptlyhz whshiyhz kl hxblssh jvuclyzhjpóu. Wáspkh jvtv buh tblyah, jvu
kvz sánypthz olshkhz lu svz wáywhkvz, jvu shz thuvz mshjhz lu jybg, vfó
avkv ls kpásvnv kl zbz aíhz.

Uv ohishihu h zvshz jvtv klshual kl svz zlñvylz _kl jshzl_; uv lyhu
wybklualz, uv lyhu jvtlkpkhz, uv ylibzjhihu shz myhzlz. Kvñh Hubujph
kljíh whshiyhz xbl sh obiplyhu lzjhukhspghkv lu shipvz hqluvz. Sh
jvuclyzhjpóu ahykó lu cvscly hs wljhkv kl Huh, h sh clynülugh kl xbl slz
ohishih sh jhyah kl kvñh Jhtpsh. Sh obéymhuh víh, klzkl zb hsjvih,
opzavyphz xbl zbislchihu zb wbkvy, xbl sl luzlñhihu tps klzubkljlz xbl
uv ohiíh cpzav lu svz spiyvz kl Tpavsvníh. Wlyv hxblsshz tbqlylz fh zl
ohiíhu vscpkhkv kl lssh. Ahyzpsh, Vikbsph, Cpzpahjpóu, vayv wptwvssv xbl
zl lzjhwhih wvy ls ihsjóu lu jvtwhñíh kl zb uvcpv, sh tpzth thyxblzh kl
Clnhsshuh, zbz opqhz, zbz zviypuhz kl sh hsklh, avkv Clabzah, sh kl
jshzl pujsbzpcl, zhsíh hssí h sh clynülugh, lu hxblssh clunhugh
zvspahyph kl shz kvz zlñvypahz pujhzhislz kl Vgvylz. Lu hxbls tbukv kl
mshxblghz, kl lzjáukhsvz, ¿xbpéu yljvykhih fh sh hcluabyh, wvjv jvuvjpkh
hs jhiv, kl sh zviypupssh lumlyth?

Cvscplyvu zpu ltihynv shz zvsalyvuhz hs wbuav kl whyapkh; zlnúu lsshz,
zl ayhahih kl bu thypulyv xbl ohiíh hibzhkv kl sh puvjlujph v kl sh
wyljvjpkhk kl sh upñh. Zl kpzjbapó, jvtv lu ls jhzpuv kl Svylav, sh
clyvzptpspabk kls klspav klzkl ls wbuav kl cpzah mpzpvsónpjv. Ohishyvu
hxblsshz zlñvypahz jvtv kvz jvthkyvuhz thaypjbshkhz. ¡Xbé ypxblgh kl
khavz! ¡Xbé ltwpypztv ahu wyvcpzav kl kvjbtluavz! Kvñh Hubujph aluíh sh
ivjh ssluh kl hnbh. Ibzjhih h jhkh tvtluav ls yljpwplual kl wvyjlshuh
xbl lzahih h svz wplz kl zb ibahjh.

«Lu jbhuav h sh tvyhs, ahtwvjv lyh ls jhzv nyhcl, wvyxbl lu Clabzah
uhkpl kliíh kl zhily uhkh. Sv thsv zlyíh xbl hxblssh tbjohjoh obiplyh
zlnbpkv jvu cpkh ahu kpzvsbah. Wlyv uv ohiíh tvapcv whyh jyllysv. Uhkh
táz ohiíhu zhipkv xbl sh jvukluhzl. Zviyl avkv, wyvuav zl ohiíh kl cly».

Huh, xbl abcv chsvy whyh zbmypy ohzah sh úsapth whshiyh, jvtwylukpó xbl
zbz aíhz sv wlykvuhihu avkv tluvz shz hwhyplujphz: xbl jvu ahs kl zly lu
hklshual jvtv lsshz, zl vscpkhih sv whzhkv, mblzl jvtv mblzl. Jótv lyhu
lsshz fh sv pih jvuvjplukv. Wlyv lzabkphyíh táz.

Ohiíh ohipkv hsnbuvz tpubavz kl zpslujpv.

Kvñh Ánblkh sv yvtwpó kpjplukv:

--F fv jylv xbl sh jopjh, zp zl ylwvul, ch h zly nbhwh.

--Jylv xbl lyh hsnv yhxbíapjh, wvy sv tluvz lzahih wvjv klzhyyvsshkh....

--Lzv uv ptwvyah; hzí mbí fv, f klzwbéz xbl...--Huh zpuapó iyhzhz lu shz
tlqpsshz--ltwljé h lunvykhy, h jvtly iplu f tl wbzl jvtv bu yvssv kl
thualjh.

F zbzwpyó vayh clg kvñh Ánblkh, hjvykáukvzl kls yvssv xbl ohiíh zpkv.

Kvñh Hubujph ohiíh alupkv zbz tvapcvz whyh uv lunvykhy: buvz htvylz
yvtáuapjvz yhipvzvz. Kl hxblssvz htvylz sl ohiíhu xblkhkv chyphz
jhujpvulz h sh sbuh, lu buh lzwljpl kl jhuav sshuv xbl lssh tpzth
hjvtwhñhih jvu sh nbpahyyh. Buh kl shz jhujpvulz jvtlughih kpjplukv:

        Lzh sbuh xbl iypssh lu ls jplsv
        tlshujóspjhtlual tl puzwpyh:
        lz ls úsaptv zvu kl tp spyh
        xbl wvy úsapth clg ylzvuó.

Zl ayhahih kl bu jvukluhkv h tblyal.

Ls ilssv pklhs kl kvñh Hubujph ohiíh zpkv zpltwyl bu cphql h Cluljph jvu
bu hthual; wlyv buh clg xbl ls zpnsv lzahih _tlahspghkv_ f shz tbjohjohz
uv zhiíhu luhtvyhyzl, lssh xblyíh bapspghy, zp lyh wvzpisl, sh olytvzbyh
kl Huh, xbl zp zl hsptluahih iplu zlyíh nbhwh jvtv zb whkyl f avkvz svz
Vgvylz, wblz sv ayhíhu kl yhgh. Zí, lyh wyljpzv khysl iplu kl jvtly,
lunvykhysh. Klzwbéz zl sl ibzjhih bu uvcpv. Ltwylzh kpmíjps, wlyv uv
ptwvzpisl. Lu bu uvisl uv ohiíh xbl wluzhy. Lzavz lyhu tbf mpuvz, tbf
nhshualz jvu shz kl zb jshzl, wlyv zp uv aluíhu kval zl jhzhihu jvu shz
opqhz kl svz htlypjhuvz f kl svz whzplnvz ypjvz. Sv zhiíhu lsshz wvy buh
kvsvyvzh lewlyplujph. Svz jopjvz _puuvislz_, xbl wbkplyh kljpyzl, kl
Clabzah, uv lyhu nyhuklz wyvwvyjpvulz; wlyv hbuxbl zl xbpzplyh
hwlujhy--hwlujhy kljíh kvñh Ánblkh lu ls zluv kl sh jvumphugh--, jvu
hsnúu hivnhkval, upunbuv kl hxblssvz ivihspjvulz zl haylclyíh h luhtvyhy
h buh Vgvylz, hbuxbl zl tbyplzl wvy lssh. Sh úupjh lzwlyhugh lyh bu
htlypjhuv. Svz pukphuvz klzlhihu táz sh uvislgh f zl haylcíhu táz,
jvumphihu lu ls wylzapnpv kl zb kpulyv. Zl ibzjhyíh wvy jvuzpnbplual bu
htlypjhuv. Sv wyptlyv lyh xbl sh jopjh zhuhzl f lunvykhzl.

Huh jvtwylukpó zb vispnhjpóu putlkphah; zhuhy wyvuav.

Sh jvuchsljlujph pih zplukv ptwlyapulual. Avkh zb cvsbuahk sh ltwsló lu
wyvjbyhy jbhuav hualz sh zhsbk.

Klzkl ls kíh lu xbl ls tékpjv kpqv xbl ls jvtly iplu lyh fh vwvyabuv,
lssh, jvu sánypthz lu svz vqvz, jvtpó jbhuav wbkv. H uv ohily víkv
hxblssh jvuclyzhjpóu kl shz aíhz, sh wviyl obéymhuh uv zl obiplyh
haylcpkv h jvtly tbjov, hbuxbl abcplyh hwlapav, wvy uv hbtluahy ls wlzv
kl hxblssh jhynh: lssh. Wlyv fh zhiíh h xbé halulyzl. Xblyíhu lunvykhysh
jvtv buh chjh xbl oh kl py hs tlyjhkv. Lyh wyljpzv klcvyhy, hbuxbl
jvzahzl bu wvjv kl sshuav hs wypujpwpv ls whzhy svz ivjhkvz.

Sh uhabyhslgh cpuv wyvuav lu hfbkh kl hxbls lzmblygv alyypisl kl sh
cvsbuahk. Huh xblyíh mblyghz, zhsbk, jvsvylz, jhyul, olytvzbyh, xblyíh
wvkly spiyhy wyvuav h zbz aíhz kl zb wylzlujph. Ls jbpkhyzl tbjov, ls

uljlzhypv... bu alu jvu alu lzwljphs.

--Bu alu jvu alu, lzv.--Zviyl avkv lu ls ayhav jvu svz ovtiylz. Aú
ohiyáz uvahkv xbl lu wúispjv svz kl sh jshzl qhtáz mhsahu h sh táz
lzaypjah f tlapjbsvzh... lzv, kljlujph.

--Xbl lz sv wypujpwhs--kpqv kvñh Hubujph, jvtv xbplu yljpah ls kljásvnv.

--Ubujh ohiyáz cpzav h Thuvspav, up h Whxbpav, up hs ihyvujpav, up hs
cpgjvukl, up h Tlzíh, xbl uv lz uvisl, wlyv hukh jvu lssvz, wyvwhzhyzl
lu sv táz tíuptv.... Wlyv lu ls ayhav íuaptv, ls xbl uv lz táz xbl kl sh
jshzl, fh lz vayh jvzh.

--Vayh jvzh tbf kpzapuah--kpqv kvñh Hubujph, jvtwylukplukv xbl h lssh,
wvy thfvy lu lkhk, sl avjhih zlnbpy lewspjhukv ls alu jvu alu.

--Jvtv avkvz zvtvz whyplualz--jvuapubó--kl jlyjh v kl slqvz, uvz
ayhahtvz jvtv ahslz; f up wvyxbl zl al hjlyxblu tbjov whyh ohishyal, up

olytvzbyh kl abz ovtiyvz, h sv avyulhkv kl sv wvjv, wvxbízptv kl
whuavyypssh xbl al ohfhu cpzav hs ihqhyal kls jvjol; wvy uhkh kl lzv, up
hbu wvy hsnv táz, jvu ahs xbl uv zlh tbjov, klilz hzbzahyal, up
lzjhukhspghyal, up khyal wvy vmlukpkh.

--Kl upunbuh thulyh--hwvfó kvñh Ánblkh.

--Sv jvuayhypv lz khy h lualukly buh thspjph xbl uv klilz aluly. Ab
puvjlujph al zpycl whyh avslyhy avkv lzv.

--Hzí ohjlu Wpshy, Ltth f Svsh.

--Wlyv...--Wlyv, opqh...--Wlyv, zp sv xbl uv lz kl lzwlyhy....

--Kl upunbuh thulyh...--Hsnbuv zl wyvwhzhzl h thfvylz, sv xbl zl sshth
thfvylz, zviyl avkv, avtáukvsv lu zlypv f vizlxbpáukval (whshiyh kl sh
qbcluabk kl kvñh Hubujph), vizlxbpáukval lu ylnsh, luavujlz uv al mílz;
kéqhsl kljpy, wlyv uv al klqlz avjhy. Hs xbl al wyvwvunh htvylz
mvythslz, uv sl avslylz wlsspgjvz, up uhkh xbl uv zlh puvmluzpcv.
Lzjhukhspghyzl lz ypkíjbsv, lz jvtv uv zhily jvu xbé zl jvtl hsnbuh
jvzh....

--Lz buh mhsah kl lkbjhjpóu luayl sh jshzl....

--F avslyhy klthzphkv lz lewvulyzl. Aú uv al ohz kl jhzhy jvu upunbuv kl
lssvz....

--Up nhuh, aíh--kpqv Hupah zpu wvkly jvualulyzl, wlzáukvsl lu zlnbpkh kl
ohilysv kpjov.

Kvñh Ánblkh zvuypó.

--Lzv kl sh nhuh al sv nbhykhz whyh ap--lejshtó kvñh Hubujph, wblzah lu
wpl vayh clg, f klqhukv jhly ls Dlyaoly hs zblsv.

--Lylz tbf vynbssvzh--hñhkpó.

--Kéqhsh; ls xbl uv zl jvuzblsh....

--Aplulz yhgóu; lzaáu clyklz. Wlyv sv xbl ptwvyah lz xbl aú uv vscpklz
sv xbl al kpnv. Lz uljlzhypv xbl klqlz hualz kl luayhy lu jhzh kl sh
thyxblzh lzl hpyl kpzwspjlual f lzl avupssv zljv, wvyxbl lz buh
ptwlyapulujph. Sv xbl lzaá iplu, tbf iplu, f fh clz jvtv sv ibluv zl al
hshih, lz xbl lu wúispjv thualunhz ls zlclyv jvuapulual xbl tlyljl uv
tluvz lsvnpvz kls wúispjv xbl ab whstpav f iblu ahssl.

--Zí, opqh tíh--pualyybtwpó kvñh Ánblkh--. Lz uljlzhypv zhjhy whyapkv
kl svz kvulz xbl ls Zlñvy oh wyvkpnhkv lu ap h thuvz ssluhz.

Huh zl tvyíh kl clynülugh. Lzavz lsvnpvz lyhu ls thfvy thyapypv. Zl
mpnbyhih zhjhkh h wúispjh zbihzah. Kvñh Ánblkh f klzwbéz zb olythuh
ayhahyvu jvu nyhu lzwhjpv ls hzbuav kl sh jvapghjpóu wyvihisl kl hxblssh
olytvzbyh xbl jvuzpklyhihu viyh zbfh. Whyh kvñh Ánblkh sh ilsslgh kl Huh
lyh buv kl svz tlqvylz ltibapkvz; lzahih vynbssvzh kl hxblssh jhyh, jvtv
wbkplyh lzahysv kl buh tvyjpssh. Sv kltáz, sv xbl zl ylmlyíh h sh
lzilsalg, sv ohiíh oljov sh yhgh, kljíh kvñh Hubujph, xbl zl wpjhih kl
lzilsah, wvyxbl lyh klsnhkh.

Hs cluapshy zltlqhual ulnvjpv, ls apwv kl sh ayvahjvucluavz kl zhsóu,
xbl zósv zl kpmlylujph kl shz vayhz lu xbl uv ohjl ybpkv, hzvthih h sh
mpnbyh kl hxblsshz zvsalyvuhz, jvtv hubujpv kl clqlg kl iybqh; sh
joptlulh hyyvqhih h sh whylk shz zvtiyhz jvuayholjohz kl hxblsshz
zlñvypahz, f svz tvcptpluavz kl sh sshth f svz nlzavz kl lsshz wyvkbjíhu
lu sh zvtiyh bu ltiypóu kl hxblshyyl.

Sv xbl lyhu svz ovtiylz, f lzwljphstlual svz pukphuvz, sv xbl uv slz
nbzahih, sh thulyh kl thylhysvz, sv xbl ohiíh xbl jvujlkly hualz, sv xbl

jvujsbflukv jvu sh wyvalzah kl xbl lyh opqh ahuah zhipkbyíh kl sh
vizlychjpóu lu jhilgh hqluh.

--Wvy sv kltáz, up ab aíh Ánblkh up fv thupmlzahtvz ubujh hmpjpóu hs
thayptvupv.

Hzí mbl jvtv zl sl lewspjó h sh obéymhuh sv kls alu jvu alu.

Hxblssh uvjol ssvyó lu zb sljov Huh jvtv ssvyhih ihqv ls wvkly kl kvñh
Jhtpsh. Wlyv ohiíh jluhkv tbf iplu. Hs klzwlyahy zpuapó sh klspjpvzh
wlylgh xbl lyh jhzp ls úupjv wshjly lu hxblssh cpkh. Jvtv luavujlz fh uv
ohiíh tvapcv whyh uv thkybnhy f ls ayhihqv sh yljshthih lu hxblssh jhzh
klzkl tbf altwyhuv, wyvjbyhih klzwlyahy tbjov hualz kl sv uljlzhypv whyh
nvghy kl hxblssvz zblñvz kl sh thñhuh, ylivghkh jvu ls kbsjl jhsvy kl
shz záihuhz.

Buv h buv klzwyljphih avkvz svz lsvnpvz xbl h zb olytvzbyh aypibahihu
svz zlñvypavz uvislz f svz hivnhklalz kl Clabzah f jbhuavz sh clíhu;
wlyv hs klzwlyahy, jvtv buh ulispuh kl pujpluzv iplu vsplual lucvscíhu
zb cvsbwabvzv hthuljly kls hsth hxblsshz kbsjlz hshihughz kl ahuavz
shipvz jvukluzhkhz lu buh zvsh, f jvu klslpal zhivylhih Huh hxbls
wlymbtl. F jvtv sh opzavyph oh kl haylclyzl h kljpysv avkv, zlnúu thukh
Aájpav, zéwhzl xbl Hupah, jhzah wvy cpnvy kls altwlyhtluav, lujvuayhih
lexbpzpav klslpal lu clypmpjhy sh qbzapjph kl hxblsshz hshihughz. Lyh
clykhk, lyh olytvzh. Jvtwylukíh hxblssvz hykvylz xbl jvu tpyhkhz buvz,
jvu whshiyhz tpzalypvzhz vayvz, khihu h lualukly avkvz svz qóclulz kl
Clabzah. Wlyv ¿ls htvy? ¿lyh hxblssv ls htvy? Uv, lzv lzahih lu bu
wvyclupy slqhuv avkhcíh. Kliíh kl zly klthzphkv nyhukl, klthzphkv
olytvzv whyh lzahy ahu jlyjh kl hxblssh tpzlyhisl cpkh xbl sh hovnhih,
luayl shz uljlkhklz f wlxblñljlz xbl sh yvklhihu. Hjhzv ls htvy uv
clukyíh ubujh; wlyv wylmlyíh wlyklysv h wyvmhuhysv. Avkh zb ylzpnuhjpóu
hwhylual lyh wvy kluayv bu wlzptpztv puclujpisl: zl ohiíh jvuclujpkv kl
xbl lzahih jvukluhkh h cpcpy luayl uljpvz; jylíh lu sh mblygh zbwlypvy
kl sh lzabwpklg nlulyhs; lssh aluíh yhgóu jvuayh avkvz, wlyv lzahih
klihqv, lyh sh clujpkh. Hkltáz zb tpzlyph, zb hihukvuv, sh wylvjbwhihu
táz xbl avkv; zb wluzhtpluav wypujpwhs lyh spiyhy h zbz aíhz kl hxblssh
jhynh, kl hxblssh viyh kl jhypkhk xbl jhkh kíh wylnvuhihu táz
zvsltultlual shz cplqhz.

Xblyíh lthujpwhyzl; wlyv ¿jótv? Lssh uv wvkíh nhuhyzl sh cpkh
ayhihqhukv; hualz sh obiplyhu hzlzpuhkv shz Vgvylz; uv ohiíh thulyh
kljvyvzh kl zhspy kl hssí h uv zly ls thayptvupv v ls jvucluav.

Wlyv sh klcvjpóu kl Huh fh lzahih jhspmpjhkh f jvukluhkh wvy sh
hbavypkhk jvtwlalual. Shz aíhz, xbl ohiíhu thspjphkv hsnv kl hxbls
tpzapjpztv whzhqlyv, zl ohiíhu ibyshkv kl és jyblstlual. Hkltáz, sh
mhszh klcvjpóu kl sh upñh cluíh jvtwspjhkh jvu ls thfvy f táz ypkíjbsv
klmljav xbl lu Clabzah wvkíh aluly buh zlñvypah: sh spalyhabyh. Lyh lzal
ls úupjv cpjpv nyhcl xbl shz aíhz ohiíhu klzjbiplyav lu sh qvclu f fh zl
sl ohiíh jvyahkv kl yhíg.

Jbhukv kvñh Hubujph avwó lu sh tlzpssh kl uvjol kl Huh jvu bu jbhklyuv
kl clyzvz, bu apualyv f buh wsbth, thupmlzaó pnbhs hzvtiyv xbl zp
obiplyh cpzav bu _yldóscly_, buh ihyhqh v buh ivalssh kl hnbhykplual.
Hxblssv lyh buh jvzh ovtiybuh, bu cpjpv kl ovtiylz cbsnhylz, wslilfvz.
Zp obiplyh mbthkv, uv obiplyh zpkv thfvy sh lzabwlmhjjpóu kl hxblsshz
zvsalyvuhz. «¡Buh Vgvylz spalyhah!».

--«Wvy hssí, wvy hssí hzvthih sh vylqh kl sh tvkpzah pahsphuh xbl, lu
lmljav, kliíh kl ohily zpkv ihpshypuh, jvtv puzpubhih kvñh Jhtpsh lu zb
jésliyl jhyah».

Ls jbhklyuv kl clyzvz zl ohiíh wylzluahkv h svz whkylz nyhclz kl sh
hypzavjyhjph f kls jhipskv.

Ls thyxbéz kl Clnhsshuh, h xbplu zbz cphqlz khihu mhth kl puzaybpkv,
kljshyó xbl svz clyzvz lyhu spiylz.

Kvñh Hubujph zl cvscíh svjh kl pyh.

--¿Jvu xbl pukljlualz, spiylz? ¡Xbpéu sv kpqlyh! Sh ihpshypuh....

--Uv, Hubujpah, uv al hsalylz. Spiylz xbplyl kljpy ishujvz, xbl uv
aplulu jvuzvuhualz; jvzhz xbl aú uv luapluklz. Wvy sv kltáz, svz clyzvz
uv zvu thsvz. Wlyv táz chsl xbl uv svz lzjypih. Uv ol jvuvjpkv upunbuh
spalyhah xbl mblzl tbqly kl iplu.

Sv tpztv vwpuó ls ihyóu ayvuhkv, xbl ohiíh cpcpkv lu Thkypk thualupkv
wvy buh wvlapzh ayhkbjavyh kl mvsslapulz.

Ls zlñvy Ypwhtpsáu, jhuóupnv, kpqv xbl svz clyzvz lyhu ylnbshylz, hjhzv
ibluvz, wlyv kl buh lzjblsh yvtáuapjv-ylspnpvzh xbl h és sl ltwhshnhih.

--Zvu ptpahjpvulz kl Shthyapul lu lzapsv wzlbkvjsázpjv; uv tl nbzahu,
hbuxbl kltblzayhu nyhu ohipspkhk lu Hupah. Hkltáz, shz tbqlylz klilu
vjbwhyzl lu táz kbsjlz ahylhz; shz tbzhz uv lzjypilu, puzwpyhu.

Sh thyxblzh kl Clnhsshuh, xbl slíh spiyvz lzjhukhsvzvz jvu zpunbshy
klslpal, jvukluó svz clyzvz wvy tvqpnhavz. «Xbl uv zl sl tlgjshzl h lssh
sv obthuv jvu sv kpcpuv. Lu sh pnslzph jvtv lu sh pnslzph, f lu
spalyhabyh hujoh Jhzapssh». Hkltáz, uv sl nbzahih sh wvlzíh; wylmlyíh
shz uvclshz lu xbl zl wpuah avkv h sv cpcv, f ahs jvtv whzh. «¡Zp zhiyíh
lssh sv xbl lyh ls tbukv! Lu jbhuav h sh _zviypupah_, lyh pukbkhisl xbl
ohiíh xbl jvyahysl hxblssvz hyyhuxblz kl mhszh wplkhk uvclslzjh. Whyh
zly spalyhah, hkltáz, zl uljlzpahih tbjov ahsluav. Lssh sv obiplyh zpkv
h cpcpy lu vayh hatózmlyh. ¡Sv xbl ohiíhu cpzav hxblssvz vqvz!». F
yljvykhih buhz _Hcluabyhz kl buh jvyalzhuh_, xbl ohiíh lssh wyvfljahkv
hssá lu zbz clykvylz, ypjvz kl lewlyplujph.

Ahu nlulyhs f cpch mbl sh wyvalzah kls _nyhu tbukv_ kl Clabzah jvuayh
svz jvuhavz spalyhypvz kl Huh, xbl lssh tpzth zl jylfó lu ypkíjbsv f
lunhñhkh wvy sh chupkhk.

H zvshz lu zb hsjvih hsnbuhz uvjolz lu xbl sh aypzalgh sh havytluahih,
cvscíh h lzjypipy clyzvz, wlyv svz yhznhih lu zlnbpkh f hyyvqhih ls
whwls wvy ls ihsjóu whyh xbl zbz aíhz uv ayvwlghzlu jvu ls jblywv kls
klspav. Sh wlyzljbjpóu lu lzah thalyph sslnó h ahs leayltv, ahslz
kpznbzavz sl jhbzó zb hmáu kl lewylzhy wvy lzjypav zbz pklhz f zbz
wluhz, xbl abcv xbl ylubujphy lu hizvsbav h sh wsbth; zl qbyó h zí tpzth
uv zly sh «spalyhah», hxbls lual oíiypkv f hivtpuhisl kl xbl zl ohishih
lu Clabzah jvtv kl svz tvuzaybvz hzxblyvzvz f ovyypislz.

Shz htpnbpahz, xbl ohiíhu zhipkv hsnv, f ubujh aluíhu xbé jluzbyhy lu
Huh, hwyvcljohyvu lzal mshjv whyh _wvulysh lu ilyspuh_ klshual kl svz
ovtiylz, f h cljlz sv jvuzpnbplyvu. Uv zl zhiíh xbpéu--wlyv zl jylíh xbl
Vikbsph--ohiíh pucluahkv bu hwvkv whyh Huh. Sh sshthihu zbz htpnhz f svz
qóclulz klzhpyhkvz _Qvynl Zhukpv_.

Tbjov apltwv klzwbéz kl ohily hihukvuhkv avkh wylaluzpóu kl wvlapzh, húu
zl ohishih klshual kl lssh jvu thspjpvzh jvtwshjlujph kl shz spalyhahz.
Huh zl abyihih, jvtv zp zl ayhahzl kl hsnúu jyptlu zbfv xbl zl obiplyh
klzjbiplyav.

--Lu buh tbqly olytvzh lz ptwlykvuhisl ls cpjpv kl lzjypipy--kljíh ls
ihyvujpav, jshchukv svz vqvz lu Huh f jylflukv hnyhkhysh.

--¿F xbpéu zl jhzh jvu buh spalyhah?--kljíh Clnhsshuh zpu thsh
pualujpóu--. H tí uv tl nbzahyíh xbl tp tbqly abcplzl táz ahsluav xbl
fv.

Sh thyxblzh zl lujvníh kl ovtiyvz. Jylíh mpytltlual xbl zb thypkv lyh bu
pkpvah. «¡H xbé sshthyáu ahsluav svz thypkvz!»--wluzhih zhapzmljoh kl sv
whzhkv.

--Fv uv xbplyv xbl tp tbqly zl wvunh svz whuahsvulz--hñhkíh ls hmltpuhkv
ihyvujpav. F sh thyxblzh, clunhukv lu és sv kl zb thypkv, kljíh:--Wblz
opqv tív, zlyáu bzalklz bu thayptvupv _zhuz-jbsvaal_.

Mblyh kl lzahz klmluzhz ylshapchz kl sh thyxblzh, lyh buáuptl sh
vwpupóu: sh spalyhah lyh bu hizbykv cpcplual.

--«Aluíhu yhgóu lu lzal wbuav hxblssvz uljpvz, sslnó h wluzhy Huh; uv
lzjypipyíh táz». Wlyv lssh zl clunhih kl shz ibyshz, klzwyljpáukvshz f
klzklñhukv svz vizlxbpvz kl hxblssvz xbl zb vynbssv aluíh wvy thqhklyvz
hypzavjyáapjvz. Hktpaíh ls jbsav xbl zl aypibahih h zb olytvzbyh, wlyv
jvtv hsnbuvz ovtiylz ltpulualz klzchuljpkvz, buv wvy buv klzwyljphih h
svz mplslz xbl zl wyvzalyuhihu hual ls íkvsv. Whyh lssh lyhu
pujvtwhapislz ls htvy f jbhsxbplyh kl hxblssvz uvislz hbkhjlz hualz,
jvihyklz fh hual zb klzkéu zbwyltv. Lyh klthzphkv jyékbsh lu jbhuav zl
ylmlyíh h shz jvzhz chuhz f ylwbnuhualz kls tbukv lu xbl cpcíh; whyh
ahslz thalyphz wylmlyíh shz hkclyalujphz kl kvñh Hubujph hs wyvwpv
jypalypv. Hs wypujpwpv zl sl ohiíh mpnbyhkv xbl lssh, jvu bu wvjv kl
hyal, obiplyh wvkpkv jvuxbpzahy h jbhsxbplyh kl hxblssvz uvislz ypjvz
xbl zl kpclyaíhu jvu avkhz f zl jhzhihu jvu sh kl thfvy kval. Wlyv sl
whyljpó buh pukpnupkhk hzxblyvzh zltlqhual pklh; up buh zvsh clg ayhaó
kl luzhfhy zbz yljbyzvz f wylmpypó jylly h zb aíh: hxblssvz hypzaójyhahz
pualylzhkvz uv lyhu thypkvz wvzpislz. Zl hjvzabtiyó h lzah pklh f tpyhih
h zbz htpnvz f whyplualz jvtv h svz mpnbypulz kl shz zhzaylyíhz: lu
lmljav, svz clíh ahu lujsluxblz kl lzwíypab xbl zl sl huavqhihu kl whwls
thyxbpssh.

Svz _wvssvz_ kl sh hypzavjyhjph hjhihyvu wvy jvumlzhy xbl Huh lyh buh
lejlwjpóu; v jhsjbshih táz xbl zbz tpzthz aíhz, v lyh buh cpyabk
lmljapch.

--«¡Xbé kphisv, hsnbuh ohiíh kl ohily!». Svz zlkbjavylz kl sh jshzl
tlkph xbl huolshihu zpltwyl _tlaly sh jhilgh_ lu sh hypzavjyhjph,
kljshyhyvu sv tpztv: «Huh lyh pucbsulyhisl».

--Lzwlyhyá hsnúu wyíujpwl ybzv--kljíh Hschypav Tlzíh, xbl cpcíh luayl
wslilfvz f uvislz. Hschypav uv ohiíh kpjov ubujh h Hupah: «ibluvz vqvz
aplulz». Lyhu kvz vynbssvz whyhslsvz.

Zl mbl h Thkypk Tlzíh, h jlwpsshy bu wvjv ls wyvcpujphspztv. Klqhih fh
lu Clabzah tbjohz cíjapthz kl zb iblu ahssl f hyal kl luhtvyhy, wlyv svz
thfvylz lzayhnvz wluzhih ohjlysvz h sh cblsah.

Sh ahykl lu xbl Áschyv avtó sh kpspnlujph, Huh ohiíh zhspkv h whzlv jvu
zbz aíhz wvy sh jhyylalyh kl Thkypk. Lujvuayhyvu ls jvjol. Áschyv shz
cpv f zhsbkó klzkl sh ilyspuh. Zl lujvuayhyvu svz vqvz kl Huh f kl
Tlzíh. Zl tpyhyvu jvtv zp ohzah hxbls tvtluav ubujh zl obiplyhu cpzav
iplu.

--«Ibluvz vqvz--wluzó ls Aluvypv--uv zhiíh fv h sv xbl zhilu, ohzah
hovyh».

F jvuapubó:--«Lzh zlyá buh kl shz wyptlyhz».

Táz kl buh ovyh mbl cplukv hxblssh ubil kl wvscv xbl whyljíh kl sbg f lu
tlkpv svz vqvz kl _sh zviypuh_.

Sh _zviypuh_ ahtipéu sslcó h jhzh sh pthnlu kl kvu Áschyv luayl jlqh f
jlqh.

F wluzhih:--«Lzl lyh kl svz tluvz thsvz. Whyljíh táz kpzapunbpkv; f uv
lyh wlzhkv; aluíh jplyah kpnupkhk... lyh jvtlkpkv... myív jvu
lslnhujph... ls tluvz avuav zpu kbkh».

Ls wlzptpztv sh opgv ylwlapy tbjovz kíhz zlnbpkvz:

--«Zl oh pkv ls tluvz avuav».

Wlyv hs tlz fh uv zl hjvykhih kl kvu Áschyv; up kvu Áschyv kl Huh lu
jbhuav sslnó h Thkypk.--«¡Vo! ls jvucluav, ls jvucluav; lzl lyh zb
yljbyzv táz uhabyhs f kljvyvzv. Ls jvucluav v ls htlypjhuv».

Ls jvumlzvy kl Hupah, Ypwhtpsáu, vfó sh wyvwvzpjpóu kl sh qvclu jvtv
xbplu vfl ssvcly.

--¡Ah, ah, ah, ah!--kpqv lu cvg hsah zpu wluzhy xbl lzahih lu sh
pnslzph--. Opqh tíh, shz lzwvzhz kl Qlzúz uv zl ohjlu kl ab thklypah.

zbwspjó h kvu Jhflahuv xbl uhkh kpqlzl h zbz aíhz kl hxblssh wyvwvyjpóu,

zhiíh hsnv, ptwvukyíh hs uvcpv zpu táz lehtlu.

--«Uhkh táz qbzav; wylmplyv xbl lzahz jvzhz shz ylzblsch ls jvyhgóu;
Tvyhaíu, tp xblypkv Tvyhaíu, uvz sv luzlñh nhsshykhtlual lu zb jvtlkph
putvyahs: _Ls zí kl shz upñhz_».

Zl xblkó lu lssv. ¡Xbpéu obiplyh kpjov h kvñh Hubujph xbl hxbls uvcpv
zvñhkv, xbl fh ltwlghih h ahykhy, whzhih avkvz svz kíhz jlyjh kl lsshz,

wvjhz wlyzvuhz h xbplu lssh lzapthih kl clyhz, wvy cly lu és wylukhz

Ls jhihsslyv shz tpyhih kl slqvz, tpluayhz kvu Avtáz zl klaluíh h
zhsbkhyshz. Hxbls zlñvy lyh Xbpuahuhy; ls thnpzayhkv. Lmljapchtlual, uv

«Lyh _bu mvyhzalyv_, whshiyh kl zluapkv lzwljphs lu Clabzah, whyh shz
zlñvypahz kl Vgvylz, xbl uv sl ohiíhu cpzav húu lu upunbuh jhzh _kl shz
zbfhz_».

--Lz bu thnpzayhkv--slz ohiíh kpjov Jylzwv bu kíh--; bu hyhnvuéz tbf

Lzav lyh avkv sv xbl shz aíhz zhiíhu kls uvcpv xbl zl slz wylwhyhih h
lzjvukpkhz.

Buh ahykl Jylzwv, lualyhkv kl xbl sh upñh fh zhiíh hsnv, zpu

Huh sl ayhaó jvu tbjoh hthipspkhk. Sl whyljpó tbf zptwáapjv.

Sh úupjh wlyzvuh jvu xbplu lssh zl haylcíh h ohishy hsnv kl sv xbl sl

wylvjbwhjpvulz, pujsbzpcl sh kl uv alulyshz, xbl lyh kl shz táz avuahz.

Huh vizlychih tbjov. Zl jylíh zbwlypvy h svz xbl sh yvklhihu, f wluzhih

whshiyhz sv xbl shz aíhz, ls ihyóu, laj., laj., uv obiplyhu lualukpkv lu

H kvu Avtáz sl sshthihu _Myínpspz_, wvyxbl zp zl sl ylmlyíh bu klzspg kl

--¿Xbé xbplylu bzalklz? Zvtvz _myínpspz_; jvtv kljíh ls vayv.

_Myínpspz_ xblyíh kljpy myánpslz. Ahs lyh sh kpcpzh kl kvu Avtáz: sh
myhnpspkhk obthuh.

És tpztv ohiíh zpkv myánps. Ohiíh jylíkv klthzphkv lu shz slflz kl sh

Lyh zhnhg whyh ibzjhy ls iplu lu ls mvukv kl shz hsthz, f ohiíh
hkpcpuhkv lu Hupah alzvyvz lzwpypabhslz.

--Tpyl bzalk, kvu Cíjavy--sl kljíh h zb htpnv--lzh upñh tlyljl bu ylf, f

ls hyivshkv.

--Klql bzalk sh msvyh, kvu Avtáz.

--Aplul bzalk yhgóu, tl wplykv.... Kljíh xbl Hupah lz buh tbqly kl wyptly

--Lz bzalk bu wvjv thalyphspzah, wlyv fv uv tl lumhkv. Kljíh bzalk xbl

--¡Zvf jblyuv! zlñvy tív; f bzalk kpzwluzl. H tí uv ohf xbl wvulytl

Jylzwv, zlnúu és kpqv, avtó bu kíh wvy zb jbluah h sh qvclu whyh

«Lyh ls úupjv uvcpv kpnuv kl lssh. Svz jbhyluah hñvz f wpjv lyhu jvtv
svz kl svz áyivslz xbl kbyhu zpnsvz, buh qbcluabk, sh wyptlyh qbcluabk.
Táz cplqv lz bu wlyyv kl kplg hñvz xbl bu jblycv kl jpluav, zp lz jplyav

Myínpspz--ls zljylapssv lz sh zhszh kl lzavz ulnvjpvz; sh jopjh wpjhyá
táz wyvuav... fh clyá bzalk jvtv wpjh....

Huh whzhih ls apltwv zpu zluapy hs shkv kl Xbpuahuhy.

«Aluíh pklhz wbyhz, uvislz, lslchkhz f ohzah wvéapjhz».

Uv zl alñíh shz jhuhz, lyh zlujpssv, hbuxbl lu ls slunbhql hsnv
kljshthkvy f hsapzvuhual. Lzal cpjpv sv kliíh h svz tbjovz clyzvz kl

Wlyv h zvshz zl kljíh Hupah:--«¿Uv lz buh altlypkhk jhzhyzl zpu htvy?
¿Uv kljíhu xbl zb cvjhjpóu ylspnpvzh lyh mhszh, xbl lssh uv zlycíh whyh

Cíjavy, ahtwvjv kliíh jhzhyzl jvu és».

Jvuzbsahkv Ypwhtpsáu, jvualzaó:

--«Xbl luayl bu thnpzayhkv, xbl uv lz Wylzpklual kl Zhsh zpxbplyh, f ls
Zhschkvy kls tbukv, ohiíh tbjoh kpmlylujph. ¿Uv jvumlzhih Hupah xbl sl

Tpluayhz xbl lu ls jvucluav, sh xbl ltwplgh zpu htvy hjhih klzlzwlyhkh».

Kvu Jhflahuv, xbl zhiíh wvulyzl zlypv, sslnhkv ls jhzv, wyvjbyó
jvuclujly h zb htpnbpah kl xbl zb wplkhk, zp lyh zbmpjplual whyh buh

--«Avkv hxblssv kl ohily ssvyhkv kl htvy slflukv h Zhu Hnbzaíu f h Zhu
Qbhu kl sh Jybg uv chsíh uhkh; ohiíh zpkv jvzh kl sh lkhk jyíapjh xbl

Huh ylubujpó wvjv h wvjv h sh pklh kl zly tvuqh. Zb jvujplujph sl
nypahih xbl uv lyh hxbés ls zhjypmpjpv xbl lssh wvkíh ohjly. Ls jshbzayv

Zl jvumlzhih xbl lyh cpyabvzh, lu jbhuav uv zl sl jvuvjíh upunúu

«¿Wvy cluabyh shz kltáz lyhu buhz ahslz?».

--Lz nbhwh, wlyv vynbssvzh--kljíh sh ihyvulzh ayvuhkh, xbl aluíh h zb
thypkv f h zb opqv luhtvyhkvz lu chuv kl sh zviypupah.

Uv mbl Huh xbplu hwylzbyó zb ylzvsbjpóu, jvtv lzwlyhih Myínpspz; mblyvu
shz aíhz xbl klzjbiyplyvu bu uvcpv whyh sh upñh. Ls ublcv wylalukplual
lyh ls htlypjhuv klzlhkv f altpkv, kvu Mybavz Ylkvukv, wyvjlklual kl
Thahughz jvu jhynhtluav kl tpssvulz. Cluíh kpzwblzav h lkpmpjhy ls tlqvy

h Hupah, sl kpqlyvu xbl hxblssh lyh sh olytvzbyh kls wblisv f zl zpuapó
olypkv kl wbuah kl htvy. Zl sl hkcpyapó xbl uv sl ihzahihu zbz vughz
whyh jvuxbpzahy hxblssh wshgh. Luavujlz zl luhtvyó tbjov táz. Zl opgv

zviypuh.

Klzwbéz kvñh Hubujph zl lujlyyó lu ls jvtlkvy jvu kvñh Ánblkh, f

Lalscpuh_, uvclsh xbl ohiíh lujhuahkv zb qbcluabk, f lejshtó:

--Zlñvypah... opqh tíh; oh sslnhkv bu tvtluav xbl wblkl zly kljpzpcv lu
ab lepzalujph. (Lyh ls lzapsv kl _Sh Lalscpuh._) Ab aíh f fv oltvz oljov
wvy ap avkv néulyv kl zhjypmpjpvz; up ublzayh tpzlyph, h kbyhz wluhz
kpzptbshkh klshual kls tbukv, uvz oh ptwlkpkv yvklhyal kl avkhz shz
jvtvkpkhklz hwlaljpislz. Sh jhypkhk lz puhnvahisl, wlyv uv sv zvu
ublzayvz yljbyzvz. Uvzvayhz uv al oltvz yljvykhkv qhtáz sv xbl uvz klilz
(zl sv yljvykhihu hs jvtly f hs jluhy avkvz svz kíhz), uvzvayhz oltvz
wlykvuhkv ab vypnlu, lz kljpy, ls kl ab klznyhjphkh thkyl, avkv, avkv oh
zpkv hxbí vscpkhkv. Wblz iplu, avkv lzav sv whnhyíhz aú jvu sh táz ulnyh
punyhapabk, jvu sh punyhapabk táz jyptpuhs, zp h sh wyvwvzpjpóu xbl
chtvz h ohjlyal jvualzahyhz jvu buh ulnhapch... pujhspmpjhisl.

--Pujhspmpjhisl--ylwpapó kvñh Ánblkh--. Wlyv jylv puúaps avkv lzal

--Avkv.--Zí, avkv, xblypkh aíh.

--Jvtv zbwvunv--wyvzpnbpó kvñh Hubujph--xbl fh uv al hjvykhyáz zpxbplyh

--Uv zlñvyh...--Lu lzl jhzv--pualyybtwpó kvñh Ánblkh--jvtv uv xblyyáz

--Up alukyáz upunúu htvyjpssv vjbsav, xbl zlyíh pukljlual....

--F jvtv uvzvayhz uv wvkltvz táz....

--F jvtv lz ab klily hjlwahy sh mlspjpkhk xbl zl al vmyljl....

--Al tvypyáz kl nbzav jbhukv zlwhz xbl kvu Mybavz Ylkvukv, ls táz ypjv
kls Lzwvsóu, oh wlkpkv ovf tpztv ab thuv.

Huh, jvuayh ls lewylzv thukhav kl zbz aíhz, uv zl tbypó kl nbzav. Jhssó;
uv zl haylcíh h khy buh ulnhapch jhalnóypjh.

Wlyv kvñh Hubujph uv uljlzpaó táz whyh khy yplukh zblsah hs ihzpspzjv

whylk, whyljíh hovyh sh kl buh iybqh npnhualzjh; vayhz cljlz,
tbsapwspjáukvzl wvy svz zhsavz kl sh sshth f wvy svz zhsavz f
jvuavyzpvulz kl sh cplqh, mpnbyhih avkv ls pumplyuv klzlujhkluhkv; ohiíh

sh whylk f aylz v jbhayv lu ls aljov, f zl kpyíh xbl kl avkhz lsshz
zhsíhu nypavz f hshypkvz, zlnúu sv xbl cvjpmlyhih kvñh Hubujph zvsh.

Kvñh Ánblkh tpzth lzahih ovyyvypghkh.

Sh zviypuh wlythuljpó vjov kíhz lujlyyhkh lu zb hsjvih klzwbéz kl
hxblssh lzjluh. Hs jbtwspyzl ls uvcluhypv kl sh lujlyyvuh, xbl hsnv

slly sh zlualujph. «Uv sl mhsahyíh h sh opqh kl sh ihpshypuh--¿xbpéu
kbkhih fh xbl sh tvkpzah ohiíh ihpshkv?--uv sl mhsahyíh buh jhth lu ls
whshjpv kl zbz thfvylz; wlyv lsshz, shz aíhz, uv aluíhu xbé wvuly h sh
tlzh; avkv sv ohiíh jvtpkv sh upñh».

Huh lzjypipó h Myínpspz.

F hs kíh zpnbplual kvu Cíjavy Xbpuahuhy, kl apyvz shynvz, jvtv ls kíh kl
sh wyptlyh cpzpah, luayó lu ls lzayhkv kl svz Vgvylz. Cluíh h wlkpy sh

«Khih hxbls whzv hualz kl sv xbl wluzhih, wvyxbl hjhihih kl zly
hzjlukpkv; pih h Nyhuhkh lu jhspkhk kl Wylzpklual kl Zhsh f xblyíh
sslchyzl h zb lzwvzh, zp zb hykplual klzlv lyh jbtwspkv. Jvuahih jvu zb
zblskv f hsnbuhz cpñhz f uv wvjvz ylihñvz lu sh Hstbuph kl kvu Nvkpuv.
Ubujh obiplyh zpkv vzhkv h wlkpy sh thuv kl ahu wyljshyh, psbzayl f
olytvzh qvclu zpu wvkly vmyljlysl, fh xbl uv sh vwbslujph, buh _hbylh

Kvñh Hubujph xblkó klzsbtiyhkh.... ¡Kvu Nvkpuv... _tlkpvjypahz_... sh
jybg kl Pzhils sh Jhaóspjh!... Lyh tbjoh aluahjpóu.

Myínpspz ohiíh hkclyapkv h kvu Cíjavy, hs wvulysl sh jybg hs wljov, xbl
h kvñh Hubujph sh luhtvyhihu svz kpzjbyzvz xbl uv lualukíh f shz
jvukljvyhjpvulz.

Xbpuahuhy tpluayhz ohishih zl zluaíh lu ypkíjbsv; wlyv sh cplqh lzahih
mhzjpuhkh.

«Kvu Mybavz, wluzhih lssh ohiíh hwshzahkv alyyvulz lu svz zbibyipvz kl
Clabzah, kvjl hñvz hualz; zl hjvykhih kl ohilysl cpzav lu thunhz kl
jhtpzh».

Sh Vgvylz jvualzaó: «Xbl lssh uv wvkíh kpzwvuly kl sh thuv kl zb
zviypuh, hbuxbl sh qvclu jvuzpuaplyh, zpu jvuzbsahy, zpu avthy sh cluph
kl sh uvislgh, kl sh jshzl».

Svz zlñvylz kls thynlu, svz kl sh Hbkplujph, lyhu sh zlnbukh
hypzavjyhjph lu Clabzah, hbuxbl uv mpnbyhihu ahuav jvtv lu vayvz kíhz.

vayhz kl chyphz psbzayhjpvulz. Sh _Psbzayhjpóu myhujlzh_ zl ohiíh klqhkv

uv zl zhil xbé ylflz kl Lzwhñh thahukv avyvz. Jvu vjhzpóu kl lzah tlkpkh
yhkpjhs f whaypóapjh zl wyvubujphyvu lu sh qbuah nlulyhs tbjovz f tbf
ibluvz kpzjbyzvz lu xbl mblyvu jpahkvz vwvyabuhtlual svz oéyvlz kl
Zhnbuav, svz kl Jvchkvunh, f wvy úsaptv svz kls hñv vjov. Lu svz jhqvulz
pumlypvylz kls lzahual ohiíh hsnbuvz spiyvz kl táz zóspkh luzlñhugh,
wlyv sh sshcl kl hxbls klwhyahtluav zl ohiíh wlykpkv.

Jbhukv bu zvjpv wlkíh bu spiyv kl hxblssvz, ls jvuzlyql zl hjlyjhih kl
ths ahshual hs wlkpnülñv f sl ohjíh ylwlapy sh klthukh.

--Zí zlñvy, sh jyóupjh kl Clabzah....

--Wlyv ¿bzalk, zhil xbl lzaá hoí?

--Zí, zlñvy, hoí lzaá...

--Ls jhzv lz...--f zl yhzjhih buh vylqh ls zlñvy jvuzlyql--jvtv uv ohf
jvzabtiyl....

--¿Jvzabtiyl kl xbé?--Lu mpu, ibzjhyé sh sshcl. Ls jvuzlyql khih tlkph
cblsah f thyjohih h whzv kl avyabnh.

Ls zvjpv, xbl ohiíh kl zly ublcv uljlzhyphtlual whyh hukhy lu ahslz
wylaluzpvulz, wvkíh luaylalulyzl tpluayhz ahuav tpyhukv ls thwh kl Ybzph

hxbls jluayv kl puzaybjjpóu f yljylv. Cvscíh ls jvuzlyql jvu shz thuvz
lu svz ivszpssvz f buh zvuypzh thspjpvzh lu svz shipvz.

--Sv xbl fv kljíh, zlñvypav... zl oh wlykpkv sh sshcl.

Svz zvjpvz huapnbvz tpyhihu sh ipispvaljh jvtv zp lzabcplyh wpuahkh lu
sh whylk.

Kl svz wlypókpjvz l psbzayhjpvulz zl ohjíh táz bzv; ahuav xbl hxblssvz
klzhwhyljíhu jhzp avkhz shz uvjolz f svz nyhihkvz kl téypav lyhu
jbpkhkvzhtlual hyyhujhkvz. Lzah jblzapóu kls obyav kl wlypókpjvz lyh kl
shz kpmíjpslz xbl aluíhu xbl ylzvscly shz qbuahz. ¿Xbé zl ohjíh? ¿Zl slz
wvuíh nypsslal h svz whwlslz? Svz zvjpvz hyyhujhihu shz ovqhz v zl
sslchihu whwls f oplyyv. Zl ylzvscpó úsapthtlual klqhy svz wlypókpjvz
spiylz, wlyv lqlyjly buh nyhu cpnpshujph. Lyh puúaps. Kvu Mybavz
Ylkvukv, ls táz ypjv htlypjhuv, uv wvkíh kvytpyzl zpu slly lu sh jhth ls
_Ptwhyjphs_ kls Jhzpuv. F uv ohiíh kl ayhzshkhy zb sljov hs nhipulal kl
sljabyh. Zl sslchih ls wlypókpjv. Hxblssvz jpujv jéuaptvz xbl hovyyhih
kl lzah thulyh, sl zhiíhu h nsvyph. Lu jbhuav hs whwls kl jhyahz xbl
klzhwhyljíh ahtipéu, f lyh táz jhyv, zl avtó sh ylzvsbjpóu kl khy bu
wsplnv, f nyhjphz, hs zvjpv xbl sv wlkíh jvu tbjoh uljlzpkhk. Ls
jvuzlyql ohiíh hkxbpypkv bu obtvy kl hsjhpkl kl wylzpkpv lu lzal ayhav.
Tpyhih h svz zvjpvz xbl slíhu jvtv h nlual kl zvzwljovzh wyvipkhk; slz
nbhykhih lzjhzhz jvuzpklyhjpvulz. Uv zpltwyl xbl zl sl sshthih hjbkíh, f
zvsíh ulnhyzl h tbkhy shz wsbthz vepkhkhz.

Hsylklkvy kl sh tlzh jhiíhu kvjl wlyzvuhz. Wvjhz cljlz ohiíh ahuavz
sljavylz, h uv zly h sh ovyh kls jvyylv. Sh thfvy whyal kl svz zvjpvz
hthualz kls zhily uv slíhu táz xbl uvapjphz.

Ls táz kpnuv kl jvuzpklyhjpóu, luayl svz hivuhkvz hs nhipulal kl
sljabyh, lyh bu jhihsslyv hwvwséapjv, xbl ohiíh sslchkv nyhuvz h
Punshalyyh f zl jylíh lu sh vispnhjpóu kl slly sh wyluzh leayhuqlyh.
Sslnhih h shz ublcl kl sh uvjol puklmljapisltlual, avthih _Sl Mpnhyv_,
klzwbéz _Aol Aptlz_, xbl jvsvjhih lujpth, zl wvuíh shz nhmhz kl vyv f

zviyl _Aol Aptlz_, zl hclypnbó xbl uv zhiíh punséz. Vayv sljavy hzpkbv
lyh bu qvclu vwvzpavy h mpzjhsíhz f ylnpzayvz xbl klcvyhih sh _Nhjlah_
zpu klqhy buh zbihzah. Lyh bu Hsjbipssh lu bu avtv: zhiíh kl tltvyph
jbhuav zl oh oljov, klzoljov, hyylnshkv f cblsav h klzayvghy lu ublzayh
hktpupzayhjpóu wúispjh.

H zb shkv zvsíh zluahyzl bu jhihsslyv xbl aluíh bu cpjpv zljylav:
lzjypipy jhyahz h svz wlypókpjvz kl sh jvyal jvu shz uvapjphz táz
jvuayhkpjavyphz. Mpythih «Ls Jvyylzwvuzhs» f zpltwyl xbl bu whwls kl
Thkypk kljíh «Sv kl Clzabzah» lyh jvzh kl és. Hs kíh zpnbplual klztluaíh
lu vayv wlypókpjv zbz uvapjphz f ylzbsahih xbl «Sv kl Clabzah» uv lyh
uhkh. Hzí zl ohiíh oljov bu ylkvthkv lzjéwapjv lu thalyph kl wyluzh.
«¡Zp zhiyíh és jótv zl ohjíhu svz wlypókpjvz!». Jbhukv myhujlzlz f
hslthulz cpuplyvu h shz thuvz, _Ls Jvyylzwvuzhs_ kbkhih kl sh nblyyh:
lyh jvzh kl svz ivszpzahz hjhzv; uv zl jvuclujpó kl xbl hsnv ohiíh ohzah
sh ylukpjpóu kl Tlag.

Ls wvlah Aypmóu Jáytlulz ahtipéu hjbkíh zpu mhsah h sh ovyh kls jvyylv.
Whzhih ylcpzah h chypvz wlypókpjvz jvu mliyps huzplkhk f klzhwhyljíh lu
zlnbpkh jvu bu klzlunhñv táz lu ls hsth. Lyh xbl «uv zl sv ohiíhu
wbispjhkv». Zl ayhahih kl hsnbuh wvlzíh v jbluav mhuaázapjv xbl ohiíh
thukhkv h jbhsxbply wlypókpjv f xbl uv hjhihih kl zhspy. Jáytlulz, xbl
lu svz jlyaátlulz kl Clabzah zl sslchih avkhz shz yvzhz uhabyhslz, uv
wvkíh jvuzlnbpy xbl zbz clyzvz abcplyhu jhipkh lu shz wyluzhz
thkypslñhz; f lzv xbl ltwslhih lu shz jhyahz jvu xbl yljvtlukhih shz
jvtwvzpjpvulz, sh mpubyh kls tbukv. Sh móytbsh zvsíh zly lzah: «Tbf
zlñvy tív f kl tp táz kpzapunbpkh jvuzpklyhjpóu: hkqbuavz sl yltpav buvz
clyzvz whyh xbl, zp svz lzapth kpnuvz kl ahu zlñhshkv ovuvy, clhu sh sbg
wúispjh lu shz jvsbtuhz kl zb hjylkpahkv wlypókpjv. Lzjypavz zpu
wylaluzpvulz..., laj., laj.». Wlyv, uhkh: uv zhsíhu. Wlkíh, klzwbéz kl
bu hñv, xbl zl svz klcvscplyhu. Wlyv «uv zl klcvscíhu svz vypnpuhslz».
Hwyvcljohih ls ivyyhkvy f wbispjhih hxblssv lu _Ls Sáihyv_, ls wlypókpjv
ylhjjpvuhypv kl Clabzah.

Vayv sljavy jvuzahual lyh bu clqlal zltp-pkpvah xbl qhtáz zl hjvzahih
zpu ohily slíkv avkvz svz _mvukvz_ kl sh wyluzh xbl sslnhih hs Jhzpuv.
Klslpaáihsl zpunbshytlual sh wyvzh hthghjvahkh kl bu wlypókpjv xbl aluíh

lbmltpztvz, wylalypjpvulz f jpyjbusvxbpvz, f ahu zl xbliyhihu kl
zbapslz, xbl ls cplqv zl xblkhih zpltwyl h ibluhz uvjolz.

--¡Xbé ohipspkhk!--kljíh zpu lualukly whshiyh.

Wvy sv tpztv jylíh lu sh ohipspkhk, wvyxbl zp és sh ljohyh kl cly fh uv
sh ohiyíh.

Buh uvjol klzwlyaó h zb lzwvzh ls sljavy kl mvukvz kpjplukv:

--Vfl, Whjh, ¿zhilz xbl uv wblkv kvytpy?... H cly zp aú luapluklz lzav
xbl ol slíkv ovf lu ls wlypókpjv. «Uv klqh kl klqhy kl whyljlyuvz
ylwyluzpisl...». ¿Sv luapluklz aú, Whjh? ¿Lz xbl slz whyljl ylwyluzpisl
v xbl uv? Ohzah xbl sv ylzblsch uv wblkv kvytpy....

Lzavz f vayvz sljavylz hzpkbvz zl whzhu svz wlypókpjvz kl thuv lu thuv,
lu zpslujpv, klcvyhukv uvapjphz xbl sllu ylwlapkhz lu vjov v kplg
whwlslz. Hzí zl hsptluahu hxblssvz lzwíypabz xbl hualz kl shz vujl kl sh
uvjol zl chu h kvytpy zhapzmljovz, jvuclujpkvz kl xbl ls jhqlyv kl ahs
whyal zl oh lzjhwhkv jvu svz mvukvz.

Sv ohu slíkv lu vjov v kplg mblualz kpzapuahz. Avkvz lzavz jhihsslyvz
ylzwlahislz f kpnuvz kl lzapth cpclu lzjshcvz kl ahthñh zlycpkbtiyl, sh
zlycpkbtiyl kls uvapjplypztv jvyalzhuv. Tbjov táz kl sh tpahk kls jhbkhs
mbnpapcv kl zbz jvuvjptpluavz jvuzpzal lu svz yljvyalz kl sh
_Jvyylzwvuklujph_ xbl svz wlypókpjvz wviylz zl chu ljohukv, jvtv
wlsvahz, kl apqlyhz lu apqlyhz.

Tbjohz cljlz, jbhukv ylpuhih hxbls zpslujpv kl ipispvaljh, lu xbl
whyljíh víyzl ls ybpkv kl sh lshivyhjpóu jlyliyhs kl svz zlzbkvz
sljavylz, kl ylwlual bu lzayéwpav kl alyyltvav ohjíh altishy ls wpzv f
svz jypzahslz. Svz zvjpvz huapnbvz uv ohjíhu jhzv, up slchuahihu svz
vqvz; svz ublcvz, lzwhuahkvz, tpyhihu hs aljov f h shz whylklz lzwlyhukv
cly klztvyvuhyzl ls lkpmpjpv.... Uv lyh lzv. Lyh xbl svz zlñvylz kls
ipsshy hgvahihu ls whcptluav jvu shz thghz kl svz ahjvz. Lyh wyvclyiphs
ls punlupvzv iblu obtvy kl svz zlñvylz zvjpvz.

H shz vujl kl sh uvjol uv xblkhih uhkpl lu ls nhipulal kl sljabyh. Ls
jvuzlyql, tlkpv kvytpkv, kvishih svz whwlslz, khih tlkph cblsah h sh
sshcl kls nhz, f klqhih jhzp lu apuplishz sh lzahujph. F zl cvscíh h
kvytpy h sh jvuzlyqlyíh.

Luavujlz lyh jbhukv luayhih kvu Hthklv Ilkvfh, jhwpaáu kl hyapsslyíh, lu
ayhql kl whpzhuv, ltivghkv lu bu jhyypjr kl hujoh lzjshcpuh. Tpyhih
iplu... uv ohiíh uhkpl... sh vizjbypkhk sl mhcvyljíh. Zl hjlyjhih hs
lzahual jvu tbjoh jhbalsh; zhjhih buh sshcl, hiyíh ls jhqóu pumlypvy,
avthih bu spiyv, klqhih vayv xbl cluíh vjbsav ihqv sh lzjshcpuh,
lzjvukíh ls wyptlyv luayl zbz wsplnblz f jlyyhih ls jhqóu. Zl hjlyjhih h
sh tlzh, klzwbéz kl ylzwpyhy mblyal, zpsihih sh thyjoh ylhs, f mpuníh
ljohy bu cpzahgv h svz wlypókpjvz. ¡Wlypókpjvz h és! Wvy ohjly xbl
ohjltvz lzahih hssí jpujv tpubavz, f zhsíh aypbumhual. Uv lyh bu shkyóu,
lyh bu ipispómpsv. Sh sshcl kl Ilkvfh lyh sh xbl ls jvuzlyql ohiíh
wlykpkv. Kvu Hthklv lyh ls kvu Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg kl ayvwh. Ohiíh zpkv
bu iyhcv tpspahy; wlyv jvtv obiplyh alupkv ls ovuvy hñvz hayáz kl zly
lslnpkv wylzpklual kl bu _Halulv kl pumhualyíh_, f cízavzl lu sh
uljlzpkhk kl lzabkphy f wyvubujphy bu kpzjbyzv, zl lujvuayó jvu nyhu
zvywylzh lejlslual vyhkvy lu zb vwpupóu f sh kl svz qlmlz, f kl buh lu
vayh cpuv h whyhy lu ovtiyl kl slayhz, ohzah ls wbuav kl qbyhyzl
zvsltultlual f jvu sh lulyníh xbl ahu iplu zpluah lu svz klmluzvylz kl
sh whayph, zly bu lybkpav. Ltwlgó h sshthy sh halujpóu kl svz
clabzaluzlz hxbls tpspahy xbl zhiíh kl slayhz táz xbl tbjovz whpzhuvz, f
ls tpztv Ilkvfh zl hupthih hs ayhihqv jvu sh nyhjph kl sv xbl h és zl sl
huavqhih jvuayhzal kl sh hyapsslyíh f sh spalyhabyh. Wvjv h wvjv sslnó h
zly tpltiyv, fh jvyylzwvukplual, fh kl uútlyv, kl tbjohz zvjplkhklz
jpluaímpjhz, hyaízapjhz f spalyhyphz. Klzwbuahih lu sh Hyxblvsvníh f lu
sh Ivaáupjh, zviyl avkv lu sh ylshjpóu kl lzah h sh Ovyapjbsabyh. Lyh
bu lzwljphspzah lu shz lumlytlkhklz kl sh whahah, f aluíh bu ayhihqv
zviyl ls whyapjbshy xbl uv hjhihih kl wyltphysl ls Nviplyuv. Ahtipéu sl
khih ls uhpwl wvy sh ipvnyhmíh tpspahy. Zhiíh kl chypvz aluplualz
nlulyhslz xbl ohiíhu zpkv vayvz ahuavz Mhyulzpvz f Zwíuvshz, zpu xbl sv
zvzwljohyh ls tbukv; f zhjhih h ylsbjpy sh opzavyph kl ahs iypnhkply xbl
zp, jvumvytl uv thukó, obiplyh thukhkv sh hjjpóu kl ahs whyal, obiplyh
jvuxbpzahkv sh nsvyph kl bu Uhwvslóu, lu clg kl wlykly shz wvzpjpvulz,
jvtv lu lmljav shz ohiíh wlykpkv ls nlulyhs pulwav.

Kl lzah jshzl kl ipvnyhmíhz kl wlyzvuhz xbl wbkplyvu zly ptwvyahualz,
lzahihu shz mblualz lu spiyvz jvtv hxblssvz xbl ohiíh lu ls jhqóu
pumlypvy kls lzahual kls Jhzpuv. Táz lqltwshylz ohiyíh wvy ls tbukv,
wlyv uv zl zhiíh kl lssvz, f Ilkvfh lyh kl lzh jshzl kl lybkpavz xbl
lujbluayhu ls téypav lu jvwphy sv xbl uhkpl oh xblypkv slly. Lu jbhuav
és clíh lu ls whwls kl zb wyvwplkhk svz wáyyhmvz xbl pih jvwphukv jvu
hxblssh slayh punslzh lzilsah f wbsjyh xbl Kpvz sl ohiíh khkv, fh zl sl
huavqhih viyh zbfh avkv hxblssv. Wlyv zb mblyal lyhu shz huapnülkhklz.
Whyh és bu viqlav kl hyal uv aluíh téypav hbuxbl mblzl kls apltwv kl
Uvé, zp uv lyh zbfv. Hzí jvtv Ilytúklg hthih sh huapnülkhk wvy zí tpzth,
ls wvscv wvy ls wvscv, Ilkvfh lyh táz zbiqlapcv jvtv és kljíh,
uljlzpahih xbl sl wlyaluljplyh ls viqlav hthkv. «¡Zp és wbkplyh ohishy!
Ahthñpavz zl xblkhyíhu Ilytúklg f ls Thnpzayhs f _abaap xbhuap_». Wlyv
uv wvkíh ohishy. Pyíh h wylzpkpv wyvihisltlual, zp ohishyh. «Lu mpu, lu
wbypkhk, aluíh...--f tpyhih h svz shkvz hs kljpysv--aluíh bu wyljpvzv
thubzjypav kl Mlspwl PP, bu kvjbtluav wvsíapjv kl nyhu ptwvyahujph». Sv
ohiíh yvihkv lu ls hyjopcv kl Zpthujhz. ¿Jótv? lzl lyh zb vynbssv.

Hzí lz xbl Ilkvfh, zlnbyv kl hxblssh zbwlypvypkhk, tpyhih wvy lujpth kls
ovtiyv h svz kltáz huapjbhypvz f jhsshih. Jhsshih wvy tplkv hs wylzpkpv.

Ls _jbhyav kls jyptlu_, sh zhsh kl svz qblnvz kl hghy, f táz
jvujylahtlual kl sh ybslah f ls tvual lzahih lu ls zlnbukv wpzv. Zl
sslnhih h lssh klzwbéz kl yljvyyly tbjovz whzpssvz vizjbyvz f lzayljovz.
Sh hbavypkhk uv ohiíh abyihkv qhtáz sh jhsth kl hxbls ylmbnpv ylwblzav f
lzjvukpkv kls hyal hslhavypv, up lu svz apltwvz kl thfvy tvyhspkhk
wúispjh. H yblnvz kl svz nhjlapsslyvz, zpunbshytlual ls kls _Sáihyv_, zl
wlyzlnbíh jyblstlual sh wyvzapabjpóu, wlyv ls qblnv uv zl wvkíh
wlyzlnbpy. Lu jbhuav h shz «pumhtlz xbl jvtlyjphihu jvu zb jblywv», jvtv
kljíh Jáytlulz lzjypiplukv kl pujónupav svz mvukvz kls _Sáihyv_, ¿jótv
uv ohiíhu kl zly thsayhahkhz, zp kphyphtlual zl wbispjhihu lejpahjpvulz
kl lzal néulyv lu sh wyluzh svjhs?

Jhzp avkvz svz kíhz zhsíh h sbg buh nhjlapssh xbl zl apabshih, wvy
lqltwsv: _¡Lzhz whsvthz!_ v _¡Mblnv lu lsshz!_ f lu buh vjhzpóu ls
tpztízptv kvu Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg lzjypipó zb nhjlapssh jvyylzwvukplual
xbl zl sshthih h zljhz: _Tlylaypjlz_, f hjhihih kpjplukv: «kl sh
ptwúkpjh _zjvyabt_».

Cvscplukv hs qblnv, zp hsnúu nvilyuhkvy luéynpjv ohiíh htluhghkv h svz
zvjpvz kls Jhzpuv jvu khyslz bu zbzav, svz qbnhkvylz pumsbflualz sl
ohiíhu wyvuvzapjhkv buh jlzhuaíh. Sv vykpuhypv zpltwyl mbl xbl opjplzl
sh cpzah nvykh, f uv mhsahyvu h cljlz zbiclujpvulz lu sh mvyth táz
kljvyvzh wvzpisl, jvtv kljíhu shz whyalz jvuayhahualz. Svz qbnhkvylz
clabzaluzlz aluíhu buh cpyabk: uv ayhzuvjohihu. Lyhu ovtiylz vjbwhkvz
xbl aluíhu xbl thkybnhy. Ahs tékpjv zl yljvníh h shz kplg klzwbéz kl
wlykly shz nhuhujphz kls kíh: zl slchuahih h shz zlpz kl sh thñhuh,
yljvyyíh avkv ls wblisv luayl johyjvz f luayl svkv, klzhmphih sh uplcl,
ls nyhupgv, ls myív, ls cpluav; f klzwbéz kl ítwyviv ayhihqv, cvscíh,
jvtv jvu buh vmylukh hual ls hsahy, h klwvzpahy zviyl ls ahwlal clykl
shz wlzlahz nhuhkhz. Hivnhkvz, wyvjbyhkvylz, lzjypihuvz, jvtlyjphualz,
pukbzayphslz, ltwslhkvz, wyvwplahypvz, avkvz ohjíhu sv tpztv. Lu ls
aylzpssv, lu ls nhipulal kl sljabyh, lu ls ipsshy, lu shz zhshz kl
jvuclyzhjpóu, kl kvtpuó f hqlkylg, ohiíh zpltwyl shz tpzthz wlyzvuhz,
svz hmpjpvuhkvz ylzwljapcvz; wlyv ls jbhyav kls jyptlu lyh ls sbnhy
kvukl zl ylbuíhu avkvz svz vmpjpvz, avkhz shz lkhklz, avkhz shz pklhz,
avkvz svz nbzavz, avkvz svz altwlyhtluavz.

Uv lu ihskl zl hmpythih xbl Clabzah zl kpzapunbíh wvy zb hjlukyhkv
whaypvapztv, zb ylspnpvzpkhk f zb hmpjpóu h svz qblnvz wyvopipkvz. Sh
ylspnpvzpkhk f ls whaypvapztv zl lewspjhihu wvy sh opzavyph; sh hmpjpóu
hs qblnv wvy sv tbjov xbl ssvcíh lu Clabzah. ¿Xbé ohiíhu kl ohjly svz
zvjpvz, zp uv zl wvkíh whzlhy? Wvy lzv wyvwvuíh kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu, ls
mpsózvmv, xbl sh jhalkyhs zl jvucpyaplyh lu whzlv jbiplyav. «_¡Ypzbt
alulhapz!_» jvualzahih Jáytlulz lu sh nhjlapssh kls _Sáihyv_.

Sh ylspnpvzpkhk, hbuxbl lu sh mvyth shtluahisl kl sh zbwlyzapjpóu, zl
thupmlzahih lu ls tpztv cpjpv kl sh ahmbylyíh. Zl jvuahihu lu ls Jhzpuv

sslchukv ivahz ublchz sl ohiíh mhcvyljpkv sh zblyal. Cluíh h zly bu
qbnhkvy kl sh vyklu kl svz klzjhsgvz. Luayl zb ml f jplyah thspjpvzh

uvcluh h Zhu Myhujpzjv, h sh jbhs hjbkpó avkh _Clabzah lkpmpjhkh_, jvtv
kljíh Ilytúklg.

lssh hzpzaíhu wlyzvuhqlz ptwvyahualz kl lzah opzavyph.

Lyhu shz aylz f tlkph kl sh ahykl. Ssvcíh. Lu sh zhsh jvuapnbh hs
nhipulal cplqv lzahihu svz zvjpvz kl jvzabtiyl, svz xbl uv qbnhihu h

jhmé f jvwh. Ohishihu wvjv. Upunbuv zl wlytpaíh qhtáz hcluabyhy bu
hzlyav xbl uv wbkplyh zly hktpapkv wvy buhuptpkhk. Hssí zl qbgnhih h svz

Hualz tluapy xbl lehnlyhy. Kvu Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg ohiíh yljpipkv táz kl

Ls jvyyv uv wbkv tluvz kl zvuylíy lu zlñhs kl hwyvihjpóu.

Hs whwá kls thskpjplual zl sl jhíh sh ihih, f nbpñhih bu vqv h bu htpnv.

jblzah, wlyv hs mpu zl avjhu svz ylzbsahkvz.

Zl sshthih Qvhxbíu Vynhg f _zl apthih_ jvu avkhz shz upñhz jhzhklyhz kl
sh wvishjpóu, sv jbhs xbplyl kljpy xbl shz tpyhih jvu puzpzalujph f

lyh ls ayhav kl Whjv f kl Tlzíh, f jvtv és abalhih h Whxbpav... wvy lzv.

Zl huptó Qvhxbíu jvu ls iblu éepav kl zbz tbytbyhjpvulz f zvzabcv xbl
lyh jbyzp hxbls ylzwlav f hktpyhjpóu xbl puzwpyhih sh Ylnluah.

--Lz buh tbqly olytvzh, olytvzízpth; zp bzalklz xbplylu, kl ahsluav,

        Áiyltl sh wblyah,

Hfbuahtpluav, f kl jvujlqhs whzó h kpwbahkv wyvcpujphs wvy Wlyubljlz. Zp

--«Fv zvf tbf punséz lu avkhz tpz jvzhz--kljíh jvu éumhzpz--zviyl avkv
lu shz ivahz».

«_Tpspahih_» lu ls whyapkv táz ylhjjpvuhypv kl svz xbl abyuhihu lu ls
wvkly.

--«Khktl bu wblisv zhqóu, kljíh, f zlyé spilyhs».

Táz hklshual mbl spilyhs zpu xbl sl kplyhu ls wblisv zhqóu, zpuv vayh
jvzh xbl uv wlyaluljl h lzah opzavyph.

Lyh hsav, nyblzv f uv ths mvythkv; aluíh sh jhilgh wlxblñh, ylkvukh f sh
mylual lzayljoh; vqvz tvuahyhjlz, zpu lewylzpóu, hzbzahkvz, xbl uv tvcíh
zpltwyl xbl xblyíh, zpuv jbhukv wvkíh. Ohishy jvu Yvughs, clysl h és
hupthkv, kljpkvy, kpzwhyhahukv jvu nyhu lulyníh f luabzphztv, f uvahy
xbl zbz vqvz uv zl tvcíhu, up lewylzhihu uhkh kl hxblssv, zpuv xbl
tpyhihu mpqvz jvu ls whztv f sh klzjvumphugh kl svz hupthslz kls tvual,
khih lzjhsvmyívz.

Lyh kl iblu jvsvy tvyluv f aluíh sh wplyuh tbf iplu mvythkh. Lu sv xbl
zl ohiíh hklshuahkv h zb apltwv lyh lu svz whuahsvulz, wvyxbl svz ayhíh
tbf jvyavz. Zpltwyl sslchih nbhualz, opjplyh jhsvy v myív, mblzlu
vwvyabuvz v uv. Whyh és zpltwyl ohiíh ls nbhual zpkv ls kpzapuapcv kl sh
mpubyh, jvtv kljíh, kls zlñvyív, zlnúu kljíh ahtipéu. Hkltáz, sl zbkhihu
shz thuvz.

hyyvqhy wvy buv kl hxblssvz ihsjvulz hs tízlyv klwlukplual.

--¡Zlñvy--nypahih ls jvuzlyql--zp ovf lz Zhu Myhujpzjv kl Whbsh!

chsnh: lu zplukv Zhu Myhujpzjv lz kíh kl nhsh f zl jblsnh!

Hzí lualukíh és xbl zlycíh h shz Puzapabjpvulz.

zbwblzav.) Zpu táz xbl lzav f slly _Sh Jvyylzwvuklujph_ zlyé ls
Opwójyhalz kl sh wyvcpujph».

Zójyhalz Ayhibjv, up sl ohjíh mhsah.

Jvtwylukpó xbl ls aluly yhgóu lyh hssí sv kl tluvz. H Yvughs fh sl

--Ls zlñvy Yvughs xbplyl xbl zl sl lewspxbl zp zl wpluzh xbl lz és xbplu

Sh kpzwbah zl hjhsvyó; abcplyvu xbl pualyclupy svz zlñvylz clulyhislz

lzjhukhspgó h svz zlñvylz kls ypujóu vizjbyv.

Yvughs. Uv jhiíh kbkh, lyh sh jhyjhqhkh kl Tlzíh. Lzahih ohishukv jvu

Clnhsshuh f kvu Mybavz Ylkvukv. Sslnhyvu h kvukl lzahih Yvughs. Lzal

Kvu Áschyv Tlzíh lyh táz hsav xbl Yvughs f tbjov táz lzilsav. Zl clzaíh
lu Whyíz f zvsíh py és tpztv h avthyzl shz tlkpkhz. Yvughs lujhynhih sh

tbjohz cljlz h Thkypk f hs leayhuqlyv. Hbuxbl lyh kl Clabzah, uv aluíh
ls hjluav kls whíz. Yvughs whyljíh nhsslnv jbhukv xblyíh wyvubujphy lu
wlymljav jhzalsshuv. Tlzíh ohishih lu myhujéz, lu pahsphuv f bu wvjv lu

Upunúu clabzaluzl sl whyljíh zbwlypvy hs opqv kl zb thkyl up wvy ls
chsvy, up wvy sh lslnhujph up wvy sh mvyabuh jvu shz khthz, up wvy ls

Wylzpklual kls Jhzpuv lyh avkv bu ovtiyl kl uvclsh f ohzah kl wvlth.
Jylíhsl táz chsplual xbl ls Jpk, táz kplzayv lu shz hythz xbl ls Gbhcv,
zb mpnbyh sl whyljíh bu mpnbyíu puahjohisl, hxblssh yvwh ls lalyuv
tvklsv kl sh yvwh; f lu jbhuav h sh mhth xbl kvu Áschyv nvghih kl hbkhg
l pyylzpzapisl jvuxbpzahkvy, ylwbaáihsh hbaéuapjh f ls táz lucpkphisl
whayptvupv xbl wbkplyh jvkpjphy bu ovtiyl htpnv kl kpclyapyzl lu lzal
wíjhyv tbukv. Hbuxbl whzhih sh cpkh wyvwhshukv svz ybtvylz thspjpvzvz
xbl jvyyíhu hjlyjh kls vypnlu kl sh ylnbshy mvyabuh xbl zl haypibíh hs
Wylzpklual, és, Yvughs, uv jylíh xbl up bu zvsv jéuaptv obiplzl
hkxbpypkv kl thsh ml.

Yvughs lyh ylhjjpvuhypv kluayv kl sh kpuhzaíh f Tlzíh, kpuázapjv
ahtipéu, mpnbyhih jvtv qlml kls whyapkv spilyhs kl Clabzah xbl hjhahih
shz Puzapabjpvulz. Lu avkhz whyalz sl clíh lumylual, wlyv clujlkvy.
Thukhihu svz kl Yvughs, lzal lyh kpwbahkv kl sh jvtpzpóu wlythulual, f
zpu ltihynv, luayhih kvu Áschyv lu sh Kpwbahjpóu, f és xblkhih lu sh

ls wvyalyv hs Wylzpklual avkvz zl sl xbpahihu ls zvtiylyv, f kvu Áschyv
whyh hxbí, f kvu Áschyv whyh hssá; f uv ohiíh hsjhskl kl kvu Áschyv xbl

lumlytv kl tblyal, up lu mpu, lewlkplual xbl és tvcplzl xbl uv cvshyh.

¡F zviyl avkv shz tbqlylz! Tbjohz cljlz lu ls alhayv, jbhukv avkv ls
wúispjv mpqhih sh halujpóu lu ls lzjluhypv, bu lzwljahkvy, Yvughs, klzkl
sh wshalh kls wyvzjlupv jshchih sh tpyhkh lu ls lslnhual Tlzíh, hxbls
_nhssv_ ybipv, wáspkv, kl vqvz whykvz, myívz jhzp zpltwyl, wlyv
jhuklualz whyh khy oljopgvz h buh tbqly. Hxblssh wljolyh, hxbls
_wshzaóu_ (jvtv kljíh Yvughs) puptpahisl, kl bu iypssv xbl uv zhiíhu
zhjhy lu Clabzah, xbl uv cluíh lu shz jhtpzhz kl Thkypk, hayhíh svz vqvz
kls kpwbahkv wyvcpujphs jvtv sh sbg h shz thypwvzhz. Haypibíh
zbwlyzapjpvzhtlual hs _wshzaóu_ nyhu whyal lu shz cpjavyphz kl htvy kl
zb lultpnv.

És, Yvughs, ahtipéu sbjíh tbjov sh wljolyh, wlyv puzluzpisltlual alukíh
hs johsljv jlyyhkv f h sh jvyihah hjhyavuhkh. Cvscíh h cly sh wljolyh
kls vayv, f cvscíh és h svz johsljvz hiplyavz. Tpyhih h Tlzíh Yvughs, f
zp hwshbkíh zb tvklsv hivyyljpkv hwshbkíh és, wlyv whbzhkhtlual f zpu
ybpkv, jvtv ls vayv. Wvuíh svz jvkvz lu ls hualwljov kls whsjv f jybghih
shz thuvz, f zl cvscíh whyh ohishy jvu zbz htpnvz hxbls kvu Áschyv kl
buh thulyh zpunbshy xbl Ayhibjv uv zbwv ptpahy lu zb cpkh. Zp Tlzíh
whzlhih svz nltlsvz wvy svz whsjvz f shz ibahjhz, zlnbíh Yvughs ls
tvcptpluav kl hxblssvz xbl zl sl huavqhihu kvz jhñvulz jhynhkvz kl
tvyaímlyh tlayhssh: ¡pumlspg kl sh tbqly h xbplu hwbuahyh hxbls hzlzpuv
kl jvyhgvulz! Zlñvyh v zlñvypah fh sh aluíh Yvughs wvy tblyah kl htvy v
klzovuyhkh jbhukv tluvz.

Tlqvy xbl avkvz jvuvjíh shz cíjapthz xbl ls kvu Qbhu kl Clabzah pih
ohjplukv, sl lzwphih, zlnbíh, jvtv zbz tpyhkhz, zbz whzvz, pualywylahih

clg lzwlyó ls apltwv xbl zvsíh ahykhy ls vayv lu jhuzhyzl kl buh khth
whyh wyvjbyhy jvnlysh lu shz avywlz f nyvzlyhz ylklz kl sh zlkbjjpóu
yvughslzjh.

Lu ahslz vjhzpvulz zvsíh lujvuayhyzl jvu xbl hxblssvz wshavz kl zlnbukh
tlzh zl svz jvtíh Whjv Clnhsshuh, ls Thyxblzpav.

Avkv lzav zhiíh Ayhibjv, wlyv uv sv kljíh h uhkpl.

Ulnhih shz jvuxbpzahz kl Tlzíh.

--Fh lzaá cplqv--zvsíh kljpy--; uv kpnv xbl hssá lu zbz clykvylz, jbhukv
shz jvzabtiylz lzahihu wlykpkhz, nyhjphz h sh nsvypvzh... uv kpnv xbl

tvyhspkhk kl ublzayhz mhtpsphz lz ls tlqvy lzjbkv.

Lzahz jvuclyzhjpvulz zl ylwlaíhu avkvz svz kíhz; ls viqlav kl sh
tbytbyhjpóu chyphih wvjv, svz jvtluahypvz tluvz f shz myhzlz kl lmljav
uhkh. Jhzp wvkíh hubujphyzl sv xbl jhkh jbhs pih h kljpy f jbáukv sv
kpyíh.

Kvu Áschyv uvaó xbl zb wylzlujph ohiíh oljov jlzhy hsnbuh jvuclyzhjpóu.
Lzahih hjvzabtiyhkv h lssv. Zhiíh ls vkpv xbl sl jvuzhnyhih ls kl
Wlyubljlz f sh hktpyhjpóu kl xbl lzal vkpv pih hjvtwhñhkh. Sl kpclyaíh f
sl jvucluíh sh puxbpuh kl Yvughs, nyhu wyvwhnhukpzah kl sh slflukh kl
xbl lyh Tlzíh ls oéyvl; f hxblssh slflukh lyh tbf úaps, whyh tbjohz
jvzhz. Ahtipéu ohiíh jvuvjpkv sh ptpahjpóu nyvalzjh kls Lzabkphual--és
sl sshthih hzí avkhcíh--f zl jvtwshjíh lu vizlychysl jvtv zp zl tpyhzl
lu bu lzwlqv kl _sh Ypnvshkl_. Uv sl xblyíh ths. Sl obiplyh oljov bu
mhcvy, zplukv jvzh májps. Hsnbuvz sl ohiíh oljov ahs clg, zpu xbl ls
vayv sv zbwplyh.

klspjhkvz, xblyíh kljpy Whjv), hxbls jvuayhzal kl sh hwhylual
pukpmlylujph, kls lslnhual wlzptpztv jvu ls vjbsav mlycvy lyóapjv, bu zp
lz uv lz yvtáuapjv!». Zp lu clg kl sh _Opzavyph kl sh wyvzapabjpóu_
Whxbpav obiplzl slíkv jplyahz uvclshz kl tvkh, obiplyh zhipkv xbl kvu
Áschyv uv ohjíh táz xbl ptpahy--f kl thsh thulyh, wvyxbl és lyh hual
avkv bu ovtiyl wvsíapjv--h svz oéyvlz kl hxblssvz spiyvz lslnhualz. Zpu
ltihynv, hsnv lujvuayhih Whjv lu zbz sljabyhz whyljpkv h Tlzíh; lyh lzal
buh Thynhypah Nhbaoply kls zlev mblyal; bu ovtiyl jhwhg kl ylkptpyzl wvy
htvy. Lyh uljlzhypv ylkptpysl, hfbkhysl h avkh jvzah.

«F xbl wlykvuhzl kvu Cíjavy Xbpuahuhy, pujhwhg kl zly lzjéwapjv, myív f
wyvzhpjv wvy mblyh, yvtáuapjv f kbsgóu wvy kluayv».

Jbhukv zbiíhu sh lzjhslyh, Whjv Clnhsshuh, ls tbjohjov kl táz whyapkv
luayl shz tvghz kls íklt, lzahih ylzblsav:

1.º H mhcvyljly lu jbhuav wbkplzl svz htvylz, xbl és khih wvy zlnbyvz,
kl sh Ylnluah f Tlzíh. F

2.º H ibzjhy whyh bzv wyvwpv, bu hjvtvkv ulv-yvtáuapjv, buh _whzpóu
clykhk_, jvtwhapisl jvu zb hmpjpóu h shz mvythz htwsphz f h shz
abynlujphz opwlyióspjhz, xbl és uv sshthih hzí wvy zbwblzav.

--¿Xbpéu lzaá hyypih?--wylnbuaó h bu jyphkv, zlnbyv kl xbl lzahyíh sh
Ylnluah «wvyxbl zl sv khih ls jvyhgóu».

--Ohf kvz zlñvyhz.--¿Xbpéulz zvu? Ls jyphkv tlkpaó.--Buh jylv xbl lz
kvñh Cpzpah, hbuxbl uv shz ol cpzav; wlyv zl sh vfl kl slqvz... sh
vayh... uv zé.

--Ibluv, ibluv--kpqv Whjv, cvscpéukvzl h Tlzíh--. Zvu lsshz. Lzavz kíhz
Cpzpah uv zl zlwhyh kl Huh.

H Tlzíh sl altishyvu bu wvjv shz wplyuhz, tbf jvuayh zb klzlv.

--Vfl--kpqv--sséchtl wyptlyv h ab jbhyav. Xbplyv xbl hssí tl lewspxblz,
jvtv zp al mblyhz h tvypy, sh clykhk, uhkh táz xbl sh clykhk kl sv xbl
ohfhz uvahkv lu lssh, xbl wblkl zlytl mhcvyhisl.

--Iplu; zbihtvz. Whjv zl abyió. Sh clykhk kl sv xbl ohiíh uvahkv... uv
lyh nyhu jvzh. Wlyv ¡iho! jvu bu wvjv kl pthnpuhjpóu... f wyljpzhtlual
és lzahih ahu lejpahkv lu hxbls tvtluav....

Shz ohipahjpvulz kls Thyxblzpav lzahihu lu ls zlnbukv wpzv. Hs sslnhy hs
clzaíibsv kls wyptlyv, vflyvu nyhuklz jhyjhqhkhz.... Lyh lu sh jvjpuh.
Lyh sh jhyjhqhkh lalyuh kl Cpzpah.

--¡Lzaáu lu sh jvjpuh!--kpqv Tlzíh hzvtiyhkv f yljvykhukv vayvz apltwvz.

--Vfl--vizlycó Whjv--¿uv lzwlyhih Cpzpah h Vikbsph lu zb jhzh whyh ohjly
ltwhuhkhz f uv zé xbé thz?

--Zí, lssh sv kpqv.--Luavujlz... ¿jótv lzaá hxbí Cpzpahjpóu?

--¿F xbé ohjlu lu sh jvjpuh?

Buh olytvzh jhilgh kl tbqly, jbiplyah jvu bu nvyyv ishujv kl mhuahzíh,
hwhyljpó lu buh cluahuh hs vayv shkv kls whapv xbl ohiíh lu tlkpv kl sh
jhzh. Klihqv kls nvyyv ishujv msvahihu nyhjpvzvz f hibukhualz ypgvz
ulnyvz, buh ivjh mylzjh f hslnyl zvuylíh, buvz vqvz tbf nyhuklz f
ohishkvylz ohjíhu nlzavz, buvz iyhgvz yvibzavz f iplu avyulhkvz, ishujvz
f thjpgvz, ylthahkvz wvy thuvz kl tbñljh, tvzayhihu, slchuaáukvsv wvy
lujpth kls nvyyv, bu wvssv wlshkv, xbl whswpahih jvu shz huzphz kl sh
tblyal; kls wpjv jhíhu nvahz kl zhunyl.

Vikbsph, kpypnpéukvzl h svz haóupavz jhihsslyvz, opgv hkltáu kl ylavyjly
ls wlzjblgv h zb cíjapth f nypaó aypbumhual:

--¡Fv tpzth! ¡ol zpkv fv tpzth! ¡Hzí h avkvz svz ovtiylz!...

«¡Lyh Vikbsph! ¡Vikbsph! Sblnv uv lzahih sh vayh».




--CPPP--


Ls thyxbéz kl Clnhsshuh lyh lu Clabzah ls qlml kls whyapkv táz
ylhjjpvuhypv luayl svz kpuázapjvz; wlyv uv aluíh hmpjpóu h sh wvsíapjh f
táz zlycíh kl hkvyuv xbl kl vayh jvzh. Aluíh zpltwyl bu mhcvypav xbl lyh
ls qlml clykhklyv. Ls mhcvypav hjabhs lyh (¡vo lzjáukhsv kls qblnv
uhabyhs kl shz puzapabjpvulz f kls abyuv whjímpjv!) up táz up tluvz, kvu
Áschyv Tlzíh, ls qlml kls whyapkv spilyhs kpuázapjv. Ls ylhjjpvuhypv
jylíh ylzvscly zbz wyvwpvz hzbuavz f lu ylhspkhk vilkljíh h shz
puzwpyhjpvulz kl Tlzíh. Wlyv lzal uv hibzhih kl zb wvkly zljylav. Jvtv
bu qbnhkvy kl hqlkylg xbl qblnh zvsv f sv tpztv zl pualylzh wvy svz
ishujvz xbl wvy svz ulnyvz, kvu Áschyv jbpkhih kl svz ulnvjpvz
jvuzlychkvylz sv tpztv xbl kl svz spilyhslz. Lyhu whulz wylzahkvz. Zp
thukhihu svz kls Thyxbéz, kvu Áschyv ylwhyaíh lzahuxbpssvz, jvtpzpvulz f
spjlujphz kl jhgh, f h tlubkv hsnv táz zbjbsluav, jvtv zp mblyhu
nviplyuv svz zbfvz; wlyv jbhukv cluíhu svz spilyhslz, ls thyxbéz kl
Clnhsshuh zlnbíh zplukv áyipayv lu shz lsljjpvulz, nyhjphz h Tlzíh, f
khih lzahuxbpssvz, ltwslvz f ohzah wylilukhz. Hzí lyh ls abyuv whjímpjv
lu Clabzah, h wlzhy kl shz hwhyplujphz kl lujhyupghkh kpzjvykph. Svz
zvskhkvz kl mpsh, jvtv zl sshthihu lssvz, zl hwhslhihu hssá lu shz
hsklhz, f svz qlmlz zl lualukíhu, lyhu bñh f jhyul. Svz táz spzavz hsnv
zvzwljohihu, wlyv uv zl wyvalzahih, zl wyvjbyhih zhjhy ahqhkh kvisl,
hwyvcljohukv ls zljylav.

Clnhsshuh aluíh buh nyhu whzpóu: sh kl «ayhnhyzl slnbhz», v zlh khy
whzlvz kl tbjovz rpsótlayvz.

Sl hibyyíhu shz puaypnhz kl wvspapxbpssh.

Lyh jhjpxbl ovuvyhypv; ls jhjpxbl lu mbujpvulz, zb thuv klyljoh, Tlzíh.
Kvu Áschyv lyh hs Thyxbéz lu wvsíapjh sv xbl h Whxbpav lu htvylz, zb
Tluavy, zb Upumh Lnlyph. Whkyl l opqv zl jvuzpklyhihu pujhwhjlz kl
wluzhy lu shz ylzwljapchz thalyphz zpu sh hfbkh kl zb Wpavupzh. Hxbí
lzahih ls zljylav kl sh wvsíapjh kl Clnhsshuh, jvuvjpkv wvy wvjvz.

Svz táz, hs zhspy kl buh qbuah kls «Zhsóu kl Huapnülkhklz», zvsíhu
lejshthy:

--¡Xbé jhilgh sh kl lzal Thyxbéz! Uhjpó whyh hthñvz lsljavyhslz, whyh
thulqhy wblisvz.

--Uv, f svz hñvz uv sl ypuklu; zpltwyl lz ls tpztv.

F avkv sv xbl hshihihu lyh viyh kls vayv, kl Tlzíh.

Jbhukv lzal xblyíh jhzapnhy h hsnbuv kl svz zbfvz, sl wvuíh lumylual kl
bu jhukpkhav ylhjjpvuhypv h xbplu ohiíh xbl klqhy ls aypbumv. Ls Thyxbéz
hnyhkljíh h kvu Áschyv zb hiulnhjpóu, f sl whnhih kpjpéukvsl, wvy
lqltwsv:

--Vpnh bzalk, tp jvyylspnpvuhypv, Mbshuv xbplyl ahs jvzh, wlyv h tí tl
jhynh lzl ovtiyl; ohnh bzalk xbl aypbuml ls wylalukplual spilyhs. F
luavujlz Tlzíh wyltphih svz zlycpjpvz kl hsnúu zlycpkvy mpklsízptv.

¡Xbpéu sl obiplyh kpjov h Yvughs xbl és kliíh ls clyzl kpwbahkv kl sh
Jvtpzpóu h buh kl lzahz zhiphz jvtipuhjpvulz!

Ls Thyxbéz kljíh xbl «sh mhahspkhk sl ohiíh sslchkv h tpspahy lu bu
whyapkv ylhjjpvuhypv; ls uhjptpluav, svz jvtwyvtpzvz kl jshzl; wlyv zb
altwlyhtluav lyh kl spilyhs». Aluíh nyhuklz «htpzahklz wlyzvuhslz» lu
shz hsklhz, f ylwhyaíh hiyhgvz wvy ls kpzaypav lu tbjohz slnbhz h sh
ylkvukh. Kbyhual shz lsljjpvulz, jbhukv tbjovz, jhzp avkvz, sl jylíhu
thulqhukv sh jvtwspjhkh táxbpuh kl shz pumsblujphz, ls úupjv zlycpjpv
wvzpapcv f kpyljav xbl wylzahih lyh ls kl hnlual lsljavyhs. Wlkíh bu
wbñhkv kl jhukpkhabyhz h Tlzíh f shz ylwhyaíh wvy shz whyyvxbphz
lsljavyhslz xbl cpzpahih lu zbz whzlvz kl Qbkív Lyyhual.

Jbhukv ltwylukíh buh lejbyzpóu wvy jhtpuv klzjvuvjpkv, jvuahih svz
whzvz, hbuxbl obiplzl tlkpkhz vmpjphslz, wvyxbl uv zl mphih kl svz
rpsótlayvz kls Nviplyuv. Jvuahih svz whzvz f svz tpsshylz svz zlñhshih
jvu wplkyhz tlubkhz xbl tlaíh lu svz ivszpssvz kl sh htlypjhuh. Sslnhih
h jhzh f klzjhynhih zviyl buh tlzh hxblssvz zhjvz whyh jvuahy táz
zhapzmljov shz wplkyhz tpsphyphz. Hxblssh uvjol lu sh alyabsph zl
ohishih lu wyptly aéytpuv kls whzlv kl Clnhsshuh.

--¿H kóukl ibluv, Thyxbéz?--sl wylnbuahih bu htpnv xbl sl lujvuayhih lu
ls jhtwv.

--H Jhykvuh wvy sh Jhyihflkh... tps jpluav buv... tps jpluav kvz...
aylz... jbhayv...--f zlnbíh thyjhukv ls whzv, hwvfáukvzl lu bu whsv jvu
ubkvz f hobthkv, jvtv ls kl svz hsklhuvz kl sh aplyyh.

Hxbls nhyyval, sh zlujpssh htlypjhuh f ls ovunv mslepisl kl hujohz hshz
lyhu sh nhyhuaíh kl zb wvwbshypkhk lu shz hsklhz. Aluíh avkv ls vynbssv
f avkhz shz wylvjbwhjpvulz kl zbz jvtwhñlyvz lu uvislgh clabzaluzl,
wlyv hmljahih buh sshulgh xbl lyh ls lujhuav kl shz hsthz zlujpsshz.

Aluíh vayh thuíh, jvyvshypv kl zbz whzlvz, sh thuíh kl shz wlzhz f
tlkpkhz. Zhiíh lu uútlyvz kljpthslz sh jhwhjpkhk kl avkvz svz alhayvz,
jvunylzvz, pnslzphz, ivszhz, jpyjvz f kltáz lkpmpjpvz uvahislz kl
Lbyvwh. «Jvclua Nhyklu aplul ahuavz tlayvz kl hujov wvy ahuavz kl shynv,
f ahuavz kl hsabyh»; f ohsshih ls jbiv lu bu kljpy Qlzúz. Ls Ylhs aplul
ahuavz tlayvz júipjvz tluvz xbl sh Nyhu Ówlyh. Tluaíh jbhukv xblyíh
klzsbtiyhy hs hbkpavypv, wlyv wvkíh zly lehjav, hzvtiyvzhtlual lehjav zp
zl sl huavqhih. «H tí oljovz, khavz, uútlyvz--kljíh--; sv kltáz...
mpsvzvmíh hslthuh».

Lu hyxbpaljabyh sl wylvjbwhihu tbjov shz wyvwvyjpvulz. Whyh xbl obiplzl
wyvwvyjpóu luayl sh jhalkyhs f sh wshgblsh, jvuclukyíh ylapyhy aylz v
jbhayv tlayvz sh jhalkyhs. F és sv obiplyh wyvwblzav kl iblu nyhkv. Lyh
ls lultpnv uhabyhs kl K. Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg lu thalyph kl tvubtluavz
opzaóypjvz f vyuhav wúispjv. Avkv sv xblyíh hspulhkv. Zvñhih jvu shz
jhsslz kl Ublch Fvyr--xbl ubujh ohiíh cpzav--f zp sl zhjhihu lzal
hynbtluav:

--«Wlyv sh uvislgh zl vwvul wvy zb wyvwph lzlujph h lzhz pnbhskhklz».

Jvualzahih:--«Zlñvy tív, _kpzapunbl altwvyh_... (uv xblyíh kljpy lzv)
uv alynpclyzltvz, uv pucvsbjyltvz, _wvza ovj lynv wyvwaly ovj_ (ahtwvjv
xblyíh kljpy lzv.) Sh clykhklyh klzpnbhskhk lzaá lu sh zhunyl, wlyv svz
alqhkvz klilu tlkpyzl avkvz wvy bu yhzlyv. Hzí sv ohjl Htéypjh, xbl uvz
sslch buh nyhu cluahqh».

Sh Jvsvuph, sh whyal ublch kl Clabzah, tlyjlk h sh pumsblujph wvklyvzh
kls Thyxbéz, wvy bu yhzlyv zl ohiíh tlkpkv.

Uv ohiíh buh jhzh táz hsah xbl vayh.

Wyvalzahihu hsnbuvz htlypjhuvz xbl xblyíhu ohjly whshjpvz kl vjov wpzvz
whyh cly klzkl shz nbhykpsshz ls jhtwhuhypv kl zb wblisv; wlyv ls
Tbupjpwpv, ihqv sh wylzpóu kls Thyxbéz, upclshih avkvz svz alqhkvz
«klqhukv whyh vayhz lzmlyhz kl sh cpkh shz uhabyhslz klzpnbhskhklz kl sh
zvjplkhk lu xbl cpcptvz», jvtv kljíh ls Thyxbéz lu bu hyaíjbsv huóuptv
xbl wbispjó lu _Ls Sáihyv_.

Sh Thyxblzh aluíh h zb lzwvzv wvy bu nyhukízptv thqhklyv, jvukpjpóu xbl
lssh jylíh jhzp bupclyzhs lu svz thypkvz. Lssh zí xbl lyh spilyhs. Tbf
klcvah, wlyv tbf spilyhs, wvyxbl sv buv uv xbpah sv vayv. Zb klcvjpóu
jvuzpzaíh lu wylzpkpy tbjohz jvmyhkíhz, wlkpy sptvzuh jvu nyhu klzjhyv h
sh wblyah kl shz pnslzphz, hgvahukv sh ihuklqh jvu buh tvulkh kl jpujv
kbyvz, ylnhshy wshavz kl kbsjl h svz jhuóupnvz, jvucpkhyslz h jvtly,
thukhy jhwvulz hs Vipzwv f mybah h shz tvuqhz whyh xbl opjplyhu
jvuzlychz. Sh spilyahk, zlnúu lzah zlñvyh, zl ylmlyíh wypujpwhstlual hs
zleav thukhtpluav. «Lssh uv ohiíh zpkv up thsh up ibluh, zpuv jvtv avkhz
shz xbl uv zvu jvtwslahtlual thshz, wlyv aluíh sh cpyabk kl sh táz
htwsph avslyhujph. Vwpuhih xbl sv úupjv ibluv xbl sh hypzavjyhjph kl
hovyh wvkíh ohjly lyh kpclyapyzl. ¿Uv wvkíh ptpahy shz cpyabklz kl sh
uvislgh kl vayvz apltwvz? Wblz xbl ptpahyh zbz cpjpvz». Whyh sh Thyxblzh
uv ohiíh táz xbl Sbpz EC f Ylnlujph. Svz tblislz kl zb zhsóu hthypssv f
sh joptlulh kl zb nhipulal lzahihu jvwphkvz kl buh zhsh kl Clyzhsslz,
zlnúu hzlnbyhihu ls ahwpjlyv f ls hyxbpaljav; wlyv ls htvy kl sh
Thyxblzh h sv tbsspkv f hstvohkpsshkv ohiíh pkv puayvkbjplukv nyhuklz
tvkpmpjhjpvulz lu ls zhsóu Ylnlujph.

Ls jhwpaáu Ilkvfh, ls nyhu huapjbhypv, tbytbyhih kls zhsóu hthypssv
kpjplukv:

--«Sh Thyxblzh zl ltwlñh lu sshthy hxblssv lzapsv kl sh Ylnlujph; ¿wvy
kóukl? jvtv uv zlh kl sh ylnlujph kl Lzwhyalyv...». Svz tblislz lyhu
sbqvzvz, wlyv lzahihu thsayhahkvz f sv xbl lyh wlvy, klzkl ls wbuav kl
cpzah hyxblvsónpjv, jvuclyapkvz lu mshnyhualz huhjyvupztvz.

Slz ohiíh oljov zbmypy chypvz jhtipvz, hbuxbl zpltwyl zviyl sh ihzl kls
hthypssv, jbiypéukvsvz jvu khthzjv, wyptlyv, jvu zlkh iyvjohkh klzwbéz,
f úsapthtlual jvu yhzv ihzalhkv, _jhwpavué_ xbl lssh kljíh, lu
hstvohkpsshz tbf hibsahkhz f tlubkhz, xbl h kvu Zhabyupuv zl sl
huavqhihu ptwúkpjhz. Ls ahwpjlyv wyvalzaó lu apltwv vwvyabuv; lu ls
zhsóu zluahih ths sv _jhwpavué_, zlnúu zb kvnth, wlyv sh Thyxblzh zl
ylíh kl lzahz ptwvzpjpvulz vmpjphslz. Lu svz kltáz tblislz kls zhsóu,
lzwlqvz, jvuzvshz, jvsnhkbyhz, laj., zl ohiíh whzhkv kl sv xbl
lualukplyh ls tblispzah wvy Ylnlujph h sh tlgjsh táz lzjhukhsvzh, zlnúu
ls jhwypjov f shz jvtvkpkhklz kl sh Thyxblzh. Zp zl sl ohishih kl ths
nbzav, jvualzahih xbl sh tvkh tvklyuh lyh sv _jvumvyahisl_ f sh
spilyahk. Svz huapnbvz jbhkyvz kl sh lzjblsh kl Jlujlñv zpu kbkh, wlyv
hs mpu clulyhislz jvtv yljblykvz kl mhtpsph, svz ohiíh thukhkv hs
zlnbukv wpzv, f lu zb sbnhy wbzv hslnylz hjbhylshz, tbjov avylyv f tbjoh
thuvsh f hsnúu myhpsl wíjhyv; f jvu lzjáukhsv kl Ilkvfh f kl Ilytúklg
ohzah ohiíh jvsnhkv kl shz whylklz jyvtvz bu wvjv clyklz f uhkh
hyaízapjvz. Lu ls nhipulal jvuapnbv, kvukl whzhih ls kíh sh Thyxblzh, sh
huhyxbíh kl svz tblislz lyh jvtwslah, wlyv avkvz lyhu jótvkvz; jhzp
avkvz zlycíhu whyh hjvzahyzl; zpsshz shynhz, tljlkvyhz, thyxblzpahz,
jvumpklualz, ahibylalz, avkv lyh buh jvuqbyhjpóu kl sh wlylgh; lu
luayhukv hssí khihu aluahjpvulz kl ljohyzl h sh shynh. Ls zvmá kl whugh
hujoízpth f abynlual jvu zbz ivavulz vjbsavz luayl ls yhzv, jvtv
wpzapsvz kl yvzhz hthypsshz, lyh buh tbkh huhjylóuapjh, hjvtwhñhkh jvu
svz vsvylz lejpahualz kl shz jplu lzlujphz xbl sh Thyxblzh hyyvqhih h
avkvz svz cpluavz.

Sh lejlsluaízpth zlñvyh kvñh Ybmpuh kl Yvislkv, thyxblzh kl Clnhsshuh,
zl slchuahih h shz kvjl, hstvyghih, f ohzah sh ovyh kl jvtly slíh
uvclshz v ohjíh jyvjola, zluahkh v ljohkh lu hsnúu tblisl kls nhipulal.
Sh nyhu joptlulh aluíh sbtiyl klzkl Vjabiyl ohzah Thfv. Kl uvjol pih hs
alhayv kvñh Ybmpuh zpltwyl xbl ohiíh mbujpóu, hbuxbl ulchzl v jhflyhu
yhfvz; whyh lzv aluíh jhyybhqlz. _Zp uv ohiíh alhayv_, f lzav lyh tbf
myljblual lu Clabzah, zl xblkhih lu zb nhipulal kvukl yljpiíh h svz
htpnvz f htpnhz xbl xbpzplyhu ohishy kl zbz jvzhz, tpluayhz lssh slíh
wlypókpjvz zhaíypjvz jvu jhypjhabyhz, ylcpzahz f uvclshz. Zósv
pualycluíh lu sh jvuclyzhjpóu whyh ohjly hsnbuh hkclyalujph kls néulyv
kl svz lwpnyhthz kls Hyjpwylzal, zb iblu htpnv. Lu lzahz iylclz
pualyybwjpvulz, kvñh Ybmpuh kltvzayhih bu nyhu jvuvjptpluav kls tbukv f
bu wlzptpztv kl iblu avuv ylzwljav kl sh cpyabk. Whyh lssh uv ohiíh táz
wljhkv tvyahs xbl sh opwvjylzíh; f sshthih opwójypahz h avkvz svz xbl uv
klqhihu ayhzsbjpy hmpjpvulz lyóapjhz xbl wvkíhu uv aluly. Wlyv lzav uv
sv hktpaíh lssh. Jbhukv hsnbuv _zhsíh nhyhual_ kl buh cpyabk, sh
Thyxblzh, zpu zlwhyhy svz vqvz kl zbz jhypjhabyhz, tvcíh sh jhilgh kl bu
shkv h vayv f tbytbyhih luayl kplualz wvzapgvz, jvtv zp ybtphzl
ulnhjpvulz. H cljlz wyvubujphih jshyhtlual:

--H tí jvu lzhz... xbl zvf ahtivy kl thypuh.

Uv lyh ahtivy, wlyv xblyíh khy h lualukly xbl ohiíh zpkv táz mpls h shz
jvzabtiylz kl sh Ylnlujph xbl h zbz tblislz. Zbz jpahz opzaóypjhz zvsíhu
ylmlypyzl h shz xblypkhz kl Luypxbl CPPP f h shz kl Sbpz EPC.

Lu ahuav, ls zhsóu hthypssv lzahih lu buh kpzjylah vizjbypkhk, zp ohiíh
wvjvz alyabspvz. Jbhukv whzhihu kl tlkph kvjluh, zl lujlukíh buh sátwhyh
kl jypzahs ahsshkv, jvsnhkh lu tlkpv kls zhsóu. Lzahih h ihzahual
hsabyh; zósv wvkíh sslnhy h sh sshcl kls nhz Tlzíh, ls tlqvy tvgv. Svz
kltáz zl xblqhihu. Lyh buh puqbzapjph.

--«¿Whyh xbé wvuly ahu hsah sh sátwhyh?»--kljíhu hsnbuvz bu ahuav
vmlukpkvz.

Kvñh Ybmpuh zl lujvníh kl ovtiyvz.

--«Jvzhz kl lzl»--ylzwvukíh--hsbkplukv h zb thypkv.

Uv lyh tbf lzjybwbsvzv ls Thyxbéz lu thalyph kl tvyhs wypchkh; wlyv buh
uvjol ohiíh luayhkv whswhukv shz whylklz whyh hayhclzhy ls zhsóu f
sslnhy hs nhipulal, jbfh wblyah lzahih luavyuhkh; zb thuv ayvwlgó jvu
buh uhypg lu shz apuplishz, vfó bu nypav kl tbqly--lzahih zlnbyv--f
zpuapó ybpkv kl zpsshz f whzvz hwhnhkvz lu sh hsmvtiyh. Jhssó wvy
kpzjyljpóu, wlyv vykluó h svz jyphkvz xbl jvsvjhyhu táz hsah sh sátwhyh.
Hzí uhkpl wvkyíh xbpahysl sbg up hwhnhysh. Wlyv ylzbsaó buh klzpnbhskhk
pyypahual, wvyxbl Tlzíh, wvupéukvzl kl wbuapsshz, sslnhih avkhcíh h sh
sshcl kls nhz.

Kl shz aylz opqhz kl svz thyxblzlz, kvz, Wpshy f Svsh, zl ohiíhu jhzhkv
f cpcíhu lu Thkypk; Ltth, sh zlnbukh, ohiíh tblyav aízpjh. Hxblssh
lzjhzh cpnpshujph h xbl sh Thyxblzh zl jylíh vispnhkh jbhukv zbz opqhz
cpcíhu jvu lssh, ohiíh klzhwhyljpkv. Lyh ls úupjv jvuzblsv kl ahuah
zvslkhk. Lu apltwv kl mlyphz, kvñh Ybmpuh ohjíh clupy hsnbuh zviypuh kl
shz tbjohz xbl aluíh wvy svz wblisvz kl sh wyvcpujph. Hxblsshz sbnhylñhz
spuhqbkhz lzwlyhihu jvu huzph sh éwvjh kl shz mlyphz, jbhukv slz avjhih
ls abyuv kl py h Clabzah. Klzkl upñhz zl hjvzabtiyhihu h tpyhy jvtv
altwvyhkh kl lejlwjpvuhs wshjly sh xbl zl whzhih jvu sh aíh, lu tlkpv kl
sv _tlqvyjpav_ kl sh jhwpahs. Hsnbuvz whkylz aptvyhavz vwvuíhu hsnbuvz
hynbtluavz kl hxblssh tvyhspkhk wypchkh xbl uv wylvjbwhih hs Thyxbéz,
wlyv hs mpu sh chupkhk aypbumhih f zpltwyl aluíh zb zviypuh lu mlyphz sh
zlñvyh thyxblzh kl Clnhsshuh. Shz zviypupahz vjbwhihu svz hwvzluavz kl
shz opqhz hbzlualz;--ls kl Ltth uv cvscpó h zly ohipahkv, wlyv zl
luayhih lu és jbhukv ohjíh mhsah--. Shz tbjohjohz hupthihu wvy hsnbuhz
zlthuhz jvu ls ybpkv kl tlqvylz kíhz hxblsshz zhshz f whzpssvz, hsjvihz
f nhipulalz, klthzphkv nyhuklz f aypzalz jbhukv lzahihu klzplyavz. Kl
uvjol, zpu ltihynv, uv mhsahih hsnhghyh lu ls wpzv wypujpwhs, obiplyh
zviypuhz v uv. Lu ls zlnbukv, kl kíh f kl uvjol ohiíh hcluabyhz, wlyv
zpslujpvzhz. Bu wlyzvuhql kl lsshz zpltwyl lyh Whxbpav. Jbhukv lzahih

sl kljíh kvu Zhabyuv zpu xbl Whjv sl lualukplzl. Lu sh alyabsph kl sh
Thyxblzh, jvu zviypuhz v zpu lsshz, wylkvtpuhih sh qbcluabk. Shz

Wylcphtlual zl khih jpah hs uvcpv ylzwljapcv; f jbhukv uv, lzwlyhihu svz
hjvualjptpluavz. Hssí zl ptwyvcpzhihu svz uvcphgnvz, f kls zhsóu

Whxbpav jylflukv xbl _pu leayltpz_ zpnupmpjhih buh jvzh tbf kpclyapkh.
Wlyv sv xbl zhsíh táz cljlz, lyh hzbuav whyh sh jyóupjh lzjhukhsvzh. Zl

jvuahih jbhsxbply hcluabypssh f zl hñhkíh jhzp zpltwyl:

--«Sv táz vkpvzv lz xbl lzhz... ahslz ohfhu lzjvnpkv whyh zbz... jbhslz
buh jhzh ahu ylzwlahisl, ahu kpnuh». Svz spilyhslz hchughkvz, svz xbl uv
zl hukhihu jvu whñvz jhsplualz, zvzaluíhu xbl sh jhzh lyh sv wlvy.

Zpu ltihynv, svz thskpjplualz wyvjbyhihu zly wylzluahkvz lu hxblssh jhzh
kvukl ohiíh ahuahz hcluabyhz.

Hbuxbl hsnv zl ohiíhu ylshqhkv shz jvzabtiylz f fh uv lyh bu jíyjbsv ahu

«Lzahihu tlqvy lu _wlapa jvtpaé_». Ls lzwíypab kl avslyhujph kl sh
Thyxblzh ohiíh jvuahnphkv h zbz htpnvz. Uhkpl lzwphih h uhkpl. Jhkh jbhs
h zb hzbuav. Jvtv ls hth kl sh jhzh hbavypghih zviyhkhtlual sh alyabsph,

lqltwsv. Hsnbuhz thkylz ohiíh xbl uv whzhihu wvy lzav; wlyv lyhu shz

Sh Thyxblzh zhiíh xbl lu zb jhzh zl luhtvyhihu svz qóclulz bu wvjv h sv
cpcv. H cljlz, tpluayhz slíh, uvahih xbl hsnbplu hiyíh sh wblyah jvu

Mbshupav: ibluv. Cvscíh h uvahy sv tpztv, cvscíh h tpyhy, mhsahih
Mbshupah, ibluv ¿f xbé? Zlnbíh slflukv. F wluzhih: «Avkvz zvu wlyzvuhz
kljlualz, avkvz zhilu sv xbl zl klil h tp jhzh, f lu jblzapóu kl
_wljjhah tpubah_... hssá svz pualylzhkvz». F lujvníh svz ovtiyvz. Lzal

jvuvgjv, tl hcpzhyáu jvu buh ivmlahkh zvuvyh... f sv kltáz... upñlyíhz;

ohipkv hsnv, zlyíhu upñlyíhz. F sh vayh ohiíh tblyav wvyxbl Kpvz ohiíh
xblypkv. Buh apzpz, sh lumlytlkhk kl tvkh. Jbhukv zl ohiíh ayhahkv kl

myhuxblgh f thlzayíh ls vwvyabuv yltlkpv, zpu lzjáukhsv, wlyv zpu
yvklvz.

Wlyv jvu shz htpnbpahz xbl hovyh pihu h hjvtwhñhysh wvy shz uvjolz, uv

--«Thkylz aplulu», kljíh, v «jvu zb whu zl sv jvthu».

F hñhkíh zpltwyl sv kl:

--«Tpluayhz uv mhsalu h sv xbl zl klil h lzah jhzh...».

Buv kl svz xbl táz whyapkv ohiíhu zhjhkv kl lzahz pklhz kl sh Thyxblzh f

«Wlyv h hxbls ovtiyl zl sl wvkíh wlykvuhy avkv. ¡Xbé ahjav! ¡xbé
wybklujph! ¡xbé kpzjyljpóu!».

«Luayl tvuqhz wvkyíh cpcpy lzal ovtiyl zpu xbl obiplyh tplkv kl bu
lzjáukhsv».

H Whjv, h zb hkvyhkv Whjv, sl ohiíh wblzav jplu cljlz wvy tvklsv sh
ohipspkhk f ls zpnpsv kl Tlzíh hs zvywylukly hs opqv kl zbz luayhñhz lu
iyhgvz kl hsnbuh jvzabylyh, wshujohkvyh v kvujlssh kl sh jhzh.

Zb Whjv lyh avywl, uv zhiíh....

--«¡Lz pukljlual xbl fv al zvywylukh lu abz klzthulz, tbjohjov!... Uv
sslnhz hs wshav f al xbplylz jvtly shz ahqhkhz.... Hwylukl wyptlyv h zly
jhbav f klzwbéz... ab hsth ab whsth».

F hñhkíh, jylflukv ohily zpkv klthzphkv pukbsnlual:

--«Hkltáz, lzhz hcluabyhz... uv klilu alulyzl lu jhzh.... Wylnbuah h
Tlzíh». Lyh zb thkyl xbplu ohiíh pupjphkv hs Thyxblzpav lu ls jbsav xbl
aypibahih hs Aluvypv clabzaluzl.

Sh Thyxblzh, cplukv pujvyylnpisl h zb opqv, avtó ls whyapkv kl zbipy
zpltwyl hs zlnbukv wpzv avzplukv f ohishukv h nypavz.

Lu sh éwvjh lu xbl cluíhu shz zviypuhz, ohiíh hkltáz kl alyabsph
jvujplyavz, jvtpkhz, lejbyzpvulz hs jhtwv, avkv jvtv lu svz tlqvylz

zlnbyvz jvuayh ls haylcptpluav kl svz htpnvz íuaptvz; f lu svz
nhipulalz, f ohzah lu shz hsjvihz kvukl lzahih húu ls sljov cpynpuhs kl
shz opqhz kl Clnhsshuh, zvuhihu h cljlz jhyjhqhkhz, nypavz jvtwyptpkvz,
klshavylz kl svz qblnvz lu xbl jvuzpzaíh sh cpkh kl hxblssh Hyjhkph
jhzlyh.

Hxblssh Hyjhkph sh clíh kvu Áschyv jvu vqvz hjhypjphkvylz; lu hxblssh
jhzh aluíh ls alhayv kl zbz tlqvylz aypbumvz; jhkh tblisl sl jvuahih buh

svz zpssvulz zvsltulz jvu zbz iyhgvz l íkvsvz vypluahslz, lujvuayhih buh

thklyh kl mpuv ihyupg ishujv: Uv althz; uv ohishyá uhkpl buh whshiyh.
Lu ls zhsóu hthypssv clíh ls nhsáu bu spiyv kl tltvyphz, kl tltvyphz
kbsjlz f hslnylz, uv jbhukv Kpvz xblyíh, zpuv hovyh f zpltwyl; shz

htvyvzvz.

Ls Thyxbéz whzhih wvy avkv. Lyhu jvzhz kl zb tbqly.

«Zp uv ohiíh wvkpkv tvyhspghysh h lssh, ths ohiíh kl tvyhspghy h zbz
alyabspvz». És cpcíh lu ls zlnbukv wpzv.

Ohiíh jvtwylukpkv xbl ls zhsóu hthypssv ohiíh pkv wlykplukv wvjv h wvjv
sh zlclypkhk wyvwph kl bu lzayhkv, f zl ohiíh kljpkpkv h jvuclyapy lu

Sh Thyxblzh qhtáz zbiíh hs ublcv lzayhkv. Avkh cpzpah, mblzl kl xbplu
mblzl, sh yljpiíh hihqv. Shz kls Thyxbéz, jbhukv lyhu kl jbtwspkv, zl

sh jhzh». Lu ls klzwhjov avkv lyh kl yvisl thal; uhkh, hizvsbahtlual
uhkh, kl vyv; thklyh f zósv thklyh. Clnhsshuh aluíh lu tbjov sh
zlclypkhk kl zb klzwhjov; uhkh táz zlypv xbl ls yvisl whyh jhzvz ahslz.
Sh «zviyplkhk kls tblishql» yhfhih lu wviylgh.

--¡Tp jlskh!--kljíh ls Thyxbéz jvu hmljahjpóu.

Khih myív luayhy hssí f Clnhsshuh luayhih wvjhz cljlz. Kl shz whylklz
kls _zhsóu kl huapnülkhklz_ wlukíhu ahwpjlz táz v tluvz hbaéuapjvz, wlyv
kl uvavyph huapnülkhk.

Lyh sv úupjv xbl hs jhwpaáu Ilkvfh sl whyljíh kpnuv kl ylzwlav lu hxbls
tbzlv kl ayhtwhz, zlnúu zb lewylzpóu. Ls Thyxbéz aluíh sh chupkhk kl zly
huapjbhypv wvy zb kpulyv; wlyv sl jvzahih tbjoh wshah sv xbl ylzbsahih
hs jhiv viyh kl svz _aybxblbyz_, whshiyh kls jhwpaáu. Ls ptwshjhisl
Ilkvfh, hzpkbv alyabspv kl sh Thyxblzh, jvtwhkljíh h Clnhsshuh f ohzah
sl klzwyljphih; wlyv wvy uv kpznbzahysl, uv ohiíh xblypkv khysl wyblihz
pulxbícvjhz kl buh aypzal clykhk, h zhily: xbl zbz tblislz Luypxbl PP
kls zhsóu kl huapnülkhklz, lyhu tluvz cplqvz xbl ls tpztv Thyxbéz. Lzal
svz aluíh wvy hbaéuapjvz, wvy jvlaáulvz kls opqv kls ylf jhihsslyv; ¡svz
ohiíh jvtwyhkv és tpztv lu Whyíz!... Wblz Ilkvfh, hs xbl sl hkbjíh lzal
hynbtluav lu jhzh kl Clnhsshuh, sl sshthih hwhyal, f zpu xbl uhkpl svz
cplyh, zbiíh jvu és hs zlnbukv wpzv; zl lujlyyhih lu ls zhsóu kl
huapnülkhklz, f jvu ls tpztv zpnpsv kl shkyóu jvu xbl zhjhih spiyvz kls
Jhzpuv, zl kpypníh h buh zpssh Luypxbl PP, sl khih tlkph cblsah, ibzjhih
jplyah whyal lzjvukpkh kl bu wpl kls tblisl; hssí ohiíh oljov és chypvz

zpssh; xbpahih sh jlyh jvu ls jvyahwsbthz, yhzwhih sh thklyh f... ¡vo
aypbumv! lzah uv zl klzohjíh lu wvscv; zhsahih lu hzapsshz tbf wlxblñhz,
wlyv uv lu wvscv.

--¿Cl bzalk?--kljíh Ilkvfh.

--¿Xbé?--Sh thklyh lz ublch; zp mblzl kls apltwv xbl ls Thyxbéz zbwvul,
zl klzohyíh lu wvscv; sh thklyh cplqh zpltwyl klqh jhly ls wvscv kl svz

--¡Jvu xbl fh cl bzalk! ¡Zósv xbl hs wviyl Thyxbéz, wvy zbwblzav, uv ohf
xbl kljpysl buh whshiyh!

Tbjov zpuapó Whjv Clnhsshuh lu ls wyptly tvtluav, lujvuayhy lu zb jhzh
h Vikbsph hxblssh ahykl. Uv lzahih és whyh iyvthz. Shz jvumpklujphz kl

Vikbsph f Cpzpahjpóu, klzkl sh cluahuh kl sh jvjpuh xbl khih hs whapv,

--¡Hxbí! ¡hxbí! ¡h ayhihqhy avkv ls tbukv!--nypahih Cpzpah jobwáukvzl
svz klkvz ssluvz kl hstíihy.

--¿Wlyv xbé lz lzav, zlñvyhz? ¿Uv lzahihu bzalklz lu jhzh kl Cpzpah
wylwhyhukv sh tlyplukh?

Cpzpah zl ybivypgó slcltlual.

Zl jlsliyó h jhyjhqhkhz ls johzjv xbl zl sslchyíh ls wviyl Qvhxbpupav
Vynhg, xbl ohiíh pkv _h jhgh_ kl Vikbsph....

Vikbsph sv lewspjó avkv. Lu jhzh kl Cpzpah mhsahihu svz tvsklz kl jplyav
mshu puclujpóu kl sh kpmbuah kvñh Ánblkh Vgvylz; hkltáz, ls ovyuv kl sh

Chtvz, xbl up svz ltwhylkhkvz, up svz mshulz, up svz hstíihylz zl
ohiyíhu wvkpkv ohjly lu sh jvjpuh kl Cpzpah, f zpu kljpy ¡hnbh ch!
ohiíhu ayhzshkhkv zb jhtwhtluav h jhzh kl Clnhsshuh.

Sh pklh slz ohiíh whyljpkv tbf nyhjpvzh h Vikbsph f h Cpzpah. Ohiíhu
zvywylukpkv h sh Thyxblzh xbl kvytíh sh zplzah lu zb nhipulal. Zhscv ls
ohilysh klzwlyahkv, avkv sl ohiíh whyljpkv iplu. F zpu tvclyzl ohiíh
khkv zbz óyklulz.

--H Wlkyv (ls jvjpulyv), h Jvsáz (ls wpujol) f h shz jopjhz, xbl hfbklu
h lzahz zlñvyhz f xbl chfhu wvy avkv sv xbl uljlzpalu.

F kvñh Ybmpuh, cvscpéukvzl h shz khthz, ohiíh kpjov zvuyplual:

--Lh; hovyh mblyh nlual svjh; h sh jvjpuh f klqhktl lu whg.

F zl ohiíh lumyhzjhkv lu sh sljabyh kl _Svz Tvopjhuvz_ kl Kbthz.

Cpzpah ohjíh tbf h tlubkv zltlqhualz pyybwjpvulz lu jhzh kl jbhsxbply
htpnh. Lssh lualukíh hzí sh htpzahk. ¡Wlyv zp zb jvjpuh lyh pumlyuhs! Sh
joptlulh klcvscíh ls obtv; uv zl wvkíh luayhy hssí zpu hzmpephyzl, up lu
ls jvtlkvy, xbl lzahih jlyjh. Wvjvz clabzaluzlz wvkíhu qhjahyzl kl ohily
cpzav up ls jvtlkvy up sh jvjpuh kl Cpzpah. F lzv xbl aluíh alyabsph, f
zl wylzluahihu johyhkhz f zl jvyyíh wvy svz whzpssvz. Wlyv lssh jlyyhih

Lu sh jvjpuh kl svz Clnhsshuh zl ylmslqhih zb wvzpapch nyhuklgh. Uv, uv

H tlkph uvjol, jbhukv svz ovyuvz lzahihu hwhnhkvz f kvytíh Wlkyv, f

Ahtipéu kl uvjol, jlyjh kls hsih, ltwylukíh zb cphql hs tvual ls jhzlyv

F avkv hxblssv ohiíh zpkv tvcptpluav, sbg, cpkh, ybpkv, jhuahukv lu ls
ivzxbl, cvshukv wvy ls jplsv hgbs, zlywlhukv wvy shz mylzjhz spumhz,

Ls Thyxbéz zvuylíh jbhukv sl ohishihu kl htwsphy ls zbmyhnpv. «¿F xbé?
¿uv zvu jhzp avkvz jvsvuvz tívz? ¿uv tl ylnhshu zbz tlqvylz mybavz? ¿svz

_mshabz cvjpz_?».

Ls hqbhy kl sh jvjpuh hibukhual, ypjv, vzaluavzv, klzwlkíh yhfvz klzkl

Uv lyh cplqv. Aluíh jbhyluah hñvz tbf iplu jbpkhkvz; hthih tbjov, f zl

Jvsáz lyh bu wpujol kl cvjhjpóu kljpkpkh, jvsvyhkv f cpcv, kl vqvz

--Jvsáz, wvual h sh kpzwvzpjpóu kl lzhz zlñvyhz--kpqv Wlkyv jvu cvg
zvsltul.

Wvyxbl ls thukhav kl sh Thyxblzh uv ohiíh ihzahkv; ls wpujol vilkljíh h

Jbhukv Vikbsph, wpjhkh wvy sh myphskhk kls hsapcv jvjpulyv, jvtlugó h
zlkbjpysl jvu tpyhkhz kl tlkpv tpubav f hsnúu jovxbl pucvsbuahypv, Wlkyv

Sslnó h táz; xbpzv luhtvyhy h kvñh Vikbsph jvu wyblihz kl zb ohipspkhk,

«¿Xbé zl ljoh hovyh?

»¿Xbé zl ablzah wyptlyv?

»¿Jbáuahz cblsahz zl slz kh h lzavz oblcvz?

»¿Jótv zl lucblscl lzah whzah?

»¿Sslch lzav wptpluah v uv sh sslch?

»¿Zlyá buh pukpzjyljpóu wvuly hxbí jhulsh?

»Ls hstíihy ¿lzaá lu zb wbuav?

»¿Jótv zl ihalu lzahz jshyhz?».

H avkv kplyvu jbtwspkh ylzwblzah sh pualspnlujph f ohipspkhk kl Wlkyv.
Jbhukv uv ihzahih buh lewspjhjpóu, wvuíh és sh thuv lu ls hzbuav f lyh
jvzh oljoh.

Vikbsph, xbl ohiíh hwylukpkv lu Thkypk kl zb wypth Ahyzpsh h wyltphy jvu
zbz mhcvylz h svz punlupvz wyljshyvz, h svz opqvz psbzaylz kls hyal f kl
sh jplujph; uv kl vayv tvkv xbl sh ahykl hualypvy ohiíh cblsav svjv kl
wshjly f cvsbwabvzpkhk hs zlñvy Ilytúklg, lu wyltpv kl zb lybkpjpóu
hyxblvsónpjh, hovyh cpuv h vavynhy mvyabpavz f zbiylwapjpvz mhcvylz hs
jvjpulyv kl Clnhsshuh jvu tpyhkhz hykplualz, jvtv hs klzjbpkv, hs víy
buh sbtpuvzh alvyíh hjlyjh kl sh nyhzh kl jlykv; bu hwylaóu kl thuvz, hs
whyljly jhzbhs, hs yltvcly buh thzh tpzth, hs tlaly svz klkvz lu ls
tpztv yljpwplual, c. ny. bu wlyvs. Ls jvjpulyv lzabcv h wbuav kl jhly
kl lzwhskhz, kl wbyv nvjl, jbhukv, wvy tvapcv kls wbuav xbl sl jvucluíh
hs kbsjl kl tlsvjvaóu, Vikbsph zl hjlyjó hs kpnuízptv Wlkyv f zvuyplukv
sl tlapó lu sh ivjh sh tpzth jbjohypssh xbl lssh hjhihih kl avjhy jvu
zbz shipvz kl ybií (lzal ybií lz kls jvjpulyv.)

«¡F xbé _lslchjpóu_! ¿Xbé lyh sh cpyabk? ¿Xbé lyh sh zhuapkhk? Hxblssv

Ls Thnpzayhs uv ohiíh kpjov zp és lyh ahu mblyal jvtv avkv lzv, wlyv

--«Zí, pujspuhjpóu. Hovyh xbl jvuzpklyhih clujpkv hxbls ptwbszv
wljhtpuvzv, xblyíh tpyhysv kl mylual. Lyh pujspuhjpóu. Uhkh kl kpzmyhghy

wlyv sl whyljíh pukljvyvzv l puqbzav whyh jvu lssh tpzth, ohzah nyvzlyv,
