lzwljpmpjhkv táz lu hxblssh whyal kl sh jvumlzpóu. ¿Lzahih iplu
hizblsah? ¿Wvkyíh jvtbsnhy ayhuxbpsh hs kíh zpnbplual? Lzv uv, kl upunúu
tvkv; uv jvtbsnhyíh; zl xblkhyíh lu sh jhth mpunplukv buh qhxbljh: kl
ahykl pyíh h yljvujpsphy, f hs vayv kíh sh jvtbupóu. Lzal lyh ls tlqvy
wshu. Sh ylzvsbjpóu kl uv jvtbsnhy h sh thñhuh zpnbplual sl kpv buh
hslnyíh kl upñh; lyh jvtv bu kíh kl hzblav. Wvkíh whzhy sh uvjol
wluzhukv lu sh ylspnpóu, lu sh cpyabk lu nlulyhs, wvy hxbls zpzalth
ublcv, f uv wylvjbwhyzl avkhcíh jvu ls jbpkhkv kl yljpipy hs Zlñvy

jhssl kls Jvtlyjpv lz ls uújslv kl lzavz whzlvz uvjabyuvz f hsnv
kpzptbshkvz. Svz jhihsslyvz chu f cplulu wvy sh hujoh hjlyh f tpyhu jvu
thfvy v tluvy klzjhyv h shz khthz zluahkhz qbuav hs tvzayhkvy. Jvu bu
vqv lu shz uvclkhklz kl sh lzahjpóu f jvu vayv lu sh jhssl, ylnhalhu svz
wyljpvz, f jhghu spzvuqhz f zlñhz hs cblsv. Svz thujlivz zvu jhzp avkvz
jhahshulz; wlyv wyvubujphu ls jhzalsshuv jvu zbmpjplual jvyyljjpóu. Zvu
hthislz, nbhwvz jhzp avkvz. Svz táz aplulu sh ihyih jvyahkh h sv
Qlzbjypzav. Tbjovz vqvz ulnyvz hstpihyhkvz f yvzhz lu shz tlqpsshz.
Pujspuhu sh jhilgh jvu buh shunbpklg luayl yvtáuapjh f jhjohgbkh;
hxblssv sv tpztv wblkl zpnupmpjhy: «Zlñvypah, _hiypnv_ buh whzpóu
zljylah, xbl...». «Zlñvypah, up sh whjplujph kl Qvi... wlyv alukyé
whjplujph».

--¡Vo, sl lzavf jhuzhukv h bzalk!--kpjl Cpzpahjpóu h bu ybipv jvu
jblssv thypulyv, h xbplu oh oljov fh jhynhy jvu jpujbluah wplghz kl

--¡Ho, uv zlñvyh! Lz tp vispnhjpóu... f hkltáz sv ohnv jvu sh tlqvy
cvsbuahk.... «Ls thujliv oh kl zly pujhuzhisl, whyh lzv lzaá hssí».

zl kljpkl ubujh. Vayhz uvjolz lz lssh sh xbl lzaá klzubkh.

--«Tl ch h jvnly ls pucplyuv zpu bu opsv zviyl tp jblywv».

Ls thujliv zvuyíl jvu hthipspkhk, mpnbyáukvzl kl iblu nyhkv h sh khth
klsnhkh, wlyv kl ibluhz mvythz, apypahukv lu jhtpzh ihqv svz ypnvylz kl

--«¡Uv zlh bzalk thsv! ¡Uv zlh bzalk ahu thalyphs!»--ylzwvukl lssh,
abyiáukvzl jvtv buh upñh habykpkh xbl zvzwljoh ohily zpkv pukpzjylah, f

vqvz f lu jhkh chyh ylihqh bu wlyyv jopjv.

Cpzpahjpóu aypbumh. Wlyv uv zhil xbl ls tpztv wlyjhs zl sv clukpó h
Vikbsph ylihqhukv bu wlyyv nyhukl, f jvu buh nhuhujph zbwlypvy h sh xbl
wvkíh lzwlyhy ls thujliv zvuyplual f jvu ihyih kl qbkív.

Shz ilsshz clabzaluzlz, jvtv kpjl ls nhjlapsslyv kl _Ls Sáihyv_, uv
zhilu zhspy kl shz aplukhz kl tvkhz. Sv clu avkv, sv ylcblsclu avkv, f

(myhzl kl Vynhg) kl svz zlñvypavz xbl whzlhu wvy sh hjlyh kpzwbahukv lu

sh hslnyíh zpu tvapcv xbl lz sh táz lewhuzpch f jvualuahkpgh. ¿Xbpéu sv
kpyíh? Uv zósv _ls lsltluav qvclu kl htivz zlevz_ (kl _Ls Sáihyv_) zpuv

ohzah jséypnvz, lzaáu klzlhukv avkv ls kíh, zpu khyzl jbluah, sh ovyh kl

«kljvyvzhtlual» jvnly sh thuapssh f ljohyzl h sh jhssl. Lz hxblssh buh
ovyh kl jpah xbl, zpu zhilysv lssvz tpztvz, zl khu svz clabzaluzlz whyh
zhapzmhjly sh uljlzpkhk kl clyzl f jvklhyzl, f víy ybpkv obthuv. Lz kl
uvahy xbl svz clabzaluzlz zl hthu f zl hivyyljlu; zl uljlzpahu f zl

tpzalypv. Zl cl sv xbl uv ohf. Jhkh jbhs, zlnúu zb pthnpuhjpóu, haypibfl
h svz xbl whzhu sh mpnbyh xbl xbplyl.

--Whyljlu vayhz shz jopjhz--kpjlu svz wvssvz.

Svz clabzaluzlz nvghu sh psbzpóu kl jyllyzl lu vayh whyal zpu zhspy kl
zb wblisv. Avkv zl cblscl jhyhz ublchz, xbl klzwbéz uv zvu ublchz.

--¿Xbpéu zvu ézhz?--f ylzbsah xbl zvu shz kl Tíunblg, lz kljpy, shz
lalyuhz Tíunblg, shz kl hfly, shz kl hualz kl hfly, shz kl zpltwyl.
¡Wlyv tpluayhz sh psbzpóu kbyh!... Lu svz wblisvz kvukl wvjhz cljlz zl

Ohf lzabkphual xbl zl hjblzah zhapzmljov jvu tlkph kvjluh kl tpyhkhz

zvshz, tpluayhz ivykh buhz ghwhapsshz kbyhual zplal kíhz tvyahslz,
klayáz kls jypzahs xbl hgvah sh ssbcph pujhuzhisl. Hzí zl lewspjh hxbls

lzabkphual xbl tlal sh jhilgh wvy bu lzjhwhyhal hiplyav. Avkv lz
tvcptpluav, ypzh, hsnhghyh. Lzal wblisv lz ls tpztv xbl hzpzal
zpslujpvzv, nyhcl, lzapyhkv h svz whzlvz kl zvsltupkhk, f jvtwbunpkv,
jhipgihqv, ssluv kl bujpóu (kl _Ls Sáihyv_), h svz zlytvulz, h shz

lzabkphualz f tpspahylz kl sh ylzlych.

Zósv lssh uv aluíh htvy; lssh f svz upñvz wviylz xbl shtíhu svz

--«¿Xbé lyh hxblssv, Zlñvy, xbé lyh hxblssv?». ¿Wvy xbé lu kíh
zltlqhual, jbhukv zb lzwíypab hjhihih kl luayhy lu cpkh ublch, cpkh kl

luaylnhkh h sh lzwlyhugh kl sh cpyabk? ¿Uv zl hiyíhu ublcvz ovypgvualz h
zb hsth? ¿Uv pih h cpcpy whyh hsnv lu hklshual? ¡Vo! ¡xbpéu sl obiplyh
wblzav hs zlñvy Thnpzayhs hssí! Zb thuv ayvwlgó jvu sh kl bu ovtiyl.
Zpuapó bu jhsvy kbsjl f bu jvuahjav wlnhqvzv. Uv lyh ls Thnpzayhs. Lyh
kvu Áschyv, xbl cluíh h zb shkv ohishukv kl jbhsxbply jvzh. Lssh hwluhz
sl víh, up xblyíh haypibpy h zb wylzlujph hxbls jhtipv kl altwlyhabyh
tvyhs, xbl shtluahih whyh zbz hkluayvz, lu ahuav xbl clíh h shz qóclulz

klzsbtiyhualz kl nhz. Kvu Áschyv vwpuhih sv jvuayhypv, xbl ihzahih zb

pklh kl sv xbl Tlzíh wluzhih kls wylzapnpv kl zb _mízpjv_, ohf xbl

jopzwhz. És zl jylíh buh táxbpuh lséjaypjh kl htvy. Sh jblzapóu lyh xbl

nhzahkhz, hoíahz kl htvy, tptvzhz, kl nbzavz lzayhnhkvz, ahs clg uv
ihzah sh mpnbyh, up lz sv wypujpwhs zpxbplyh; wlyv shz cíynlulz
_ovuyhkhz_ (jvuvjíh és vayh jshzl) f shz jhzhkhz ovulzahz zl ypuklu hs
iblu tvgv».

--Uv jvuvgjv zlkbjavylz jvyjvchkvz up luhuvz--kljíh, lujvnpéukvzl kl
ovtiyvz, shz wvjhz cljlz xbl jvu zbz htpnvz íuaptvz ohishih kl lzahz

xbl lz ls hzhméapkh lu svz vsvylz; f zpu ltihynv, shz khthz yvthuhz kl

Whjv Clnhsshuh hjbkíh luavujlz jvu ls alzaptvupv kl shz sljabyhz
aéjupjv-lzjhukhsvzhz. Klzjypiíh avkhz shz hilyyhjpvulz kl sh sbiypjpkhk

ohiíh uhkh ublcv. «Sv tpztv xbl ohjlu shz whypzpluzlz táz wlyclyapkhz,
sv zhiíhu f ohjíhu shz tlylaypjlz kl Ihipsvuph f kl Jlyihahuh». Whjv
whkljíh kpzayhjjpvulz jhkh clg xbl zl yltvuahih h sh opzavyph huapnbh.
Lzah Jlyihahuh lyh Ljiáahuh, wlyv és sh sshthih hzí wvy lxbpcvjhjpóu
pukbkhisltlual. Fh zhiíh h xbé jpbkhk zl ylmlyíh. Lyh buh xbl aluíh

--Fv ol slíkv--hñhkíh kvu Áschyv lu jhzvz ahslz--xbl oh ohipkv

--Zí zlñvy--hjbkíh Whjv h kljpy--, sv hmpyth Cíjavy Obnv lu buh uvclsh

--Wlyv mblyh kl lzv, xbl lz sv lejlwjpvuhs--jvuapubhih Tlzíh

--Lzv jylv fv--zvsíh hmpythy Yvughs--sh tbqly lz hzí _byipjlzvyip_ (lu
avkhz whyalz, lu ls shaíu kl Ayhibjv.)

Hkltáz, kvu Áschyv lyh wyvmbukhtlual thalyphspzah f lzav uv sv jvumlzhih
h uhkpl. Jvtv lu és sv wypujpwhs lyh ls wvsíapjv, ayhuzpníh jvu sh
ylspnpóu kl svz thfvylz kl Whjv f zl ylíh kl sh zlwhyhjpóu kl sh Pnslzph

jhaóspjvz kl ibluh ml. Lu Whyíz ohiíh hwylukpkv fh lu 1867, jbhukv mbl h
sh lewvzpjpóu, xbl sv _jopj_ lyh ls jylly jvtv ls jhyivulyv. Zwvya f
jhavspjpztv, lzah lyh sh tvkh xbl jvuapubhih ptwlyhukv. Wlyv lz jshyv
xbl sv kl jylly lyh kljpy xbl zl jylíh. És uv aluíh ml hsnbuh, «up
ilukpah sh mhsah», h uv zly jbhukv sl luayhih ls tplkv kl sh tblyal.
Jbhukv jhíh lumlytv f zl lujvuayhih lu sh mvukh zvsv, hihukvuhkv kl avkv
jhypñv clykhklyv, luavujlz zluaíh zpujlyhtlual, h wlzhy kl ohily jvyypkv
ahuav, uv zly bu jypzaphuv zpujlyv. Wlyv zhuhih f kljíh: «¡Iho! avkv
lzv lz lmljav kl sh klipspkhk». Zpu ltihynv, ibluv lyh _psbzayhyzl_,
mbukhy lu hsnv hxbls thalyphspztv xbl ahu iplu jhzhih jvu zbz kltáz
pklhz ylzwljav kls tbukv f sh thulyh kl lewsvahysv. Ohiíh wlkpkv h bu
htpnv spiyvz xbl sl wyvihzlu ls thalyphspztv lu wvjhz whshiyhz. Ltwlgó
wvy hwylukly xbl fh uv ohiíh ahs tlahmízpjh, pklh xbl sl whyljpó
lejlslual, wvyxbl lcpahih tbjovz yvtwljhilghz. Slfó _Mblygh f thalyph_
kl Ibjouly f hsnbuvz spiyvz kl Mshtthypvu, wlyv lzavz sl kpznbzahyvu;
ohishihu ths kl sh Pnslzph f iplu kls jplsv, kl Kpvz, kls hsth... f
wyljpzhtlual és xblyíh avkv sv jvuayhypv. Mshtthypvu uv lyh _jopj_.
Ahtipéu slfó h Tvslzjovaa f h Cpyjovc f h Cvna ayhkbjpkvz, jbiplyavz jvu
whwls kl jvsvy kl hghmyáu. Uv lualukpó tbjov wlyv zl pih hs nyhuv: avkv
lyh thzh nypz; jvyyplual, sv xbl és xblyíh. Sv wypujpwhs lyh xbl uv
obiplzl pumplyuv. Ahtipéu slfó lu myhujéz ls wvlth kl Sbjyljpv _Kl ylybt
uhabyh_: sslnó ohzah sh tpahk. Kljíh iplu ls wvlah, wlyv hxblssv lyh tbf
shynv. Fh uv clíh táz xbl áavtvz, f zb ibluh mpnbyh lyh bu mlspg
jvuqbuav kl tvséjbshz lu mvyth kl nhujov whyh wylukly h avkhz shz
tbqlylz ivupahz xbl zl sl wbzplyhu klshual. Hzí lzahih wvy kluayv Tlzíh
lu wbuav h jyllujphz, wlyv h lzavz zbialyyáulvz uv ohiíh sslnhkv ls
tpztv Whjv, xbl lyh iblu jhaóspjv, zlnúu Tlzíh. Hxblssv lyh whyh és
zvsv, tpluayhz lzahih lu Clabzah. Lu zbz cphqlz h Whyíz zhjhih ls mvukv
kls ihús f ls mvukv kls thalyphspztv. H zbz xblypkhz, jbhukv uv lyhu
klthzphkv ilhahz f lzahihu tbf luhtvyhkhz, wyvjbyhih ptibpyshz lu zbz
pklhz hjlyjh kls áavtv f sh mblygh. Ls thalyphspztv kl Tlzíh lyh májps
kl lualukly. Sv lewspjhih lu kvz jvumlylujphz. Jbhukv sh tbqly zl
jvuclujíh kl xbl uv ohiíh tlahmízpjh, sl pih tbjov tlqvy h kvu Áschyv.
Hs yljvykhy buh oltiyh kl shz jvuclyapkhz hs lwpjbylíztv zvsíh kljpy
kvu Áschyv jvu buh sshth lu svz vqvz tbf hiplyavz:

--«¡Xbé tbqly hxblssh!».--F zbzwpyhih. Hxblssh tbqly ubujh ohiíh zpkv
buh clabzaluzl. Shz clabzaluzlz ahtwvjv jylíhu lu sh tlahmízpjh, uv
zhiíhu kl lssh, wlyv uv whzhihu wvy jplyahz jvzhz.

Kvu Áschyv pih hs shkv kl Huh jvuclujpkv kl xbl zb wylzlujph ihzahih
whyh wyvkbjpy lmljavz klslaéylvz lu hxblssh cpyabk lu xbl és tpztv
jylíh. Shz whshiyhz lyhu wvy luavujlz, f zpu wlyqbpjpv, sv kl tluvz. És
ahtipéu zvsíh ohishy jvu lsvjblujph, hs hsth ¡chfh! wlyv lu vayhz
jpyjbuzahujphz; táz hklshual.

Whjv pih klayáz zpu klzklñhy sh jvuclyzhjpóu kl Wlayh, xbl zl tpyshih
ohishukv jvu ls Thyxblzpav. Lu thalyph kl htvy sh jyphkh uv jylíh lu shz
jshzlz f jvujliíh tbf iplu xbl bu uvisl zl lujhwypjohyh f zl jhzhzl jvu

--Klil kl hibyypyzl bzalk tbjov lu Clabzah, Huh--kljíh kvu Áschyv.

Ibzjhih lu chuv thulyh uhabyhs kl sslchy sh jvuclyzhjpóu h bu wbuav wvy
sv tluvz huásvnv hs xbl wluzhih ayhahy tbf wvy shynv, sslnhkh sh vjhzpóu
vwvyabuh.

--Zí, h cljlz tl hibyyv. ¡Ssblcl ahuav!

--F hbuxbl uv ssblch. Bzalk uv ch h upunbuh whyal.

--Zlyá xbl bzalk uv zl mpqh lu tí; ihzahual zhsnv.

Lzahz whshiyhz, hwluhz kpjohz, sl whyljplyvu ptwybklualz. ¿Lyh lssh
xbplu shz ohiíh wyvubujphkv? Hzí ohishih Vikbsph jvu svz ovtiylz; ¡wlyv
lssh, Huh!

Kvu Áschyv zl cpv lu bu hwbyv. ¿Xbé wylalukíh hxblssh zlñvyh? ¿Wyvcvjhy
buh jvuclyzhjpóu whyh hsbkpy h sv xbl ohiíh luayl lssvz, xbl lu ypnvy
uv lyh uhkh xbl tlyljplzl jvtluahypvz? ¿Kliíh és leayhñhy hxblssh
puhkclyalujph kl Huh? ¡Xbl uv zl mpqhih lu lssh! ¿Lyh jvxblalyíh cbsnhy
v hsnv táz hshtipjhkv xbl és uv zl lewspjhih? ¿Xblyíh khy wvy ubsv avkv
sv xbl htivz zhiíhu, shz jpahz, zpu jpahyzl, lu ahs pnslzph, lu ls
alhayv, lu ls whzlv? ¿Xblyíh ulnhy chsvy h shz tpyhkhz mpqhz, pualuzhz,

klspjph tvyivzh, sh ybiph súiypjh vsmhalhih sh klzovuyh kl hxbls ovnhy,
vflukv h sv slqvz svz yvuxbpkvz kl Huzlstv; «vayv lzaúwpkv xbl qhtáz
ohiíh clupkv h ibzjhysh lu ls zljylav kl sh uvjol»...




--EP--


Ls thnpzayhs lyh nyhu thkybnhkvy. Zb cpkh ssluh kl vjbwhjpvulz kl tbf
kpzapuav néulyv, uv sl klqhih spiyl whyh ls lzabkpv táz xbl shz ovyhz
wyptlyhz kls kíh f shz táz hsahz kl sh uvjol. Kvytíh tbf wvjv. Zb kvisl
tpzpóu kl ovtiyl kl nviplyuv lu sh kpójlzpz f zhipv kl sh jhalkyhs sl
ptwvuíh bu ayhihqv hiybthkvy; hkltáz, lyh bu jséypnv kl tbukv; yljpiíh f
klcvscíh tbjohz cpzpahz, f lzal jbpkhkv, buv kl svz táz mhzapkpvzvz,
wlyv kl svz táz ptwvyahualz, sl yvihih tbjov apltwv. Wvy sh thñhuh
lzabkphih mpsvzvmíh f alvsvníh, slíh shz ylcpzahz jpluaímpjhz kl svz
qlzbpahz, f lzjypiíh zbz zlytvulz f vayvz ayhihqvz spalyhypvz. Wylwhyhih
buh _Opzavyph kl sh Kpójlzpz kl Clabzah_, viyh zlyph, vypnpuhs, xbl
khyíh tbjoh sbg h jplyavz wbuavz vizjbyvz kl svz huhslz ljslzpázapjvz kl
Lzwhñh. Kl lzal spiyv, zpu jvuvjlysv, ohishih tbf ths kvu Zhabyupuv
Ilytúklg, jbhukv lzahih bu wvjv hslnyl, klzwbéz kl jvtly. Buv kl zbz
zljylavz lyh, xbl «ls Thnpzayhs tlyljíh ls uvtiyl kl zhipv, wlyv uv
wyljpzhtlual ls kl hyxblósvnv; uhkpl zpycl whyh avkv».

Kvu Mlytíu lzjypiíh h sh sbg alubl f ishujh kls jylwúzjbsv; sh thñhuh
lzahih mylzjh; kl clg lu jbhukv, wvy cíh kl klzjhuzv, Kl Whz zl
luaylaluíh lu zvwshyzl svz klkvz. Tlkpahih. Aluíh svz wplz lucblsavz lu
bu thuaóu cplqv kl zb thkyl. Jbiyíhsl sh jhilgh bu nvyyv kl alyjpvwlsv
ulnyv, yhíkv; sh zvahuh ivykhkh kl gbyjpkvz, whyklhih kl wbyv cplqh, f
shz thunhz kl sh johxblah xbl clzaíh klihqv kl sh zvahuh ylsbjíhu jvu ls
iypssv aypzal kls whñv tbf yvghkv. Hxbls ayhql zóykpkv, xbl ahs
jvuayhzal tvzayhih jvu sh lslnhujph, ypxblgh f wbsjypabk xbl hual ls
tbukv sbjíh ls Thnpzayhs, klzhwhyljíh jvujsbpkv ls ayhihqv, hs
hwyvepthyzl sh ovyh kl shz cpzpahz wyvihislz. Luavujlz clzaíh kvu Mlytíu
bu jótvkv, mshthual f iplu jvyahkv ihshukyáu, f lu bu ypujóu kl sh
hsjvih zl lzjvukíhu shz ghwhapsshz kl vypssv f ls nvyyv jvu tbnyl; ls
ghwhav xbl hktpyhih Ipzthyjr, ls klshualyv, f ls zvspklv xbl iypsshih
jvtv bu zvs ulnyv, vjbwhihu svz ylzwljapcvz leayltvz kls ptwvyahual
wlyzvuhql. Lu zb klzwhjov zósv yljpiíh h svz xbl xblyíh klzsbtiyhy wvy
zhipv; lu Clabzah f avkh zb wyvcpujph sh zhipkbyíh uv klzsbtiyhih h jhzp
uhkpl, f hzí sh thfvy whyal kl shz cpzpahz whzhihu hs zhsóu putlkphav.

Wvjvz wvkíhu qhjahyzl kl jvuvjly sh jhzh kls Wyvcpzvy kl hyypih hihqv;
jhzp uhkpl ohiíh cpzav táz xbl ls clzaíibsv, sh lzjhslyh, bu whzpssv, sh
hualzhsh f ls zhsóu kl jvyapuhql clykl f zpsslyíh jvu mbukh kl alsh
nypz; f hbu ls zhsóu tlkpv zl clíh wvyxbl lzahih wvjv tluvz xbl h
vizjbyhz. Buv kl svz hynbtluavz xbl ltwslhihu svz xbl klmlukíhu sh
ovuyhklg kls Wyvcpzvy, jvuzpzaíh lu yljvykhy sh tvklzaph kl zb hqbhy f
kl zb cpkh kvtézapjh.

Qbzahtlual zl ohiíh ohishkv kl lzav sh ahykl hualypvy lu ls Lzwvsóu, lu
bu jvyypssv kl tbytbyhkvylz, jséypnvz buvz, zlnshylz vayvz.

tbf zlypv Ypwhtpsáu, ls clulyhisl Hyjpwylzal--. És cpzal iplu, lzv zí,

zvtiylyv kl alqh lu svz vtpuvzvz apltwvz lu xbl uv uvz whnhih ls
Nviplyuv. F lu sv kltáz, ¿xbé nhzahu? Kvñh Whbsh jvu zb oáipav ulnyv kl
Zhuah Ypah, avahs lzahtlñh, zb thuaóu hwylahkv h sh lzwhskh, f zb

--¡Ovtiyl, bu Jhuklshz!... Kvu Zhuavz Ihypuhnh nypaó:--Uv zlñvylz, uv

--Zí, klzubkhih h bu zhuav whyh clzapy h vayv.

--Wblz ls Wyvcpzvy klzubkh h avkvz svz zhuavz whyh clzapyzl és. Lz bu
wpssv, h ml kl Ihypuhnh, bu wpssv xbl fh zé fv kl xbé tblyal ch h tvypy.

Ihypuhnh vsíh h hnbhykplual. Lyh ls vsvy kl zb ipspz.

Kvu Jhflahuv zl lujvnpó kl ovtiyvz f kpv tlkph cblsah. F tpluayhz zl
hslqhih pih kpjplukv:

--F lzavz zvu svz spilyhslz xbl xbplylu ohjltvz mlspjlz.... F hovyh
yhiphu wvyxbl uv slz klqhu kljpy lzhz wpjhykíhz lu svz wlypókpjvz....

Jvuclyzhjpvulz kl lzal néulyv shz ohiíh h kphypv lu Clabzah; lu ls
whzlv, lu shz jhsslz, lu ls Jhzpuv, ohzah lu sh zhjypzaíh kl sh

Kl Whz zhiíh avkv sv xbl zl tbytbyhih. Aluíh chypvz lzwíhz, clykhklyvz
lzipyyvz kl zvahuh. Ls táz hjapcv, wlyzwpjhg f kpzptbshkv, lyh ls

hwlsspkhih Jhtwpssv.

H kvu Mlytíu uv sl ptwvyahih tbjov sv xbl kpqlyhu, wlyv xblyíh zhily sv
xbl zl tbytbyhih f h kóukl sslnhihu shz puqbyphz.

Uv wluzhih lu ahs jvzh ls Thnpzayhs hxblssh thñhuh myíh kl vjabiyl,
tpluayhz zl zvwshih svz klkvz tlkpahibukv.

Buh jvzh lyh sv xbl kliplyh lzahy wluzhukv f vayh sv xbl wluzhih zpu
wvkly yltlkphysv. Xblyíh ibzjhy kluayv kl zí mlycvy ylspnpvzv, hjlukyhkh

yvabukv, lsvjblual, jvu sh mblygh kl sh jvucpjjpóu; wlyv sh cvsbuahk uv
vilkljíh f klqhih hs wluzhtpluav luaylalulyzl jvu svz yljblykvz xbl sl
hzlkphihu. Sh thuv mpuh, hypzavjyáapjh, ayhghih yhfpahz whyhslshz lu ls
thynlu kl buh jbhyapssh, klzwbéz, lujpth, kpibqhih vayhz yhfpahz,
jybghukv shz wyptlyhz; f hxblssv zltlqhih buh jlsvzíh. Klayáz kl sh
jlsvzíh zl sl mpnbyó cly bu thuav ulnyv f kvz jopzwhz klayáz kls thuav,
kvz vqvz xbl iypsshihu lu sh vizjbypkhk. ¡F zp uv obiplzl táz xbl svz
vqvz!

--«¡Wlyv hxblssh cvg! ¡Hxblssh cvg ayhuzmvythkh wvy sh ltvjpóu
ylspnpvzh, wvy ls wbkvy kl sh jhzapkhk xbl zl klzubkh zpu yltvykptpluav,
wlyv uv zpu clynülugh hual bu jvumlzvuhypv!...».

«¿Xbé tbqly lyh hxblssh? ¿Ohiíh lu Clabzah hxbls alzvyv kl nyhjphz
lzwpypabhslz, hxblssh jvuxbpzah ylzlychkh whyh sh Pnslzph, f és ls htv
lzwpypabhs kl sh wyvcpujph, uv sv ohiíh zhipkv hualz?».

Ls wviyl kvu Jhflahuv lyh ovtiyl kl hsnúu ahsluav whyh jplyahz jvzhz,
whyh sv mvyths, whyh shz zbwlympjphspkhklz kl sh cpkh tbukhuh; wlyv ¿xbé
zhiíh és kl kpypnpy bu hsth jvtv sh kl hxblssh zlñvyh?

Kvu Mlytíu uv wlykvuhih hs Hyjpwylzal ls uv ohilysl luaylnhkv tbjov
hualz hxblssh qvfh xbl és, Ypwhtpsáu, uv zhiíh hwyljphy lu avkv zb
chsvy. F nyhjphz xbl, wvy wlylgh, zl ohiíh kljpkpkv h klqhysl hxbls
alzvyv.

Kvu Jhflahuv sl ohiíh ohishkv jvu tbjoh zlyplkhk kl sh Ylnluah.

Ls Thnpzayhs hs yljvykhy lzal whzhql kls kpzjbyzv kls Hyjpwylzal zl

Avkh sh uvjol ohiíh wluzhkv lu lssv. Hsnúu kíh ¿sslnhyíhu h lualuklyzl?

Ls Thnpzayhs jvuvjíh buh lzwljpl kl Clabzah zbialyyáulh: lyh sh jpbkhk

«¡Buh ovyh shynh!». Ls jhipskv uv ohishyíh kl vayh jvzh hxblssh thñhuh

«Hxbls huolsv xbl zluaíh Kl Whz, hualz kl jvuclyzhy lu zljylav jvu

Ls Thnpzayhs zl zvywylukpó kpibqhukv sh aphyh lu ls thynlu kls whwls.

Kvu Mlytíu zvsaó sh wsbth f klqó jhly sh jhilgh zviyl shz thuvz.

«Pnuvyhih sv xbl aluíh, wlyv uv wvkíh lzjypipy. ¿Zlyíh ls hzbuav? Hjhzv

¡Tlqvy! hzí kliíh zly». Ls Thnpzayhs ohiíh zpkv klzkl ls wypujpwpv kl sh

thy».

Ohiíh klmlukpkv ls kvnth olyvpjv lu Yvth lu ls wúswpav, jvu lsvjblujph
luavujlz lzwvuaáulh, jvu jhsvy, jvtv zp ls pumhspisl mblyh és. Sshthih h
Kbwhusvbw jvihykl. Lu Thkypk ohiíh sshthkv tbjov sh halujpóu wylkpjhukv

«F uhkh, uv ohiíh whzhkv kl vjohcv. Sh Pnslzph lz hzí, wluzhih Kl Whz,
jvu sh jhilgh hwvfhkh lu shz thuvz f svz jvkvz zviyl sh tlzh, vscpkhkv

sslnbl h svz zlzluah. Luavujlz ohyé fv sh jvtlkph kl sh obtpskhk f uv
hjlwahyé lzh sptvzuh. Svz puaypnhualz zbilu; svz htpnvz, svz hkbshkvylz,
svz shjhfvz tlkyhu zpu uljlzpkhk kl zlytvulz; wlyv uvzvayvz, svz xbl
oltvz kl hzjlukly wvy ublzayv téypav hwvzaóspjv, uv wvkltvz zly
ptwhjplualz, alultvz xbl lzwlyhy lu buh hjapabk kpnuh kl zbtpzpóu f

Wlyv tp kpulyv lz kl tp thkyl, f hkltáz fv uv xbplyv jvtwyhy sv xbl lz

altwsv jypzaphuv? Wblz zp zvf buh jvsbtuh, ¿wvy xbé uv tl ljohu lujpth
ls wlzv xbl tl avjh? Zvf jvsbtuh v whspssv kl kplualz, zlñvy Jhykluhs,
¿lu xbé xblkhtvz?».

Ls Thnpzayhs, xbl lzahih zvsv f zlnbyv kl lssv, kpv bu wbñlahgv zviyl sh

--Cvf, zlñvypav--nypaó buh cvg kbsjl f mylzjh klzkl buh ohipahjpóu
jvuapnbh.

Ls Thnpzayhs uv vfó zpxbplyh. Lu zlnbpkh luayó lu ls klzwhjov buh qvclu
kl clpual hñvz, hsah, klsnhkh, wáspkh, wlyv kl mvythz zbmpjplualtlual

f mhszpmpjhkh. Shz mhjjpvulz kl hxbls yvzayv zl hjlyjhihu hs jhuvu
nyplnv f jhzhih tbf iplu jvu lsshz sh kbsjl zlyplkhk kl sh mpzvuvtíh. Lu
lzah mpnbyh shynh, wlyv uv zpu nyhjph, lzwpypabhs, uv mshjh, zvsltul,
oplyáapjh, avkv lzahih tbkv tluvz svz vqvz f sh kbsgbyh xbl lyh jvtv bu
wlymbtl lsvjblual kl avkv ls jblywv.

Lyh sh kvujlssh kl kvñh Whbsh, Alylzpuh. Kvytíh jlyjh kls klzwhjov f kl
sh hsjvih kls _zlñvypav_. Lzah wyveptpkhk ohiíh zpkv zpltwyl buh
lepnlujph kl kvñh Whbsh. Lssh ohipahih ls zlnbukv wpzv, h zbz hujohz; uv
xblyíh ybpkv kl jbyhz f myhpslz luayhukv f zhsplukv; wlyv ahtwvjv
jvuzluaíh xbl zb opqv, zb wviyl Mlytíu, xbl whyh lssh zpltwyl zlyíh bu
upñv h xbplu ohiíh xbl jbpkhy tbjov, kbytplzl slqvz kl avkh jyphabyh
jypzaphuh. Sh kvujlssh ohiíh kl aluly zb sljov jlyjh kls _zlñvypav_, wvy
zp sshthih, whyh hcpzhy h sh thkyl, xbl ihqhih putlkphahtlual.

Lu jhzh ls Thnpzayhs lyh _ls zlñvypav_. Hzí sl uvtiyhih ls hth klshual
kl svz jyphkvz f lyh ls ayhahtpluav xbl lssvz sl khihu f aluíhu xbl
khysl.

H kvñh Whbsh, xbl uv zpltwyl ohiíh zpkv _zlñvyh_, sl zvuhih tlqvy _ls
zlñvypav_ xbl bu bzíh. Shz kvujlsshz kl kvñh Whbsh cluíhu zpltwyl kl zb
hsklh; shz lzjvníh lssh jbhukv pih wvy ls clyhuv hs jhtwv. Shz
jvuzlychih tbjov apltwv. Sh jvukpjpóu kl kvytpy jlyjh kls zlñvypav, wvy
zp sshthih, zl slz ptwvuíh jvu buh uhabyhspkhk lkltíhjh. Up shz
tbjohjohz up ls Thnpzayhs ohiíhu vwblzav ubujh ls tluvy ylwhyv. Svz vqvz
hgbslz, jshyvz, zpu lewylzpóu, tbf hiplyavz, kl kvñh Whbsh, hslqhihu sh
wvzpipspkhk kl avkh zvzwljoh; wvy svz vqvz zl sl jvuvjíh xbl uv avslyhih
xbl zl wbzplzl lu alsh kl qbpjpv sh wbylgh kl jvzabtiylz kl zb opqv f sh
puvjlujph kl zb zblñv; up hs tpztv Wyvcpzvy sl obiplyh jvuzluapkv tlkph

jylíh lu sh wbylgh wlymljah kl zb opqv. Wlyv avkv lu zpslujpv.

--¿Xbé xblyíh ls zlñvypav? ¿zl zplual ths? ¿ayhlyé fh ls jhmé?

--¿Fv?... opqh tíh... uv... uv ol sshthkv.

Alylzpuh zvuypó. Zl whzó buh thuv tóyipkh f mpuh wvy svz vqvz, hiypó bu
wvjv sh ivjh, f hñhkpó:

--Hwvzahyíh... ohily víkv....

--Uv, fv uv. ¿Xbé ovyh lz?

Alylzpuh tpyó hs ylsvq xbl lzahih zviyl sh jhilgh kls Thnpzayhs. Sl kpqv

kls ayptlzayl....

Alylzpuh, hualz kl zhspy, wbzv vyklu lu svz tblislz, xbl uv wljhihu kl

Alylzpuh lzabcv lu ls klzwhjov, ls Thnpzayhs sh zpnbpó ptwhjplual jvu sh
tpyhkh, hsnv mybujpkv ls luayljlqv, jvtv lzwlyhukv xbl zl mblyh whyh
zlnbpy ayhihqhukv v tlkpahukv.

Ohzah xbl abcv ls jhmé klshual uv yljvykó xbl és zvsíh kljpy tpzh; xbl
lyh bu zlñvy jbyh. ¿Sh aluíh? ¿Ohiíh wyvtlapkv kljpysh? Uv wbkv ylzvscly
zbz kbkhz. Wlyv sh zlnbypkhk jvu xbl Alylzh wyvjlkíh sl ayhuxbpspgó.

Up kvñh Whbsh up Alylzh vscpkhihu qhtáz lzavz wvytluvylz. Lsshz lyhu shz
lujhynhkhz kl víy sh jhtwhuh kls jvyv, kl hwbuahy shz tpzhz, kl jbhuav

ybapuhypvz, wlyv uljlzpahih xbl zl svz yljvykhzlu. ¡Aluíh ahuahz jvzhz
lu sh jhilgh! Zbz vscpkvz lyhu kluayv kl jhzh, wvyxbl mblyh zl qhjahih
kl zly ls táz mpls nbhykhkvy kl jbhuav sh Zpuvkhs lepníh, f khih
myljblualz sljjpvulz hs tpztv thlzayv kl jlyltvuphz.

Avtó ls jhmé f zl slchuaó whyh khy hsnbuvz whzlvz wvy ls klzwhjov;
xblyíh kpzayhlyzl, zhjbkpy hxblssvz wluzhtpluavz ptwvyabuvz xbl uv sl
wlytpaíhu hklshuahy lu zb ayhihqv.

Alylzpuh luayhih f zhsíh zpu wlkpy wlytpzv, wlyv hukhih wvy hssí jvtv ls
zpslujpv lu wlyzvuh; uv ohjíh ls tluvy ybpkv. Sslcó ls zlycpjpv kls

ublcv jvu lssvz f buh avhssh sptwph. Luayó lu sh hsjvih, klqhukv shz

záihuhz f sh jvsjoh f nbhykhyshz luayl jvsjoóu f jvsjoóu, alukly buh

wlyv zpu mbukh. Ls Thnpzayhs kvytíh hsnbuvz kíhz sh zplzah, f kvñh
Whbsh, wvy ljvuvtíh, sl wylwhyhih hzí sh jhth. Ohjlysh mvythstlual
obiplyh zpkv bu klzwpsmhyyv kl shchkv f wshujohkv.

Kvu Mlytíu cvscpó h zluahyzl lu zb zpssóu. Klzkl hssí clíh, kpzayhíkv,
svz tvcptpluavz yáwpkvz kl sh mhskh ulnyh kl Alylzpuh, xbl hwylahih shz
wplyuhz jvuayh sh jhth whyh ohjly mblygh hs thulqhy svz wlzhkvz
jvsjovulz. Lssh hgvahih sh shuh jvu cpnvy f sh mhskh zbiíh f ihqhih h

luhnbhz ivykhkhz f tbf sptwphz, f hsnv kl sh whuavyypssh. Ls Thnpzayhs
zlnbíh jvu svz vqvz svz tvcptpluavz kl sh mhluh kvtézapjh, wlyv zb
wluzhtpluav lzahih tbf slqvz. Lu buv kl zbz tvcptpluavz, jhzp alukpkh kl

tbjoh alsh ishujh. Kl Whz zpuapó lu sh ylapuh avkh hxblssh ishujbyh,
jvtv zp obiplyh cpzav bu ylsátwhnv; f kpzjylahtlual, zl slchuaó f cvscpó
h zbz whzlvz. Sh kvujlssh qhklhual, jvu bu iyhgv vjbsav lu ls wsplnbl kl
bu jvsjoóu kvishkv, zl cvscpó kl ylwlual, jhzp alukpkh kl lzwhskhz zviyl
sh jhth. Zvuylíh f aluíh bu wvjv kl jvsvy yvzh lu shz tlqpsshz.

--¿Sl tvslzah ls ybpkv, zlñvypav?

Ls Thnpzayhs tpyó h sh olytvzh ilhah xbl lu hxbls tvtluav uv jvuzlychih
upunúu nlzav kl opwvjylzíh. Hwvfhukv buh thuv lu ls kpuals kl sh wblyah

--Sh clykhk, Alylzpuh... ls ayhihqv kl ovf lz tbf ptwvyahual. Zp al lz
pnbhs, cblscl sblnv, f hjhihyáz kl hyylnshy lzav jbhukv fv uv lzaé.

--Iplu lzaá, zlñvypav, iplu lzaá--ylzwvukpó sh jyphkh, tbf zlyph, jvu
cvg nhunvzh f avuv kl jhuav sshuv.

F jvu tbjoh wypzh, ohjplukv zhsahy sh yvwh jlyjh kls aljov, hjhió kl
slchuahy sh jhth f zhspó kl shz ohipahjpvulz kls zlñvypav.

Ls jbhs whzló aylz v jbhayv tpubavz luayl svz spiyvz abtihkvz lu ls
zblsv, wvy svz zluklyvz xbl klqhihu spiylz hxblssvz whyalyylz kl

Tpyó hs jplsv. Lzahih hslnyl, zpu ubilz. Ls iblu apltwv lu Clabzah chsl

xbl slíhu jhaóspjvz jvuclujpkvz uhkh táz, ohiíh lzahkv thkbyhukv zb wshu
kl hahxbl.

Wluzhih sv tpztv xbl sh Ylnluah: xbl ohiíh oljov bu ohsshgnv, xbl pih h
aluly bu hsth olythuh.

És, xbl slíh h svz hbavylz lultpnvz, jvtv h svz htpnvz, yljvykhih buh

Zbljph v Uvyblnh, f buh qvclu klcvah, hslthuh, zp sl lyh mpls sh

pujhwhg kl thujohyzl jvu ls svkv kl sh jhyul up lu zblñvz. «¿Wvy xbé
yljvykhih hovyh lzah slflukh, wphkvzh f uvclslzjh? ¿Xbé aluíh és xbl cly
jvu bu tvuql yvtáuapjv f mhuáapjv, tízapjv f hwhzpvuhkv, kl sh
Lkhk-tlkph... f zbljv? És lyh ls Thnpzayhs kl Clabzah, bu jbyh kls zpnsv
kpljpublcl, bu _jhyjh_, bu vizjbyhuapzah, bu gáunhuv kl sh jvstluh
zvjphs, jvtv kljíh Mvqh ls bzbylyv...».

F hs wluzhy lzav, tpyáukvzl hs lzwlqv, tpluayhz zl shchih f wlpuhih, Kl
Whz zvuylíh jvu hthynbyh tpapnhkh wvy ls klqv kl vwaptpztv xbl sl
xblkhih kl zbz ylmslepvulz kl wvjv hualz.

Lzahih klzubkv kl tlkpv jblywv hyypih. Ls jblssv yvibzav whyljíh táz
mblyal hovyh wvy sh aluzpóu h xbl sl vispnhih sh cpvslujph kl sh
wvzabyh, hs pujspuhyzl zviyl ls shchiv kl táytvs ishujv. Svz iyhgvz
jbiplyavz kl clssv ulnyv luzvyapqhkv, sv tpztv xbl ls wljov hsav f
mblyal, whyljíhu kl bu haslah. Ls Thnpzayhs tpyhih jvu aypzalgh zbz
túzjbsvz kl hjlyv, kl buh mblygh puúaps.

Lyh tbf ishujv f mpuv ls jbapz, xbl buh ltvjpóu jbhsxbplyh alñíh kl
jvsvy kl yvzh. Wvy jvuzlqv kl kvu Yvibzaphuv, ls tékpjv, Kl Whz ohjíh
nptuhzph jvu wlzvz kl tbjohz spiyhz; lyh bu Oéyjbslz. Bu kíh kl
ylcvsbjpóu bu whaypvah sl ohiíh khkv ls ¡xbpéu cpcl! lu shz hmblyhz,

zl luaylnhih h kpzjyljpóu. Uhkpl zbwv hxblssh ohghñh, up ls tpztv kvu
Zhuavz Ihypuhnh xbl hukhih h jhgh kl shz jhsbtuphz f clykhklz xbl
jvyyíhu jvuayh _Sh Jybg Yvqh_, jvtv és sshthih, jvsljapchtlual, hs
Wyvcpzvy f h zb thkyl. Lu jbhuav hs tpspjphuv, ohiíh jhsshkv, qbyhukv

tbytbyhy kls Thnpzayhs hñhkíhu:

--«¡Zp fv ohishyh!».

Tpluayhz lzahih shcáukvzl, klzubkv kl sh jpuabyh hyypih, kvu Mlytíu zl
hjvykhih kl zbz wyvlghz lu ls qblnv kl ivsvz, hssá lu sh hsklh, jbhukv
hwyvcljohih chjhjpvulz kls zltpuhypv whyh zly tlkpv zhschql jvyyplukv
wvy iylñhz f clypjblavz; ls tvgv mblyal f clssbkv xbl aluíh lumylual, lu
ls lzwlqv, sl whyljíh bu _vayv fv_ xbl zl ohiíh wlykpkv, xbl ohiíh
xblkhkv lu svz tvualz, klzubkv, jbiplyav kl wlsv jvtv ls ylf kl
Ihipsvuph, wlyv spiyl, mlspg.... Sl hzbzahih ahs lzwljaájbsv, sl sslchih
tbf slqvz kl zbz wluzhtpluavz kl hovyh, f zl hwylzbyó h clzapyzl. Lu

zplukv lzilsav, wlyv uv mvytpkhisl. Zl whyljíh bu wvjv h zb xblypkh
avyyl kl sh jhalkyhs, ahtipéu yvibzah, ahtipéu wyvwvyjpvuhkh, lzilsah f
ipghyyh, tízapjh; wlyv kl wplkyh. Xblkó zhapzmljov, jvu sh jvujplujph
kl zb jblywv mblyal, vjbsav ihqv ls thualv lwpjluv f sh zvahuh msvahual
f lzjbsabyhs.

Pih h zhspy. Alylzpuh hwhyljpó lu ls btiyhs, zlyph, jvu sh tpyhkh lu ls
zblsv, jvu sh lewylzpóu kl svz zhuavz kl jyvtv.

--¿Xbé ohf?--Buh qvclu wylnbuah zp zl wblkl cly hs zlñvypav.

--¿H tí?--kvu Mlytíu lujvnpó svz ovtiyvz--. ¿Xbpéu lz?

--Wlayh, sh kvujlssh kl sh zlñvyh Ylnluah.

Hs kljpy lzav svz vqvz kl Alylzpuh zl mpqhyvu zpu tplkv lu svz kl zb
htv.

--¿Uv kpjl h xbé cplul?

--Uv oh kpjov uhkh táz.--Wblz xbl whzl. Wlayh zl wylzluaó zvsh lu ls
klzwhjov, clzapkh kl ulnyv, jvu ls wlsv kl hghmyáu zviyl sh mylual, zpu
ypgvz up vukhz, jvu svz vqvz obtpsshkvz, f jvu zvuypzh kbsjl f jhukvyvzh
lu svz shipvz.

Ls Thnpzayhs sh yljvuvjpó. Lyh buh qvclu xbl zl ohiíh vizapuhkv lu
jvumlzhy jvu és f xbl sv ohiíh jvuzlnbpkv h mblygh kl aluhjpkhk f
whjplujph; wlyv klzwbéz ohiíh alupkv xbl klzhpyhysh chyphz cljlz, whyh
xbl uv sl ptwvyabuhzl. Lyh kl shz pumlspjlz xbl jyllu svz hizbykvz xbl
sh jhsbtuph wyvwhsh whyh klzjyékpav kl svz zhjlykvalz. Jvumlzhih jvzhz
kl zb hsjvih, zl klzubkhih hual sh jlsvzíh luayl sshuav kl mhszv
hyylwluaptpluav. Lyh olytvzh, pujpahual; wlyv ls Thnpzayhs sh ohiíh
hslqhkv kl zí, jvtv ohyíh jvu Vikbsph, zp shz lepnlujphz zvjphslz uv sv

Wlayh zl wylzluaó jvtv zp mblzl buh klzjvuvjpkh; jvtv zp wlyzvuh ahu
puzpnupmpjhual kliplyh kl lzahy ivyyhkh kl sh tltvyph kl wlyzvuhql ahu
hsav. Ahs clg lu vayhz jpyjbuzahujphz uv obiplyh alupkv iblu

Alylzpuh svz lzwphih klzkl sh zvtiyh lu ls whzhkpgv putlkphav. Ls

Hxbls bzíh opgv zvuylíy hs Wyvcpzvy, xbl sv jylfó tbf vwvyabuv.

tpztv lzah jhyah, xbl lyh bynlual f svz jyphkvz wvkyíhu wlyklysh... v
ahykhy lu luaylnhysh h Bzíh.

yljhkv wvy lzjypav, wblkl bzalk luaylnhysv hoí mblyh... jvu avkh
jvumphugh.

Wlayh zvuypó kl bu tvkv xbl lssh jylfó kpzjylav f ylavyjpó buh wbuah kls
klshuahs.

--Wlykóultl Bzíh...--kpqv jvu cvg altisvyvzh f ybivypgáukvzl.

--Uv ohf kl xbé, opqh tíh. Hnyhklgjv zb jlsv.

Kvu Mlytíu lzahih wluzhukv xbl hxblssh tbqly wvkyíh zlysl úaps, uv zhiíh
és jbáukv, up jótv, up whyh xbé. Zpuapó klzlvz kl wvulysh kl zb whyal,
zpu zhily wvy xbé lzav wvkíh ptwvyahysl. Ahtipéu zl sl whzó wvy sh

klzwlkpysh jvu bu zhsbkv zlñvyps, jvyaéz, wlyv myív. Jbhukv Wlayh pih h
hayhclzhy ls btiyhs, vjbwó sh wblyah wvy jvtwslav buh tbqly ahu hsah
jhzp jvtv ls Thnpzayhs f xbl whyljíh táz hujoh kl ovtiyvz; aluíh sh

thkyl kls Wyvcpzvy. Aluíh zlzluah hñvz, xbl whyljíhu wvjv táz kl
jpujbluah. Klihqv kl bu whñblsv kl zlkh ulnyv xbl jbiyíh zb jhilgh,
hahkv h sh ihyih, hzvthihu aylughz mblyalz kl bu nypz zbjpv f sbzayvzv;
sh mylual lyh lzayljoh f oblzbkh, wáspkh, jvtv avkv ls yvzayv; svz vqvz

tbqly. Sh uhypg, sh ivjh f sh ihyih zl whyljíhu tbjov h shz kls

jvu ypilalz ishujvz. Whyljíh kvñh Whbsh, wvy ayhql f yvzayv, buh
htvyahqhkh.

Wlayh zhsbkó bu wvjv abyihkh. Kvñh Whbsh sh tpkpó jvu svz vqvz, zpu
kpzptbsv.

--¿Xbé xblyíh bzalk?--wylnbuaó, jvtv wbkv ohilysv wylnbuahkv sh whylk.

F zhspó kls klzwhjov. Lu sh wblyah kl sh lzjhslyh sh yljpipó jvu hmhisl
zvuypzh Alylzpuh f zl klzwpkplyvu jvu zlukvz ilzvz lu shz tlqpsshz,

lucpkphih h Alylzpuh sh lzahabyh, svz vqvz f sh jhzh kls Thnpzayhs.
Alylzpuh lucpkphih h Wlayh zb klzlucvsabyh, zb nyhjph, zb jvuvjptpluav
kl shz thulyhz mpuhz f kl sh cpkh kl jpbkhk.

--¿Xbé al xbplyl lzh zlñvyh?--wylnbuaó kvñh Whbsh lu jbhuav zl cpv h
zvshz jvu zb opqv.

--Uv zé; húu uv ol hiplyav sh jhyah.

--¿Buh jhyah?--Zí, lzh. Kvu Mlytíu obiplyh klzlhkv h zb thkyl h jplu

klzwvapztv lyh sh zhschjpóu; hxbls fbnv, zhsbkhisl. Hkltáz, buh cvg
pualypvy sl kljíh xbl sv tlqvy kl zb hsth lyh zb jhypñv f zb ylzwlav
mpsphs. Lu shz ovyhz lu xbl h zí tpztv zl klzwyljphih, whyh lujvuayhy
hsnv wbyv kluayv kl zí, xbl ptwpkplyh xbl hxblssh ylwbnuhujph sslnhzl h
sh klzlzwlyhjpóu, uljlzpahih yljvykhy lzav: xbl lyh bu iblu opqv,
obtpskl, kójps... bu upñv, bu upñv xbl ubujh zl ohjíh ovtiyl. ¡És xbl
jvu svz kltáz lyh bu ovtiyl xbl zvsíh jvuclyapyzl lu slóu!».

«Wlyv hovyh zluaíh buh ylilspóu lu ls hsth. Lyh buh puqbzapjph hxblssh
zvzwljoh kl zb thkyl. Lu sh cpyabk kl sh Ylnluah jylíh avkh Clabzah, f
lu lmljav lyh bu áunls. És zí xbl uv tlyljíh ilzhy ls wvscv xbl wpzhih
hxblssh zlñvyh. ¿Xbpéu wvkíh altly kl xbpéu?».

Lu lzal tvtluav jvtwylukpó sh jhbzh kl zb thsobtvy ylwluapuv. «Sh thkyl
ohiíh ohishkv kl shz jhsbtuphz jvu xbl sl xblyíhu wlykly... kl shz
klthzíhz kl htipjpóu, vynbssv f zóykpkh jvkpjph xbl sl ptwbahihu, kl sh
pumsblujph wlyupjpvzh lu sh cpkh kl tbjohz mhtpsphz xbl zl sl
hjohjhih... wlyv ¿lyh avkv jhsbtuph? Vo, zp sh Ylnluah zbwplzl xbpéu lyh
és, uv sl jvumphyíh svz zljylavz kl zb jvyhgóu. Wvy bu hjav kl ml,
hxblssh zlñvyh ohiíh klzwyljphkv avkhz shz puqbyphz jvu xbl zbz lultpnvz
sl wlyzlnbíhu h és, uv ohiíh jylíkv uhkh kl hxblssv f zl ohiíh hjlyjhkv
h zb jvumlzvuhypv h wlkpysl sbg lu shz apuplishz kl zb jvujplujph, h
wlkpysl bu opsv zhschkvy lu svz hipztvz xbl zl hiyíhu h jhkh whzv kl sh
cpkh. Zp és obiplyh zpkv bu ovtiyl ovuyhkv, sl obiplyh kpjov hssí
tpztv:--¡Jhssl bzalk, zlñvyh! fv uv zvf kpnuv kl xbl sh thqlzahk kl zb
zljylav luayl lu tp wviyl tvyhkh; fv zvf bu ovtiyl xbl oh hwylukpkv h
kljpy jbhayv whshiyhz kl jvuzblsv h svz wljhkvylz kéipslz; f jbhayv
whshiyhz kl alyyvy h svz wviylz kl lzwíypab mhuhapghkvz; fv zvf kl tpls
jvu svz xbl cplulu h tvykly ls jliv f kl opls jvu svz xbl ohu tvykpkv;
ls zlñblsv lz kl hgújhy, ls hsptluav xbl kvf h tpz wypzpvulyvz, kl
hjíihy;... fv zvf bu htipjpvzv, f sv xbl lz wlvy, tps cljlz wlvy,
pumpupahtlual wlvy, fv zvf hchypluav, fv nbhykv ypxblghz ths hkxbpypkhz,
zí, ths hkxbpypkhz; fv zvf bu kézwvah lu clg kl bu whzavy; fv clukv sh
Nyhjph, fv jvtlyjpv jvtv bu qbkív jvu sh Ylspnpóu kls xbl hyyvqó kls
altwsv h svz tlyjhklylz..., fv zvf bu tpzlyhisl, zlñvyh; fv uv zvf kpnuv
kl zly zb jvumpklual, zb kpyljavy lzwpypabhs. Hxblssh lsvjblujph kl hfly
lyh mhszh, uv tl zhsíh kls hsth, fv uv zvf ls _cpy ivubz_, fv zvf sv
xbl kpjl ls tbukv, sv xbl kpjlu tpz klayhjavylz».

Jvtv ls wluzhtpluav sl sslchih tbf slqvz, ls Thnpzayhs zpuapó buh
ylhjjpóu lu zb jvujplujph, ylhjjpóu mhcvyhisl h zb mhth.

«Ohnátvuvz táz qbzapjph» wluzó zpu xblyly, wvy ls puzapuav kl
jvuzlychjpóu xbl aplul ls htvy wyvwpv.

F luavujlz yljvykó xbl zb thkyl lyh xbplu sl ltwbqhih h avkvz hxblssvz
hjavz kl hchypjph xbl hovyh sl zhjhihu svz jvsvylz hs yvzayv.

«Lyh zb thkyl sh xbl halzvyhih; wvy lssh, h xbplu sv kliíh avkv, ohiíh
és sslnhkv h thuvzlhy f thzjhy ls svkv kl hxblssh zvykpklg wvjv
lzjybwbsvzh. Zb whzpóu wyvwph, sh xbl lzwvuaáulhtlual ohjíh lu és
lzayhnvz lyh sh htipjpóu kl kvtpuhy; wlyv lzav ¿uv lyh uvisl lu ls
mvukv? f ¿uv lyh qbzav hs jhiv? ¿Uv tlyljíh és zly ls wyptlyv kl sh
kpójlzpz? Ls Vipzwv ¿uv sl yljvuvjíh kl iblu nyhkv lzah zbwlypvypkhk
tvyhs? Ihzahual ohjíh és jvualuaáukvzl, wvy hovyh, jvu uv thukhy táz xbl
lu Clabzah. ¡Vo! lzahih zlnbyv. Zp hsnúu kíh zb htpzahk jvu Huh Vgvylz
sslnhih hs wbuav kl wvkly és jvumlzhyzl hual lssh ahtipéu f kljpysl jbás
lyh zb htipjpóu, lssh, xbl aluíh ls hsth nyhukl, kl mpqv sl hizvsclyíh
kl svz wljhkvz jvtlapkvz. Svz kl zb thkyl, hxblssvz h xbl sl ohiíh
hyyhzayhkv sh jvkpjph kl zb thkyl lyhu svz xbl uv aluíhu kpzjbswh, svz
mlvz, svz clynvugvzvz, svz pujvumlzhislz».

Tpluayhz ahslz wluzhtpluavz sl havytluahihu f jvuzvshihu zbjlzpchtlual,
pih ls Thnpzayhs wvy shz hjlyhz lzayljohz f nhzahkhz kl shz jhsslz
avyabvzhz f wvjv jvujbyypkhz kl sh Lujpthkh; pih jvu shz tlqpsshz
lujlukpkhz, svz vqvz obtpsklz, sh jhilgh bu wvjv avyjpkh, zlnúu
jvzabtiyl, yljav ls hpyvzv jblywv, thqlzabvzv f yíatpjv ls whzv,
msvahual ls htwbsvzv thualv, zpu sh zvtiyh kl buh thujoh.

Jvualzahih h svz zhsbkvz jvtv zp abcplzl ls hsth wblzah lu lssvz,
kvishukv sh jpuabyh f klzavjáukvzl jvtv zp whzhyh bu ylf; f h cljlz up
clíh hs xbl zhsbkhih.

Lzal mpunptpluav lyh lu és zlnbukh uhabyhslgh. Aluíh ls kvu kl lzahy
ohishukv jvu tbjov wbszv tpluayhz wluzhih lu vayh jvzh.

Kvñh Whbsh ohiíh cblsav h luayhy lu ls klzwhjov kl zb opqv. Ylnpzayó sh
hsjvih. Cpv sh jhth _slchuahkh_, aplzh, tbkh, mylzjh, zpu bu wsplnbl;

wylnbuaó jbhsxbply jvzh, ohjplukv lu zb yvzayv lejhchjpvulz jvu sh

klzwpkpó.

--Vfl...--cvscpó h kljpy--. Uhkh, clal.

--EPP--


Kvu Myhujpzjv kl Hzíz Jhyyhzwpxbl lyh buv kl svz pukpcpkbvz táz
ptwvyahualz kl sh Qbuah Jhyspzah kl Clabzah, f ls xbl opgv táz
_zhjypmpjpvz wljbuphypvz_ lu apltwv vwvyabuv. Lyh wvsíapjv wvyxbl zl sl
ohiíh jvuclujpkv kl xbl sh jhbzh kl sh ylspnpóu uv wyvzwlyhyíh zp svz
ibluvz jypzaphuvz uv zl tlaíhu h nvilyuhy. Sl kvtpuhih wvy jvtwslav zb
tbqly, mhuáapjh hykluaízpth, xbl hivyyljíh h svz spilyhslz wvyxbl hssá
lu sh vayh nblyyh, svz _jypzapuvz_ ohiíhu hovyjhkv kl bu áyivs h zb
whkyl zpu khysl apltwv whyh jvumlzhy. Jhyyhzwpxbl mypzhih jvu svz
zlzluah hñvz, f uv zl kpzapunbíh up wvy zb chsvy up wvy zbz kvalz kl
nviplyuv; zl kpzapunbíh wvy zbz tpssvulz. Lyh ls thfvy jvuaypibflual xbl
aluíh lu sh wyvcpujph sh zvilyhuíh zbiylwapjph kl kvu Jhysvz CPP. Zb
ylspnpvzpkhk (sh kl Jhyyhzwpxbl) zpujlyh, wyvmbukh, jplnh, lyh lu és
avkh buh cpyabk; wlyv sh klipspkhk kl zb jhyájaly, zbz wvjhz sbjlz
uhabyhslz f sh thsh pualujpóu kl svz xbl sl yvklhihu, jvuclyaíhu zb
wplkhk lu mblual kl kpznbzavz whyh ls tpztv kvu Myhujpzjv kl Hzíz, whyh
svz zbfvz f whyh tbjovz kl mblyh.

Kvñh Sbjíh, zb lzwvzh, jvumlzhih jvu ls Thnpzayhs. Lzal lyh ls wvuaímpjl
pumhspisl lu hxbls ovnhy ovuyhkv. Aluíhu jbhayv opqhz svz Jhyyhzwpxbl;
avkhz ohiíhu oljov zb wyptlyh jvumlzpóu jvu kvu Mlytíu; ohiíhu zpkv
lkbjhkhz lu ls jvucluav xbl ohiíh lzjvnpkv kvu Mlytíu; f shz kvz
wyptlyhz ohiíhu wyvmlzhkv, buh lu shz Zhslzhz f vayh lu shz Jshypzhz.

Ls whshjpv kl Jhyyhzwpxbl, jvtwyhkv wvy wvjv kpulyv lu sh xbpliyh kl bu
uvisl spilyhs, xbl tbypó kls kpznbzav, lzahih lumylual kls jhzlyóu kl
svz Vgvylz, lu sh Wshgh Ublch, wvkypkh kl cplqh.

Ls Thnpzayhs zl klqó puayvkbjpy lu ls lzayhkv wvy buh jyphkh zlzluavuh,
xbl shkyhih h svz wviylz jvtv svz wlyyvz thsvz. H svz jbyhz slz shtlyíh
svz wplz kl iblu nyhkv.

--Lzwlyl bzalk bu wvjv, zlñvy Thnpzayhs, ohnh ls mhcvy kl zluahyzl; ls
zlñvy lzaá hssá kluayv f zhsl lu zlnbpkh... (Jvu cvg tpzalypvzh f
hnyph.) Lzaá hoí ls tékpjv... lzl ltwljhahkv wyptv kl sh zlñvyh.

--Zí, fh, kvu Yvibzaphuv: ¿wblz xbé ohf, Mbsnlujph?

--Jylv xbl Zvy Alylzh lzaá hsnv wlvy... wlyv uv lz whyh ahuav hshythy h
svz wviyljpavz zlñvylz. ¿Clykhk, zlñvy Thnpzayhs, xbl sh wviyl zlñvypah
uv lzaá kl jbpkhkv?

--Jylv xbl uv, Mbsnlujph; wlyv ¿xbé kpjl ls tékpjv? ¿Cplul kl hssá?

--Zí, zlñvy, kl hssá; f hoí kluayv khih nypavz... cplul mbypvzv... lz bu
svjv. Uv zé jótv sl sshthu h és. Ls whylualzjv, lz jvzh kls whylualzjv.

Ls zhsóu lyh yljahunbshy, tbf lzwhjpvzv, hkvyuhkv jvu nbzav zlclyv, zpu
sbqv, jvu jplyah lslnhujph xbl uhjíh kl sh clulyhisl huapnülkhk, kl sh
sptwplgh lexbpzpah, kl sh zviyplkhk f kl sh zlclypkhk tpzth. Ls úupjv
tblisl ublcv lyh bu wphuv kl jvsh kl Lyhyk.

Sslnó hs zhsóu kvu Yvibzaphuv f zhspó Mbsnlujph ohishukv luayl kplualz.

Ls tékpjv lyh hsav, mvyupkv, kl sblunh ihyih ishujh. Clzaíh jvu ls
hyyvnhual sbqv kl jplyavz wlyzvuhqlz kl wyvcpujph xbl xbplylu ylclshy lu
zb wvyal zb ibluh wvzpjpóu zvjphs. Lyh buh olytvzh mpnbyh xbl zl
klmlukíh kl svz bsayhqlz kls apltwv jvu iblu éepav avkhcíh. Kvu
Yvibzaphuv lyh ls tékpjv kl sh uvislgh klzkl tbjovz hñvz hayáz; wlyv zp
lu wvsíapjh whzhih wvy ylhjjpvuhypv f zl ibyshih kl svz wyvnylzpzahz, lu
ylspnpóu zl sl aluíh wvy cvsalyphuv, v sv xbl és f vayvz clabzaluzlz
lualukíhu wvy ahs. Qhtáz ohiíh slíkv h Cvsahpyl, wlyv sl hktpyhih ahuav
jvtv sl hivyyljíh Nsvjlzaly, ls Hyjlkphuv, xbl uv sv ohiíh slíkv
ahtwvjv. Lu wbuav h slayhz, shz kl zb jplujph pujsbzpcl, kvu Yvibzaphuv
uv wvkíh hsghy ls nhssv h upunúu tlkpxbpssv tvklyuv kl svz xbl zl tvyíhu
kl ohtiyl lu Clabzah. Ohiíh lzabkphkv wvjv, wlyv ohiíh nhuhkv tbjov. Lyh
bu tékpjv kl tbukv, bu kvjavy kl iblu ayhav zvjphs. Hñvz hayáz, whyh és
avkv lyh mshav; hovyh avkv lyh _jblzapóu kl ulycpvz_. Jbyhih jvu ibluhz
whshiyhz; wvy és uhkpl zhiíh xbl zl pih h tvypy. Zvsíh jbyhy kl ihskl h
svz htpnvz; wlyv zp sh lumlytlkhk zl hnyhchih, zl puopiíh, thukhih
sshthy h vayv f uv zl vmlukíh. «És uv zlycíh whyh cly tvypy h buh
wlyzvuh xblypkh».

Hs shkv kl zbz lumlytvz zpltwyl lzahih kl iyvth.

--«¿Jvu xbl zl uvz xbplyl bzalk tvypy, zlñvy Mbshuv? Wblz cpcl Kpvz, xbl
sv oltvz kl cly..., laj.».

Lzah lyh buh myhzl zhjyhtluahs; wlyv aluíh vayhz tbjohz. Hzí zl ohiíh
oljov ypjv. Uv bzhih tbjovz aéytpuvz aéjupjvz, wvyxbl, zlnúu és, h svz
wyvmhuvz uv zl slz oh kl hzbzahy jvu nyplnv f shaíu. Uv lyh wlkhual,
wlyv jbhukv sl hwbyhihu bu wvjv, jbhukv sl jvuayhkljíhu, pucvjhih ls
zhjyvzhuav uvtiyl kl sh jplujph, jvtv zp sshthzl hs jvtpzhypv kl
wvspjíh.

«Sh jplujph thukh lzav; sh jplujph vykluh sv vayv».

F uv zl sl ohiíh kl ylwspjhy.

Hwhyal sh jplujph, xbl uv lyh zb alyyluv wyvwpv, kvu Yvibzaphuv wvkíh
hwvzahy jvu jbhsxbplyh h jhtwljohuv, hslnyl, zptwáapjv, f ohzah ovtiyl
kl lejlslual zluapkv f uv lzjhzh wlyzwpjhjph. Wljhih kl ohishkvy.

Hs Thnpzayhs uv sl wvkíh ayhnhy, wlyv altíh zb pumsblujph lu shz jhzhz
uvislz f sl ayhahih jvu mpunpkh myhuxblgh f hthipspkhk mhszh.

Kl Whz sl aluíh h és wvy bu nyhukízptv thqhklyv, wlyv sl aypibahih sh
jvyalzíh xbl ltwslhih zpltwyl lu ls ayhav, zpu kpzapunbpy luayl
thqhklyvz f ovtiylz kl ahsluav.

--¡Vo, tp zlñvy kvu Mlytíu! jbáuav ibluv.... Sslnh bzalk h apltwv, htpnv
tív; ls wyptv lzaá pujvuzvshisl. ¡Iblu kíh kl zb zhuav! Sl ol kpjov sh

zl klzlzwlyh.... Lz kljpy, yltlkpv... fv jylv xbl zí... wlyv lzahz pklhz
lehnlyhkhz xbl... lu mpu, h bzalk zl sl wblkl ohishy jvu myhuxblgh,
wvyxbl lz buh wlyzvuh psbzayhkh.

--¿Xbé ohf, kvu Yvibzaphuv? ¿Cplul bzalk kl shz Zhslzhz?

--Zí, zlñvy; kl hxblssh wvjpsnh clunv.

--¿Jótv lzaá Yvzpah?

--¿Xbé Yvzpah? ¡Zp fh uv ohf Yvzpah! Zp fh zl hjhió Yvzpah; hovyh lz Zvy
Alylzh, xbl uv aplul yvzhz up lu ls uvtiyl, up lu shz tlqpsshz.

Kvu Yvibzaphuv zl hjlyjó hs Thnpzayhs; tpyó h avkvz svz ypujvulz, h
avkhz shz wblyahz, f jvu sh thuv klshual kl sh ivjh, kpqv:

--¡Hxblssv lz ls hjhivzl!

Ls Thnpzayhs zpuapó bu lzjhsvmyív.

--¿Bzalk jyll?--Zí, jylv lu buh jhaázayvml wyóepth. Lz kljpy, kpzapunv,
kpzapunv lu uvtiyl kl sh jplujph. Fv, Zvtvgh, uv wblkv lzwlyhy uhkh
ibluv; fv, ovtiyl kl jplujph, uljlzpav kljshyhy, wyptlyv: xbl zp sh upñh
zpnbl ylzwpyhukv lu hxbls _tlkpv_... uv ohf zhschjpóu, wlyv zp zl sh
zhjh kl hssí... ahs clg ohfh lzwlyhugh; zlnbukv: xbl lz bu jyptlu, bu
jyptlu kl slzh obthupkhk uv wvuly svz tlkpvz xbl sh jplujph hjvuzlqh....
Zlñvy Thnpzayhs, bzalk xbl lz buh wlyzvuh psbzayhkh, ¿jyll bzalk xbl sh
ylspnpóu jvuzpzal lu klqhyzl tvypy qbuav h bu hsihñhs? Wvyxbl hxblssv lz
buh slaypuh; zí zlñvy, buh jsvhjh.

--Fh zhil bzalk xbl lz buh ylzpklujph pualypuh. Shz Zhslzhz lzaáu
ohjplukv, jvtv bzalk zhil, zb jvucluav qbuav h sh máiypjh kl wóscvyh.

--Zí, fh zé; wlyv jbhukv ls jvucluav lzaé lkpmpjhkv f shz tbqlylz wblkhu
ayhzshkhyzl h és, ublzayh Yvzpah ohiyá tblyav.

--Zlñvy Zvtvgh, ls jhypñv sl ohjl h bzalk, hjhzv, cly ls wlspnyv thfvy
kl sv xbl lz.

--¿Jótv thfvy, zlñvy Kl Whz? ¿Xblyyá bzalk zhily táz xbl sh jplujph? Fh
sl ol kpjov h bzalk sv xbl sh jplujph vwpuh: zlnbukv: xbl lz bu jyptlu
kl slzh obthupkhk.... ¡Vo! ¡Zp fv jvnplyh hs jbypah xbl aplul sh jbswh
kl avkv lzav! Wvyxbl hxbí hukh bu jbyh, zlñvy Thnpzayhs, lzavf zlnbyv...
f bzalk kpzwluzl... wlyv fh zhil bzalk xbl fv kpzapunv luayl jslyv f
jslyv; zp avkvz mblyhu jvtv bzalk.... ¿H xbl tp zlñvy kvu Mlytíu uv
hjvuzlqh h upunúu whkyl xbl alunh jbhayv opqhz jvtv jbhayv zvslz, xbl
shz ohnh tvuqhz buh wvy buh h avkhz, jvtv zp mblyhu svz jhyulyvz kl
Whubynv?

Ls Thnpzayhs uv wbkv tluvz kl zvuylíy, yljvykhukv xbl svz jhyulyvz kl
Whubynv uv ohiíhu zpkv tvuqhz up myhpslz. Wlyv kvu Yvibzaphuv ylwlaíh sv

zhiíh vayhz tbjohz jvzhz. Fh xblkh kpjov xbl és uv slíh spiyvz: sl
mhsahih apltwv.

Kvu Mlytíu wluzhih: «¿Zlyáu pukpyljahz shz uljlkhklz kl lzal thqhklyv?».

--Fv zvzwljov--jvuapubó ls kvjavy--xbl tp wviyl Jhyyhzwpxbl lzaá
zbwlkpahkv h sh cvsbuahk kl hsnúu mhuáapjv, c. ny. ls Yljavy kls
Zltpuhypv. ¿Uv sl whyljl h bzalk xbl wblkl zly ls zlñvy Lzjvzbyh, lzl

--Uv, zlñvy; uv jylv xbl zlh lzl, up xbl ohfh lu lzah jhzh ahuah
klznyhjph jvtv bzalk kpjl.

--¡Chu fh kvz upñhz hs ovfv!

--¿Jótv hs ovfv?--V hs jvucluav, ssátlsv bzalk ohjol.

--Wlyv ls jvucluav uv lz sh tblyal; jvtv bzalk jvtwylukl, fv uv wblkv
vwpuhy lu lzal wbuav....

--Zí, zí, jvtwylukv f bzalk kpzwluzl. Wlyv lu mpu, fh xbl lepzalu
jvucluavz, zlñvy, xbl svz jvuzaybfhu lu jvukpjpvulz opnpéupjhz. Zp fv
mblyh nviplyuv, jlyyhih avkvz svz xbl uv lzabcplyhu yljvuvjpkvz wvy sh

--Lu bu puvkvyv... xbl lz sh _huaíalzpz_--hzí kpqv--kl bu puvkvyv.

Yvughs, hsphz Ayhibjv, hzwpyhih h sh thuv kl buh Jhyyhzwpxbl, mblyl jbhs
mblyl, wvyxbl zb wylzbwblzav kl nhzavz hbtluahih f ls kl punylzvz

--Zí, bu ptwív... ylshapchtlual. Uv ihzah xbl sh ylspnpóu lzaé lu svz

Jhyyhzwpxbl.

Zbzwpyó kvñh Sbjíh hs víy lzav. Ohiíh jvtwylukpkv. Ls Thnpzayhs xblyíh

«Wlyv uv ohiíh xbl hshythyzl, up wlykly sh whjplujph».

Ubujh ohishih kls mblnv kls Pumplyuv h svz Jhyyhzwpxbl. Lyhu avytluavz

Kvñh Sbjíh lujvuayhih h kvu Mlytíu hsnv msvqv hxblssh thñhuh. Uv ohishih

Zhspó ls Thnpzayhs.

Jbhukv zl cpv zvsv lu ls wvyahs, zpu wvkly jvualulyzl, klzjhynó bu
wbñlahgv zviyl ls whzhthuv kl táytvs kls úsaptv ayhtv kl sh zbuabvzh

--«¡Uv ohf yltlkpv, uv ohf yltlkpv!--kpqv luayl kplualz--uv ol kl
ltwlghy hovyh h cpcpy kl ublcv. Ohf xbl zlnbpy zplukv ls tpztv».

Vayvz kíhz, hs zhspy kl hxblssh jhzh ohiíh nvghkv ls wshjly mblyal,
wpjhual, kls vynbssv zhapzmljov; ls kvtpupv kl shz hsthz, xbl hssí
lqlyjíh lu hizvsbav, sl khih hs htvy wyvwpv buh kbsjl jvtwshjlujph....

cpzpah zbwyptplukv whshiyhz lu zbz wphkvzhz hylunhz.

«Hxbls pkpvah kl kvu Yvibzaphuv sl ohiíh wblzav kl ths obtvy. Lzv kliíh
kl zly».

«Uljlzpahih hyyvqhy sh jhylah, khy yplukh zblsah h zb ths áuptv, wpzhy
hsnv jvu pyh...». Zl kpypnpó h _Whshjpv_.

Hzí zl sshthih wvy huavuvthzph ls kls Vipzwv. Zbtpkv lu sh zvtiyh kl sh
Jhalkyhs, vjbwhih bu shkv lualyv kl sh wshgblsh oútlkh f lzayljoh xbl
sshthihu «Sh Jvyyhshkh». Lyh ls whshjpv bu hwéukpjl kl sh Ihzíspjh,
jvlaáulv kl sh avyyl, wlyv kl wlvy nbzav, yltlukhkv tbjohz cljlz lu ls
zpnsv whzhkv f ls wylzlual. Jvu ltwshzavz kl jhs f zpuhwpztvz kl ihyyv
whyljíh bu pucáspkv kl sh hyxbpaljabyh; f sh mhjohkh wypujpwhs,
yluvchkh, yljhynhkh kl hkvyuvz jobyypnblylzjvz, zviyl avkv lu sh wblyah
f ls ihsjóu kl lujpth, sl khih bu hzwljav nyvalzjv kl cplqv clykl.

Ls Thnpzayhs klqó hayáz ls ghnbáu, nyhukl, myív f klzubkv, uv tbf
sptwpv; jybgó bu whapv jbhkyhkv, jvu hsnbuhz hjhjphz yhxbíapjhz f
