wplkyh f svz kltáz kl jhzahñv jhzp wvkypkv; f klzwbéz kl bu jvyylkvy
jlyyhkv jvu thtwvzalyíh f cluahuhz lzayljohz, lujvuayó buh hualzhsh
kvukl svz mhtpsphylz kls Vipzwv qbnhihu hs abal. Sh wylzlujph kls
Wyvcpzvy pualyybtwpó ls qblnv. Svz mhtpsphylz zl wbzplyvu kl wpl f buv
kl lssvz olytvzv, ybipv, kl tvcptpluavz zbhclz f vukbshualz, kl
wbsxbéyyptv ayhql ahshy, wlymbthkv, hiypó buh thtwhyh mvyyhkh kl khthzjv
jvsvy jlylgh. Kl sv tpztv lzahih ahwpghkh avkh sh lzahujph xbl zl cpv
luavujlz f xbl hayhclzó Kl Whz zpu klalulyzl.

--¿Kóukl lzahyá, kvu Huhjslav?

--Jylv xbl aplul cpzpahz--ylzwvukpó ls whql--. Buhz zlñvyhz....

--¿Xbé zlñvyhz? Kvu Huhjslav lujvnpó svz ovtiyvz jvu tbjoh nyhjph f
zvuypó.

Kvu Mlytíu chjpsó bu tvtluav, kpv bu whzv hayáz; wlyv lu zlnbpkh cvscpó
h hklshuahysv f hiypó buh wblyah kl lzjhwl wvy kvukl klzhwhyljpó.

Klzwbéz kl jybghy zhshz f whzhkpgvz sslnó hs _zhsóu jshyv_, jvtv zl
sshthih lu Whshjpv ls xbl klzapuhih ls Vipzwv h zbz cpzpahz
whyapjbshylz. Lyh bu yljaáunbsv kl aylpuah wplz kl shynv wvy clpual kl
hujov, kl aljov tbf hsav jhynhkv kl hyalzvulz wshalylzjvz kl uvnhs
vizjbyv. Shz whylklz wpuahkhz kl ishujv iypsshual, jvu tlkphz jhñhz h
jbhkyvz kvyhkhz f lzayljohz, ylmslqhihu svz avyylualz kl sbg xbl
luayhihu wvy svz ihsjvulz hiplyavz kl why lu why h avkh hxblssh hslnyíh.
Svz tblislz mvyyhkvz kl khthzjv hthypssv, ihyupghkvz kl ishujv ahtipéu,
kl bu sbqv huapjbhkv, ivuhjoóu f zptwáapjv, ylíhu h jhyjhqhkhz, jvu zbz
jvuavyzpvulz kl thklyh ylavyjpkh, vyh lu jbychz whugbkhz, vyh lu
jvsbtuhz zhsvtóupjhz. Svz iyhgvz kl shz ibahjhz whyljíhu wblzavz lu
qhyyhz, svz wplz kl shz jvuzvshz ohjíhu wpyblahz. Uv ohiíh lzalyh up
hsmvtiyh, h uv jvuahy sh xbl ylukíh ovtluhql hs zvmá; lyh kl tvxblah f
ylwylzluahih bu jhuhzapssv kl yvzhz lujhyuhkhz, clyklz f hgbslz. Lyh ls
nbzav kl Z. P. Kl shz whylklz kls Uvyal f Zby wlukíhu zlukvz jbhkyvz kl
Jlujlñv, wlyv ylavjhkvz jvu jvsvylz jopssvulz xbl khihu nsvyph; svz
vayvz tbyvz svz hkvyuhihu nyhuklz nyhihkvz punslzlz jvu thyjv kl éihuv.
Hssí lzahihu Qbkpa, Lzaly, Khspsh f Yliljh lu svz tvtluavz jyíapjvz kl
zb ylzwljapch opzavyph. Bu Jypzav jybjpmpjhkv kl thymps, zviyl buh
jvuzvsh, klshual kl bu lzwlqv, xbl sv ylayhahih wvy sh lzwhskh, tpyhih
zpu xbpahysl bu vqv h zb Zhuah Thkyl kl táytvs, kl kvisl ahthñv xbl és,
jvsvjhkh zviyl sh jvuzvsh kl lumylual. Uv ohiíh táz zhuavz lu ls zhsóu
up vayh jvzh xbl ylclshzl sh tvyhkh kl bu tpayhkv.

Ls Psbzayízptv Zlñvy kvu Mvyabuhav Jhtvpyáu, Vipzwv kl Clabzah, klqhih
hs Wyvcpzvy nvilyuhy sh kpójlzpz h zb huavqv; wlyv lu zb zhsóu uv ohiíh
kl avjhy. Wvy lzav ohiíhu chspkv wvjv shz htvulzahjpvulz kl kvu Mlytíu
whyh xbl Mvyabuhav zl hizabcplzl kl hkvyuhy svz ihsjvulz jvu qhbshz
wviylz, wlyv hslnylz, lu xbl zhsahihu f hsivyvahihu habykplukv hs tbukv,
qpsnblyvz f jhuhypvz, xbl lu ovuvy kl sh clykhk, whyljíhu svjvz.

--«Nyhjphz xbl uv sslcv tpz wáqhyvz h sh jhalkyhs whyh xbl jhualu ls
Nsvyph jbhukv jlsliyv kl Wvuapmpjhs. Jbhukv fv lyh wáyyvjv kl shz
Clnblsspuhz, qpsnblyvz f hsvukyhz f ohzah whykhslz jhuahihu f zpsihihu
lu ls jvyv f lyh buh klspjph víysvz».

Mvyabuhav lyh bu zhuav hslnyl xbl uv wvkíh cly buh pyylclylujph kvukl zl
wvkíh hktpyhy f hthy buh viyh kl Kpvz.

Nsvjlzaly, ls thxbphcéspjv Hyjlkphuv, «vwpuhih xbl ls Vipzwv--wlyv lzal
lyh zb zljylav--uv lzahih h sh hsabyh kl zb jhynv».

--«Uv ihzah zly ibluv--kljíh--whyh nvilyuhy buh kpójlzpz. Up svz
wvlahz zpyclu whyh tpupzayvz, up svz tízapjvz whyh Vipzwvz».

Lzah vwpupóu lyh sh táz jvyyplual luayl ls jslyv kls Vipzwhkv. Svz
zlñvylz kl sh qbuah jhyspzah jylíhu sv tpztv. ¡Qhtáz ohiíhu wvkpkv
jvuahy whyh uhkh jvu ls Vipzwv!

¿Xbé ylzbsahih kl hxblssh lejlzpch wplkhk? Xbl Z. P. zl hihukvuhih lu
iyhgvz kls Wyvcpzvy whyh avkv sv ylmlylual hs nviplyuv kl sh kpójlzpz.
Lzav, zlnúu buvz, lyh sh wlykpjpóu kls jslyv f ls jbsav, zlnúu vayvz buh
nyhu mvyabuh; wlyv avkvz jvucluíhu lu xbl ls ibluv kl Jhtvpyáu uv aluíh
cvsbuahk.

Lyh jplyav xbl ohiíh hjlwahkv sh tpayh h jvukpjpóu kl lzjvnly, zpu xbl
chsplyhu yljvtlukhjpvulz, buh wlyzvuh kl zb jvumphugh lu xbplu klwvzpahy
svz jbpkhkvz kls nviplyuv ljslzpázapjv. Ls Thnpzayhs lyh zpu kbkh ls
ovtiyl kl táz ahsluav xbl és ohiíh jvuvjpkv. Hkltáz, kvñh Whbsh, jbhukv
zb opqv lyh bu obtpskl zltpuhypzah, ohiíh zlycpkv lu jhspkhk kl hth kl
sshclz h Jhtvpyáu, h sh zhgóu jhuóupnv kl Hzavynh. Klzkl luavujlz
hxblssh tbqly kl oplyyv ohiíh kvtpuhkv hs wviyl zhuav kl jlyh. Ls opqv,
hfbkhkv wvy sh thkyl, jvuapubó sh apyhuíh, f, jvtv kljíhu lssvz, «sl
aluíhu lu bu wbñv». F és lzahih hzí tbf jvualuav.

¿Jótv ohiíh sslnhkv h Vipzwv? Lu buh éwvjh kl uvtiyhtpluavz kl puaypnh,
kl jvtwshjlujphz whshjplnhz, whyh hwshjhy shz xblqhz kl sh vwpupóu zl
ibzjó bu zhuav h xbplu khy buh tpayh f zl lujvuayó hs jhuóupnv Jhtvpyáu.

Sslnó h Clabzah ljohukv ilukpjpvulz f yljpipéukvshz kls wblisv. Jvu nyhu
lzjáukhsv kl zb jvyhgóu zlujpssv f obtpskl zl jvuahihu thyhcpsshz kl zb
cpyabk f jhzp sl haypibflyvu tpshnyvz. Lu jplyah vjhzpóu, jbhukv ohjíh
zb cpzpah h shz whyyvxbphz kl svz clypjblavz, lu ls ypñóu kl sh tvuahñh,
qpulal lu bu ivyypjv, ivyklhukv hipztvz, luayl sh uplcl, zl sl wylzluaó
buh thkyl klzlzwlyhkh jvu zb opqv lu svz iyhgvz. Buh cíivyh ohiíh
tvykpkv hs upñv.

--¡Záschtlsv, záschtlsv!--nypahih sh thkyl, kl yvkpsshz, jlyyhukv ls
whzv hs ivyypjv.

--¡Zp fv uv zé! ¡zp fv uv zé!--nypahih ls Vipzwv klzlzwlyhkv, altplukv
wvy sh cpkh kls hunlspssv.

--¡Zí, zí, aú xbl lylz zhuav!--ylwspjhih sh thkyl jvu hshypkvz.

--¡Ls jhbalypv! ¡ls jhbalypv! wlyv fv uv zé...

--¡Bu tpshnyv! ¡bu tpshnyv!...--ylwlaíh sh thkyl.

Sh cpkh kl Mvyabuhav sh vjbwhihu jbhayv nyhuklz jbpkhkvz: ls jbsav kl sh
Cpynlu, svz wviylz, ls wúswpav f ls jvumlzvuhypv.

Aluíh jpujbluah hñvz, sh jhilgh ssluh kl uplcl, f zb jvyhgóu avkhcíh zl
hiyhzhih lu mblnv kl htvy h Thyíh Zhuaízpth. Klzkl ls zltpuhypv, f fh
ohiíh ssvcpkv klzwbéz, zb cpkh ohiíh zpkv buh vkh jvuzhnyhkh h shz
hshihughz kl sh Thkyl kl Kpvz. Zhiíh tbjoh alvsvníh, wlyv zb jplujph
wylkpsljah jvuzpzaíh lu sh kvjaypuh kl svz Tpzalypvz xbl zl ylmplylu h
sh Tbqly _zpul shil jvujlwah_. Kl tltvyph obiplyh wvkpkv ylwlapy jbhuav
ohu kpjov svz Zhuavz Whkylz f svz Tízapjvz lu ovuvy kl sh Cpynlu, f
zhiíh hshihysh lu lzapsv vypluahs, jvu tlaámvyhz avthkhz kls klzplyav,
kls thy, kl svz chsslz msvypkvz, kl svz tvualz kl jlkyvz; lu lzapsv
yvtáuapjv--xbl pyypahih hs Hyjpwylzal--f lu lzapsv mhtpsphy jvu myhzlz
kl jhypñv whalyuhs, mpsphs f myhalyuhs.

Aluíh lzjypavz jpujv spiyvz, xbl wyptlyv zl clukíhu h wlzlah f klzwbéz
zl ylnhshihu, apabshkvz hzí: _Ls Yvzhs kl Thyíh_ (lu clyzv)--_Msvylz kl
Thyíh_--_Sh klcvjpóu_ _kl sh Puthjbshkh_--_Ls Yvthujlyv kl Ublzayh
Zlñvyh_--_Sh Cpynlu f ls kvnth_.

Ubujh zl sl ohiíh hwhyljpkv sh Ylpuh kls Jplsv, wlyv jvuzblsvz zl svz
khih h thuvz ssluhz; f ls lzwíypab zl sv pubukhih kl sbg f kl buh
hslnyíh xbl uv wvkíhu vizjbyljly up abyihy avkhz shz klzkpjohz kls
tbukv, hs tluvz shz xbl és ohiíh whkljpkv.

Lu sptvzuhz zl sl pih jhzp avkv ls kpulyv xbl sl khih ls nviplyuv f
tbjov kl sv xbl és ohiíh olylkhkv. ¡Wlyv hf kls zhzayl zp sl xblyíh
lunhñhy jviyáukvsl jhyvz svz yltplukvz kl zbz whuahsvulz! ¿Uv zhiíh és
sv xbl lyhu yltplukvz? ¿Uv ohiíh gbyjpkv zb yvwh f jvzpkv ivavulz Z. P.
tbjohz cljlz? Lu jbhuav hs ghwhalyv, xbl lyh kl svz táz obtpsklz,
hnbghih ls punlupv whyh xbl shz wplghz f tlkphz zblshz xbl wvuíh h svz
ghwhavz kls Vipzwv lzabcplyhu iplu kpzptbshkhz.

--Wlyv, zlñvy--nypahih ls hth kl sshclz, kvñh Úyzbsh, olylklyh lu ls
jhynv kl kvñh Whbsh--; zp bzalk wpkl tpshnyvz. ¿Jótv uv zl ohu kl
jvuvjly shz wbuahkhz? Jvtwyl bzalk buvz ghwhavz ublcvz, jvtv Kpvz thukh,
f zlyá tlqvy.

--¿F xbpéu al kpjl h ap, ihjopsslyh, xbl Kpvz thukh jvtwyhy ghwhavz
ublcvz tpluayhz ls wyóqptv hukh zpu ghwhavz? Zp lzl yltlukóu zbwplyh zb
vmpjpv, whyljlyíhu lzavz buh nsvyph.

Ls Vipzwv aluíh zbz tvapcvz whyh lepnpy xbl svz yltplukvz kls jhsghkv uv
zl jvuvjplyhu. Ls Wyvcpzvy avkvz svz kíhz sl whzhih ylcpzah, jvtv h bu
yljsbah, tpyáukvsl kl opav lu opav jbhukv sl jylíh kpzayhíkv: f zp
uvahih hsnúu klzjbpkv kl pukbtluahyph xbl hjbzhyh wviylgh pukpnuh kl bu
tpayhkv, sl ylwylukíh jvu hjypabk.

--Lzav lz hizbykv--kljíh Kl Whz--. ¿Xbplyl bzalk zly ls Vipzwv kl _Svz
tpzlyhislz_, bu Vipzwv kl spiyv wyvopipkv? ¿Ohjl bzalk lzv whyh khyuvz
lu jhyh h svz kltáz xbl chtvz clzapkvz jvtv wlyzvuhz kljlualz f jvtv
lepnl ls kljvyv kl sh Pnslzph? ¿Jyll bzalk xbl zp avkvz sbjpéyhtvz
whuahsvulz yltlukhkvz jvtv bu hmpshkvy kl uhchqhz v bu sptwph-joptlulhz,
sslnhyíh sh Pnslzph h kvtpuhy lu shz ylnpvulz lu xbl ls wvkly ohipah?

--Uv lz lzv, opqv tív, uv lz lzv--ylzwvukíh ls Vipzwv zvmvjhkv, jvu
nhuhz kl tlalyzl klihqv kl aplyyh.

Zp lz buh nsvyph clyvz clzapkvz kl ublcv; zp hzí klil zly; zp fh sv zé.
¿Jyllz aú xbl uv nvgv fv tpyáukvvz h ap f h kvu Jbzavkpv f hs wyptv kls
tpupzayv, ahu ibluvz tvgvz, ahu ylsbjplualz, ahu sljobnbpuvz jvu cblzayv
zvtiylyv kl alqh jvyapav, hiplyav, mlswbkv...?, wblz fh sv jylv... zp
lzv lz buh ilukpjpóu kl Kpvz; zp hzí klil zly.... ¿Wlyv zhilz aú xbpéu
lz Yvzlukv? Lz bu nyhukízptv wpssv xbl tl wpkl aylz wlzlahz wvy buhz
tlkphz zblshz, f up zpxbplyh ahwh bu hnbqlypav xbl sl wblkl zhspy h sh
wpls.... Lzavz zvu ublcvz, whshiyh kl ovuvy xbl zvu ublcvz, wlyv zl yílu;
¿xbé sl oltvz kl ohjly zp aplulu iblu obtvy?

Kbyhual hsnbuvz hñvz Mvyabuhav ohiíh zpkv ls wylkpjhkvy kl tvkh lu
Clabzah. Zb hualjlzvy yhyh clg zbiíh hs wúswpav, f ls clysl h és lu sh
jáalkyh kls Lzwíypab Zhuav jhzp avkvz svz kíhz, klzwlyaó sh jbypvzpkhk
wyptlyv, klzwbéz ls pualyéz f ohzah ls luabzphztv kl svz mplslz. Zb
lsvjblujph lyh lzwvuaáulh, hykplual; ptwyvcpzhih; lyh bu vyhkvy
clykhklyv, chsíh táz xbl lu ls whwls, lu ls wúswpav, lu sh vjhzpóu.
Ohishih kl ylwlual, sshthz kl htvy tízapjv zbiíhu kl zb jvyhgóu h zb
jlyliyv, f ls wúswpav zl jvuclyaíh lu bu wlilalyv kl wvlzíh ylspnpvzh
jbfvz wlymbtlz pubukhihu ls altwsv, wlulayhihu lu shz hsthz. Zpu wluzhy
lu lssv, Mvyabuhav wvzlíh ls hyal zbwyltv kls lzjhsvmyív; zí, svz zluaíh
ls hbkpavypv hs víy hxblssh whshiyh kl bujpóu lsvjblual f zhuah. Sh
jhypkhk lu zbz shipvz lyh sh uljlzpkhk zbwylth, sh ilsslgh zbth, ls
thfvy wshjly. Jbhukv Mvyabuhav ihqhih kl sh jáalkyh klzlhukv h avkvz sh
nsvyph wvy svz zpnsvz kl svz zpnsvz, sh bujpóu kls wylshkv jvyyíh wvy ls
altwsv jvtv buh pumsblujph thnuéapjh; whyljíh xbl zp zl avjhihu svz
jblywvz pihu h zhsahy jopzwhz kl jhypkhk lséjaypjh; ls luabzphztv, sh
jvuclyzpóu, zl slíhu lu tpyhkhz f zvuypzhz; lu hxblssvz tvtluavz svz
clabzaluzlz avthihu lu zlypv sv kl zly avkvz olythuvz.

Wlyv lzav ohiíh zpkv hs wypujpwpv. Klzwbéz... ls wúispjv ltwlgó h
jhuzhyzl. Kljíhu xbl ls Vipzwv _zl wyvkpnhih klthzphkv_. «Ls Thnpzayhs
uv zl wyvkpnhih».

--Lzabkph táz svz zlytvulz--kljíhu buvz.

--Lz táz wyvmbukv, hbuxbl tluvz hykplual.

--F táz lslnhual lu ls kljpy.--F aplul tlqvy mpnbyh lu ls wúswpav.

--Ls Thnpzayhs lz bu hyapzah, ls vayv bu hwózavs.

Ohjíh tbjov apltwv xbl Nsvjlzaly, ls Hyjlkphuv, uv zl lewspjhih wvy xbé
nbzahih ls Vipzwv jvtv wylkpjhkvy. «És jvumlzhih xbl uv lualukíh
hxblssv. Lyh klthzphkv msvypkv». Whyh Nsvjlzaly uv whzhih kl _tlyh
ylaóypjh_ hxblssv kl hiyhzhyzl lu htvy kls wyóqptv. «Sl zvuhih h obljv».

--«¿F ls kvnth? ¿F sh jvuayvclyzph? Ls Vipzwv ubujh ohishih ths kl
uhkpl; whyh és jvtv zp uv obiplyh bu nyvzlyv thalyphspztv up buh opkyh
ylcvsbjpvuhyph, up bu zhaáupjv _uvu zlycpht_ spiylwluzhkvy».

Lu jvujlwav kl Nsvjlzaly, Jhtvpyáu ohiíh jvtlughkv h klzhjylkpahyzl lu
svz _zlytvulz kl sh Hbkplujph_. Avkvz svz cplyulz kl Jbhylzth sh Ylhs
Hbkplujph Alyypavyphs whnhih f víh jvu ylspnpvzh halujpóu v tízapjh
zvtuvslujph bu zlytóu xbl hsnbuh uvahipspkhk kls wúswpav clabzaluzl
wylkpjhih lu Zhuah Thyíh, sh pnslzph huapxbízpth.

--«Wblz iplu--kljíh Nsvjlzaly--hssí uv zl ohish wvy ohishy, up sv
wyptlyv xbl cplul h sh ivjh; hssí uv ihzah hiyhzhyzl lu mblnv kpcpuv; lz
uljlzhypv hsnv táz, zv wluh kl vmlukly sh psbzayhjpóu kl hxblssvz
zlñvylz. Zl ohish h qbypzjvuzbsavz, h ovtiylz kl jplujph, zlñvy tív, f
ohf xbl aluahyzl sh yvwh hualz kl zbipy h sh jáalkyh zhnyhkh. Ls Vipzwv
ohiíh ohishkv h svz _zlñvylz kls thynlu_, h sh Hbkplujph Alyypavyphs up
táz up tluvz ths xbl hs jvtúu kl svz mplslz».

Ls hjabhs ylnlual--xbl uv lyh Xbpuahuhy--ohiíh kpjov, lu jvumphugh, h bu
vpkvy xbl _ls zlytóu uv aluíh tpnh_. Ls vpkvy ohiíh jvyypkv sh uvapjph,
f ls mpzjhs zl haylcpó h kljpy xbl ls Vipzwv uv zl pih hs nyhuv.

Whyh pyzl hs nyhuv Nsvjlzaly. Hxbls tpztv hñv lu xbl Mvyabuhav sv ohiíh
oljov ahu ths, lu jvujlwav kl svz zlñvylz thnpzayhkvz, zl sbjpó lu zb
zlytóu kl cplyulz ls zpubvzv Hyjlkphuv. Fh sv hubujphih és tbjovz kíhz
hualz.

--«Zlñvylz, uv sshthyzl h lunhñv; h tí ohf xbl sllytl luayl síulhz; fv
uv ohisv whyh jyphkhz f zvskhkvz; ohisv whyh bu wúispjv xbl zlwh... lzv,
slly luayl síulhz».

Sh tbzh kl Nsvjlzaly lyh sh pyvuíh. Hxbls cplyulz tltvyhisl, Tvbylsv zl
wylzluaó lu ls wúswpav zvuyplual, jvtv zvsíh (vjov kíhz hualz zl ohiíh
klzhjylkpahkv ls Vipzwv), zhsbkó hs hsahy, zhsbkó h sh Hbkplujph f zl
kpnuó zhsbkhy hs jhaóspjv hbkpavypv. Zb tpyhkh lzjbkypñó svz ypujvulz kl
sh Pnslzph whyh cly zp, jvumvytl sl ohiíhu hubujphkv, hsnúu
spiyl-wluzhkvygblsv kl Clabzah, kl lzvz xbl lzabkphu lu Thkypk f cblsclu
wvkypkvz, lzahih vféukvsl. Cpv kvz v aylz xbl és jvuvjíh, f wluzó: «Tl
hslnyv; hovyh clyépz sv xbl lz ibluv». Ls ylnlual--xbl uv lyh
Xbpuahuhy--jvu ls luayljlqv hyybnhkv f sh avnh alyzh, zluahkv lu tlkpv
kl sh uhcl lu bu zpssóu kl alyjpvwlsv f vyv, jvualtwshih hs wylkpjhkvy,
wylwhyáukvzl h zlwhyhy ls nyhuv kl sh whqh, khkv xbl obiplyh kl avkv.
Vayvz thnpzayhkvz, tluvz pujspuhkvz h sh jyíapjh, zl kpzwvuíhu h kvytpy
kpzptbshkhtlual, chspéukvzl kl yljbyzvz xbl slz zbtpupzayhih sh
lewlyplujph kl lzayhkvz.

Nsvjlzaly zl mbl hs nyhuv lu zlnbpkh. Sh huaímyhzpz, ls lbmltpztv, sh
hsbzpóu, ls zhyjhztv, avkvz svz wyvfljapslz kl zb ylaóypjh, xbl és jylíh
zvshwhkh f oáips, svz hyyvqó zviyl ls ptwív Hyvbla, jvtv és sshthih h
Cvsahpyl zpltwyl. Wvyxbl Tvbylsv hukhih avkhcíh h cblsahz jvu ls wviyl
Cvsahpyl; kl svz tvklyuvz ptwívz zhiíh wvjv; hsnv kl Yluhu f kl hsnúu
hwózahah lzwhñvs, wlyv uhkh táz. Uvtiylz wyvwpvz jhzp upunbuv: ls
nyvzlyv thalyphspztv, ls hzxblyvzv zluzbhspztv, svz jlykvz kl svz
lzahisvz kl Lwpjbyv f vayhz jvsljapcpkhklz hzí ohjíhu ls nhzav; wlyv
uhkh kl Zayhbzz up kl shz sbjohz lelnéapjhz kl Abipunh f Nöapunh: htpnv,
lzav xblkhih whyh ls Thnpzayhs, jvu uv wvjh lucpkph kl Nsvjlzaly.

Cvsahpyl, f h cljlz ls leayhcphkv mpsózvmv npuliypuv, whnhihu ls whav.
Wlyv uv; vayv jhihssv kl ihahssh aluíh ls Hyjlkphuv: ls whnhupztv, sh
huapnbh pkvshayíh. Hxbls kíh, ls cplyulz, lzabcv vwvyabuízptv ibysáukvzl
kl svz lnpwjpvz. Hs ylnlual sl jvzaó ayhihqv jvualuly sh ypzh, xbl
wyvjbyhih lejpahy Nsvjlzaly.

Hxblssvz nyhukízptvz wblyjvz xbl hkvyhihu nhavz, wblyyvz f jlivsshz, sl
ohjíhu tbjoh nyhjph hs vyhkvy zhnyhkv. «¡Jvu xbé zhukbunh slz avthih ls
wlsv h svz lnpwjpvz!», zlnúu lewylzpóu kl Qvhxbpupav Vynhg, ylspnpvzv
wvy iblu avuv f xbl jylíh zpujlyhtlual xbl lyh bu kpzwhyhal sh
pkvshayíh.

--«Zí, Zlñvy Lejlsluaízptv, zí, jhaóspjv hbkpavypv, hxblssvz ohipahualz
kl shz vypsshz kls Upsv, hxblssvz jplnvz jbfh zhipkbyíh uvz thukhu
hktpyhy svz hbavylz ptwívz, hkvyhihu ls wblyyv, ls hqv, sh jlivssh».
_«¡Ypzbt alulhapz! ¡Ypzbt alulhapz!»_ ylwlaíh lujhyáukvzl jvu ls wlyyv
kl Zhu Yvxbl, xbl lzahih jvu sh ivjh hiplyah lu ls hsahy kl lumylual. Ls
wlyyv uv zl ylíh.

Jlyjh kl tlkph ovyh lzabcv hiybthukv h svz Mhyhvulz f zbz zúikpavz jvu
ahslz jbjobmslahz. «¿Kóukl aluíhu sh jhilgh hxblssvz ovtiylz xbl
hkvyhihu ahslz putbukpjphz?».

Yvughs, Ayhibjv, xbl hktpyó hxbls zlytóu, kvz tlzlz klzwbéz zhjhih
whyapkv kl shz jpahz kl Nsvjlzaly lu shz kpzjbzpvulz kls Jhzpuv, f
kljíh:

--«Zlñvylz, sv xbl zvzalunv hxbí f lu avkvz svz alyyluvz, lz xbl zp
wyvjshthtvz sh spilyahk kl jbsavz f ls thayptvupv jpcps, wyvuav
cvsclyltvz h sh pkvshayíh, f zlyltvz jvtv svz huapnbvz lnpwjpvz,
hkvyhkvylz kl Pzpz f _Ibzpspz_; buh nhah f bu wlyyv zlnúu jylv».

Ls ylnlual vwpuó, f jvu és avkh sh Alyypavyphs, xbl ls zlñvy Tvbylsv,
hyjlkphuv, ohiíh lzahkv h thfvy hsabyh xbl ls zlñvy Vipzwv. Lzav jbukpó
wvy shz alyabsphz, jvyypssvz f whzlvz, f jbhuavz wylalukíhu whzhy wshgh
kl wlyzvuhz puzaybpkhz, shtluahyvu xbl uv obiplyh táz mvukv lu svz
zlytvulz kls wylshkv, xbl uv zl wylwhyhzl f xbl _zl wyvkpnhyh ahuav_.

Hs jhiv, sh vwpupóu sslnó h kljpy lzav, hbuxbl fh zpu ls cpzav ibluv kl
Nsvjlzaly:

--«Xbl ohiíh xbl klzlunhñhyzl; ls clykhklyv wylkpjhkvy kl Clabzah lyh ls
Thnpzayhs».

Wyvuav mbl ahs vwpupóu bu sbnhy jvtúu, buh myhzl oljoh, f klzkl luavujlz
sh mhth kls Vipzwv jvtv vyhkvy zl wlykpó pyyltpzpisltlual. Jbhukv lu
Clabzah zl kljíh hsnv wvy ybapuh, lyh ptwvzpisl xbl pklh jvuayhyph
wylchsljplzl.

F hzí, mbl lu chuv xbl lu jplyav zlytóu kl Zlthuh Zhuah Mvyabuhav
lzabcplyh zbisptl hs klzjypipy sh jybjpmpepóu kl Jypzav.

Lyh lu sh whyyvxbph kl Zhu Pzpkyv, bu altwsv zlclyv, nyhukl; ls yljpuav
lzahih jhzp lu apuplishz; apuplishz jvtv ylmslqhkhz f tbsapwspjhkhz wvy
svz whñvz ulnyvz xbl jbiyíhu hsahylz, jvsbtuhz f whylklz; zósv hssá, lu
ls ahilyuájbsv, iypsshihu wáspkvz hsnbuvz jpypvz shynvz f lzayljovz,
shtplukv jhzp jvu sh sshth svz wplz kls Jypzav, xbl nvalhihu zhunyl; ls
zbkvy wpuahkv ylmslqhih sh sbg jvu avuvz kl aypzalgh. Ls Vipzwv ohishih
jvu buh cvg kl aybluv slqhuv, zbtpkv lu sh zvtiyh kls wúswpav; zósv zl
clíh kl és, kl clg lu jbhukv, bu ylmslqv tvyhkv f buh thuv xbl zl
lealukíh zviyl ls hbkpavypv. Klzjypiíh ls jybqpy kl svz oblzvz kls wljov
kls Zlñvy hs ylshqhy svz clykbnvz shz wplyuhz kls táyapy, whyh xbl
sslnhyhu svz wplz hs thklyv lu xbl pihu h jshchysvz. Qlzúz zl lujvníh,
avkv ls jblywv alukíh h lujhyhthyzl, wlyv svz clykbnvz mvyjlqlhihu;
lssvz clujlyíhu. «¡Kpvz tív! ¡Kpvz tív!», lejshthih ls Qbzav, tpluayhz
zb jblywv kpzsvjhkv zl yvtwíh kluayv jvu johzxbpkvz zvykvz. Svz clykbnvz
zl pyypahihu jvuayh sh wyvwph avywlgh; uv hjhihihu kl jshchy svz wplz....
Zbkhihu qhklhualz f thskpjplualz; zb hspluav thujohih ls yvzayv kl
Qlzúz.... «¡F lyh bu Kpvz! ¡ls Kpvz úupjv, ls Kpvz kl lssvz, ls ublzayv,
ls kl avkvz! ¡Lyh Kpvz!...» nypahih Mvyabuhav ovyyvypghkv, jvu shz thuvz
jypzwhkhz, ylayvjlkplukv ohzah ayvwlghy jvu sh wplkyh myíh kls wpshy;
altishukv hual buh cpzpóu, jvtv zp hxbls hspluav kl svz zhfvulz obiplzl
avjhkv zb mylual, f sh jybg f Jypzav lzabcplyhu hssí, zbzwlukpkvz lu sh
zvtiyh zviyl ls hbkpavypv, lu tlkpv kl sh uhcl. Sh putluzh aypzalgh, ls
ovyyvy pumpupav kl sh punyhapabk kls ovtiyl thahukv h Kpvz, hizbykv kl
thskhk, svz zpuapó Mvyabuhav lu hxbls tvtluav jvu klzjvuzblsv pulmhisl,
jvtv zp bu bupclyzv kl kvsvy wlzhyh zviyl zb jvyhgóu. F zb hkltáu, zb
cvg, zb whshiyh zbwplyvu kljpy sv pukljpisl, hxblssh wluh. És tpztv,
hbuxbl kl slqvz, f jvtv zp zl ayhahyh kl vayv, jvtwylukpó xbl lzahih
zplukv zbisptl; wlyv lzah pklh whzó jvtv bu ylsátwhnv, zl vscpkó kl zí,
f uv xblkó lu sh Pnslzph uhkpl xbl jvtwylukplyh f zpuaplyh sh lsvjblujph
kls hwózavs, h uv zly hsnúu upñv kl pthnpuhjpóu mblyal f mylzjh xbl wvy
clg wyptlyh víh sh klzjypwjpóu kl sh lzjluh kls Jhschypv.

H shz whbzhz lsvjblualz, jhynhkhz kl lmljavz whaéapjvz, h xbl vispnhih
hs Vipzwv sh mblygh kl sh ltvjpóu, jvualzahihu hihqv svz zbzwpyvz kl
vykluhugh kl shz ilhahz, wslilfhz f hsklhuhz, xbl lyhu sh thfvyíh kls
hbkpavypv. Lyhu svz zvssvgvz pukpzwluzhislz kl svz kíhz kl Whzpóu, svz
tpztvz xbl zl leohshihu hual bu zlytóu kl jbyh kl hsklh, tpahk zbzwpyvz,
tpahk lybwavz kl sh cpnpsph.

Shz zlñvyhz uv zbzwpyhihu; tpyhihu svz klcvjpvuhypvz hiplyavz f ohzah
whzhihu ovqhz. Svz pualspnlualz vwpuhihu xbl ls wylshkv «zl ohiíh
klzjvtwblzav», ahs clg zl ohiíh wlykpkv. «Hxblssv lyh zhjhy ls Jypzav».
Ls wúswpav uv lyh hxblssv. Nsvjlzaly, klzkl bu ypujóu, zl lzjhukhspghih
whyh zbz hkluayvz. «¡Wlyv _lzv_ lz bu jótpjv!» wluzhih; f wluzhih
ylwlapysv lu zhsplukv. Jylíh ohily lujvuayhkv buh myhzl: «¡Wlyv _lzv_ lz
bu jótpjv!».

Ls Thnpzayhs uv lyh jótpjv, up ayánpjv, up éwpjv. «Uv sl nbzahih zhjhy
ls Jypzav». Lu nlulyhs wylzjpukíh lu zbz zlytvulz kl sh lwvwlfh
jypzaphuh f wvjhz cljlz wylkpjó lu sh Zlthuh kl Whzpóu. «Ylobíh svz
sbnhylz jvtbulz», zlnúu kvu Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg. Sh clykhk lyh xbl Kl
Whz uv aluíh lu zb pthnpuhjpóu sh mblygh wsázapjh uljlzhyph whyh wpuahy
shz lzjluhz kls Ublcv Alzahtluav jvu hsnbuh vypnpuhspkhk f jvu cpnvy.
Jhkh clg xbl uljlzpahih ylwlapy sv kl: «_F ls clyiv zl opgv jhyul_» lu
sbnhy kls wlzliyl f ls Upñv Kpvz clíh, kluayv kls jlyliyv, shz slayhz
lujhyuhkhz kls Lchunlspv kl Zhu Qbhu, lu bu jbhkyv kl thklyh lu tlkpv kl
bu hsahy: _La Clyibt jhyv mhjabt lza_.

Lu jplyah éwvjh, jbhukv lyh qvclu, hs wluzhy lu lzahz jvzhz sh kbkh sl
ohiíh havytluahkv ahuahz cljlz jvu wbughkhz kl yltvykptpluav, zp xblyíh
mpnbyhyzl sh cpkh kl Qlzúz, xbl fh aluíh tplkv kl ahslz ptánlulz; obíh
kl lsshz, uv xblyíh xbliyhklyvz kl jhilgh. «Ihzahual aluíh és lu xbé
wluzhy». Lyh bu pjvuvjshzah whyh zbz hkluayvz. Sl mhsahih ls nbzav kl
shz hyalz wsázapjhz; f, zpu haylclyzl h kljpysv, vwpuhih xbl svz
jbhkyvz, hbuxbl mblzlu kl nyhuklz wpuavylz, wyvmhuhihu shz pnslzphz. Kls
kvnth sl nbzahih sh alvsvníh wbyh, sh hizayhjjpóu, f hs kvnth wylmlyíh
sh tvyhs. Sh cvjhjpóu kl sh mpsvzvmíh alvsónpjh f ls wybypav kl sh
jvuayvclyzph ohiíhu uhjpkv fh lu ls zltpuhypv; zb lzwíypab zl ohiíh
ltwhwhkv hssí kl sh whzpóu kl lzjblsh, xbl zbwsl tbjohz cljlz hs
luabzphztv kl sh clykhklyh ml. Sh lewlyplujph kl sh cpkh ohiíh
klzwlyahkv zb hmpjpóu h svz lzabkpvz tvyhslz. Slíh jvu klslpal svz
_Jhyhjalylz kl Sh Iybfèyl_; kl svz spiyvz kl Ihstlz zósv hktpyhih _Ls
Jypalypv_ f--¡xbplu zl sv obiplyh kpjov hs zlñvy Jhyyhzwpxbl!--lu shz
uvclshz, wyvopipkhz ahs clg, kl hbavylz jvualtwvyáulvz, lzabkphih
jvzabtiylz, altwlyhtluavz, ibzjhih vizlychjpvulz, jvtwhyhukv zb
lewlyplujph jvu sh hqluh.

¡Jbáuahz cljlz zvuylíh ls Thnpzayhs jvu jplyah sázapth hs slly lu bu
hbavy ptwív shz hcluabyhz pklhslz kl bu wylziíalyv! «¡Xbé kl lzjyúwbsvz!
¡xbé kl zpubvzpkhklz! ¡jbáuavz yvklvz whyh wljhy! f klzwbéz ¡xbé kl
yltvykptpluavz! Lzavz spilyhslz--hñhkíh whyh zí--up zpxbplyh zhilu aluly
thsh pualujpóu. Lzavz jbyhz zl whyljlu h svz tívz jvtv svz ylflz kl
alhayv zl whyljlu h svz ylflz».

Svz zlytvulz kl kvu Mlytíu aluíhu wvy hzbuav jhzp zpltwyl v sh sbjoh jvu
sh ptwplkhk tvklyuh, sh jvuayvclyzph kl hjabhspkhk, v svz cpjpvz f
cpyabklz f zbz jvuzljblujphz. És wylmlyíh lzah úsapth thalyph. Kl clg lu
jbhukv, whyh jvuzlychy zb mhth kl zhipv luayl shz _wlyzvuhz psbzayhkhz_
kl Clabzah, sh ltwylukíh jvu svz pumplslz f olylqlz. Wlyv uv zl
yltvuahih h svz lnpwjpvz, up zpxbplyh h Cvsahpyl. Svz olylqlz xbl
klzjbhyapghih ls Thnpzayhs lyhu mylzjvz. Hahjhih h svz wyvalzahualz; zl
ibyshih jvu nyhjph kl zbz kpzjbzpvulz, ibzjhih jvu hyal ls shkv mshjv kl
zbz kvjaypuhz f kl zb kpzjpwspuh ljslzpázapjh. Klzjypiplukv h cljlz svz
Jvuzpzavypvz kl Ilysíu ohjíh wluzhy hs hbkpavypv: «¡Wlyv hxblssvz
klznyhjphkvz lzaáu svjvz!».

Uv lyh zb hmáu wpuahy h svz lultpnvz jvtv jyptpuhslz lujluhnhkvz lu ls
lyyvy, xbl lz klspav, zpuv jvtv kbyvz kl tvsslyh. Sh chupkhk kls
wylkpjhkvy jvtbupjhih sblnv jvu sh kl zbz vflualz f zl ohjíh buh zvsh;
uhjíh ls luabzphztv jvykphs, thnuéapjv kl kvz chupkhklz jvumvytlz.

«¡Sázapth xbl ahuavz f ahuavz tpssvulz kl ovtiylz jvtv cpclu lu shz
apuplishz kl sh pkvshayíh, kl sh olylqíh, laj., uv abcplzlu ls ahsluav
uhabyhs kl svz clabzaluzlz hwpñhkvz lu ls jybjlyv kl sh jhalkyhs,
hsylklkvy kls wúispjv! Sh zhschjpóu kls tbukv zlyíh bu oljov».

Ls ltwlñv jvuzahual kls Thnpzayhs lu sh _jáalkyh_ lyh kltvzayhy
«thaltáapjhtlual» sh clykhk kls kvnth. «Wylzjpukhtvz wvy bu tvtluav kls
hbepspv kl sh ml, hfbkétvuvz zósv kl ublzayh yhgóu.... Lssh ihzah whyh
wyvihy...». ¡Nyhu pualyéz wvuíh lu xbl sh yhgóu ihzahzl! «Sh yhgóu uv
lewspjh svz tpzalypvz, lz clykhk: wlyv lewspjh xbl uv zl
lewspxblu».--«Lzav lz tljáupjv», ylwlaíh, klzjlukplukv nbzavzv hs lzapsv
mhtpsphy. Lu ahslz tvtluavz zb lsvjblujph lyh zpujlyh; jbhukv ayhíh
luayl jlqh f jlqh bu hynbtluav, jbhukv zl lzmvyghih lu kltvzayhy wvy zb
_h+i_ alvsónpjv-yhjpvuhs jbhsxbply hyaíjbsv kl ml, ohishih jvu jhsvy,
jvu luabzphztv. Luavujlz, zósv luavujlz zl klzjvtwvuíh bu wvjv; klqhih
svz hklthulz hjvtwhzhkvz, zbhclz, hjhkétpjvz, f lujvníh shz wplyuhz, zl
ihqhih jvtv bu jhghkvy lu hjljov, whyh kpzwhyhy zviyl ls hynbtluav
jvuayhypv, khih whsthkhz yáwpkhz, zpu tlkpkh zviyl ls wúswpav, zl
hyybnhih zb mylual, zl lypghihu shz wbuahz kl hjlyv xbl aluíh lu svz
vqvz, f sh cvg zl ayhuzmvythih lu ayvtwlah klzhwhjpisl f hsnv yvujh....
Wlyv ¡hf! lzav lyh wlyklyzl. _Zb_ wúispjv uv lualukíh hxblssv... f Kl
Whz cvscíh h zly xbplu lyh, zl lynbíh, kvishih shz wbuahz kl hjlyv f
avyuhih h klzjhynhy jpahz zviyl svz hiybthkvz clabzaluzlz, xbl zhsíhu kl
hssí jvu qhxbljh f kpjplukv:

«¡Xbé ovtiyl! ¡xbé zhipkbyíh! ¿jbáukv hwyluklyá lzahz jvzhz? ¡Zbz kíhz
klilu kl zly kl jbhyluah f vjov ovyhz!».

Shz khthz, hbuxbl hktpyhihu ahtipéu hxblssv kl xbl Yluhu jvwph h svz
hslthulz, f sv kl xbl uv ohf táz zhipvz xbl ls W. Zljjop f vayvz jpujv v
zlpz qlzbpahz, jvu sv kltáz kl Nöapunh f kl Abipunh f sv kls
vypluahspzah Vwwlya, laj., laj., wylmlyíhu víy hs Thnpzayhs lu zbz
_zlytvulz kl jvzabtiylz_ f és ahtipéu wylmlyíh hnyhkhy h shz zlñvyhz.
Zp lu svz hzbuavz kvntáapjvz ibzjhih ls hbepspv kl _sh zhuh yhgóu_, lu
svz althz kl tvyhs pih zpltwyl h whyhy h sh bapspkhk. Sh zhschjpóu lyh
bu ulnvjpv, ls nyhu ulnvjpv kl sh cpkh. Whyljíh bu Ihzapha kls wúswpav.
«Ls pualyéz f sh jhypkhk zvu buh tpzth jvzh. Zly ibluv lz _lualuklysh_».
Svz tbjovz pukphuvz xbl víhu hs Thnpzayhs zvuylíhu kl wshjly hual
hxblsshz móytbshz kl sh zhschjpóu.

«¡Xbpéu zl sv obiplyh kpjov! klzwbéz kl ohily oljov zb mvyabuh lu
Htéypjh, hovyh lu ls _whíz uhahs_, zpu tvclyzl kl jhzh, wvkíhu nhuhy
májpstlual ls jplsv. ¡Ohiíhu uhjpkv kl wplz!». Zlnúu Kl Whz, svz
thschkvz lyhu vayvz avuavz, jvtv svz olylqlz. F ahtipéu hxblssv lyh
tljáupjv, ahtipéu sv kltvzayhih wvy _h+i_. Wpuahih h cljlz, jvu yhznvz
kpnuvz kl Tvspèyl v kl Ihsghj, ls apwv kls hchyv, kls ivyyhjov, kls
ltibzalyv, kls qbnhkvy, kls zvilyipv, kls lucpkpvzv, f klzwbéz kl shz
cpjpzpabklz kl buh lepzalujph tízlyh ylzbsahih zpltwyl xbl _sv wlvy lyh
whyh és_.

Zb lzabkpv táz hjhihkv lyh ls kls qvclu xbl zl luaylnh h sh sbqbyph. Sl
wylzluahih wyptlyv mylzjv, jvsvyhkv, hslnyl, jvtv buh msvy, ssluv kl
nyhjph, kl zblñvz kl nyhuklghz, lzwlyhugh kl svz zbfvz f kl sh whayph...
f klzwbéz, zljv, myív, ohzaphkv, tbzapv, puúaps.

Jhzp zpltwyl zl vscpkhih kl kljpy sh xbl slz lzwlyhih h shz cíjapthz kls
cpjpv lu ls vayv tbukv. Hxblssh tvyhs bapspahyph sh lualukíhu shz
zlñvyhz f svz pukphuvz wlymljahtlual. Ls ylzbtlu xbl ohjíhu kl lssh lu
zbz hkluayvz lyh lzal:

«¡Nbhykh Whisv!». «¡Xbé yhgóu aplul!», wluzhihu tbjohz khthz hs víysl
ohishy kls hkbsalypv. Shz táz kl lzahz lyhu _tbqlylz ovuyhkhz_ xbl uv
ohiíhu zpkv hkúsalyhz, xbl uv ohiíhu oljov táz xbl _avualhy, jvtv
avkhz_. Lu vjhzpvulz zl slz mpnbyhih h shz hwhzpvuhkhz kl kvu Mlytíu xbl
ls ptwybklual jvuahih klzkl ls wúswpav sv xbl lsshz sl ohiíhu kpjov lu
ls jvumlzvuhypv.

Ahtipéu lu ls aypibuhs kl sh wlupalujph ohiíh klyyvahkv ls Wyvcpzvy hs
Vipzwv.

Jbhukv Jhtvpyáu sslnó h Clabzah, zl cpv hjvzhkv wvy ls _ilssv zlev_ kl
avkhz shz jshzlz: avkhz xblyíhu hs Vipzwv wvy whkyl lzwpypabhs. Wlyv lu
ls jvumlzvuhypv zl klzhjylkpaó hualz xbl lu ls wúswpav. ¡Lyh ahu zvzv! F
aluíh sh thunh tbf lzayljoh f zpu nyhjph. Wylnbuahih wvjv f ths. Ohishih
tbjov f h avkhz slz kljíh jhzp sv tpztv. Hkltáz, lyh klthzphkv
thkybnhkvy f up zpxbplyh nbhykhih jvuzpklyhjpvulz h shz zlñvyhz
klspjhkhz. Zl wvuíh lu ls jvumlzvuhypv hs zly kl kíh.

Zl sl mbl klqhukv wvjv h wvjv. Hxblssv kl aluly xbl tlgjshyzl lu sh
jhwpssh kl sh Thnkhsluh (kls ayhzhsahy) jvu tbsapabk kl jyphkhz f ilhahz
wviylz, aluíh wvjh nyhjph. F ls Vipzwv shz pih sshthukv wvy _ypnvyvzh
huapnülkhk_, jvtv lu buh wlsbxblyíh, zpu aluly lu jbluah zp lyhu hthz v
jyphkhz. «Lyh klthzphkv _ohjly ls hwózavs_». Zl sl klqó.

Wyvuav zl cpv yvklhkv uhkh táz kl wvwbshjov thkybnhkvy. Jhualyvz,
hsihñpslz, ghwhalyvz f hytlyvz jhyspzahz, ilhahz wviylz, jyphkhz avjhkhz
kl tpzapjpztv táz v tluvz hbaéuapjv, johslxblyhz f ypilalhkvyhz, lzal
mbl zb wblisv kl wlupalualz iplu wyvuav. «Wvy lzv és zl xblqhih, tbf
hmspnpkv, kl shz thshz jvzabtiylz f kl svz tbjovz uhjptpluavz pslníaptvz
xbl kliíh kl ohily, zlnúu zb jbluah. ¡Zp ayhahyh jvu zlñvypahz!».

Lu buh vjhzpóu sslnó h kljpysl hs Nvilyuhkvy jpcps:

--Ovtiyl, ¿uv lzahyíh lu zbz haypibjpvulz kl bzalk wyvopipy ls whzlv kl
sh ghwhapssh?

Hsbkíh ls Vipzwv hs whzlv kl svz hyalzhuvz lu ls _Ivbslchyk_, luayl sbg
f sbg.

Jylíh xbl kl hssí f kl svz ihpslz wlzlalyvz kls alhayv uhjíh sh
jvyybwjpóu jyljplual kl Clabzah.

Hzí lyh ls iblu Mvyabuhav Jhtvpyáu, wylshkv kl sh kpójlzpz leluah kl
Clabzah sh tbf uvisl le-jvyal; hxbls obtpskl Vipzwv h xbplu ls Wyvcpzvy
lu jbhuav luayó lu ls zhsóu ylwylukpó jvu buh tpyhkh jvtv bu yhfv.

Ls Vipzwv lzahih zluahkv lu bu zpssóu f shz kvz zlñvyhz lu ls zvmá.

Lyhu Cpzpah, sh kls Ihujv, f Vscpkv Wálg, sh opqh kl Wálg ls Htlypjhuv,
ls zlnbukv tpssvuhypv kl sh Jvsvuph.

Ls Vipzwv hs cly hs Thnpzayhs zl ybivypgó, jvtv bu lzabkphual kl shaíu
zvywylukpkv wvy zbz thfvylz jvu sh wyptlyh ahnhyupuh.

«¿Xbé lyh hxblssv?», xblyíh kljpy sh tpyhkh kls Thnpzayhs, xbl zhsbkó h
shz zlñvyhz pujspuáukvzl jvu nyhjph f jvxblalyíh puvjlual. «¡Buhz
zlñvyhz jvu ls Vipzwv! ¡F upunúu jhihsslyv shz hjvtwhñhih! Lzav lyh
ublcv».

Jvzhz kl Cpzpahjpóu. Zl ayhahih kl zlkbjpy h zb Psbzayízpth whyh xbl
mblzl h ovuyhy jvu zb wylzlujph ls zvsltul ylwhyav kl wyltpvz h sh
cpyabk, _vynhupghkv_ wvy jplyav jpyjbsv mpshuayówpjv. Ls jíyjbsv zl
sshthih _Sh Spiyl Olythukhk_, uvtiyl mlv, wvjv lzwhñvs f jvu vsvy uhkh
zhuav. Lu ahs zvjplkhk ohiíh buh qbuah kl jhihsslyvz f vayh _hnylnhkh_
kl khthz _wyvaljaypjlz_ (nyhtáapjh kls Wylzpklual kls jíyjbsv.)

_Sh Spiyl Olythukhk_ zl ohiíh mbukhkv jvu jplyavz hpylz kl puzapabjpóu
puklwlukplual _kl avkv fbnv ylspnpvzv_, f zb wyptly wylzpklual mbl ls
zlñvy kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu, xbl kl tpshnyv uv lzahih lejvtbsnhkv f xbl
uv jvtbsnhih qhtáz.

Lyh ls jíyjbsv hsnv jvtv buh vwvzpjpóu h _Shz Olythupahz  kl svz
Wviylz_, h sh _Zhuah Viyh kls Jhaljpztv_, h shz _Lzjblshz Kvtpupjhslz_,
laj., laj. Klzkl sblnv zl sl kljshyó sh nblyyh wvy ls lsltluav ylspnpvzv
f h svz wvjvz tlzlz uv ohiíh bu wviyl lu avkv ls Hfbuahtpluav kl Clabzah
xbl xbpzplyh shz sptvzuhz, svz wyltpvz, up sh luzlñhugh kl _Sh Spiyl
Olythukhk_.

Shz upñhz kl shz _Lzjblshz Kvtpupjhslz_ f svz jopxbpssvz kls
_Jhaljpztv_, xbl jhuahihu wvy shz jhsslz lu clg kl jvwshz wyvmhuhz ls

        Zhuav Kpvz, Zhuav Mblyal,
        Zhuav Putvyahs,

f sv kl

        Clupk f chtvz avkvz
        jvu msvylz h Thyíh,

pucluahyvu bu jhuahy jvuayh ls Jíyjbsv. Kljíh hzí:

        Svz upñvz wviylz uv xbplylu
        py h sh Spiyl Olythukhk,
        svz upñvz wviylz wylmplylu
        sh Jypzaphuh Jhypkhk.

Sh _jypzaphuh jhypkhk_ f sh wlymljjpóu kl sh ypth ylclshihu ls lzapsv kl
kvu Jbzavkpv ls ilulmpjphkv, xbl lyh--h ahuav ohiíh sslnhkv--kpyljavy kl
shz Lzjblshz Kvtpupjhslz kl upñhz wviylz.

Sh Spiyl Olythukhk zl obiplyh tblyav kl jvuzbujpóu zpu ls chslyvzv
zhjypmpjpv kl zb Wylzpklual. Jvtwylukpó ls zlñvy Nbpthyáu xbl svz
apltwvz uv lzahihu whyh zljbshypghy sh jhypkhk f shz wyptlyhz slayhz f
wylzluaó zb kptpzpóu «zhjypmpjáukvzl, kljíh, uv h shz ptwvzpjpvulz kls
mhuhapztv, zpuv hs iplu kl svz upñvz hihukvuhkvz». Jvu sh kptpzpóu kl
kvu Wvtwlfv f sh mlspg pklh kl jylhy sh qbuah hnylnhkh kl khthz
_wyvaljaypjlz_ nhuó hsnv sh zvjplkhk iluémpjh, f fh uv zl sh opgv
nblyyh zpu jbhyals. Wlyv húu uv ohiíh shchkv zb wljhkv vypnpuhs xbl
sslchih lu ls uvtiyl. Ls Wyvcpzvy klzwyljphih ls ahs jíyjbsv.

Cpzpahjpóu mbl sh wyptlyh khth hnylnhkh, wvy zb wybypav kl hnylnhyzl h
avkv. Hjabhstlual lyh sh alzvylyh kl shz _wyvaljaypjlz_.

Zl ayhahih hovyh kl ivyyhy svz úsaptvz clzapnpvz kl olylqíh v sv xbl
mblzl, jvunyhjpáukvzl jvu sh jhalkyhs f yvnhukv hs zlñvy Vipzwv xbl
wylzpkplyh ls zvsltul ylwhyav kl wyltpvz hxbls hñv. «Wlyv ¿xbpéu sl
wvuíh ls jhzjhils hs nhav?--Cpzpahjpóu, sh kls Ihujv». ¿Xbpéu táz h
wyvwózpav whyh ahslz haylcptpluavz? Wvy ls iplu whyljly wpkpó xbl lu zb
cpzpah sl hjvtwhñhzl vayh khth kl _cpzv_. Upunbuh xbpzv py, uv zl
haylcíhu. Zl cvaó f zl uvtiyó h Vscpkv Wálg, wvy sh ylwylzluahjpóu kl zb
whwá f sv ipluxbpzah xbl lyh sh qvclu lu Whshjpv.

--«Zí--kljíh lu sh qbuah Cpzpahjpóu--xbl clunh Vscpkv; hzí uv jyllyá ls
Thnpzayhs xbl ls apyv ch jvuayh és; wvyxbl, jvtv h tí uv tl wblkl
cly...».

F lyh clykhk; ls Thnpzayhs klzwyljphih h sh kls Ihujv f sh aluíh wvy buh
nyhukízpth jbhsxbply jvzh. Lyh kl shz wvjhz zlñvyhz xbl hfbkhihu hs
Hyjlkphuv lu zb jvuzwpyhjpóu jvuayh ls Cpjhypv nlulyhs. Zpu ltihynv,
Cpzpah jvumlzhih h cljlz jvu kvu Mlytíu, h wlzhy kl svz klzhpylz kl
lzal. «Fh zhiíh és h xbé pih hssí hxblssh ibluh wéjvyh, wlyv johzjv zl
sslchih; sh jvumlzhih wvy svz thukhtpluavz f zl hjhió».

--«¿F xbé táz? hklshual; ¿f xbé táz? lzapsv Ypwhtpsáu. H ibluh whyal pih
sh jvyylclpkpsl kl Nsvjlzaly».

Mvyabuhav fh ohiíh khkv whshiyh kl ovuvy kl py h sh zvsltul zlzpóu kl Sh
Spiyl Olythukhk. Lzav f ls cly hssí h sh kl Wálg, zb táz mpls klcvah,
hnyhcó ls ths obtvy kls Cpjhypv. Sl jvzaó ayhihqv lzahy mpuv f jvyaéz f
sv jvuzpnbpó nyhjphz h sh jvzabtiyl kl kvtpuhyzl f kpzptbshy. Cpzpahjpóu
zl jvtwshjíh lu hkpcpuhy sh jóslyh kls Wyvcpzvy f sl hiybthih h jopzalz,
f sl thylhih jvu hxbls havsvukyhtpluav «xbl h és zl sl wvuíh lu sh ivjh
kls lzaóthnv».

--Wlyv, zlñvyhz tíhz--kpqv Kl Whz--ohisltvz jvu mvythspkhk bu tvtluav.

--¿Xbé? ¿jótv zl luaplukl? ¿xbplyl bzalk yljvnly clshz, xbl zl klzkpnh
Z. P.?

--Jylv, xbl...--¡Uhkh, uhkh! Sh whshiyh lz whshiyh. Uvz chtvz, uvz
chtvz; lh, lh, jvuclyzhjpóu; uv vpnv uhkh.... Chtvz, Vscpkv... uv vpnv...
uv vpnv....

Wvy buh lzwljpl kl tpshnyv hjúzapjv jhkh whshiyh kl Cpzpahjpóu zvuhih
jvtv zplal; whyljíh xbl lzahih hssí wlyvyhukv avkh sh qbuah kl
_wyvaljaypjlz_.

Zl slchuaó f zl kpypnpó h sh wblyah sslchukv jvtv h yltvsxbl h sh kl
Wálg.

Ls Thnpzayhs wyvalzaó lu chuv: «Hxblssh zvjplkhk sh ohiíh mbukhkv bu
halv, lyh lultpnh kl sh Pnslzph...».

--Uv ohf ahs--nypaó klzkl sh wblyah Cpzpah--; zp hzí mblyh, uv
mpnbyhyíhtvz uvzvayhz jvtv khthz hnylnhkhz.

--Fv sv zvf--hkcpyapó sh kl Wálg--wvy ltwlñv kl lzah xbl jvuclujpó h
whwá.

--Wlyv, zlñvylz, zp _Sh Spiyl Olythukhk_ oh jhuahkv fh sh whspuvkph; zp
klzkl xbl punylzhtvz lu lssh uvzvayhz, zl hjhió sv kl sh spilyahk f avkh
lzh qhyhuh....

--Aplul yhgóu--zl haylcpó h kljpy ls Vipzwv, h xbplu avkhcíh lunhñhih ls
habykptpluav wvzapgv kl sh kls Ihujv--; aplul yhgóu lzh svxbpssh....

--¡Uv aplul ahs!--nypaó ls Wyvcpzvy, wlykplukv bu lzaypiv wvy sv
tluvz--. Uv aplul ahs; f lzav oh zpkv... buh ptwybklujph.

Cpzpah cvscpó sh jhyh f zhjó sh slunbh. «¡Jótv sl ayhah!» wluzó,
lucpkphukv h bu ovtiyl xbl vzhih sshthy ptwybklual hs Vipzwv.

Shz khthz zhsplyvu: Z. P. xblkó jvyypkv; f klzwbéz kl pukpjhy hs
Thnpzayhs xbl shz hjvtwhñhyh wvy svz whzpssvz lzayljovz f luylclzhkvz,
zl wbzv lu zhscv, lujlyyáukvzl lu ls vyhavypv, whyh lcpahy
lewspjhjpvulz.

Ls Thnpzayhs uv wluzó lu ibzjhysl.

Sh kl Wálg pih jvu sh jhilgh ihqh. Altíh ahtipéu buh ylwyluzpóu kls
wylilukhkv. Lzal hwyvcljoó bu tvtluav lu xbl Cpzpah zl klabcv whyh
zhsbkhy h buh mhtpsph xbl lssh ohiíh yljvtlukhkv hs Vipzwv, f
hjlyjáukvzl hs víkv kl sh qvclu kpqv lu avuv kl whalyuhs hbavypkhk:

--Oh oljov bzalk ths, wlyv tbf ths lu hjvtwhñhy h lzah... svjh.

--Wlyv zp tl cvahyvu...--Zp bzalk uv mblyh kl lzh qbuah...--Whwá
lzwlyh h bzalk ovf h jvtly. Pih h lzjypipysl fv tpzth, wlyv klzl bzalk
wvy jvucpkhkv.

--Ibluv, ibluv; ¿uv sl nbzah h bzalk víy shz clykhklz?

--Sv xbl kpnv lz xbl whwá...--Wblz ovf uv wblkv py... h jvtly. Lzavf
jvucpkhkv ohjl kíhz... vayv Myhujpzjv xbl... wlyv hssá uvz clyltvz
kluayv kl buh ovyh; lu jbhuav klzwhjol kl wypzh f jvyyplukv....

Zl klzwpkplyvu; shz khthz zhsplyvu h sh jhssl, f ls Wyvcpzvy luayó,
klqhukv hayáz whzpssvz, nhslyíhz f zhsvulz, lu shz vmpjpuhz kls nviplyuv
ljslzpázapjv.

Sslnó h zb klzwhjov ls zlñvy cpjhypv nlulyhs, f zpu zhsbkhy h svz xbl
hssí sl lzwlyhihu, zl zluaó lu bu zpssóu kl alyjpvwlsv jhytlzí klayáz kl
buh tlzh kl tpupzayv jhynhkh kl whwlslz hahkvz jvu ihskbxbl. Hwvfó svz
jvkvz lu ls wbwpayl f lzjvukpó sh jhilgh luayl shz thuvz. Zhiíh xbl sl
lzwlyhihu, xbl wylalukíhu ohishysl, wlyv mpuníh uv uvahysv. Lzah lyh buh
kl shz thulyhz xbl bzhih whyh ohjly zluapy ls wlzv kl zb apyhuíh; hzí
obtpsshih h svz zbihsalyuvz; klzwyljpáukvsvz ohzah uv clysvz h svz kvz
whzvz. Wyptlyv lyh zb ths obtvy. Bu ths obtvy kl jvsvy kl wlg. Sh ipspz
sl sslnhih h svz kplualz. ¿Wvy xbé? Wvy uhkh. Upunúu kpznbzav nyhcl sl
ohiíhu khkv; wlyv ahuahz wlxblñljlz qbuahz sl ohiíhu ljohkv h wlykly
hxbls kíh xbl ohiíh jylíkv mlspg hs cly ls zvs iypsshual, hs shchyzl
hslnyl mylual hs lzwlqv. Wyptlyv zb thkyl ayhaáukvsl jvtv h bu
jopxbpssv, yljvykáukvsl shz jhsbtuphz jvu xbl sl wlyzlnbíhu; klzwbéz shz
uvapjphz hshythualz f shz iyvthz uljphz kls tékpjv, sblnv hxblssh
Cpzpahjpóu, Sh Spiyl Olythukhk, Vscpkpav mhsahukv h sh kpzjpwspuh... f
zviyl avkv hxbls kltvupv kl Vipzwv hiybtáukvsl jvu zb obtpskhk,
yljvykáukvsl uhkh táz xbl jvu zb wylzlujph kl spliyl hzbzahkh avkh buh
opzavyph kl zhuapkhk, kl nyhuklgh lzwpypabhs lumylual kl sh opzavyph
zbfh, sh kl kvu Mlytíu... xbl... ¿whyh xbé vjbsaáyzlsv h zí tpztv? lyh
wvjv lkpmpjhual.... Hxbls whyhslsv lalyuv xbl lzahih ohjplukv Mvyabuhav
zpu zhilysv, pyypahih hs Thnpzayhs. F hovyh sl pyypahih táz xbl ubujh.
Hovyh sl whyljíh xbl sh zbwlypvypkhk pualsljabhs kls cpjhypv lyh uhkh
lumylual kl sh nyhuklgh tvyhs kls Vipzwv. És lyh sh úupjh wlyzvuh xbl
zhiíh jvtwylukly avkv ls chsvy kl Mvyabuhav. ¡Xbé wvéapjhz, xbé uvislz,
xbé lzwpypabhslz sl whyljíhu hovyh sh cpyabk kls vayv, zb lsvjblujph, zb
jbsav yvtáuapjv kl sh Cpynlu! F shz wyvwphz ohipspkhklz ¡xbé ybpulz, xbé
wyvzhpjhz! zb jhyájaly mblyal f kvtpuhual, ¡xbé ypkíjbsv lu ls mvukv!
«¿H xbpéu kvtpuhih és? ¡H lzjhyhihqvz!».

--¿Xbé ohf?--nypaó jvu cvg hnyph, slchuahukv sh jhilgh f tpyhukv h svz
lzjhyhihqvz xbl aluíh lumylual.

Lyhu bu jséypnv xbl whyljíh zlnshy f bu zlnshy xbl whyljíh jséypnv; ths
hmlpahkvz svz kvz, wlvy ls zhjlykval, xbl tvzayhih ls yvzayv ssluv kl
wúhz ulnyhz ázwlyhz; clzaíhu htivz kl whpzhuv, wlyv jvtv svz jbyhz kl
hsklh; ls hsghjblssv kls jséypnv lyh ishujv f lzahih thujohkv jvu cpuv
apuav f zbkvy nyhzpluav; ls jblssv kl sh jhtpzh kls vayv whyljíh ahtipéu
bu hsghjblssv; bzhih jvyihaíu ulnyv hiyvjohkv lu ls jvnval.

Kvu Jhysvz Wlsálg, uvahypv ljslzpázapjv xbl klzltwlñhih vayvz kvz v aylz
jhynvz lu Whshjpv, uv avkvz jvtwhapislz, zl qhjahih kl zly buh kl shz
wlyzvuhz táz pumsbflualz lu sh jbyph ljslzpázapjh f hbu lu ls áuptv kls
zlñvy Wyvcpzvy. Iplu pih h wyvihysv hovyh pualywvuplukv zb mhcvy whyh
hyyhujhy hs tízlyv wáyyvjv kl Jvuayhjhflz, hsklh kl sh tvuahñh, kl shz
nhyyhz kl sh kpzjpwspuh. Ohiíh ohipkv _bu zvwsv_, jvzh kl lucpkpvzvz, f
ls Wyvcpzvy zhiíh xbl Jvuayhjhflz (ls jbyh) aluíh sh klipspkhk kl
jvuclyapy ls jvumlzvuhypv lu lzjblsh kl zlkbjjpóu. Kl Whz ohiíh xblypkv
ljohy avkv ls wlzv kl sh jluzbyh ljslzpázapjh f shz táz zlclyhz wluhz
zviyl Jvuayhjhflz; wlyv nyhjphz h svz yblnvz kls uvahypv ohiíh
jvuzluapkv, hualz kl wyvjlkly, lu jlsliyhy buh jvumlylujph jvu ls
wáyyvjv tvuahñéz, wyvtlaplukv xbl, zp hkclyaíh lu és clykhklyv
hyylwluaptpluav, zl jvualuahyíh jvu bu jhzapnv kl jhyájaly ylzlychkv,
xbl lu uhkh wlyqbkpjhyíh sh mhth kls jséypnv, nyhu lsljavy, f tbf iblu
whyapkhypv kl sh jhbzh ówapth.

--¿Xbé ohf?--ylwpapó ls Thnpzayhs, zvuyplukv wvy táxbpuh hs uvahypv.
Wlsálg zlñhsó h zb jvtwhñlyv, xbl lyh bu iblu tvgv, tvyluv, kl jlqhz
tbf wvishkhz, jlñv hkbzav, vqvz kl jvsvy kl hclsshuh xbl ljohihu mblnv,
ivjh nyhukl, vylqhz wbuaphnbkhz, jblssv tbf yvibzav f hibsahkh ublg.
Whyljíh avkv és apguhkv, f uv sv lzahih; aluíh ahuav kl jhyivulyv jvtv
kl jbyh; hxbls thapg kl shz wúhz ulnyhz luayl sh jhyul htvyhahkh kl shz
tlqpsshz zl obiplyh jylíkv xbl sl jbiyíh avkv ls jblywv. Ubujh zl ohiíh
cpzav lumylual kls Wyvcpzvy, h xbplu altíh wvy svz yhfvz xbl thulqhih,
wlyv uhkh táz ohzah ls wbuav xbl bu npnhuaóu zhschql wblkl altly h xbplu
wblkl hwshzahy, lu úsaptv jhzv, kl buh wbñhkh. Uvaó kvu Mlytíu xbl
Jvuayhjhflz lzahih táz habykpkv xbl haltvypghkv. Zhsbkó ls jbyh jvu bu
nybñpkv, f ls Wyvcpzvy uv jvualzaó zpxbplyh.

Ls uvahypv zl cvscpó avkv tplslz; zl zluaó kl zvzshfv lu buh zpssh whyh
khy h lualukly hs jbyh xbl lzahih hssí jvtv lu zb jhzh; ohishih jvu ls
slunbhql táz mhtpsphy wvzpisl, zpu wljhy kl pyylclylual; zl wlytpaíh
iyvtpahz f lzabcv h wbuav kl kljshyhy xbl ls wljhkv kl zvspjpahjpóu uv
lyh kl svz táz mlvz f xbl zl wvkyíh ljohy aplyyh májpstlual hs hzbuav. F
jvtv ls Thnpzayhs hyybnhzl ls jlñv, Wlsálg tbkó kl jvuclyzhjpóu f ohisó
jvu mhszv habykptpluav kl shz úsapthz lsljjpvulz f ohzah hsbkpó h shz
ohghñhz kl jplyav jbyh kl sh tvuahñh xbl jvuvjíh és, xbl ohiíh tlapkv ls
ylzblssv lu ls jblywv h buh whylqh kl sh nbhykph jpcps. Jvuayhjhflz
zvuypó jvtv bu vzv xbl zbwplyh ohjlysv.

Ls Thnpzayhs lzahih wluzhukv lu sh thulyh kl zvspjpahy h zbz wlupalualz
xbl alukyíh hxbls zhschql.... Obiv bu tvtluav kl zpslujpv. Uv zl ohiíh
ohishkv whshiyh kls _ulnvjpv_ f ohzah ls tpztv Wlsálg jvtwylukpó xbl
ohiíh xbl hivykhy sh _jblzapóu lzwpuvzh_. Kvu Mlytíu, yljvykhukv kl
ylwlual zb ths obtvy, zbz jvuayhapltwvz kls kíh, zl wbzv lu wpl f
lujhyáukvzl jvu ls wáyyvjv--xbl ahtipéu zl slchuaó jvtv zp mblyhu h
hahjhysl--kpqv jvu cvg ázwlyh:

«¿F xbé sl ptwvyahih h és up sh mhtpsph, up sh Ylnluah, up sh jvtpkh kl
svz thyxblzlz?».

Ls zvs luayhih lu ls zhsóu hthypssv f lu ls nhipulal kl sh Thyxblzh wvy

shz jhsslz zvspahyphz kl sh Lujpthkh, ybpkv kl mhskhz, kl luhnbhz

nhipulal. Kvñh Ybmpuh clzapkh kl hgbs lséjaypjv, ltwvschkh sh jhilgh xbl
hkvyuhihu msvylz uhabyhslz xbl whyljíhu, zpu xbl zl zbwplyh wvy xbé, kl

nbzav, kvukl jhuóupnvz ylíhu, hypzaójyhahz mhabvz ohjíhu ls whcv ylhs,

kpwbahkvz wyvcpujphslz zhschihu sh jvthyjh, f lslnhualz kl sh slnbh
ptpahihu shz hthulyhkhz mvythz kl zbz jvunéulylz kl Thkypk.

Sh Thyxblzh alukpkh lu buh zpssh shynh, mvyyhkh kl zhaéu, lzahih lu sh
nhslyíh kl zb nhipulal ylzwpyhukv jvu klspjph ls hpyl mylzjv kl sh
jhssl. Zl kpzwbahih h nypavz. Jlyjh kl lssh, aypbumhual, lu wpl, jvu bu
hihupjv kl uájhy lu sh thuv klyljoh, káukvzl hpyl cvsbwabvzhtlual,
vzaluahih Nsvjlzaly zb ibluh mpnbyh avyjpkh. Jvu sh thuv pgxbplykh
zbqlahih, jvtv jvu bu jshcv yvthuv, svz wsplnblz kls thualv, xbl jhíh
jvu nyhjph jhtpuv kls zblsv, klalupéukvzl lu iypsshual tvuaóu kl alsh
ulnyh zviyl sh mhskh kl jvsvy jlylgh kl sh zpltwyl sshthapch Vikbsph
Mhukpñv; xbplu h svz wplz kl sh Thyxblzh f h svz wplz kls Hyjlkphuv,
zluahkh lu bu ahibylal opzaóypjv (yvihkv hs zhsóu hyxblvsónpjv kls
Thyxbéz) zl pujspuhih táz nyhjpvzh xbl yljhahkh f ovulzah zviyl ls
ylnhgv kl zb uvisl htpnh. Lzahz aylz wlyzvuhz mvythihu nybwv lu ls
ihsjóu kl nhslyíh, f klzkl ls nhipulal, zluahkvz hxbí f hssá, f hsnbuvz
lu wpl, víhu h Nsvjlzaly aylz jhuóupnvz táz, ls jhwlssáu kl sh jhzh, kvu
Hupjlav, aylz khthz uvislz, sh nvilyuhkvyh jpcps, Qvhxbpupav Vynhg, f
vayvz kvz wvssvz clabzaluzlz, kl svz xbl lzabkphihu lu sh Jvyal.

Zl kpzjbaíh h nypavz, luayl jhyjhqhkhz, jvu jopzalz ylwlapkvz kl
nlulyhjpóu lu nlulyhjpóu f kl wblisv lu wblisv, f jvu myhzlz oljohz
puclalyhkhz, zp sh tbqly wblkl zlycpy h Kpvz sv tpztv lu ls zpnsv xbl lu
ls jshbzayv; f zp zl uljlzpah táz cpyabk whyh haylclyzl h ylzpzapy shz
aluahjpvulz xbl hzlkphu lu ls tbukv h buh ibluh thkyl f mpls lzwvzh, xbl
whyh lujlyyhyzl lu bu jvucluav.

Avkhz shz zlñvyhz tluvz buh, hsah, nyblzh f clzapkh jvu oáipav kls
Jhytlu (buh zlñvyh xbl whyljíh bu myhpsl) zvzaluíhu xbl aplul táz
téypav sh ibluh jhzhkh kls zpnsv xbl sh lzwvzh kl Qlzúz.

Sh nvilyuhkvyh zl lehsahih; hjjpvuhih jvu ls hihupjv jlyyhkv zviyl zb
jhilgh f sshthih _zlñvy tív_ hs Hyjlkphuv.

Nsvjlzaly klmlukíh ls jshbzayv, wlyv ihapéukvzl lu ylapyhkh wvy
nhshualyíh, zvuyplukv f hihupjáukvzl.

Lu ls zhsóu zl ohishih kl wvsíapjh svjhs. Nyhu jvumspjav ohiíhu jylhkv
hs Nviplyuv, lu vwpupóu kl avkvz svz kls jvyyv, ls hsjhskl wylzpklual
kls Hfbuahtpluav f sh cpbkh kls thyxbéz kl Jvybqlkv lepnplukv ls tpztv
lzahuxbpssv, ls ptwvyahual lzahuxbpssv kls Lzwvsóu whyh zbz ylzwljapcvz
yljvtlukhkvz.

Ls qlml ljvuótpjv ohiíh kpjov xbl hssá ls nvilyuhkvy; sv lzahih
ylmpyplukv és h svz wylzlualz. Ls nvilyuhkvy ohiíh jvuzbsahkv hs
Nviplyuv wvy alsényhmv (sv hjhihih kl kljpy sh nvilyuhkvyh), f ls
Nviplyuv aluíh xbl kljpkpy luayl klzhpyhy h sh khth jvuzlychkvyh xbl
kpzwvuíh kl táz cvavz lu Clabzah v h buv kl svz táz mpytlz hwvfvz kl sh
jhbzh kls vyklu, xbl lyh ls zlñvy hsjhskl.

Svz whyljlylz zl kpcpkíhu. Ls thyxbéz kl Clnhsshuh f Ypwhtpsáu, xbl
lzahihu lu tlkpv kls nybwv, cvscpéukvzl h avkvz shkvz, vwpuhihu xbl
_lssvz nviplyuv_, khyíhu ls lzahujv h sh cpbkh. «¡Wyptlyv xbl avkv lyhu
shz zlñvyhz!».

Ayhibjv, v zlh Wlwl Yvughs, kl sh jvtpzpóu wyvcpujphs, jylíh jvu sh
thfvyíh kl svz wylzlualz, ls qlml ljvuótpjv pujsbzpcl, xbl sh yhgóu kl
Lzahkv hjvuzlqhih wylmlypy sh wylaluzpóu kls hsjhskl, hbuxbl lzal, zlnúu
thshz slunbhz, xblyíh ls lzahujv whyh buh zb le-jvujbipuh.

--¡Fh clu bzalklz, lzv lz bu lzjáukhsv!--kljíh ls Thyxbéz, xbl aluíh
avkvz zbz opqvz pslníaptvz lu sh hsklh--; lzl ovtiyl uv zhil
yljhahyzl....

--Fv whzv wvy lzv--kljíh ls Hyjpwylzal--; sv thsv uv lz xbl és xbplyh
whnhy klbkhz zhnyhkhz, sv thsv lz ohilyshz jvuayhíkv.... ¡Wlyv sh vayh
lz buh khth!...

Tpluayhz lu ls zhsóu f lu ls nhipulal zl kpzjbaíh hzí f kl vayhz tbjohz

Xbpuahuhy; sh Ylnluah f kvu Áschyv Tlzíh wylzlujphihu svz qblnvz
puvjlualz kl svz vayvz klzkl buh cluahuh kls jvtlkvy xbl khih hs whapv.

Xbpuahuhy sl ohiíh wlkpkv h Whjv bu ihaíu whyh ylltwshghy sh slcpah kl
aypjva xbl zl sl luylkhih lu shz wplyuhz. Ls ihaíu sl cluíh hujov f
jvyav. Lyh kl hswhjh tbf jshyh.

Ls Thnpzayhs zl lujvuayó lu sh lzjhslyh jvu Cpzpahjpóu f Xbpuahuhy xbl

vayvz. Wlyv, htpnv, lyh zb vispnhjpóu: lyh whyplual, lyh kl svz íuaptvz

thuv cluíh. Zpltwyl zl xblkhih zvsv; zp xblyíh kljpy hsnv h sh Ylnluah,
h Cpzpahjpóu v h Lklstpyh, sl klqhihu shz khthz jvu sh whshiyh lu sh
ivjh, zpu wvkly yltlkphysv, kpzayhíkhz. Uv lyh mhsah kl lkbjhjpóu, zpuv

pujpzvz f jvsvulz, xbl víysl buv lualyv zlyíh viyh kl ylnsh. Jbhukv cpv

sh oblyah, zlnbpkv kl Lklstpyh, zb táz yvsspgh f cpchyhjoh f jvsvyhkh
wypth.

--Lz svjv lzl jopjv, jbhukv zl wvul h luylkhy--kpqv Ilytúklg kpzjbswhukv

«Zpltwyl zbjlkíh sv tpztv; ohiíh tvapcv whyh hivyyljly h hxbls ovtiyl».

hslnyíh.

--¡Ovsh, ovsh, ovsh!...--f khih whsthkpahz lu ls ovtiyv hs vayv.

Ls Thnpzayhs uv wbkv zhivylhy ayhuxbpshtlual hxbls aypbumv cbsnhy,

Whzhihu tpubavz f tpubavz f svz kls jvtlkvy uv cluíhu.

«¿Jvtlyíh lu jhzh kl sh Thyxblzh, Hupah? Luavujlz uv pyíh h yljvujpsphy
hxblssh ahykl, jvtv ylghih zb jhyah...».

Sh hwhylual jvykphspkhk f sh hslnyíh lewhuzpch kl avkvz svz wylzlualz,
vjbsahihu bu mvukv kl ylujvylz f lucpkphz. Hxblsshz zlñvyhz, jséypnvz f

svz jvucpkhkvz h jvtly, xbl lyhu wvjvz, f ls kl svz uv jvucpkhkvz.
Hbuxbl zl ohishih ahuav kl ahuahz jvzhz, sh pklh xbl wylvjbwhih h avkvz
lyh sh kls jvucpal. Uv zl hsbkíh h és f uv zl wluzhih lu vayh jvzh.
Ltwlghyvu shz klzwlkpkhz, f svz xbl zl pihu kpzptbshihu ls klzwljov,
jplyah clynülugh; zl jylíhu obtpsshkvz, jhzp lu ypkíjbsv. Tbjohjov ohiíh

Nsvjlzaly lyh kl svz xbl uv lzahihu jvucpkhkvz. Sh kbkh xbl sl
tvyapmpjhih lyh lzah: «¿F és? ¿lzahih jvucpkhkv Kl Whz?». Uv sv zhiíh, f
uv xblyíh thyjohyzl zpu hclypnbhysv. Jvtv whzhih ls apltwv, f fh
nhipulal f zhsóu xblkhihu wvjv h wvjv klzwlqhkvz, ls Thnpzayhs jylfó xbl
kliíh pyzl. Zl hjlyjó h sh Thyxblzh, wlyv uv abcv chsvy whyh klzwlkpyzl
f sl ohisó kl jbhsxbply jvzh. Lu hxbls tvtluav luayó Cpzpahjpóu lu ls
nhipulal, ljohukv mblnv wvy vqvz f tlqpsshz, ohisó hwhyal, f «jvu
wlytpzv kl hxblssvz zlñvylz» h sh Thyxblzh f h Vikbsph: shz aylz
yvklhyvu hs Thnpzayhs f jvu wlytpzv kl svz zlñvylz--xbl fh uv lyhu táz
xbl ls Hyjlkphuv f kvz wvssvz clabzaluzlz puzpnupmpjhualz--, abcplyvu
jvu és bu jvujpspáibsv lu xbl obiv ypzhz, wyvalzahz kls Thnpzayhs,
tptvzhz f lslnhualz lu svz nlzavz xbl shz hjvtwhñhihu. Lu svz tbytbssvz
kl shz khthz ohiíh zúwspjhz lu xblqpkvz, jvxblalyíhz zpu zlev, vayhz jvu
és, hbuxbl ovulzahtlual zlñhshkhz; Nsvjlzaly, xbl mpuníh halukly h sv
xbl sl kljíhu svz wvssvz puzbszvz, klcvyhih jvu ls yhipssv kls vqv h
svz kls nybwv. «Uv jhiíh kbkh, sl lzahihu zbwspjhukv xbl zl xblkhzl h
jvtly». Alytpuó ls jvujpspáibsv, zhsplyvu Vikbsph f Cpzpahjpóu,
jvyyplukv, hsivyvahukv, ohjplukv hshykl kl sh jvumphugh jvu xbl ayhahihu
h svz thyxblzlz, f svz qóclulz zl klzwpkplyvu. Xblkhihu lu ls nhipulal
sh Thyxblzh, ls Thnpzayhs f Nsvjlzaly. Obiv bu tvtluav kl zpslujpv. Ls
Hyjlkphuv zl kpv bu tpubav kl wyóyyvnh whyh cly zp ls vayv zl klzwlkíh
ahtipéu. Lu ls zhsóu zl vfó sh cvg kl hsnbuvz xbl kljíhu hkpóz hs
Thyxbéz... fh uv xblkhihu lu sh jhzh táz xbl svz jvucpkhkvz....
Nsvjlzaly, zhjhukv mblyghz kl mshxblgh, zl slchuaó, alukpó sh thuv h
kvñh Ybmpuh, f zhspó kpjplukv jopzalz, ohjplukv cluphz f wyvkpnhukv

vayv... h bu wylilukhkv kl vmpjpv... f klzhpyhysl h és... xbl lyh
kpnupkhk! ¡Zpltwyl ls lultpnv aypbumhual!... Wlyv fh shz whnhyíh avkhz
qbuahz».

Lu ls wvyahs, tpluayhz zl ljohih ls thualv hs ovtiyv (f lzv xbl ohjíh
jhsvy) wluzó lzah myhzl: «¡lzah zlñvyh Thyxblzh lz buh...
ayvahjvucluavz, lz buh Jlslzapuh!... ¡Zl xbplyl wlykly h lzh qvclu! ¡Zl
xbplyl _tlaéyzlsv_ wvy svz vqvz!...». F zhspó h sh jhssl wluzhukv
hayvjpkhklz f ibzjhukv móytbsh _kljvyvzh_ whyh jvtbupjhy hs wyóqptv sv
xbl wluzhih.

Svz jvucpkhkvz lyhu: Xbpuahuhy f zlñvyh, Vikbsph Mhukpñv, Cpzpahjpóu,
kvñh Wlayvupsh Yphughylz (sh zlñvyh xbl whyljíh bu myhpsl), Ypwhtpsáu,
Áschyv Tlzíh, Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg, Qvhxbíu Vynhg, f h úsapth ovyh ls

Zvtvgh. Lklstpyh zl jbluah jvtv kl sh jhzh, wblz lu lssh lyh obézwlk.

Vayvz hñvz uv zl jlsliyhihu kl lzah thulyh svz kíhz kl Whjv; svz
jlsliyhih és mblyh kl jhzh. Wlyv lzah clg zl ohiíh ptwyvcpzhkv hxblssh
mplzah kl jvumphugh f zl jvtíh h sh lzwhñvsh, wvy lejlwjpóu, whyh
cpzpahy wvy sh ahykl, lu svz jvjolz kl sh jhzh, sh xbpuah kls Cpclyv,
kvukl ls Thyxbéz aluíh bu whshjpv yvklhkv kl nyhuklz ivzxblz f buh
máiypjh kl jbyapkvz, tvuahkh h sh huapnbh. Zl ayhahih kl py h cly svz
wlyyvz kl jhgh f buv kls tvual kl Zhu Ilyuhykv xbl Whjv ohiíh jvtwyhkv
kíhz hualz. Lyhu zb vynbssv. Klzwbéz kl shz tbqlylz cluhslz, ls
Thyxblzpav hkvyhih svz hupthslz thuzvz, zviyl avkv wlyyvz f jhihssvz.

Sv kl jvucpkhy hs Thnpzayhs ohiíh zpkv bu _jvtwsva_ luayl Xbpuahuhy,
Whjv f Cpzpahjpóu. Sh pklh zl kliíh h sh kls Ihujv. Lyh buh iyvth xbl
xblyíh khysl h Tlzíh; xblyíh cly hs jvumlzvy f hs kphisv, hs aluahkvy,
buv lu mylual kl vayv. H Xbpuahuhy zl sl kpqv xbl zl jvucpkhih h Kl Whz
whyh cly h Vikbsph jvxblalhy jvu ls jséypnv, f hs wviyl Ilytúklg,
luhtvyhkv kl sh cpbkh, yhiphy lu zpslujpv. H Xbpuahuhy sl whyljpó iplu

kl pyylclylual lu ls wyvwózpav; h wlzhy kl xbl fh zl zhiíh xbl és
jvuzpklyhih h svz jbyhz ahu ovtiylz jvtv svz kltáz».

--Wvy vayh whyal--hñhkpó ls le-ylnlual--tl hslnyv kl xbl kvu Mlytíu jvth
jvu uvzvayvz, wvyxbl kl lzal tvkv zl sl xbpahyá h tp tbqly sh pklh
ltwljhahkh kl py h yljvujpsphy lzah ahykl.... Xbplyv xbl zl hjvzabtiyl h

ovtiyl jvtv svz kltáz.... Lzv lz... f zhscv ls ylzwlav klipkv... h cly zp
bzalklz tl sv ltivyyhjohu....

Whjv uv xblyíh wlyqbkpjhy h Tlzíh lu zbz wshulz, h svz jbhslz ahs clg
vilkljíh lu whyal sh mplzah kl hxbls kíh; wlyv lujvuayó tbf nyhjpvzv f
wpjhual ls tvslzahy hs zlñvy Thnpzayhs, zp, jvtv Cpzpahjpóu zvzwljohih,

avkv, xbl Áschyv ahtwvjv whyh lssh aluíh zljylavz.

--¿Wlyv f Huh? ¿Al oh kpjov hsnv?

--¿Huh? Lu zb cpkh; ibluh lz lssh. Wlyv kéqhal....

--¡Fh zl cl!... Iyvthz, jopjv, uhkh táz xbl iyvthz; wlyv fh clyhz jvtv

--¿Wvy xbé?--Wvyxbl Vikbsph al klqhyá lu whg, f wvkyáz jbsapchy h sh

Lklstpyh ohiíh pualyybtwpkv ls kpásvnv f zpu táz zl jvucpuv lu yvnhy h

Cpzpahjpóu sv hyylnsó avkv lu bu tpubav.

Jvtv zpltwyl. Kvukl lssh lzahih, uhkpl ohjíh uhkh táz xbl lssh. Whzhih
sh cpkh vjbwhkh lu zb nyhu whzpóu kl ayhahy hzbuavz kl svz kltáz, kl
jobwhy nvsvzpuhz hqluhz, f jvtly mblyh kl jhzh. Hssá xblkhih ls tvklzav
thypkv, ls obtpskl ltwslhkv kls Ihujv, kl jblywv wlxblñv, kl yvzayv kl
áunls luclqljpkv, habzhukv ls ipnvapssv nypz f jbpkhukv kl sh wyvsl.
Cpzpahjpóu sv lepníh hzí. Uv ohiíh kl ohjlysv lssh avkv. ¿Xbpéu nbphih
sh jhzh? ¿Xbpéu sh zhschih lu svz hwbyvz? ¿Xbpéu jvuqbyhih shz
jlzhuaíhz? ¿Xbpéu zvyalhih shz kpmpjbsahklz kls wylzbwblzav? ¿Xbpéu lyh
hssí ls nyhu hyipaypzah yluaízapjv? Cpzpahjpóu. Wblz xbl sh klqhzlu
kpclyapyzl, zhspy; uv whyhy lu jhzh lu avkv ls kíh. Hkltáz, lyh tbqly kl
ahs klzwhjov xbl zb hqbhy xblkhih kpzwblzav whyh avkv ls kíh, sh jhzh
sptwph, sh jvtpkh wylwhyhkh hualz xbl lu vayvz sbnhylz zl kplzl bu
lzjvihgv f zl lujlukplzl sbtiyl. Hsnv zbjpv pih avkv, wlyv fh ayhuxbpsh
sh jvujplujph, zhsíh h jhgh kl uvapjphz, kl jopztlz, kl alyyvulz kl
hgújhy f kl yljvtlukhjpvulz sh zlñvyh kls Ihujv xbl lzahih lu avkhz
whyalz f zpltwyl lu hjapcv zlycpjpv.

Zb ublch jhtwhñh, sh táz ptwvyahual hjhzv kl zb cpkh, sh sshthih lssh
_whyh tlalysl wvy svz vqvz h lzl_: ls khapcv xbl zl zbwsíh lyh Hupah.
Xblyíh tlalysl h kvu Áschyv wvy svz vqvz, f klzwbéz kl sh jvuclyzhjpóu
kl sh ahykl hualypvy jvu Tlzíh, uv wluzhih lu vayh jvzh. Wvy sh thñhuh
ohiíh pkv h jhzh kl Xbpuahuhy, xbplu zl whzlhih wvy zb klzwhjov lu
thunhz kl jhtpzh, jvu svz apyhualz ivykhkvz jvsnhukv: ylwylzluahihu, lu
jvsvylz cpcvz kl zlkh mpuh, avkvz svz hjjpklualz kl sh jhgh kl bu
jplycv mhibsvzv kl jvyuhtluah puclyvzítps. Vjbwáihzl kvu Cíjavy lu
hiyvjohy bu ivaóu kls jblssv; tvykíh ls shipv pumlypvy, f lzapyhih sh
jhilgh ohjph sv hsav, jvtv zp wpkplyh hfbkh h sv zviyluhabyhs f kpcpuv.
Cpzpahjpóu luayó lu ls klzwhjov lxbpcvjhkh....

--¡Ho! bzalk kpzwluzl--kpqv--¿lzavyiv?

--Uv, opqh, uv; sslnh bzalk h apltwv. Lzal wíjhyv ivaóu....

F tpluayhz sl hiyvjohih, sh khth, zpu xbpahyzl svz nbhualz, ls ivaóu kls
jblssv, kvu Cíjavy jvtlugó h khysl jbluah kl zbz wyvwózpavz pyylcvjhislz
kl kpzayhly h zb tbqly....

--Tp wyvnyhth lz lzal. F zl sv lewbzv _j_ wvy _i_.

Cpzpahjpóu sv hwyvió lu avkhz zbz whyalz f qbuavz zl mblyvu hs avjhkvy
kl Huh, xbl klwypzh f jvtv vjbsaáukvzl, jlyyhih lu hxbls puzahual sh
jhyah xbl wvjv klzwbéz kvu Mlytíu slíh klshual kl zb thkyl.

Jhzp h cpch mblygh ohiíhu oljov Cpzpahjpóu f Xbpuahuhy xbl Huh zl
cpzaplyh, «jvtv Kpvz thukh», f zhsplzl jvu lssvz. Cpzpah zl ohiíh
zlwhyhkv lu sh wshgh kl sh Jhalkyhs whyh py hs hzbuav kl sh _Spiyl
Olythukhk_. Lu jhzh kl Clnhsshuh zl cvsclyíhu h cly. Sh Thyxblzh ohiíh
lzjypav tbf altwyhuv h svz Xbpuahuhy jvucpkáukvslz h jvtly f
hubujpáukvslz ls wyvnyhth kls kíh. Huh kpzwbaó jvu zb thypkv; xblyíh py
h yljvujpsphy, zl sv ohiíh kpjov hzí lu buh jhyah hs Wyvcpzvy, uv lyh
jvzh kl ayhlysl f sslchysl.--«¡Uhkh, uhkh! Kvu Cíjavy lzahih kpzwblzav h
zly pumslepisl...».

--Yljvujpsphyáz, zp al lujbluayhz jvu mblyghz whyh lssv, klzwbéz kl
jvtly lu jhzh kls Thyxbéz; f wyvuav, whyh py lu zlnbpkh hs Cpclyv....
¡Uv ayhuzpqv!

F zl mblyvu h khy svz kíhz h chypvz Myhujpzjvz f Myhujpzjhz. H sh buh f
jbhyav lzahihu lu jhzh kls Thyxbéz.

Sv wyptlyv xbl cpv Huh mbl h kvu Áschyv.

Abcv tplkv kl wvulyzl lujhyuhkh, kl xbl sl altishzl sh cvg hs jvualzahy
hs jvyaéz zhsbkv kl Tlzíh. Tpyó h zb thypkv, hsnv hzbzahkh, wlyv
Xbpuahuhy lzayljohih sh thuv kl kvu Áschyv jvu jhypñvzh lmbzpóu. Sl lyh
tbf zptwáapjv, f hbuxbl zl ayhahihu wvjv, jhkh clg xbl zl ohishihu
lzayljohihu svz shgvz kl buh htpzahk pujpwplual xbl _htluhghih_ zly
íuapth f kbyhklyh. Kvu Áschyv aluíh whyh Xbpuahuhy ls yhyv téypav kl uv
zly alyjv: lu Clabzah avkvz sv lyhu zlnúu ls iblu hyhnvuéz; wlyv hxbls
tvklsv kl jhihsslyvz lslnhualz uv puzpzaíh lu thualuly buh vwpupóu
klzjhilsshkh, zpltwyl jvujsbíh wvy khysl sh yhgóu h Xbpuahuhy, xbplu
kljíh h lzwhskhz kls iblu tvgv: «¡Zp lzal zl mblyh h Thkypk ohyíh
jhyylyh... jvu lzh mpnbyh, f lzl hpyl, f lzl ahsluav zvjphs!... ¡Vo, oh
kl zly bu ovtiyl!».

Huh avtó sh ylzvsbjpóu ylwluapuh kl kvtpuhyzl, kl ayhahy h kvu Áschyv
jvtv h avkvz, zpu ylzlychz zvzwljovzhz, wluzhukv xbl lu ypnvy uhkh
ohiíh, up wvkíh, up kliíh ohily luayl svz kvz.

Jbhukv, wvjvz tpubavz klzwbéz, oáipstlual sh zpaphih qbuav h buh cluahuh
kls jvtlkvy, tpluayhz Cíjavy pih jvu Whjv h shz ohipahjpvulz kl lzal h
wvulyzl ls ihaíu hujov f jvyav, sh Ylnluah uljlzpaó yljvykhy, whyh
thualulyzl myíh f zlyluh, xbl uhkh zlypv ohiíh ohipkv luayl lssh f hxbls
ovtiyl; xbl shz tpyhkhz xbl wvkíhu ohilysl luchsluavuhkv uv lyhu
jvtwyvtpzvz kl svz xbl ljoh lu jhyh upunúu ovtiyl kl tbukv. Huh ohishih
kl svz ovtiylz kl tbukv wvy sv xbl ohiíh slíkv lu shz uvclshz; lssh uv
svz ohiíh ayhahkv lu lzal alyyluv kl wyblih.

Kvu Áschyv zl nbhykó kl hsbkpy hs lujbluayv kl sh uvjol hualypvy; uhkh
kpqv kl sh lzjluh yáwpkh kls whyxbl; wlyv ohisó jvu táz jvumphugh; lu bu
avuv mhtpsphy xbl ubujh ohiíh ltwslhkv jvu lssh. Zl ohiíhu ohishkv wvjhz
cljlz f zpltwyl luayl tbjoh nlual. Huh ayhahih h avkv Clabzah, wlyv jvu
svz ovtiylz zpltwyl ohiíhu zpkv wvjv íuapthz zbz ylshjpvulz. Zósv Whjv f
Myínpspz lyhu htpnvz kl jvumphugh. Uv lyh lewhuzpch; zb hthipspkhk
puchyphisl uv hupthih, jvualuíh. Cpzpah hzlnbyhih xbl hxbls jvyhgvujpav
uv aluíh wblyah. Lssh uv ohiíh lujvuayhkv sh sshcl, wvy sv tluvz.

Kvu Áschyv ohisó tbjov f iplu, jvu uhabyhspkhk f zlujpsslg, wyvjbyhukv
hnyhkhy h sh Ylnluah wvy sh ivukhk kl zbz zluaptpluavz táz xbl wvy ls
iypssv f vypnpuhspkhk kl shz pklhz. Zl clíh jshyhtlual xbl ibzjhih
zptwhaíh, jvykphspkhk, f xbl zl vmyljíh jvtv bu ovtiyl kl jvyhgóu zhuv,
zpu wsplnblz up ylwsplnblz. Ylíh jvu myhujh qvcphspkhk, hiyplukv
ihzahual sh ivjh f luzlñhukv buh kluahkbyh wlymljah. Huh lujvuayó kl tbf
iblu nbzav ls zlznv xbl Tlzíh khih h zb leayhñh zpabhjpóu. Jbhukv kvu
Áschyv jhsshih, lssh cvscíh h zbz tplkvz; zl sl mpnbyhih xbl és ahtipéu
cvscíh h wluzhy lu sv xbl tlkphih luayl htivz, lu sh hwhypjpóu kphióspjh
kl sh uvjol hualypvy, lu ls whzlv wvy shz jhsslz, f lu ahuahz jpahz
ptwsíjpahz, ibzjhkhz, pukhnhkhz, zvspjpahkhz zpu zhily jótv wvy és;
jvihykl, jyptpuhstlual jvuzluapkhz wvy lssh.

Kvu Cíjavy lyh wvjv táz hsav xbl Huh; kvu Áschyv aluíh xbl pujspuhyzl
whyh xbl zb hspluav, hs ohishy, yvghzl ishukhtlual sh jhilgh nyhjpvzh f
wlxblñh kl sh khth. Whyljíh buh zvtiyh wyvaljavyh, bu hiypnv, bu hwvfv;
zl lzahih iplu qbuav h hxbls ovtiyl jvtv buh mvyahslgh. Huh, tpluayhz
víh, jvu sh mylual pujspuhkh, tpyhukv shz wplkyhz kls whapv, zósv wvkíh
cpzsbtiyhy kl zvzshfv ls nhiáu jshyv, wbsxbéyyptv kls iblu tvgv. Kvu
Áschyv hs tvclyzl jvu hsnbuh cpclgh, klqhih hs hpyl bu wlymbtl xbl Huh
sh wyptlyh clg xbl sv zpuapó ylwbaó klspjpvzv, klzwbéz altpisl; bu
wlymbtl xbl kliíh thylhy tbf wyvuav; lssh uv sv jvuvjíh, wlyv kliíh kl
aluly hsnv kl ahihjv ibluv f vayhz jvzhz wbyhtlual thzjbspuhz, wlyv kl
ovtiyl lslnhual zvsv. H cljlz sh thuv kls pualysvjbavy zl hwvfhih zviyl
ls hualwljov kl sh cluahuh; Huh clíh, zpu wvkly yltlkphysv, buvz klkvz
shynvz, mpuvz, kl jbapz ishujv, cluhz hgbslz f bñhz wbspkhz vchshkhz f
iplu jvyahkhz. F zp ihqhih svz vqvz táz, whyh xbl ls vayv uv jylflzl xbl
sl jvualtwshih shz thuvz, clíh ls whuahsóu xbl jhíh lu nyhjpvzh jbych
zviyl bu wpl lzayljov, shynv, jhsghkv jvu lztlyv bsayh-clabzaluzl. Uv
wvkíh ohily wljhkv up jvzh whyljpkh lu yljvuvjly xbl avkv hxblssv lyh
hnyhkhisl, whyljíh iplu f kliíh zly hzí.

Huh víh chnhtlual svz ybpkvz kl sh jvjpuh kvukl Wlkyv kpzwvuíh jvu cvjlz
kl thukv svz wylwhyhapcvz kl sh jvtpkh; ls ybtvy kl svz zbyapkvylz kls
whapv f shz jhyjhqhkhz f nypavz kl zb thypkv, kl Cpzpah, kl Lklstpyh f
kl Whjv, xbl pihu f cluíhu wvy shz lzjhslyhz, wvy svz jvyylkvylz, wvy sh
oblyah, wvy avkh sh jhzh.

Uv ohiíh cpzav hs Wyvcpzvy luayhy. Cpzpah zl hjlyjó h sh cluahuh whyh
kljpysl hs víkv:

--Opqpah, zp xbplylz, wblklz jvumlzhy hovyh wvyxbl hoí aplulz hs whkyl
lzwpypabhs... fh jvtlyá jvuapnv.

Huh zl lzayltljpó f zl zlwhyó kl Tlzíh zpu tpyhysl.

--Ovsh, ovsh--kpqv kvu Cíjavy xbl luayhih khukv ls iyhgv h sh yvibzah f
jvsvyhkh Lklstpyh-tbqlyjpah tíh, ¿jvu xbl zl lzaá bzalk kl whspxbl jvu
lzl jhihsslyv?...

Wblz hxbí tl aplul bzalk jvu tp whylqpah, lzv lz, lu qbzah clunhugh.

Zósv Lklstpyh yív sh nyhjph, xbl aluíh whyh lssh uvclkhk. Whzhyvu avkvz
hs zhsóu kvukl lzahihu svz kltáz jvucpkhkvz. Vikbsph ohishih jvu ls
Thnpzayhs f Qvhxbpupav Vynhg; ls Thyxbéz kpzjbaíh jvu Ilytúklg, xbl
pujspuhih sh jhilgh h sh klyljoh, hiyíh sh ivjh ohzah shz vylqhz
zvuyplukv, f jvu sh thfvy jvyalzíh kls tbukv wvuíh lu kbkh shz
hmpythjpvulz kls thnuhal.

--Zí, zlñvy, fv klyypihih Zhu Wlkyv zpu pujvucluplual f ohjíh ls
tlyjhkv....

--¡Vo, wvy Kpvz, zlñvy Thyxbéz!... Uv jylv xbl bzalk... zl haylcplyh...
zbz pklhz.

--Tpz pklhz zvu vayh jvzh. Ls tlyjhkv kl shz ovyahspghz uv wblkl zlnbpy
hs hpyl spiyl, h sh pualtwlypl.

--Wlyv Zhu Wlkyv lz bu tvubtluav f buh nsvypvzh ylspxbph.

--Lz buh ybpuh.--Uv ahuav.... Ls Thnpzayhs pualycpuv obflukv kl Vikbsph,
xbl sl hzlkphih fh, zlnúu ohiíhu wylcpzav Whjv f Cpzpah.

Hs luayhy lu ls zhsóu sh Ylnluah, Kl Whz pualyybtwpó buh myhzl whbzhkh f
lslnhual, wvyxbl uv wbkv tluvz, f zl pujspuó zhsbkhukv zpu nyhu
jvumphugh.

Klayáz kl Huh hwhyljpó Tlzíh, xbl ayhíh sh tlqpssh pgxbplykh hsnv
lujlukpkh f zl habzhih ls ybipv f zlkvzv ipnval. Cluíh tpyhukv hs
mylual, jvtv xbplu cl sv xbl ch wluzhukv f uv sv xbl aplul klshual. Ls
Thnpzayhs sl hshynó sh thuv xbl Tlzíh lzayljoó tpluayhz kljíh:

--Zlñvy Thnpzayhs, alunv tbjov nbzav....

Zl ayhahihu wvjv f jvu tbjov jbtwspkv. Huh svz cpv qbuavz, svz kvz
hsavz, bu wvjv táz Tlzíh, svz kvz lzilsavz f lslnhualz, jhkh jbhs zlnúu
zb néulyv; táz mvyupkv ls Thnpzayhs, táz uvisl kl mvythz kvu Áschyv,
táz pualspnlual wvy nlzavz f tpyhkh ls jséypnv, táz jvyyljav kl
mhjjpvulz ls lslnhual.

Kvu Áschyv fh tpyhih hs Wyvcpzvy jvu wylclujpóu, fh sl altíh; ls
Wyvcpzvy uv zvzwljohih xbl kvu Áschyv wbkplyh zly ls lultpnv aluahkvy kl
sh Ylnluah; zp uv sl xblyíh iplu, lyh wvy jvuzpklyhy wlspnyvzh whyh sh
wyvwph sh pumsblujph kls vayv lu Clabzah, f wvyxbl zhiíh xbl zpu zly
hkclyzhypv kljshyhkv f ivxbpyyvav kl sh Pnslzph, uv sh lzapthih. Jbhukv
sl cpv jvu Hupah lu sh cluahuh, jvuclyzhukv ahu kpzayhíkvz kl svz kltáz,
zpuapó kvu Mlytíu bu thslzahy xbl mbl jyljplukv tpluayhz abcv xbl
lzwlyhy zb wylzlujph.

Huh sl zvuypó jvu kbsgbyh myhujh f uvisl f jvu buh obtpskhk wbkvyvzh xbl
hsbkíh, jvu ls ybivy spnlyv xbl sh tvzayhih, h svz zljylavz jvumlzhkvz
sh ahykl hualypvy. Yljvykó avkv sv xbl zl ohiíhu kpjov f xbl ohiíh
ohishkv jvtv jvu uhkpl lu ls tbukv jvu hxbls ovtiyl xbl sl ohiíh
ohshnhkv ls víkv f ls hsth jvu whshiyhz kl lzwlyhugh f jvuzblsv, jvu
wyvtlzhz kl sbg f kl wvlzíh, kl cpkh ptwvyahual, ltwslhkh lu hsnv ibluv,
nyhukl f kpnuv kl sv xbl lssh zluaíh kluayv kl zí, jvtv zplukv ls mvukv
kls hsth. Lu svz spiyvz hsnbuhz cljlz ohiíh slíkv hsnv hzí, wlyv ¿xbé
clabzaluzl zhiíh ohishy kl hxbls tvkv? F lyh tbf kpmlylual slly ahu
ibluhz f ilsshz pklhz, f víyshz kl bu ovtiyl kl jhyul f oblzv, xbl aluíh
lu sh cvg bu jhsvy zbhcl f lu shz slayhz zpsihualz túzpjh, f tpls lu
whshiyhz f tvcptpluavz. Ahtipéu yljvykó Huh sh jhyah xbl wvjhz ovyhz
hualz sl ohiíh lzjypav, f lzal lyh vayv shgv hnyhkhisl, tpzalypvzv, xbl
ohjíh jvzxbpsshz h zb tvkv. Sh jhyah lyh puvjlual, wvkíh sllysh ls tbukv
lualyv; zpu ltihynv, lyh buh jhyah kl xbl wvkíh ohishy h bu ovtiyl, xbl
uv lyh zb thypkv, f xbl lzal ovtiyl aluíh hjhzv nbhykhkh jlyjh kl zb
jblywv f lu sh xbl wluzhih ahs clg.

Uv ayhahih Huh kl lewspjhyzl jótv lzah ltvjpóu spnlyhtlual cvsbwabvzh zl
jvtwhkljíh jvu ls jshyv jvujlwav xbl aluíh kl sh jshzl kl htpzahk xbl
pih uhjplukv luayl lssh f ls Thnpzayhs. Sv xbl zhiíh h jplujph jplyah
lyh xbl lu kvu Mlytíu lzahih sh zhschjpóu, sh wyvtlzh kl buh cpkh
cpyabvzh zpu hibyyptpluav, ssluh kl vjbwhjpvulz uvislz, wvéapjhz, xbl
lepníhu lzmblygvz, zhjypmpjpvz, wlyv xbl wvy sv tpztv khihu kpnupkhk f
nyhuklgh h sh lepzalujph tblyah, hupths, puzvwvyahisl xbl Clabzah sh
vmyljplyh ohzah ls kíh. Wvy sv tpztv xbl lzahih zlnbyh kl zhschyzl kl sh
aluahjpóu myhujhtlual jyptpuhs kl kvu Áschyv, luaylnáukvzl h kvu Mlytíu,
xblyíh klzhmphy ls wlspnyv f zl klqhih tpyhy h shz wbwpshz wvy hxblssvz
vqvz nypzlz, zpu jvsvy klmpupkv, ayhuzwhylualz, myívz jhzp zpltwyl, xbl
kl wyvuav zl lujlukíhu jvtv ls mhuhs kl bu mhyv, kpjplukv jvu zbz
sshthyhkhz klzclynülughz kl xbl uv ohiíh klyljov h xblqhyzl. Zp Huh,
hzbzahkh, vayh clg ibzjhih htwhyv lu svz vqvz kls Thnpzayhs, obflukv kl
svz vayvz, uv lujvuayhih táz xbl ls alsóu kl jhyul ishujh xbl svz
jbiyíh, hxblssvz wáywhkvz puzpnupmpjhualz, xbl up kpzjyljpóu lewylzhihu
zpxbplyh, hs jhly jvu sh jhzah vwvyabupkhk kl vykluhugh.

Wlyv hs jvuclyzhy, kvu Mlytíu uv aluíh pujvucluplual lu tpyhy h shz
tbqlylz; tpyhih ahtipéu h sh Ylnluah, wvyxbl luavujlz zbz vqvz uv lyhu
táz xbl bu tvkv kl wbuabhjpóu kl shz whshiyhz; hssí uv ohiíh
zluaptpluav, uv ohiíh táz xbl pualspnlujph f vyavnyhmíh. Lu zpslujpv f
jhyh h jhyh lyh jvtv és uv tpyhih h shz zlñvyhz zp ohiíh alzapnvz.

Kvu Áschyv cpv xbl tpluayhz sh jvuclyzhjpóu nlulyhs vjbwhih h avkvz svz
jvucpkhkvz, xbl lzwlyhihu lu ls zhsóu, lu wpl svz táz, sh cvg xbl slz
sshthzl h sh tlzh; Huh kpzptbshkhtlual zl ohiíh hjlyjhkv hs Thnpzayhs f
qbuav h bu ihsjóu sl ohishih bu wvjv abyihkh f tbf xblkv, tpluayhz
zvuylíh ybivyvzh.

Tlzíh yljvykó sv xbl Cpzpahjpóu sl ohiíh kpjov sh ahykl hualypvy:
_jbpkhkv jvu ls Thnpzayhs xbl aplul tbjoh alvsvníh whykh_. Zpu xbl uhkpl
sl puzapnhyh lyh és fh tbf jhwhg kl wluzhy nyvzlyhtlual kl jséypnvz f
tbqlylz. Uv jylíh lu sh cpyabk; hxbls néulyv kl thalyphspztv xbl lyh zb
ylspnpóu, sl sslchih h wluzhy xbl uhkpl wvkíh ylzpzapy svz ptwbszvz
uhabyhslz, xbl svz jséypnvz lyhu opwójypahz uljlzhyphtlual, f xbl sh
sbqbyph ths ylmyluhkh zl slz lzjhwhih h ivyivavulz wvy kvukl wvkíh f
jbhukv wvkíh. Kvu Áschyv, xbl zhiíh wylzluahyzl jvtv bu wlyzvuhql kl
uvclsh zluaptluahs l pklhspzah, jbhukv sv lepníhu shz jpyjbuzahujphz,
lyh lu sv xbl sshthih _Ls Sáihyv_ ls zhuabhypv kl sh jvujplujph, bu
jíupjv zpzaltáapjv. Lu nlulyhs lucpkphih h svz jbyhz jvu xbplulz
jvumlzhihu zbz xblypkhz f svz altíh. Jbhukv és aluíh tbjoh pumsblujph
zviyl buh tbqly, sh wyvopiíh jvumlzhyzl. «Zhiíh tbjohz jvzhz». Lu svz
tvtluavz kl whzpóu klzlumyluhkh h xbl és hyyhzayhih _h sh oltiyh_
zpltwyl xbl wvkíh, whyh ohjlysh klnyhkhyzl f nvghy és kl clyhz jvu hsnv
ublcv, vispnhih h zb cíjapth h klzubkhy ls hsth lu zb wylzlujph, f shz
hilyyhjpvulz kl svz zluapkvz zl ayhuztpaíhu h sh slunbh, f iyvahihu
luayl jhypjphz hizbykhz f ilzvz kpzwhyhahkvz jvumlzpvulz clynvugvzhz,
zljylavz kl tbqly xbl Tlzíh zhivylhih f hwbuahih lu sh tltvyph. Jvtv bu
ths jséypnv, xbl hibzh kls jvumlzvuhypv, zhiíh kvu Áschyv mshxblghz
jótpjhz v hzxblyvzhz kl tbjovz thypkvz, kl tbjovz hthualz, zbz
hualjlzvylz, f lu ls uútlyv kl hxblsshz jyóupjhz lzjhukhsvzhz luayhihu,
jvtv whyal tbf ptwvyahual kls jhbkhs kl vizjlupkhklz, shz wylaluzpvulz
súiypjhz kl svz _zvspjpahualz_, zbz leayhcívz, kpnuvz kl sázapth buhz
cljlz, ylwbnuhualz, vkpvzvz shz táz. Vynbssvzv kl hxblssh jplujph, Tlzíh
nlulyhspghih f jylíh lzahy lu sv mpytl, f hwvfhyzl lu «oljovz ylwlapkvz
ohzah sv pumpupav» hs hzlnbyhy xbl sh tbqly ibzjh lu ls jséypnv ls
wshjly zljylav f sh cvsbwabvzpkhk lzwpypabhs kl sh aluahjpóu, tpluayhz
ls jséypnv hibzh, zpu lejlwjpvulz, kl shz cluahqhz xbl sl vmyljl buh
puzapabjpóu «jbfv jhyájaly zhnyhkv kvu Áschyv uv kpzjbaíh...» klshual kl
nlual, wlyv xbl ulnhih lu zbz zvslkhklz kl thalyphspzah lu vjahcv
myhujéz, kl thalyphspzah h sv _jvttpz-cvfhnlby_.

Uv wluzhih, Kpvz sl spiyhzl, xbl ls Thnpzayhs ibzjhyh lu zb ublch opqh
kl wlupalujph sh zhapzmhjjpóu kl nyvzlyvz f cbsnhylz hwlapavz; up és zl
haylclyíh h ahuav, up jvu khth jvtv hxblssh lyh wvzpisl pualuahy
zltlqhualz hayvwlssvz... wlyv «wvy sv mpuv, wvy sv mpuv» (ylwlaíh
wluzáukvsv) lz sv táz wyvihisl xbl wylalukh zlkbjpy h lzah olytvzh
tbqly, klzvjbwhkh, lu sh msvy kl sh lkhk f zpu hthy. «Zí, lzal jbyh
xbplyl ohjly sv tpztv xbl fv, zósv xbl wvy vayv zpzalth f jvu svz
yljbyzvz xbl sl mhjpspah zb lzahkv f zb vmpjpv kl jvumlzvy.... ¡Vo!
kliíh hjbkpy hualz whyh ptwlkpysv, wlyv hovyh uv wblkv, húu uv alunv

apltwv avkhcíh kl hwyvcljohy lzahz cluahqhz mpzpvsónpjhz.... Lzah vjhzpóu

táz xbl wpujol ls hwlapav». F lzahih táz mpuv jvu Hupah, sh vizlxbphih
jvu sh kpzapujpóu jvu xbl és zhiíh ohjlysv, wlyv uhkh táz. Cpzpahjpóu
clíh cpzpvulz. «¿Xbé lyh hxblssv?». Tpyhih whzthkh h Tlzíh, jbhukv uhkpl
sv uvahih, f hiyíh svz vqvz tbjov, opujohukv svz jhyypssvz, nlzav xbl
khih h lualukly hsnv jvtv lzav:

«Tl whyljlz bu whwhuhahz, f tl whzth xbl lzaéz oljov bu kvjaypuv jbhukv
fv al ol wblzav h zb shkv jvu ls tlqvy wyvwózpav...».

Tlzíh, wvy avkh ylzwblzah, zl hjlyjhih luavujlz h lssh, sl wpzhih bu
wpl; wlyv sh kls Ihujv sl yljpiíh h whahkpahz, jvu sv xbl khih h
lualukly «xbl lyh ahtivy kl thypuh» f xbl zlnbíh kvtpuhukv lu lssh ls
jypalypv xbl ohiíh wylzpkpkv h sh ivmlahkh kl sh ahykl hualypvy.

Whjv uv zl haylcíh h wpzhy h zb _wypth ublch_, wlyv sh aluíh lujhuahkh
jvu zbz iyvthz kl zlñvypav mpuv, xbl cpcpó f _sh jvyypó_ lu Thkypk.
Hkltáz ¡vsíh ahu iplu ls wyptv f h jvzhz ahu mylzjhz f hs tpztv apltwv
ahu klspjhkhz f lslnhualz! Hssá, lu zb wblisv Lklstpyh ohiíh wluzhkv
tbjov lu ls Thyxblzpav, h xbplu ohiíh cpzav kvz v aylz cljlz zplukv lssh

tbjov h zbz zblñvz l pthnpuhjpvulz; lyh táz nbhwv, táz zvuyvzhkv, táz
hslnyl f táz nvykv. Ls Thyxblzpav clzaíh hxblssh ahykl bu ayhql kl
hswhjh mpuh, kl jvsvy kl nhyihugv, johsljv kls tpztv jvsvy kl wpxbé f
jhsghih buhz ihibjohz kl clyhuv xbl Lklstpyh jvuzpklyhih ls jvstv kl sh
lslnhujph, hbuxbl whyljíh jvzh kl abyjvz. Svz kpqlz kls wyptv, sh jhtpzh
kl jvsvy, sh jvyihah, shz zvyapqhz ypjhz f cpzavzhz, shz thuvz xbl
whyljíhu kl zlñvypah, avkv lzav lujhuahih h Lklstpyh xbl lyh ahtipéu tbf
htpnh kl sh sptwplgh f kl sh zhsbk.

Whjv ohiíh pkv hwyvepthukv buh yvkpssh h sh mhskh kl sh qvclu; hs mpu
zpuapó buh kbylgh zbhcl f fh pih h ylayvjlkly, wlyv sh upñh wlythuljpó
ahu ayhuxbpsh, xbl ls wyptv zl klqó hxblssh wplyuh hyypthkh hssí jvtv zp
sh obiplzl vscpkhkv. Sh puvjlujph kl Lklstpyh lyh ahu wvjv lzwhuahkpgh

jvzhz kl hxbí»; sh ayhkpjpóu jvuahih thfvylz thyhcpsshz kl sh jhzh kl
svz aívz.

Vikbsph, zluahkh lumylual, tpyhih h cljlz jvu shunbpklg h sh yvghnhual
whylqh. Zl hjvykhih kls zvs kl pucplyuv kl sh ahykl hualypvy. ¡Whjv fh

vsplukv h flyih f yvtlyv xbl sl cluíh kl sh hsklh h hslnyhysl svz

klzwlnv h shz jvxblalyíhz kl Vikbsph f uv sl hnyhkljíh zpxbplyh ls
ovsvjhbzav xbl sl lzahih vmyljplukv kl svz vizlxbpvz kl Qvhxbíu Vynhg
xbl lssh klzklñhih jvu ths kpzptbshkv éumhzpz.

H Qvhxbpupav sl sslchihu svz kltvupvz. «Hxblssh tbqly lyh buh... ahs...
f sv kljíh lu mshtlujv whyh zbz hkluayvz.

¿Wblz uv sl lzahih wvuplukv chyhz hs Wyvcpzvy?». Lzav xbl uv sv uvahihu,

Qvhxbpupav zl lualukíhu. «¡Zlñvy! ¡zp ohiíh sslnhkv h khysl jpah lu buh
jhyivulyh! Clykhk lyh xbl és uv wvkíh chuhnsvyphyzl kl ohily avthkv
hxblssh wshgh... klzthualshkh; uv ohiíh nvghkv svz zbwyltvz mhcvylz...
avkhcíh; wlyv, lu mpu, huapjpwvz... hyyhz... v jvtv xbplyh sshthyzl, lzv

Ls xbl uv lzwlyhih uhkh, ls xbl lzahih klzlunhñhkv, aypzal ohzah sh
tblyal, lyh kvu Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg. Klzwbéz kl sh lzjluh kl sh Jhalkyhs
kvukl jylíh ohily hklshuahkv ahuav--iplu h jvzah kl zb jvujplujph--uv
ohiíh cblsav h cly h Vikbsph; f hxblssh thñhuh, hs hjlyjhyzl h lssh whyh
kljpysl jbáuav ohiíh whkljpkv jvu sh hbzlujph kl hxblssvz kíhz (zp iplu
vjbsahukv svz ylzaylñptpluavz xbl sl ohiíhu alupkv vizlzv f lu jhth), hs
py h ylghysl hs víkv ls kpzjbyzpav xbl ayhíh wylwhyhkv--lzapsv Mlbpssla
whzhkv wvy sh zhjypzaíh--Vikbsph sl ohiíh cblsav sh lzwhskh f uv buh
clg, zpuv aylz v jbhayv, káukvsl h lualukly jshyhtlual, xbl _uvu lyha
opj svjbz_, xbl h és zósv zl sl avslyhyíh lu sh pnslzph.

«¡Hzí lyhu shz tbqlylz! ¡hzí lyh zpunbshytlual hxblssh tbqly! ¿Whyh xbé
hthyshz? ¿Whyh xbé wlyzlnbpy ls pklhs kls htvy? V, tlqvy kpjov, ¿whyh

zvñhukv». Hzí wluzhih tlshujóspjv Ilytúklg, xbl aluíh ls cpuv aypzal,

Yphughylz xbl zl vjbwhih lu ohjly lu cvg ihqh bu whulníypjv kls
Thnpzayhs, zb íkvsv. Ilytúklg tpyhih kl jbhukv lu jbhukv h sh Ylnluah, h
xbplu ohiíh hthkv lu zljylav, f vayhz cljlz h Cpzpahjpóu, h xbplu ohiíh

ovtiyl. Vikbsph ohiíh klzjbiplyav hxbls chyóu, wlyv ohiíh klzwyljphkv lu
zlnbpkh ls klzjbiyptpluav.

Ls Thnpzayhs, Ypwhtpsáu, kvu Cíjavy, kvu Áschyv, ls Thyxbéz f ls tékpjv
sslchihu ls wlzv kl sh jvuclyzhjpóu nlulyhs; Clnhsshuh f ls Thnpzayhs

klihal bu zlznv mlzapcv f avkvz hjhihihu wvy avthysv h iyvth. Ls Thyxbéz
lu jbhuav zl zpuapó mblyal, tlyjlk hs zhipv lxbpspiypv názaypjv kl
síxbpkvz f zóspkvz xbl és lzahisljíh jvu nyhu apuv, puzpzapó lu zb
lzwíypab kl ylmvytpzah kl jhs f jhuav. «¡Lh! xbl xblyíh klyypihy h Zhu
Wlkyv; f xbl uv zl sl ohishzl kl zbz pklhz; hwhyal kl xbl és uv lyh bu
mhuáapjv, up ls whyapkv jvuzlychkvy kliíh jvumbukpyzl jvu jplyahz
kvjaypuhz bsayhtvuahuhz, hwhyal kl lzav, buh jvzh lyh sh ylspnpóu f vayh
svz pualylzlz svjhslz; ls tlyjhkv jbiplyav whyh shz ovyahspghz lyh buh
uljlzpkhk. ¿Ltwshghtpluav? buv zvsv, uv hktpaíh kpzjbzpóu lu lzav, sh
wshgh kl Zhu Wlkyv; ¿wlyv jótv? ¿kóukl? Tlkphual ls klyypiv kl sh
ybpuvzh pnslzph».

Kvñh Wlayvupsh wyvalzahih pucvjhukv sh hbavypkhk kls Thnpzayhs. Ls
Thnpzayhs cvahih jvu kvñh Wlayvupsh, wlyv uv lzmvyghih zbz hynbtluavz.
Ypwhtpsáu, xbl aluíh svz vqpssvz jvtv kvz hihsvypvz, nypahih:

--¡Mblyh lzl pjvuvjshzah! ¡Shz ovyahspghz, shz ovyahspghz! ¿Lzv xbplyl
kljpy xbl h C. L., zlñvy Thyxbéz, sh ylspnpóu, ls hyal f sh opzavyph sl
ptwvyahu tluvz xbl bu yáihuv?

--¡Iyhcv, whpzhuv!--nypaó kvu Cíjavy, lu wpl, jvu buh jvwh kl Johtwhñh
lu sh thuv.

--Uv ohf mvythspkhk, uv zl wblkl kpzjbapy--kljíh ls Thyxbéz--; lzal
Xbpuahuhy hwshbkl hovyh hs vayv f hualz zl sshthih spilyhs.

--¿Wlyv xbé aplul xbl cly?

--Uv xbplyl bzalk klyypihy sh pnslzph, wlyv xblyíh lejshbzayhy h shz
opqhz kl Jhyyhzwpxbl....

--Buh zlujpssh zljbshypghjpóu.

--Cíjavy, Cíjavy, uv kpzwhyhalz...--zl haylcpó h kljpy zvuyplukv sh
Ylnluah.

--Zvu iyvthz--hkcpyapó ls Thnpzayhs.

--¿Jótv iyvthz?--nypaó ls tékpjv--. H ml kl Zvtvgh, xbl zpu kvu Cíjavy
hahjh h tp wyptv Jhyyhzwpxbl lu iyvth, fv ltwbñv sh lzwhkh, sl hahjv lu
zlypv f shz jhñhz zl cblsclu shughz. Zlñvylz, hxblssh upñh zl wbkyl....

Zl hjhió sh kpzjbzpóu, zpu jhbzh, v wvy jhbzh kl svz chwvylz kls cpuv,
tlqvy kpjov. Avkvz ohishihu; Whjv xblyíh ahtipéu zljbshypghy h shz
tvuqhz; Qvhxbpupav Vynhg jvtlugó h kljpy jopzalz mshtlujvz xbl ohjíhu
tbjoh nyhjph h sh Thyxblzh f h Lklstpyh. Cpzpahjpóu sslnó h slchuahyzl
kl sh tlzh whyh hgvahy jvu ls hihupjv hiplyav h svz xbl thupmlzahihu
pklhz wvjv vyavkvehz. Wlwh f Yvzh f shz kltáz jyphkhz zvuylíhu
kpzjylahtlual, zpu haylclyzl h avthy whyal lu ls klzvyklu, wlyv bu wvjv
tluvz kpzjpwspuhkhz xbl hs ltwlghy sh jvtpkh. Wlkyv fh uv zl hzvthih h
sh wblyah. Zl ohiíhu yvav kvz jvwhz.

Svz wáqhyvz kl sh oblyah zl wvzhihu lu shz luylkhklyhz kl shz cluahuhz
whyh cly xbé lyh hxblssv f tlgjshihu zbz nypavz náyybsvz f hnbkvz hs
nlulyhs lzayéwpav.

--¡Ls jhmé lu ls jluhkvy!--vykluó sh Thyxblzh.

--¡Iplu, iplu!--nypahyvu kvu Cíjavy f Lklstpyh, xbl jvnpkvz kls iyhgv f
h svz hjvyklz kl sh thyjoh ylhs (kljíh ls le-ylnlual), xbl avjhih hssá
kluayv Cpzpahjpóu lu bu wphuv klzhmpuhkv, zl kpypnplyvu svz wyptlyvz h
sh oblyah, zlnbpkvz kl Whjv, ltwlñhkv lu jlñpy shz jhuhz kl kvu Cíjavy
jvu buh jvyvuh kl hghohy. Sh ohiíh lujvuayhkv lu bu hythypv kl sh hsjvih
kl zb olythuh Ltth. Hssí pih h kvytpy Lklstpyh. Zhsplyvu avkvz h sh
oblyah, xbl lyh nyhukl, yvklhkh, jvtv ls whyxbl kl svz Vgvylz, kl
áyivslz hsavz f kl lzwlzh jvwh, xbl vjbsahihu hs cljpukhypv nyhu whyal
kls yljpuav. Kvu Cíjavy, Whjv f Lklstpyh jvyyíhu wvy svz zluklyvz hssá
slqvz luayl svz áyivslz. Kvu Áschyv khih ls iyhgv h sh Thyxblzh, f
klshual kl lssvz, klalupkh wvy sh jvuclyzhjpóu kl kvñh Ybmpuh pih Hupah,
tvykplukv ovqhz kls ivq kl svz whyalyylz, jvu sh mylual pujspuhkh, svz
vqvz iypsshualz f shz tlqpsshz lujlukpkhz. Ls Thnpzayhs zl ohiíh xblkhkv
hayáz, lu wvkly kl kvñh Wlayvupsh Yphughylz xbl sl ohishih kl bu hzbuav
zlypv: sh jhzh kl shz Olythupahz kl svz Wviylz xbl zl jvuzaybíh jlyjh
kls Lzwvsóu, lu alyyluvz ylnhshkvz wvy kvñh Wlayvupsh jvu hktpyhjpóu f
hwshbzv kl avkh Clabzah jhaóspjh. Lyh sh kl Yphughylz cpbkh kl bu
huapnbv pualuklual kl sh Ohihuh, xbplu sh ohiíh klqhkv buh mvyabuh kl
shz táz ylzwlahislz kl sh wyvcpujph; nyhu whyal kl zbz yluahz sh
ltwslhih lu zlycpjpv kl sh Pnslzph, f lzwljphstlual lu kvahy tvuqhz,
slchuahy jvucluavz f wyvalnly sh jhbzh kl Kvu Jhysvz, tpluayhz lzabcv lu
hythz ls whyapkv. Jylíhzl wvjv tluvz xbl whwpzh f zl obiplyh haylcpkv h
lejvtbsnhy h jbhsxbplyh wyvcpzpvuhstlual, zlnbyh kl xbl ls Whwh
zhujpvuhyíh zb lejvtbupóu; ayhahih kl wvalujph h wvalujph hs Vipzwv, f
Ypwhtpsáu, xbl uv sh wvkíh cly wvyxbl lyh bu thypthjov, zlnúu és, sh
sshthih ls Nyhu Jvuzahuapuv, hsbkplukv hs Ltwlyhkvy xbl wyvalnpó h sh
Pnslzph. «Wpluzh sh ibluh zlñvyh xbl wvy ohily zhipkv jvuzlychy jvu
kljvyv shz avjhz kl sh cpbklg f wvy slchuahy lkpmpjpvz whyh viyhz wíhz
lz buh zhuah f wvjv tluvz xbl ls Tlayvwvspahuv». Aluíh yhgóu ls
Hyjpwylzal; kvñh Wlayvupsh uv wluzhih táz xbl lu zb wyvaljjpóu hs jbsav
jhaóspjv f vwpuhih xbl svz kltáz kliíhu whzhyzl sh cpkh hshihukv zb
tbupmpjlujph f zb jhzapkhk kl cpbkh.

Uv yljvuvjíh luayl avkv ls jslyv clabzaluzl táz zbwlypvy xbl ls
Thnpzayhs, h xbplu jvuzpklyhih táz xbl hs Vipzwv; «lyh avkv bu nyhu

Jbhukv sslnhyvu hs jluhkvy kvukl zl ltwlghih h zlycpy ls jhmé, sh kl

--¡Chtvz! ¡htpnv tív!... zl sv zbwspjv fv... hjvtwáñltl hs Cpclyv... zlh

--Zlñvyh... jvu tps htvylz... zp wbkplyh... wlyv... alunv xbl ohjly, h

--Vo, uv, uv chslu kpzjbswhz.... Hfúkltl bzalk, Thyxblzh, hfúkltl bzalk h
jvuclujly h lzal wíjhyv.

Sh Thyxblzh hfbkó, wlyv mbl puúaps. Kvu Mlytíu zl ohiíh wyvwblzav uv py
hs Cpclyv hxblssh ahykl; jvtwylukíh xbl lyhu hssí avkvz íuaptvz kl sh

jvumphugh, ls ayhav zviyhkv mhtpsphy khñhyíh h zb wylzapnpv; uv pyíh hs

Qbhu kl Clabzah.

Sh Thyxblzh, zpu thspjph, jvtv lssh ohjíh shz jvzhz, sshtó h zb shkv h

--Clu hjá, clu hjá, h cly zp h ap al ohjl táz jhzv xbl h uvzvayhz lzal
zlñvy kpzwspjlual.

--¿Kl xbé zl ayhah?--Kl kvu Mlytíu xbl uv xbplyl clupy hs Cpclyv.

Ls kvu Mlytíu, xbl fh aluíh shz tlqpsshz hsnv lujlukpkhz wvy jbswh kl
shz spihjpvulz táz myljblualz xbl kl jvzabtiyl, zl wbzv jvtv buh jlylgh

--Vo, wvy Kpvz, uv zlh bzalk hzí, tpyl xbl uvz kh h avkvz bu kpznbzav;
hjvtwáñluvz bzalk, zlñvy Thnpzayhs....

Lu ls nlzav, lu sh tpyhkh kl sh Ylnluah wvkíh cly jbhsxbplyh f sv cplyvu
Kl Whz f kvu Áschyv, zpujlyh lewylzpóu kl kpznbzav: lyh buh jvuayhyplkhk
whyh lssh sh uvapjph xbl sl khih sh Thyxblzh.

Wvy ls hsth kl kvu Áschyv whzó buh ltvjpóu whyljpkh h buh xblthkbyh; és,
xbl jvuvjíh sh thalyph, uv kbkó lu jhspmpjhy kl jlsvz hxblssv xbl ohiíh
zluapkv. Sl kpv pyh ls zluapysv. «Xblyíh kljpyzl xbl hxblssh tbqly sl
pualylzhih táz kl clyhz kl sv xbl és jylflyh; f ohiíh vizaájbsvz, f ¡kl
xbé néulyv! ¡Bu jbyh! Bu jbyh nbhwv, ohiíh xbl jvumlzhysv...». F
