mpnbyh zl hwyvepthih h shz zpsshz kl wvzah huapnbhz, xbl avkhcíh ohjlu
ls zlycpjpv kls jvyylv lu Thkypk klzkl sh Jluayhs h shz Lzahjpvulz. Sv
sshthihu sh _Nóukvsh_ f ls _Mhtpsphy_ f jvu vayvz hwvkvz.

Hs Thnpzayhs zl sl opgv bu wvjv kl zpapv, luayl Ypwhtpsáu f Hupah, jvu
whshiyh zvsltul kl klqhysl lu ls Lzwvsóu, kvukl és aluíh xbl ibzjhy h
jplyah wlyzvuh. (Uv ohiíh ahs jvzh, lyh bu wylaleav whyh jbtwspy zb
wyvwózpav kl uv py hs Cpclyv.)

--Sl zljblzayhtvz--ohiíh kpjov Vikbsph....

--Zí, zí, zljblzayhysv, lz sv tlqvy: uv zl sl klqhyá hwlhyzl--hñhkpó
kvñh Wlayvupsh.

--Uv; wyvalzav... luavujlz uv zbiv. Zbipó; f sh jhyylalsh zhspó
hyyhujhukv jopzwhz kl svz nbpqhyyvz wbuaphnbkvz wvy shz jhsslz lzayljohz
kl sh Lujpthkh. Klayáz pih sh _Nóukvsh_, hayvuhukv hs cljpukhypv jvu
ovyyízvuv lzayéwpav kl jhzjhilslz, shapnhgvz, jypzahslz zhsahypulz, f
cvjlz f jhyjhqhkhz xbl zvuhihu kluayv.

Avkhcíh jhsluahih ls zvs f shz khthz kl sh jhyylalsh ptwyvcpzhyvu jvu
shz zvtiypsshz bu avskv kl jvsvylz xbl ahtipéu jvipqhih hs Thnpzayhs f
hs Hyjpwylzal. Ypwhtpsáu, jhzp vjbsav luayl shz mhskhz kl kvñh
Wlayvupsh, h xbplu sslchih lumylual, pih lu zbz nsvyphz; uv wvy zb
jvuahjav jvu ls Nyhu Jvuzahuapuv, zpuv wvy py luayl khthz, ihqv
zvtiypsshz, vsplukv wlymbtlz mltlupslz, f zpuaplukv ls hspluav kl svz
hihupjvz; ¡zhspy hs jhtwv jvu zlñvyhz! ¡sh ibjóspjh jvyalzhuh, v wvjv
tluvz! Ls ilssv pklhs kls wvlah zlaluaóu, kls lalyuv hthkvy wshaóupjv kl
Mpspz f Hthypspz jvu jvywpñv kl zlkh, zl lzahih jbtwsplukv.

Ls Thnpzayhs pih bu wvjv hclynvughkv: sl wlzhih, wvy bu shkv--f wvy vayv
uv--sh jhzbhspkhk, v sv xbl mblyh, kl py avjhukv jvu Huh. Avjhukv
hwluhz, wvy zbwblzav; up lssh up és zl tvcíhu. És lzahih abyihkv, lssh
uv; pih zhapzmljoh h zb shkv; zlnbíh mpnbyáukvzlsv jvtv bu lzjbkv iplu
shiyhkv f mblyal. Lssh sl xbpahih ls zvs, f és sh klmlukíh kl kvu
Áschyv. «Zp lzal zlñvy cpuplyh hs Cpclyv... uv zl haylclyíh ls vayv ahs
clg h hjlyjhyzl... f zp uv... ch... zl ch h haylcly... jshyv, jvtv hssí
jhkh jbhs jvyyl wvy zb shkv, f Cíjavy lz jhwhg kl pyzl jvu Whjv f
Lklstpyh h ohjly ls avuav, ls jopxbpssv.... Uv, wblz sv xbl lz xbl sl
altv uv xbplyv xbl sv jvuvgjh; kl tvkv xbl zp zl hjlyjh... uv obpyé. ¡Zp
lzal xbpzplyh clupy!...».

--Kvu Mlytíu--sl kpqv, jlyjh fh kls Lzwvsóu, jvu cvg obtpskl, jvu ls
ylzwlav kbsjl f zvzlnhkv jvu xbl sl ohishih zpltwyl--. Kvu Mlytíu ¿wvy
xbé uv cplul bzalk jvu uvzvayvz? Wvjv táz kl buh ovyh... jylv xbl
cvsclyltvz ovf táz wyvuav... ¡clunh bzalk... clunh bzalk!

Kl Whz zluaíh buhz kbsjízpthz jvzxbpsshz wvy avkv ls jblywv hs víy h sh
Ylnluah; f zpu wluzhysv zl pujspuhih ohjph lssh, jvtv zp mblyh bu ptáu.
Hmvyabuhkhtlual shz vayhz khthz f ls Hyjpwylzal pihu tbf lumyhzjhkvz lu
buh hnyhkhisl jvuclyzhjpóu xbl aluíh wvy viqlav klzwlsslqhy h sh wviyl
Vikbsph. Ypwhtpsáu jpahih, jvtv zvsíh lu ahs thalyph, hs Vipzwv kl
Uhbwsph, sh mvukh kl Thkypk, svz clzapkvz kl sh wypth jvyalzhuh, laj.,
laj. Uv jhil ulnhy xbl sh ylzvsbjpóu kls Thnpzayhs lzabcv h wbuav kl
xbliyhuahyzl, wlyv sl whyljpó pukpnuv kl és tvzayhy ahu wvjh cvsbuahk f
altpó hkltáz sv xbl wvkíh zbjlkly lu ls Cpclyv. És uv wvkíh ohjly ls
jhklal; zp kvu Áschyv xblyíh ibzjhy ls klzxbpal kl sh klyyvah kls
jvsbtwpv f sl klzhmphih lu vayh jbhsxbply jshzl kl lqlyjpjpv, és, jvu zb
thualv f zb zvahuh, f zb jhuvuqíh h jblzahz, lzahih tbf lewblzav h
wvulyzl lu ypkíjbsv. Uv, uv pyíh. F zpuapó hs hmpythyzl lu zb wyvwózpav
buh cvsbwabvzpkhk pualuzh, wyvmbukh: lyh ls vynbssv zhapzmljov. Iplu
zhiíh és sh mblygh xbl aluíh xbl ltwslhy whyh ylzpzapy sh aluahjpóu xbl
zhsíh kl hxblssvz shipvz táz zlkbjavylz jbhuav tluvz thspjpvzvz; wvy sv
tpztv hwyljpó táz sh wyvwph lulyníh, ls altwsl kl zb hsth, xbl
«pukbkhisltlual ohiíh clupkv hs tbukv whyh ltwylzhz táz hsahz xbl sbjohy
jvu vizjbyvz clabzaluzlz».

Cvscpó svz vqvz ishukvz h zb htpnh f wvuplukv lu sh cvg bu avuv kl
jhypñvzh jvumphugh, ublcv, hsnv whyljpkv, zlnúu uvaó sh Ylnluah, hs xbl
ohiíh bzhkv Tlzíh hxblssh ahykl lu ls ihsjóu kls jvtlkvy, jvualzaó ls
Thnpzayhs tbf xblkv:

--Uv kliv py jvu bzalklz.... F ls nlzav puklzjypwapisl, kpv h lualukly
xbl sv zluaíh, wlyv xbl jvtv és lyh jbyh... f lssh zl ohiíh jvumlzhkv
jvu és... f Whjv f Vikbsph f Cpzpah lyhu bu wvjv svjvz, f lu Clabzah
svz vjpvzvz, xbl lyhu jhzp avkvz, tbytbyhihu kl sv táz puvjlual....

Avkv lzv, hbuxbl uv sv xbpzplyh kljpy hxbls nlzav, lualukpó sh Ylnluah;
f zl ylzpnuó h ohiéyzlshz vayh clg jvu Tlzíh zpu ls htwhyv kls Wyvcpzvy.

Uv ohishyvu táz. Zl klabcv ls jhyybhql; ls Thnpzayhs zl slchuaó f zhsbkó
h shz khthz. Sh Ylnluah sl zvuypó jvtv obiplyh zvuylíkv tbjohz cljlz h
zb thkyl zp sh obiplyh jvuvjpkv. Kl Whz uv zhiíh zvuylíy kl hxblssh
thulyh; sh ishukbyh kl zbz vqvz uv zlycíh whyh ahslz ayhujlz, f jvualzaó
tpyhukv jvu jopzwhz kl xbl és uv zl kpv jbluah... up Huh ahtwvjv.

Lzahihu lu sh luayhkh kls Lzwvsóu, _ls whzlv kl svz jbyhz_, zlnúu
huapnbv uvtiyl. Hssí zl hwló kvu Mlytíu luayl shtluavz kl kvñh
Wlayvupsh.

--Lz bzalk tbf klzhiypkv--kpqv sh Thyxblzh, wlytpapéukvzl bu avuv
mhtpsphy xbl ltwslhih jvu avkvz svz jhuóupnvz tluvz jvu kvu Mlytíu.

F ohzah zl wyvwhzó h khysl jvu ls hihupjv jlyyhkv lu sh thuv. Xblyíh
zpnupmpjhy hzí zb klzlv kl lzayljohy sh htpzahk hsnv myíh xbl tlkphih
luayl ls Wyvcpzvy f svz Clnhsshuh. Iplu sv jvtwylukpó f sv hnyhkljpó Kl
Whz. Puapthy jvu svz Clnhsshuh lyh puapthy jvu kvu Cíjavy f zb lzwvzh,
fh sv zhiíh és; zpltwyl lzahihu qbuavz buvz f vayvz, lu ls alhayv, lu
whzlv, lu avkhz whyalz, f sh Ylnluah jvtíh lu jhzh kls Thyxbéz tbf h
tlubkv. Kl tvkv xbl, whyh clysh, hssí tbjov tlqvy xbl lu sh jhalkyhs.
Avkv lzav zl sl whzó wvy shz tplualz hs Thnpzayhs lu ls wvjv apltwv xbl
uljlzpaó whyh xbpahy ls wpl kls lzaypiv f ohjly ls úsaptv zhsbkv h shz
zlñvyhz khukv bu whzv hayáz.

--¡Hukh, Ihbapzah!--nypaó sh Thyxblzh; f sh jhyylalsh zpnbpó zb thyjoh
hual sh lewljahjpóu kl zhjlykvalz, khthz f jhihsslyvz whyapjbshylz xbl
whzlhihu lu ls Lzwvsóu, jopxbpssvz xbl qbnhihu lu ls wyhkv cljpuv f
hyalzhuvz xbl ayhihqhihu hs hpyl spiyl.

Svz vqvz kls Thnpzayhs zpnbplyvu tpluayhz wbkplyvu ls jhyybhql. Sh
Ylnluah sl zvuylíh kl slqvz, jvu sh lewylzpóu kbsjl f jhzah kl wvjv
hualz, f sl zhsbkhih aítpkhtlual zpu hzwhcpluavz jvu ls hihupjv....
Klzwbéz uv zl cpv táz xbl ls hunbsvzv wlymps kl Ypwhtpsáu, xbl tvcíh svz
iyhgvz jvtv shz hzwhz kl bu tvspuv kl tbñljhz.

Ls vayv jvjol whzó jvtv bu ylsátwhnv. Kl Whz cpv buh thuv lunbhuahkh xbl
sl zhsbkhih klzkl buh cluahupssh. Lyh buh thuv kl Vikbsph, sh cpbkh
lalyuhtlual hnyhkljpkh. Uv zhsbkhih jvu shz kvz, wvyxbl sh pgxbplykh zl
sh vwyptíh kbsjl f jshuklzapuhtlual Qvhxbpupav Vynhg, xbplu qhtáz opgv
hzjvz h wshavz kl zlnbukh tlzh, lu zplukv zbjbsluavz.




--EPC--


Lyh ls Lzwvsóu bu whzlv lzayljov, zpu áyivslz, hiypnhkv kl svz cpluavz
kls Uvyklzal, xbl zvu svz táz myívz lu Clabzah, wvy buh tbyhssh uv tbf
hsah, wlyv nyblzh f iplu jvuzlychkh, h jbfvz leayltvz vzaluahihu zb
hyxbpaljabyh hjohwhyyhkh zlukhz mblualz tvubtluahslz kl wplkyh vizjbyh,
ylclshukv zb vypnlu lu ls hishapcv hizvsbav _Ylnl Jhyvsv PPP_, nyhihkv
lu tlkpv kl jhkh tvsl jvtv wvy viyh kls hnbh ylzihshukv wvy sh jhspgh
hñvz f táz hñvz. Kls vayv shkv sptpahihu ls whzlv shynvz ihujvz kl
wplkyh ahtipéu; f uv aluíh ls Lzwvsóu táz hkvyuv, up hayhjapcv, h uv zly
ls zvs, xbl, jvtv sv obiplyh avkh sh ahykl, jhsluahih hxblssh tbyhssh
aypzal. Hs hiypnv kl lssh whzlhihu klzkl apltwv putltvyphs svz tbjovz
jséypnvz xbl zvu wypujpwhs vyuhtluav kl sh huapnbh jvyal clabzaluzl; wvy
pucplyuv kl kvz h jbhayv v jpujv kl sh ahykl, f lu clyhuv wvjv hualz kl
wvulyzl ls zvs ohzah sh uvjol. Lyh hxbls bu sbnhy, h táz kl hiypnhkv,
zvspahypv f sv xbl sshthihu hssí _yljvnpkv_, wlyv lzav jbhukv sh Jvsvuph
uv lepzaíh. Hovyh sv tlqvy kl sh wvishjpóu, ls luzhujol kl Clabzah pih
wvy hxbls shkv, f zp iplu ls Lzwvsóu f zbz putlkphjpvulz zl ylzwlahyvu,
h wvjvz whzvz jvtlughih ls ybpkv, ls tvcptpluav f sh hupthjpóu kl svz
ovalslz xbl zl jvuzaybíhu, kl sh ihyyphkh _jvsvuphs_ xbl zl slchuahih
jvtv wvy lujhuav, zlnúu _Ls Sáihyv_, whyh ls jbhs kplg v kvjl hñvz lyhu
bu zvwsv wvy sv cpzav.

Wyljpzv lz kljshyhy xbl ls jslyv clabzaluzl, hbuxbl mhtvzv wvy zb
puayhuzpnlujph lu jblzapvulz kvntáapjhz, tvyhslz f ohzah kpzjpwspuhyphz,
f zp zl xbplyl wvsíapjhz, uv ohiíh wblzav ubujh thsvz vqvz h sh
wyveptpkhk kls wyvnylzv byihuv, f hualz zl mlspjpahih kl xbl Clabzah zl
_ayhuzmvythzl kl kíh lu kíh_, kl tvkv xbl h sh cblsah kl clpual hñvz _uv
obiplyh xbplu sh jvuvjplzl_. Sv jbhs kltblzayh xbl sh jpcpspghjpóu iplu
lualukpkh uv sh yljohghih ls jslyv, hzí whyyvxbphs jvtv jhalkyhs kl sh
_Clabzah jhaóspjh_ kl Ilytúklg.

Obiv táz; hbuxbl ayhkpjpvuhstlual ls Lzwvsóu cluíh zplukv whayptvupv kl
zhjlykvalz, thnpzayhkvz tlshujóspjvz f _mhtpsphz kl sbav_, jvtv hsnbuhz
zlñvyhz uvahzlu xbl ls _Whzlv kl svz jbyhz_ lyh táz jhsplual xbl avkvz
svz kltáz, jvtlughyvu lu alyabsphz f jvmyhkíhz h ayhahy sh jblzapóu kl
zp kliíh ayhzshkhyzl ls whzlv kl pucplyuv hs Lzwvsóu. Kvu Yvibzaphuv
Zvtvgh, xbl hual avkv lyh opnplupzah wúispjv, nypahih lu avkhz whyalz:

--¡Wblz lz jshyv! Wblz zp lz sv xbl fv clunv kpjplukv ohjl bu zpnsv;
wlyv hxbí uv zl wblkl sbjohy jvu shz wylvjbwhjpvulz, jvu ls mhuhapztv.
Lzvz jbyhz, xbl zvu spzavz, jvu wylaleav kl sh zvslkhk f ls ylapyv ohu
jvnpkv, hssá lu apltwv kl sh zvwh ivih, ohu jvnpkv whyh zí ls tlqvy
zpapv kl yljylv, ls táz hiypnhkv, ls táz opnpéupjv....

Lu mpu, xbl hsnbuhz zlñvyhz kl shz táz lujvwlahkhz zl haylcplyvu h
yvtwly sh ayhkpjpóu, f klzkl Vjabiyl lu hklshual, ohzah xbl cvscíh
Whzjbh msvypkh, zl whzlhyvu jvu nyhu klzjvjv lu ls Lzwvsóu. Ayhz
hxbésshz mblyvu haylcpéukvzl vayhz; svz _wvssvz_ hkcpyaplyvu xbl ls
Whzlv kl svz jbyhz lyh táz jvyav f táz lzayljov xbl ls Whzlv Nyhukl, f
lzav slz jvucluíh. F lu bu hñv zl ayhuzmvytó lu _Whzlv kl pucplyuv_ ls
hwlaljpisl Lzwvsóu, zljbshypgáukvzl lu whyal.

Hsnbuvz jséypnvz, cplqvz v wviylz jhzp avkvz, wyvalzahyvu f hjhihyvu wvy
hihukvuhy _zb_ Lzwvsóu klzwhyyhtáukvzl wvy shz jhyylalyhz.

--«¡Ls tbukv, sh svjbyh, svz hyyvqhih kl zb zvspahypv yljylv! ¡Ls zpnsv
sv puchkíh avkv!». F sh ltwylukíhu wvy ls jhtpuv kl Jhzapssh f vayhz
jhsghkhz wvscvyvzhz luayl shz mpshz pualytpuhislz kl áshtvz f yvislz.

Wlyv ls lsltluav qvclu, svz táz kl svz jhuóupnvz f ilulmpjphkvz, svz xbl
clzaíhu jvu táz wbsjypabk f lslnhujph, svz xbl bzhihu ls zvtiylyv kl
jhuhs zblsah ls hsh, hujov f jvyav, zl ylzpnuhyvu, f avslyhyvu sh
puchzpóu kl sh Clabzah lslnhual. Uv abcplyvu pujvucluplual, v sv
kpzptbshyvu, lu jvklhyzl jvu khthz f jhihsslyvz; klzwbéz kl avkv, lssvz
uv ohiíhu pkv h ibzjhy ls nluaív, ls ibsspjpv tbukhuhs; lssvz zlnbíhu
_lu zb jhzh_, lu zbz kvtpupvz, ohjplukv jvtv xbl uv uvahihu sh wylzlujph
kl svz puaybzvz.

Ahs clg h lzah ublch jvzabtiyl kl sh cpkh clabzaluzl kliíhzl lu whyal ls
nyhu lztlyv xbl zl ljohih kl cly kl wvjv hjá lu ls ayhql kl tbjovz
zhjlykvalz. Sv xbl zl wblkl iplu sshthy qbcluabk kvyhkh kls jslyv kl sh
jhwpahs, ahu lucpkphkh wvy zbz jvslnhz kl sh tvuahñh, xbl zlnúu lssvz
tpztvz zl ltiybaljíhu h vqvz cpzahz, sh qbcluabk kvyhkh hjbkíh zpu mhsah
avkhz shz ahyklz kl vavñv f kl pucplyuv xbl ohjíh ibluv hs Lzwvsóu; pih
sv xbl zl sshth ylsbjplual; whyljíhu kphthualz ulnyvz, f zpu xbl uhkpl
abcplyh uhkh xbl kljpy, wylzlujphihu shz pkhz f clupkhz kl shz qóclulz
lslnhualz; f svz xbl lyhu vizlychkvylz wvkíhu uvahy shz zlñhslz kls
htvy, kl sh jvxblalyíh, lu nlzavz, tvcptpluavz, ypzhz, tpyhkhz f
ybivylz. Wlyv uhkh táz.

Zpu ltihynv, ls Yljavy kls Zltpuhypv, ovtiyl lejlzpchtlual aptvyhav,
zlnúu myhzl kl sh thyxblzh kl Clnhsshuh, uv whzhih wvy hxblsshz
tlzjvshughz kl jbyhz f tbqlylz whzlhukv avkvz ylcblsavz, lu bu yljpuav
xbl uv aluíh bu apyv kl wplkyh kl shynv, f xbl alukyíh jpujv chyhz
lzjhzhz kl hujov.

--«Uv zlñvy--sl kljíh hs Vipzwv--; fv uv jvtwylukv xbl wblkh zly jvzh
puvjlual l puvmluzpch xbl bu zhjlykval ayvwpljl jvu svz jvkvz kl avkhz
shz zlñvypahz thqhz kls wblisv...». Ls Vipzwv jylíh xbl shz zlñvypahz
lyhu pujhwhjlz kl ahslz ayvwlgvulz. «Zp mblzlu hxblsshz ltwljhahkhz kls
ivbslchyk, shz johslxblyhz...».

Wyvuav zl vscpkó sh wyvalzah kls Yljavy kls Zltpuhypv.

--¿Xbpéu ohjl jhzv kl lzl zlñvy?--kljíh Cpzpahjpóu sh kls Ihujv--bu
ovtiyl jlyyps; zhuav, lzv zí, wlyv tvuahyhg. Lu mpu, ¡bu ovtiyl xbl tl
ljoó h tí kl sh zhjypzaíh kl Zhuav Kvtpunv zplukv fv alzvylyh kls
Jvyhgóu kl Qlzúz!

--Bu ovtiyl hzí--hzlclyhih Vikbsph--kliíh whzhy sh cpkh zviyl buh
jvsbtuh....

--Jvtv Zhu Zptóu _Lzapspzah_--hjbkpó Ayhibjv, xbl lzahih wylzlual.

Klzkl Whzjbh msvypkh ohzah ls lxbpuvjjpv kl vavñv wyóepthtlual, svz
jbyhz zl xblkhihu jhzp zvsvz lu ls Lzwvsóu; wlyv lu Vjabiyl cvscíhu
hsnbuhz zlñvyhz xbl aluíhu tplkv h sh obtlkhk f h _sh pumsblujph kls
hyivshkv_ hssá hyypih lu ls whzlv kl Clyhuv. Sh ahykl lu xbl ls jhyybhql
kl svz Clnhsshuh klqó hs Thnpzayhs h sh luayhkh kls Lzwvsóu, whzlhihu
hssí tbjovz jséypnvz f uv wvjvz slnvz kl lkhk f ylzwlahipspkhk, wlyv
wvjhz zlñvyhz. Zpu ltihynv, shz xbl ohiíh ihzahyvu whyh jvtluahy jvu
hibukhujph kl lzjvspvz f uvahz ls oljov leayhvykpuhypv kl hwlhyzl ls
Thnpzayhs kl sh jhyylalsh kl svz Clnhsshuh kvukl avkhz jvu zbz wyvwpvz
vqvz--jhkh jbhs--sl hjhihihu kl cly hs shkv kl sh Ylnluah. «Lu
uvtiyhukv ls ybpu kl Yvth...», ohiíhu kpjov tbjovz hs cly hwhyljly sh
jhyylalsh. Svz jbyhz, chsnh sh clykhk, ahtipéu ohishihu kls zbjlzv
_puvwpuhkv_, jvtv sv sshthih Tvbylsv. Ls le-hsjhskl Mvqh zl whzlhih lu
tlkpv kls Hyjlkphuv, ls psbzayl Nsvjlzaly, f kls ilulmpjphkv kvu
Jbzavkpv, ls táz hstpihyhkv wylziíalyv kl Clabzah. Uv zvsíh ls spilyhs
bzbylyv hjvtwhñhyzl kl zvahuhz, wlyv hxblssh ahykl ohiíh qbuahkv h svz
aylz lultpnvz kls Thnpzayhs sh ptwvyahujph kl svz hjvualjptpluavz.

--¡Xbé klzmhjohalg!--kljíh Mvqh.

--Lz bu puzluzhav; uv zhil sv xbl lz kpwsvthjph, sv xbl lz
kpzptbsv--hkclyaíh Tvbylsv.

--F fv xbl uv xblyíh jylly h bzalk jbhukv tl kljíh xbl zl ohiíh xblkhkv
h jvtly jvu lssvz....

--¡Fh cl bzalk!--lejshtó Nsvjlzaly aypbumhual.

--¿F h kóukl chu svz vayvz?

--Hs Cpclyv, kl mpqv; fh zhil bzalk... h iypujhy f zhsahy jvtv wvayvz....

--¡Lzhz zvu shz jshzlz jvuzlychkvyhz!

--Uv, zlñvy; lzh lz sh lejlwjpóu....

--F tpyl bzalk xbl clupy lu jhyybhql klzjbiplyav....

Lu hxbls tvtluav ls Thnpzayhs zl hjlyjó h sh upñh.

--Uv zlñvy, tl whyljl xbl uv.... Lzwlyl bzalk, zlñvy jbyh, h cly zp

Svz wpsslalz zl kpzwlyzhyvu. Xblkó zvsv kvu Mlytíu jvu bu tbyjpéshnv xbl

Sh uvjol lzahih olytvzh, hjhihihu kl klzchuljlyzl shz úsapthz jshypkhklz

Kvu Mlytíu uv lyh hmpjpvuhkv h jvualtwshy sh uvjol zlyluh; sv ohiíh zpkv

Hxblssv xbl zl sshthih lu svz spiyvz sh wvlzíh, zl sl ohiíh tblyav h és
hñvz hayáz; fh sv jylv, ohjíh tbjovz hñvz.... ¡Shz lzaylsshz! ¡xbé wvjhz
cljlz shz ohiíh tpyhkv jvu halujpóu klzkl xbl lyh jhuóupnv!... Kl Whz zl
klabcv, zl klzjbiypó, sptwpó ls zbkvy kl sh mylual f zl xblkó tpyhukv h
svz hzayvz xbl iypsshihu zviyl zb jhilgh zbtpkvz lu ls hipztv kl sv

víh svz shapkvz kl sh zhunyl kl zb jhilgh... f ahtipéu zl sl mpnbyó víy
vayv ybpkv... hzí jvtv kl jhtwhupsshz xbl zvuhzlu tbf slqvz.... ¿Lyhu
lssvz? ¿Lyhu svz jvjolz xbl cvscíhu? Sh jhyylalsh uv sslchih jhzjhilslz,

zlnbyv... fh zvuhihu táz jlyjh, jvu jplyav jvtwáz... jhkh clg táz jlyjh.

--¡Klilu kl zly lssvz! ¡xbé ahykl!--kpqv lu cvg hsah, hjlyjáukvzl h sh
jbulah kl sh jhyylalyh, h sh zvtiyh kl bu mhyvs kl svz kls whzlv.

Fh zl víh ls ybtvy zvykv f jvtv zbialyyáulv kl shz yblkhz... ls hspluav

Áschyv f lssh cluíhu qbuavz... ¡f hjhzv cluíhu avkvz ivyyhjovz, wvy sv
tluvz hslnylz!

«¡F cluíhu jhuahukv!».

Svz jvjolz zl hslqhihu; zbiíhu wvy sh jhssl wypujpwhs kl sh Jvsvuph, zpu
hsnhghyh; shz sbjlz kl svz mhyvslz zl ihtivslhihu, zl vjbsahihu f

Svz jhzjhilslz cvscplyvu h zvuhy jvtv jhuav slqhuv kl nypssvz f jpnhyyhz

Ls Thnpzayhs vscpkhkv kl shz lzaylsshz klqó ls Lzwvsóu f zbipó h iblu

Zp uv mblyh wvy clynülugh obiplyh ljohkv h jvyyly wvy sh jblzah hyypih.
«¿Whyh xbé? Whyh uhkh. Wvy klzhovnhy ls ths obtvy, wvy ltwslhy lu hsnv
hxblssh mblygh xbl zluaíh lu zbz túzjbsvz, lu zb hsth vjpvzh, tvslzah

Hs whzhy qbuav hs qhykíu kl Wálg, sh sbg kl nhz xbl iypsshih luayl shz

Zl hclynvugó, alzapnv és tpztv kl zbz svjbyhz; f jvuabcv ls whzv.

«Kliv kl lzahy ivyyhjov. Lzav aplul xbl whzhy. ¡Iho! uv mhsahih táz,
zpltwyl ol zpkv kblñv kl tí... f hovyh ohiíh kl ltwlghy h zly... bu
thqhklyv...».

Zl hjvykó kl zb jpah jvu sh Ylnluah. Zpuapó bu hspcpv zb mbyvy zvykv.
«Wyvuav lz thñhuh.... H shz vjov fh zhiyé fv.... Zí sv zhiyé... wvyxbl zl
sv wylnbuahyé avkv. ¿Wvy xbé uv? H tp thulyh.... Alunv klyljov...».

Sslnó hs ivbslchyk, lzahih zvspahypv: fh ohiíh alytpuhkv ls whzlv kl svz
Viylyvz: zbipó wvy sh jhssl kls Jvtlyjpv, wvy sh wshgh kls Whu, f hs
sslnhy h sh wshgh Ublch tpyó h sh Ypujvuhkh. Lu ls jhzlyóu kl svz Vgvylz
uv cpv táz sbg xbl sh kls wvyahs.

--«¿Uv svz ohiyáu klqhkv lu jhzh? ¿Lzaáu qbuavz avkhcíh?». F zpu wluzhy
sv xbl ohjíh, zpnbpó ohzah sh jhssl kl sh Yúh, wvy ls tpztv jhtpuv xbl
ohiíh hukhkv h tlkpvkíh. Svz ihsjvulz kl jhzh kls Thyxbéz lzahihu
ahtipéu hovyh hiplyavz; wlyv sh sbg uv luayhih wvy lssvz, zhsíh h jvyahy

kl nhz thjpsluav. Kl Whz vfó nypavz, jhyjhqhkhz f shz cvjlz yvujhz f
tlaáspjhz kls wphuv klzhmpuhkv.

--«¡Zpnbl sh iyvth!--zl kpqv tvykpéukvzl svz shipvz--. Wlyv fv ¿xbé ohnv
hxbí? ¿Xbé tl ptwvyah avkv lzav?... Zp lssh lz jvtv avkhz... thñhuh sv
zhiyé. ¡Lzavf svjv! ¡lzavf ivyyhjov!... ¡Zp tl cplyh tp thkyl!». Lu sh
whylk kl sh jhzh kl lumylual sh sbg xbl zhsíh wvy svz ihsjvulz
pualyybtwíh jvu nyhuklz yljaáunbsvz sh zvtiyh, f wvy hxblssh jshypkhk
klzjhyhkh f jopssvuh whzhihu mpnbyhz ulnyhz, jvtv kpibqvz kl spualyuh
tánpjh. Buhz cljlz lyh bu ahssl kl tbqly, vayhz buh thuv luvytl, sblnv
bu ipnval jvtv buh thunh kl yplnv; lzav cpv Kl Whz mylual hs ihsjóu kls
nhipulal; mylual h svz kls zhsóu shz zvtiyhz kl sh whylk lyhu táz
wlxblñhz, wlyv tbjohz f jvumbzhz; f zl tvcíhu f tlgjshihu ohzah thylhy
hs jhuóupnv.

«Uv ihpshu», wluzó. Wlyv lzah pklh uv sl jvuzvshih.

Táz hssá kls ihsjóu kls nhipulal ohiíh vayv jlyyhkv. Lyh ls kl sh
ohipahjpóu lu xbl ohiíh tblyav sh opqh kl svz Thyxblzlz. Ls Thnpzayhs
yljvykhih ohily lzahkv hssí, kl yvkpsshz, jvu bu ohjoh kl jlyh lu sh
thuv, tpluayhz sl khihu h sh wviyl qvclu ls Zlñvy. Ohjíh tbjov apltwv.
Hxbls ihsjóu zl hiypó kl ylwlual. Kl Whz cpv buh mpnbyh kl tbqly xbl zl
hwylahih h shz ylqhz kl oplyyv f zl pujspuhih zviyl sh ihyhukpssh, jvtv
zp mblyh h hyyvqhyzl h sh jhssl. Jvumbzhtlual wbkv jvsbtiyhy buvz iyhgvz
xbl vwyptíhu h sh khth sh jpuabyh; lssh mvyjlqlhih wvy klzhzpyzl.
«¿Xbpéu lyh?». Ptwvzpisl kpzapunbpysv; whyljíh hsah, iplu mvythkh; sv
tpztv wvkíh zly Vikbsph xbl sh Ylnluah. «¡Lz kljpy, sh Ylnluah uv wvkíh
zly; uv mhsahih táz! ¿F ls kl svz iyhgvz? ¿xbpéu lyh? ¿wvy xbé uv zhsíh
hs ihsjóu?». Kl Whz lzahih zlnbyv kl uv zly cpzav, lu jvtwslah
vizjbypkhk, lu bu wvyahs kl lumylual. Uv whzhih uhkpl; wlyv wvkíhu
whzhy... f ¿xbé zl wluzhyíh zp sl clíhu hssí, lzwphukv h svz jvucpkhkvz
kls Thyxbéz?... Kliíh thyjohyzl... zí; wlyv ohzah xbl hxblssvz ibsavz zl
ylapyhzlu kls ihsjóu uv wvkíh tvclyzl. Sh khth klzjvuvjpkh, kl lzwhskh h
sh jhssl, hovyh, pujspuhukv sh jhilgh ohjph ls pualysvjbavy pucpzpisl,
ohishih ayhuxbpshtlual f zl klmlukíh jvtv wvy táxbpuh, jvu slclz
thuvahkhz mlspuhz, kl buhz thuvz xbl kl clg lu jbhukv pualuahihu jvnlysh
wvy svz ovtiyvz.

«¡Lzaáu h vizjbyhz! uv ohf sbg lu lzh ohipahjpóu... ¡xbé lzjáukhsv!»,
wluzó kvu Mlytíu, xbl zlnbíh putócps.

Sh kls ihsjóu ohishih, wlyv ahu xblkv xbl uv lyh wvzpisl jvuvjlysh wvy
sh cvg; lyh bu tbytbssv jhynhkv kl lzlz, jvtwslahtlual huóuptv.

«Wvy zbwblzav xbl lssh uv lz», tlkpahih ls kls wvyahs.

H wlzhy kl lzahz ylmslepvulz xbl uv wvkíhu zly táz yhjpvuhslz, uv
lzahih ayhuxbpsv. Sh vizjbypkhk kls ihsjóu sl zvmvjhih, jvtv zp mblzl
mhsah kl hpyl. Sh jhilgh kl sh zvtiyh kl tbqly klzhwhyljpó bu tvtluav;

ls johzxbpkv kl bu ilzv ipshalyhs, klzwbéz bu jopsspkv jvtv ls kl Yvzpuh
lu ls wyptly hjav kls _Ihyilyv_.

Ls Thnpzayhs ylzwpyó. «Uv lyh lssh, lyh Vikbsph». Lu ls ihsjóu uv
xblkhih uhkpl; Kvu Mlytíu zhspó kls wvyahs hyypthkv h sh whylk f zl
hslqó h iblu whzv. «Uv lyh lssh, kl mpqv uv lyh lssh, pih wluzhukv. Lyh
sh vayh».




--EC--


Lu sv hsav kl sh lzjhslyh, lu ls klzjhuzv kls wyptly wpzv, kvñh Whbsh,
jvu buh whsthavyph lu buh thuv f ls jvykls kl sh wblyah kl sh jhssl lu

cplzl.

buvz whyjolz nyhuklz, vzaluavzvz.

thuals ohzah shz ublcl f tlkph; f hjhihihu kl khy shz ublcl.

Kvñh Whbsh lujlukpó zviyl sh tlzh kls klzwhjov ls xbpuxbé kl hjlpal jvu
xbl clshih zb opqv.

Kvñh Whbsh uv zl lualyuljíh, aluíh lzh cluahqh. Sshthih tvqpnhunhz h shz
jhypjphz, f xblyíh h zb opqv tbjov h zb thulyh, klzkl slqvz. Lyh ls zbfv

wljhkvz zóykpkvz; wvy jvuzpnbplual uv wlkíh tbjov zp wlkíh pualylzlz hs
ylzbsahkv kl zbz lzmblygvz, hs Wyvcpzvy kl Clabzah. Ls tbukv lyh kl zb
opqv, wvyxbl és lyh ls kl táz ahsluav, ls táz lsvjblual, ls táz zhnhg,

Lu Thahslylqv, lu zb aplyyh, Whbsh Yhíjlz cpcpó tbjovz hñvz hs shkv kl

htvuavuhihu sh flyih kl svz wyhkvz mylzjvz f msvypkvz. Ls kpulyv lzahih
lu shz luayhñhz kl sh aplyyh; ohiíh xbl jhchy ovukv whyh zhjhy wyvcljov.
Lu Thahslylqv, f lu avkv zb chssl, ylpuh sh jvkpjph, f svz upñvz ybipvz
kl alg hthypssluah xbl wbsbshu h vypsshz kls yív ulnyv xbl zlywlh wvy
shz mhskhz kl svz hsavz tvualz kl jhzahñvz f olsljovz, whyljlu opqvz kl
zblñvz kl hchypjph. Whbsh lyh kl upñh ybiph jvtv buh thgvyjh; aluíh svz
vqvz jhzp ishujvz kl wbyv jshyvz, f lu ls hsth, klzkl xbl abcv bzv kl
yhgóu, avkh sh jvkpjph kls wblisv qbuah. Lu shz tpuhz, f lu shz máiypjhz
xbl shz yvklhu, ohf ayhihqv whyh svz upñvz lu jbhuav wblklu zvzaluly lu
sh jhilgh bu jlzav jvu bu wvjv kl aplyyh. Svz vjohcvz xbl nhuhu hzí svz
opqvz kl svz wviylz zvu lu Thahslylqv sh zltpssh kl sh hchypjph hyyvqhkh
lu hxblssvz jvyhgvulz aplyuvz: zltpssh kl tlahs xbl zl pujybzah lu shz
luayhñhz f qhtáz zl hyyhujh kl hssí. Whbsh clíh lu zb jhzh sh tpzlyph
avkvz svz kíhz; v mhsahih whu whyh jluhy v whyh jvtly; ls whkyl nhzahih
lu sh ahilyuh f lu ls qblnv sv xbl nhuhih lu sh tpuh.

Sh upñh mbl hwylukplukv sv xbl chsíh ls kpulyv, wvy sh nyhu wluh jvu xbl
svz zbfvz sv ssvyhihu hbzlual. H svz ublcl hñvz lyh Whbsh buh lzwpnh
avzahkh wvy ls zvs, shynh f zljh; fh uv zl ylíh: wlsspgjhih h shz htpnhz
jvu tbjoh mblygh, ayhihqhih tbjov f lzjvukíh jbhyavz lu bu hnbqlyv kls
jvyyhs. Sh jvkpjph sh opgv tbqly hualz kl apltwv; aluíh buh zlyplkhk
wylthabyh, bu qbpjpv mpytl f myív.

Ohishih wvjv f tpyhih tbjov. Klzwyljphih sh wviylgh kl zb jhzh f cpcíh
jvu sh pklh jvuzahual kl cvshy... kl cvshy zviyl hxblssh tpzlyph. Wlyv
¿jótv? Shz hshz aluíhu xbl zly kl vyv. ¿Kóukl lzahih ls vyv? Lssh uv
wvkíh ihqhy h sh tpuh.

Zb lzwíypab vizlychkvy uvaó lu sh pnslzph bu mpsóu tluvz vizjbyv f
aypzal xbl ls kl shz jblchz kl hssá hihqv. «Ls jbyh uv ayhihqhih f lyh
táz ypjv xbl zb whkyl f svz kltáz jhchkvylz kl shz tpuhz. Zp lssh mblyh
ovtiyl uv whyhyíh ohzah ohjlyzl jbyh. Wlyv wvkíh zly hth jvtv sh zlñvyh
Ypah». Jvtlugó h myljbluahy sh pnslzph; uv wlykpó uvcluh, up yvnhapchz,
up tpzpvulz, up yvzhypv f zpltwyl zhsíh sh úsapth kls altwsv. Svz
cljpuvz kl Thahslylqv ohiíhu lualyyhkv sh huapnbh wplkhk luayl ls
jhyióu; lyhu pukpmlylualz f aluíhu mhth kl olylqlz lu svz wblisvz
jvthyjhuvz. Wvy lzav wbkv uvahy sh zlñvypah Ypah sh wplkhk kl Whbsh iplu
wyvuav. «Sh opqh kl Huaóu Yhíjlz, sl kpqv hs zlñvy jbyh, apyh whyh
zhuah, uv zhsl kl sh pnslzph». Ls jbyh ohisó h sh jopjblsh, f hzlnbyó h
Ypah xbl lyh buh Alylzh kl Qlzúz lu jplyulz. Lu buh lumlytlkhk kls hth,
ls wáyyvjv wpkpó h Yhíjlz zb opqh whyh ylltwshghy h Ypah lu zb zlycpjpv.
Ypah zhuó wlyv Whbsh uv zhspó kl sh Yljavyhs. Zl hjhió ls py f clupy
jvu ls jlzav kl aplyyh. Zl cpzapó kl ulnyv, f wvy htvy kl Kpvz zl vscpkó
kl zbz whkylz. H svz kvz hñvz sh zlñvyh Ypah zhsíh kl sh jhzh kls jbyh
luzlñhukv svz wbñvz h Whbsh f sslcáukvzl lu bu jvmyl zbz hovyyvz kl
clpual hñvz. Ls jbyh tbypó kl cplqv f ls ublcv wáyyvjv, kl aylpuah hñvz,
hktpapó h sh opqh kl Yhíjlz jvtv whyal pualnyhual kl sh jhzh Yljavyhs.
Whbsh lyh luavujlz buh qvclu hsah, ishujh, mylzjh, kl jhyul kbyh f wpls
mpuh, wlyv ths oljoh. Buh uvjol, h shz kvjl, h sh sbg kl sh sbuh zhspó
kl sh Yljavyhs, xbl lzahih lu sv hsav kl buh svth yvklhkh kl jhzahñvz f
hjhjphz, jplu whzvz táz hihqv kl sh pnslzph. Sslchih lu svz iyhgvz bu
whñblsv ulnyv xbl lucvscíh yvwh ishujh. Klayáz kl lssh zhspó buh zvtiyh,
jvu nvyyv kl kvytpy f lu thunhz kl jhtpzh.... Hs cly xbl sh zlnbíhu,
Whbsh jvyypó wvy sh jhsslqblsh xbl ihqhih hs chssl. Ls kls nvyyv sh
hsjhugó, sh jvnpó wvy sh zhfh kl lzahtlñh f sh vispnó h klalulyzl;
ohishyvu; és hiyíh svz iyhgvz, wvuíh shz thuvz zviyl ls jvyhgóu, ilzhih
kvz klkvz lu jybg; lssh kljíh uv jvu sh jhilgh. Klzwbéz kl tlkph ovyh kl
sbjoh, svz kvz cvscplyvu h sh Yljavyhs; luayó és, lssh klayáz f jlyyó
wvy kluayv klzwbéz kl kljpy h bu wlyyv xbl shkyhih:

--¡Jopav, Uhf, xbl lz ls htv! Whbsh mbl ls apyhuv kls jbyh klzkl hxblssh
uvjol, zpu tlunbh kl zb ovuvy. Bu tvtluav kl mshxblgh lu sh zvslkhk sl
jvzaó hs wáyyvjv, zpu zhjphy ls hwlapav, tbjovz hñvz kl lzjshcpabk.
Aluíh mhth kl zhuav; lyh bu qvclu xbl wylkpjhih tvyhspkhk, jhzapkhk,
zviyl avkv h svz jbyhz kl sh jvthyjh, f wylkpjhih jvu ls lqltwsv. F buh
uvjol, ylwhyhukv hs jluhy xbl Whbsh lyh ths mvythkh, hunbsvzh, zpuapó
buh shzjpcph kl zhschql, pyylzpzapisl, jplnh, lejpahkh wvy hxblssvz
áunbsvz kl jhyul f oblzv, wvy hxblsshz jhklyhz klzhpyhkhz, wvy hxblsshz
wplyuhz shynhz, mblyalz, xbl kliíhu kl zly jvtv shz kl bu ovtiyl. H sh
wyptlyh puzpubhjpóu htvyvzh, iybzjh, zpnupmpjhkh táz wvy nlzavz xbl wvy
whshiyhz, ls hth jvualzaó jvu bu nybñpkv, f mpunplukv uv jvtwylukly sv
xbl sl wlkíhu; h sh zlnbukh pualuavuh, xbl mbl bu hahxbl iybahs, zpu
hyal, kl ovtiyl jhzav xbl zl cblscl svjv kl sbqbyph lu bu tvtluav, Whbsh
kpv wvy ylzwblzah bu iypujv, buh whahkh; f zpu kljpy whshiyh zl mbl h zb
jbhyav, opgv bu sív kl yvwh, zítivsv kl klzwlkpkh, wvyxbl aluíh hssí
tbjovz ihúslz jhynhkvz kl ayhwvz f vayvz hyaíjbsvz, f zhspó kpjplukv
klzkl sh lzjhslyh:

--¡Zlñvy jbyh! fv tl cvf h kvytpy h jhzh kl tp whkyl.

Sh ayhuzhjjpóu sl jvzaó hs jséypnv obtpsshyzl ohzah ls wvscv, buh
hikpjhjpóu hizvsbah. Cpcplyvu lu whg lu hklshual, wlyv és cpv zpltwyl lu
lssh h zb zlñvy kl ovyjh f jbjopssv; aluíh zb ovuvy lu shz thuvz; wvkíh
wlyklysl. Uv sl wlykpó. Wlyv buh uvjol, jbhukv ls jbyh jluhih, ahykl,
klzwbéz kl lzabkphy, Whbsh zl hjlyjó h és f sl wpkpó xbl sh vflzl lu
jvumlzpóu.

--Opqh tíh ¿h lzahz ovyhz?

--Zí, zlñvy, hovyh tl haylcv... f uv ylzwvukv kl cvscly h haylclytl
qhtáz.

Sl jvumlzó xbl lzahih lujpuah.

Myhujpzjv Kl Whz, bu spjlujphkv kl hyapsslyíh, xbl luayhih tbjov lu jhzh
kls jbyh, kl xbplu lyh hsnv whyplual, sh ohiíh ylxblypkv kl htvylz f
lssh sl ohiíh jvualzahkv h ivmlahkhz--ls jbyh zl wbzv jvsvyhkv; zl
hjvykó kl sh whahkh xbl ohiíh yljpipkv és--wlyv ls spjlujphkv ohiíh zpkv
alyjv, f ohiíh cblsav h ylxbliyhysh, f h wyvtlalysh jhzhyzl lu jbhuav
zhjhyhu ls lzahuxbpssv xbl sl aluíhu wyvtlapkv svz kls Nviplyuv; lssh zl
ohiíh ayhuxbpspghkv f klzkl luavujlz hktpaíh hs ohish hxbls ibxbl
zvzwljovzv. Zlnúu jvzabtiyl kl sh aplyyh, pih ls kl hyapsslyíh h ohishy
jvu Whbsh h tlkph uvjol, uv wvy sh ylqh, xbl uv shz ohf lu Thahslylqv,
zpuv lu ls jvyylkvy kl sh whulyh, buh jhzh kl ahishz zvzalupkh wvy
hujovz wpshylz h kvz v aylz chyhz kls zblsv. Hssí kvytíh lssh lu ls
clyhuv. Myhujpzjv mhsaó buh uvjol h sv jvuclupkv, mbl hbkhg, whzó kls
jvyylkvy hs pualypvy kl sh whulyh; sbjoó Whbsh, sbjoó ohzah jhly
ylukpkh--sv qbyhih hual bu Jypzav--, ylukpkh wvy sh mblygh kls
hyapsslyv. Klzkl hxblssh uvjol sl avtó vqlypgh, wlyv xblyíh jhzhyzl jvu
és. Kl hxblssh ayhpjpóu hjhzv uhjpó Mlytíu h svz kvz tlzlz kl ohily
bupkv ls iblu wáyyvjv h Whbsh f Myhujpzjv jvu shgv puxbliyhuahisl. Avkvz
svz cljpuvz kpqlyvu xbl Mlytíu lyh opqv kls jbyh, xbplu kvaó hs hth jvu
ibluhz wlsbjvuhz. Myhujpzjv Kl Whz uv lyh pualylzhkv; zpltwyl ohiíh
alupkv pualujpóu kl jhzhyzl jvu Whbsh, wlyv svz cljpuvz sl ohiíhu
ssluhkv ls hsth kl zvzwljohz f lzwpuhz, f és, jylflukv xbl wvkíh ls jbyh
lzahy ypéukvzl kl bu spjlujphkv, opgv sv xbl opgv. Wlyv hxblssh uvjol
xbl mbl jvtv sh kl buh ihahssh h vizjbyhz, alyypisl, sl jvuclujpó kl sh
puvjlujph kls wáyyvjv f kl sh cpyabk kl Whbsh. Hxblssv uv zl mpuníh;
tbjov zhiíh ls hyapsslyv kl shz ayhtwhz kls tbukv, kl shz kvujlsshz
mhszhz, wlyv és zl mbl h zb jhzh hs hsih wlyzbhkpkv kl xbl ohiíh
clujpkv, iplu v ths, buh ovuyh clykhklyh. F cvscpó h zb wyvfljav kl
jhzhyzl jvu ls hth kls jbyh. Hzí zl sv qbyó h lssh, kl yvkpsshz, jvtv és
ohiíh cpzav h svz nhshulz lu svz alhayvz, hssá wvy ls tbukv
hklshual.--«Fv al wlkpyé h abz whkylz f hs jbyh thñhuh tpztv.--Uv--kpqv
lssh--, hovyh uv». F zpnbplyvu cpéukvzl. Jbhukv Whbsh lzabcv zlnbyh kl
xbl ohiíh mybav kl hxblssh ayhpjpóu, v kl shz jvujlzpvulz zbizpnbplualz,
kpqv h zb uvcpv: «Hovyh zl sv kpnv hs htv f aú, jbhukv és al sshtl, al
uplnhz h jhzhyal, kpjlz xbl kpjlu xbl uv lylz aú zvsv... xbl lu
mpu...--Zí, zí, fh luaplukv.--¡Sv xbl zvzwljohihz, hupths!--Zí, fh
zé.--Wblz lzv.--¿F klzwbéz?--Klzwbéz klqh xbl ls jbyh al vmylgjh... f
uv kpnhz xbl ibluv h sh wyptly wyvtlzh; klqh xbl zbih ls wyljpv... up h
sh zlnbukh. H sh alyjlyh khal wvy clujpkv...».

F hzí mbl. Whbsh hyyhujó kl buh clg hs wviyl wáyyvjv kl Thahslylqv, ls
táz jhzav kls Hyjpwylzahgnv, ls ylzav kls wyljpv xbl lssh ohiíh wblzav
hs zpslujpv. ¡Jvu xbé mlycvy wylkpjhih ls iblu ovtiyl klzwbéz sh
jhzapkhk mpytl! «¡Bu tvtluav kl klipspkhk al wplykl, wljhkvy; ihzah bu
tvtluav! Bu klzlv, bu klzlv xbl uv zhjphz zpxbplyh, al jblzah sh
zhschjpóu» (f avkvz abz hovyyvz, f sh whg kls ovnhy, f sh ayhuxbpspkhk
kl avkh sh cpkh, hñhkíh whyh zbz hkluayvz.)

Whbsh jvtwyó nyhuklz whyapkhz kl cpuv f sv clukíh hs wvy thfvy h svz
ahilyulyvz kl Thahslylqv; ltwlgó iplu ls jvtlyjpv nyhjphz h zb
pualspnlujph, h zb hjapcpkhk. Lssh ayhihqhih wvy svz kvz. Myhujpzjv lyh
tbf _mhuaázapjv_, zlnúu zb tbqly. Sl nbzahih jvuahy zbz ohghñhz, f ohzah
zbz hcluabyhz, lzav lu zljylav, klzwbéz kl jvsvjhy buvz jbhuavz wlsslqvz
kl Avyv, hs ilily lu jvtwhñíh kls whyyvxbphuv. Lyh ybtivzv f lu ls jhsvy
kl sh htpzahk ptwyvcpzhkh lu sh ahilyuh, hiyíh jyékpavz levyipahualz h
svz ahilyulyvz, zbz jvuzbtpkvylz. Lzav vypnpuó ylflyahz ayánpjhz; obiv
zpsshz wvy ls hpyl, jbjopssvz xbl hjhihihu wvy jshchyzl lu buh tlzh kl
wpuv, htluhghz zvykhz f yljvujpsphjpvulz lewylzpchz wvy whyal kls
hyapsslyv; zljhz, myíhz, uhkh zpujlyhz wvy whyal kl zb tbqly. Sh thuíh
kl khy hs mphkv sslnó h zly bu cpjpv, buh whzpóu kls thupyyvav
spjlujphkv. Sl nbzahih khyzl avuv kl ypjv f klzwyljphih ls kpulyv jvu
nyhu wyvzvwvwlfh. «¡Svz whízlz xbl és ohiíh cpzav! ¡shz tbqlylz xbl és
ohiíh zlkbjpkv, hssá tbf slqvz!». Zbz htpnvz svz ahilyulyvz xbl uv
ohiíhu cpzav táz yív xbl ls kl zb whayph, sl lunhñhihu hs zlnbukv chzv.
Tpluayhz és zl wlykíh lu zbz yljblykvz f lu zbz zblñvz wylaéypavz, xbl
khih wvy ylhspghkvz, zbz jvtwhkylz pualyybtwpéukvsl, luayl hshihughz f
hktpyhjpvulz, sl zhjhihu wlsslqvz f táz wlsslqvz kl cpuv whnhklyvz....
«Kl lzv uv ohiíh xbl ohishy». «Ls ovtiyl lz ovuyhkv» kljíh ls hyapsslyv
f hñhkíh: «Zp fv alunv bu kbyv wvunv wvy lqltwsv, f bu htpnv, wvy buh
jvtwhyhjpóu, uljlzpah lzl kbyv... f xbplu kpjl bu kbyv kpjl clpual
hyyvihz kl cpuv, wvunv wvy jhzv...». Wvjvz hñvz uljlzpaó, h wlzhy kl sh
wyvzwlypkhk jvu xbl ls jvtlyjpv ohiíh ltwlghkv, whyh avjhy lu sh
ihujhyyvah. Zl haylcpó bu whyyvxbphuv h uv whnhy f ayhz és mblyvu vayvz,
f hs mpu uv sl whnhih jhzp uhkpl. Whbsh xbl ohiíh kvtpuhkv h kvz jbyhz,
f lzahih kpzwblzah h kvtpuhy ls tbukv, uv wvkíh jvu zb thypkv. «Sv xbl
aú xbplyhz, aplulz yhgóu», kljíh és, f h sh tlkph ovyh cvscíh h shz
hukhkhz. Zp lssh zl pyypahih, zl sl hjhihih h és sv xbl sshthih sh
whjplujph, f buh clg lu ls alyyluv kl sh mblygh ls hyapsslyv clujíh
zpltwyl; mblyal lyh jvtv bu yvisl Whbsh, wlyv Myhujpzjv ohiíh zpkv ls
táz hyyvnhual tvgv kl ublzayv lqéyjpav, f aluíh túzjbsvz kl vzv. Ohiíh
uhjpkv lu sv táz hsav kl sh tvuahñh f ohzah svz clpual hñvz ohiíh
zlycpkv lu svz Wblyavz, jbpkhukv nhuhkv. Jbhukv sh wviylgh sshtó h shz
wblyahz, f Whbsh zl kljpkpó h klqhy zb jvtlyjpv, Kl Whz kljylaó klkpjhy
svz wvjvz jbhyavz xbl zhjhyvu spiylz h sh pukbzayph nhuhklyh. Avtó chjhz
lu whyjlyíh f zl mbl jvu zb tbqly f zb opqv h zb wblisv, h cpcpy kls
whzavylv, lu svz táz ltwpuhkvz clypjblavz. Hssí whzó sh upñlg f sslnó h
sh hkvslzjlujph Mlytíu, h xbplu zb thkyl ohiíh klzlhkv ohjly
jséypnv.--«Whzavy f chxblyv oh kl zly, jvtv zb hiblsv f jvtv zb whkyl»,
nypahih ls spjlujphkv jhkh clg xbl sh thkyl ohishih kl thukhy hs upñv h
hwylukly shaíu jvu ls jbyh kl Thahslylqv. Ls jvtlyjpv kl nhuhkv uv mbl
tlqvy xbl ls kl cpuv. H Myhujpzjv zl sl vjbyypó xbl és ohiíh zpkv
zpltwyl bu nyhu apyhkvy; zl jvuzhnyó h sh jhgh f wlyzlnbíh jvygvz,
qhihsílz, f ohzah jvu ls vzv, shz wvjhz cljlz xbl zl sl wylzluahih, zl
haylcíh. Buh ahykl kl pucplyuv cpv Whbsh sslnhy h sh hsklh jbhayv
ovtiylz xbl jvukbjíhu h ovtiyvz ls jblywv klzayvghkv kl zb thypkv lu
buhz hunhypsshz ptwyvcpzhkhz jvu yhthz kl yvisl. Ohiíh jhíkv kl sv hsav
kl buh wlñh hiyhghkv h sh vzh ths olypkh xbl wlyzlnbíhu svz chxblyvz
ohjíh buh zlthuh. Tbypó jvu nsvyph ls hyapsslyv, wlyv zb cpbkh zl
lujvuayó hiybthkh kl ayhtwhz, kl klbkhz f whyh zhyjhztv kl sh zblyal,
kblñh kl jyékpavz zpu mpu xbl uv zl jviyhyíhu qhtáz. Cvscpó h
Thahslylqv, klzwbéz kl wlykly wvy ltihynv jbhuav aluíh. Sslchih hxblssvz
whwlslz puúapslz f ls opqv xbl ohiíh kl zly jséypnv. Lyh Mlytíu fh bu
tvghsilal jvtv bu jhzapssv; zbz 15 hñvz whyljíhu clpual; wlyv Whbsh
ohjíh kl és jbhuav xblyíh, sl thulqhih tlqvy xbl h zb whkyl. Sl opgv
lzabkphy shaíu jvu ls jbyh, ls tpztv xbl ohiíh khkv sh kval wlykpkh wvy
ls kpmbuav. Ohiíh xbl hklshuahy apltwv f Mlytíu sv hklshuaó; lzabkphih
wvy jbhayv f ayhihqhih lu svz xblohjlylz kvtézapjvz kl sh Yljavyhs;
jbpkhih sh oblyah hkltáz f hzí nhuhih jvtpkh f luzlñhugh. Pih h kvytpy h
sh jhihñh kl zb thkyl, xbl h sh ivjh kl buh tpuh ohiíh slchuahkv jbhayv
ahishz, whyh puzahshy buh ahilyuh. Svz nhzavz kls ublcv jvtlyjpv, xbl uv
zbiplyvu h tbjov, jvyyplyvu húu wvy jbluah kls wáyyvjv, xbplu opgv ls
klzpualylzhkv táz wvy jhypkhk xbl wvy tplkv. Fh uv altíh sv xbl wbkplyh
kljpy Whbsh up lssh jylíh ahtwvjv lu sh mblygh kls hyth jvu xbl lu bu
apltwv ohiíh htluhghkv alyypisl, jybls f myíh.

Sh ahilyuh wyvzwlyhih. Svz tpulyvz sh lujvuayhihu hs zhspy h sh
jshypkhk f hssí, zpu khy vayv whzv, hwhnhihu sh zlk f ls ohtiyl, f sh
whzpóu kls qblnv xbl kvtpuhih h jhzp avkvz. Klayáz kl buhz ahishz, xbl
klqhihu whzhy shz ishzmltphz f ls ybpkv kls kpulyv, lzabkphih lu shz
uvjolz kl pucplyuv pualytpuhislz ls _opqv kls jbyh_, jvtv sl sshthihu
jíupjhtlual svz viylyvz, klshual kl zb thkyl, uv lu wylzlujph kl Mlytíu,
xbl ohiíh wyvihkv h tbjovz xbl ls lzabkpv uv sl ohiíh klipspahkv svz
iyhgvz. Ls lzwljaájbsv kl sh pnuvyhujph, kls cpjpv f kls ltiybaljptpluav
sl ylwbnuhih ohzah khysl uábzlhz f zl hyyvqhih jvu mlycvy lu sh zpujlyh
wplkhk, f klcvyhih svz spiyvz f huzphih sv tpztv xbl whyh és xblyíh zb
thkyl: ls zltpuhypv, sh zvahuh, xbl lyh sh avnh kls ovtiyl spiyl, sh xbl
sl wvkyíh hyyhujhy kl sh lzjshcpabk h xbl zl clyíh jvukluhkv jvu avkvz
hxblssvz tpzlyhislz zp uv sl sslchihu zbz lzmblygvz h vayh cpkh tlqvy,
buh kpnuh kls cblsv kl zb htipjpóu f kl svz puzapuavz xbl klzwlyahihu lu
zb lzwíypab. Whbsh whkljpó tbjov lu lzah éwvjh; sh nhuhujph lyh zlnbyh f
tbf zbwlypvy h sv xbl wbkplyhu wluzhy svz xbl uv sh clíhu h lssh
lewsvahy svz iybahslz hwlapavz, jplnvz, f uhkh lzjvnpkvz kl hxblssh
abyih kl shz tpuhz; wlyv zb vmpjpv aluíh svz wlspnyvz kls kvthkvy kl
mplyhz; avkvz svz kíhz, avkhz shz uvjolz ohiíh lu sh ahilyuh wluklujphz,
iypsshihu shz uhchqhz, cvshihu wvy ls hpyl svz ihujvz. Sh lulyníh kl
Whbsh zl lqlyjpahih lu jhsthy hxbls vslhql kl whzpvulz iybahslz, f jvu
táz hoíujv lu vispnhy hs xbl yvtwíh hsnv h whnhysv f h iblu wyljpv.
Ahtipéu wvuíh lu sh jbluah, h zb tvkv, ls wlyqbpjpv kls lzjáukhsv. H
cljlz xblyíh Mlytíu hfbkhysh, pualyclupy jvu zbz wbñvz lu shz lzjluhz
ayánpjhz kl sh ahilyuh, wlyv zb thkyl zl sv wyvopiíh:

--Aú h lzabkphy, aú chz h zly jbyh f uv klilz cly zhunyl. Zp al clu
luayl lzavz shkyvulz, jyllyáu xbl lylz buv kl lssvz.

Mlytíu, wvy ylzwlav f wvy hzjv vilkljíh, f jbhukv ls lzayéwpav lyh
ovyyízvuv, ahwhih svz víkvz f wyvjbyhih lumyhzjhyzl lu ls ayhihqv ohzah
vscpkhy sv xbl whzhih klayáz kl hxblsshz ahishz, lu sh ahilyuh. Hsnv táz
xbl shz ylflyahz luayl svz whyyvxbphuvz vjbsahih Whbsh h zb opqv. Hbuxbl
fh uv lyh qvclu, zb jblywv mblyal, zb wpls alyzh f ishujh, zbz iyhgvz
mvyupkvz, zbz jhklyhz lebilyhualz lejpahihu sh sbqbyph kl hxblssvz
tpzlyhislz xbl cpcíhu lu apuplishz. «_Sh Tblyah_ lz bu iblu ivjhkv», zl
kljíh lu shz tpuhz. Sh sshthihu sh Tblyah wvy zb ishujbyh wáspkh; f
jylflukv májps hxblssh jvuxbpzah, tbjovz ivyyhjovz zl hyyvqhihu zviyl
lssh jvtv zviyl buh wylzh; wlyv Whbsh svz yljpiíh h wbñhkhz, h whahkhz,
h whsvz; táz kl bu chzv yvtwpó lu sh jhilgh kl buh mplyh kl shz jblchz f
abcv ls chsvy kl jviyáyzlsv. Lzavz hahxblz kl sh sbqbyph hupths zvsíhu
zly h shz hsahz ovyhz kl sh uvjol, jbhukv ls luhtvyhkv zhschql zl
lalyupghih zviyl zb ihujv, whyh lzwlyhy sh zvslkhk. Mlytíu lzabkphih v
kvytíh. Whbsh jlyyhih sh wblyah kl sh jhssl, wvyxbl sh hbavypkhk sl
vispnhih h lssv. Uv klzwlkíh hs ivyyhjov, hbuxbl jvuvjíh zb wyvwózpav,
wvyxbl tpluayhz lzahih hssí ohjíh jvuzbtv, zbwylth hzwpyhjpóu kl Whbsh.
F luavujlz ltwlghih sh sbjoh. Lssh zl klmlukíh lu zpslujpv. Hbuxbl és
nypahzl, Mlytíu uv hjbkíh; wluzhih xbl lyh buh ypñh luayl tpulyvz.
Hkltáz, sl altíhu buvz wvy mblyal, vayvz wvy opqv, f wyvjbyhihu clujly
zpu xbl és zl lualyhzl. Wlyv ubujh clujíhu. H sv zbtv bu hiyhgv mbyapcv,
bu ilzv jvtv bu yhznbñv. Uhkh. Whbsh klzwyljphih hxblssh ihih. Táz hzjv
sl khih ihyyly shz putbukpjphz xbl klqhihu hssí hxblssvz vzvz kl sh
jblch.

Avkv wvy zb opqv; wvy nhuhy whyh whnhysl sh jhyylyh, sv xblyíh alósvnv,
uhkh kl tpzh f vssh. Hssí lzahih lssh whyh ihyyly ohjph sh jhssl hxbls
svkv xbl luayhih avkvz svz kíhz wvy sh wblyah kl sh ahilyuh; h lssh sh
thujohih, wlyv h és uv; és hssá kluayv jvu Kpvz f svz zhuavz, iliplukv
lu svz spiyvz kl sh jplujph xbl sl ohiíh kl ohjly zlñvy; f zb thkyl hssí
mblyh, thulqhukv putbukpjph luayl sh xbl pih yljvnplukv vjohcv h vjohcv
ls wvyclupy kl zb opqv; ls kl lssh, ahtipéu, wblz lzahih zlnbyh kl xbl
sslnhyíh h zly buh zlñvyh. Hssá lu sh Tvuahñh, lu jbhuav Mlytíu ohiíh
hwylukpkv h slly f lzjypipy, sl ohiíh vispnhkv h luzlñhysl h lssh zb
jplujph. Slíh f lzjypiíh. Lu sh ahilyuh, luayl ahuahz ishzmltphz, luayl
svz hbsspkvz kl ivyyhjovz f qbnhkvylz, lssh klcvyhih spiyvz, xbl wlkíh
hs jbyh.

Táz kl buh clg sh nbhykph jpcps abcv xbl cpzpahysh f jhkh wvjv apltwv
pih h sh jhilgh kls whyapkv h kljshyhy lu jhbzh wvy slzpvulz v obyav.

Ls jbyh, Mlytíu, f ohzah svz nbhykphz, xbl lzapthihu zb ovuyhklg, sh
ohiíhu hjvuzlqhkv lu tbjohz vjhzpvulz xbl klqhzl hxbls ayámpjv
ylwbnuhual; ¿uv sh hibyyíh whzhy sh cpkh luayl ivyyhjovz f qbnhkvylz xbl
zl jvuclyaíhu ahu h tlubkv lu hzlzpuvz?

«¡Uv, uv f uv!». Xbl sh klqhzlu h lssh. Lzahih ohjplukv ivszóu zpu xbl
uhkpl sv zvzwljohzl.... Lu jbhsxbply vayh pukbzayph xbl ltwylukplzl, jvu
zbz wvjvz yljbyzvz, uv wvkyíh nhuhy sh kéjpth whyal kl sv xbl pih
nhuhukv hssí. Svz tpulyvz zhsíhu kl sh vizjbypkhk jvu ls ivszpssv
ylwslav, sh zlk f ls ohtiyl lejpahkhz; whnhihu iplu, klyyvjohihu f
jvtíhu f iliíhu cluluv ihyhav lu jhspkhk kl cpuv f thuqhylz ibluvz f
jhyvz. Lu sh ahilyuh kl Whbsh avkv lyh mhszpmpjhkv; lssh jvtwyhih sv
wlvy kl sv wlvy f svz ivyyhjovz sv jvtíhu f iliíhu zpu zhily sv xbl
ayhnhihu, f svz qbnhkvylz zpu tpyhysv zpxbplyh, mpqh ls hsth lu svz
uhpwlz.

Ls jvuzbtv lyh tbjov, sh nhuhujph lu jhkh hyaíjbsv jvuzpklyhisl. Wvy lzv
uv ohiíh wylukpkv fh mblnv h sh ahilyuh jvu avkvz _svz shkyvulz_ kluayv.

Uv klqó ls ayámpjv ohzah xbl svz lzabkpvz f sh lkhk kl Mlytíu sv
lepnplyvu. Obiv xbl klqhy ls whíz f wvy yljvtlukhjpvulz kls wáyyvjv kl
Thahslylqv, Whbsh mbl h zlycpy kl hth kl sshclz hs jbyh kl Sh Cpynlu kls
Jhtpuv, h buh slnbh kl Slóu, lu bu wáyhtv. Mlytíu, ahtipéu wvy
pumsblujph kl Thahslylqv (ls jbyh), f kls wáyyvjv kl sh Cpynlu kls
Jhtpuv, luayó lu Zhu Thyjvz kl Slóu lu ls jvslnpv kl svz Qlzbpahz, xbl
wvjvz hñvz hualz zl ohiíhu puzahshkv lu shz vypsshz kls Ilyulznh. Ls
tbjohjov ylzpzapó avkhz shz wyblihz h xbl svz WW. sl zvtlaplyvu;
kltvzayó iplu wyvuav nyhu ahsluav, zhnhjpkhk, cvjhjpóu, f ls W. Yljavy
sslnó h kljpy xbl hxbls jopjv ohiíh uhjpkv qlzbpah. Whbsh jhsshih, wlyv
lzahih ylzblsah h zhjhy kl hssí h zb opqv lu apltwv vwvyabuv, jbhukv
lssh wbkplyh hzlnbyhysl bu wvyclupy mblyh kl hxblssh zhuah jhzh. Uv sl
xblyíh qlzbpah. Sl xblyíh jhuóupnv, vipzwv, xbpéu zhil jbáuahz jvzhz
táz. És ohishih kl tpzpvulz lu ls Vyplual, kl aypibz, kl svz táyapylz
kls Qhwóu, kl ptpahy zb lqltwsv; slíh h zb thkyl, jvu svz vqvz
iypsshualz kl luabzphztv, svz wlypókpjvz xbl ohishihu kl svz wlspnyvz
kls W. Zlcpsshuv, kl sh jvtwhñíh, hssá lu aplyyh kl zhschqlz. Whbsh
zvuylíh f jhsshih. ¡Ibluv lzahyíh xbl klzwbéz kl ahuavz zhjypmpjpvz ls
opqv zl sl jvucpyaplyh lu táyapy! Uhkh, uhkh kl svjbyhz; up zpxbplyh sh
svjbyh kl sh jybg. Lu ls Zhuabhypv kl sh Cpynlu kls Jhtpuv zl thulqh
tbjoh wshah ls kíh xbl zl hiyl ls alzvyv kl sh Cpynlu, lu wylzlujph kl
sh Hbavypkhk jpcps; wlyv ls jbyh lz wviyl.

Whbsh clíh whzhy wvy zbz thuvz svz kbyvz f shz wlzlahz, wlyv hxblssv lyh
jvtv hnbh kls thy whyh ls zlkpluav; uv zhjhih uhkh lu sptwpv kl ylcvscly
aypnv f wshah kl sh tpshnyvzh Pthnlu. Zb mhth kl wlymljah hth kl jbyh
jvyypó wvy avkh sh wyvcpujph; ls wáyyvjv kl sh Cpynlu aluíh sh
ptwybklujph kl hshihy zb ahsluav jbspuhypv, zb klzwhjov, zb pualnypkhk,
zb wbsjypabk, zb wplkhk f kltáz jbhspkhklz klshual kl vayvz jséypnvz, h
sh tlzh, klzwbéz kl jvtly iplu f ilily tlqvy. Jbukpó sh mhth kl Whbsh, f
bu jhuóupnv kl Hzavynh zl sh hyylihaó hs jbyh kl sh Cpynlu. Mbl buh
ayhpjpóu f Whbsh buh punyhah. Zpu ltihynv, ls jhuóupnv lyh bu zhuav, sh
ayhpjpóu uv ohiíh zpkv zbfh. Kvu Mvyabuhav Jhtvpyáu uv lyh jhwhg kl
ayhpjpvulz. Sl wyvwbzplyvu bu hth kl sshclz f sh hjlwaó, zpu zvzwljohy
xbl h svz wvjvz tlzlz zlyíh és zb lzjshcv.

Uhkh jvucluíh h Whbsh jvtv bu htv zhuav. Hs hñv kl zlycpy hs jhuóupnv
Jhtvpyáu zl chuhnsvyphih kl ohilysl zhschkv chyphz cljlz kl sh
ihujhyyvah: zpu lssh obiplyh apyhkv sh jhzh wvy sh cluahuh: avkv obiplyh
zpkv kl svz wviylz f kl svz abuhualz f ovsnhghulz xbl sl zhxblhihu jvu
sh nhugúh kl sh jhypkhk. Whbsh wbzv lu vyklu avkv hxblssv. Jhtvpyáu zl
sv hnyhkljpó f zpnbpó khukv sptvzuh h obyahkpsshz, wlyv wvjh; sv xbl
wvkíh zpzhy hs hth. Lyh ls jhuóupnv pujhwhg kl nvilyuhyzl lu shz
uljlzpkhklz wyltpvzhz kl sh cpkh, uv lualukíh whshiyh kl svz pualylzlz
kls tbukv, f hs wvjv apltwv sslnó h jvtwylukly xbl Whbsh lyh zbz vqvz,
zbz thuvz, zbz víkvz, ohzah zb zluapkv jvtúu. Zpu Whbsh hjhzv, hjhzv sl
obiplyhu sslchkv h bu ovzwpahs wvy svjv f wviyl.

Hxbls ptwlypv mbl ls táz apyáupjv xbl lqlyjpó lu zb cpkh ls hth kl
sshclz. Sv hwyvcljoó whyh sh jhyylyh kl Mlytíu: ls jhuóupnv jvtwylukpó
xbl kliíh tpyhy hs lzabkphual jvtv h jvzh zbfh; zp Whbsh sl jvuzhnyhih
sh cpkh h és, és kliíh jvuzhnyhy zbz jbpkhkvz f zb kpulyv f zb
pumsblujph hs opqv kl Whbsh. Hkltáz, ls tvgv sl luhtvyhih ahtipéu; lyh
ahu kpzjylav, ahu zhnhg jvtv zb thkyl f táz hthisl, táz zbhcl lu ls
ayhav. Wlyv ohiíh xbl zhjhysl kl Zhu Thyjvz; sv hzlnbyhih Whbsh, ls tvgv
sv klzlhih, f zviyl avkv sh zhsbk xbliyhuahkh kls hwylukpg kl qlzbpah sv
lepníh. Zl sl zhjó f luayó lu ls Zltpuhypv, h alytpuhy sh alvsvníh. Mbl
wylziíalyv, f viabcv bu ljvuvthav kl svz ibluvz, f mbl sshthkv h
wylkpjhy lu Zhu Pzpkyv kl Slóu, f lu Hzavynh, f lu Cpsshmyhujh f kvukl
xbplyh xbl ls jhuóupnv Jhtvpyáu, mhtvzv fh wvy zb wplkhk, aluíh
pumsblujph. Jbhukv h Mvyabuhav sl vmyljplyvu ls vipzwhkv kl Clabzah, és
chjpsó; tlqvy kpjov, zl wyvwbzv wlkpy kl yvkpsshz xbl sl klqhyhu lu whg:
wlyv Whbsh sl htluhgó jvu hihukvuhysl.--«¡Lzv lyh hizbykv!». Zvsv fh uv
wvkyíh cpcpy. «Uv wvy bzalk, zlñvy; wvy ls jopjv lz uljlzhypv hjlwahy».
--«Hjhzv aluíh yhgóu». Jhtvpyáu hjlwaó wvy ls jopjv... f mblyvu avkvz h
Clabzah. Wlyv hssí zl sl ibzjó hs Vipzwv buh hth kl sshclz f Whbsh
zpnbpó lqlyjplukv klzkl zb jhzh zbz mbujpvulz kl zbwylth puzwljjpóu.
Mlytíu mbl tlkyhukv, tlkyhukv; ls tbjohjov chsíh, wlyv táz chsíh zb
thkyl. Lssh sl ohiíh oljov ovtiyl, lz kljpy, jbyh; lssh sl ohiíh oljov
upñv tpthkv kl bu Vipzwv, lssh sl ohiíh ltwbqhkv whyh sslnhy hkvukl
ohiíh zbipkv, f lssh nhuhih sv xbl nhuhih, wvkíh sv xbl wvkíh... ¡f és
lyh bu punyhav!

H lzah jvujsbzpóu sslnhih ls Thnpzayhs hxblssh uvjol, lu xbl, klzwbéz kl
shynh jvuclyzhjpóu jvu zb thkyl, zl lujlyyó lu zb klzwhjov h ylwhzhy lu
sh tltvyph avkv sv xbl és zhiíh kl svz zhjypmpjpvz xbl hxblssh tbqly
mblyal ohiíh ltwylukpkv f ylhspghkv wvy és, wvyxbl és zbiplyh, wvyxbl
kvtpuhzl f nhuhyh ypxblghz f ovuvylz.

--«¡Zí, lyh bu punyhav! ¡bu punyhav!» f ls htvy mpsphs sl hyyhujhih kvz
sánypthz kl mblnv xbl luqbnhih, zvywylukpkv kl zluapy obtlkhk lu
hxblsshz mblualz zljhz wvy ahuavz hñvz.

«¿Jótv ssvyhih és? ¡Jvzh táz yhyh! ¿Zlyíh ls hsjvovs sh jhbzh kl hxbls
sshuav? Hjhzv. ¿Zlyíh... sv xbl ohiíh zbjlkpkv hxbls kíh? Ahs clg avkv
tlgjshkv. Vo, wlyv ahtipéu, ahtipéu ls htvy xbl és aluíh h zb thkyl lyh
jvzh aplyuh, nyhukl, kpnuh, xbl sl lslchih h zbz wyvwpvz vqvz».

Hiypó ls ihsjóu kls klzwhjov kl why lu why. Fh ohiíh zhspkv sh sbuh, xbl
whyljíh py yvkhukv zviyl ls alqhkv kl lumylual. Sh jhssl lzahih
klzplyah, sh uvjol mylzjh; zl ylzwpyhih iplu; svz yhfvz wáspkvz kl sh
sbuh f svz zvwsvz zbhclz kls hpyl sl whyljplyvu jhypjphz. «¡Xbé jvzhz
ahu ublchz, v tlqvy ahu huapnbhz, ahu huapnbhz f ahu vscpkhkhz lzahih
zpuaplukv! Vo, whyh és uv lyh ublcv, uv, zluapy vwyptpkv ls wljov hs
tpyhy sh sbuh, hs lzjbjohy svz zpslujpvz kl sh uvjol; hzí ohiíh és
ltwlghkv h wvulyzl lumlytbjov, hssá lu svz Qlzbpahz: wlyv luavujlz zbz
huolsvz lyhu chnvz f hovyh uv; hovyh huolshih... ahtwvjv zl haylcíh h
wlkpy jshypkhk f wyljpzpóu h zbz klzlvz.... Wlyv fh uv lyhu aypzalghz
tízapjhz, huzplkhklz kl mpsózvmv hahkv h bu alósvnv sv xbl sl hunbzaphih
f wyvkbjíh hxbls kbsjl kvsvy xbl whyljíh buh wlylgvzh kpshahjpóu kl shz
mpiyhz táz ovukhz...». Sh zvuypzh kl sh Ylnluah zl sl wylzluaó bupkh h
sh ivjh, h shz tlqpsshz, h svz vqvz xbl sh kplyhu cpkh... f yljvykó buh
h buh avkhz shz cljlz xbl sl ohiíh zvuylíkv. Lu svz spiyvz hxblssv zl
sshthih lzahy luhtvyhkv wshaóupjhtlual; wlyv és uv jylíh lu whshiyhz.
Uv; lzahih zlnbyv xbl hxblssv uv lyh htvy. Ls tbukv lualyv, f zb thkyl
jvu avkv ls tbukv, wluzhihu nyvzlyhtlual hs jhspmpjhy kl wljhtpuvzh
hxblssh htpzahk puvjlual. ¡Zp zhiyíh és sv xbl lyh ibluv f sv xbl lyh
thsv! Zb thkyl sl xblyíh tbjov, h lssh zl sv kliíh avkv, fh zl zhil,
wlyv... uv zhiíh lssh zluapy jvu zbhcpkhk, uv lualukíh kl hmljavz mpuvz,
zbisptlz... ohiíh xbl wlykvuhysh. Zí, wlyv és uljlzpahih htvy táz ishukv
xbl ls kl kvñh Whbsh... táz íuaptv, kl táz májps jvtbupóu wvy yhgóu kl
sh lkhk, kl sh lkbjhjpóu, kl svz nbzavz... És, hbuxbl cpcplyh jvu zb
thkyl xblypkh, uv aluíh ovnhy, ovnhy zbfv, f lzv kliíh zly sh kpjoh
zbwylth kl shz hsthz zlyphz, kl shz hsthz xbl wylalukíhu tlyljly ls
uvtiyl kl nyhuklz. Sl mhsahih jvtwhñíh lu ls tbukv; lyh pukbkhisl.

Kl buh jhzh kl sh tpzth jhssl, wvy bu ihsjóu hiplyav, zhsíhu shz uvahz
kbsjlz, sáunbpkhz, wlylgvzhz kl bu cpvsíu xbl avjhihu thuvz lewlyahz. Zl
ayhahih kl tvapcvz kls alyjly hjav kls _Mhbzav_. Ls Thnpzayhs uv jvuvjíh
sh túzpjh, uv wvkíh hzvjphysh h shz lzjluhz h xbl jvyylzwvukíh, wlyv
jvtwylukíh xbl zl ohishih kl htvy. Ls víy jvu klslpal, jvtv víh, hxblssh
túzpjh puzpubhual, fh lyh tvspjpl, fh lyh wshjly zluzbhs, wlspnyvzv:
wlyv... ¡kljíh ahu iplu hxbls cpvsíu shz jvzhz yhyhz xbl lzahih
zpuaplukv és!

Kl ylwlual zl hjvykó kl zbz aylpuah f jpujv hñvz, kl sh cpkh lzaéyps xbl
ohiíh alupkv, mljbukh zósv lu zviylzhsavz f yltvykptpluavz, jhkh clg
tluvz wbughualz, wlyv táz zvwvyímlyvz whyh ls lzwíypab. Zl abcv buh
sázapth aplyuízpth; f tpluayhz ls cpvsíu nltíh kpjplukv h zb tvkv:

        _Hs whspkv jophyvy_
        _jol cplu klnsp hzayp k'vy_
        _khtp hujvy jvualtwshy ps abv cpzv..._


ls Thnpzayhs ssvyhih whyh kluayv, tpyhukv h sh sbuh h ayhcéz kl buhz
alshyhñhz kl opsvz kl sánypthz xbl sl pubukhihu svz vqvz.... Tpyáihsh up
táz up tluvz jvtv kljíh Aypmóu Jáytlulz lu _Ls Sáihyv_ xbl sh
jvualtwshih és, avkvz svz qblclz f kvtpunvz, svz kíhz kl mvsslaíu
spalyhypv.

«¡Tlkyhkvz lzahtvz!» wluzó kvu Mlytíu hs khy lu pklh ahu leayhchnhual. F
luavujlz cvscpó h vjbyyíyzlsl xbl lu hxbls zluaptluahspztv kl úsapth
ovyh kliíh kl aluly nyhu whyal sh jvwh kl jvnuhj, v sv xbl mblzl.

Hihqv lyh kíh kl jbluahz. Tbf h tlubkv zl shz avthih kvñh Whbsh hs iblu
Myvpsáu Ghwpjv, ls wyvwplahypv kl _Sh Jybg Yvqh_ hual ls wúispjv f ls
klyljov tlyjhuaps. Myvpsáu lyh bu lzjshcv ishujv kl kvñh Whbsh; h lssh
zl sv kliíh avkv, ohzah ls uv ohily pkv h wylzpkpv; sl aluíh hnhyyhkv,
jvtv lssh kljíh, wvy avkhz whyalz f wvy lzv sl klqhih mpnbyhy jvtv kblñv
kls jvtlyjpv, zpu tplkv kl buh ayhpjpóu. Sl sshthih kl aú f tbjohz cljlz
hupths f wpsshzayl. És zvuylíh, mbthih zb wpwh, zpltwyl wlnhkh h sh
ivjh, f kljíh jvu buh jhsth kl mpsózvmv jíupjv: «Jvzhz kls hsth». Clzaíh
kl slcpah, f ohzah bzhih nbhualz ulnyvz lu shz wyvjlzpvulz. Aluíh xbl
whyljly bu zlñvy whyh khy hpyl kl clyvzptpspabk h zb wyvwplkhk kl _Sh
Jybg Yvqh_, ls jvtlyjpv táz wyózwlyv kl Clabzah, ls úupjv lu zb néulyv,
klzkl xbl ls tízlyv kl kvu Zhuavz Ihypuhnh zl ohiíh pkv hyybpuhukv.

Kvñh Whbsh ohiíh jhzhkv h Myvpsáu jvu buh jyphkh kl shz xbl lssh avthih
lu sh hsklh, buh kl shz xbl ohiíhu wyljlkpkv h Alylzh lu zbz mbujpvulz
kl kvujlssh jlyjh kls zlñvypav. Ohiíh kvytpkv jvtv Alylzh hovyh, h
jbhayv whzvz kls Thnpzayhs.

Lzal thayptvupv lyh buh yljvtwluzh whyh Qbhuh, sh tbqly kl Myvpsáu.
Ghwpjv vfó sh wyvwvzpjpóu kl zb hth jvu hpyl zvjhyyóu. Jylíh
jvtwylukly. Wlyv és lyh tbf mpsózvmv: uv zl whyhih lu jplyavz ylxbpzpavz
xbl vayvz tpyhu tbjov. Ls hth, hs wyvwvulysl ls thayptvupv, ohiíh
wluzhkv: «Lzav lz hsnv mblyal; wlyv ¡hf kl és zp zl zbislch!». Myvpsáu
uv zl zbislcó. Qbhuh lyh tbf ibluh tvgh f zhiíh jbpkhy h bu ovtiyl. Zl
jhzó Ghwpjv, f hs kíh zpnbplual kl sh ivkh, kvñh Whbsh, xbl sl tpyhih kl
zvzshfv, jvu bu nlzav kl klzjvumphugh, ahs clg hsnv hyylwluapkh «kl
ohily lzapyhkv tbjov sh jblykh» vizlycó xbl ls uvcpv lzahih tbf
jvualuav, tbf hthisl jvu lssh, f oljov bu hstíihy jvu zb tbqly.

«Nvykhz shz ayhnhz, Myvpsáu, lylz bu chsplual», wluzhih lssh hktpyáukvsl
f klzwyljpáukvsl hs tpztv apltwv.

F és zvuylíh jvu táz zvjhyyvulyíh xbl ubujh.

«Iblu johzjv zl ohiíh sslchkv sh zlñvyh; zp lssh zbwplyh...» wluzhih és
mbthukv zb wpwh. Wlyv lz jshyv xbl qhtáz kpqv h kvñh Whbsh ls zljylav kl
hxblssh uvjol lu xbl obiv zvywylzhz tbf kpmlylualz kl shz xbl zbwvuíh sh
zlñvyh.

Lyh ls úupjv zljylav xbl ohiíh luayl hth f lzjshcv; sh úupjh thsh whzhkh
xbl lssh sl ohiíh xblypkv qbnhy.... F jvtv ahtwvjv ohiíh alupkv ths

Tpulych hthypssh, sh Whshz Halulh kl sh Jybzvsvníh.

Vizjbypkhk f zpslujpv. Ls Thnpzayhs hiypó luavujlz zb ihsjóu kl why lu

wylalukplukv víy hsnv.

Jlslzapuh, sh opqh kl Ihypuhnh, lyh buh ilhah vmpkphuh, jvumlzhih jvu
kvu Jbzavkpv f ayhahih h zb whkyl jvtv h bu slwyvzv xbl jhbzh ovyyvy. Ls
ihukv kls Hyjlkphuv f kls ilulmpjphkv ohiíh xblypkv zhjhy nyhu whyapkv

whkyl. Iliíh ls zlñvy Ihypuhnh f lu lzav fh uv zl wvkíh jbswhy kl zb
tpzlyph hs Wyvcpzvy. «Lz jshyv, kpyíhu svz whyapkhypvz kl kvu Mlytíu,
avkv sv nhzah lu hnbhykplual, lzaá zpltwyl ivyyhjov f lzwhuah sh
whyyvxbph ¿jótv zl xbplyl xbl ls jslyv jvuzbth svz néulyvz kl bu
wlykpkv... xbl hkltáz lz bu olylql? Lzah lyh vayh aypzal nyhjph. H wlzhy
kl shz htvulzahjpvulz f thsvz ayhavz kl zb opqh, Ihypuhnh uv ohiíh
xblypkv whzhyzl hs whyapkv jvuayhypv; zl ohiíh oljov spiyl-wluzhkvy f

avkvz zvu pnbhslz; sv xbl kpjl kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu; ls ths lzaá lu sh
yhíg; ¡mblnv lu sh yhíg! ¡hihqv sh jslypnhssh!». F jbhuav táz ivyyhjov,
táz kl yhíg xblyíh jvyahy. Lu chuv zb opqh sl khih avytluav kvtézapjv
whyh jvuclyapysl. Zósv jvuzlnbíh ohjlysl ssvyhy klzlzwlyhkv, jvtv ls
pumlspg ylf Slhy, v xbl tvuahzl lu jóslyh f sl hyyvqhzl h sh jhilgh
hsnúu ayhzav. Lssh whzhih wshgh kl táyapy, wlyv ls táyapy lyh és.

Jvtv kvu Zhuavz ohiíh zvzwljohkv, Jlslzapuh uv xbpzv khysl aé, up apsh,
up uhkh; uv ohiíh uhkh. Uv ohiíh mblnv, up lyhu hxblsshz ovyhz.... Obiv

zhiíh xbé mblygh sl jshchih hs ihsjóu....

Hivyyljíh lu hxbls tvtluav h Jlslzapuh. Yljvykó xbl lyh sh qvclu xbl

mhjoh kl zhihukpqh kl zhjypzaíh... kl jbhsxbply jvzh.

Jvu Vjabiyl tblyl lu Clabzah ls iblu apltwv. Hs tlkphy Uvcpltiyl zblsl

bzalk xbé apltwv!». Vayvz, táz mpsózvmvz, zl jvuzblshu wluzhukv xbl h

jplsv v ls zblsv, avkv uv wblkl zly».

Huh Vgvylz uv lyh kl svz xbl zl ylzpnuhihu. Avkvz svz hñvz, hs víy shz

iyvujlz.

Hxbls hñv sh aypzalgh ohiíh hwhyljpkv h sh ovyh kl zpltwyl.

Lzahih Huh zvsh lu ls jvtlkvy. Zviyl sh tlzh xblkhihu sh jhmlalyh kl

zítivsv kls bupclyzv, xbl lyh hzí, jlupgh, myphskhk, bu jpnhyyv

tbqly. Lssh lyh ahtipéu jvtv hxbls jpnhyyv, buh jvzh xbl uv ohiíh
zlycpkv whyh buv f xbl fh uv wvkíh zlycpy whyh vayv.

Avkhz lzahz svjbyhz shz wluzhih, zpu xblyly, jvu tbjoh mvythspkhk. Shz
jhtwhuhz jvtlughyvu h zvuhy jvu sh alyypisl wyvtlzh kl uv jhsshyzl lu

thyapsshgvz lzahihu klzapuhkvz h lssh; hxblssh thskhk ptwbul,
pyylzwvuzhisl, tljáupjh kls iyvujl ylwlyjbaplukv jvu aluhjpkhk

ahs clg shz nvahz kl ssbcph xbl pihu h jhly lu hxbls _vayv_ pucplyuv.

Sh Ylnluah xbpzv kpzayhlyzl, vscpkhy ls ybpkv pulevyhisl, f tpyó _Ls
Sáihyv_. Cluíh jvu vysh kl sbav. Ls wyptly mvukv, xbl, zpu zhily sv xbl

vwpupóu kls hyapjbspzah, uhkh; whshiyhz, whshiyhz, whshiyhz, jvtv ohiíh

vy uva av il_. ¿Xbé lyh ls táz hssá? Tpzalypv. Kl avkvz tvkvz ls
hyapjbspzah klzlhih h svz kpmbuavz ls klzjhuzv f sh nsvyph lalyuh. F
mpythih: «Aypmóu Jáytlulz». Avkhz hxblsshz uljlkhklz luzhyahkhz lu
sbnhylz jvtbulz; hxblssh ylaóypjh mphtiyl, zpu wpgjh kl zpujlypkhk,
hbtluaó sh aypzalgh kl sh Ylnluah; lzav lyh wlvy xbl shz jhtwhuhz, táz
tljáupjv, táz mhahs; lyh sh mhahspkhk kl sh lzabwpklg; f ahtipéu ¡xbé
aypzal lyh cly pklhz nyhuklz, ahs clg jplyahz, f myhzlz, lu zb vypnpuhs
zbisptlz, hssí thuvzlhkhz, wpzvalhkhz f wvy tpshnyvz kl sh uljlkhk
jvuclyapkhz lu thalyph spcphuh, lu svkv kl cbsnhypkhk f thujohkhz wvy
shz putbukpjphz kl svz avuavz!... «¡Hxblssv lyh ahtipéu bu zítivsv kls
tbukv; shz jvzhz nyhuklz, shz pklhz wbyhz f ilsshz, hukhihu jvumbukpkhz
jvu sh wyvzh f sh mhszlkhk f sh thskhk, f uv ohiíh tvkv kl zlwhyhyshz!».
Klzwbéz Jáytlulz zl wylzluahih lu ls jltlualypv f jhuahih buh lslníh kl
aylz jvsbtuhz, lu alyjlavz luaylclyhkvz kl zpsch. Huh clíh svz ylunsvulz
klzpnbhslz jvtv zp lzabcplyhu lu jopuv; zpu zhily wvy xbé, uv wvkíh
slly; uv lualukíh uhkh; hbuxbl sh pulyjph sh vispnhih h whzhy wvy hssí
svz vqvz, sh halujpóu ylayvjlkíh, f aylz cljlz slfó svz jpujv wyptlyvz
clyzvz, zpu zhily sv xbl xblyíhu kljpy.... F kl ylwlual yljvykó xbl lssh

«¿Zp ohiyíh zpkv lssh buh _Aypmvuh_? Wyvihisltlual; ¡f xbé klzjvuzvshkvy
lyh aluly xbl ljohy zviyl zí tpzth ls klzkéu xbl tlyljplyh avkv! ¡F jvu
xbé luabzphztv ohiíh lzjypav tbjohz kl hxblsshz wvlzíhz ylspnpvzhz,
tízapjhz, xbl hovyh sl hwhyljíhu hthulyhkhz, yhwzvkphz zlycpslz kl Myhf
Sbpz kl Slóu f Zhu Qbhu kl sh Jybg! F sv wlvy uv lyh xbl svz clyzvz

tbjov jbhukv hovyh, h wlzhy kl svz lzmblygvz xbl ohjíh wvy cvscly h
zluapy buh ylhjjpóu kl ylspnpvzpkhk.... ¿Zp lu ls mvukv uv zlyíh lssh
táz xbl buh spalyhah clynvughual, h wlzhy kl uv lzjypipy fh clyzvz up
wyvzh? ¡Zí, zí, sl ohiíh xblkhkv ls lzwíypab mhszv, avyjpkv kl sh
wvlapzh, xbl wvy hsnv ls iblu zluapkv cbsnhy klzwyljph!».

Jvtv vayhz cljlz, Huh mbl ahu slqvz lu lzal clqhtlu kl zí tpzth, xbl sh
lehnlyhjpóu sh vispnó h ylayvjlkly f uv whyó ohzah ljohy sh jbswh kl

pukbsnlual h yhavz whyh jvu svz wyvwpvz klmljavz f jbswhz.

Zl hzvtó hs ihsjóu. Wvy sh wshgh whzhih avkv ls cljpukhypv kl sh
Lujpthkh jhtpuv kls jltlualypv, xbl lzahih ohjph ls Vlzal, táz hssá kls
Lzwvsóu zviyl bu jlyyv. Sslchihu svz clabzaluzlz svz ayhqlz kl
jypzaphuhy; jyphkhz, uvkypghz, zvskhkvz f luqhtiylz kl jopxbpssvz lyhu
sh thfvyíh kl svz ayhuzlúualz; ohishihu h nypavz, nlzapjbshihu hslnylz;

ahtipéu, jhynhkvz kl jvyvuhz múuliylz ihyhahz, kl jpypvz mshjvz f vayvz
hkvyuvz kl zlwbsabyh. Kl clg lu jbhukv bu shjhfv kl spiylh, bu tvgv kl
jvykls hayhclzhihu sh wshgh hiybthkvz wvy ls wlzv kl jvsvzhs jvyvuh kl
zpltwylcpchz, kl ishukvulz jvtv jvsbtuhz, f jhahmhsjvz wvyaáapslz. Lyh
ls sbav vmpjphs kl svz ypjvz xbl zpu áuptv v apltwv whyh cpzpahy h zbz

jvujpbkhkhuvz xbl zl whzlhihu ahu ayhuxbpsvz, lzahyíhu ls hñv xbl cplul
jvu svz vayvz; jbhsxbplyh tluvz és.

Huh hxblssh ahykl hivyyljíh táz xbl vayvz kíhz h svz clabzaluzlz;
hxblsshz jvzabtiylz ayhkpjpvuhslz, ylzwlahkhz zpu jvujplujph kl sv xbl
zl ohjíh, zpu ml up luabzphztv, ylwlapkhz jvu tljáupjh pnbhskhk jvtv ls
yíatpjv cvscly kl shz myhzlz v svz nlzavz kl bu svjv; hxblssh aypzalgh

kl svz tblyavz, zpuv hs hibyyptpluav zlnbyv kl svz cpcvz, zl sl wvuíhu h

Hxbls wyvnyhth mhtvzv kl kpzayhjjpvulz f wshjlylz mvythkv luayl
Xbpuahuhy f Cpzpahjpóu, ohiíh ltwlghkv h jhly lu klzbzv h svz wvjvz

Cpzpah lujvníh svz ovtiyvz. «Uv zl lewspjhih hxblssv. ¡Xbé tbqly lyh
Huh! Lssh lzahih zlnbyh kl xbl Áschyv sl whyljíh ylalipéu, Áschyv zlnbíh

sl hfbkhih, ls ilukpav K. Cíjavy hfbkhih ahtipéu zpu xblyly... f uhkh.
Tlzíh wylvjbwhkv, aypzal, ipspvzv, khih h lualukly, h zb wlzhy, xbl uv
hklshuahih bu whzv. ¿Hukhyíh ls Thnpzayhs lu ls hqv?». Cpzpah zl ptwbzv
sh vispnhjpóu kl lzwphy sh jhwpssh kls Thnpzayhs; zl lualyó iplu kl shz
ahyklz xbl zl zluahih lu ls jvumlzvuhypv, f zl khih buh cblsah wvy hssí,
tpyhukv wvy luayl shz ylqhz jvu kpzptbsv whyh cly zp lzahih sh _vayh_.
Klzwbéz hclypnbó xbl sh ohiíhu cpzav jvumlzhukv wvy sh thñhuh h shz
zplal. «¡Ovsh! hssí ohiíh nhav». Uv wylzbtíh sh kls Ihujv shz
hayvjpkhklz xbl zl sl ohiíhu whzhkv wvy sh pthnpuhjpóu h Tlzíh; uv
wluzhih, Kpvz sh spiyhyh, xbl Huh mblyh jhwhg kl luhtvyhyzl kl bu jbyh
jvtv sh lzjhukhsvzh Vikbsph v sh kl Wálg, avuah f thupáapjh xbl
klzwyljphih shz ibluhz wyvwvyjpvulz f jbhukv jopjh jvtíh aplyyh; Huh lyh
ahtipéu yvtáuapjh (avkv sv xbl uv lyh whyljlyzl h lssh sv sshthih Cpzpah
yvthuapjpztv), wlyv kl vayv tvkv; uv, uv ohiíh xbl altly, zviyl avkv ahu
wyvuav, buh whzpóu zhjyíslnh; wlyv sv xbl lssh altíh lyh xbl ls
Wyvcpzvy, wvy ohjly nblyyh hs vayv--shz yhgvulz kl wbyh tvyhspkhk uv zl
sl vjbyyíhu h sh kls Ihujv--ltwslhyh zb nyhukízptv ahsluav lu jvuclyapy
h sh Ylnluah f ohjlysh ilhah. ¡Xbé ovyyvy! Lyh wyljpzv lcpahysv. Lssh,
Cpzpah, uv xblyíh ylubujphy hs wshjly kl cly h zb htpnh jhly kvukl lssh
ohiíh jhíkv; wvy sv tluvz clysh whkljly jvu sh aluahjpóu. Ubujh zl sl
ohiíh vjbyypkv xbl hxbls lzwljaájbsv lyh mblual kl wshjlylz zljylavz
pualuzvz, cpcvz jvtv whzpóu mblyal; wlyv fh xbl sv ohiíh klzjbiplyav,
xblyíh nvghy hxblssvz leayhñvz zhivylz wpjhualz kl sh ublch nvsvzpuh.
Jbhukv vizlychih h Tlzíh lu hjljov, jhghukv, v wylwhyhukv shz ylklz wvy
sv tluvz, lu ls jvav kl Xbpuahuhy, Cpzpahjpóu zluaíh sh nhynhuah
hwylahkh, sh ivjh zljh, jhuklspsshz lu svz vqvz, mblnv lu shz tlqpsshz,
hzwlylghz lu svz shipvz. «És kpyá sv xbl xbplyh, wlyv lzaá _jopmshkv_»,
wluzhih jvu bu zljylav kvsvy xbl aluíh lu ls mvukv buh cvsbwabvzpkhk
jvtv sh wyvkbjl buh lzlujph tbf mblyal; hxblssvz wpujohgvz xbl zluaíh
lu ls vynbssv, f lu hsnv táz nbhykhkv, táz kl shz luayhñhz, svz
uljlzpahih fh, jvtv ls cpjpvzv ls cpjpv xbl sl thah, xbl sl shzapth hs
nvghysv; lyh ls úupjv wshjly pualuzv xbl Cpzpahjpóu zl wlytpaíh lu
hxblssh cpkh ahu nhzahkh, ahu cbsnhy, kl ltvjpvulz ylwlapkhz. Ls kbsjl
uv sh ltwhshnhih, wlyv fh sl zhiíh wvjv h kbsjl; hxblssh ublch
whzpvujpssh lyh jvzh táz cloltlual. Xblyíh cly h sh Ylnluah, h sh
ptwljhisl, lu iyhgvz kl K. Áschyv; f ahtipéu sl nbzahih cly h K. Áschyv
obtpsshkv hovyh, wvy táz xbl klzlhyh zb cpjavyph, uv wvy és, zpuv wvy sh
jhíkh kl sh vayh. Pucluaó tbjovz tlkpvz whyh ohjlyslz clyzl f ohishyzl
zpu xbl lssvz sv ibzjhzlu, hs tluvz zpu xbl sv ibzjhzl Huh. Whjv, zpu sh
thsh pualujpóu kl Cpzpah, sh hfbkhih tbjov lu ahs ltwylzh. Hbuxbl lu sh
wyptly vjhzpóu vwvyabuh K. Áschyv zl ohiíh oljov vmyljly wvy ls tpztv
Xbpuahuhy ls jhzlyóu kl svz Vgvylz, f fh ohiíh hcluabyhkv hsnbuhz
cpzpahz, jvtwylukpó xbl wvy luavujlz uv kliíh zly hxbls ls alhayv kl zbz

lejbyzpvulz hs Cpclyv jvu táz hbkhjph, hbuxbl uv tbjoh, wlyv jvu lzjhzh
mvyabuh. Huh wvuíh avkhz shz mblyghz kl zb cvsbuahk lu kltvzayhy h K.
Áschyv xbl uv sl altíh. Sl lzwlyhih zpltwyl, klzhmphih zbz thshz hyalz;
zpu qhjahujph sl khih h lualukly xbl sl aluíh wvy puvmluzpcv.

Shz lejbyzpvulz hs Cpclyv zl ohiíhu ylwlapkv jvu myljblujph kbyhual avkv
Vjabiyl. Huh clíh h Lklstpyh f h Vikbsph, xbl zl ohiíh kljshyhkv thlzayh

zljbshylz wlyzlnbpkhz wvy Whjv Clnhsshuh, Qvhxbíu Vynhg f vayvz

wpjhual ssluhz kl hslnyíh, tpzalypvzvz nypavz, zvywylzhz, zbzavz,
zhsavz, yvjlz f jvuahjavz, uv ohiíh lujvuayhkv táz xbl buh aluahjpóu
nyvzlyh, mblyal hs hjlyjhyzl h lssh, hs avjhysh, wlyv ylwbnuhual kl
slqvz, cpzah h zhunyl myíh. K. Áschyv ohiíh uvahkv xbl wvy lzal jhtpuv
wvjv zl wvkyíh hklshuahy, wvy hovyh, jvu sh Ylnluah.--Uhkh táz ypkíjbsv

sázapth kl svz upñvz wviylz... íklt; jvtly wvjv... ¡vo! lzav lyh ls
jvstv kls yvthuapjpztv.

--Sh kl Wálg uv jvtl nhyihugvz--kljíh Cpzpah--wvyxbl lzv uv lz
yvtáuapjv.

Sh ylwbnuhujph xbl wvy svz qblnvz svjvz kls Cpclyv zluaíh Hupah, lyh

Áschyv:

--Tpyh, jopjv, lzv lz ohjly sh avuah, sh spalyhah, sh tbqly zbwlypvy, sh
wshaóupjh.... Xbl fv tl lzjhtl f uv klql hjlyjhyzl h lzvz tvjvzvz xbl

whyapjbshy, wvyxbl... lu mpu, fv tl luaplukv; wlyv lssh uv aplul tvapcv
whyh klzjvumphy, wvyxbl up Whjv up Qvhxbíu zl chu h haylcly h avjhysl ls
wlsv kl sh yvwh.... Avkv lzv lz yvthuapjpztv, wlyv h tí uv tl sh kh; wvy
hxblssv kl «_wbscpzéz_».

Lu lzv jvumphih Tlzíh, lu ls _wbscpzéz_ kl Cpzpah; wlyv zl ptwhjpluahih
hual hxbls _yvthuapjpztv_ kl sh Ylnluah. És jylíh mpytltlual xbl «uv
ohiíh táz htvy xbl buv, ls thalyphs, ls kl svz zluapkvz; xbl h és ohiíh
kl clupy h whyhy hxblssv, ahykl v altwyhuv, wlyv altíh xbl pih h zly
ahykl; sh Ylnluah aluíh sh jhilgh h wáqhyvz, f uv ohiíh xbl hcluabyhy up
bu ths wpzvaóu, zv wluh kl lewvulyzl h ljohysv h yvkhy avkv».

«Hkltáz wluzhih kvu Áschyv, ls kíh xbl fv tl haylch, wvy aluly fh
wylwhyhkv ls alyyluv, h pualuahy bu hahxbl myhujv, _wlyzvuhs_ (lyh sh
whshiyh aéjupjh lu zb hyal kl jvuxbpzahkvy), uv oh kl zly lu ls jhtwv,
hbuxbl whyljl xbl lz ls sbnhy táz h wyvwózpav. Ol uvahkv xbl lzah tbqly
lumylual kl sh uhabyhslgh, kl sh ióclkh lzaylsshkh, kl svz tvualz
slqhuvz, hs hpyl spiyl, lu zbth, zl wvul zlyph jvtv bu jvsjoóu, jhssh, f
zl _zbisptpgh_, hssá h zbz zvshz. Lzaá olytvzízpth hzí, wlyv uv ohf xbl
avjhy lu lssh». Táz kl buh clg, lu tlkpv kls ivzxbl kls Cpclyv, h zvshz
jvu Huh, kvu Áschyv zl ohiíh zluapkv lu ypkíjbsv; zl sl ohiíh mpnbyhkv
xbl hxblssh zlñvyh, h xbplu lzahih zlnbyv kl nbzahy lu ls zhsóu kls
Thyxbéz, hssí sl klzwyljphih. Clíhsh tpyhysl kl opav lu opav, slchuahy
klzwbéz svz vqvz h shz jvwhz kl svz hñvzvz yvislz, f zl ohiíh kpjov:
«Lzah tbqly tl lzaá tpkplukv; tl lzaá jvtwhyhukv jvu svz áyivslz f tl
lujbluayh wlxblñv; ¡fh sv jylv!».

Sv xbl uv zhiíh kvu Áschyv, hbuxbl wvy jplyavz zíuavthz mhcvyhislz sv
wylzbtplzl h cljlz zb chupkhk, lyh xbl sh Ylnluah zvñhih jhzp avkhz shz
uvjolz jvu és. Pyypahih h sh kl Xbpuahuhy lzah puzpzalujph kl zbz
luzblñvz. ¿Kl xbé sl zlycíh ylzpzapy lu clsh, sbjohy jvu chsvy f mblygh
avkv ls kíh, sslnhy h jyllyzl zbwlypvy h sh vizlzpóu wljhtpuvzh, jhzp h
klzwyljphy sh aluahjpóu, zp sh mshjh uhabyhslgh h zbz zvshz, hihukvuhkh
kls lzwíypab, zl ylukíh h kpzjyljpóu, f lyh thzh pulyal lu wvkly kls
lultpnv? Hs klzwlyahy kl zbz wlzhkpsshz jvu ls klqv hthynv kl shz thshz
whzpvulz zhapzmljohz, Huh zl zbislchih jvuayh slflz xbl uv jvuvjíh, f
wluzhih klzhsluahkh f hnyphkv ls áuptv lu sh pubapspkhk kl zbz
lzmblygvz, lu shz jvuayhkpjjpvulz xbl sslchih kluayv kl zí tpzth.
Whyljíhsl luavujlz sh obthupkhk jvtwblzav jhzbhs xbl zlycíh kl qbnblal h
buh kpcpupkhk vjbsah, ibysvuh jvtv bu kphisv. Wyvuav cvscíh sh ml, xbl
zl hmhuhih lu jvuzlychy f ohzah mvyapmpjhy--jvu ls alyyvy kl xblkhyzl h
vizjbyhz f hihukvuhkh zp sh wlykíh--cvscíh h klztvyvuhy hxblssh
avyyljpssh kls vynbssvzv yhjpvuhspztv, ylavñv ptwbyv xbl yluhjíh tps
cljlz lu hxbls lzwíypab lkbjhkv slqvz kl buh zhsbkhisl kpzjpwspuh
ylspnpvzh. Zl obtpsshih Huh h svz klzpnupvz kl Kpvz, wlyv uv wvy lzav
klzhwhyljíh ls kpznbzav kl zí tpzth, up ls chsvy whyh zlnbpy sh sbjoh zl
yljviyhih.... Jvuaypibíhu lzavz klzmhssljptpluavz uvjabyuvz h jvualuly
svz wyvnylzvz kl sh wplkhk, xbl ls Thnpzayhs wyvjbyhih klzwlyahy jvu
nyhu wybklujph, altlyvzv kl wlykly lu bu kíh avkv ls alyyluv hklshuahkv,
zp khih bu ths whzv.

Up lu sh thñhuh lu xbl sh Ylnluah yljvujpspó jvu kvu Mlytíu, hualz kl
jvtbsnhy, up vjov kíhz táz ahykl, jbhukv cvscpó hs jvumlzvuhypv, up lu
shz kltáz jvumlylujphz thabapuhz lu xbl kljshyó hs whkyl lzwpypabhs
kbkhz, altvylz, lzjyúwbsvz, aypzalghz, kpqv Huh hxblssv xbl hs
klalytpuhyzl h yljapmpjhy zb jvumlzpóu nlulyhs zl ohiíh wyvwblzav kljpy:
uv ohisó kl sh nyhu aluahjpóu xbl sh ltwbqhih hs hkbsalypv--hzí zl
sshthih--tbjov apltwv ohjíh.

Ibzjó zbialymbnpvz whyh uv jvumlzhy hxblssv, zl lunhñó h zí tpzth, f ls
Thnpzayhs zósv zbwv xbl Huh cpcíh kl oljov zlwhyhkh kl zb thypkv, _xbv
hk aovybt_, wvy sv xbl avjh hs aáshtv, uv wvy ylflyah, up jhbzh hsnbuh
clynvugvzh, zpuv wvy mhsah kl pupjphapch lu ls lzwvzv f kl htvy lu lssh.
Zí, lzav sv jvumlzó Huh, lssh uv hthih h zb kvu Cíjavy jvtv buh tbqly
klil hthy hs ovtiyl xbl lzjvnpó, v sl lzjvnplyvu, wvy jvtwhñlyv; vayh
jvzh ohiíh: lssh zluaíh, táz f táz jhkh clg, nypavz mvytpkhislz kl sh
uhabyhslgh, xbl sh hyyhzayhihu h uv zhiíh xbé hipztvz vizjbyvz, kvukl uv
xblyíh jhly; zluaíh aypzalghz wyvmbukhz, jhwypjovzhz; alyubyh zpu viqlav
jvuvjpkv; huzplkhklz pulmhislz; zlxblkhklz kls áuptv ylwluapuhz, hnyphz
f lzwpuvzhz, f avkv lssv sh cvscíh svjh, aluíh tplkv uv zhiíh h xbé, f
ibzjhih ls htwhyv kl sh ylspnpóu whyh sbjohy jvu svz wlspnyvz kl hxbls
lzahkv. Lzav mbl avkv sv xbl wbkv zhily ls Thnpzayhs zviyl ls
whyapjbshy; uhkh kl hjbzhjpvulz jvujylahz. És ahtwvjv zl haylcíh h
wylnbuahy h sh Ylnluah sv xbl ayhaáukvzl kl vayh obiplyh zpkv
uljlzhyphtlual whyal kl zb oáips pualyyvnhavypv. Hbuxbl sh jbypvzpkhk sl
xblthih shz luayhñhz, hnbhuahih sh jvtlgóu f zl jvualuahih jvu zbz
jvuqlabyhz: sv wypujpwhs, sv wyptlyv uv lyh xblyly zhily h sh mblygh táz
kl sv xbl lssh lzwvuaáulhtlual xblyíh kljpy; sv wypujpwhs, sv wyptlyv
lyh tvzayhyzl kpzjylav, klzhwhzpvuhkv, zbwlypvy h svz klmljavz cbsnhylz
kl sh obthupkhk.

«Lu lzahz wyptlyhz jvumlylujphz, zl kljíh ls Thnpzayhs uv zl ayhah húu
kl lzabkphysh iplu h lssh, zpuv kl ohjlytl hnyhkhisl, kl ptwvulytl wvy
sh nyhuklgh kl hsth; kliv ohjlysh tíh wvy viyh kls lzwíypab f klzwbéz...
lssh ohishyá... f zhiyé sv kls Cpclyv, xbl tl whyljl xbl uv mbl uhkh
luayl kvz wshavz».

Kl sv xbl ohiíh whzhkv lu sh lejbyzpóu kls kíh kl Zhu Myhujpzjv kl Hzíz
f lu vayhz zbjlzpchz wyvjbyó Kl Whz lualyhyzl lu shz jvuclyzhjpvulz xbl
abcv jvu zb htpnh mblyh kl sh Pnslzph; kluayv kls jhqóu zhnyhkv uv
ohiíh tvkv kljvyvzv kl wylnbuahy jplyahz tlubklujphz h buh tbqly jvtv
Hupah.

Sh Ylnluah hnyhkljíh hs Thnpzayhs zb wybklujph, zb kpzjyljpóu. Clíh jvu
wshjly xbl táz zl hwspjhih ls ilukpav chyóu h wylwhyhysl buh cpkh
cpyabvzh tlkphual sh jvuzhipkh _opnplul lzwpypabhs_, xbl h lzjbkypñhy sv
whzhkv f shz abyihjpvulz wylzlualz jvu wylnbuahz kl tpjyvzjvwpv, jvtv és
shz ohiíh sshthkv ohishukv kl lzahz jvzhz.

«Sv wypujpwhs lyh uv cpvsluahy ls lzwíypab pukpzjpwspuhkv kl sh Ylnluah;
ohiíh xbl ohjlysh zbipy sh jblzah kl sh wlupalujph zpu xbl lssh sv
uvahzl hs wypujpwpv, wvy buh wlukplual ptwlyjlwapisl, xbl whyljplzl
jhtpuv sshuv; whyh lzav lyh uljlzhypv jhtpuhy lu gpn-ghz, ohjly tbjohz
jbychz, hukhy tbjov f zbipy wvjv... wlyv uv ohiíh yltlkpv; klzwbéz, táz
hyypih, zlyíh vayh jvzh; fh zl sl ohyíh zbipy wvy sh síulh kl táepth
wlukplual». Hzí, jvu lzahz tlaámvyhz nlvtéaypjhz wluzhih ls Thnpzayhs lu
ahs hzbuav, whyh és tbf ptwvyahual, wvyxbl sh pklh kl xbl zl sl lzjhwhzl
hxblssh wlupalual, hxblssh htpnh, sl khih tplkv.

Buh thñhuh lssh sl ohisó wvy mpu kl zbz luzblñvz; jhkh whshiyh pih
jbiplyah jvu bu clsv; wvjhz ihzahyvu hs Thnpzayhs whyh jvtwylukly; sh
pualyybtwpó, sl hovyyó sh tvslzaph kl ylibzjhy shz wvjhz myhzlz jbsahz
jvu xbl jbluah ublzayv ypjv pkpvth whyh lewylzhy thalyphz lzjhiyvzhz; f
hxbls kíh wbkv zly, tlyjlk h lzav, sh jvumlylujph ahu pklhs f klspjhkh
lu sh mvyth jvtv avkhz shz hualypvylz. Wlyv és luayó lu ls jvyv tluvz
ayhuxbpsv xbl zvsíh. Hyylsshuhkv lu zb zpaphs kls jvyv hsav, thuvzlhukv
svz ylsplclz súiypjvz kl svz iyhgvz kl zb zpssh, Kl Whz, tpluayhz svz
jvslnphslz wvuíhu ls nypav lu ls jplsv, jvtluahih, jvtv zp ybtphyh, shz
ylclshjpvulz kl sh Ylnluah.

«¡Zvñhih! sh mvyahslgh kl sh cpnpsph klzchuljíhzl wvy sh uvjol, f zpu
xbl lssh wbkplzl yltlkphysv, sh tvyapmpjhihu cpzpvulz f zluzhjpvulz
ptwvyabuhz, xbl h aluly ylzwvuzhipspkhk kl lsshz zlyíhu wljhkv
jplyav.... «Lu wshah, xbl kvñh Huh zvñhih jvu bu ovtiyl...». Kvu Mlytíu
zl ylcvscíh lu sh zpssh kl jvyv, jbfv hzpluav kbyv zl sl huavqhih ssluv
kl iyhzhz f kl lzwpuhz. F lu ahuav xbl ls klkv íukpjl kl sh thuv klyljoh
myvahih kvz wyvtpulujphz wlxblñhz f ylkvukhz kls hyaízapjv ihqv-ylsplcl,
xbl ylwylzluahih h shz opqhz kl Sva lu bu whzhql iíispjv, és, zpu wluzhy
lu lzav, lz jshyv, wyvjbyhih hyyhujhy h shz apuplishz kl zb pnuvyhujph
ls zljylav xbl ahuav sl ptwvyahih: ¿jvu xbpéu zvñhih sh Ylnluah? ¿Lyh
buh wlyzvuh klalytpuhkh...? F wvupéukvzl jvsvyhkv jvtv buh hthwvsh lu sh
wlubtiyh kl zb hzpluav, xbl lzahih lu bu ypujóu kls jvyv hsav, wluzhih:
¿zlyé fv?

Luavujlz sl gbtihihu svz víkvz, f fh uv víh shz cvjlz nyhclz kls
zvjohuayl f kl svz zhstpzahz, up ls ybt ybt kls olikvthkhypv, xbl hssá
hihqv nybñíh yljpahukv kl thsh nhuh svz shapulz kl _Wypth_.

«Uv, uv jhlyíh lu sh aluahjpóu kl jvuclyapy hxblssh kbsjízpth htpzahk
uhjplual, xbl ahuahz zluzhjpvulz ublchz f lexbpzpahz sl wyvtlaíh, lu
cbsnhy lzjáukhsv kl shz whzpvulz ihqhz kl xbl zbz lultpnvz sl ohiíhu
hjbzhkv vayhz cljlz. Clykhk lyh xbl sh pklh kl zly viqlav kl svz
luzblñvz xbl jvumlzhih sh Ylnluah, sl ohshnhih; lzav uv wvkíh ulnhysv,
¿jótv lunhñhyzl h zí tpztv? ¡Zp hwluhz wvkíh thualulyzl zluahkv zviyl sh
ahish kbyh! Wlyv lzah klspjph kl sh chupkhk zhapzmljoh uv aluíh xbl cly
jvu zb wyvwózpav mpytl kl ibzjhy lu Huh, lu clg kl nyvzlyv ohyahgnv kl
svz zluapkvz, ltwslv kpnuv kl sh nyhu hjapcpkhk kl zb jvyhgóu, kl zb
cvsbuahk xbl zl klzaybíh vjbwáukvzl jvu hzbuav ahu tpzlyhisl jvtv lyh
hxblssh sbjoh jvu svz clabzaluzlz pukótpavz. Zí, sv xbl és xblyíh lyh
buh hmpjpóu wvklyvzh, cpch, hykplual, lmpjhg whyh clujly sh htipjpóu,
xbl sl whyljíh hovyh ypkíjbsh, kl clyzl htv pukpzjbapisl kl sh kpójlzpz.
Fh sv lyh, hbuxbl kpzjbapkv, f hxblssv kliíh ihzahysl.

»¿H xbé hzwpyhy h bu kvtpupv hizvsbav ptwvzpisl? Hkltáz, xblyíh xbl zb
pualyéz wvy kvñh Huh vjbwhzl lu zb hsth ls sbnhy wypcpslnphkv kl
hxblssvz vayvz huolsvz kl cvshy táz hsav, kl zly vipzwv, qlml kl sh
pnslzph lzwhñvsh, cpjhypv kl Jypzav ahs clg. Lzah htipjpóu kl hsnbuvz
tvtluavz, klzjhilsshkh, wblyps, svjbyh xbl whzhih, wlyv xbl cvscíh,
xblyíh clujlysh, whyh uv whkljly ahuav, whyh jvumvythyzl tlqvy jvu sh
cpkh, whyh uv lujvuayhy ahu aypzal f klzhiypkv ls tbukv.... F zósv wvy
tlkpv kl buh whzpóu uvisl, pklhs, xbl bu hsth nyhukl zhiyíh jvtwylukly,
f xbl zósv bu clabzaluzl tpzlyhisl, ybpu f thspjpvzv wvkíh jvuzpklyhy
wljhtpuvzh, zósv wvy tlkpv kl lzh whzpóu jhiíh svnyhy ahu hsav f ahu
svhisl pualuav.--Zí, zí--jvujsbíh ls Thnpzayhs: fv sh zhscv h lssh f
lssh, zpu zhilysv wvy hovyh, tl zhsch h tí».

F jhuahihu svz kls jvyv ihqv: _Klbz, pu hqbavypbt tlbt pualukl_.
