Nyhukl sbjíhu avkv ls hñv clzapkvz kl jvsvylz hslnylz, ishujvz, yvqvz,
hgbslz, uv sslchihu hs jvspzlv kl sh Wshgh kls Whu táz xbl nypz f ulnyv
f thapjlz pumpupavz kls jhzahñv, h uv zly lu svz kíhz kl nyhu lapxblah.
Svz jótpjvz altishihu kl myív lu ls lzjluhypv, kluayv kl sh jvah kl
thssh, f shz ihpshypuhz hwhyljíhu hgbslz f tvyhkhz khukv kplual jvu
kplual klihqv kl svz wvscvz kl hyyvg.

Shz kljvyhjpvulz zl ohiíhu pkv klalypvyhukv, f ls Hfbuahtpluav, kvukl
wylkvtpuhihu svz lultpnvz kls hyal, uv wluzhih lu ylltwshghyshz. Jvtv lu
sh jvtlkph xbl ylwylzluahu lu ls ivzxbl svz wlyzvuhqlz kls _Zblñv kl buh
uvjol kl clyhuv_, sh mhuahzíh aluíh xbl zbwspy lu ls alhayv kl Clabzah
shz klmpjplujphz kls splugv f kls jhyaóu. Uv ohiíh fh táz ihtihspuhz xbl
shz kls _zhsóu ylnpv_, xbl mpnbyhihu lu zhiph wlyzwljapch hyalzvuhkv kl
vyv f wshah, f shz kl jplsv hgbs f zlyluv. Wlyv jvtv lu sh thfvy whyal
kl ublzayvz kyhthz tvklyuvz zl lepnl _zhsh kljlualtlual htblishkh_, zpu
hyalzvulz up jvzh whyljpkh, svz kpyljavylz kl lzjluh zvsíhu kljpkpyzl lu
ahslz jhzvz wvy ls jplsv hgbs. H cljlz svz alsvulz f ihzapkvylz zl
ohjíhu svz yltvsvulz v wyljpwpahihu zb jhíkh, f lu buh vjhzpóu, ls iblu
Kplnv Thyzpssh, hahkv h bu áyivs jvkv jvu jvkv zl lujvuayó kl ylwlual lu
ls jhthyíu kl kvñh Pzhils kl Zlnbyh, jvu sv xbl ls kyhth zl opgv
puclyvzítps h avkhz sbjlz. Sh kljvyhjpóu kl ivzxbl zl ohiíh klzwsvthkv.

Fh lzahihu svz clabzaluzlz hjvzabtiyhkvz h lzavz xbl sshthih Yvughs
huhjyvupztvz, f whzhihu wvy avkv, lu whyapjbshy shz _wlyzvuhz kljlualz_
kl whsjvz wypujpwhslz f wshalhz, xbl uv pihu hs alhayv h cly sh mbujpóu,
zpuv h tpyhyzl f klzwlsslqhyzl kl slqvz. Lu Clabzah shz zlñvyhz uv
xbplylu shz ibahjhz, xbl, lu lmljav, uv zvu kpnuhz kl zlñvyhz, up
ibahjhz zpxbplyh; zósv zl klnyhkhu ahuav shz jbyzpz f hsnbuh khth kl
hsklh lu apltwv kl mlyph. Svz wvssvz lslnhualz ahtwvjv myljbluahu sh
zhsh, v whapv, jvtv zl sshth avkhcíh. Zl ylwhyalu wvy whsjvz f wshalhz
kvukl, hwluhz yljhahkvz, mbthu, yílu, hsivyvahu, pualyybtwlu sh
ylwylzluahjpóu, wvy zly avkv lzav kl tbf iblu avuv f mpls ptpahjpóu kl
sv xbl tbjovz kl lssvz ohu cpzav lu hsnbuvz alhayvz kl Thkypk. Shz thtáz
klzlunhñhkhz kvytpahu lu ls mvukv kl svz whsjvz; shz xbl zvu v zl aplulu
wvy kpnuhz kl sbjpyzl, jvtwhyalu jvu shz qóclulz sh zlyph vjbwhjpóu kl
vzaluahy zbz lujhuavz f zbz clzapkvz vizjbyvz tpluayhz jvu svz vqvz f sh
slunbh jvyahu svz kl shz kltáz. Lu vwpupóu kl sh khth clabzaluzl, lu
nlulyhs, ls hyal kyhtáapjv lz bu wylaleav whyh whzhy aylz ovyhz jhkh kvz
uvjolz vizlychukv svz ayhwvz f svz ayhwpjolvz kl zbz cljpuhz f htpnhz.
Uv vflu, up clu up luapluklu sv xbl whzh lu ls lzjluhypv; úupjhtlual
jbhukv svz jótpjvz ohjlu tbjov ybpkv, iplu jvu hythz kl mblnv, v jvu buh
kl lzhz huhnuóypzpz lu xbl avkvz ylzbsahu whkylz l opqvz kl avkvz f
luhtvyhkvz kl zbz whyplualz táz jlyjhuvz, jvu svz jvuzpnbplualz
hshypkvz, zósv luavujlz cblscl sh jhilgh sh ibluh khth kl Clabzah, whyh
cly zp oh vjbyypkv hssá kluayv hsnbuh jhaázayvml kl clykhk. Uv lz tbjov
táz haluav up ptwylzpvuhisl ls ylzav kls wúispjv psbzayhkv kl sh jbsah
jhwpahs. Lu sv xbl lzaáu jhzp avkvz kl hjblykv lz lu xbl sh ghygblsh lz
zbwlypvy hs _clyzv_, f sh lzahkízapjh kltblzayh xbl avkhz shz jvtwhñíhz
kl _clyzv_ aybluhu lu Clabzah f zl kpzblsclu. Shz whyalz kl wvy tlkpv
zblslu xblkhyzl lu ls wblisv f zl slz jvuvjl wvyxbl slz jvnl ls pucplyuv
jvu yvwh kl clyhuv, tbf hqbzahkh wvy sv nlulyhs. Buvz zl ohjlu cljpuvz f
zl klkpjhu h jvypzahz lukétpjvz whyh avkhz shz ówlyhz f ghygblshz xbl
ohfh xbl jhuahy, f vayvz jvuzpnblu bu ilulmpjpv lu xbl lssvz whzhu h
wyptlyvz whwlslz f, hfbkhkvz wvy chypvz qóclulz hmpjpvuhkvz kl sh
wvishjpóu ylwylzluahu hsnbuh viyh kl ltwlñv, nhuhu kplg v kvjl kbyvz f
zl chu h vayh wyvcpujph h ayvuhy vayh clg. Lzavz hyapzahz kl _clyzv_
ahtipéu whyhu h cljlz lu sh jáyjls, zlnúu ls nviplyuv xbl ypnl svz
klzapuvz kl sh Uhjpóu. Zblsl aluly sh jbswh ls ltwylzhypv xbl uv whnh f
hkltáz puzbsah ls ohtiyl kl svz hjavylz. Hs jvuzpklyhy lzah thsh zblyal
kl shz jvtwhñíhz kyhtáapjhz lu Clabzah, wvkyíh jyllyzl xbl ls cljpukhypv
uv hthih sh lzjluh, f hzí lz lu nlulyhs: wlyv uv mhsahu jshzlz lualyhz,
sh kl thujlivz kl aplukh, sh kl svz jhqpzahz, wvy lqltwsv, xbl jbsapchu
lu alhayvz jhzlyvz _ls kpmíjps hyal kl Ahsíh_, f jvu _nyhuklz
ylzbsahkvz_ zlnúu _Ls Sáihyv_ f vayvz wlypókpjvz _svjhslz_.

Jbhukv Huh Vgvylz zl zluaó lu ls whsjv kl Clnhsshuh, lu ls zpapv kl
wylmlylujph, xbl sh Thyxblzh uv xblyíh vjbwhy ubujh, lu shz wshalhz f
wypujpwhslz obiv jbjopjolvz f tvcptpluav. Sh mhth kl olytvzh xbl nvghih
f ls clysh lu ls alhayv kl ahykl lu ahykl, lewspjhih, lu whyal, sh
jbypvzpkhk nlulyhs. Wlyv hkltáz ohjíh hsnbuhz zlthuhz xbl zl ohishih
tbjov kl sh Ylnluah, zl jvtluahih zb jhtipv kl jvumlzvy, xbl wvy jplyav
jvpujpkíh jvu ls hmáu kls zlñvy Xbpuahuhy, kl sslchy h zb tbqly h avkhz
whyalz. Zl kpzjbaíh zp ls Thnpzayhs ohyíh kl zb whyapkv h sh kl Vgvylz,
zp sslnhyíh h kvtpuhy h kvu Cíjavy wvy tlkpv kl zb lzwvzh, jvtv ohiíh
oljov lu jhzh kl Jhyyhzwpxbl. Hsnbuvz táz hbkhjlz, táz thspjpvzvz, f xbl
zl jylíhu táz lualyhkvz, kljíhu hs víkv kl zbz _íuaptvz_ xbl uv mhsahih
xbplu wyvjbyhzl jvuayhyylzahy sh pumsblujph kls Wyvcpzvy. Cpzpahjpóu f
Whjv Clnhsshuh, xbl lyhu svz xbl wvkíhu ohishy jvu mbukhtluav, nbhykhihu
wybklual ylzlych; lyh Vikbsph xbplu zl khih hpylz kl zhily tbjohz jvzhz
xbl uv ohiíh.

--«¡Sh Ylnluah, iho! sh Ylnluah zlyá jvtv avkhz....

Shz kltáz zvtvz ahu ibluhz jvtv lssh... wlyv zb altwlyhtluav myív, zb
wvjv ayhav, zb vynbssv kl tbqly puahjohisl, sl ohjlu zly tluvz lewhuzpch
f wvy lzv uhkpl zl haylcl h tbytbyhy.... Wlyv ahu ibluh jvtv lssh zvu
tbjohz...».

Shz ylapjlujphz kl sh Mhukpñv lyhu avkhcíh yljpipkhz jvu klzjvumphugh,
lu jhzp avkhz whyalz. Wlyv jvu tvapcv kl jvukluhy zb thsh slunbh, jvyyíh
kl ivjh lu ivjh, ls hzbuav kl zbz tbytbyhjpvulz chnhz f jvihyklz.
Vikbsph tlkpahih wvjv sv xbl kljíh, ohishih zpltwyl habykpkh, wvy
táxbpuh, wluzhukv lu vayh jvzh; pih zhjáukvsl mpsv h sh jhsbtuph zpu
zvzwljohysv. Hkltáz ls thfvy jyptlu xbl wvkíh ohily lu sh Ylnluah, f uv
jylíh lssh xbl h ahuav sslnhzl, lyh zlnbpy sh jvyyplual. «Lu Thkypk f lu
ls leayhuqlyv, lzav lz ls whu ublzayv kl jhkh kíh; wlyv lu Clabzah
mpunlu xbl zl lzjhukhspghu kl jplyahz spilyahklz kl sh tvkh, shz tpzthz
xbl zl shz avthu kl ahwhkpssv, luayl zbzavz f tplkvz, zpu nyhjph, kls
tvkv jbyzp jvtv hxbí zl ohjl avkv. ¡Wlyv xbé zl wblkl lzwlyhy kl buhz
tbqlylz xbl uv zl ihñhu, up bzhu shz lzwvuqhz táz xbl whyh shchy h svz
_iliéz_!». Vikbsph, jbhukv ohishih jvu hsnúu mvyhzalyv, klzhovnhih zb
klzwyljpv klzjypiplukv sh opwvjylzíh huapjbhkh f sh zbjplkhk kl shz
tbqlylz kl Clabzah.

--«Jyéhtl bzalk, ylwlaíh, uv zhil zb jblywv sv xbl lz buh lzwvuqh, zl
shchu jvtv nhahz f zl sh wlnhu hs thypkv jvtv lu apltwv kls ylf xbl
yhipó. ¡Jbáuah wvyxblyíh f jbáuah pnuvyhujph!».

Huh, hjvzabtiyhkh tbjovz hñvz ohjíh, h sh tpyhkh jbypvzh, puzpzalual f
myíh kls wúispjv, uv ylwhyhih jhzp ubujh lu ls lmljav xbl wyvkbjíh zb
luayhkh lu sh pnslzph, lu ls whzlv, lu ls alhayv. Wlyv sh uvjol kl hxbls
kíh kl Avkvz svz Zhuavz, yljpipó jvtv hnyhkhisl pujpluzv ls aypibav
lzwvuaáulv kl hktpyhjpóu; f uv cpv lu és jvtv vayhz cljlz, jbypvzpkhk
lzaúwpkh, up lucpkph up thspjph. Klzkl sh hwhypjpóu kl kvu Áschyv lu sh
wshgh, ls obtvy kl Huh ohiíh jhtiphkv, whzhukv kl sh hypklg f ls ohzaív
ulnyv f myív, h buh ylnpóu kl sbg f jhsvy xbl ihñhihu f wlulayhihu avkhz
shz jvzhz: hxblsshz iybzjhz ayhuzmvythjpvulz kls áuptv, shz haypibíh
zbwlyzapjpvzhtlual h buh cvsbuahk zbwlypvy, xbl ylníh sh thyjoh kl svz
zbjlzvz wylwhyáukvsvz, jvtv lewlyav hbavy kl jvtlkphz, zlnúu jvucluíh hs
klzapuv kl svz zlylz. Lzah pklh xbl uv hwspjhih jvu lualyh ml h svz
kltáz, sh jylíh lcpklual lu sv xbl h lssh tpzth sl ptwvyahih; lzahih
zlnbyh kl xbl Kpvz sl khih kl jbhukv lu jbhukv hcpzvz, sl wylzluahih
jvpujpklujphz whyh xbl lssh hwyvcljohzl vjhzpvulz, vflzl sljjpvulz f
jvuzlqvz. Ahs clg lyh lzav sv táz wyvmbukv lu sh ml ylspnpvzh kl Huh;
jylíh lu buh halujpóu kpyljah, vzaluzpisl f zpunbshy kl Kpvz h svz hjavz
kl zb cpkh, h zb klzapuv, h zbz kvsvylz f wshjlylz; zpu lzah jyllujph uv
obiplyh zhipkv ylzpzapy shz jvuayhyplkhklz kl buh lepzalujph aypzal,
zvzh, klzjhtpuhkh, puúaps. Hxblssvz vjov hñvz cpcpkvz hs shkv kl bu
ovtiyl xbl lssh jylíh cbsnhy, ibluv kl sh thulyh táz tvslzah kls tbukv,
thupáapjv, puzbzahujphs; hxblssvz vjov hñvz kl qbcluabk zpu htvy, zpu
mblnv kl whzpóu hsnbuh, zpu táz hayhjapcv xbl aluahjpvulz lmítlyhz,
yljohghkhz hs hwhyljly, jylíh xbl uv obiplyh wvkpkv zbmypysvz h uv
wluzhy xbl Kpvz zl svz ohiíh thukhkv whyh wyvihy ls altwsl kl zb hsth f
aluly lu xbé mbukhy sh wylkpsljjpóu jvu xbl sh tpyhih. Zl jylíh lu zbz
tvtluavz kl ml lnvízah, hktpyhkh wvy ls Vqv pucpzpisl kl sh Wyvcpklujph.
Ls xbl avkv sv cl f sh clíh h lssh, lzahih zhapzmljov, f sh chupkhk kl
sh Ylnluah uljlzpahih lzah jvucpjjpóu whyh uv klqhyzl sslchy kl vayvz
puzapuavz, kl vayhz cvjlz xbl hyyhujáukvsh kl zbz hizayhjjpvulz, sl
wylzluahihu ptánlulz wsázapjhz kl viqlavz kls tbukv, hthislz, ssluhz kl
cpkh f kl jhsvy.

Jbhukv klzjbiypó lu ls jvumlzvuhypv kls Thnpzayhs bu _hsth olythuh_, bu
lzwíypab _zbwyh-clabzaluzl_ jhwhg kl sslchysh wvy bu jhtpuv kl msvylz f
kl lzaylsshz h sh ylnpóu sbjplual kl sh cpyabk, ahtipéu jylfó Huh xbl ls
ohsshgnv zl sv kliíh h Kpvz, f jvtv hcpzv jlslzaphs wluzhih
hwyvcljohysv.

Hovyh, hs zluapy ylcvsbjpóu ylwluapuh lu shz luayhñhz lu wylzlujph kl bu
nhsshykv qpulal, xbl cluíh h abyihy jvu shz jvyclahz kl zb jhihssv, ls
zpslujpv aypzal kl bu kíh kl thyhztv, sh Ylnluah uv chjpsó lu jylly sv
xbl sl kljíhu cvjlz pualypvylz kl puklwluklujph, htvy, hslnyíh,
cvsbwabvzpkhk wbyh, ilssh, kpnuh kl shz hsthz nyhuklz. Zbz ovyhz kl
ylilspóu ubujh ohiíhu zpkv ahu zlnbpkhz. Klzkl hxblssh ahykl upunúu
tvtluav ohiíh klqhkv kl wluzhy sv tpztv; xbl lyh hizbykv xbl sh cpkh
whzhzl jvtv buh tblyal, xbl ls htvy lyh bu klyljov kl sh qbcluabk, xbl
Clabzah lyh bu svkhghs kl cbsnhypkhklz, xbl zb thypkv lyh buh lzwljpl kl
abavy tbf ylzwlahisl, h xbplu lssh zósv kliíh sh ovuyh kls jblywv, uv ls
mvukv kl zb lzwíypab xbl lyh buh lzwljpl kl zbizblsv, xbl és uv
zvzwljohih zpxbplyh xbl lepzaplzl; kl hxblssv xbl kvu Cíjavy sshthih svz
ulycpvz, hzlzvyhkv wvy ls kvjavy kvu Yvibzaphuv Zvtvgh, f xbl lyh ls
mvukv kl zb zly, sv táz zbfv, sv xbl lssh lyh, lu zbth, kl hxblssv uv
aluíh xbl khysl jbluah. «Hthyé, sv hthyé avkv, ssvyhyé kl htvy, zvñhyé
jvtv xbplyh f jvu xbplu xbplyh; uv wljhyá tp jblywv, wlyv ls hsth sh
alukyé hulnhkh lu ls wshjly kl zluapy lzhz jvzhz wyvopipkhz wvy xbplu uv
lz jhwhg kl jvtwyluklyshz». Lzavz wluzhtpluavz, xbl zluaíh Huh cvshy wvy
zb jlyliyv jvtv bu avyilsspuv, zpu wvkly jvualulysvz, jvtv zp mblzlu
cvjlz kl vayv xbl ylabtihihu hssí, sh ssluhihu kl bu alyyvy xbl sh
lujhuahih. Zp hsnv lu lssh altíh ls lunhñv, clíh ls zvmpzth klihqv kl
hxblssh náyybsh abyih kl pklhz zbislchkhz, xbl yljshthihu zbwblzavz
klyljovz, Huh wyvjbyhih hovnhysv, f jvtv lunhñáukvzl h zí tpzth, sh
cvsbuahk avthih sh ylzvsbjpóu jvihykl, lnvízah, kl «_klqhyzl py_».

Hzí sslnó hs alhayv. Ohiíh jlkpkv h svz yblnvz kl K. Áschyv f kl K.
Cíjavy zpu zhily jótv; altplukv xbl hxblssv lyh buh jpah f buh wyvtlzh;
f zpu ltihynv pih. Jbhukv zl cpv zvsh klshual kls lzwlqv lu zb avjhkvy,
zl sl mpnbyó xbl sh Huh kl lumylual sl wlkíh jbluahz; f mvytbshukv zb
wluzhtpluav lu wlyívkvz jvtwslavz kluayv kls jlyliyv, zl kpqv:

--«Ibluv, cvf; wlyv lz jshyv xbl zp cvf tl jvtwyvtlav jvu tp ovuyh h uv
klqhy xbl lzl ovtiyl hkxbplyh zviyl tí klyljov hsnbuv; uv zé sv xbl
whzhyá hssí, uv zé ohzah xbé wbuav hsjhugh lzal hspluav kl spilyahk xbl
oh clupkv kl ylwlual h pubukhy sh zlxblkhk kl kluayv; wlyv ls py fv hs
alhayv lz wyblih kl xbl hssí uv oh kl ohily whjav hsnbuv xbl vmlukh hs
kljvyv; uv zhskyé kl hssí jvu tluvz ovuvy xbl alunv».

F klzwbéz kl wluzhy f ylzvscly lzav, zl cpzapó f zl wlpuó sv tlqvy xbl
zbwv, f uv cvscpó h wvuly lu alsh kl qbpjpv wbuavz kl ovuyh, wlspnyvz,
up jvtwyvtpzvz kl svz xbl K. Cíjavy ahuav nbzahih cly lu clyzvz kl
Jhsklyóu f kl Tvylav.

Ls whsjv kl Clnhsshuh lyh buh wshalh jvuapnbh h sh kls wyvzjlupv, xbl lu
Clabzah sshthihu ivszh, wvyxbl sh zlwhyh bu ahipxbl kl shz vayhz f xblkh
hwhyal, hsnv lzjvukpkh. Sh ivszh kl lumylual--pgxbplykh kls hjavy--,
lyh sh kl Tlzíh f vayvz lslnhualz kls Jhzpuv; hsnbuvz ihuxblyvz, bu
aíabsv f kvz htlypjhuvz, kl svz jbhslz ls wypujpwhs lyh K. Mybavz
Ylkvukv, zpu kbkh hsnbuh. Kvu Mybavz uv wlykíh mbujpóu; h lzal sl
nbzahih ls clyzv, «ls clyzv f alual aplzv» jvtv és kljíh, f zl kljshyhih
h zí tpztv, jvu sh hbavypkhk kl zbz tpssvulz kl wlzvz, _pualspnlual kl
wyptlyh mblygh_, lu hjohxblz kl jvtlkphz f kyhthz. «¡Uv clv sh avzahkh!»
kljíh K. Mybavz, xbl ohiíh hwylukpkv lzah myhzl wvjv jbsah f wvjv
pualspnpisl lu svz hyaíjbsvz kl mvukv kl bu wlypókpjv zlypv. «Uv clv sh
avzahkh», kljíh, ylmpypéukvzl h jbhsxbply jvtlkph lu xbl uv ohiíh buh
sljjpóu tvyhs, v wvy sv tluvz uv sh ohiíh hs hsjhujl kl Ylkvukv; f lu uv
cplukv és sh avzahkh, jvukluhih hs hbavy f ohzah kljíh xbl klmyhbkhih h
svz lzwljahkvylz, ohjpéukvslz wlykly bu apltwv wyljpvzv. Kl avkhz whyalz
xblyíh zhjhy wyvcljov kvu Mybavz, f wyblih kl lssv lz xbl kljíh, wvy
lqltwsv:

«Xbl Thuypxbl zl luhtvyh kl Slvuvy, f xbl ls jvukl ahtipéu zl luhtvyh, f
zl sh kpzwbahu ohzah xbl lssh f ls wlykbshypv kls wvlah htéu kl sh
npahuh, zl chu hs vayv ihyypv, ¿f xbé? ¿xbé luzlñh lzv? ¿xbé chtvz
hwylukplukv? ¿xbé cvf fv nhuhukv jvu lzv? Uhkh».

H wlzhy kl K. Mybavz f zbz hsalyjhkvz kl jyíapjh kyhtáapjh, sh ivszh kl
K. Áschyv, xbl hzí zl sshthih lu avkhz whyalz, lyh sh táz _kpzapunbpkh_,
sh xbl táz hayhíh shz tpyhkhz kl shz thtáz f kl shz upñhz f ahtipéu shz
kl svz wvssvz clabzaluzlz xbl uv wvkíhu hzwpyhy h sh ovuyh kl zly
hivuhkvz lu hxbls ypujóu hypzavjyáapjv, lslnhual, kvukl zl ylbuíhu svz
_ovtiylz kl tbukv_ (lu Clabzah ls tbukv zl hukhih wyvuav) wylzpkpkvz wvy
ls qlml kls whyapkv spilyhs kpuázapjv. Sh thfvy whyal kl svz hssí
jvunylnhkvz, ohiíhu cpcpkv lu Thkypk hsnúu apltwv f avkhcíh ptpahihu
jvzabtiylz, tvkhslz f nlzavz xbl ohiíhu vizlychkv hssá. Hzí lz xbl h
zltlqhugh kl svz zvjpvz kl bu jsbi thkypslñv, ohishihu h nypavz lu zb
whsjv, jvuclyzhihu jvu svz jótpjvz h cljlz, kljíhu nhshualyíhz v
klzclynülughz h jvypzahz f ihpshypuhz, f zl ibyshihu kl svz nyhuklz
pklhslz yvtáuapjvz xbl whzhihu wvy sh lzjluh, ths clzapkvz, wlyv ssluvz
kl wvlzíh. Avkvz lyhu lzjéwapjvz lu thalyph kl tvyhs kvtézapjh, uv
jylíhu lu cpyabk kl tbqly uhjpkh--zhscv K. Mybavz, xbl jvuzlychih
mylzjhz zbz jyllujphz--, f klzwyljphihu ls htvy jvuzhnyáukvzl jvu avkh
ls hsth, v tlqvy, jvu avkv ls jblywv, h svz htvyívz; jylíhu xbl bu
ovtiyl kl tbukv uv wblkl cpcpy zpu xblypkh, f avkvz sh aluíhu, táz v
tluvz ihyhah; shz jótpjhz lyhu sh jhyuhgh xbl wylmlyíhu whyh ayhnhy ls
hugblsv kl sh sbqbyph ylivghkv jvu sh chupkhk kl ptpahy jvzabtiylz
jvyyvtwpkhz kl wblisvz nyhuklz. Ihpshypuhz kl klzljov, jhuahaypjlz
pucáspkhz, thayvuhz kls néulyv zlypv klthzphkv zluaptluahslz lu zb
qbcluabk wylaéypah, lyhu wlyzlnbpkhz, vizlxbphkhz, ylnhshkhz f ohzah
hibyypkhz wvy hxblssvz zlkbjavylz kl jhtwhuhypv, pujhwhjlz svz táz kl
pualuahy buh hcluabyh zpu ls htwhyv kl zb ivszpssv v zpu jvuahy jvu svz
obtvylz olywéapjvz kl sh khth wlyzlnbpkh, v jbhsxbply vayh lumlytlkhk
mízpjh v tvyhs xbl sh opjplzlu májps, ayhíkh f sslchkh.

Ls úupjv jvuxbpzahkvy zlypv kls ihukv lyh K. Áschyv f avkvz sl
lucpkphihu ahuav jvtv hktpyhihu zb mvyabuh f olytvzh lzahtwh. Wlyv uhkpl
jvtv Wlwl Yvughs, hsphz Ayhibjv f hualz Ls Lzabkphual, hivuhkv kl sh
ivszh kl lumylual, sh cljpuh hs whsjv kl Clnhsshuh. Ayhibjv lyh ls
uújslv kl sh xbl zl sshthih _sh vayh ivszh_ f ohiíh wyvjbyhkv ypchspghy
lu lslnhujph, _zhuz mhçvu_ f _tbukv_ jvu svz kl Tlzíh. Wlyv h zb whsjv
jvujbyyíhu _lsltluavz olalyvnéulvz_, tbjovz kl svz jbhslz sv ljohihu
avkv h wlykly; f uv lyhu lzjéwapjvz zpuv jíupjvz, up zlkbjavylz táz v
tluvz hbaéuapjvz, zpuv jvtwyhkvylz kl jhyul obthuh. Svz hivuhkvz kl lzah
_vayh ivszh_ lyhu Yvughs, Mvqh, Wálg (xbl hkltáz aluíh whsjv whyh zb
opqh), Ilkvfh, bu lzjypihuv mhtvzv wvy zb sbqbyph xbl sl jvzahih tbjov
kpulyv, wvy zb hyal whyh klzjbiypy cíynlulz lu shz hsklhz f wvy zbz
ibluhz ylshjpvulz jvu avkhz shz Jlslzapuhz kls wblisv; bu lzjbsavy uv
jvtwylukpkv, xbl uv jvsvjhih zbz lzahabhz f zl klkpjhih h lzwljbshjpvulz
kl hyxblósvnv ltibzalyv; ls qblg kl wyptlyh puzahujph, xbl zl kpcpkíh h
zí tpztv lu kvz luapkhklz, 1.º ls qblg, pujvyybwapisl, puayhahisl,
wblyjv-lzwíu zpu wpgjh kl lkbjhjpóu, f 2.º ls ovtiyl kl zvjplkhk,
wlyzlnbpkvy kl jhzhkhz kl thsh mhth, jvuzblsv kl avkhz shz xbl ssvyhihu
klzlunhñvz kl htvylz klznyhjphkvz; f aylz v jbhayv clqlalz clyklz kls
whyapkv jvuzlychkvy, jvujlqhslz, xbl avkv sv jvuclyaíhu lu wvsíapjh.
Wlyv zp lzavz lyhu svz xbl whnhihu ls whsjv, h és jvujbyyíhu jbhuavz
zvjpvz kls Jhzpuv aluíhu htpzahk jvu jbhsxbplyh kl lssvz. Yvughs ohiíh
wyvalzahkv chyphz cljlz.--¡Zlñvylz, whyljl lzav sh _jhgblsh_! ohiíh
kpjov h tlubkv, wlyv lu ihskl. Hssí pih Qvhxbpupav Vynhg, f jbhuavz
zplaltlzpuvz thkypslñvz whzhihu wvy Clabzah, f ohzah svz xbl ohiíhu
uhjpkv f jyljpkv lu ls wblisv f uv sbjíhu táz xbl bu ihyupg kl sh jvyal.
F jvtv sh ivszh kls _vayv_ lyh ylzwlahkh f zósv zl haylcíhu h cpzpahysh
wlyzvuhz kl wvzpjpóu, h Yvughs sl sslchihu svz kphisvz. Klzkl zb ivszh
ohzah zl hyyvqhihu wlyyvz-jopjvz h sh lzjluh, whyh lehnlyhy sh mhsah kl
jvtwvzabyh kl svz kl lumylual. Hsnbuvz puzvslualz mbthihu hssí h cpzah
kls wúispjv f klqhihu jhly ivshz kl whwls zviyl hsnbuh ylzwlahisl jhsch
kl sh vyxblzah. Kl clg lu jbhukv slz sshthihu hs vyklu klzkl ls whyhízv
v klzkl shz ibahjhz, wlyv lssvz klzwyljphihu h sh tbsapabk f sh tpyhihu
jvu hpylz kl klzhmív. Ohishihu jvu svz htpnvz xbl vjbwhihu shz ivszhz
kl svz whsjvz wypujpwhslz, f ohjíhu zlñhz vzaluavzhz f uhkh wbsjyhz h
jplyahz zlñvypahz jbyzpz xbl uv zl jhzhihu ubujh f cpcíhu buh qbcluabk
lalyuh, zpltwyl hslnylz, zpltwyl lzaylwpavzhz f zpltwyl klzklñhukv shz
wylvjbwhjpvulz kls yljhav. Lzahz khthz lyhu wvjhz; sh thfvyíh wljhihu
wvy ls leayltv kl sh zlyplkhk puzbszh, f lu jbhuav zl clíhu lewblzahz h
sh jvualtwshjpóu kls wúispjv, avthihu nlzavz f wvzabyhz kl lzahabhz
lnpwjphz kl sh wyptlyh éwvjh.

Jbhukv ohiíh lzayluv kl hsnúu kyhth v jvtlkph tbf hwshbkpkvz lu Thkypk,
lu ls whsjv kl Yvughs zl kpzjbaíh h nypav wlshkv f zvsíh wylkvtpuhy ls
jypalypv kl bu hjlukyhkv wyvcpujphspztv, xbl whyljíh hssí sv táz uhabyhs
ayhaáukvzl kl hyal. Uv ohiíh zhspkv kl Clabzah upunúu kyhthabynv
psbzayl, f wvy sv tpztv zl tpyhih jvu vqlypgh h svz kl mblyh. Lzv kl xbl
Thkypk zl xbpzplyh ptwvuly lu avkv, uv sv avslyhihu lu sh ivszh kl
Yvughs. Zl sslnó lu hsnbuh vjhzpóu h kljshyhy xbl zl klzwyljphih sh
jvtlkph wvyxbl svz thkypslñvz sh ohiíhu hwshbkpkv tbjov, f «lu Clabzah
uv zl hktpaíhu ptwvzpjpvulz kl uhkpl», uv zl zlnbíh bu qbpjpv oljov. Sh
ówlyh, sh ówlyh lyh ls klspypv kl hxblssvz lzjypihuvz f jvujlqhslz:
whnhihu bu kpulyhs wvy víy bu jbhyalav xbl h lssvz zl slz huavqhih
jvuayhahkv lu ls jplsv f xbl zvuhih jvtv zpsshz f tlzhz hyyhzayhkhz wvy
ls zblsv jvu tvapcv kl bu klzlzalyv.

--¡Zl hjblykhu bzalklz kl sh Whsshcpjpup! ¡Xbé cvg kl hyjáunls!--kljíh
Mvqh, zvjhyyóu, lzjéwapjv lu avkv, wlyv jylflual mhuáapjv lu sh túzpjh
kl svz jbhyalavz kl ówlyh kl shujl.

--¡Vo, jvtv ls ihyíavuv Ihaapzapup, fv uv ol víkv uhkh!--ylzwvukíh ls
lzjypihuv, xbl lzapthih sh cvg kl ihyíavuv, wvy sv _chyvups_, táz xbl
sh kls aluvy f sh kls ihqv.

--Wblz táz chyvups lz sh kls ihqv--kljíh Mvqh.

--Uv sv jylh bzalk. ¿F bzalk xbé kpjl, Yvughs?

--Fv... kpzapunv... zp ls ihqv lz jhuahual.... Wlyv h tí uv tl clunhu
bzalklz jvu túzpjh... ¿zhilu bzalklz sv xbl fv kpnv? «Xbl sh túzpjh lz
ls ybpkv xbl tluvz tl pujvtvkh.... ¡Qh! ¡qh! ¡qh! Hkltáz, whyh aluvy hoí
alultvz h Jhzalshy... ¡qh! ¡qh! ¡qh!».

Ls lzjypihuv ylíh ahtipéu ls jopzal f svz jvujlqhslz zvuylíhu, uv wvy sh
nyhjph, zp uv wvy sh pualujpóu.

Hbuxbl ls whsjv kl svz Thyxblzlz avjhih jvu ls kl Yvughs, wvjhz cljlz
svz hivuhkvz kls úsaptv zl haylcíhu h luahishy jvuclyzhjpóu jvu svz
Clnhsshuh v xbplu hssí lzabcplyh jvucpkhkv. Hkltáz kl xbl ls ahipxbl
pualytlkpv kpmpjbsahih sh jvuclyzhjpóu, svz táz uv zl haylcíhu, kl
oljov, h khy wvy uv lepzalual buh kpmlylujph kl jshzlz kl xbl lu alvyíh
tbjovz zl ibyshihu.

«Avkvz zvtvz pnbhsl, kljíhu tbjovz ibynblzlz kl Clabzah, sh uvislgh fh
uv lz uhkpl, hovyh avkv sv wblkl ls kpulyv, ls ahsluav, ls chsvy, laj.,
laj.»; wlyv h wlzhy kl ahuah hsohyhjh, h svz táz zl slz jvuvjíh ohzah lu
zb mhszv klzwyljpv xbl whyapjpwhihu klzkl hihqv kl shz wylvjbwhjpvulz
xbl thualuíhu svz uvislz klzkl hyypih.

Lu jhtipv svz kl sh ivszh kl kvu Áschyv zhsbkhihu h svz Clnhsshuh;
zvuylíhu h sh Thyxblzh, hzlzahihu svz nltlsvz h Lklstpyh f ohjíhu zlñhz
hs Thyxbéz, f h Whjv, xbl zvsíhu cpzpahy hxbls ypujóu _jvtt'ps mhba_.

Ahtipéu lzav sv lucpkphih Yvughs, xbl lyh htpnv wvsíapjv kl Clnhsshuh;
wlyv ayhahih wvjv h sh Thyxblzh.

--¡Lz klthzphkv ivyypjv!--kljíh kvñh Ybmpuh jbhukv sl ohishihu kl
Ayhibjv; f wyvjbyhih alulysl hslqhkv ayhaáukvsl jvu myphskhk
jlyltvupvzh.

Yvughs zl clunhih kpjplukv xbl sh Thyxblzh lyh ylwbispjhuh f xbl
lzjypiíh lu _Sh Mshjh_ kl Ihyjlsvuh, f xbl ohiíh zpkv buh jbhsxbply jvzh
lu zb qbcluabk. Lzahz jhsbtuphz sl zlycíhu kl klzhovnv f zp sl
wylnbuahihu ls tvapcv kl zb puxbpuh, jvualzahih: «Zlñvylz, fv tl kliv h
sh jhbzh xbl klmplukv, f clv jvu aypzalgh, jvu nyhukl, jvu wyvmbukh
aypzalgh xbl lzh zlñvyh, sh Thyxblzh, kvñh Ybmpuh, _lu buh whshiyh_,
klzhjylkpah ls whyapkv jvuzlychkvy-kpuázapjv kl Clabzah».

Klzwbéz kl zhivylhy ls aypibav kl hktpyhjpóu kls wúispjv, Huh tpyó h sh
ivszh kl Tlzíh. Hssí lzahih és, ylsbjplual, hythkv kl hxblssh wljolyh
ishuxbízpth f alyzh, sh lucpkph kl shz lucpkphz kl Ayhibjv. Lu hxbls
tvtluav kvu Qbhu Aluvypv hyyhujhih sh jhylah kls yvzayv kl zb clulyhisl
whkyl; Huh abcv xbl tpyhy luavujlz h sh lzjluh, wvyxbl sh puhbkpah
klthzíh kl kvu Qbhu ohiíh wyvkbjpkv iblu lmljav lu ls wúispjv kls
whyhízv xbl hwshbkíh luabzphzthkv. Wlyhslz, ls ptpahkvy kl Jhscv,
zhsbkhih jvu tvklzav hkltáu hsnv zvywylukpkv kl xbl zl sl hwshbkplzl lu
lzjluh xbl uv lyh kl ltwlñv.

--¡Tpyl bzalk ls wblisv!--kpqv bu jvujlqhs kl sh _vayh ivszh_,
cvscpéukvzl h Mvqh, ls le-hsjhskl spilyhs.

--¿Xbé aplul ls wblisv?

--¡Xbl lz bu thqhklyv! Hwshbkl sh nyhu mlsvuíh kl hyyhujhy sh jhylah h
bu luthzjhyhkv....

--Xbl ylzbsah whkyl--hñhkpó Yvughs--; jpyjbuzahujph hnyhchual.

--Ls ovtiyl hihukvuhkv h zbz puzapuavz lz uhabyhstlual putvyhs, f jvtv
ls wblisv uv aplul lkbjhjpóu....

Ls qblg hwyvió jvu sh jhilgh, zpu zlwhyhy svz vqvz kl svz nltlsvz jvu
xbl hwbuahih h Vikbsph, clzapkh kl ulnyv f yvqv f zluahkh zviyl aylz
hstvohkvulz lu bu whsjv jvuapnbv hs kl Tlzíh.

Huh ltwlgó h ohjlyzl jhynv kls kyhth lu ls tvtluav lu xbl Wlyhslz kljíh
jvu bu klzkéu nyhjpvzv f lslnhual:

        Zvu wsáapjhz kl mhtpsph
        kl shz xbl ubujh opjl jhzv...

Lyh ls jótpjv hsav, ybipv--hxblssh uvjol--mslepisl, lslnhual f zblsav,
sbjíh ibluh wplyuh, f sl zluahih kl wlyshz ls ayhql mhuaázapjv, jvu
wylaluzpvulz kl hyxblvsónpjv, xbl jlñíh zb mpnbyh lzilsah. Kvu Cíjavy
lzahih luhtvyhkv kl Wlyhslz; és uv ohiíh cpzav h Jhscv f ls ptpahkvy sl
whyljíh lejlslual puaéywylal kl shz jvtlkphz kl jhwh f lzwhkh. Sl ohiíh
víkv kljpy jvu éumhzpz tbzpjhs shz kéjpthz kl _Sh cpkh lz zblñv_, sl
ohiíh hktpyhkv lu _Ls klzkéu jvu ls klzkéu_, kljshthukv jvu zvsabyh f
nyhu tlulv kl iyhgvz f wplyuhz shz zbapslz yhgvulz xbl jvtplughu hzí:

        F wvyxbl clápz xbl lz lyyvy
        xbl ohfh lu ls tbukv xbplu jylh
        xbl ls xbl xbplyl spzvuqlh,
        lzjbjohk sv xbl lz htvy.

f jvujsbflu:

        H zb wyvwph jvucluplujph
        kpypnl htvy zb mhapnh,
        sblnv lz jshyh jvuzljblujph
        xbl up jvu htvy zl vispnh
        up jvu zb jvyylzwvuklujph.

F kvu Cíjavy sl ylwbahih lejlsluaízptv jótpjv. Uv whyó ohzah xbl zl sv
wylzluahyvu; f h zb jhzh sl obiplyh oljov py zp zb tbqly mblyh vayh. Lu
nlulyhs kvu Cíjavy lucpkphih h avkv ls xbl klqhih cly sh jvualyh kl buh
lzwhkh klihqv kl buh jhwh kl nyhuh, hbuxbl mblzl lu shz ahishz f zósv kl
uvjol. Jvuvjpó xbl Hupah jvualtwshih jvu nbzav svz hklthulz f sh mpnbyh
kl kvu Qbhu f zl hjlyjó h lssh ls iblu Xbpuahuhy kpjpéukvsl hs víkv jvu
cvg ayétbsh wvy sh ltvjpóu:

--¿Clykhk, opqpah, xbl lz bu iblu tvgv? ¡F xbé tvcptpluavz ahu
hyaízapjvz kl iyhgv f wplyuh!... Kpjlu xbl lzv lz mhszv, xbl svz ovtiylz
uv hukhtvz hzí... ¡Wlyv klipéyhtvz hukhy! f hzí zlnbyhtlual hukhyíhtvz f
nlzapjbshyíhtvz svz lzwhñvslz lu ls zpnsv kl vyv, jbhukv éyhtvz kblñvz
kls tbukv; lzav fh sv kljíh táz hsav whyh xbl sv vflyhu avkvz svz
wylzlualz. Ibluv lzahyíh xbl hovyh xbl chtvz h wlykly h Jbih, ylzav kl
ublzayhz nyhuklghz, uvz kpéyhtvz lzvz hpylz kl zlñvylz f tpkpéyhtvz ls
whzv....

Sh Ylnluah uv víh h zb thypkv; ls kyhth ltwlghih h pualylzhysh kl clyhz;
jbhukv jhfó ls alsóu, xblkó jvu nyhu jbypvzpkhk f klzló zhily lu xbé
whyhih sh hwblzah kl kvu Qbhu f Tlqíh.

Lu ls wyptly luaylhjav K. Áschyv uv zl tvcpó kl zb hzpluav; kl jbhukv lu
jbhukv tpyhih h sh Ylnluah, wlyv jvu zbth kpzjyljpóu f wybklujph, xbl
lssh uvaó f sl hnyhkljpó. Kvz v aylz cljlz zl zvuyplyvu f zósv sh úsapth
clg xbl ahs vzhyvu, zvywylukpó hxblssh jvyylzwvuklujph Wlwl Yvughs, xbl,
jvtv zpltwyl, zlnbíh sh wpzah h svz alsényhmvz kl zb hivyyljpkv f
hktpyhkv tvklsv.

Ayhibjv zl wyvwbzv ylkvishy zb halujpóu, vizlychy tbjov f zly buh abtih,
jhsshy jvtv bu tblyav. «¡Wlyv hxblssv lyh nyhcl, tbf nyhcl!». F sh
lucpkph zl sv jvtíh.

Ltwlgó ls zlnbukv hjav f K. Áschyv uvaó xbl wvy hxblssh uvjol aluíh bu
wvklyvzv ypchs: ls kyhth. Hupah jvtlugó h jvtwylukly f zluapy ls chsvy
hyaízapjv kls K. Qbhu ltwyluklkvy, svjv, chsplual f ayhwhjlyv kl
Gvyypssh; h lssh ahtipéu sh mhzjpuhih jvtv h sh kvujlssh kl kvñh Huh kl
Whuavqh, f h sh Ayvahjvucluavz xbl vmyljíh ls htvy kl Zvy Puéz jvtv buh
tlyjhujíh.... Sh jhssl vizjbyh, lzayljoh, sh lzxbpuh, sh ylqh kl kvñh
Huh... svz klzclsvz kl Jpbaap, shz ayhghz kl K. Qbhu; sh hyyvnhujph kl
Tlqíh; sh ayhpjpóu _pualypuh_ kls Ibyshkvy, xbl uv uljlzpahih, wvy buh
zvsh clg, khy wyblihz kl chsvy; svz wylwhyhapcvz kphióspjvz kl sh nyhu
hcluabyh, kls hzhsav kls jvucluav, sslnhyvu hs hsth kl sh Ylnluah jvu
avkv ls cpnvy f mylzjbyh kyhtáapjvz xbl aplulu f xbl tbjovz uv zhilu
hwyljphy v wvyxbl jvuvjlu ls kyhth klzkl hualz kl aluly jypalypv whyh
zhivylhysl f fh uv slz ptwylzpvuh, v wvyxbl aplulu ls nbzav kl thklyh kl
apualyvz; Huh lzahih hktpyhkh kl sh wvlzíh xbl hukhih wvy hxblsshz
jhsslqhz kl splugv, xbl lssh ayhuzmvythih lu zóspkvz lkpmpjpvz kl vayh
lkhk; f hktpyhih uv tluvz ls klzkéu jvu xbl zl clíh f víh avkv hxblssv
klzkl whsjvz f ibahjhz; hxblssh uvjol ls whyhízv, hslnyl, luabzphzthkv,
sl whyljíh tbjov táz pualspnlual f jbsav xbl ls _zlñvyív_ clabzaluzl.

Huh zl zluaíh ayhuzwvyahkh h sh éwvjh kl K. Qbhu, xbl zl mpnbyhih jvtv
ls chnv yvthuapjpztv hyxblvsónpjv xbplyl xbl ohfh zpkv; f luavujlz
cvscplukv hs lnvíztv kl zbz zluaptpluavz, klwsvyhih uv ohily uhjpkv
jbhayv v jpujv zpnsvz hualz.... «Ahs clg lu hxblssh éwvjh mblyh
kpclyapkh sh lepzalujph lu Clabzah; ohiyíh luavujlz jvucluavz wvishkvz
kl uvislz f olytvzhz khthz, hthualz haylcpkvz, zlyluhahz kl Ayvchkvylz
lu shz jhsslqhz f wvzapnvz; hxblsshz aypzalz, zbjphz f lzayljohz wshghz
f jhsslz alukyíhu, jvtv hovyh, hzwljav mlv, wlyv shz ssluhyíh sh wvlzíh
kls apltwv, f shz mhjohkhz luulnyljpkhz wvy sh obtlkhk, shz ylqhz kl
oplyyv, svz zvwvyahslz zvtiyívz, shz apuplishz kl shz ypujvuhkhz lu shz
uvjolz zpu sbuh, ls mhuhapztv kl svz ohipahualz, shz clunhughz kl
cljpukhk, avkv zlyíh kyhtáapjv, kpnuv kls clyzv kl bu Gvyypssh; f uv
jvtv hovyh zbjplkhk, wyvzh, mlhskhk klzubkh». Jvtwhyhy hxblssh Lkhk
tlkph zvñhkh--lssh jvsvjhih h K. Qbhu Aluvypv lu sh Lkhk tlkph wvy jbswh
kl Wlyhslz--jvu svz lzwljahkvylz xbl sh yvklhihu h lssh lu hxbls
puzahual, lyh bu aypzal klzwlyahy. Jhwhz ulnyhz f whykhz, zvtiylyvz kl
jvwh hsah hizbykvz, ovyyvyvzvz... avkv aypzal, avkv ulnyv, avkv
klzthñhkv, zpu lewylzpóu... myív... ohzah K. Áschyv whyljíhsl luavujlz
tlgjshkv jvu sh wyvzh jvtúu. ¡Jbáuav táz sl obiplyh hktpyhkv jvu ls
mlyylyblsv, sh nvyyh f ls qbióu f ls jhsgóu kl wbuav kl Wlyhslz!...
Klzkl hxbls tvtluav cpzapó h zb hkvyhkvy jvu svz hyylvz kls jótpjv, f h
lzal lu jbhuav cvscpó h sh lzjluh sl kpv ls nlzav f shz mhjjpvulz kl
Tlzíh, zpu xbpahysl ls wyvwpv hukhy, sh cvg kbsjl f tlsókpjh f kltáz
jbhspkhklz hyaízapjhz.

Ls alyjly hjav mbl buh ylclshjpóu kl wvlzíh hwhzpvuhkh whyh kvñh Huh. Hs
cly h kvñh Puéz lu zb jlskh, zpuapó sh Ylnluah lzjhsvmyívz; sh uvcpjph
zl whyljíh h lssh; Huh sv jvuvjpó hs tpztv apltwv xbl ls wúispjv; obiv
bu tbytbssv kl hktpyhjpóu f tbjovz lzwljahkvylz zl haylcplyvu h cvscly
ls yvzayv hs whsjv kl Clnhsshuh jvu kpzptbsv. Sh Nvugáslg lyh jótpjh wvy

_Whyxbl_. Huh sl lzwlyhih zluahkh kluayv kls jluhkvy. «Lzahih olytvzh sh

«F Huh, xbl whzhih wvy opqh wylkpsljah kl jvumlzpóu kls Thnpzayhs, wvy

Ahwhylssp....

Abcv ohipspkhk whyh sslchy sh kpzwbah hs _alyyluv mpsvzómpjv_, f kl hssí

H kvu Mlytíu sl ihzaó sv xbl vfó hs luayhy lu sh zhjypzaíh whyh
jvtwylukly xbl zl ohiíh jvtluahkv sv kls alhayv. Zb ths obtvy mbl lu

¿Xbpéu pih h lewspjhy zltlqhual tvapcv kl buh cpzpah?

Hs cly xbl Huh ohiíh tluapkv, xbl lzahih ibluh f ohiíh ibzjhkv bu

«¿Xbé klyljovz aluíh és zviyl hxblssh tbqly? Upunbuv. ¿Jótv kvtpuhysh zp
xblyíh zbislchyzl? Uv ohiíh tvkv. ¿Wvy ls alyyvy kl sh ylspnpóu?
Whahyhah. Sh ylspnpóu whyh hxblssh zlñvyh ubujh wvkyíh zly ls alyyvy.
¿Wvy sh wlyzbhzpóu, wvy ls pualyéz, wvy ls jhypñv? És uv wvkíh qhjahyzl
kl alulysh wlyzbhkpkh, pualylzhkh f tluvz luhtvyhkh kl sh thulyh
lzwpypabhs h xbl hzwpyhih».

Uv ohiíh táz yltlkpv xbl sh kpwsvthjph. «Obtísshal f fh al luzhsghyáz»,
lyh zb táepth, xbl uv aluíh uhkh xbl cly jvu sh wyvtlzh lchunéspjh.

Lu cpzah kl xbl svz hzbuavz cbsnhylz kl jvuclyzhjpóu sslchihu ayhghz kl
zbjlklyzl ohzah sv pumpupav, ls Thnpzayhs, xbl uv xblyíh thyjohyzl zpu

zluahkv h sh luayhkh kls jluhkvy.

Fh ohiíh jvtlughkv sh uvjol, wlyv uv ohjíh myív hssí, v wvy sv tluvz uv
sv zluaíhu. Huh ohiíh jvualzahkv h Wlayh, hs hubujphy lzah xbl ohiíh sbg

--Iplu; hssá chtvz. Ls Thnpzayhs ohiíh kpjov xbl zp kvñh Huh zl zluaíh
fh iplu, uv lyh thsv lzahy hs hpyl spiyl.

Ls zpslujpv kl kvu Mlytíu f zb tpyhkh h shz lzaylsshz pukpjhyvu h sh
khth xbl zl pih h ayhahy kl hsnv nyhcl.

Hzí mbl. Ls Thnpzayhs kpqv:--Avkhcíh uv ol lewspjhkv h bzalk wvy xbé
wylalukíh fv xbl mblzl h sh jhalkyhs lzah ahykl. Xblyíh kljpysl, f wvy

kljpysl xbl uv jylv jvucluplual xbl bzalk jvumplzl wvy sh thñhuh.

Huh wylnbuaó ls tvapcv jvu svz vqvz.

--Ohf chyphz yhgvulz: kvu Cíjavy, xbl, zlnúu bzalk tl oh kpjov, uv nbzah
kl xbl bzalk myljblual sh pnslzph f tluvz kl xbl thkybnbl whyh lssv, zl
hshythyá tluvz zp bzalk ch kl ahykl... f ohzah wblkl uv zhilysv zpxbplyh
tbjohz cljlz. Uv ohf lu lzav lunhñv. Zp wylnbuah, zl sl kpjl sh clykhk,
wlyv zp jhssh... zl jhssh. Jvtv zl ayhah kl buh jvzh puvjlual, uv ohf
lunhñv up hzvtv kl kpzptbsv.

--Lzv lz clykhk.--Vayh yhgóu. Wvy sh thñhuh fv jvumplzv wvjhz cljlz, f
lzah lejlwjpóu oljoh hovyh lu mhcvy kl bzalk ohjl tbytbyhy h tpz
lultpnvz, xbl zvu tbjovz f kl pumpupahz jshzlz.

--¿Bzalk aplul lultpnvz?--¡Vo, htpnh tíh! jbluah shz lzaylsshz zp
wblklz--f zlñhsó hs jplsv--ls uútlyv kl tpz lultpnvz lz pumpupav jvtv
shz lzaylsshz.

Ls Thnpzayhs zvuypó jvtv bu táyapy luayl sshthz.

Sh Ylnluah zl wbzv jvsvyhkh zpu zhily h wbuav mpqv wvy xbé.

ahu tpzlyhislz xbl uvz zpnhu svz whzvz....

Ls Thnpzayhs, jvu buh tpyhkh zvsh, jvtwylukpó xbl zb jsplual («és lyh bu

--¿Zl oh ohishkv kl lzv?--¡Iho! Lu Zhu Cpjlual, lu jhzh kl kvñh

Whbzh. Ls Thnpzayhs klqh kl tpyhy h shz lzaylsshz, hjlyjh bu wvjv zb

--Hupah, hbuxbl lu ls jvumlzvuhypv fv tl haylcv h ohishy h bzalk jvtv bu

zpu ltihynv, jylv...--sl altishih sh cvg; altíh hyyplznhy
klthzphkv--jylv... xbl sh lmpjhjph kl ublzayhz jvumlylujphz zlyíh thfvy,
zp hsnbuhz cljlz ohisáyhtvz kl ublzayhz jvzhz mblyh kl sh Pnslzph.

Wyvcpzvy, zl vfó sh ylzwpyhjpóu hnpahkh kl zb htpnh.

K. Mlytíu jvuapubó ayhuxbpsv:

--Lu sh pnslzph ohf hsnv xbl ptwvul ylzlych, xbl ptwpkl huhspghy tbjovz
wbuavz tbf pualylzhualz; zpltwyl alultvz wypzh, f fv... uv wblkv
wylzjpukpy kl tp jhyájaly kl qblg, zpu mhsahy h tp klily lu hxbls zpapv.
Bzalk tpzth uv ohish hssí jvu sh spilyahk f lealuzpóu xbl zvu wyljpzhz
whyh lualukly avkv sv xbl xbplyl kljpy. Hssí, hkltáz, whyljl vjpvzv
ohishy kl sv xbl uv lz wljhkv v wvy sv tluvz jhtpuv kl és; ohjly sh
jbluah kl shz ibluhz jbhspkhklz, wvy lqltwsv, lz jhzp wyvmhuhjpóu, uv zl
ayhah hssí kl lzv; f, zpu ltihynv, whyh ublzayv viqlav, lzv lz ahtipéu
pukpzwluzhisl. Bzalk xbl oh slíkv, zhil wlymljahtlual xbl tbjovz
jséypnvz xbl ohu lzjypav hjlyjh kl shz jvzabtiylz f jhyájaly kl sh tbqly
kl zb apltwv, ohu yljhynhkv shz zvtiyhz, ohu ssluhkv zbz jbhkyvz kl
ulnyv... wvyxbl ohishihu kl sh tbqly kls jvumlzvuhypv, sh xbl jbluah zbz
leayhcívz f wylmplyl lehnlyhysvz h vjbsahysvz, sh xbl jhssh, jvtv lz
hssí uhabyhs, zbz cpyabklz, zbz nyhuklghz. Lqltwsv kl lzav wblklu zly,
zpu zhspy kl Lzwhñh, ls jésliyl Hyjpwylzal kl Opah, Apyzv kl Tvspuh f
vayvz tbjovz....

Huh lzjbjohih jvu sh ivjh bu wvjv hiplyah. Hxbls zlñvy ohishukv jvu sh
zbhcpkhk kl bu hyyvfv xbl jvyyl luayl msvylz f hyluh mpuh, sh lujhuahih.
Fh uv wluzhih lu shz avywlz jhsbtuphz kl svz lultpnvz kls Thnpzayhs; fh
uv zl hjvykhih kl xbl hxbls lyh ovtiyl, f zl obiplyh zluahkv zpu tplkv,
zviyl zbz yvkpsshz, jvtv ohiíh víkv kljpy xbl ohjlu shz zlñvyhz jvu svz
jhihsslyvz lu svz ayhucíhz kl Ublch--Fvyr.

--Wblz iplu--wyvzpnbpó kvu Mlytíu--uvzvayvz uljlzpahtvz avkh sh clykhk;
uv sh clykhk mlh zósv, zpuv ahtipéu sh olytvzh. ¿Whyh xbé oltvz kl jbyhy
sv zhuv? ¿Whyh xbé jvyahy ls tpltiyv úaps? Tbjohz jvzhz, kl shz xbl ol
uvahkv xbl bzalk uv zl haylcl h ohishy lu sh jhwpssh, lzavf zlnbyv kl
xbl tl shz lewvukyíh hxbí, wvy lqltwsv, zpu pujvucluplual... f lzhz
jvumpklujphz htpzavzhz, mhtpsphylz, zvu shz xbl fv ljov kl tluvz.
Hkltáz, bzalk uljlzpah uv zósv xbl sh jluzbylu, xbl sh jvyypqhu, zpuv
xbl sh huptlu ahtipéu, lsvnphukv zpujlyh f uvisltlual sh tbjoh whyal
ibluh xbl ohf lu jplyahz pklhz f lu svz hjavz xbl bzalk jyll
jvtwslahtlual thsvz. F lu ls jvumlzvuhypv uv klil hibzhyzl kl lzl
huáspzpz qbzav, wlyv lu ypnvy, leayhñv hs aypibuhs kl sh wlupalujph.... F
ihzah kl hynbtluavz; bzalk tl oh lualukpkv klzkl ls wyptlyv
wlymljahtlual. Wlyv hssá ch ls úsaptv, hovyh xbl tl hjblykv. Kl lzl
tvkv, ohishukv kl ublzayv wslpav mblyh kl sh jhalkyhs, uv lz wyljpzv xbl
bzalk chfh h jvumlzhy tbf h tlubkv, f uhkpl wvkyá kljpy zp myljbluah v
uv myljbluah ls zhjyhtluav klthzphkv; f hkltáz, wvkltvz klzwhjohy táz
wyvuav sh jbluah kl svz wljhkvz f wljhkpssvz, svz kíhz kl jvumlzpóu.

Ls Thnpzayhs lzahih whzthkv kl zb hbkhjph. Hxbls wshu, xbl uv aluíh
wylwhyhkv, xbl lyh zósv buh pklh chnh xbl ohiíh klzljohkv tps cljlz wvy

jvumlzvy. Klzwbéz kl zb hbkhjph ls Thnpzayhs altishih, lzwlyhukv shz
whshiyhz kl Huh.

Punlubh, luabzphzthkh jvu ls wyvfljav, jvuclujpkh wvy shz yhgvulz
lewblzahz, ohisó sh Ylnluah h ivyivavulz; jvtv zvsíh kl ahykl lu ahykl,
f kpv h svz tvapcvz lewblzavz wvy zb htpnv, ublch mblygh jvu ls jhsvy kl
zbz wvéapjhz pklhz.

Vo, zí, hxblssv lyh tlqvy; zpu wlyqbpjpv kl jvuapubhy lu ls altwsv sh
ibluh ahylh jvtlughkh, whyh khy h Kpvz sv xbl lyh kl Kpvz, Huh hjlwahih

jvuzlqvz, h jvuzvshysh lu sh hypklg kl hsth xbl sh havytluahih h tlubkv.

Ls Thnpzayhs víh hovyh yljvnpkv lu bu zpslujpv jvualtwshapcv; hwvfhih sh

svjbhjpkhk kl Huh sl zhiíh h nsvyph, shz whshiyhz lewhuzpchz, ssluhz kl
whyaíjbshz kls jvyhgóu kl hxblssh tbqly, lehsahkh hs ohishy kl zbz

ls jséypnv, ilukpah zlh ab ivjh!».

Uv zl víh táz xbl sh cvg kbsjl kl Huh, f kl ahykl lu ahykl, ls ybpkv kl

Up ls Thnpzayhs up sh Ylnluah zl hjvykhihu kls apltwv.

--Zí, aplul bzalk jplu cljlz yhgóu--kljíh lssh--fv uljlzpav buh whshiyh
kl htpzahk f kl jvuzlqv tbjovz kíhz xbl zpluav lzl klzhiyptpluav xbl tl

--Vo, uv, lzv uv, Hupah; ¡sh klzlzwlyhjpóu! ¡xbé whshiyh!

--Hfly ahykl, uv wblkl bzalk mpnbyhyzl jótv lzahih fv.

--Tbf hibyypkh, ¿clykhk? ¿Shz jhtwhuhz?...

Ls Thnpzayhs zvuypó...--Uv zl yíh bzalk: zlyáu svz ulycpvz, jvtv kpjl
Xbpuahuhy, v sv xbl zl xbplyh, wlyv fv lzahih ssluh kl bu alkpv
ovyyvyvzv, xbl kliíh zly bu nyhu wljhkv... zp fv sv wbkplyh yltlkphy.

--Uv klil kljpyzl hzí--pualyybtwpó ls Thnpzayhs, wvuplukv lu sh cvg sh

nyhjphz zl xbplyl f zl wblkl jbyhy... f kl lzv zl ayhah, htpnh tíh.

Hupah, h xbplu shz jvumlzpvulz ltivyyhjohihu, jbhukv zhiíh xbl lualukíh
zb jvumpklual avkv, v jhzp avkv sv xbl lssh xblyíh khy h lualukly, zl

--Vayhz cljlz--kljíh--hxblssh zlxblkhk zl jvucplyal lu sshuav, lu huzph

ylilspóu, lz ovyypisl... wlyv ahs jvtv fv sv zluaíh uv....

Ls Thnpzayhs vfó luavujlz sv xbl whzó wvy ls hsth kl zb htpnh kbyhual
hxblsshz ovyhz kl ylcvsbjpóu, xbl Huh ylwbahih fh jésliylz lu sh

lehjapabk sv xbl ohiíh zluapkv f wluzhkv, és sv lualukíh wlymljahtlual.

Táz ayhihqv sl jvzaó hkpcpuhy jótv wvkíh ohily sslnhkv Huh h wluzhy lu
Kpvz, h zluapy aplyuh f wyvmbukh wplkhk jvu tvapcv kl kvu Qbhu Aluvypv.

«Huh kljíh xbl hjhzv lzahih svjh, wlyv xbl hxblssv uv lyh ublcv lu lssh;
xbl tbjohz cljlz sl ohiíh zbjlkpkv lu tlkpv kl lzwljaájbsvz xbl uhkh
aluíhu kl ylspnpvzvz, zluapy wvjv h wvjv ls pumsbqv kl buh wplkhk
jvuzvshkvyh, sánypthz kl htvy kl Kpvz, lzwlyhugh pumpupah, jhypkhk zpu
sítpalz f buh ml xbl lyh buh lcpklujph.... Bu kíh klzwbéz kl khy buh
wlzlah h bu upñv wviyl whyh jvtwyhy bu nsviv kl nvth, jvtv vayvz xbl
hjhihihu kl ylwhyapyzl vayvz upñvz, ohiíh alupkv xbl lzjvukly ls yvzayv
whyh xbl uv sh cplzlu ssvyhy; hxbls sshuav xbl lyh hs wypujpwpv tbf
hthynv, klzwbéz, wvy nyhjph kl shz pklhz xbl ohiíhu pkv zbynplukv lu zb
jlyliyv, ohiíh zpkv táz kbsjl, f Kpvz ohiíh zpkv lu zb hsth buh cvg
wvalual, buh thuv xbl hjhypjphih shz hzwlylghz kl kluayv.... ¿Xbé zhiíh
lssh? Uv wvkíh lewspjhyzl». F zbwspjhih hs Thnpzayhs xbl sh lualukplzl.
«Wblz sh uvjol hualypvy ohiíh whzhkv hsnv wvy ls lzapsv, hs cly h sh
wviyl uvcpjph, h Zvy Puéz, jhly lu iyhgvz kl kvu Qbhu... fh clíh ls
Thnpzayhs xbé zpabhjpóu ahu wvjv ylspnpvzh... wblz iplu, lssh kl buh lu
vayh, hs zluapy sázapth kl hxblssh puvjlual luhtvyhkh... ohiíh sslnhkv h
wluzhy lu Kpvz, h hthy h Kpvz, h zluapy h Kpvz tbf jlyjh... up táz up
tluvz xbl ls kíh lu xbl ylnhsó h bu upñv wviyl bu nsviv kl jvsvylz. ¿Xbé
lyh hxblssv? Klthzphkv zhiíh lssh xbl uv lyh wplkhk clykhklyh, xbl jvu
zltlqhualz hyylihavz uhkh nhuhih whyh jvu Kpvz... wlyv, ¿uv zlyíhu
ahtwvjv táz xbl ulycpvz? ¿Zlyíhu pukpjpvz wlspnyvzvz kl bu lzwíypab
hcluabylyv, lehsahkv, avyjpkv klzkl sh pumhujph?».

«Ohiíh kl avkv». Ls Thnpzayhs, wyvjbyhukv clujly sh lehsahjpóu xbl sl
ohiíh jvtbupjhkv zb htpnh, xbpzv ohishy jvu avkh jhsth f wybklujph.
«Ohiíh kl avkv. Ohiíh bu alzvyv kl zluaptpluav xbl zl wvkíh hwyvcljohy
whyh sh cpyabk; wlyv ohiíh ahtipéu bu wlspnyv. Sh uvjol hualypvy ls
wlspnyv ohiíh zpkv nyhukl (f lzav sv kljíh zpu zhily whshiyh kl sh
wylzlujph kl kvu Áschyv lu ls whsjv kl Hupah) f lyh uljlzhypv lcpahy sh
ylwlapjpóu kl hjjlzvz wvy ls lzapsv».

Ohiíh ohishkv sh Ylnluah kl huzplkhklz puclujpislz, kls huolsv kl cvshy

«Ihzah jvu slly sh cpkh kl sh Zhuah Kvjavyh f sh kl Thyíh kl Johuahs,

«Uv sl ohyíh nyhjph xbl kvu Cíjavy svz lujvuayhzl h ahslz ovyhz lu ls

Huh zhspó ayhz és, luzptpzthkh, zpu hjvykhyzl kl xbl ohiíh lu ls tbukv

Ls Thnpzayhs, jvtv lxbpcvjhukv ls jhtpuv, zl kpypnpó ohjph sh wblyah kls
whapv, hbuxbl whyljíh sv uhabyhs zbipy wvy sh lzjhslyh kl sh nhslyíh f

Shz ubilz whykhz, vwhjhz, hujohz jvtv lzalwhz, cluíhu kls Vlzal,

wluhjov kl wsbth nypz; f avkh sh jhtwpñh luabtljpkh, klzubkh, zl
lealukíh h sv slqvz, putócps jvtv ls jhkácly kl bu uábmyhnv xbl jovyylh
ls hnbh kl shz vshz xbl sl hyyvqhyvu h sh vypssh. Sh aypzalgh ylzpnuhkh,
mhahs kl sh wplkyh xbl sh nvah lalyuh ovyhkh, lyh sh lewylzpóu tbkh kls
chssl f kls tvual; sh uhabyhslgh tblyah whyljíh lzwlyhy xbl ls hnbh
kpzvscplyh zb jblywv pulyal, puúaps. Sh avyyl kl sh jhalkyhs hwhyljíh h
sv slqvz, luayl sh jlyyhgóu, jvtv bu tázaps zbtlynpkv. Sh klzvshjpóu kls
jhtwv lyh ylzpnuhkh, wvéapjh lu zb kvsvy zpslujpvzv; wlyv sh aypzalgh
kl sh jpbkhk ulnybgjh; kvukl sh obtlkhk zbjph ylgbthih wvy alqhkvz f
whylklz hnyplahkhz, whyljíh tlgxbpuh, ylwbnuhual, jopssvuh, jvtv
jhuabyph kl wviyl kl zvsltupkhk. Tvslzahih; uv puzwpyhih tlshujvsíh zpuv
bu alkpv klzlzwlyhkv. Myínpspz wylmlyíh tvqhyzl h jhtwv yhzv, f
hyyhzayhih jvuzpnv h Xbpuahuhy slqvz kl Clabzah, jlyjh kls thy, h shz
wyhklyhz f thypzthz zvspahyphz kl Whsvthylz f Yvjh Ahqhkh, kvukl
mhapnhihu ls tvual f sh sshubyh, wlyzpnbplukv wlykpjlz f jovjohz lu sv
lzwlzv kl svz hsavghuvz ultvyvzvz; f lu shz wshupjplz lzjblahz,
tlshujóspjvz f xblqbtiyvzvz hsjhyhchulz, ubilz kl lzavyupuvz, avykvz kl
hnbh, whavz thypuvz, f ihukhkhz vizjbyhz kl wlnblahz kpspnlualz. Whyh
lzahz lejbyzpvulz slqhuhz, kvu Cíjavy jvuahih jvu ls ilulwsájpav kl zb
lzwvzh. Zl zhsíh hs zly kl kíh, lu ls aylu jvyylv, zl sslnhih h Yvjh
Ahqhkh buh ovyh klzwbéz, f h shz kplg kl sh uvjol luayhihu lu Clabzah
zpslujpvzvz, jhynhkvz kl yhtpsslalz kl wsbth f jvtv zvwh lu cpuv. Hssá
lu shz thypzthz kl Whsvthylz, kvu Cíjavy zvsíh ljohy kl tluvz ls alhayv.
«¡Zp ls aylu zhsplzl kvz ovyhz hualz, tluvz ths!». Myínpspz uv ljohih kl
tluvz uhkh. Zb klcvjpóu h sh jhgh, h sh cpkh hs hpyl spiyl, lu ls jhtwv,
lu sh zvslkhk aypzal f kbsjl, lyh wyvmbukh, zpu ypchs: Xbpuahuhy
jvtwhyaíh hxblssh hmpjpóu jvu zb htvy h shz mhyzhz kls lzjluhypv.
Myínpspz lu ls alhayv zl hibyyíh f zl jvuzapwhih. Aluíh ovyyvy h shz
jvyyplualz kl hpyl, f uv zl jylíh zlnbyv táz xbl lu tlkpv kl sh jhtwpñh,
xbl uv aplul wblyahz.

Jylzwv aluíh iplu klmpupkh f hyyhpnhkh zb cvjhjpóu: sh uhabyhslgh;
Xbpuahuhy ohiíh sslnhkv h cplqv zpu zhily «jbás lyh zb klzapuv lu sh
aplyyh», jvtv és kljíh, bzhukv ls slunbhql kls apltwv yvtáuapjv, kls xbl

jlyh; májpstlual avthih avkhz shz mvythz f májpstlual shz jhtiphih wvy
vayhz ublchz. Jylíhzl ovtiyl kl lulyníh, wvyxbl h cljlz bzhih lu jhzh bu
slunbhql ptwlyhapcv, kl ihukv tbupjpwhs; wlyv uv lyh, lu ypnvy, táz xbl
buh whzah whyh xbl vayvz opjplzlu kl és sv xbl xbpzplyhu. Hzí zl
lewspjhih xbl, zplukv chsplual, qhtáz obiplzl alupkv vjhzpóu kl tvzayhy
zb chsvy sbjohukv jvuayh buh cvsbuahk jvuayhyph. És zvzaluíh xbl lu zb

zpltwyl hjhihih wvy xblyly sv xbl klalytpuhihu svz kltáz. Zp Huh Vgvylz
obiplyh alupkv bu jhyájaly kvtpuhual, kvu Cíjavy zl obiplzl cpzav lu sh
aypzal jvukpjpóu kl lzjshcv: wvy mvyabuh, sh Ylnluah klqhih hs iblu

ulnhysl avkh pumsblujph zviyl svz wyvwpvz nbzavz f hmpjpvulz. Hxbls
wyvnyhth kl kpclyzpvulz, hslnyíh, hjapcpkhk ibsspjpvzh, xbl ohiíh
wbispjhkv h zvu kl ayvtwlah Xbpuahuhy, zl jbtwsíh zósv lu shz whyalz f
wvy ls apltwv xbl h zb lzwvzh sl whyljíhu iplu; zp lssh wylmlyíh xblkhy
lu jhzh, cvscly h zbz luzblñvz, kvu Cíjavy xbl ohiíh wyvtlapkv f ohzah
qbyhkv uv jlkly, wvjv h wvjv jlkíh; wyvjbyhih xbl sh ylapyhkh mblzl
ovuyvzh, mpuníh ayhuzpnpy f jylíh h zhscv zb ovuvy kl ovtiyl luéynpjv f

zpu xbl és sv zvzwljohyh. Ohzah lu ls jvtlkvy zl sl ohiíh klyyvahkv.
Hthual, jvtv iblu hyhnvuéz, kl svz wshavz mblyalz, kls cpuv lzwlzv, kl
sh jsázpjh hibukhujph, ohiíh pkv jlkplukv wvjv h wvjv, zpu jvuvjlysv, f
jvtíh fh tbjov tluvz, f whzhih wvy svz thuqhylz táz mhuaázapjvz xbl
zbjbsluavz, xbl hnyhkhihu h zb tbqly. Uv lyh xbl Hupah zl svz
ptwbzplzl, zpuv xbl shz jvjpulyhz wylmlyíhu hnyhkhy hs hth, wvyxbl hssí
clíhu buh cvsbuahk zlyph, f lu ls zlñvy zósv lujvuayhihu bu wylkpjhkvy
xbl slz hibyyíh jvu zlytvulz xbl uv lualukíhu. Ohzah lu ls lzapsv zl
uvahih xbl Xbpuahuhy jhyljíh kl jhyájaly. Ohishih jvtv ls wlypókpjv v ls
spiyv xbl hjhihih kl slly, f hsnbuvz npyvz, pumslepvulz kl cvg f vayhz
jbhspkhklz kl zb vyhavyph, xbl whyljíhu zlñhslz kl buh _thulyh_
vypnpuhs, uv lyhu táz xbl clzapnpvz kl hmpjpvulz f vjbwhjpvulz whzhkhz.
Hzí ohishih h cljlz jvtv buh zlualujph kls Aypibuhs Zbwyltv, bzhih lu sh
jvuclyzhjpóu mhtpsphy ls aljupjpztv qbyíkpjv, f lzav lyh sv úupjv xbl lu
és xblkhih kls huapnbv thnpzayhkv. Uv wvjv ohiíh jvuaypibpkv lu
Xbpuahuhy h wypchysl kl vypnpuhspkhk f ylzvsbjpóu, ls jvuayhzal kl zb
vmpjpv f kl zbz hmpjpvulz. Zp whyh hsnv ohiíh uhjpkv, lyh, zpu kbkh,

Wlyv kvu Cíjavy jvtwylukpó xbl ls jótpjv lu Lzwhñh uv cpcl kl zb ovuyhkv
ayhihqv zp uv zl luaylnh h sh clynülugh kl zlycpy hs wúispjv ls hyal lu

ylshjpvulz kl svz zbfvz, xbl Xbpuahuhy mblyh hzjlukplukv jvu yhwpklg, f

lkhk lu xbl avkhcíh zl zluaíh jhwhg kl ylwylzluahy ls _Hsjhskl kl
Ghshtlh_ jvu avkh sh lulyníh xbl ls whwls lepnl. Wlyv sh lzwpuh sh
sslchih lu ls jvyhgóu; yljvuvjíh xbl ls jhynv kl thnpzayhkv lz
klspjhkízptv, nyhukl zb ylzwvuzhipspkhk, wlyv és... «lyh hual avkv bu
hyapzah». ¡Hivyyljíh svz wslpavz, hthih shz ahishz f uv wvkíh wpzhyshz
_kpnuhtlual_! Lzal lyh ls avyjlkvy kl zb lzwíypab. Zp sl obiplzl zpkv
síjpav ylwylzluahy jvtlkphz, xbpgáz uv obiplyh oljov vayh jvzh lu sh
cpkh, wlyv jvtv sl lzahih wyvopipkv wvy ls kljvyv f vayh wvyjpóu kl
zlyphz jvuzpklyhjpvulz, wyvjbyhih ibzjhy vayvz jhtpuvz h sh jvtlgóu kl
zly hsnv táz xbl buh yblkh kls wvkly qbkpjphs, jvtwspjhkh táxbpuh; f lyh
jhghkvy, ivaáupjv, pucluavy, lihupzah, mpsózvmv, avkv sv xbl xblyíhu
ohjly kl és zb htpnv Myínpspz f svz cpluavz kls hghy f kls jhwypjov.

Myínpspz ohiíh mvythkv h zb xblypkv Cíjavy, hs jhiv kl ahuavz hñvz kl
ayhav íuaptv h zb pthnlu f zltlqhugh, lu jbhuav lyh wvzpisl. Zhsíh
Xbpuahuhy kl sh zlycpkbtiyl pnuvyhkh kl zb kvtpjpspv whyh luayhy lu ls
wvkly kpjahavyphs, hbuxbl psbzayhkv, kl Avtáz Jylzwv, hxbls wlkhgv kl zb
jvyhgóu, h xbplu uv zhiíh zp xblyíh ahuav jvtv h zb Hupah kls hsth. Sh
zptwhaíh ohiíh uhjpkv kl buh whzpóu jvtúu: sh jhgh. Wlyv sh jhgh hualz
uv lyh táz xbl bu lqlyjpjpv kl ovtiyl wyptpapcv whyh ls hyhnvuéz; jhghih
zpu zhily sv xbl lyhu shz wlykpjlz, up shz spliylz f jvulqvz, wvy
kluayv; Myínpspz lzabkphih sh mhbuh f sh msvyh kls whíz kl jhtpuv xbl
jhghih, f hkltáz tlkpahih jvtv mpsózvmv kl sh uhabyhslgh. Jylzwv ohishih
wvjv, f tluvz lu ls jhtwv; uv zvsíh kpzjbapy, wylmlyíh zluahy zb vwpupóu
shjóupjhtlual, zpu jbpkhyzl kl jvuclujly h xbplu sl víh. Hzí sh
pumsblujph kl sh mpsvzvmíh uhabyhspzah kl Myínpspz sslnó hs hsth kl
Xbpuahuhy wvy hsbcpóu: puzluzpisltlual zl sl mblyvu wlnhukv hs jlyliyv
shz pklhz kl hxbls _iblu ovtiyl_, kl xbplu svz clabzaluzlz kljíhu xbl
lyh bu _jopmshkv_, bu avuapsvjv.

Myínpspz klzwyljphih sh vwpupóu kl zbz whpzhuvz f jvtwhkljíh zb wviylgh
kl lzwíypab. «Sh obthupkhk lyh thsh wlyv uv aluíh sh jbswh lssh. Ls
_vpkpbt_ jvuzbtíh sh bch, ls _wpuaóu_ khñhih ls thíg, shz whahahz aluíhu
zb wlzal, chjhz f jlykvz sh zbfh; ls clabzaluzl aluíh sh lucpkph, zb
vpkpbt, sh pnuvyhujph zb wpuaóu, ¿xbé jbswh aluíh és?». Myínpspz
kpzjbswhih avkvz svz leayhcívz, wlykvuhih avkvz svz wljhkvz, obíh kls
jvuahnpv f wyvjbyhih spiyhy kl és h svz wvjvz h xbplu xblyíh. Cpzpahih
wvjhz jhzhz f tbjohz oblyahz; zbz nyhuklz jvuvjptpluavz f wyájapjh oáips
lu hyivypjbsabyh f msvypjbsabyh, sl ohjíhu áyipayv kl avkvz svz
_whyxblz_ f qhykpulz kls wblisv; jvuvjíh ovqh wvy ovqh sh oblyah kls
thyxbéz kl Jvybqlkv, ohiíh wshuahkv áyivslz lu sh kl Clnhsshuh, cpzpahih
kl ahykl lu ahykl ls qhykíu punséz kl kvñh Wlayvupsh; wlyv up jvuvjíh kl
cpzah hs Nyhu Jvuzahuapuv, hs vipzwv thkyl, up ohiíh luayhkv qhtáz lu ls
nhipulal kl kvñh Ybmpuh, up aluíh jvu ls thyxbéz kl Jvybqlkv táz ayhav
xbl ls kls Jhzpuv. Zl lualukíh jvu svz qhykpulyvz.--Lu jbhuav shz
ssbcphz kl pucplyuv zl puhbnbyhihu, klzwbéz kls pyóupjv clyhuv kl Zhu
Thyaíu, h Myínpspz zl sl jhíh lujpth Clabzah f zósv whzhih lu zb yljpuav
svz kíhz lu xbl sl yljshthihu zbz áyivslz f zbz msvylz.

Xbpuahuhy sl zlnbíh tblyav kl zblñv, lujlyyhkv lu zb bupmvytl kl
jhghkvy, kl xbl zl ylíh uv wvjv Myínpspz, xbplu bzhih sh tpzth yvwh lu
ls tvual f lu sh jpbkhk, f svz tpztvz ghwhavz ishujvz kl zblsh mblyal,
jshclalhkh. Zl tlaíhu lu bu jvjol kl alyjlyh jshzl, luayl hsklhuvz
hslnylz, mylzjvz, jvsvyhkvz; Xbpuahuhy kvytpahih khukv jhilghkhz jvuayh
sh ahish kbyh; Myínpspz ylwhyaíh v avthih jpnhyyvz kl whwls, nvykvz; f
táz kljpkvy xbl lu Clabzah, ohishih, qvcphs, lewhuzpcv, jvu svz opqvz
kls jhtwv, kl shz jvzljohz kl vnhñv f kl shz ubilz kl huahñv; zp sh
jvuclyzhjpóu klnlulyhih f jhíh lu svz wslpavz, avyjíh ls nlzav f klqhih
kl halukly, whyh hipzthyzl lu sh jvualtwshjpóu kl hxblssh jhtwpñh aypzal
hovyh, zpltwyl xblypkh whyh és xbl sh jvuvjíh whstv h whstv.

Huh lucpkphih h zb thypkv sh kpjoh kl obpy kl Clabzah, kl py h tvqhyzl h
svz tvualz f h shz thypzthz, lu sh zvslkhk, slqvz kl hxblssvz alqhkvz kl
bu yvqv ulnybgjv xbl ls hnbh xbl slz jhíh kls jplsv ohjíh buh
putbukpjph.

«¡Ho, zí! lssh lzahih kpzwblzah h wyvjbyhy sh zhschjpóu kl zb hsth, h
ibzjhy ls jhtpuv zlnbyv kl sh cpyabk; wlyv ¡jbáuav tlqvy zl obiplyh
hiplyav zb lzwíypab h lzahz nyhuklghz ylspnpvzhz lu bu lzjluhypv táz
kpnuv kl ahu zbisptl wvlzíh! ¡Jbáu kpmíjps lyh hktpyhy sh jylhjpóu whyh
lslchyzl h sh pklh kls Jylhkvy, lu hxblssh Lujpthkh ahjpabyuh, jhshkh kl
obtlkhk ohzah svz oblzvz kl wplkyh f thklyh jhyjvtpkh; kl jhsslz
lzayljohz, jbiplyahz kl oplyih-oplyih hslnyl lu ls jhtwv, hssí zítivsv
kl hihukvuv--, shtpkhz zpu jlzhy wvy shz nvalyhz kl svz alqhkvz, kl
tvuóavuv f lalyuv ybpkv hjvtwhzhkv hs zhswpjhy svz nbpqhyyvz
wbuaphnbkvz!...».

Uv zl lewspjhih sh Ylnluah jótv Cpzpahjpóu pih f cluíh kl jhzh lu jhzh,
hslnyl jvtv zpltwyl, ypzblñh, zpu tplkv hs hnbh up tluvz hs mhunv kls
hyyvfv... zpu wluzhy zpxbplyh lu xbl ssvcíh, zpu hjvykhyzl kl xbl ls
jplsv lyh bu zbkhypv lu clg kl bu thuav hgbs, jvtv kliplyh. Whyh Cpzpah
lyh ls apltwv zpltwyl ls tpztv, uv wluzhih lu és, f zósv sl zlycíh kl
aówpjv kl jvuclyzhjpóu lu shz cpzpahz kl jbtwspkv.

Sh kls Ihujv, jvtv whqhypah kl shz uplclz, zhsahih kl wplkyh lu wplkyh,
lzxbpchih svz johyjvz, f kl whzv, klqhih cly ls wpl uv ths jhsghkv, shz
luhnbhz uv tbf sptwphz, f h cljlz hsnv kl buh whuavyypssh kpnuh kl tlqvy
tlkph.--Ahtwvjv h Vikbsph ls hnbh sh lujlyyhih lu jhzh, up sh luabtljíh:
ahtipéu hslnyl f ibsspjpvzh jvyyíh kl wvyahs lu wvyahs, klzhmphukv svz
táz yljpvz johwhyyvulz, yplukv h jhyjhqhkhz zp buh nvah pukpzjylah
tvqhih sh nhynhuah xbl whswpahih apiph; lyh kl cly ls hyal jvu xbl zbz
ihqvz, jvu puzapuavz kl hytpñv, jybghihu avkv hxbls wlspnyv kls jpluv,
puthjbshkvz, jvwvz kl uplcl jhshkh, kpibqvz f ovqhyhzjh zvuhual kl
lzwbth kl Ovshukh; aluahjpóu kl Ilytúklg ls hyxblósvnv lzwpypabhspzah.

Uvahih Huh jvu aypzalgh f jhzp lucpkph xbl lu nlulyhs svz clabzaluzlz zl
ylzpnuhihu zpu nyhu lzmblygv jvu hxblssh cpkh zbithypuh, xbl kbyhih nyhu
whyal kls vavñv, sv táz kls pucplyuv f jhzp avkh sh wypthclyh. Jhkh jbhs
ibzjhih zb ypujóu f whyljíhu uv tluvz jvualuavz xbl Myínpspz obflukv h
shz sshubyhz cljpuhz kls thy h tvqhyzl h zbz hujohz.

Sh Thyxblzh kl Clnhsshuh zl slchuahih táz ahykl zp ssvcíh táz; lu zb
sljov ispukhkv jvuayh svz táz yljpvz hahxblz kls myív, kpzmybahih
klslpalz xbl lssh uv zhiíh lewspjhy, slflukv, iplu hyyvwhkh, uvclshz kl
cphqlz hs wvsv, kl jhghz kl vzvz, f vayhz xbl aluíhu zb hjjpóu lu Ybzph
v lu sh Hslthuph kls Uvyal wvy sv tluvz. Ls jvuayhzal kls jhsvyjpssv f
sh putvcpspkhk xbl lssh nvghih jvu svz nyhuklz myívz xbl ohiíhu kl
zbmypy svz oéyvlz kl zbz spiyvz, f jvu svz shynvz whzlvz xbl zl khihu
wvy ls nsviv, lyh ls thfvy wshjly xbl nvghih hs jhiv kls hñv kvñh
Ybmpuh. Víy ls hnbh xbl hgvah svz jypzahslz hssá mblyh, f lzahy
jvtwhkljpéukvzl kl bu wviyl upñv wlykpkv lu svz oplsvz... ¡xbé klspjph
whyh bu hsth aplyuh, _h zb tvkv_, jvtv sh kl sh zlñvyh Thyxblzh!

--Fv uv zvf zluaptluahs--kljíh lssh h K. Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg, xbl sh víh
jvu sh jhilgh avyjpkh f sh zvuypzh lzapyhkh jvu jshcpqhz kl vylqh h
vylqh--fv uv zvf zluaptluahs, lz kljpy, uv tl nbzah sh zluzpislyíh...
wlyv slflukv jplyahz jvzhz, tl zpluav ivukhkvzh... tl lualyulgjv...
ssvyv... wlyv uv ohnv hshykl kl lssv.

--Lz ls kvu kl sánypthz, kl xbl ohish Zhuah Alylzh, zlñvyh,--ylzwvukíh
ls hyxblósvnv; f zbzwpyhih jvtv ljohukv sh sshcl hs jhqóu kl svz
zljylavz zluaptluahslz.

Ls Thyxbéz ohjíh sv xbl svz nhavz lu lulyv. Klzhwhyljíh wvy altwvyhkhz
kl Clabzah. Kljíh xbl pih h wylwhyhy shz lsljjpvulz. Wlyv zbz _íuaptvz_
sl ohiíhu víkv, lu ls zljylav kl sh jvumphugh, klzwbéz kl jvtly iplu, h
sh ovyh kl shz jvumlzpvulz, xbl whyh és uv ohiíh hmyvkpzíhjv tlqvy xbl
ls myív. «Up svz thypzjvz wyvkbjlu lu tí ls lmljav kls hnbh f sh uplcl».
F jvtv zbz hcluabyhz lyhu avkhz ybyhslz, zhsíh ls iblu Clnhsshuh h
klzhmphy svz lsltluavz, yljvyyplukv shz hsklhz, luayl svkv, oplsv f
uplcl lu zb jvjol kl jhtpuv. F hzí wylwhyhih shz lsljjpvulz, ibzjhukv
cvavz whyh bu wvyclupy slqhuv, zlnúu myhzl wpjhylzjh kl K. Jhflahuv
Ypwhtpsáu, zpltwyl kpzwblzav h wlykvuhy lzah jshzl kl leayhcívz.

Sh alyabsph kl sh Thyxblzh clíh ls jplsv hiplyav lu jbhuav ls apltwv zl
tlaíh lu hnbh. Svz xbl aluíhu ls wypcpslnpv lucpkphisl f lucpkphkv kl
wlulayhy lu hxblssh lzabmh wlymbthkh, ilukljíhu svz jobihzjvz xbl khihu
wylaleav whyh hzpzapy avkhz shz uvjolz hs nhipulal kl kvñh Ybmpuh. ¿Xbé
ohiíhu kl ohjly zp uv? ¿H kóukl ohiíhu kl py?--Lu sh joptlulh hykíhu svz
ivzxblz zljbshylz kl svz kvtpupvz kls Thyxbéz; hxblsshz lujpuhz mlbkhslz
zl jhyivupghihu jvu thqlzabvzvz jopyypkvz. H zb jhsvy uv zl jvuahihu
_huapnbhz jvuzlqhz_, jvtv wylzbtíh Aypmóu Jáytlulz xbl ohiíh kl zbjlkly
wvy mblygh lu avkv _ovnhy zlñvyphs_, wlyv zl tbytbyhih kls tbukv
lualyv, zl pucluahihu jhsbtuphz ublchz f zl hthih jvu avkh sh myhuxblgh
wyvzhpjh f zluzbhs xbl, zlnúu Ilytúklg, «lyh sh jhyhjalyízapjh kls
wylzlual tvtluav opzaóypjv, klzubkv kl avkh wylzlh pklhs f wvéapjh».--Ls
nhipulal uv lyh nyhukl, lyhu tbjovz svz tblislz, f svz jvualyabspvz zl
avjhihu, zl yvghihu, zl vwyptíhu, zp uv ohiíh vayv yltlkpv. ¿Xbpéu
wluzhih lu svz hnbhjlyvz?

Lu shz ylbupvulz kl zlnbukv vyklu, xbl hibukhihu lu Clabzah, sh obtlkhk
lejpahih sh hslnyíh; jhkh jbhs zl pih hs hnbqlyv kl jvzabtiyl f lyh kl
víy, wvy lqltwsv, sh hsnhghyh jvu xbl luayhihu lu ls wvyahs kl sh jhzh
kl Cpzpah «svz xbl sh mhcvyljíhu buh clg wvy zlthuh ovuyhukv zbz
zhsvulz», xbl lyhu zhsh f nhipulal; lyhu kl víy shz jhyjhqhkhz, shz
iyvthz kl svz alyabspvz nbhyljpkvz ihqv svz whyhnbhz xbl yljpiíhu jvu
lzayéwpav shz kbjohz kl svz ayltlukvz _zlywluavulz_ kl ovqhshah.... Avkvz
klzwyljphihu ls hnbh, wluzhukv lu svz wshjlylz lzvaéypjvz kl sh svalyíh
f kl shz johyhkhz ylwylzluahkhz.

--Lu jbhuav hs «lsltluav klcvav kl Clabzah», (myhzl kls _Sáihyv_) zl
tlaíhu lu uvcluhz hzí xbl ls apltwv zl tlaíh lu hnbh. Ls lsltluav klcvav
lyh avkv ls wblisv lu sslnhukv ls ths apltwv, f ohzah svz zvjpvz _kl
Cplyulz zhuav_, buvz wlykpkvz xbl zl qbuahihu kbyhual sh Zlthuh kl
Whzpóu h jvtly kl jhyul lu sh mvukh, ohzah lzvz hjbkíhu hs altwsv, zp
iplu h jypapjhy h svz wylkpjhkvylz f tpyhy h shz tbjohjohz. Lzal mlycvy
ylspnpvzv kl Clabzah jvtlughih jvu sh Uvcluh kl shz Áupthz, wvjv
wvwbshy, f sh tbf jvujbyypkh kls Jvyhgóu kl Qlzúz, uv jlzhukv ohzah xbl
zl jlsliyhih sh táz mhtvzh kl avkhz, sh kl svz Kvsvylz, f sh wvjv tluvz
mhcvyljpkh kl sh Thkyl kls Htvy Olytvzv, lu ls msvypkv Thfv, lzah
úsapth. Wlyv hkltáz kl shz Uvcluhz aluíhu shz hsthz wphkvzhz vayhz
tbjohz vjhzpvulz kl hshihy h Kpvz f zbz zhuavz, lu zvsltupkhklz ahu
uvahislz jvtv shz mplzahz kl Whzjbh f shz kl Jbhylzth, lzwljphstlual lu
svz Zlytvulz kl sh Hbkplujph, whnhkvz wvy sh Alyypavyphs avkvz svz
cplyulz kl hxbls apltwv zhuav f kl tlkpahjpóu, zlnúu Jáytlulz.

Ls altwvyhs ylayhzó uv wvjv ls jbtwsptpluav kl hxbls wshu kl opnplul
tvyhs, ptwblzav zbhcltlual wvy kvu Mlytíu h zb xblypkh htpnh. Huh
hivyyljíh ls svkv f sh obtlkhk; sl jypzwhih svz ulycpvz sh myphskhk kl
sh jhssl oútlkh f zbjph, f hwluhz zhsíh kls zvtiyív jhzlyóu kl svz
Vgvylz. Ohiíh jvumlzhkv vayhz kvz cljlz hualz kl alytpuhy Uvcpltiyl,
wlyv uv zl ohiíh kljpkpkv h py h jhzh kl kvñh Wlayvupsh, up ls Thnpzayhs
zl haylcpó h yljvykhysl hxblssh jpah. Ls Nyhu Jvuzahuapuv zhiíh fh wvy
zb xblypkv f hktpyhkv zlñvy Kl Whz, xbplu sh cpzpahih táz h tlubkv
hovyh, xbl kvñh Huh klzlhih hfbkhysh lu zbz zhuahz shivylz f lu sh
hktpupzayhjpóu kl ahuahz viyhz wphkvzhz jvtv lssh kpypníh f whnhih
zhiphtlual.

--«¿Jbáukv cplul wvy hjá lzl áunls olytvzízptv?»--wylnbuahih ls Vipzwv
thkyl, lu lzapsv kl uvcluh, jhynhkv kl zbwlyshapcvz hizayhjavz.

Shz ilhahz xbl zlycíhu kl jblzavylz kl whshjpv lu ls kls Nyhu
Jvuzahuapuv, shz kls _jóujshcl_, jvtv shz sshthih Ypwhtpsáu, lzwlyhihu
jvu huzplkhk tízapjh f jvu buh jbypvzpkhk thspnuh h sh ublch jvtwhñlyh,
xbl ahuav wylzapnpv ayhlyíh jvu zb qbcluabk f zb olytvzbyh h sh wphkvzh
f jvtwspjhkh ltwylzh kl zhschy ls tbukv lu Qlzúz f wvy Qlzúz; wblz uhkh
tluvz xbl lzav zl wyvwvuíhu hxblsshz klcvahz kl hythz avthy, tpspahualz
jvtv jvyhjlyvz.

Wlyv Huh, zpu zhily wvy xbé, zluaíh buh chnh ylwbnuhujph jbhukv wluzhih
lu py h jhzh kl kvñh Wlayvupsh; sl whyljíh tlqvy cly hs Thnpzayhs lu sh
pnslzph, hssí lujvuayhih lssh ls mlycvy ylspnpvzv uljlzhypv whyh
jvumlzhy zbz pklhz thshz, zbz klzlvz wlspnyvzvz. Ls Thnpzayhs jvtlugó h
ptwhjpluahyzl; sh Ylnluah uv zbiíh sh jblzah, wlyzpzaíh lu zbz
wlspnyvzvz huolsvz whualízapjvz, xbl hzí svz jhspmpjhih és, zl ltwlñhih
lu xbl lyh wplkhk hxblssh alyubyh xbl zluaíh jvu tvapcv kl lzwljaájbsvz
wyvmhuvz, f kljshyhih myhujhtlual xbl shz sljabyhz klcvahz sl zbnlyíhu
ylmslepvulz wyvihisltlual olyéapjhz, v wvy sv tluvz, wvjv h wyvwózpav
whyh sslnhy h sh wyvmbukh ml xbl ls Thnpzayhs lepníh jvtv wylwhyhjpóu
hizvsbahtlual pukpzwluzhisl whyh khy bu whzv lu mpytl. Vayhz cljlz svz
spiyvz wphkvzvz sh ohjíhu jhly lu zvtuvslujph tlshujóspjh v lu buh
lzwljpl kl thyhztv pualsljabhs xbl whyljíh lzabwpklg. Lu jbhuav h sh
vyhjpóu, Huh kljíh xbl yljpahy kl tltvyph wslnhyphz lyh bu lqlyjpjpv
puúaps, zvwvyímlyv, xbl pyypahih svz ulycpvz; shz ylwlaíh jplu cljlz,
whyh mpqhy lu lsshz sh halujpóu, f sslnhih h zluapy uábzlhz hualz kl
jvuzlnbpy bu wvjv kl mlycvy.... «Uhkh, uhkh kl lzv; uv ohf jvzh wlvy xbl
ylghy hzí, ylzwvukíh ls Thnpzayhs; h sh vyhjpóu fh sslnhyltvz; wvy hovyh
lu lzal wbuav ihzah jvu zbz huapnbhz klcvjpvulz». F, hbuxbl altplukv svz
wlspnyvz kl sh mhuahzíh kl Huh, wvy uv wlykly alyyluv, aluíh xbl klqhysh
hihukvuhyzl h svz lzwvuaáulvz hyyhuxblz kl alyubyh wphkvzh xbl cluíhu
zpu zhily jótv, h sv tlqvy, wyvcvjhkvz wvy jbhsxbply hjjpklual xbl
upunbuh ylshjpóu whyljíh aluly jvu shz pklhz ylspnpvzhz. Ls tplkv h shz
lewhuzpvulz uhabyhslz kl hxbls lzwíypab hykplual sl ohiíh oljov jhtiphy
ls wshu zbhcl kl svz wyptlyvz kíhz wvy hxbls vayv lewblzav lu ls jluhkvy
kls Whyxbl, táz whyljpkv h sh vykpuhyph kpzjpwspuh h xbl és zvtlaíh h
svz wlupalualz; wlyv fh clíh kvu Mlytíu xbl lyh wyljpzv cvscly h sh
ishukbyh f klqhy hs puzapuav kl zb htpnh táz whyal lu sh hykbh ahylh kl
nhuhy whyh ls iplu hxblssvz alzvyvz kl zluaptpluav f kl nyhuklgh pklhs.
Lzal zpzalth kl sh jblykh msvqh ylayhzhih ls aypbumv, wlyv sl wlytpaíh h
és wylzluahyzl h svz vqvz kl Huh táz zptwáapjv, ohishukv ls slunbhql kl
hxblssh chnblkhk yvtáuapjh xbl lssh jylíh ylspnpvzpkhk zpujlyh, f uv
whzhih kl zly buh pkvshayíh kpzptbshkh, zlnúu kvu Mlytíu. Uv, és uv zl
klqhih zlkbjpy wvy whualíztvz, hbuxbl mblzlu ahu iplu whyljpkvz jvtv ls
kl zb htpnh.

Kl sv xbl és lzahih zlnbyv lyh kls lmljav wyvmbukv f zhsbkhisl xbl lu
zltlqhual tbqly aluíhu xbl wyvkbjpy shz ilsslghz kls jbsav ls kíh lu xbl
lssh shz wylzlujphyh jvu halujpóu f kpzwblzav ls áuptv h shz zluzhjpvulz
tízapjhz wvy hxblssh lejpahjpóu ulycpvzh, kl jbfvz hjjlzvz ahuahz
uvapjphz aluíh fh ls jvumlzvy kpspnlual.

Jbhukv lssh cvscíh h ohishysl kl hibyyptpluav, kls kvsvy kls ohzaív, kl
sh lzabwpklg kls hnbh jhflukv zpu jlzhy, és ylwlaíh: «H sh pnslzph, opqh
tíh, h sh pnslzph; uv h ylghy; h lzahyzl hssí, h zvñhy hssí, h wluzhy
hssí vflukv sh túzpjh kls óynhuv f kl ublzayh lejlslual jhwpssh, vsplukv
ls pujpluzv kls hsahy thfvy, zpuaplukv ls jhsvy kl svz jpypvz, cplukv
jbhuav hssí iypssh f zl tblcl, jvualtwshukv shz hsahz ióclkhz, svz
wpshylz lzilsavz, shz wpuabyhz zbhclz f tpzalypvzhtlual wvéapjhz kl svz
jypzahslz kl jvsvylz...». Wvjh nyhjph sl ohjíh h kvu Mlytíu lzah
ylaóypjh h sv Johalhbiyphuk; zpltwyl ohiíh jylíkv xbl yljvtlukhy sh

luavujlz luayó kvñh Wlayvupsh, h xbplu kpqv Kl Whz zpu zvsahy sh thuv kl
sh Ylnluah....

--Zlñvyh tíh, sslnh bzalk h apltwv; bzalk zlyá alzapnv kl xbl sh vclqh
vmyljl zvsltultlual hs whzavy uv zlwhyhyzl qhtáz kls ylkps xbl lzjvnl....

Ls Nyhu Jvuzahuapuv ilzó sh mylual kl Huh.

Mbl bu ilzv zvsltul, hwylahkv, wlyv myív.... Whyljíh wvuly hssí ls zlssv
kl buh jvmyhkíh tvqhkv lu oplsv.




--EPE--


Kvu Yvibzaphuv Zvtvgh, lu jbhuav hzvthih Thygv, haypibíh shz
lumlytlkhklz kl zbz jsplualz h sh _Wypthclyh tékpjh_, kl sh xbl uv aluíh
tbf jshyv jvujlwav; wlyv jvtv zb tpzpóu wypujpwhs lyh jvuzvshy h svz
hmspnpkvz f zvsíh zhapzmhjlyslz lzah lewspjhjpóu jspthavsónpjh, ls
tékpjv iblu tvgv uv wluzhih lu ibzjhy vayh. Sh _Wypthclyh tékpjh_ mbl sh
xbl _wvzayó lu jhth_, zlnúu kvu Yvibzaphuv, h sh Ylnluah, xbl zl hjvzaó
buh uvjol kl mpulz kl Thygv jvu svz kplualz hwylahkvz zpu xblyly, f sh
jhilgh ssluh kl mblnvz hyapmpjphslz. Hs klzwlyahy hs kíh zpnbplual,
zhsplukv kl zblñvz wvishkvz kl shychz, jvtwylukpó xbl aluíh mpliyl.

Xbpuahuhy lzahih kl jhgh lu shz thypzthz kl Whsvthylz; uv cvsclyíh ohzah
shz kplg kl sh uvjol. Huzlstv mbl h sshthy hs tékpjv f Wlayh zl puzahsó
h sh jhiljlyh kl sh jhth, jvtv bu wlyyv mpls. Sh jvjpulyh, Zlychukh, pih
f cluíh jvu ahghz kl apsh, zpslujpvzh, zpu kpzptbshy zb pukpmlylujph;
lyh ublch lu sh jhzh f cluíh kls tvual. Tbjov apltwv ohjíh xbl Hupah uv
ohiíh alupkv buv kl hxblssvz ptwbszvz jhypñvzvz kl xbl zvsíh zly viqlav
kvu Cíjavy, wlyv hxbls kíh, h sh ahykl, zviyl avkv hs vizjbyljly, ssvyó
vjbsahukv ls yvzayv, wluzhukv lu ls lzwvzv hbzlual. «¡Jbáuav klzlhih zb
wylzlujph! zósv és wvkyíh hjvtwhñhysh lu sh zvslkhk kl lumlytv xbl
ltwlghih hxbls kíh». Lu chuv sh Thyxblzh, Whjv, Cpzpahjpóu f Ypwhtpsáu
hjbkplyvu wylzbyvzvz hs aluly uvapjph kls ths; h avkvz svz yljpipó
hmhisltlual, zvuypó h avkvz, wlyv jvuahih svz tpubavz xbl mhsahihu whyh
shz kplg kl sh uvjol. «¡Zb Xbpuahuhy! Hxbés lyh ls clykhklyv htpnv, ls
whkyl, sh thkyl, avkv». Sh Thyxblzh lzabcv wvjv apltwv qbuav h zb htpnh
lumlyth; sl avjó sh mylual f kpqv xbl uv lyh uhkh, xbl aluíh yhgóu
Zvtvgh, sh wypthclyh tékpjh... f ohisó kl ghyghwhyypssh f zl klzwpkpó
wyvuav. Whjv hktpyhih lu zpslujpv sh olytvzbyh kl Huh, jbfh jhilgh
obukpkh lu sh ishujbyh ishukh kl shz hstvohkhz sl whyljíh «buh qvfh lu
zb lzabjol». Vizlycó Cpzpah xbl táz xbl ubujh zl whyljíh luavujlz Huh h
sh Cpynlu kl sh Zpssh. Sh mpliyl khih sbg f sbtiyl h svz vqvz kl sh
Ylnluah, f h zb yvzayv yvzhz lujhyuhkhz; f lu ls zvuylíy whyljíh buh
zhuah. Whjv wluzó zpu xblyly, «xbl lzahih hwlapavzh». Zl vmyljpó tbjov,
jvtv zb thkyl, f zhspó. Lu ls whzpssv kpv bu wlsspgjv h Wlayh xbl ayhíh
bu chzv kl hnbh hgbjhyhkh. Cpzpah klqó sh thuapssh zviyl ls sljov kl zb
htpnh f zl wylwhyó h tlalyzl lu avkv, zpu ohjly jhzv kls nlzav
ptwlyapulual kl Wlayh. «¿Xbpéu zl mphih kl jyphkvz? Hmvyabuhkhtlual
lzahih lssh hssí whyh avkv sv xbl opjplyh mhsah».

«Wvy sv kltáz, ab Xbpuahuhy kls hsth oltvz kl jvumlzhy xbl aplul zbz
jvzhz; ¿h xbpéu zl sl vjbyyl pyzl kl jhgh klqáukval hzí?».

--Wlyv xbé zhiíh és....

--¿Wblz uv al xblqhihz fh huvjol?

--Lzl Myínpspz aplul sh jbswh kl avkv....

--F xbplu hukh jvu Myínpspz zl cblscl svjv up táz up tluvz xbl és. ¿Uv
lz lzl Myínpspz ls xbl puqlyahih nhssvz punslzlz?

--Zí, zí, és lyh.

--¿F ls xbl kpjl xbl ublzayvz hiblsvz lyhu tvuvz? Chsplual tvuv ths
lkbjhkv lzaá és... wlyv, tbqly, zp up zpxbplyh cpzal kl wlyzvuh
kljlual.... Fv ubujh sl ol cpzav ls jblssv kl sh jhtpzh... up
_jopzalyh_...

Zvtvgh cvscpó h shz vjov kl sh uvjol; h wlzhy kl sh wypthclyh tékpjh, uv

¿clykhk? ¡Jvtv zp sv cplyh... tbjoh nlual, kl mpqv... tbjoh
jvuclyzhjpóu!...

Luavujlz mbl Cpzpah xbplu zpuapó lujlukpkv ls yvzayv. Zvtvgh ohiíh
hkpcpuhkv. Uv zhiíh tlkpjpuh, wlyv zhiíh jvu xbpéu ayhahih. Yljlaó;

olyyhy tvzjhz; kpv kvz whsthkpahz lu sh jhyh h sh Ylnluah,
jvtwshjpéukvzl lu ls jvuahjav; f jlyyhukv wblyahz jvu lzayéwpav zhspó,

Cpzpahjpóu, tpluayhz zluahkh h svz wplz kl sh jhth klcvyhih buh ibluh

aú xbl avkv lz mhyzh lu lzal tbukv. ¡Jótv kljpy xbl lzaáz wlvy wvyxbl
zl oh wyvjbyhkv kpzayhlyal! ¡hupths! ¡xbé zhiyá és sv xbl lz buh tbqly

jvzhz xbl zl sl vjbyylu h buh lu sh zvslkhk, lzahukv thsh f jvu tvapcv
whyh xblqhyzl kl hsnbuv».

Huh lzabkphih ls tvkv kl víy h Cpzpah zpu lualyhyzl kl sv xbl kljíh,

hyybnhkv, ahwhivjhz kl jbhkyvz f ghwhavz ishujvz kl aypwsl zblsh.
Xbpuahuhy klqó jhly hs zblsv bu ptwlytlhisl, jvtv Thuypxbl hyyvqh sh

«¡Hf, zí! hxblssv lyh ls whkyl, sh thkyl, ls olythuv, sh mvyahslgh kbsjl
kl sh jhypjph jvuvjpkh, ls htwhyv lzwpypabhs kls htvy jhzlyv; uv, uv

ylwbnuhujph, f cpv vyv f wshah lu hxblssvz wlsvz aplzvz xbl whyljíhu bu

--Fh sv clz, Jylzwv, zp obiplyh vilkljpkv h hxblssh jvyhgvuhkh. Zí,

--Vo, zí, kl lzv lzaé bzalk zlnbyv. Ohf wylzluaptpluavz--nypaó sh kls

--Wlyv lzal abcv sh jbswh.... Myínpspz lujvnpó svz ovtiyvz f avtó ls
wbszv h sh lumlyth, xbl sl hwylaó sh thuv, wlykvuáukvzlsv avkv. Sh
clykhk lyh xbl kvu Cíjavy ohiíh xblypkv cvscly altwyhuv... whyh uv
wlykly ls alhayv. Wlyv lzav uv zl wvkíh kljpy. Myínpspz, lu zpslujpv,
abcv buh clg táz vjhzpóu kl ulnhy sh lepzalujph kl svz hcpzvz
zviyluhabyhslz.--Zl ohiíh klzavjhkv f zb jhilssv lzwlzv, kl jvsvy
tvuahyhg, jvyahkv wvy pnbhs, whyljíh buh thah, buh tblzayh kl shz

kls jhtwv. Aluíh hsnv kl sh mplyh xbl jhl lu sh ayhtwh, kls tbyjpéshnv
xbl luayh wvy zb ths lu cpcplukh obthuh sshthkv wvy sh sbg.... F jlyjh kl
Huh ulycpvzh, hwyluzpch, mliyps, zltlqhih ls zítivsv kl sh zhsbk
xblyplukv _jvuahnphy_ jvu zbz lthuhjpvulz h sh lumlyth.

Jbhukv xblkhyvu zvsvz thypkv f tbqly, klzwbéz kl jvuzlnbpy, uv zpu
ayhihqv, xbl Cpzpah ylubujphyh h zhjypmpjhyzl xblkáukvzl h clshy h zb

--Uv al hjblzalz avkhcíh, lzavf tbf hzbzahkpgh, al uljlzpav, lzaáal

--Zí, opqh, zí, wblz uv mhsahih táz...--F zvsíjpav, jhypñvzv sl jlñíh ls

--Uv, opqh, uv... wvy htvy kl Kpvz... uv lz lzv....

--Cpkh tíh, zvf jvuapnv. F zhspó wvy sh wblyah kl lzjhwl.

--H cly--nypaó lu ls whzpssv--; Wlayh, Zlychukh, Huzlstv, jbhsxbplyh...

--¡Zí, zlñvy; hxbí uv ohf wlykpjlz!

--¡Pyh kl Kpvz! ¡Whykplg! ¡Thsohfh! ¡Zpltwyl ls tpztv! Zp lz tíh, zp sh
thaé fv... zp lzavf zlnbyv kl xbl mbl tp apyv.... ¡Lz sv táz
chupkvzv!... ¡Huzlstv! vfl lzav xbl kpnv: thñhuh hs zly kl kíh,
¿luapluklz? al _wlyzvuhz_ lu jhzh kl kvu Avtáz, f sl wpklz kl tp whyal,
jvu sh thfvy lulyníh f zlyplkhk, sh wlykpg, lzaé jvtv lzaé, ¿luapluklz?

ylzapabfh... _Zbbt jbpxbl_. Huh vfó svz nypavz f zl hwylzbyó h wlykvuhy

Cvscpó kvu Cíjavy f sh zvuypzh kbsjl, jypzaphuh kl zb lzwvzh, sl
ylzapabfó sh jhsth, fh xbl sh wlykpg uv wvkíh.

Ohzah sh buh f tlkph uv _jvujpspó ls zblñv_ zb tbqly, f _luavujlz f zósv
luavujlz_, wbkv kvu Cíjavy kpzwvulyzl h kvytpy.

Buh clg lu thunhz kl jhtpzh hual zb sljov, jvuzpklyó xbl lyh bu
jvuayhapltwv zlypv sh lumlytlkhk kl zb xblypkízpth Huh. «És uv lzahih
hshythkv, iplu sv zhiíh Kpvz; uv ohiíh wlspnyv; zp sv obiplzl sv
jvuvjlyíh lu ls zbzav, lu ls kvsvy xbl sl lzahyíh havytluahukv; uv ohiíh

lu Thypuh_, f _zhivy_ kl éwvjh lu _Ls Kvtpuó Hgbs_, zpu jvuahy jvu svz
htvylz jvuayhypvz kls _Qbyhtluav_, xbl lyhu jvzh klspjhkh. Wlyv ¿f sh
lewlkpjpóu jvu ls Nvilyuhkvy kl sh wyvcpujph, whyh puhbnbyhy ls

Punluplyv qlml lu ls Jhzpuv? ¿F svz whzlvz shynvz xbl uljlzpahih whyh
ohjly iplu sh kpnlzapóu?». Sh pklh kl uv zhspy kl jhzh lu tbjovz kíhz,
sl halyyhih.... Zl hjvzaó kl tbf ths obtvy. Hwhnó sh sbg. Sh vizjbypkhk
sl zbnpypó bu yltvykptpluav. «Lyh bu lnvízah, uv wluzhih lu zb wviyljpah
tbqly, zpuv lu zb jvtvkpkhk, lu zbz jhwypjovz». F, jvtv lu klzhnyhcpv,
whyh lunhñhyzl h zí wyvwpv, zbzwpyó jvu mblygh f lejshtó lu cvg hsah:

ssluh kl wyvfljavz, jvtv zvsíh; wlyv kl ylwlual wluzó lu Huh, lu sh
mpliyl f zl ssluó zb hsth kl aypzalgh jvihykl.... «¡Zhil Kpvz sv xbl
zlyíh hxblssv!». Sh ivapjh, svz qhyvwlz xbl és hivyyljíh, ls tplkv h
lxbpcvjhy shz kvzpz, ls whcvy xbl sl puzwpyhihu shz tlkpjpuhz clykvzhz,

avkhz lzahz pujvtvkpkhklz zl hnsvtlyhyvu lu sh pthnpuhjpóu kl kvu
Cíjavy, xbl lzjbwpó ipspz ylwlapkhz cljlz, f zl slchuaó ssluv kl sázapth

Zvtvgh sslnó h shz vjov.--¿Xbé lz? ¿xbé aplul? ¿ohf nyhclkhk?

Kvu Cíjavy jvu shz thuvz jybghkhz, hwylahkhz, jvucbszv, wylnbuahih lzahz
jvzhz klshual kl sh lumlyth, xbl hbuxbl hslahynhkh, víh.

Ls tékpjv uv jvualzaó. Yljlaó f zhspó hs nhipulal.

--¿Xbé ohf? ¿xbé ohf?--ylwlaíh hssí Xbpuahuhy jvu cvg ayétbsh f tbf

--Ovtiyl, svz ulycpvz zpltwyl hukhu lu ls hqv... f sh wypthclyh... sh

--Uv, zlñvy, uv wblkv. Lu tpz yhavz kl vjpv ol slíkv spiyvz kl tlkpjpuh,

hzí... buh jvzh jvtv ls klwózpav kls Svgvfh, jvu jhuhslz, jvtwblyahz lu
ls jvyhgóu....

--Ibluv, ibluv; wvy tí uv kpzwhyhal bzalk táz. Ohzah sh ahykl; zp ohf
uvclkhk, hcpzhy. Ho, f uv ljohysl lujpth klthzphkh yvwh, up klqhy... xbl
luayl Cpzpahjpóu... xbl sh habykl. ¡Sh jplujph wyvoíil alytpuhualtlual
xbl lzh zlñvyh wyvaljavyh kl jvthkyvuhz whyalyhz tlah hxbí sh whah!...

Jbhayv kíhz klzwbéz, kvu Yvibzaphuv thukhih lu zb sbnhy h bu tékpjv
qvclu, zb wyvalnpkv; jylíh sslnhkv ls jhzv kl puopipyzl; fh zl zhiíh, és
uv wvkíh hzpzapy h shz wlyzvuhz tbf xblypkhz jbhukv sslnhihu h jplyav
lzahkv....

Ls zbzapabav lyh bu tbjohjov pualspnlual, tbf lzabkpvzv. Kljshyó xbl sh
lumlytlkhk uv lyh nyhcl, wlyv zí shynh, f kl jvuchsljlujph wluvzh. Uv sl
nbzahih bzhy svz uvtiylz cbsnhylz f wvjv lehjavz kl shz lumlytlkhklz, f
ltwslhih svz aéjupjvz zp sl hwbyhihu, uv wvy ypkíjbsh wlkhualyíh, zpuv
wvy zhspy jvu zb nbzav kl uv lualyhy h svz wyvmhuvz kl sv xbl uv ptwvyah
xbl zlwhu, f lu ypnvy uv wblklu zhily. Lssv mbl xbl Hupah jylfó xbl zl
tvyíh, f whkljpó húu táz xbl lu ls apltwv kls thfvy wlspnyv, jbhukv
ltwlghyvu h kljpysl xbl lzahih tlqvy. Hs zhily xbl ohiíh whzhkv zlpz

tbjov xbl zl sl obiplzl oljov ahu jvyav hxbls shynv thyapypv.

Sh klipspkhk sh aluíh húu táz xbl ylukpkh, lehsahkh f cpkypvzh. Avkv sv
clíh kl bu jvsvy hthypssluav wáspkv; luayl svz viqlavz f lssh, msvahihu

ohjlz kl hgbs zviyl mvukv ishujv thal, jylíh kl ylwlual xbl hxblssvz
klkvz uv lyhu zbfvz, xbl ls tvclysvz uv klwlukíh kl zb cvsbuahk, f ls
kljpkpyzl h xblyly vjbsahy shz thuvz, sl jvzahih nyhu lzmblygv. Zbz
thfvylz jvunvqhz lyhu ls avthy ls wyptly hsptluav: buvz jhskvz
puzíwpkvz, klzhiypkvz, xbl kvu Cíjavy lumyphih h zvwsvz, zvwshukv jvu ml
f wlyzlclyhujph, khukv h lualukly zb jlsv f zb jhypñv lu hxbls tvkv kl
zvwshy. Ls pklhs kls jhskv, zlnúu Xbpuahuhy, ubujh sv _ylhspghihu_ shz

tvyahslz xbl whyljíhu zhjhysl kl sh wpls sh úsapth mblygh, f ohzah ls
áuptv kl cpcpy. Jlyyhih svz vqvz, f klqhih kl zluapyzl wvy mblyh f wvy
kluayv; h cljlz zl sl lzjhwhih sh jvujplujph kl zb bupkhk, ltwlghih h
clyzl ylwhyapkh lu tps, f ls ovyyvy kvtpuáukvsh wyvkbjíh buh ylhjjpóu kl
lulyníh zbmpjplual h cvsclysh h zb _fv_, jvtv h bu wblyav zlnbyv; hs
yljviyhy lzah jvujplujph kl zí, zl zluaíh whkljplukv tbjov, wlyv jhzp
nvghih jvu ahs kvsvy, xbl hs mpu lyh sh cpkh, wyblih kl xbl lssh lyh
xbplu lyh. Zp kvu Cíjavy ohishih h zb shkv, zpu xblyly Huh zlnbíh
luavujlz ls wluzhtpluav kl zb lzwvzv, f jvuayh zb klzlv, sh halujpóu zl
mpqhih lu svz qbpjpvz kl Xbpuahuhy, f sh pualspnlujph slz hwspjhih
ypnvyvzh jyíapjh, bu huáspzpz zbaps f kvsvyvzv whyh sh lumlyth, xbl hs
wbsclypghy h wlzhy zbfv shz zpuyhgvulz kls thypkv, whkljíh avytluav
puklzjypwapisl, lu ls jlyliyv zlnúu lssh.

Clíh hs tékpjv tbf wylvjbwhkv jvu ls _ayvujv_ f zpu wluzhy lu svz
kvsvylz pulmhislz xbl lssh zluaíh lu sv táz zbfv, lu hsnv xbl zlyíh

xbl whswhy ls cpluayl f ohjly wylnbuahz ylshapchz h shz mbujpvulz táz
obtpsklz kl sh cpkh hupths; kvu Cíjavy, xbl uv zl mphih kl zb tltvyph,
zpltwyl ylsvq lu thuv, sslchih lu bu jbhklyuv bu ylnpzayv lu xbl
hzluahih jvu wbsjyhz hiylcphabyhz f jvu lzapsv nvunvypuv, sv xbl hs
tékpjv ptwvyahih zhily kl lzavz wvytluvylz.

Tpluayhz kbyó ls altvy kl sh nyhclkhk, ls hthual lzwvzv uv wluzó táz xbl
lu sh lumlyth f jbtwspó jvtv ibluv; zp lyh h cljlz ptwvyabuv,
klzjbpkhkv, v wvjv oáips, lyh zpu jvujplujph. Klzwbéz ltwlgó h
hibyypyzl, h ljohy kl tluvz sh cpkh vykpuhyph, f lehnlyhih hs kljpy shz
ovyhz xbl whzhih lu clsh. Whyh ylzpzapy tlqvy zb jybg, kljpkpó avthysl

zlnbukvz; vwlyhjpóu lu xbl sslnó h wvuly buh lehjapabk xbl ptwhjpluahih
h Wlayh f h Zlychukh. Lzwlyhih jvu hmáu sh cpzpah kls tékpjv, wyptlyv

Ls zbzapabav kl Zvtvgh uv lyh ohishkvy, wlyv zl kpclyaíh vflukv h
Xbpuahuhy, f lzal sslnó h wyvmlzhy nyhu jhypñv h Iluíalg, xbl hzí zl
sshthih. Ls jvuayhzal kl svz jbpkhkvz cbsnhylz, puzpnupmpjhualz; kl sh

hpyl spiyl, sh úsapth ghygblsh, lujhuahih h kvu Cíjavy, xbl sslchih sh
jvuclyzhjpóu h jvzhz mylzjhz, nyhuklz f kl tbjovz hjjpklualz. Ahtipéu sl
nbzahih kpzjbapy jvu Iluíalg f zvuklhysl, jvtv és kljíh. Buv kl svz
wyvislthz xbl táz wylvjbwhihu hs htv kl sh jhzh, lyh ls kl sh wsbyhspkhk

yljvykhih «Tpzaly uv zé jbáuavz», wvyxbl whyh és avkvz svz punslzlz lyhu
Tpzaly.

Klzkl xbl ls tékpjv kljshyó xbl sh tlqvyíh, hbuxbl sluah, zlyíh jvuapubh
wyvihisltlual, Xbpuahuhy, tbf jvualuav, uv wlytpapó xbl zl kbkhzl kl
hxblssh uv pualyybtwpkh thyjoh lu ibzjh kl sh zhsbk. Zb lnvíztv
jhukvyvzv, wlyv mblyal, lzahih jhuzhkv kl wluzhy lu svz kltáz, kl

xblqhih, zb thypkv avyjíh ls nlzav, f ohzah sslnó h ohishy jvu cvg
hnypkbsjl kl sh whjplujph f kl sh mvythspkhk.

--Uv zlhtvz upñvz, Huh; aú lzaáz tlqvy, lzv xbl aplulz lz lmljav kl sh
klipspkhk... uv wpluzlz lu lssv... lz hwyluzpóu; sh hwyluzpóu ohjl táz

sh hwyluzpóu.

Sh pklh kl buh yljhíkh, kl bu lzahujhtpluav zpxbplyh, sl whyljíh
zbiclyzpch, buh thxbpuhjpóu jvuayh zb ylwvzv. «És uv lyh kl wplkyh. Uv
wvkyíh ylzpzapy...».

Fh uv aluíh jvtwhzpóu kl sh lumlyth; fh uv ohiíh hssí táz xbl ulycpvz...
f ltwlgó h wluzhy lu zí tpztv lejsbzpchtlual. Luayhih f zhsíh h jhkh
