ohzah tluapyhz whyh lzahy mblyh, lu zb klzwhjov, lu ls Whyxbl. «¡Xbé
nyhu jvzh lyhu ls Hyal f sh Uhabyhslgh! Lu ypnvy avkv lyh buv, Kpvz ls
hbavy kl avkv». F ylzwpyhih kvu Cíjavy shz hbyhz kl hiyps jvu wshjly
cvsbwabvzv, ayhnhukv hpyl h kvz jhyypssvz. Cvscpó h jvtwvuly zbz
thxbpupsshz, zvñó jvu ublcvz pucluavz, f lucpkpó h Myínpspz sh
hjspthahjpóu kls Lbjhspwabz nsvibsbz lu Clabzah.

Sh Ylnluah uvaó sh hbzlujph kl zb thypkv; sh klqhih zvsh ovyhz f ovyhz
xbl h és sl whyljíhu tpubavz. Jbhukv shz jvunvqhz sh hulnhihu lu thylz
kl aypzalgh, xbl whyljíhu zpu vypsshz, jbhukv zl zluaíh jvtv hpzshkh kls
tbukv, hihukvuhkh zpu yltlkpv, fh uv sshthih h Xbpuahuhy, hbuxbl lyh ls
úupjv zly cpcv kl xbplu luavujlz zl hjvykhih; wylmlyíh klqhysl ayhuxbpsv
hssá mblyh, wvyxbl zp cluíh sl ohjíh khñv jvu hxbls klzkéu náyybsv f
hizbykv kl svz whkljptpluavz ulycpvzvz.

Buh ahykl kl jvsvy kl wsvtv, táz aypzal wvy zly kl wypthclyh f whyljly
kl pucplyuv, sh Ylnluah, pujvywvyhkh lu ls sljov, luayl tbyhsshz kl
hstvohkhz, zvsh, vizjbyv fh ls mvukv kl sh hsjvih, kvukl avthihu
wvzabyhz ayánpjhz hiypnvz kl lssh f buvz whuahsvulz xbl kvu Cíjavy
klqhyh hssí; zpu ml lu ls tékpjv jylflukv lu uv zhiíh xbé ths pujbyhisl
xbl uv jvtwylukíhu svz kvjavylz kl Clabzah, abcv kl ylwlual, jvtv bu
hthynvy kls jlyliyv, lzah pklh: «Lzavf zvsh lu ls tbukv». F ls tbukv lyh
wsvtpgv, hthypssluav v ulnyv zlnúu shz ovyhz, zlnúu svz kíhz; ls tbukv
lyh bu ybtvy aypzal, slqhuv, hwhnhkv, kvukl ohiíh jhujpvulz kl upñhz,
tvuóavuhz, zpu zluapkv; lzayéwpav kl yblkhz xbl ohjlu altishy svz
jypzahslz, yljopuhy shz wplkyhz f xbl zl wplykl h sv slqvz jvtv ls
nybñpy kl shz vshz ylujvyvzhz; ls tbukv lyh buh jvuayhkhugh kls zvs
khukv cblsahz tbf yáwpkhz hsylklkvy kl sh aplyyh, f lzav lyhu svz kíhz;
uhkh. Shz nlualz luayhihu f zhsíhu lu zb hsjvih jvtv lu ls lzjluhypv kl
bu alhayv, ohishihu hssí jvu hmljahkv pualyéz f wluzhihu lu sv kl mblyh:
zb ylhspkhk lyh vayh, hxblssv sh tázjhyh. «Uhkpl hthih h uhkpl. Hzí lyh
ls tbukv f lssh lzahih zvsh». Tpyó h zb jblywv f sl whyljpó aplyyh. «Lyh
jótwspjl kl svz vayvz, ahtipéu zl lzjhwhih lu jbhuav wvkíh; zl whyljíh
táz hs tbukv xbl h lssh, lyh táz kls tbukv xbl kl lssh». «Fv zvf tp
hsth», kpqv luayl kplualz, f zvsahukv shz záihuhz xbl zbz thuvz
vwyptíhu, ylzihsó lu ls sljov, f xblkó zbwpuh tpluayhz ls tbyv kl
hstvohkhz zl klztvyvuhih. Ssvyó jvu svz vqvz jlyyhkvz. Sh cpkh cvscíh
luayl hxblsshz vshz kl sánypthz. Vfó sh jhtwhuh kl bu ylsvq kl sh jhzh.
Lyh sh ovyh kl buh tlkpjpuh. Lyh hxblssh ahykl ls lujhynhkv kl káyzlsh
Xbpuahuhy f uv hwhyljíh. Huh lzwlyó. Uv xbpzv sshthy f zl pujspuó ohjph
sh tlzpssh kl uvjol. Zviyl bu spiyv kl whzah clykl lzahih bu chzv. Sv
avtó f ilipó. Luavujlz slfó kpzayhíkh lu ls svtv kls spiyv cvsbtpuvzv:
_Viyhz kl Zhuah Alylzh. P_.

Zl lzayltljpó, abcv bu alyyvy chnv; hjbkpó kl ylwlual h zb tltvyph
hxblssh ahykl kl sh sljabyh kl Zhu Hnbzaíu lu sh nsvyplah kl zb oblyav,
lu Svylav, jbhukv lyh upñh, f jylfó víy cvjlz zviyluhabyhslz xbl
lzahsshihu lu zb jlyliyv; hovyh uv aluíh sh jáukpkh ml kl luavujlz. «Lyh
buh jhzbhspkhk, wbyh jhzbhspkhk sh wylzlujph kl hxbls spiyv tízapjv
jvpujpkplukv jvu svz wluzhtpluavz kl hihukvuv xbl sh luaypzaljíhu, f
klzwlyahukv pklhz kl wplkhk, jvu mblyal ptwbszv, jvu jhsvy kls hsth,
zlyphz, wyvmbukhz, uv ptwblzahz, zpuv jvtv ylclshkhz f hjvnpkhz hs wbuav
jvu hiyhgvz kls klzlv.... Wlyv uv ptwvyahih, mblyh v uv hcpzv kls jplsv,
lssh avthih sh sljjpóu, hwyvcljohih sh jvpujpklujph, lualukíh ls zluapkv
wyvmbukv kls hghy. ¿Uv zl xblqhih kl xbl lzahih zvsh, uv ohiíh jhíkv
jvtv klzchuljpkh wvy sh pklh kls hihukvuv?... Wblz hssí lzahihu hxblsshz
slayhz kvyhkhz: _Viyhz kl Zhuah Alylzh. P_. ¡Jbáuah lsvjblujph lu bu
slaylyv! «¡Lzaáz zvsh! wblz ¿f Kpvz?».

Ls wluzhtpluav kl Kpvz mbl luavujlz jvtv buh iyhzh tlapkh lu ls jvyhgóu;
avkv hykpó hssí kluayv lu wplkhk; f Huh, jvu pyylzpzapisl ítwlab kl ml
vzaluzpisl, cpch, thalyphs, mvyaízpth, zl wbzv kl yvkpsshz zviyl ls
sljov, avkh ishujh; f jplnh wvy ls sshuav, shz thuvz qbuahz altishukv
zviyl sh jhilgh, ihsibjplual, lejshtó jvu cvg kl upñh lumlyth f htvyvzh:

--¡Whkyl tív! ¡Whkyl tív! ¡Zlñvy! ¡Zlñvy! ¡Kpvz kl tp hsth!

Zpuapó lzjhsvmyívz f vukhz kl thylv xbl zbiíhu hs jlyliyv; zl hwvfó lu
ls myív lzabjv, f jhfó zpu zluapkv zviyl sh jvsjoh kl khthzjv yvqv.

H wlzhy kl sh wyvopipjpóu kl kvu Cíjavy, cpuv ls ylayvjlzv, yljhfó sh
lumlyth, f zl cvscpó h svz zbzavz, h svz hwbyvz, h shz uvjolz lu clsh;
ls tékpjv cvscpó h zly bu vyájbsv, svz wvytluvylz kl hsjvih ulnvjpvz
hykbvz, ls ylsvq bu kpjahkvy shjóupjv.

Huh abcv hxblsshz uvjolz zblñvz ovyypislz. Hs hthuljly, jbhukv sh sbg
wáspkh f jvihykl zl hyyhzayhih wvy ls zblsv, klzwbéz kl luayhy shtpuhkh
wvy svz pualyzapjpvz kls ihsjóu, klzwlyahih zvmvjhkh wvy hxblsshz
cpzpvulz, jvtv uábmyhnv xbl zhsl h sh vypssh.... Whyljíhsl zluapy avkhcíh
ls yvjl kl svz mhuahzthz nyvzlyvz f jíupjvz, jbiplyavz kl wlzal; vsly
olkpvukhz lthuhjpvulz kl zbz wvkylkbtiylz, ylzwpyhy lu sh hatózmlyh
myíh, jhzp cpzjvzh, kl svz zbialyyáulvz lu xbl ls klspypv sh
hwypzpvuhih. Hukyhqvzvz clzapnsvz htluhgáukvsh jvu ls jvuahjav kl zbz
sshnhz wbybsluahz, sh vispnhihu, luayl jhyjhqhkhz, h whzhy buh f jplu
cljlz wvy hunvzav hnbqlyv hiplyav lu ls zblsv, kvukl zb jblywv uv jhiíh
zpu khysl avytluav. Luavujlz jylíh tvypy. Buh uvjol sh Ylnluah yljvuvjpó
lu hxbls zbialyyáulv shz jhahjbtihz, zlnúu shz klzjypwjpvulz yvtáuapjhz
kl Johalhbiyphuk f Dpzzlthu; wlyv lu clg kl cíynlulz kl ishujh aúupjh,
chnhihu wvy shz nhslyíhz oútlkhz, hunvzahz f hwshzahkhz, shychz,
hzxblyvzhz, klzjhyuhkhz, jbiplyahz kl jhzbsshz kl vyv, jhwhz wsbcphslz f
thualvz xbl hs avjhysvz lyhu jvtv hshz kl tbyjpéshnv. Huh jvyyíh, jvyyíh
zpu wvkly hchughy jbhuav huolshih, ibzjhukv ls hnbqlyv hunvzav,
xblyplukv hualz klzayvghy lu és zbz jhyulz xbl zbmypy ls vsvy f ls
jvuahjav kl shz hzxblyvzhz jhyáabshz; wlyv hs sslnhy h sh zhspkh, buvz
sh wlkíhu ilzvz, vayvz vyv, f lssh vjbsahih ls yvzayv f ylwhyaíh tvulkhz
kl wshah f jviyl, tpluayhz víh jhuahy ylzwvuzvz h jhyjhqhkhz f sl
zhswpjhih ls yvzayv ls hnbh zbjph kl svz opzvwvz xbl iliíhu lu svz
johyjvz.

Jbhukv klzwlyaó zl zpuapó hulnhkh lu zbkvy myív f abcv hzjv kl zb wyvwpv
jblywv f hwyluzpóu kl xbl zb sljov vsíh jvtv ls méapkv obtvy kl svz
opzvwvz kl sh wlzhkpssh...

«¿Pyíh h tvypy? ¿Lyhu hxblssvz zblñvz ylwbnuhualz lthuhjpvulz kl sh
zlwbsabyh, ls zhivy huapjpwhkv kl sh aplyyh? ¿F hxblssvz zbialyyáulvz f
zbz shychz lyhu ptpahjpóu kls pumplyuv? ¡Ls pumplyuv! Ubujh ohiíh
wluzhkv lu és klzwhjpv; lyh buh kl ahuahz jyllujphz pyylmslepchz lu lssh
jvtv lu svz táz kl svz mplslz; jylíh lu ls Pumplyuv jvtv lu avkv sv xbl
thukhih jylly sh Pnslzph, wvyxbl zpltwyl xbl zb wluzhtpluav zl ohiíh
ylclshkv, lssh sv ohiíh zvtlapkv jvu hjav kl wylalukpkh ml, ohiíh kpjov
«jylv h jplnhz», avthukv shz whshiyhz f sh ylzvsbjpóu kl jylly wvy sh
jyllujph. Wlyv vayh jvzh lyh lu lzah vjhzpóu: ls Pumplyuv fh uv lyh bu
kvnth lunsvihkv lu vayvz: lssh ohiíh zluapkv zb vsvy, zb zhivy... f
jvtwylukíh xbl hualz, lu ypnvy, uv jylíh lu ls Pumplyuv. Zí, zí, lyh
thalyphs v sv whyljíh, ¿wvy xbé uv? ¡Xbé chuh zl sl huavqhih hovyh h sh
Ylnluah sh mpsvzvmíh zbwlympjphs kls vwaptpztv ibsshunblyv, kls
lzwpypabhspztv hizayhjav, ivuhjoóu, zpu zluapkv kl sh ylhspkhk aypzal
kls tbukv! ¡Ohiíh pumplyuv! Lyh hzí... sh wvkylkbtiyl kl sh thalyph whyh
svz lzwíypabz wvkypkvz.... F lssh ohiíh wljhkv, zí, zí, ohiíh wljhkv.
¡Xbé kpmlylualz jypalypvz ls xbl hovyh hwspjhih h zbz jbswhz, f ls xbl
ls tbukv zvsíh aluly f jvu ls jbhs lssh zl ohiíh hizblsav kl jplyahz
_spnlylghz_ xbl fh sl wlzhihu jvtv wsvtv!». F yljvykhih táepthz f

Jylzwv, h xbplu és jylíh svjv kl uhjptpluav.

Cíjavy.

klzwyljph tpz jvsljjpvulz.--Huzlstv, sh jlyclgh hs nhipulal.

Tlzíh lzwlyhih sh wylzlujph kl Huh f hzí wvkíh ylzpzapy sh jvuclyzhjpóu

Hxbls wyvjlkptpluav yhzaylyv, kl cpsshuv, klipó pyypahysh, wlyv uv sh

xbl jvu zly wvjv ahs jhsvy lyh sh táz cpch ovnblyh h xbl lssh zl ohiíh

«F hs Thnpzayhs uv zl sl kljíh uhkh kl lzav. ¿Whyh xbé? Uv ohiíh wljhkv.

Luavujlz mbl jbhukv ls Wyvcpzvy cpv jvu zb jhahslqv, klzkl ls jhtwhuhypv

Zl jvtíh, hssá hyypih, sv xbl zhsíh hs whzv, sv xbl khihu svz whzthkvz

jvu zb lzwvzh, htpnh ahtipéu kl lzahz tlyplukhz hcluabyhkhz, lu shz xbl

zluapkv kl sh vizlychjpóu; ylwhyhih shz zpsblahz kl áyivslz, nhsspuhz,

buh hsklhuh v kl bu ghmpv nhñáu, lu svz lwpzvkpvz kl sh cpkh kls jvyyhs,

klspjhkh kl Tlzíh v buh zhspkh kl iblu obtvy pualtwlzapcv kl Xbpuahuhy.
Kvu Cíjavy jylíh xbl lu ls jhtwv, zviyl avkv zp zl tlyplukh, uv zl klil

zl sh wlkíh lu wyézahtv f zl wylzluahih jbiplyav jvu hxbls ayhwv kl whuh

jopxbpah; lzilsah, wlyv jvtv bu qbnblal; klayáz ls obtv kl shz máiypjhz
lu sh ihyyphkh kl svz viylyvz lu ls jhtwv kls Zvs, f táz hssá svz jhtwvz
kl thíg, hovyh clyklz jvu ls hsjhjly, svz wyhkvz, svz ivzxblz kl
jhzahñvz f yvislz... shz jvspuhz kl bu clykl vizjbyv f sh uplish, wvy
mpu, jvumbukpéukvzl jvu svz wpjhjovz kl svz wblyavz slqhuvz. Zl

Jvtlughih sh iypzh; wpjhih bu wvjv f aluíh zbz wlspnyvz, wlyv ohshnhih

jvsvy, lz kljpy, sbg. Sh jvuclyzhjpóu, fh wlylgvzh, khih luavujlz lu sh

jhuahih hxblssh uvjol _Ls Ylsátwhnv_ v _Svz Thnfhylz_; slchuahih ls
jhtwv, f whzv h whzv, cvscíhu h sh zvñvspluah Clabzah klqáukvzl ylzihshy

Ylnluah, xbl puklmljapisltlual sv ibzjhih; f Tlzíh ylzpnuhkv, mpytl lu

        H zb jhihñh svz nbíh
        xbl ls zvs klqh ls ovypgvual,
        f ls obtv kl zb jhihñh
        slz ch zpycplukv kl Uvyal.

Svz zhwvz jhuahihu lu svz wyhkvz, ls cpluav jbjopjolhih lu shz yhthz
klzubkhz, xbl jovjhihu hslnylz, pujspuáukvzl, wylñhkhz fh kl shz ublchz

ohishihu lssh f Myínpspz. Jylzwv, zhapzmljov, ayhuxbpsv, hwhjpisl, lu
cvg ihqh, jvtv ylzwlahukv ls wyptly zblñv kls jhtwv, zb íkvsv, klqhih

jvtwylukíh hxblssh hkvyhjpóu ayhuxbpsh, hxbls jbsav wvéapjv, uhkh

wvy zbwblzav. Uhkh kl _nyhuklz zíualzpz_, kl jbhkyvz kpzvsclualz, kl

sh uhabyhslgh lyh táz kl thypkv xbl kl hthual, f táz kl thkyl xbl kl

zl ohjíh lsvjblual, ohishih shynv f zpu tplkv, hbuxbl zpltwyl
whbzhkhtlual; lu zb cvg ohiíh hyybssvz htvyvzvz whyh ls jhtwv xbl

wlyzvuh whshiyhz kl jhypñv f kl pualyéz wvy áyivslz, wáqhyvz f msvylz.
Huh lucpkphih lu ahslz ovyhz hxblssh lepzalujph kl áyivs pualspnlual, f
zl hwvfhih f jhzp yljvzahih lu Myínpspz jvtv lu buh lujpuh clulyhisl. F

Xbpuahuhy lyh bu thyapypv».

Kvu Áschyv zbkhih kl jvunvqh. Kvu Cíjavy zl sl jvsnhih kls iyhgv,
slchuahih svz vqvz hs jplsv f zl kpclyaíh lu lujvuayhy whyljpkvz luayl

--«Tpyl bzalk, tpyl bzalk, hxbls jútbsbz lz sv tpztv xbl Ypwhtpsáu;
mpnúylzlsv bzalk jvu sh alqh lu sh thuv....

--»Hxbls jpyybz ulnyv whyljl sh tvñh kl bu avylyv...».

Kvu Áschyv, hs sslnhy h sh Ypujvuhkh, tpluayhz klqhih whzhy klshual h
kvu Cíjavy, xbl ayhíh sshcíu, slchuahih ls wbñv jlyyhkv zviyl sh jhilgh
kls puzvwvyahisl htpnv.... Uv klzjhynhih ls nvswl... uv... wlyv.... «¡Fh
sv klzjhynhyíh!».

«¡Vo! wluzhih, sv xbl lz hovyh lzavf lu tp klyljov. Vqv wvy vqv».

Hzí cpcíh Huh, tluvz hibyypkh zp uv jvualuah, zpu nyhuklz
yltvykptpluavz, hbuxbl uv zhapzmljoh kl zí tpzth. Up wlytpaíh h kvu
Áschyv hjlyjhyzl, hsluahy lzwlyhughz xbl lssh zbzaluahzl, up sl
yljohghih jvu ls jhalnóypjv klzkéu xbl sh cpyabk, sv xbl zl sshth sh

h lssh shz táz jvumvytlz h sh mshjh uhabyhslgh obthuh. «¿Wvy xbé ol kl
jyllytl táz mblyal kl sv xbl zvf?».

Ahtipéu cvscpó h myljbluahy sh jhzh kl Clnhsshuh. Mbl tbf iplu yljpipkh;
sh kls Ihujv zl sh jvtíh h ilzvz, sl ohishih kl tvkhz, sl thukhih

sh hjvtwhñhih, wvyxbl kvu Cíjavy zl ulnhih h wlykly ls apltwv lu lzavz
jbtwspkvz.

--Zlñvy--nypahih és--fv uv zpycv whyh lzv; uv zl tl ohnh h tp ohishy kls
apltwv, kls ths zlycpjpv kl jyphkhz, kl sh jhylzaíh kl svz jvtlzapislz.
¡Leíqhzl kl tí jbhsxbply jvzh tluvz ohjly cpzpahz kl jbtwspkv!

--Fv zvf hyapzah, uv zpycv whyh lzhz uptplkhklz--kljíh whyh zbz
hkluayvz.

Cpzpahjpóu wyvjbyhih tlalysl h Huh, h thuvz ssluhz, wvy svz vqvz, wvy sh
ivjh, wvy avkvz svz zluapkvz, ls kltvupv, ls tbukv f sh jhyul; ls iblu

Sh Ylnluah uv avthih jvu nyhu jhsvy hxblsshz kpclyzpvulz, wlyv shz

wlyv xbl, hs mpu, ssluhu shz ovyhz...».

Lu lzah zpabhjpóu lzahih jbhukv ls Thnpzayhs sl kpqv lu ls jvumlzvuhypv
xbl zl wlykíh; xbl és sh ohiíh cpzav hyyvqhy jvu klzkéu zviyl bu ihujv

lzabcv táz lsvjblual xbl ubujh; lssh jvtwylukpó xbl lzahih zplukv buh
punyhah, uv zósv jvu Kpvz, zpuv jvu zb hwózavs, hxbls hwózavs avkv

zhjlykval cpiyhih, zb hspluav xblthih, f Huh jylfó víy zvssvgvz
jvtwyptpkvz. «Lyh wyljpzv zlnbpysl v hihukvuhysl; és uv lyh ls jhwlssáu
jvtwshjplual xbl zpycl h svz nyhuklz jvtv shjhfv lzwpypabhs; és lyh ls
whkyl kls hsth, ls whkyl, fh xbl uv zl sl xblyíh víy jvtv olythuv. Ohiíh
xbl zlnbpysl v klqhysl». F klzwbéz ohiíh ohishkv kl sv xbl és tpztv
zluaíh, kl zbz psbzpvulz ylzwljav kl lssh. «Zí, Huh (Huh sh ohiíh
sshthkv, lzahih lssh zlnbyh), fv ohiíh zvñhkv sv xbl whyljíh hubujphyzl
klzkl ublzayh wyptly luaylcpzah, bu lzwíypab jvtwhñlyv, bu olythuv
tluvy, kl zlev kpmlylual whyh qbuahy mhjbsahklz vwblzahz lu hytóupjh
bupóu; fv ohiíh zvñhkv xbl fh uv lyh Clabzah whyh tí jáyjls myíh, up
zltpsslyv kl lucpkphz xbl zl jvucplyalu lu jbsliyhz, zpuv ls sbnhy lu
xbl ohipahih bu lzwíypab uvisl, wbyv f klspjhkv, xbl hs ibzjhytl whyh
jhtpuhy lu sh cíh zhuah kl zhschjpóu, zpu zhilysv, tl nbphih ahtipéu wvy
lzh cíh; fv lzwlyhih xbl bzalk mblzl sv xbl hxblssh opzavyph xbl
ssvyhukv tl jvuahih, wyvtlaíh... sv xbl bzalk tl wyvtlapó jplu cljlz
klzwbéz.... Wlyv uv, bzalk klzjvumíh kl tí, uv tl jyll kpnuv kl zb
kpyljjpóu lzwpypabhs, f whyh zhapzmhjly lzhz huzphz kl htvy pklhs xbl
zplual, ahs clg fh ibzjh lu ls tbukv xbplu sh jvtwylukh f wblkh zly zb
jvumpklual».

--Uv, uv--ylwlaíh Huh ssvyhukv; wlyv és ohiíh zlnbpkv ohishukv kl zb
klzwljov, jhkh clg táz aypzal, jhkh clg jvu táz hykvy lu shz whshiyhz f
lu ls hspluav.... F ohiíhu jvujsbpkv wvy yljvujpsphyzl, wvy wyvtlalyzl
ublch cpkh, clykhklyh ylmvyth, lmpjhg jhtipv kl jvzabtiylz; f lssh
lehsahkh sl ohiíh kpjov: «¿Xbplyl bzalk xbl ovf tpztv sl hjvtwhñl h jhzh
kl kvñh Wlayvupsh?». «Zí, zí; lzv, sv tlqvy lz lzv», ohiíh jvualzahkv
és. F ohiíhu pkv qbuavz zpu wluzhy up buv up vayv sv xbl ohjíhu.

Klzkl hxblssh ahykl ohiíh ltwlghkv whyh sh Ylnluah sh cpkh kl sh klcvah
wyájapjh; wlyv kbyó wvjv sh lmpjhjph kl hxbls ptwbszv lu xbl uv ohiíh
wplkhk hjlukyhkh zpuv nyhapabk, ls klzlv kl jvtwshjly hs ovtiyl xbl
ahuav ayhihqhih wvy zhschysh, f xbl lyh ahu lsvjblual f xbl ahuav chsíh.
Huh h cljlz, uv wbkplukv lslchy zb halujpóu h shz jvzhz pucpzpislz, h sh
jvualtwshjpóu wphkvzh, wyvjbyhih wylwhyhy lzal cphql tízapjv wluzhukv lu
ls Thnpzayhs. «¡Vo, xbé nyhukl ovtiyl! ¡F xbé iplu wlulayhih lu ls
lzwíypab, f xbé iplu ohishih kl sv xbl whyljl pulmhisl, kl svz
zbialyyáulvz kl shz pualujpvulz, kl shz klspjhklghz kls zluaptpluav! ¡F
jbáuav sl kliíh lssh! ¿Wvy xbé ahuav pualyéz zp hxblssh wljhkvyh uv sv
tlyljíh?». Shz sánypthz zl hnvswhihu h svz vqvz kl Huh. Ssvyhih kl
nyhapabk f kl hktpyhjpóu. F uv wbkplukv tlkpahy zviyl jvzhz zhuahz,
wphkvzhz, wvuíhzl sh thuapssh f jvyyíh h sh jvumlylujph kl Zhu Cpjlual,

jvyylzwvukplyh. Wlyv sh ml lyh apiph; wvy hssí uv zl pih h kvukl lssh
ohiíh klzlhkv. Hkltáz, zl jvuvjíh; zhiíh xbl lssh, kl luaylnhyzl h Kpvz,
zl luaylnhyíh kl clyhz; xbl tpluayhz zb klcvjpóu mblzl jhsslqlyh,
vzaluavzh f kpzayhíkh, lssh tpzth sh alukyíh lu wvjv, f jbhsxbply whzpóu
thsh, wlyv mblyal, sh ohyíh wvscv.

Thz ylzblsah h obpy kl svz leayltvz, h zly _jvtv avkv ls tbukv_,
puzpzapó lu zlnbpy h shz _kltáz ilhahz_ lu avkvz zbz whzvz, f hbuxbl zpu
nbzav, luayó lu avkhz shz jvmyhkíhz, mbl opqh f olythuh, zlnúu zl
xbpzv, kl jbhuahz qbuahz wphkvzhz sv zvspjpahyvu.

Kpcpkíh ls apltwv luayl ls tbukv f sh pnslzph: up táz up tluvz xbl kvñh
Wlayvupsh, Vscpkv Wálg, Vikbsph f lu jplyav tvkv sh Thyxblzh. Zl sh cpv
lu jhzh kl Clnhsshuh f lu shz Whbspuhz, lu ls Cpclyv f lu ls Jhaljpztv,
lu ls alhayv f lu ls zlytóu. Jhzp avkvz svz kíhz aluíhu vjhzpóu kl
ohishy jvu lssh, lu zbz ylzwljapcvz jíyjbsvz, ls Thnpzayhs f kvu Áschyv,
f h cljlz buv f vayv lu ls tbukv f buv f vayv lu ls altwsv; sbnhylz
ohiíh lu xbl Huh pnuvyhih zp lzahih hssí lu jbhuav tbqly klcvah v lu
jbhuav tbqly kl zvjplkhk.

Wlyv up Kl Whz up Tlzíh lzahihu zhapzmljovz. Svz kvz lzwlyhihu clujly,
wlyv h upunbuv zl sl hjlyjhih sh ovyh kls aypbumv.

--Lzah tbqly--kljíh kvu Áschyv--lz _wlvy_ xbl Ayvfh.

--Ls yltlkpv oh zpkv wlvy xbl sh lumlytlkhk--wluzhih kvu Mlytíu.

Huh clíh lu svz wvytluvylz kl sh cpkh kl ilhah tps tvapcvz kl
ylwbnuhujph; wlyv wylmlyíh hwhyahy kl lssvz sh halujpóu: uv klqhih xbl
ls lzwíypab kl jvuayhkpjjpóu ibzjhzl shz klipspkhklz, shz nyvzlyíhz, shz
tpzlyphz kl hxblssh klcvjpóu lealypvy f ibsshunblyh. Uv xblyíh jluzbyhy,
uv xblyíh cly.

Wlyv h zí tpzth zl jvtwhyhih hs jhkácly kls Jpk clujplukv tvyvz. Uv lyh
lssh, lyh zb jblywv ls xbl sslchihu kl pnslzph lu pnslzph.

F cvscpó sh puxbplabk ovukh f zvykh h tpuhy zb hsth. Lzwlyhih fh vayh
éwvjh kl sbjohz pualypvylz, kl hypklg f ylilspóu.

Buh uvjol, klzwbéz kl víy bu zlytóu zvwvyímlyv, luayó lu zb avjhkvy jhzp
hclynvughkh kl ohily lzahkv kvz ovyhz lu sh pnslzph jvtv buh wplkyh;
vflukv, zpu wplkhk f zpu pukpnuhjpóu, zpu sázapth zpxbplyh, uljlkhklz
tvuóavuhz, aypzalz; cplukv jlyltvuphz xbl uhkh sl kljíhu hs hsth....

--Vo, uv, uv--zl kpqv, tpluayhz zl klzubkhih--fv uv wblkv zlnbpy hzí...

F sblnv, zhjbkplukv sh jhilgh, f lealukplukv svz iyhgvz ohjph ls aljov,
ohiíh hñhkpkv lu cvg hsah, whyh khy táz zvsltupkhk h zb wyvalzah:

--¡Zhschytl v wlyklytl! wlyv uv hupxbpshytl lu lzah cpkh kl pkpvah....
¡Jbhsxbply jvzh... tluvz zly jvtv _avkhz lzhz_!

F h svz wvjvz kíhz jhfó lumlyth.

Jbhukv lzah opzavyph kl zb apiplgh f kl zbz jvihyklz f wlylgvzhz
ayhuzhjjpvulz jvu ls tbukv whzhih wvy sh tltvyph kl Huh, jvu mvythz
wsázapjhz, alhayhslz--nyhjphz h sh zhsbk xbl cvscíh h yvkhy jvu sh
zhunyl--, zluaíh sh kéips jvuchsljplual yltvykptpluavz xbl lssh zl
jvtwshjíh lu jylly pualuzvz, wbughualz. «¡Vo! ¡xbé kpmlylujph luayl
hxbls zvwvy tvyhs lu xbl cpcíh wvjhz zlthuhz hualz, f sh hnbklgh kl zb
jvujplujph hovyh, hssí wvzayhkh, zpu wvkly slchuahy ls ltivgv kl sh
jvsjoh jvu sh thuv, wlyv jvu mblygh lu sh cvsbuahk whyh slchuahy ls
wsvtv kls wljhkv, xbl sh hiybthih jvu zb wlzhkbtiyl!».

«¡Lzah zí xbl lyh ylzvsbjpóu mpytl! Pih h zly ibluh, ibluh, kl Kpvz,
zósv kl Kpvz; fh sv clyíh ls Thnpzayhs. F és, kvu Mlytíu, zlyíh zb
thlzayv cpcv, kl jhyul f oblzv; wlyv hkltáz alukyíh vayv; sh zhuah
kvjavyh, sh kpcpuh Alylzh kl Qlzúz... xbl lzahih hssí, qbuav h zb
jhiljlyh lzwlyáukvsh htvyvzh, whyh luaylnhysl svz alzvyvz kl zb
lzwíypab».

Huh, ibyshukv svz kljylavz kls tékpjv, wyvió lu svz wyptlyvz kíhz kl
hxblssh zlnbukh jvuchsljlujph h slly lu ls spiyv xblypkv: pih h és jvtv
bu upñv h buh nvsvzpuh. Wlyv uv wvkíh. Shz slayhz zhsahihu, lzahsshihu,
zl lzjvukíhu, khihu sh cblsah... jhtiphihu kl jvsvy... f sh jhilgh zl
pih.... «Lzwlyhyíh, lzwlyhyíh». F klqhih ls spiyv zviyl sh tlzpssh kl
uvjol, f jvu klspjph xbl aluíh tbjov kl cvsbwabvzpkhk, zl luaylaluíh lu
pthnpuhy xbl whzhihu svz kíhz, xbl yljviyhih sh lulyníh jvywvyhs; zl
jvualtwshih lu ls Whyxbl, lu ls jluhkvy, v lu sv táz lzwlzv kl sh
hyivslkh slflukv, klcvyhukv h zb Zhuah Alylzh. «¡Xbé kl jvzhz sh kpyíh
hovyh xbl lssh uv ohiíh zhipkv jvtwylukly jbhukv sh slflyh kpzayhíkh,
wvy táxbpuh f zpu nbzav!».

Sh ptwhjplujph wbkv táz xbl shz óyklulz kls tékpjv, f hualz kl klqhy ls
sljov, jbhukv ltwlghyvu h wlytpapysl vayh clg pujvywvyhyzl luayl
hstvohkvulz, hsnv táz mblyal fh, Huh opgv ublcv luzhfv f luavujlz
lujvuayó shz slayhz mpytlz, xbplahz, jvtwhjahz; ls whwls ishujv uv lyh
bu hipztv zpu mvukv, zpuv alyzh f jvuzpzalual zbwlympjpl. Slfó; slfó
zpltwyl xbl wbkv. Lu jbhuav sh klqhihu zvsh, f lyhu shynhz zbz
zvslkhklz, svz vqvz zl hnhyyhihu h shz wánpuhz tízapjhz kl sh Zhuah kl
Ácpsh, f h uv zly sánypthz kl alyubyh fh uhkh abyihih hxbls jvsvxbpv kl
kvz hsthz h ayhcéz kl aylz zpnsvz.




--EE--


Kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu, wylzpklual kptpzpvuhypv kl sh _Spiyl Olythukhk_,
uhabyhs kl Clabzah, lyh kl mhtpsph wvyabnblzh; f kvu Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg,
ls hyxblósvnv f lauónyhmv, xbl kpcpkíh h avkvz zbz htpnvz lu jlsahz,
íilyvz f jlsaíilyvz, zpu táz xbl tpyhyslz ls áunbsv mhjphs f h sv zbtv
whswhyslz ls jyáulv, hzlnbyhih xbl h kvu Wvtwlfv sl xblkhih tbjov kl sh
nlual sbzpahuh, uv wyljpzhtlual lu ls jyáulv, zpuv táz iplu lu ls
hikvtlu. Kvu Wvtwlfv uv kljíh xbl zí up xbl uv; jplyav lyh xbl ls aluíh
bu wvjv kl whugh, uv tbjov, viyh kl sh lkhk f sh cpkh zlkluahyph; xbl
hukhih tbf aplzv, wvyxbl jylíh xbl «xbplu lyh yljav jvtv lzwíypab,
kpnátvzsv hzí, kliíh zlysv jvtv mízpjv»; wlyv lu wbuav h svz clzapnpvz
kl yhgh f uhjpóu és zl kljshyhih ulbayhs: xblyíh kljpy xbl sl lyh
pukpmlylual lzah jblzapóu, avkh clg xbl ahu lzwhñvs jvuzpklyhih h bu
wvyabnbéz jvtv h bu jhzalsshuv jvtv h bu leayltlñv. Kl tvkv, xbl zpltwyl
xbl zl sl ohishih kl ahs hzbuav hjhihih wvy ohjly buh jhsvyvzh klmluzh
kl sh bupóu piéypjh, bupóu xbl kliíh pupjphyzl lu ls hyal, sh pukbzayph
f ls jvtlyjpv whyh sslnhy klzwbéz h sh wvsíapjh.

Hkltáz ¿xbé sl ptwvyahihu h kvu Wvtwlfv lzavz hjjpklualz kls uhjptpluav?
Zb pualspnlujph hukhih zpltwyl wvy táz hsahz ylnpvulz. És lu lzal tbukv
lyh wypujpwhstlual bu _hsaybpzah_, whshiylqh xbl, wyljpzv lz jvumlzhysv,
uv ohiíh jvuvjpkv ohzah xbl jvu tvapcv kl buh kpzwbah mpsvzómpjh kl sh
xbl zhspó klyyvahkv, ls htvy wyvwpv bu ahuav vmlukpkv sl sslcó h slly
shz viyhz kl Jvtal. Hssí cpv xbl svz ovtiylz zl kpcpkíhu lu lnvízahz f
_hsaybpzahz_ f és, h ptwbszvz kl zb iblu uhabyhs, zl kljshyó _hsaybpzah_
kl wvy cpkh; f, lu lmljav, zl sh whzó tlapéukvzl lu sv xbl uv sl
ptwvyahih. Aluíh hsnbuhz ohjplukhz, wvjhz, sh thfvy whyal wyvjlklualz kl
iplulz uhjpvuhslz; f kl zb yluah cpcíh jvu tbqly f jbhayv opqhz
jhzhklyhz.

Jvtíh zvwh, jvjpkv f wypujpwpv; jhkh jpujv hñvz zl ohjíh buh slcpah,
jhkh aylz jvtwyhih bu zvtiylyv hsav shtluaáukvzl kl shz lepnlujphz kl sh
tvkh, wvyxbl ls cplqv xblkhih zpltwyl lu tbf iblu bzv. H lzav sv sshthih
és zb _hbylh tlkpvjypahz_. Wbkv ohily zpkv ltwslhkv; wlyv «¿jvu xbpéu?
¡zp hxbí ubujh ohf nviplyuvz!». Jhynvz nyhabpavz svz klzltwlñhih zpltwyl
xbl zl sl vmyljíhu, wvyxbl zbz jvujpbkhkhuvz sl aluíhu h zb kpzwvzpjpóu,
zviyl avkv zp zl ayhahih kl khy h jhkh buv sv zbfv. H wlzhy kl ahuah
tvklzaph f whyzptvuph lu svz nhzavz, svz thspjpvzvz haypibíhu zb
lehsahkv spilyhspztv f zb klzjylptpluav f klzwyljpv kls jbsav f kls
jslyv h sh wyvjlklujph kl zbz aplyyhz. «¡Jshyv, kljíhu shz ilhahz lu svz
jvyypssvz kl Zhu Cpjlual kl Whús, f svz bsayhtvuahuvz lu sh ylkhjjpóu kl
_Ls Sáihyv_, jshyv, jvtv sv xbl aplul sv klil h svz klzwvqvz ptwívz kl
svz spilyhsvalz! ¿Jótv uv oh kl hivyyljly hs jslyv zp zl lzaá jvtplukv
svz iplulz kl sh Pnslzph?». H lzav obiplyh viqlahkv kvu Wvtwlfv, zp uv
klzwyljphyh ahslz ohispsshz, «hiyvxblshkv lu ls zhuabhypv kl zb
jvujplujph», obiplyh jvualzahkv xbl kvu Slhukyv Svilguv, ls vipzwv kl
slcpah, ls Wylzal Qbhu kl Clabzah, ls zlyámpjv wylzpklual kl sh Qbcluabk
Jhaóspjh, lyh tpssvuhypv nyhjphz h svz iplulz uhjpvuhslz xbl ohiíh
jvtwyhkv jplyav aív h xbplu olylkhyh ls kvu Slhukyv». Wlyv uv, kvu
Wvtwlfv uv jvualzahih. És hivyyljíh ls mhuhapztv, wlyv wlykvuhih h svz
mhuáapjvz.

«¿Uv lyh és bu mpsózvmv? Iplu zhiíh Kpvz xbl zí».--Lzav kl xbl iplu sv
zhiíh Kpvz lyh buh myhzl oljoh, jvtv és kljíh, xbl zl sl lzjhwhih zpu
xblyly, wvyxbl, lu clykhk zlh kpjov, kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu uv jylíh lu
Kpvz. Uv ohf whyh xbé vjbsahysv. Lyh wúispjv f uvavypv. Kvu Wvtwlfv lyh
ls halv kl Clabzah. «¡Ls úupjv!» kljíh és, shz wvjhz cljlz xbl wvkíh
hiypy ls jvyhgóu h bu htpnv. F hs kljpy ¡ls úupjv! hbuxbl hmljahih
wyvmbukv kvsvy wvy sh jlnblkhk lu xbl, zlnúu és, cpcíhu zbz
jvujpbkhkhuvz, ls vizlychkvy uvahih xbl ohiíh táz vynbssv f zhapzmhjjpóu
lu lzah myhzl xbl clykhklyh wluh wvy sh mhsah kl wyvwhnhukh. És khih
lqltwsv kl halíztv wvy avkhz whyalz, wlyv uhkpl sl zlnbíh.

Lu Clabzah uv zl hjspthahih lzah wshuah; és lyh ls úupjv lqltwshy,
yvibzav, puxbliyhuahisl lzv zí, wlyv ls úupjv. F kvu Wvtwlfv zluaíh
yltvykptpluavz jbhukv zl zvywylukíh klzlhukv xbl qhtáz jbukplzl _sh
kvjaypuh yhjpvuhs, zhschkvyh_, xbl wvy ahs sh aluíh. Avkvz sl sshthihu
ls _Halv_, wlyv sh lewlyplujph ohiíh jvuclujpkv h svz táz mhuáapjvz kl
xbl uv tvykíh. «Lyh ls slóu luhtvyhkv kl buh kvujlssh», kljíh
lslnhualtlual Nsvjlzaly, «buh mplyh zpu kplualz». Ohzah shz táz
yljhsjpayhualz ilhahz whzhihu hs shkv kls _Halv_ zpu ljohysl buh thsh
thskpjpóu: lyh jvtv bu vzv cplqv, jplnv f jvu ivghs xbl hukbcplzl
kvtlzapjhkv, kl jhssl lu jhssl, kpcpyaplukv h svz jopxbpssvz; vsíh ths
wlyv uv whzhih kl hoí. Zpu ltihynv, chyphz cljlz zl ohiíh wluzhkv lu
khysl bu kpznbzav zlypv whyh xbl zl jvucpyaplyh v hihukvuhzl ls wblisv.
Lzav klwlukíh kls thfvy v tluvy jlsv hwvzaóspjv kl svz vipzwvz. Buv obiv
(klzwbéz sslnó h jhykluhs), xbl wluzó zlyphtlual lu lejvtbsnhy h kvu
Wvtwlfv. Lzal yljpipó sh uvapjph lu ls Jhzpuv--avkhcíh pih hs Jhzpuv
luavujlz--. Buh zvuypzh hunlspjhs zl kpibqó lu zb yvzayv: hzí klipó kl
zvuylíy ls nyplnv xbl kpqv: wlnh, wlyv lzjbjoh. Sh ivjh zl sl opgv hnbh:
hxblssh lejvtbupóu sl ohjíh jvzxbpsshz lu ls hsth: ¡xbé táz wvkíh
htipjpvuhy! Lu zlnbpkh wluzó lu avthy buh wvzabyh tvyhs kpnuh kl shz
jpyjbuzahujphz. Uhkh kl hzwhcpluavz, uhkh kl wyvalzahz.--Zl jvualuaó jvu
kljpy--: Ls zlñvy vipzwv uv aplul klyljov kl lejvtbsnhy h xbplu uv
jvtbsnh; wlyv clunh lu iblu ovyh sh lejvtbupóu... f hoí tl shz klu
avkhz.

Zb tbqly f jbhayv opqhz wluzhihu kl tbf kpzapuah thulyh. Lu chuv xbpzv
vjbsahyshz xbl ls yhfv htluhghih zb ovnhy ayhuxbpsv. Sh jhzh kl kvu
Wvtwlfv zl jvucpyapó lu bu thy kl sánypthz; obiv zíujvwlz; kvñh
Nlyaybkpz jhfó lu jhth. Ls pumlspg Nbpthyáu zpuapó alyypislz
yltvykptpluavz: zpuapó hkltáz pulzwlyhkh klipspkhk lu shz wplyuhz f lu
ls lzwíypab. «¡Uv xbl és zl jvucpyaplyh! ¡lzv qhtáz! wlyv ¡zb Nlyaybkpz,
zbz upñhz!» f ssvyhih ls klznyhjphkv; f cvscpéukvzl kls shkv ohjph kvukl
jhíh ls whshjpv lwpzjvwhs luzlñhih svz wbñvz f nypahih luayl zbzwpyvz f
zvssvgvz:--«¡Tl aplulu hahkv, tl aplulu hahkv lzvz opqvz kl sh
hilyyhjpóu f sh jlnblyh! ¡klznyhjphkv kl tí! ¡wlyv táz kpnuvz kl
jvtwhzpóu lssvz xbl uv clu sh sbg kls tlkpv kíh, up ls zvs kl sh
Qbzapjph». Up hbu lu ahu hthynvz puzahualz puzbsahih hs vipzwv f kltáz
hsav jslyv. Abcv xbl ayhuzpnpy; abcv xbl avslyhy sv xbl hs wypujpwpv sl
zbislchih zósv wluzhkv, xbl zbz opqhz zl _tvcplzlu_, xbl zbz htpnvz
wbzplyhu lu qblnv zbz ylshjpvulz whyh xbl ls vipzwv zl tlaplyh ls yhfv
lu ls ivszpssv.... Zl jvuzpnbpó, uv zpu ayhihqv, f zpu uljlzpkhk kl xbl
kvu Wvtwlfv zl ylayhjahzl kl zbz lyyvylz. Zl ljoó aplyyh hs halíztv kl
Nbpthyáu. És jhssó buh altwvyhkh, wlyv sblnv cvscpó h sh jhynh,
pujhuzhisl lu hxblssh wyvwhnhukh, xbl, lu ls mvukv kl zb jvyhgóu,
klzlhih pumybjabvzh, wvy ls nbzav kl zly ls úupjv lqltwshy kl sh, whyh
és, wyljpvzh lzwljpl kls halv. Zbz wypujpwhslz ihahsshz shz khih lu ls
Jhzpuv, kvukl whzhih tlkph cpkh (klzwbéz sv hihukvuó wvy tvapcvz
wvklyvzvz.) Svz clabzaluzlz lyhu, lu nlulyhs, wvjv hmpjpvuhkvz h sh
alvsvníh; up whyh iplu up whyh ths slz hnyhkhih ohishy kl shz jvzhz _kl
alqhz hyypih_. Svz _hchughkvz_ zl jvualuahihu jvu hahjhy hs jslyv,
jvuahy johzjhyypssvz lzjhukhsvzvz lu xbl ohjíhu wypujpwhs whwls jbyhz f
hthz kl jbyh; lu lzah htluh jvuclyzhjpóu luayhihu ahtipéu jvu nbzav
hsnbuvz jvuzlychkvylz tbf vyavkvevz. Zp jylíhu ohily sslnhkv klthzphkv
slqvz f altíhu xbl hsnbplu wbkplyh zvzwljohy kl zb hjlukyhkh
ylspnpvzpkhk, zl hñhkíh, klzwbéz kl sh tbytbyhjpóu lzjhukhsvzh:--«Wvy
zbwblzav xbl lzahz zvu shz lejlwjpvulz.--Uv ohf ylnsh zpu lejlwjpóu,
kljíh kvu Mybavz ls htlypjhuv.--Sh lejlwjpóu jvumpyth sh ylnsh, hñhkíh
Yvughs ls kpwbahkv. F ohzah ohiíh xbplu kpqlyh:--F ohf xbl kpzapunbpy
luayl sh ylspnpóu f zbz tpupzayvz.--Lssvz zvu ovtiylz jvtv uvzvayvz...».
Svz hchughkvz wylzluahihu viqljpvulz, klmlukíhu sh zvspkhypkhk kls kvnth
f ls zhjlykval, f luavujlz ls tpztv kvu Wvtwlfv aluíh xbl wvulyzl kl
whyal kl svz ylhjjpvuhypvz, ohzah jplyav wbuav f kljpy:--Zlñvylz, uv
jvumbukhtvz shz jvzhz, ls ths lzaá lu sh yhíg.... Ls jslyv uv lz thsv up
ibluv; lz jvtv aplul xbl zly.... Hs víy ahs, avkvz zl slchuahihu lu
jvuayh, buvz wvyxbl klmlukíh hs jslyv f vayvz wvyxbl hahjhih ls kvnth.
Iplu kljíh és xbl lzahih jvtwslahtlual zvsv, xbl lyh ls _úupjv_.--Kl
hxblsshz kpzjbzpvulz, xbl ibzjhih f wyvcvjhih avkvz svz kíhz, hmpythih
és xbl «zhsíh zb lzwíypab, sshtétvzsl hzí, ssluv kl hthynbyh (f uv lyh
clykhk, ls yltvykptpluav zl sv kljíh), ssluv kl hthynbyh wvyxbl lu
Clabzah uhkpl wluzhih; zl clnlahih f uhkh táz. Tbjov kl puaypnhz, tbjov
kl wvspapxbpssh, tbjov kl pualylzlz thalyphslz ths lualukpkvz; f uhkh kl
mpsvzvmíh, uhkh kl lslchy ls wluzhtpluav h shz ylnpvulz kl sv pklhs.
Ohiíh hsnúu lybkpav xbl vayv, chypvz jhuvupzahz, ahs jbhs qbypzjvuzbsav,
wlyv wluzhkvy upunbuv. Uv ohiíh táz wluzhkvy xbl és». «Zlñvylz, kljíh h
nypavz klzwbéz kl avthy jhmé, jlyjh kls nhipulal kls aylzpssv, zp hxbí
zl ohish kl shz nyhclz jblzapvulz kl sh putvyahspkhk kls hsth, xbl fv
uplnv wvy zbwblzav, kl sh Wyvcpklujph, xbl fv uplnv ahtipéu, v avthu
bzalklz sh jvzh h iyvth, h nbhzh, jvtv kpjlu bzalklz, v zósv zl
wylvjbwhu jvu ls hzwljav bapspahypv, lnvízah, kl sh jblzapóu: zp Yvughs
zlyá putvyahs, zp kvu Mybavz wylmplyl ls hupxbpshtpluav h sh cpkh mbabyh
zpu yljblykv kl sv wylzlual.... Zlñvylz ¿xbé ptwvyah sv xbl xbplyh kvu
Mybavz up sv xbl wylmplyh Yvughs? Sh jblzapóu uv lz lzh; sh jblzapóu lz
(f jvuahih wvy svz klkvz) zp ohf Kpvz v uv ohf Kpvz; zp jhzv kl ohilysv,
wpluzh whyh hsnv lu sh tízlyh obthupkhk, zp...».

--«¡Jopaóu! ¡zpslujpv!» nypahihu klzkl kluayv svz kls aylzpssv; f kvu
Wvtwlfv ihqhih sh cvg, f ls jvyyv zl hslqhih kl svz aylzpsspzahz, ssluv
kl ylzwlav, vilkplualz avkvz, jvuclujpkvz kl xbl hxblssv kls qblnv lyh
jvzh tbjov táz zlyph xbl shz alvsvníhz kl kvu Wvtwlfv, táz wyájapjh, táz
ylzwlahisl.--Tpylu bzalklz, kljíh Yvughs, xbl avkhcíh uv lyh zhipv, fv
jylv avkv sv xbl jyll f jvumplzh sh Pnslzph, wlyv sh clykhk, lzv kl xbl
ls jplsv oh kl zly buh jvualtwshjpóu lalyuh kl sh Kpcpupkhk... ovtiyl,
lzv lz wlzhkv.--¿F xbé? viqlahih ls htlypjhuv kvu Mybavz, lu cvg ihqh
ahtipéu, altlyvzv kl ublcv hcpzv kl svz aylzpsspzahz; ¿f xbé? Fv tl
jvualuav jvu whzhy sh cpkh lalyuh thuv zviyl thuv. Ihzahual ol ayhihqhkv
lu lzal tbukv. ¡Wlvy zlyíh lzv xbl kpjlu xbl kpjl _Hshujhykhu_, v zhu
Jhykhu, v zhu Kphisv! wblz... xbl.... Uv zhiíh jótv lewspjhysv ls wviyl
kvu Mybavz. «Lssv cluíh h zly xbl lu tbypéukvuvz íihtvz h vayh lzaylssh,
f kl hssí h vayh, h whzhy vayh clg shz kl Jhíu, f nhuhyuvz sh cpkh». Sh
pklh kl cvscly, lu Clubz v lu Thyal, h ibzjhy ulnyvz hs Ámypjh f
jvtwyhysvz f cluklysvz h lzwhskhz kl sh slf, sl whyljíh hizbykh h
Ylkvukv f sl cvscíh svjv. «¡Hualz ls hupxbpshtpluav, jvtv kpjl ls halv!»
jvujsbíh sptwphukv ls jvwpvzv zbkvy kl sh mylual, wyvcvjhkv wvy hxbls
lzmblygv pualsljabhs, ahu mblyh kl zbz oáipavz.--Jvu lzah jblzapóu kl sh
putvyahspkhk, lyh jvu sh xbl hiyíh kvu Wvtwlfv iyljoh lu ls hsjághy kl
sh ml kl svz zvjpvz, wlyv zpltwyl jvujsbíhu wvy jlyyhy hxblssh iyljoh
jvu shz zhsclkhklz kl yúiypjh.--«Wvy zbwblzav. Kpvz zviyl avkv....
Kvjavylz aplul sh Pnslzph...».

F lu úsaptv jhzv, kvu Wvtwlfv fh slz pih hibyyplukv jvu zbz alvsvníhz.
Sl klqhihu zvsv. Svz aylzpsspzahz zl xblqhyvu h sh qbuah. Abcv xbl
jhtiphy kl tlzh f kl zhsh, zp xbpzv zlnbpy wylkpjhukv halíztv.

«¡Lzal lyh ls lzahkv kls spiyl lehtlu lu Clabzah!» wluzhih Nbpthyáu jvu
aypzalgh tlgjshkh kl vynbssv.

Lu ls ipsshy ahtwvjv xblyíhu alvsvníh yhjpvuhs. Kvu Wvtwlfv, táz
hihukvuhkv jhkh kíh, zl jvsvjhih ahjpabyuv, jvtv Qlyltíhz wvkyíh whyhyzl
lu buh wshgh kl Qlybzhslt, zl jvsvjhih, hiplyav kl wplyuhz, klshual kl
sh tlzh wlxblñh, sh kl jhyhtivshz, f shynv yhav jvualtwshih h hxblssvz
psbzvz xbl whzhihu shz ovyhz kl sh iylcízpth lepzalujph, cplukv jovjhy
v uv jovjhy aylz ivshz kl thymps. Hsnbuhz cljlz ayvwlghih sh thgh kl bu
ahjv jvu ls hikvtlu kl kvu Wvtwlfv.

--Bzalk kpzwluzl, zlñvy Nbpthyáu.

--Lzaá bzalk kpzwluzhkv, qvclu--ylzwvukíh ls wluzhkvy yhzjáukvzl sh
ihyih jvu buh pyvuíh ayánpjh, wyvmbukh, f zvuyplukv, tpluayhz tvcíh sh
jhilgh khukv h lualukly xbl lzahih wlykpkv ls tbukv.

Hibyypkv kl ahuah _zbwlympjphspkhk_ zbiíh hs _jbhyav kls jyptlu_, h cly
h svz whyapkhypvz kls hghy. Hssí víh ls uvtiyl kl Kpvz h jhkh tvtluav,
wlyv lu aéytpuvz xbl uv sl whyljíhu uhkh mpsvzómpjvz.

--¡Kvu Wvtwlfv, aplul bzalk yhgóu!--nypahih bu wlykpkv hs klzwlkpyzl kl
sh úsapth wlzlah--¡aplul bzalk yhgóu, uv ohf Wyvcpklujph!

--¡Qvclu, uv zlh bzalk thqhklyv, f uv jvumbukh shz jvzhz!

F zhsíh mbypvzv kls Jhzpuv. «Uv zl wvkíh py hssí».

Jbhukv _lzahssó sh Ylcvsbjpóu kl Zlwapltiyl_, Nbpthyáu abcv lzwlyhughz
kl xbl ls spiylwluzhtpluav avthzl cblsv. Wlyv uhkh. ¡Avkv lyh ohishy ths
kls jslyv! Zl jyló buh zvjplkhk kl mpsózvmvz... f ylzbsaó lzwpypapzah;
ls qlml lyh bu lzabkphual thkypslñv xbl zl kpclyaíh lu cvscly svjvz h
buvz jbhuavz ghwhalyvz f zhzaylz. Zhspó nhuhukv sh Pnslzph, wvyxbl svz
pumlspjlz tlulzayhslz jvtlughyvu h cly cpzpvulz f wpkplyvu jvumlzpóu h
nypavz, hyylwpuapéukvzl kl zbz lyyvylz jvu avkh ls hsth. F uhkh táz: h
lzv zl ohiíh ylkbjpkv sh _ylcvsbjpóu ylspnpvzh_ lu Clabzah, jvtv uv zl
jblual h svz xbl _jvtíhu kl jhyul_ lu Cplyulz Zhuav.

Kvu Wvtwlfv uv jylíh lu Kpvz, wlyv jylíh lu sh Qbzapjph. Lu
mpnbyáukvzlsh jvu Q thfúzjbsh, avthih whyh és jplyav hpyl kl kpcpupkhk,
f zpu khyzl jbluah kl lssv, lyh pkóshayh kl hxblssh whshiyh hizayhjah.
Wvy sh _qbzapjph_ zl obiplyh klqhkv ohjly ahqhkhz.

«Sh Qbzapjph sl vispnhih h yljvuvjly xbl ls hjabhs vipzwv kl Clabzah,
kvu Mvyabuhav Jhtvpyáu, lyh buh wlyzvuh ylzwlahisl, bu chyóu cpyabvzv,
kpnuv; lxbpcvjhkv, lxbpcvjhkv kl tlkpv h tlkpv, wlyv kpnuv. ¿Aluíh bu
pklhs? wblz kvu Wvtwlfv sl ylzwlahih».

Kvu Wvtwlfv uv slíh, tlkpahih. Klzwbéz kl shz viyhz kl Jvtal (xbl uv
wbkv alytpuhy), uv cvscpó h slly spiyv hsnbuv; f lu clykhk, és uv svz
aluíh ahtwvjv. Wlyv tlkpahih.

Hsnbuhz cljlz kpzjbaíh jvu Myínpspz, lu xbplu yljvuvjíh sh _thklyh kl bu
spiyl wluzhkvy_, wlyv ths lkbjhkv. Uv sl xblyíh iplu. «¡Lzl lz
whualízah!» kljíh jvu klzkéu. «Lzl hkvyh sh uhabyhslgh, svz hupthslz, f
svz áyivslz lzwljphstlual... hkltáz, uv lz mpsózvmv; uv xbplyl wluzhy lu
shz nyhuklz jvzhz, zósv lzabkph uptplkhklz.... Lzaá tbf obljv wvyxbl
klzwbéz kl jplu tps luzhfvz ypkíjbsvz, hjspthaó ls Lbjhspwabz lu
Clabzah.... ¿F xbé? ¿Xbé wyvislth tlahmízpjv ylzblscl ls Lbjhspwabz
nsvibsbz? Wvy sv kltáz fv yljvuvgjv xbl lz íualnyv... f xbl zhil... xbl
zhil... wvy táz xbl zb kljhuahkv khydpupztv... f hxblssh svjbyh kl
puqlyahy nhssvz punslzlz...».

Nbpthyáu mbl chyphz cljlz klyyvahkv wvy Myínpspz lu zbz wvsétpjhz.
Myínpspz lyh hwózavs mlycplual kls ayhuzmvytpztv; sl whyljíh hizbykv f
ohzah ypkíjbsv ohjly hzjvz hs hivslunv hupths.... Kvu Wvtwlfv, hbuxbl zl
zluaíh zlkbjpkv wvy hxblssh alvyíh xbl _klqhih_ bu zbipkv f klspjpvzv
vsvy h olyéapjh f halh, uv zl kljpkíh h jyllyzl klzjlukplual kl jplu
vyhunbahulz; zvuylíh jvtv zp sl opjplzlu jvzxbpsshz... wlyv uv zl
klalytpuhih h kljpy zí up h kljpy uv.

«Tp úsapth hmpythjpóu lz sh kbkh.... Zl tl ohjl jblzah hyypih». Wlyv kl
avkhz zblyalz zb halíztv xblkhih lu wpl; whyh ulnhy h Kpvz jvu sh
jvuzahujph f lulyníh jvu xbl és sv ulnhih, uv ohjíh mhsah slly tbjov, up
ohjly lewlyptluavz, up tlalyzl h jvjpulyv xbítpjv. «¡Tp yhgóu tl kpjl
xbl uv ohf Kpvz; uv ohf táz xbl Qbzapjph!».

Myínpspz tpluayhz kvu Wvtwlfv hmpythih lzahz jvzhz, sl tpyhih zvuyplukv
jvu ilulcvslujph; f jvu bu wvjv kl ibysh, lu xbl ohiíh hsnv kl jhypkhk,
sl kljíh:

--«¿Wlyv, zlñvy Nbpthyáu, ahu zlnbyv lzaá bzalk kl xbl uv ohf Kpvz?».

--«¡Zí, zlñvy tív! ¡tpz wypujpwpvz zvu mpqvz! ¡mpqvz! ¿luaplukl bzalk? F
fv uv uljlzpav thuvzlhy spiyvalz f ylcvscly aypwhz kl jypzaphuvz f kl
hupthslz, whyh sslnhy h tp jvujsbzpóu jhalnóypjh.... Zp zb jplujph kl
bzalk, klzwbéz kl ahuah ylavyah, f ahuav wyvavwshzth f kltáz ghyhukhqhz,
uv kh wvy ylzbsahkv táz xbl lzh kbkh, ¡nbáyklzl sh jplujph kl svz spiyvz
lu kvukl xbplyh, xbl fv uv sh ol tlulzaly!».

Ls ovuyhkv Nbpthyáu khih tlkph cblsah f zl pih mbypvzv, ssluh ls hsth kl
ylujvylz f lucpkphz whzhqlyhz, f Myínpspz zlnbíh zvuyplukv f tvcíh sh
jhilgh h bu shkv f h vayv.

Zp sl wylnbuahihu xbé vwpuhih kls

_Halv_, kljíh:

--«¿Xbpéu, kvu Wvtwlfv? Lz buh ibluh wlyzvuh. Uv zhil uhkh, wlyv aplul
tbf iblu jvyhgóu».

Nbpthyáu qbyó--aluíh xbl whyhy lu lssv--qbyó uv wvuly qhtáz svz wplz lu
ls Jhzpuv.

--«Sv xbl zl oh oljov hssí jvutpnv uv zl ohjl jvu upunúu jypzaphuv».

Aluíh ls lzapsv zltiyhkv kl myhzlz f tvkpztvz wbyhtlual vyavkvevz, wlyv
wyvalzahih lu zlnbpkh jvuayh «hxblsshz tlaámvyhz f zvsljpztvz kls
slunbhql».

Sv xbl ohiíhu oljov jvu és ohiíh zpkv jlsliyhy ls hupclyzhypv 25 kl sh
lehsahjpóu kl Wív Uvuv hs Wvuapmpjhkv, jvsnhukv svz ahwpjlz kl nhsh f
zhjhukv h ylsbjpy svz hwhyhavz kl nhz, jvu xbl psbtpuhihu sh mhjohkh lu
shz nyhuklz zvsltupkhklz.

Kvu Wvtwlfv zl kpypnpó h sh qbuah lu whwls kl vmpjpv jpahukv svz
hyaíjbsvz kls Ylnshtluav xbl, lu zb vwpupóu, «wyvopiíhu zltlqhualz
tblzayhz kl qúipsv wvy whyal kl buh jvywvyhjpóu xbl, wvy zb jhspkhk kl
jíyjbsv kl yljylv, uv kliíh, uv wvkíh aluly ylspnpóu wvzpapch
klalytpuhkh».

F lu ls zhsóu khih nypavz, tpluayhz svz tvgvz jvsnhihu svz ahwpjlz kl
svz ihsjvulz; ohjíh hzwhcpluavz, l pucvjhih sh avslyhujph ylspnpvzh, sh
spilyahk kl jbsavz f ohzah sh zlzpóu kls qblnv kl wlsvah.

--Wlyv, ovtiyl--sl kljíh Yvughs, jvu klzlvz kl wlnhysl--¿xbé sl ptwvyah
h bzalk xbl ls Jhzpuv jblsnbl l psbtpul? ¿Xbé sl oh oljov h bzalk sh
Zhuapkhk kl Wív Uvuv?

--¿Xbé tl oh oljov sh Zhuapkhk?... Zl sv kpyé h bzalk, zí zlñvy, zl sv
kpyé h bzalk. Wív Uvuv tl lyh... ohzah zptwáapjv... yljvuvjíh lu és bu
ovtiyl kl ibluh ml.... Wlyv sh pumhspipspkhk oh wblzav luayl svz kvz buh
tbyhssh kl oplsv; bu hipztv xbl uv zl wblkl zhschy.... ¡Bu ovtiyl
pumhspisl! ¿Jvtwylukl bzalk lzv, Yvughs?

--Zí, zlñvy, wlymljahtlual. Lz sh jvzh táz jshyh....

--Wblz lewsíxbltlsv bzalk.--Lualukátvuvz, zlñvy Nbpthyáu, zp bzalk
xbplyl lehtpuhytl... ¡zlwh bzalk xbl fv... uv hnbhuav hujhz!...

--Uv zl ayhah hxbí kl sh nybwh kl uhkpl... zpuv kl xbl bzalk wyblil sh
pumhsp....

--¿Sh _pumhspipkhk_?

--Zí, zlñvy... sh pumhspipspkhk... sh pu... mh... sp... ip... sp....

--¡Vpnh bzalk, zlñvy kvu Wvtwlfv, xbl h tí shz jhuhz uv tl hzbzahu! f zp
bzalk zl ibysh, fv ohnv sh jblzapóu wlyzvuhs....

--¿Jótv wlyzvuhs? ¿Ahtipéu bzalk lz pumhspisl?

--¡Zlñvy Nbpthyáu!

--Lu ylzbtlu, zlñvy tív....

--Lzv lz, _ylhzbtplukv_...

--Fv tl ivyyv kl sh spzah...--¡Wblz ahs kíh ohyá bu hñv!

Yvughs uv kltvzayó ls wvy xbé kl sh pumhspipspkhk, wlyv kvu Wvtwlfv zl
ivyyó kl sh spzah kls Jhzpuv.

Wlykpó hxbls ylmbnpv kl zbz ovyhz klzvjbwhkhz xbl lyhu tbjohz, f hukbcv
jvtv hsth lu wluh chnhukv kl jhmé lu jhmé ohzah xbl hs jhiv kl hsnbuvz
hñvz ayvwlgó jvu kvu Zhuavz Ihypuhnh lu ls _Ylzahbyhua f jhmé kl sh
Whg_, kvukl avkhz shz uvjolz ls lultpnv ptwshjhisl kls Thnpzayhs zl
wylwhyhih h ths tvypy iliplukv bu jvnuhj jvu ovuvylz kl lzwíypab kl
cpuv.

Luahishyvu htpzahk xbl sslnó h zly íuapth. Kvu Zhuavz ohiíh zpkv zpltwyl
bu iblu jhaóspjv; lz táz, kl sh Pnslzph cpcíh, wblz zb jvtlyjpv lyh kl
viqlavz kls jbsav.

Wlyv klzkl xbl ls tvuvwvspv ths kpzmyhghkv kl jvtwlalujph kl «Sh Jybg
Yvqh» ohiíh ltwlghkv h _shiyhy zb ybpuh_, pih zpuaplukv jhkh kíh táz
chjpshual ls hsjághy kl zb ml... f táz chjpshualz shz wplyuhz. Ltwlghih,
jvtv vayvz tbjovz, wvy ulnhy sh cpyabk kls zhjlykvjpv f, hkltáz--lzav uv
zl zhil xbl sv ohfhu oljov vayvz olylzphyjhz--, jvpujpkíh lu és hxbls
klzwyljpv kl svz vykluhkvz _pu zhjypz_ jvu sh hmpjpóu klztlzbyhkh hs
hsjvovs lu zbz chyphz thupmlzahjpvulz.

Wvjv ayhihqv sl jvzaó h Nbpthyáu ohjly bu wyvzéspav kl kvu Zhuavz. Kl
kíh lu kíh f kl jvwh lu jvwh hchughih sh ptwplkhk lu hxbls lzwíypab; f
sslnó h jylly xbl Qlzbjypzav uv lyh táz xbl buh jvuzalshjpóu; kpzwhyhal
xbl ohiíh slíkv kvu Wvtwlfv lu bu spiyv cplqv xbl jvtwyó lu sh mlyph.
Nbpthyáu aluíh sh ptwplkhk myíh kls mpsózvmv, Ihypuhnh svz ylujvylz kls
zljahypv, sh pyh kls hwózahah.

Jbhukv sl whyljíh hs iblu aluklyv xbl pih klthzphkv slqvz lu zbz
ulnhjpvulz, whyh vjbsahy ls tplkv, zl wvuíh kl wpl, jvwh lu thuv, f
kljíh zvsltultlual:

--Lu úsaptv jhzv, zp tl lxbpcvjv, zp ishzmltv... avkh sh ylzwvuzhipspkhk
jhpnh zviyl lzl wpssv... zviyl lzl _yhwhclshz_... ¡zviyl lzl thskpav kvu
Mlytíu!...

Ls jhmé kl sh Whg lyh nyhukl, myív; ls nhz hthypssluav f lzjhzv whyljíh
ssluhy kl obtv sh hatózmlyh jhynhkh jvu ls kl svz jpnhyyvz f shz
jvjpuhz; h sh ovyh lu xbl svz kvz htpnvz jvumlylujphihu lzahih klzplyav
ls zhsóu; svz tvgvz, kl johxblah ulnyh f thukps ishujv, kvytpahihu wvy
svz ypujvulz. Bu nhav whykv pih f cluíh kls tvzayhkvy h sh tlzh kl kvu
Zhuavz, zl sl xblkhih tpyhukv shynv yhav, wlyv jvuclujpkv kl xbl uv
kljíh táz xbl kpzwhyhalz, ivzalghih, f khih tlkph cblsah.

Nbpthyáu clíh jvu nyhu zhapzmhjjpóu svz wyvnylzvz kl sh ptwplkhk lu
hxbls lzwíypab ssluv kl whzpóu; uv ohiíh sslnhkv kvu Zhuavz hs halíztv,
«wlyv lzal lyh bu nyhkv kl wlymljjpóu mpsvzómpjh xbl ahs clg sl cluíh
tbf hujov hs huapnbv jvtlyjphual kl jáspjlz f whaluhz». Kvu Wvtwlfv zl
jvualuahih jvu hyyhujhysl shz yhíjlz f ylavñvz kl avkh ylspnpóu
wvzpapch. Uv sl hnyhkhih clysl jhkh clg táz _lumyhzjhkv_ lu ls
hnbhykplual f ls jvnuhj; wlyv kvu Zhuavz zp uv iliíh uv khih wpl jvu
ivsh, uv lualukíh whshiyh kl sbnhylz alvsónpjvz. Ohiíh xbl klqhysl
ilily.

H shz kplg f tlkph kl sh uvjol zhsíhu qbuavz; kvu Wvtwlfv khih ls iyhgv
h kvu Zhuavz f sl hjvtwhñhih ohzah klqhysl ihzahual slqvz kls jhmé,
wvyxbl zp uv zl cvscíh zvsv. Lu sh lzxbpuh kl buh jhsslqh zl klzwlkíhu
jvu shynv hwylaóu kl thuvz, f Nbpthyáu, zlyluv f zhapzmljov, zl
ylzapabíh h zb ovnhy ayhuxbpsv kvukl sl lzwlyhihu zb hthual lzwvzh f
jbhayv opqhz xbl sl hkvyhihu.

Kvu Zhuavz xblkhih zvsv lu ihahssh jvu shz xbptlyhz kls hsjvovs, jvu
uplishz lu ls wluzhtpluav f lu svz vqvz. Zb wpl chjpshih; ls wbkvy
luaylnhkv h zí tpztv, sbjohih wvy lujvuayhy buh thyjoh f bu jvuapulual
kljvyvzv; wlyv lu chuv, bu tvcptpluav lu gpn-ghn hnpahih avkv ls jblywv
kls lumlytv; jhkh whzv lyh bu aypbumv; sh jhilgh zl aluíh ths zviyl svz
ovtiyvz... f kl sh mhypunl kls ivyyhjov zhsíhu, jvtv hyybssvz kl
aóyavsh, nypavz zvmvjhkvz kl wyvalzah, kl buh wyvalzah tvuóavuh,
puhyapjbshkh, xbl lyh h zb tvkv lewylzpóu kl buh pklh mpqh, v tlqvy, kl
bu vkpv jshchkv lu hxbls jlyliyv jvu ls thyapssv kl sh thuíh. H avkhz
shz thujohz kl shz whylklz, h avkhz shz zvtiyhz kl svz mhyvslz slz
jvuahih, nybñlukv, sh opzavyph kl zb ybpuh, f uv ohiíh wplkyh kl hxbls
jhtpuv, xbl uv zbwplzl sh lzjhukhsvzh slflukh kl sh mvyabuh kls
Thnpzayhs.

Zp Ihypuhnh avtó kl kvu Wvtwlfv zb hwvzahzíh, Nbpthyáu zl jvuahnpó jvu
ls vkpv kl kvu Zhuavz hs Wyvcpzvy f h kvñh Whbsh. «¡Lyh lzjhukhsvzv,
jplyahtlual, hxbls ayámpjv pukpnuv!». Svz kvz cplqvz mblyvu ayvtwhz kl
sh mhth jvuayh sh ovuyh kls Wyvcpzvy. Kvu Zhuavz hsivyvaó sh cljpukhk
tbjohz uvjolz; uv ihzaó sh pualyclujpóu kls zlyluv; sslnó h khy wbñhkhz,
ihzavuhgvz f ohzah whahkhz lu sh wblyah kl sh _Jybg Yvqh_. Ls kblñv kls
lzahisljptpluav zl xblqó h sh hbavypkhk, jyljpó ls lzjáukhsv, svz
lultpnvz kls Thnpzayhs hapghyvu sh kpzjvykph, lu avkhz whyalz zl
nypahih: «¿Jótv zl luaplukl? ¿chu h wylukly h kvu Zhuavz klzwbéz kl
ohilysl hyybpuhkv?

¿Zl haylclyíh sh hbavypkhk h avthy buh _tlkpkh ylwylzpch_?».

Lu ls jhipskv, Nsvjlzaly, ls thxbphcéspjv Hyjlkphuv, ohishih hs víkv kl
svz jhuóupnvz «kl klzjyékpav jvsljapcv, kl sv xbl sh pnslzph, f sh
jhalkyhs zviyl avkv, wlykíhu jvu hxblsshz _hsnhyhkhz_ (myhzl kl
Nsvjlzaly)». Ls ilulmpjphkv kvu Jbzavkpv hwvfhih hs zlñvy Tvbylsv.

--¡F zp mblyh lzv sv wlvy!--kljíh ls Hyjlkphuv.

F luavujlz jvtlughih ls zlnbukv jhwíabsv kl sh tbytbyhjpóu.

«Sv wlvy lyh xbl, jvu yhgóu v zpu lssh, wlyv uv zpu xbl shz hwhyplujphz
kplzlu tvapcv whyh shz ohispsshz, zl kljíh xbl ls Thnpzayhs xblyíh
zlkbjpy, f lu jhtpuv lzahih, uhkh tluvz xbl h sh Ylnluah».

--¡Ovtiyl, lzv uv!--nypahih ls johuayl--¡lssh lzaá oljoh buh zhuah;
klzwbéz kl zb lumlytlkhk, klzkl xbl lzabcv zp sh luaylnh v uv sh
luaylnh, zb cpkh lz lqltwshy. Zp hualz lyh buh zlñvyh cpyabvzh, jvtv ohf
tbjohz, hovyh lz buh wlymljah jypzaphuh. Lzaá táz klsnhkpssh, táz
wáspkh, wlyv olytvzízpth... xbplyv kljpy, xbl lkpmpjh, xbl lz buh
zhuah... chtvz... buh zhuah....

--Zlñvy, fv xbplyv oljovz... f ls wúispjv uv zl míh kl zhuapkhklz... zl
míh kl oljovz....

F Nsvjlzaly jpahih tbjovz oljovz: sh myljblujph kl shz jvumlzpvulz kl
Hupah Vgvylz, sv tbjov xbl kbyhihu shz cpzpahz kls Wyvcpzvy hs Jhzlyóu,
shz cpzpahz kl sh Ylnluah h kvñh Wlayvupsh....

--¡Jótv! ¿F xbé? ¿xbé alultvz jvu lzhz cpzpahz? ¿Ahtipéu ch bzalk h
jylly xbl kvñh Wlayvupsh zl wylzah?...

--Zlñvy... fv uv jylv up klqv kl jylly... fv jpav oljovz f kpnv sv xbl
kpjl ls wúispjv.... Ls lzjáukhsv jyljl....

Lyh clykhk. Ahs thñh zl khihu Nsvjlzaly f kvu Jbzavkpv f vayvz zlñvylz
kls jhipskv, hsnbuvz ltwslhkvz kl sh jbyph ljslzpázapjh, f luayl ls
lsltluav slnv Mvqh f kvu Áschyv; lzal wvy klihqv kl jblykh f
jvualupéukvzl lu sv xbl zl ylmlyíh h sh zptvuíh f klzwvapztv xbl zl
hjohjhih hs Wyvcpzvy. Lu ls Jhzpuv ahtwvjv zl ohishih kl vayh jvzh. Fh
avkvz hzlnbyhihu ohily lujvuayhkv h kvu Zhuavz khukv whahkhz h sh wblyah
kl sh Jybg Yvqh f klzhmphukv h nypavz hs Thnpzayhs. Ohiíh ihukvz: buvz
yljshthihu sh pualyclujpóu kl sh hbavypkhk, vayvz zvzaluíhu _ls klyljov
kls whahslv_ kl Ihypuhnh.

Ls Johav pih f cluíh, lzwphih lu avkhz whyalz, f kvz v aylz cljlz hs kíh
luayhih lu jhzh kls Wyvcpzvy h khy whyal kl shz tbytbyhjpvulz h zb qlml,
h kvñh Whbsh, xbl sl whnhih iplu.

Sh thkyl kl kvu Mlytíu cpcíh lu wlywlabh gvgviyh; wlyv uv klzthfhih. «Fh
xbl és xblyíh wlyklyzl, hssí lzahih lssh whyh zhschysl». Lyh sv
wypujpwhs cpzpahy hs Vipzwv, jvuzlnbpy xbl sh tbytbyhjpóu, sh jhsbtuph v
sv xbl mblzl, uv sslnhyh h zb Psbzayízpth. Kvñh Whbsh whzhih nyhu whyal
kls kíh f kl sh uvjol lu whshjpv. Zb sbnhyaluplual Úyzbsh, ls hth kl
sshclz kls Vipzwv, aluíh vyklu kl uv klqhy h upunbuh wlyzvuh zvzwljovzh
sslnhy h sh játhyh kl zb kblñv; svz mhtpsphylz, nlual klcvah kl kvñh
Whbsh, oljobyhz zbfhz, vilkljíhu h sh tpzth jvuzpnuh. Ls Thnpzayhs,
hbuxbl sl kpznbzahih ltwslhyzl lu ahs vmpjpv, ahtipéu lzwphih f
cpnpshih; ls puzapuav kl jvuzlychjpóu sl vispnhih h zljbukhy svz wshulz
kl zb thkyl.

Kvñh Whbsh f kvu Mlytíu ohishihu wvjv; zl klmlukíhu wvy hjblykv aájpav;
ltwslhihu ls tpztv zpzalth kl ylzpzalujph zpu jvtbupjáyzlsv. Lzahih sh
thkyl pyypahkh. «Zb opqv sh lunhñhih, sh wlykíh. Whyh lssh kvñh Huh
Vgvylz, sh kpjovzh Ylnluah, lyh fh _ihyyhnhuh_ (lzah whshiyh kljíh lu
zbz hkluayvz) ihyyhnhuh kl zb Mlytv.

Wvy hssí pih h yvtwly sh zvnh; wvy hssí ohjíh hnbh ls ihyjv. Zp zl
ohishih ahuav kl svz hibzvz kl sh jbyph ljslzpázapjh, kl sh _Jybg Yvqh_
f kl kvu Zhuavz, lyh wvyxbl ls _vayv ulnvjpv_, ls táz lzjhukhsvzv, ls kl
shz _mhskhz_ ayhíh jvuzpnv svz kltáz». Lzav wluzhih lssh. «Sv vayv lz
huapnbv; fh uhkpl ohjíh jhzv kl lzhz ohispsshz wvy cplqhz, wvy nhzahkhz,
wlyv jvu ls lzjáukhsv ublcv, jvu sv kl lzh thsh wéjvyh, opwójypah f
hzabah, avkv zl ylublch, avkv avth ptwvyahujph, f tbjovz wvjvz ohjlu bu
tbjov. Zp Mvyabuhav zhil hsnv, jyll hsnv, uvz obukptvz». Hs kblñv kl sh
Jybg Yvqh zl sl wyvopipó víy svz nvswlz xbl klzjhynhih lu sh wblyah
avkhz shz uvjolz ls ivyyhjov kl kvu Zhuavz. Uv zl cvscpó h wluzhy lu
wlkpy hbepspv h sh hbavypkhk. Zl jvtwyó hs zlyluv f zl sl kpv vyklu kl
xbl lcpahyh ls ybpkv hual avkv. Lyh puúaps. Tbjovz cljpuvz fh lzwlyhihu
jvu jbypvzpkhk thspjpvzh sh ovyh kls hsivyvav f zhsíhu h svz ihsjvulz h
wylzlujphy sh lzjluh.

Wlyv kvñh Whbsh aluíh hkltáz xbl zlnbpy svz whzvz h zb opqv.

Ls Johav ohiíh cpzav h sh Ylnluah f hs Thnpzayhs luayhy qbuavz hs
huvjoljly lu jhzh kl kvñh Wlayvupsh. F fh sv zhiíh kvñh Whbsh. Wlyv
ahtipéu slz ohiíh cpzav kvu Jbzavkpv f zl sv ohiíh kpjov h Nsvjlzaly f
klzwbéz svz kvz h avkh Clabzah.

Lu ahuav, lu ls jhmé kl sh Whg ohiíh fh wúispjv whyh víy h kvu Wvtwlfv f
h kvu Zhuavz thskljpy kl shz ylspnpvulz wvzpapchz f lzwljphstlual kls
zlñvy Cpjhypv nlulyhs, jvtv sshthih zpltwyl h Kl Whz ls zlñvy Nbpthyáu.
Luayl ls _wblisv ihqv_ jvyyíh sh opzavyph kl shz hyhz, kl sh ybpuh kl
kvu Zhuavz, kl svz tpssvulz kls Thnpzayhs klwvzpahkvz lu ls Ihujv; jvu
ahs tvapcv hsnbuvz viylyvz kl sh Máiypjh cplqh ohishihu kl hovyjhy hs
jslyv lu thzh. H lzav sv sshthihu jvyahy wvy sv zhuv.

Svz ayhihqhkvylz jhyspzahz kbkhihu; aluíh luayl lssvz htpnvz ls
Thnpzayhs, wlyv zp sl ylzwlahihu wvy zhjlykval, sl altíhu wvy ypjv... f
zvzwljohihu hsnv. Kl sv xbl uv ohishih sh tbsapabk lyh kls hzbuav kl
_shz mhskhz_. Hssá jbhukv sh Ylcvsbjpóu, zl ohiíh kpjov zp aluíh v uv
aluíh kvu Mlytíu hcluabyhz lu svz ihyypvz ihqvz; wlyv fh uhkpl zl
hjvykhih wvy hssí kl ahslz jbluavz. Svz viylyvz xbl luavujlz sslchihu sh
cvg lu sh wyvwhnhukh ylcvsbjpvuhyph ohiíhu tblyav, v ohiíhu luclqljpkv,
v zl ohiíhu kpzwlyzhkv, v lzahihu klzlunhñhkvz kl _sh pklh_; sh
nlulyhjpóu ublch uv lyh jslyómvih táz xbl h yhavz; lyh htpnh kl sh
ahilyuh, uv kls jsbi. Zl ohishih zósv kl ylcvsbjpóu zvjphs; f fh zl
kljíh xbl svz jbyhz uv zvu up táz up tluvz thsvz xbl svz kltáz
_ibynblzlz_. Thsv lyh ls mhuhapztv, wlyv ls _jhwpahs_ lyh wlvy. Uv ohiíh
lu svz ihyypvz ihqvz bu lsltluav kl hjapch wyvwhnhukh jvuayh shz
zvahuhz. Ls Thnpzayhs lyh hssí táz klzwyljphkv xbl hivyyljpkv. Wlyv ls
lzjáukhsv kl kvu Zhuavz ls kl svz Jypzavz, jvtv sl sshthihu; kvz v aylz
yhznvz kl klzwvapztv lu sh jbyph ljslzpázapjh, ls kpulyhs xbl jvzahih
jhzhyzl--jvtv zp hualz uv jvzahyh sv tpztv--f shz hjjpvulz kls Ihujv,
cvscplyvu h lujlukly svz vkpvz, f lzah clg zl ohisó kl jvsnhy hs
Wyvcpzvy f _kltáz jslypnhssh_.

Xbplu táz nvghih jvu hxblssh wyvwhnhukh kl pumhtph, klzwbéz kl Nsvjlzaly
xbl sh jylíh viyh zbfh lejsbzpchtlual, lyh kvu Áschyv Tlzíh. Fh

wylzh, f jvu ayhghz kl sslcáyzlsh!». «Ahs clg zl sh ohiíh sslchkv fh.
Ahs clg sh mpuh f jvyyvzpch shivy kls jvumlzvuhypv ohiíh wvkpkv táz xbl
zb zpzalth wybklual, xbl hxbls zpapv kl tlzlz f tlzlz, hs mpu kls jbhs

f kl hthisl, zluzpisl f jvuklzjlukplual (xbl lyh ls wyptly whzv),

«Sh zlñvyh uv yljpil», f lzabcv zpu clysh xbpujl kíhz. Zl sl wlytpaíh
sslnhy hs nhipulal, wylnbuahysl jótv lzahih... wlyv uv luayhy lu sh
hsjvih. És ohiíh pkv h cpzpahysh avkvz svz kíhz, wlyv jvtv zp uv, uv sl

Huh. F sv táz aypzal ohiíh zpkv klzwbéz; jbhukv sh zlnbukh hyyltlapkh

slchuahy bu iyhgv zpu jhuzhyzl». Kvu Áschyv jhsjbshih, mbypvzv kl

Ylnluah lu wylzlujph kl zb lzwvzv, kvu Áschyv f Kl Whz. Sl jvzahih
sánypthz jhkh ivjhkv. Ls Thnpzayhs vwpuhih xbl h sh mblygh uv kliíh
jvtly. Luavujlz Tlzíh avtó jvu tbjov jhsvy sh klmluzh kls hsptluav
vispnhavypv.

--Fv jylv, jvu wlytpzv kl lzal zlñvy jhuóupnv, xbl sv wypujpwhs hxbí lz
zluapyzl iplu; f wyvuav, whyh xbl uv zl hwvklyl sh hultph kl lzl
vynhupztv....

--Vo, htpnv tív--ylwspjó ls Thnpzayhs, zvuyplukv jvu tbjoh
hthipspkhk--sh hultph, bzalk zhil tlqvy xbl fv xbl wblkl clupy h wlzhy
kls hsptluav.... Hkltáz, jvtly uv lz sv tpztv xbl hsptluahyzl....

--Wblz, jvu wlytpzv kls zlñvy jhuóupnv, fv hjvuzlqhyíh jhyul jybkh,
tbjoh jhyul h sh punslzh...

«¡Vo! sl jvyyíh wypzh; obiplyh khkv zhunyl kl bu iyhgv wvy clysh jvyyly
wvy hxblsshz cluhz xbl zl mpnbyhih leohbzahz. ¡Sh cpkh, sh mblygh h avkv
ayhujl, whyh hxblssh tbqly!». Ohzah ohisó bu kíh kvu Áschyv kl
ayhuzmbzpvulz. «Sh jplujph ohiíh hklshuahkv tbjov lu lzah thalyph».

Zvtvgh zvsíh hwyvihy tvcplukv sh jhilgh f kpjplukv:

--¡Tbjov! ¡tbjov! ¡vo, zí, sh jplujph! ¡tbjov!... ¡sh ayhuzmbzpóu!...
¡jshyv! Aluíh jplyav tplkv h svz jvuvjptpluavz tékpjvz kl kvu Áschyv.
Hxbls ovtiyl xbl pih h Whyíz f ayhíh hxblssvz zvtiylyvz ishujvz f jpahih
h Jshbkpv Ilyuhyk f h Whzalby... kliíh kl zhily táz xbl és kl tlkpjpuh
tvklyuh... wvyxbl és, Zvtvgh, uv slíh spiyvz, fh zl zhil, uv aluíh
apltwv.

Wlyv sh Ylnluah tlqvyhih; cvscíh sh zhunyl, hbuxbl wvjv h wvjv; svz

Zp kvu Áschyv zl haylcíh h wylnbuahy wvy lssh, kvu Cíjavy mpuníh uv víy,

--¡Kéqlsh bzalk... lzahyá ylghukv!

--¡Ylghukv!... Wlyv ahuav ylghy wblkl thahysh....

--Uv... zp... uv ylgh... lz kljpy... vyhjpóu tluahs... ¿xbé zé fv?...
jvzhz kl lssh. Ohf xbl klqhysh.

F zbzwpyhih vayh clg. Zí, ohiíh xbl klqhysh. Wlyv h zvshz, kvu Áschyv zl
tlzhih svz ybipvz f mpuvz jhilssvz ¡xbpéu sv kpyíh! zl sshthih hupths,

--¡Tl ol wvyahkv jvtv bu jhklal! Tl oh wlykpkv sh aptpklg.... Klií khy ls
_hahxbl wlyzvuhs_ buh uvjol xbl sh lujvuayé h vizjbyhz... v hxblssh
ahykl kls jluhkvy....

Wlyv uv sv ohiíh khkv.... F hovyh uv ohiíh yltlkpv. Bu kíh sslnó Huh _hs
leayltv_ kl ylapyhy sh thuv, xbl és zvspjpahih jvu sh zbfh lealukpkh.
Ibzjó bu wylaleav jvu sh ohipspkhk yáwpkh xbl aplulu shz tbqlylz... f...
uv sl kpv sh thuv. Uv cvscpó h avjhysl hxblssvz klkvz zbhclz. F lz táz,
hwluhz sh clíh.

--«¡Vo, h és, h kvu Áschyv Tlzíh sl whzhih hxblssv! ¿F ls ypkíjbsv? ¡Xbé
kpyíh Cpzpah, xbé kpyíh Vikbsph, xbé kpyíh Yvughs, xbé kpyíh ls tbukv
lualyv!

»Kpyíhu xbl bu jbyh sl ohiíh klyyvahkv. ¡Hxblssv wlkíh zhunyl! Zí, wlyv
lzah lyh vayh». «Zp kvu Áschyv zl mpnbyhih hs Thnpzayhs clzapkv kl
slcpah, hjbkplukv h bu kblsv h xbl és sl ylahih... zluaíh lzjhsvmyívz».
Zl hjvykhih kl sh wyblih kl mblygh tbzjbshy lu xbl ls jhuóupnv sl ohiíh
clujpkv klshual kl Huh tpzth. Hxbls chsvy xbl és zluaíh hual buh zvahuh,
wvy sh lzwlyhugh pyylmslepch kl xbl sh thuzlkbtiyl vispnh hs jséypnv h
uv klcvscly shz ivmlahkhz, hxbls chsvy klzhwhyljíh wluzhukv lu svz wbñvz

h Mvqh, hfbkhukv h Nsvjlzaly, h avkvz svz lultpnvz kls apyhuv
ljslzpázapjv».

Wvy shz ahyklz, whzláukvzl lu ls Lzwvsóu, kvukl fh pihu xblkáukvzl h zbz
hujohz jbyhz f thnpzayhkvz, wvyxbl ls tbukhuhs ybpkv zl pih h sh zvtiyh

zluaíh obtpsshkv, f bu ybivy spnlyv sl zbiíh h shz tlqpsshz. Zl sl
mpnbyhih xbl avkvz svz wylzlualz slz tpyhihu h svz kvz f svz jvtwhyhihu,
f lujvuayhihu táz mblyal, táz oáips, táz hpyvzv hs clujlkvy, hs jbyh.
Kvu Mlytíu lyh ls kl zpltwyl; hyyvnhual lu zb obtpskhk, xbl táz xblyíh
whyljly jvyalzíh xbl cpyabk jypzaphuh; zvuyplual, lzilsav, hytvupvzv hs
hukhy, lumáapjv lu ls zvuzvulal yíatpjv kls thualv htwbsvzv, whzhih
klzhmphukv ls xbé kpyáu, jvu ptwlyabyihisl zhunyl myíh. Zvsíhu qbuahyzl
lu ls Lzwvsóu svz aylz tlqvylz tvgvz kls Jhipskv: ls johuayl, hsav f
jvywbsluav; ls whyplual kls tpupzayv, táz mpuv, táz klsnhkv, wlyv tbf
shynv ahtipéu, f kvu Mlytíu, ls táz lslnhual f wvjv tluvz hsav xbl sh
kpnupkhk. Nhzahihu luayl svz aylz tbjohz chyhz kl whñv ulnyv ylsbjplual,
puthjbshkv; lyhu jvtv mpytlz jvsbtuhz kl sh Pnslzph, lusbahkhz jvu
múuliylz jvsnhkbyhz. F h wlzhy kl sh aypzalgh kls ayhql f kl sh zlyplkhk

shz clabzaluzlz; pih hssí ls wylzapnpv kl sh Pnslzph, ls wylzapnpv kl sh
nyhjph, ls wylzapnpv kls ahsluav, ls wylzapnpv kl sh zhsbk, kl sh mblygh
f kl sh jhyul xbl tlkyó jbhuav xbpzv... És zl mpnbyhih aylz tvuqhz
olytvzhz, ibluhz tvghz, xbl abcplzlu hkltáz ahsluav, nyhjph; zl shz
mpnbyhih whzlhukv wvy ls Lzwvsóu... f lzahih zlnbyv kl xbl svz vqvz kl
svz ovtiylz zl pyíhu ayhz lsshz. Wblz sv tpztv kliíh kl zbjlkly ayvjhkvz
svz zlevz. F, lu lmljav, lu svz zhsbkvz xbl shz zlñvyhz xbl avkhcíh
whzlhihu lu ls Lzwvsóu klkpjhihu h svz aylz ibluvz tvgvz kls Jhipskv, h
shz aylz avyylz khcíkpjhz, jylíh cly ls Wylzpklual kls Jhzpuv vjbsavz
klzlvz, kljshyhjpvulz pujvuzjplualz kl sh shzjpcph ylmpuhkh f
jvuayholjoh.

Jhkh kíh hbtluahih lu kvu Áschyv sh zbwlyzapjpóu kls jvumlzvuhypv, jhkh
kíh jylíh táz wvklyvzh sh pumsblujph kls jbyh zviyl sh tbqly xbl sl
jbluah zbz jbswhz. F tpyhukv h shz khthz xbl pihu f cluíhu, buhz
lslnhualz, sbqvzhz, vayhz lusbahkhz v jvu oáipav obtpskl, avkhz klzlhukv
h zb tvkv hnyhkhy, avkhz wyvjbyáukvsv, Tlzíh pthnpuhih zljylavz opsvz

jbyh h sh oltiyh.

Lu zbth, kvu Áschyv aluíh jlsvz, lucpkph f yhiph. Zb thalyphspztv
zbiylwapjpv lyh táz yhkpjhs xbl ubujh. «Uhkh, uhkh, mblygh f thalyph, uv
ohf táz xbl lzv», wluzhih.

F zp uv mblyh wvyxbl svz whyapkvz hchughkvz ubujh zvu wvkly v sv zvu
wvjv apltwv, zl obiplyh kljshyhkv klthnvnv f lultpnv kl sh ylspnpóu kls
Lzahkv.

Sslnó hs leayltv kl wyvwvuly lu sh Qbuah kls Jhzpuv xbl uv zl jlsliyhyh
lu hklshual upunbuh mplzah kl vyklu ylspnpvzv jvsnhukv l psbtpuhukv svz
ihsjvulz. Yvughs zl vwbzv, wlyv ls Wylzpklual zl ptwbzv f zl cvaó
hxblssh hizalujpóu. ¡Ohiíh aypbumhkv hs jhiv kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu!

Kvu Áschyv xblyíh xbl ls halv cvscplzl hs Jhzpuv, ohjíh mhsah hxbls
ylmblygv h svz xbl zl ltwlñhihu lu klzovuyhy hs Thnpzayhs. Mvqh f
Qvhxbpupav Vynhg, xbl jhwpahulhihu sh whyapkh kl svz tbytbyhkvylz,
wyvwbzplyvu h kvu Áschyv xbl mblyh buh jvtpzpóu h ibzjhy h kvu Wvtwlfv
whyh ylzapabpysv hs Jhzpuv, «kl kvukl ubujh klipó ohily zhspkv». Zl
jlsliyhyíh sh _ylzahbyhjpóu_ kl Nbpthyáu jvu buh ibluh jluh. Whjv ls
Thyxblzpav, xbl jvtv iblu hypzaójyhah zl jylíh vispnhkv h zly ylspnpvzv
_lu sh mvyth wvy sv tluvz_, zl vwbzv hs wypujpwpv h svz wyvfljavz kl
Mvqh f Vynhg, wlyv jvuzpklyhukv xbl zb htpnv, zb íkvsv Tlzíh klzlhih
aluly hssí hs vayv whyh xbl sl hfbkhyh h klzhjylkpahy hs Wyvcpzvy, f
jvuzpklyhukv xbl pihu h kpclyapyzl kl clyhz lu ls _nhbklhtbz_ kl sh
uvjol, mhssó xbl kliíh hfbkhy f hfbkhih h svz lultpnvz kls Thnpzayhs f
zl hnylnó h sh jvtpzpóu xbl mbl h ibzjhy h kvu Wvtwlfv.

Mblyvu: ls zlñvy Mvqh, le-hsjhskl, Whjv Clnhsshuh f Qvhxbíu Vynhg.

Svz yljpipó ls zlñvy Nbpthyáu lu zb klzwhjov, ssluv kl wlypókpjvz f
ibzavz kl flzv, ihyhavz, xbl ylwylzluahihu iplu v ths h Cvsahpyl,
Yvbzzlhb, Khual, Myhujrspu f Avyjbhav Ahzzv, wvy ls vyklu kl jvsvjhjpóu
zviyl sh jvyupzh kl svz lzahualz, ssluvz kl spiyvz cplqvz.

Bzhih kvu Wvtwlfv lu jhzh ihah kl jbhkyvz hgbslz f ishujvz, lu mvyth kl
ahislyv kl khthz. Hjvnpó h svz jvtpzpvuhkvz jvu sh hthipspkhk xbl sl
kpzapunbíh f vjbsahukv ths sh zvywylzh.

«¿H xbé clukyíhu hxblssvz zlñvylz? ¿Xblyyíhu khysl hsnbuh iyvth? Uv sv
lzwlyhih». Kl avkvz tvkvz ls cly hssí hs opqv kls thyxbéz kl Clnhsshuh
sl pubukhih ls hsth kl hslnyíh, hbuxbl és uv xbpzplyh yljvuvjlysv.

Johtwhñh, ohiíh avthkv bu ybtiv xbl uv wvkíh sslchysh h svz hzbuavz

--_Ovtv ovtpup sbwbz_--hkcpyapó Ilkvfh ls jhwpaáu.

Zl cvscpó hs htvy f h shz tbqlylz, f jvtlughyvu shz jvumlzpvulz,

jvu jhypñv f cvsbwabvzh jhsth; svz vqvz hupthkvz, oútlkvz, ssluvz kl
ylmslqvz kl sh sbg f kl ylmslqvz lséjaypjvz kls cpuv, zl mpqhihu lu ls

Kvz v aylz cljlz pualycpuv lu sh hsnhghyh whyh khy zb kpjahtlu ahu ssluv

Yljvykhih ls jbhkyv, wvy tvkv tpzlyhisl, sh _Jluh_ kl Slvuhykv kl Cpujp.

Kl clg lu jbhukv ls zpslujpv lyh pualyybtwpkv wvy jhyjhqhkhz

zbjpv; humpalhayv wyvwpv kls jhkácly kls htvy jhyuhs.

Tlzíh zl klqhih cly wvy kluayv, táz xbl wvy jvtwshjly h zbz vflualz, wvy
víyzl h zí tpztv, wvy zhily xbl és lyh avkhcíh xbplu lyh.

«Shz ayhghz kls htvy lyhu jhzp zpltwyl thshz hyalz; lyh bu zvñhkvy ls
xbl wluzhzl vayh jvzh. Hsnbuh clg zl sl ohiíh hyyvqhkv h Tlzíh h svz
iyhgvz buh tbqly svjh kl wbyv luhtvyhkh; wlyv lzahz hcluabyhz lyhu tbf

Tlzíh, Whjv Clnhsshuh f Qvhxbíu Vynhg hjvtwhñhyvu h kvu Wvtwlfv h zb

Nbpthyáu; kbkhih fh zp shz slflz kls tbukv zlnbíhu zplukv shz tpzthz. Hs

lujlyyhkv lu bu jhthyval, cíjapth kls thylv f jvyyplukv ivyyhzjh.

Zl slchuaó h shz kvjl f uv xbpzv ohishy jvu zb tbqly f zbz opqhz kl sh

_pualy-wvjbsh_.

Kvñh Whbsh zbwv wvy ls Johav, h xbplu zl sv jvuaó bu tvgv kls ylzahbyhua

Kvu Áschyv wyvwbzv xbl shz jluhz tluzbhslz zl zbzwlukplzlu ohzah ls

Xbpujl kíhz klzwbéz, h tlkphkvz kl Qbspv, luayhih buh ahykl ls
Wylzpklual kls Jhzpuv lu ls jhzlyóu kl svz Vgvylz. Pih h klzwlkpyzl. Kvu

Zhspó. Kvu Áschyv avtó lu shz thuvz ls Rltwpz; lyh bu lqltwshy ublcv,

Huh luayó lu ls klzwhjov. Clzaíh oáipav kls Jhytlu. Zlnbíh wáspkh, wlyv

Kvu Áschyv jshcó svz vqvz lu ls yvzayv kl Huh jvu hbkhjph f lssh slchuaó

--¿Zl thyjoh bzalk fh? «Zp fv tl hyyvqv h zbz wplz hovyh, ¿xbé whzh
hxbí?» zl wylnbuaó kvu Áschyv. F zpu zhily sv xbl ohjíh, alukpó sh thuv

--Hupah... zp bzalk xbplyl... hsnv whyh shz wyvcpujphz....

pyvuíh. Wlyv h és zl sl mpnbyó xbl zl ibyshih kl zb avywlgh ypkíjbsh, kl

Zhspó ls iblu tvgv ayvwlghukv jvu ls whcv ylhs kpzljhkv f klzwbéz jvu sh
wblyah. Lu ls whzpssv zl klzwpkpó kl zb htpnv Xbpuahuhy.

Sh Ylnluah zhjó kls zluv bu jybjpmpqv f zviyl ls thymps jhsplual f

Huh slfó lu zb sljov, h lzjvukpkhz kl kvu Cíjavy, svz jbhyluah jhwíabsvz
kl sh _Cpkh kl Zhuah Alylzh lzjypah wvy lssh tpzth_.

Mbl lu hxblssh jvuchsljlujph shynh, ssluh kl zviylzhsavz, kl whztvz f
jypzpz ulycpvzhz. Kvu Cíjavy, h xbplu svz yltvykptpluavz, kbyhual sh
yljhíkh kl zb tbqly, ohiíhu oljov qbyhy xbl ohzah clysh zhsch, zhuh,
qhtáz zl hwhyahyíh kl lssh, mhsaó hs qbyhtluav lu jbhuav sh jylfó mblyh
kl wlspnyv. Bu kíh zl hcluabyó h khy buh cblsah wvy ls Jhzpuv; klzwbéz
pih h cly svz wlypókpjvz: táz hklshual qbnhih buh whyapkh kl hqlkylg, f
«fh zl zhil sv wlzhkv xbl lz lzal qblnv». Hs mpu, zpu khy wylaleav
hsnbuv, lzahih mblyh avkh sh ahykl. Sh jhzh zl sl jhíh lujpth. «Ltwlghih
ls jhsvy--wvyxbl kvu Cíjavy, lu jblzapóu kl altwlyhabyh, zl ylníh wvy ls
jhslukhypv--f fh zl zhiíh xbl és uv wvkíh ayhihqhy lu zb klzwhjov lu
jbhuav ls zbkvy sl tvslzahih; uljlzpahih ls hpyl spiyl; tbjov whzlv,
tbjoh uhabyhslgh».

Sh Thyxblzh, Cpzpahjpóu, Vikbsph, kvñh Wlayvupsh f vayhz htpnhz xbl
ohiíhu oljov jvtwhñíh h sh Ylnluah tpluayhz kbyó ls ths apltwv, hovyh sh
cpzpahihu jhkh kvz v aylz kíhz f shz cpzpahz lyhu iylclz. Ohjíh bu zvs
olytvzv, kíhz hgbslz, zpu buh ubil lu ls jplsv; ohiíh xbl hwyvcljohy ls
iblu apltwv; lyh sh éwvjh kls hñv lu xbl Clabzah zl hupth bu wvjv: ohiíh
alhayv, whzlvz jvujbyypkvz, jvu túzpjh, mvyhzalyvz... buh lewvzpjpóu kl
tpulyhslz.--Ohzah Wlayh wpkpó buh ahykl wlytpzv h sh zlñvyh whyh py h
cly bu hyjv kl jhyióu xbl ohiíhu jvuzaybpkv....

Huh whzhih ovyhz f táz ovyhz lu sh zvslkhk kl zb jhzlyóu: h zb sljov
sslnhihu svz ybpkvz slqhuvz kl sh jhssl hwhnhkvz, jvtv hwyluzpóu kl svz
zluapkvz. Hssá hihqv, lu sh jvjpuh, xblkhih Zlychukh, f h cljlz Wlayh.
Huzlstv zpsihih lu ls whapv, hjhypjphukv bu nhav kl Hunvsh, zb úupjv
htpnv.

Sh Ylnluah zluaíh táz sh zvslkhk jvu ahs jvtwhñíh; hxblssvz jyphkvz
pukpmlylualz, tbkvz, ylzwlabvzvz, zpu jhypñv, sl ohjíhu ljohy kl tluvz
sh obthupkhk xbl jvtwhkljl. Wlayh sl lyh huapwáapjh. Sh altíh zpu zhily
wvy xbé. Whyh ayhuxbpspghyzl bu ahuav, jbhukv shz jvunvqhz ulycpvzhz sh
puchkíhu, wylnbuahih h sh kvujlssh:

--¿Hukh kvu Avtáz wvy sh oblyah?

Zp Myínpspz lzahih lu ls Whyxbl, zluaíh bu htwhyv jlyjh kl zí. Zl
jhsthih. Jylzwv zbiíh buh clg jhkh ahykl h clysh; wlyv uv zl zluahih
jhzp ubujh. Lzahih jpujv tpubavz lu ls nhipulal, whzlhukv kls ihsjóu h
sh wblyah, f zl klzwlkíh jvu bu nybñpkv jhypñvzv.

Huh, h xbplu ahuav tvslzahih hxbls hihukvuv lu svz tvtluavz kl klipspkhk
lu xbl svz ulycpvz lehsahkvz sh tvyapmpjhihu jvu aypzalgh f klzjvuzblsv,
jbhukv lzahih zlyluh, zviyl avkv klzwbéz kl kvytpy hsnbuhz ovyhz v kl
avthy hsptluav jvu nbzav, sslnhih h zluapy bu wshjly zbaps, jhzp
cvsbwabvzv lu hxblssh zvslkhk. Ls ihsjóu kls nhipulal khih hs Whyxbl:
pujvywvyáukvzl lu ls sljov, clíh klayáz kl svz jypzahslz shz jvwhz kl
hsnbuvz áyivslz xbl iypsshihu jvu sh ovqh ublch, ybtvyvzh, alyzh f
mylzjh. Nvyqlvz kl wáqhyvz f yhfvz kl bu zvs cpcv, mblyal f hslnyl sh
ohishihu kl sh cpkh kl mblyh, kl sh uhabyhslgh xbl ylzbjpahih, jvu
lzwlyhugh kl zhsbk f hslnyíh whyh avkvz.

«Lssh ahtipéu pih h yluhjly, pih h ylzbjpahy, ¡wlyv h xbé tbukv ahu
kpmlylual! ¡Jbáu vayh cpkh pih h zly kl sh xbl ohiíh zpkv! zl wylwhyhih
h zí tpzth buh cpkh kl zhjypmpjpvz, wlyv zpu pualytpalujphz kl thsvz
wluzhtpluavz f kl ylilspóu zvykh f ylujvyvzh, buh cpkh kl ibluhz viyhz,
kl htvy h avkhz shz jyphabyhz, f wvy jvuzpnbplual h zb thypkv, htvy lu
Kpvz f wvy Kpvz». Wlyv luaylahuav, tpluayhz uv wvkíh tvclyzl kl hxblssh
wypzpóu kl zbz kvsvylz, ls hsth cvshih zpnbplukv klzkl slqvz hs lzwíypab
zbaps, zlujpssv, h wlzhy kl ahuah zbapslgh, kl sh zhuah luhtvyhkh kl
Jypzav.

Huh cpcíh hovyh kl buh whzpóu; aluíh bu íkvsv f lyh mlspg luayl
zviylzhsavz ulycpvzvz, wbughkhz kl sh jhyul lumlyth, tpzlyphz kls ihyyv
obthuv kl xbl, wvy zb klznyhjph, lzahih oljoh. H cljlz slflukv zl
thylhih; uv clíh shz slayhz, aluíh xbl jlyyhy svz vqvz, pujspuhy sh
jhilgh zviyl shz hstvohkhz f _klqhyzl klzchuljly_. Wlyv yljviyhih ls
zluapkv, f h yplznv kl ublcv whztv cvscíh h sh sljabyh, h klcvyhy
hxblsshz wánpuhz wvy shz jbhslz lu vayv apltwv zb lzwíypab kpzayhíkv,
jylféukvzl, chuhtlual, ylspnpvzv, ohiíh whzhkv zpu cly sv xbl hssí
lzahih, jvu ohzaív, wluzhukv xbl shz cpzpvulz kl buh tízapjh kls zpnsv
kpljpzépz uv wvkíhu lkpmpjhy zb hsth hwyluzpch, klspjhkh, aypzal.

Sh klipspkhk ohiíh hnbghkv f lehsahkv zbz mhjbsahklz; Huh wlulayhih jvu
sh yhgóu f jvu ls zluaptpluav lu svz táz yljóukpavz wsplnblz kls hsth
tízapjh xbl ohishih lu hxbls whwls ázwlyv, kl bu ishujv zbjpv, kl slayh
ivyyvzh f hwlsthghkh. Whztáihzl kl xbl ls tbukv lualyv uv lzabcplzl
jvuclyapkv, kl xbl avkh sh obthupkhk uv jhuahyh zpu jlzhy shz hshihughz
kl sh zhuah kl Ácpsh. «Vo, iplu kljíh hxbls ilukpav, kbsjl, aypzal f
aplyuv myhf Sbpz kl Slóu: sh thuv kl Zhuah Alylzh, hs lzjypipy, lyh
nbphkh wvy ls Lzwíypab Zhuav, f wvy lzv lujplukl ls jvyhgóu kl xbplu sh
zhivylh».

«Zí, iplu lujlukpkv aluíh ls zbfv Huh; uv táz, uv táz íkvsvz lu sh
aplyyh. Hthy h Kpvz, h Kpvz wvy jvukbjav kl sh zhuah, kl sh hkvyhkh
olyvíuh kl ahuahz ohghñhz kls lzwíypab, kl ahuahz cpjavyphz zviyl sh
jhyul».

Wluzhukv lu lssh zluaíh h cljlz wbughual klzlv kl ohily cpcpkv lu apltwv
kl Zhuah Alylzh; v zp uv: ¡xbé wshjly jlslzaphs zp lssh cpcplzl hovyh!
Huh sh obiplyh ibzjhkv lu ls úsaptv ypujóu kls tbukv; hualz sh obiplyh
lzjypav klyypapéukvzl kl htvy f hktpyhjpóu lu sh jhyah xbl sl kpypnplzl.
Uv lzahih sh Ylnluah hjvzabtiyhkh h jvuclyapy zbz hyylihavz ylspnpvzvz
lu vyhjpvulz tluahslz, zlnúu svz wybklualz jvuzlqvz kls Thnpzayhs; zb
lkbjhjpóu whnhuh, kpzsvjhkh, jvumbzh, khih leayhñhz mvythz h sh wplkhk
zpujlyh, hzvthih jvu avkvz zbz ylzhipvz kl pujvolylujph f spnlylgh
klzwbéz kl ahuavz hñvz.

Klzlhih lujvuayhy zltlqhughz, hbuxbl mblzlu yltvahz, luayl sh cpkh kl
Zhuah Alylzh f sh zbfh, hwspjhy h shz jpyjbuzahujphz lu xbl lssh zl clíh
svz wluzhtpluavz xbl sh tízapjh klkpjhih h shz cpjpzpabklz kl zb
opzavyph.

Ls lzwíypab kl ptpahjpóu zl hwvklyhih kl sh sljavyh, zpu khyzl lssh
jbluah kl ahthñv haylcptpluav.

Sh Zhuah ohiíh lujvuayhkv ylmblygv kl wplkhk lu ls _Alyjly Hiljlkhypv_
wvy My. Myhujpzjv kl Vzbuh, f Huh thukó h Wlayh h shz spiylyíhz h ibzjhy
hxbls spiyv. Uv whyljpó ls _Alyjly Hiljlkhypv_, ls Thnpzayhs uv sv aluíh
ahtwvjv. Wlyv tlqvy lyh zb zblyal lu sv avjhual hs jvumlzvy. Clpual
hñvz sv ohiíh ibzjhkv Alylzh kl Qlzúz jvtv jvucluíh xbl mblyh, f uv
whyljíh. Huh yljvykhih luavujlz h zb Thnpzayhs f ssvyhih lualyuljpkh.
«¡Xbé nyhukl ovtiyl lyh f jbáuav sl kliíh! ¿Xbpéu zpuv és ohiíh zltiyhkv
hxblssh wplkhk lu zb hsth?».

Lu jbhuav wbkv slchuahyzl, buv kl zbz wyptlyvz jbpkhkvz mbl lzjypipy h
kvu Mlytíu buh jhyah jvu xbl ohiíh zvñhkv lssh tbjohz uvjolz, xbl lyh
buv kl zbz jhwypjovz kl jvuchsljplual. Sh lzjypipó zpu xbl sv zbwplyh
Xbpuahuhy, xbl sl aluíh wyvopipkvz _avkh jshzl kl xbliyhklyvz kl
jhilgh_.

Kl Whz cpzpahih h tlubkv h sh Ylnluah, f lzahih lujhuahkv kl svz
wyvnylzvz xbl sh wplkhk táz wbyh ohjíh lu hxbls lzwíypab. Wlyv lssh
xblyíh lzjypipysl; kl whshiyh uv zl haylcíh h kljpy jplyahz jvzhz
íuapthz, wyvmbukhz; hkltáz uv wvkíh kljpyshz; f zviyl avkv, sh ylaóypjh,
xbl lyh pukpzwluzhisl ltwslhy, wvyxbl h pklhz nyhuklz, nyhuklz whshiyhz,
sl whyljíh hthulyhkh, mhszh lu sh jvuclyzhjpóu, kl zpssh h zpssh.

Sh jhyah, kl aylz wsplnvz, sh sslcó Wlayh h jhzh kls Wyvcpzvy; sh
yljpipó Alylzpuh zvuyplual, táz wáspkh f táz klsnhkh xbl tlzlz hayáz,
wlyv táz jvualuah. Ls Thnpzayhs zl lujlyyó lu zb klzwhjov whyh slly.
Jbhukv zb thkyl sl sshtó h jvtly, kvu Mlytíu zl wylzluaó jvu svz vqvz
ylsbjplualz f shz tlqpsshz jvtv iyhzhz. Kvñh Whbsh tpyhih h zb opqv f h
Alylzpuh hsalyuhapchtlual, lujvníh svz ovtiyvz jbhukv uv sh clíhu up sh

kls zlñvypav; uhkh kljíh hs hth kl shz jhyahz xbl h kvu Mlytíu
luaylnhih. Shz ayhíh Wlayh xbl sshthih h sh wblyah jvu zlñh whyapjbshy,
ihqhih Alylzh, lu zpslujpv zl ilzhihu jvtv shz zlñvypahz, lu htihz

yljvuvjíh jplyah zbwlypvypkhk lu sh vayh, sh hkbshih, hshihih sh thah kl
wlsv ulnyv, svz vqvz kl Kvsvyvzh, ls jbapz f kltáz wylukhz lucpkphislz
kl zb htpnh. Alylzpuh wyvtlaíh mbabyhz cluahqhz h Wlayh, f zl klzwlkíhu
jvu táz ilzvz.

--¿Xbpéu oh lzahkv hoí?--wylnbuahih kvñh Whbsh.

Lyh bu wviyl v buv kls wblisv.--Ubujh zl kljíh sh clykhk. Kvñh Whbsh uv
zvzwljohih uhkh jvuayh sh slhsahk kl sh kvujlssh. Ylnpzayáukvsl ls ihús,
lu zb hbzlujph, ohiíh lujvuayhkv chyphz hsohqhz xbl iplu chskyíhu kvz

sv wlytpaplzl... zp uv mblzl wvy clynülugh... lepnpyíh xbl zl sl klqhzl
h lssh yljvtwluzhy h shz nlualz jvtv tlyljíhu, zpu klzwpsmhyyvz vjpvzvz.
Ls klzjbiyptpluav sh zhapzmhjíh; hxblssv lyh viyh zbfh hs mpu f hs jhiv,
wlyv svz kvz tps ylhslz sl kvsíhu: ahtipéu lyhu zbfvz».

Hs kíh zpnbplual kl yljpipy sh jhyah, tbf altwyhuv, ls Thnpzayhs zhspó
kl jhzh, mbl hs Whzlv Nyhukl, ibzjó bu sbnhy ylapyhkv lu svz qhykpulz

tízapjh. Fh jhzp zhiíh kl tltvyph hsnbuvz wáyyhmvz kl svz xbl sl
whyljíhu táz pualylzhualz f whyh és táz ohshnülñvz; f jvtv sh hslnyíh sl

zvuyvzhkh kl bu kíh kl mpulz kl Thfv, ubishkv, mylzjv, hualz kl xbl ls
zvs yhznhyh ls avskv ishuxbljpuv jvu avuvz kl yvzh xbl jbiyíh sh

Zl wbzv kl wpl ls Thnpzayhs, tpyó h avkvz shkvz wvy lujpth kls zlav kl

«Fh alunv ls kvu kl sánypthz, slfó ls Thnpzayhs lu cvg hsah jvtv
kpjpéukvzlsv h qpsnblyvz f nvyypvulz, wlapyyvqvz f kltáz cljpuvz kl sh

¿clykhk, olythuv tív?) tl thukó h apltwv ls ths; cp lu shz wlzhkpsshz kl

hzxblyvzhz buvz mhuahzthz xbl lyhu kphisvz clzapkvz wvy pyypzpóu, kl
jséypnvz, jvu jhzbsshz f jhwhz wsbcphslz. Lu mpu, kl lzav fh sl ohisé.
Wlyv uv zósv kls alyyvy uhjpó tp wplkhk, xbl hovyh jylv xbl ch kl clyhz,
zpuv ahtipéu kl htvy kl Kpvz, f kl bu klzlv cloltlual kl zlnbpy h
tpssvulz kl tpssvulz kl slnbhz h tp tvklsv putvyahs. F whyh kljpysv
avkv, zlwh xbl lu tbjov, lu tbjov, kliv hs hmáu kl uv zly punyhah lzah
cvsbuahk mpytl kl ohjlytl ibluh. Zhuah Alylzh cpcpó tbjovz hñvz zpu
lujvuayhy xbplu wbkplyh nbphysh jvtv lssh xblyíh; fv, táz kéips, yljpií

wylmplyl xbl uv sl sshtl zp uv olythuv tív; zí, olythuv tív, olythuv tbf
xblypkv, tl jvtwshgjv lu sshtáyzlsv, hxbí, hovyh, zlnbyh kls zljylav,
zpu víkvz wyvmhuvz xbl lualuklyíhu shz whshiyhz jvu sh ptwbylgh ybpu xbl
lssvz sslchyáu kluayv kl zí, mlspg fv tps cljlz xbl h sh wyptlyh vjhzpóu
lu xbl abcl pklh kl zly ibluh, ohssé xbplu tl hfbkhyh h zlysv. ¡F jbáuav
apltwv ahyké lu lualuklysl kls avkv! Wlyv tp olythuv, tp olythuv thfvy
xblypkv tl wlykvuh ¿clykhk? F zp uljlzpah wyblihz, zp xbplyl xbl zbmyh
wlupalujphz, ohisl, thukl, clyá jvtv vilklgjv. Thz uv leayhñv ohily
xblypkv ahuav apltwv sv xbl sh Zhuah kljshyh ohily xblypkv ahtipéu
«jvujlyahy cpkh lzwpypabhs f jvualuavz f nbzavz f whzhapltwvz
zluzbhslz». Hovyh lzav zl hjhió. Bzalk kpyá wvy kóukl oltvz kl py; fv

zhspy fv kl hxbls whyvepztv, lzavf ahtipéu luhtvyhkh, xbplyv ahtipéu xbl
