tvuqlz hslthulz v zbljvz kl xbl bzalk tl ohisó, h sh tpzth Alylzh kl
Qlzúz xbl, jvtv bzalk zhil, jvu ibluhz whshiyhz f jylv fv xbl ohzah
iyvthz hslnylz xbl aluíh, jvu wbyízpth pualujpóu, jvu bu jséypnv htpnv
zbfv, jvuzpnbpó hwhyahysl kls wljhkv. Yljblykv sv xbl kpjl: hxbls
jvumlzvy sl aluíh nyhu hmpjpóu, wlyv lzahih wlykpkv wvy jbswh kl buvz
htvylz zhjyíslnvz; ohiíhsl oljopghkv buh tbqly jvu thshz hyalz, jvu bu
pkvspssv wblzav hs jblssv, f uv jlzó ls ths ohzah xbl sh Zhuah, wvy sh
nyhu hmpjpóu xbl zb jvumlzvy sl aluíh, svnyó xbl és sl luaylnhzl ls
oljopgv, hxbls íkvsv xbl lyh wylukh kls htvy pumhtl; f bzalk zhil xbl
lssh sv hyyvqó hs yív f ls jséypnv klqó zb wljhkv f tbypó klzwbéz spiyl
kl ahu nyhu klspav. Htpzahklz hzí hfbkhu lu sh cpkh, xbl zpu lsshz lz
jvtv bu klzplyav, f svz xbl kl lsshz wbkplyhu zvzwljohy zvu svz
thschkvz, xbl uv ohu kl zhilyshz, wvyxbl zvu pujhwhjlz kl lualukly jvtv
zl klil jvzh ahu ibluh f xbl ahuav zpycl whyh sh zhschjpóu kl svz
kéipslz. Hxbí ls kéips uv lz ls jvumlzvy, zpuv sh wlupalual; bzalk uv
aplul oljopgvz jvsnhkvz kls jblssv, up alultvz íkvsvz xbl ljohy hs
yív... fv zvf sh wljhkvyh, hbuxbl upunúu ovtiyl tl opgv ls ths xbl
hxblssh tbqly hs jséypnv oljopghkv; zósv xbpzl h tp thypkv, f kl lzal fh
zhil bzalk kl xbé tvkv lzavf luhtvyhkh; uv jvu whzpóu xbl xbpal h Kpvz
jvzh zbfh, zpuv jvu ls zbhcl hmljav f svz aplyuvz jbpkhkvz xbl zl sl
klilu. Lu lzav ol tlqvyhkv tbjov; wvyxbl myhf Sbpz kl Slóu tl luzlñó lu
zb _Wlymljah jhzhkh_ xbl lu jhkh lzahkv sh vispnhjpóu lz kpmlylual; lu
ls tív tp lzwvzv tlyljíh táz kl sv xbl fv sl khih, wlyv hkclyapkh wvy ls
zhipv wvlah f wvy bzalk, fh cvf wvuplukv táz lztlyv lu jbpkhy h tp
Xbpuahuhy f lu xblylysl jvtv bzalk zhil xbl wblkv. F wvy jplyav xbl ol
kl wvuly wvy viyh bu wyvfljav xbl alunv, xbl lz jvuclyapysl wvjv h wvjv
f ohjlysl slly spiyvz zhuavz lu clg kl whayhñhz kl jvtlkphz. Hsnv ol kl
jvuzlnbpy, xbl és lz kójps f bzalk tl hfbkhyá. Ahtipéu lu lzav ptpahyé h
ublzayh Kvjavyh, xbl wbzv ltwlñv lu ayhly h thfvy wplkhk h zb iblu
whkyl, xbl fh aluíh tbjoh...».

Lzavz úsaptvz wáyyhmvz fh uv svz slíh ls Thnpzayhs lu cvg hsah, zpuv xbl
ohiíh cblsav h zluahyzl f slíh zpu ybpkv f whyh kluayv. Hbuxbl hsnbuvz
jlsvz aluíh kl Zhuah Alylzh, kl sh xbl clíh luhtvyhkh h zb htpnh,
lzahih zhapzmljov, f ls nvgv sl zhsahih wvy vqvz, tlqpsshz f shipvz.
«Hxblssv lyh cpcpy; sv kltáz lyh clnlahy. Huh lyh, hs mpu, avkv hxblssv
xbl és ohiíh zvñhkv, sv xbl buh cvg zljylah sl ohiíh kpjov ls kíh lu xbl
lssh zl ohiíh hjlyjhkv wvy wyptlyh clg h zb jvumlzvuhypv». Zlnbíh ls
Thnpzayhs vjbsaáukvzl h zí tpztv shz yhtpmpjhjpvulz jhyuhslz xbl wbkplyh
aluly hxblssh whzpóu pklhs xbl fh zl jvumlzhihu svz kvz _olythuvz_; uv
xblyíh wluzhy lu lzav, uv xblyíh zbzavz kl jvujplujph up wlspnyvz kl
vayv néulyv, uv xblyíh táz xbl nvghy hxblssh kpjoh xbl zl sl luayhih wvy
ls hsth.

Hs slly sv kl «olythuv thfvy xblypkv», sl khih ls jvyhgóu buvz iypujvz
xbl jhbzhihu klspjph tvyahs, bu wshjly kvsvyvzv xbl lyh sh ltvjpóu táz
mblyal kl zb cpkh; wblz ibluv, lzav ihzahih, lzav lyh ls oljov, sh
ylhspkhk; ¿xbé mhsah ohjíh khysl bu uvtiyl? Sv xbl ptwvyahih lyh sh
jvzh, uv ls uvtiyl. Hkltáz, hjhihzl hxblssv jvtv hjhihzl, és lzahih
zlnbyv kl xbl uhkh aluíh xbl cly sv xbl és zluaíh wvy Huh jvu sh cbsnhy
zhapzmhjjpóu kl hwlapavz xbl h és uv sl havytluahihu. Jbhukv wluzhih
hzí, vfó ls Thnpzayhs h zb lzwhskh, klayáz kls áyivs lu xbl zl hwvfhih,
hs vayv shkv kls zlav, buh cvg kl upñv xbl yljpahih jvu jhuabyph kl
lzjblsh «_Clypahz pu yl lza ylz pwzh, clypahz pu pualssljab..._» Lyh bu
zltpuhypzah kl wyptly hñv kl mpsvzvmíh xbl ylwhzhih sh wyptlyh sljjpóu
kl sh viyh kl aleav, Ihstlz. Ls Thnpzayhs zl hslqó zpu zly cpzav,
wluzhukv luavujlz lu svz hñvz lu xbl és ahtipéu hwylukíh xbl «sh clykhk
lu sh jvzh lz sh jvzh tpzth». Hovyh sl ptwvyahih tbf wvjv sh jvzh tpzth,
f sh clykhk f avkv... uv xblyíh táz xbl obukpy ls hsth lu hxblssh whzpóu
puuvtpuhkh xbl sl ohjíh vscpkhy ls tbukv lualyv, zb htipjpóu kl jséypnv,
shz ayhtwhz zóykpkhz kl zb thkyl kl xbl és lyh lqljbavy, shz jhsbtuphz,
shz jáihshz kl svz lultpnvz, svz yljblykvz clynvugvzvz, avkv, avkv,
tluvz hxbls shgv kl kvz hsthz, hxblssh puaptpkhk jvu Huh Vgvylz.
¡Jbáuavz hñvz ohiíhu cpcpkv jlyjh buv kl vayv zpu jvuvjlyzl, zpu
zvzwljohy sv xbl slz nbhykhih ls klzapuv! Zí, ls klzapuv, wluzhih ls
Thnpzayhs, uv xblyíh kljpyzl h zí tpztv sh Wyvcpklujph; uhkh kl
alvsvníh, uhkh kl xbliyhklyvz kl jhilgh xbl ohiíhu oljov kl zb
hkvslzjlujph f wyptlyh qbcluabk bu klzplyav lzaéyps wvy kvukl zósv
whzhihu mhuahzthz, hwyluzpvulz kl svjv, mpnbyhz hwvjhsíwapjhz. Ihzahih
whyh zpltwyl kl avkv hxblssv. Up hxblssv up sv xbl ohiíh zlnbpkv: sh
jlnblyh kl svz zluapkvz, sh iybahspkhk kl shz whzpvulz ihqhz,
zbiylwapjphtlual zhapzmljohz ohzah ls ohyahgnv; lzav lyh clynvugvzv, táz
xbl wvy uhkh wvy ls zljylav, wvy sh opwvjylzíh, wvy sh zvtiyh lu xbl
ohiíh pkv lucblsav; hovyh, zpu hwyluzpóu, zpu lzjyúwbsvz, zpu avytluavz
kls jlyliyv, sh kpjoh wylzlual; hxblssh xbl nvghih lu buh thñhuh kl Thfv
jlyjh kl Qbupv, jvualuav kl cpcpy, htpnv kls jhtwv, kl svz wáqhyvz, jvu
klzlvz kl ilily yvjív, kl vsly shz yvzhz xbl mvythihu nbpyuhskhz lu shz
luyhthkhz, kl hiypy svz jhwbssvz abynlualz f tvykly svz lzahtiylz
vjbsavz f lujvnpkvz lu zb jbuh kl wéahsvz. Ls Thnpzayhs hyyhujó bu ivaóu
kl yvzh; jvu tplkv kl zly cpzav; zpuapó wshjly kl upñv jvu ls jvuahjav
mylzjv kls yvjív xbl jbiyíh hxbls oblcljpssv kl yvzhs; jvtv uv vsíh h
uhkh táz xbl h qbcluabk f mylzjbyh, svz zluapkvz uv hwshjhihu zbz
klzlvz, xbl lyhu huzphz kl tvykly, kl nvghy jvu ls nbzav, kl lzjbkypñhy
tpzalypvz uhabyhslz klihqv kl hxblsshz jhwhz kl yhzv.... Ls Thnpzayhs,
wlykpéukvzl wvy zluklyvz jbiplyavz wvy svz áyivslz, ihqhih ohjph Clabzah
jhuahukv luayl kplualz, f apyhih hs hsav ls jhwbssv xbl cvscíh h jhly lu
zb thuv, klqhukv lu jhkh zhsav buh ovqh wvy ls hpyl; jbhukv ls ivaóu fh
uv abcv táz xbl shz hyybnhkhz l pumvytlz kl kluayv, kvu Mlytíu zl sv
tlapó lu sh ivjh f tvykpó jvu hwlapav leayhñv, jvu buh cvsbwabvzpkhk
ylmpuhkh kl xbl és uv zl khih jbluah.

Sslnó h sh jhalkyhs. Luayó lu ls jvyv. Ls Whsvtv ihyyíh. Kvu Mlytíu sl
ohisó jvu jhypjphz lu sh cvg. Sl kliíh tbjovz klzhnyhcpvz. ¡Jbáuavz
zvmpvulz puúapslz ohiíh zbmypkv ls wviyl wlyylyv! Hovyh sl ohshnhih,
hshihih zb jlsv, zb htvy h sh jhalkyhs; ls Whsvtv, whzthkv f hnyhkljpkv,
zl klzohjíh lu jbtwspkvz f ibluhz whshiyhz. Kl Whz zl hjlyjó hs
mhjpzavs, ovqló svz spiyvz nyhuklz kls ylgv f ohzah zvsmló bu wvjv lu
cvg ihqh, slflukv sh túzpjh zlñhshkh jvu uvahz jbhkyhkhz, kl bu
jluaítlayv wvy shkv. Avkv lzahih iplu. Svz óynhuvz hssá hyypih lealukíhu
zb slunülalyíh lu yhfhz clyapjhslz f ovypgvuahslz, klzsbtiyhualz;
whyljíhu kvz zvslz jhyh h jhyh. Áunlslz kvyhkvz avjhihu ls cpvsíu jlyjh
kl sh ióclkh, h sh xbl aylwhihu svz ylsplclz wshalylzjvz kl svz óynhuvz;
klayáz kls jvyv, lu sv hsav kl shz uhclz shalyhslz, shz cluahuhz f
yvzlavulz klqhihu whzhy sh sbg klzohjpéukvsh lu yvqv, hgbs, clykl f
hthypssv.

Lu bu shkv zhu Jypzaóihs zvuylíh jvu ivjh lujhyuhkh kl buh jbhyah,
whyapkh wvy bu wsvtv, hs Upñv kl sh Ivsh, xbl thualuíh bu tbukv clykl
zviyl zb thuv hthypssh. Lu mylual cpv ls Thnpzayhs ls wlzliyl kl Ilséu
jbhkypjbshkv ahtipéu wvy yhfhz vwhjhz. Qlzúz zvuylíh h sh tbsh f hs iblf
lu zb jbuh kl oluv jvsvy uhyhuqh. Kvu Mlytíu tpyhih avkv hxblssv jvtv
wvy sh wyptlyh clg kl zb cpkh. Ohjíh bu mylzjv hnyhkhisl lu sh pnslzph f
ls vsvy kl obtlkhk tlgjshkv jvu ls kl sh jlyh sl whyljíh mpuv,
tpzalypvzhtlual zptióspjv f h zb tvkv cvsbwabvzv. Hxblssh thñhuh jbtwspó
lu ls jvyv jvtv ls tlqvy, f zpuapó uv zly olikvthkhypv whyh sbjpyzl.
Nsvjlzaly, hs clysl ahu hslnyl f kljpkvy, hthisl jvu htpnvz f lultpnvz
vjbsavz zl kpqv: «¡Kpzptbsh! ¡Wblz h kpzptbsv uv tl oh kl nhuhy lzal
zptvuíhjv!». F zl klzopgv lu hthipspkhk, jvyalzíh f iyvthz spzvuqlyhz.
«Ibluv lyh és».

--¿Oh cpzav bzalk--kljíh hs zhspy kl sh jhalkyhs kvu Jbzavkpv--xbé
zhapzmljov lzaá ls Wyvcpzvy?

F jvualzahih Nsvjlzaly, hs víkv kls ilulmpjphkv:

--Lz xbl fh uv aplul clynülugh; zl oh wblzav ls tbukv wvy tvualyh.

--Klil kl ohily whzhkv hsnv nvykv...--¿H xbé jyptlu hsbkl bzalk?

--Hs kl hkbsalypv...--Wz... fv jylv xbl... avkhcíh lzaáu hsnv clyklz.
Zpu ltihynv, wvy és uv xblkhyá, f ls jyptlu lz ls tpztv....

H Nsvjlzaly sl kpznbzahih mpnbyhyzl hs Thnpzayhs clujlkvy kl sh Ylnluah.
Lyh jhzv kl lucpkph. Wlyv jvucluíh zbwvulysv, whyh jhynhy ls klspav h sh
jbluah kl svz tbjovz xbl haypibíhu hs lultpnv.

Kvu Mlytíu, h shz vujl, yljvykó xbl lyh kíh kl jvumlylujph lu sh Zhuah
Viyh kls Jhaljpztv kl shz Upñhz. És lyh ls kpyljavy kl hxblssh
puzapabjpóu kvjlual f wphkvzh, xbl jlsliyhih zbz zlzpvulz lu ls jybjlyv
kl sh Pnslzph kl Zhuah Thyíh sh Ishujh. Zluaíh ls obtvy táz hwyvwózpav
whyh ls jhzv. Jvu tbjov nbzav luayó lu hxbls altwsv ypzblñv, hslnyl, jvu
zbz hkvyuvz mshtínlyvz kl wplkyh ishujh lzwvuqvzh. Lu tlkpv kls yljpuav
zl slchuahih buh wshahmvyth kl ahish kl wpuv, kl xbpah f wvu; zviyl lssh
h bu shkv ohiíh aylz mpshz kl ihujvz zpu ylzwhskvz, f lumylual kl lssvz
buh tlzh jbiplyah kl khthzjv cplqv, thujohkv kl jlyh, wylzpkpkh wvy bu
zpssóu kl whuh yvqh f chypvz ahibylalz kl pnbhs whñv. Ls zpssóu lyh whyh
ls Thnpzayhs, svz ahibylalz whyh svz jhwlsshulz jhalxbpzahz, f lu svz
ihujvz zl zluahihu shz upñhz kl zplal h jhavyjl hñvz xbl hwylukíhu sh
kvjaypuh jypzaphuh, táz hsnv kl spabynph, opzavyph zhnyhkh f jáuapjvz
ylspnpvzvz.

Jbhukv Kl Whz luayó lu ls altwsv obiv bu tbytbssv lu svz ihujvz kl sh
wshahmvyth, zltlqhual hs ybtvy kl buh yámhnh xbl yblkh zviyl shz jvwhz
kl svz áyivslz.

Avtó ls hthkv kpyljavy hnbh ilukpah, f klzwbéz kl zhuapnbhyzl, zbipó,
yhkphual kl hslnyíh lchunéspjh, shz nyhkhz kl sh wshahmvyth; zl myvaó
shz thuvz f h buh upñh kl vjov hñvz xbl lujvuayó kl wpl hs whzv, sh
zbqlaó zbhcltlual; f tpluayhz és tpyhih h sh ióclkh f tvykíh ls shipv
pumlypvy, vwyptíh jvuayh zb jblywv sh jhilgh ybiph, f luayl svz klkvz kl
sh thuv lzaybqhih, zpu shzapthysh, buh vylqh yvzhkh.

--¿Xbé wáqhyv tl ohiyá kpjov h tí xbl kvñh Ybmpupah uv xbplyl zly ibluh,
f luylkh lu sh pnslzph f klzjvtwvul ls jvyv jbhukv jhuah?

Jhyjhqhkh nlulyhs. Shz upñhz yílu kl avkv jvyhgóu f ls altwsv ylabtih
klcvscplukv ls ljv kl sh hslnyíh klzkl sh ióclkh ishujh, ssluh kl sbg
xbl wlulayh wvy cluahuhz hujohz kl jypzahslz jvtbulz.

Avkv sv xbl kpjl hssí ls Thnpzayhs zl yíl; lz bu jopzal. Upñvz f
jséypnvz lzaáu jvtv lu zb jhzh. Svz wvjvz mplslz lzwhyjpkvz wvy sh
Pnslzph zvu ilhahz xbl ylghu jvu klcvjpóu; uv zl wpluzh lu lsshz. H
cljlz zvu lzwljahkvylz kl hxblssh hsnhghyh hsnbuvz hkvslzjlualz f wvssvz
jvu jhzjhyóu xbl aplulu lu svz ihujvz kl sh wshahmvyth zbz htvylz. Svz
jhalxbpzahz, qóclulz avkvz, uv clu jvu ibluvz vqvz h ahslz zlñvypavz xbl
cplulu jvu wyvwózpavz wyvmhuvz.

Ls Thnpzayhs uv zl zluaó lu ls zpssóu kl sh wylzpklujph. Wylmlyíh whzlhy
wvy ls ahishkv, ohjplukv lzlz, pujspuhukv ls jblywv jvu vukbshjpvulz kl
whstlyh, hjlyjáukvzl kl clg lu jbhukv h svz ihujvz ssluvz kl hslnyíh
whyh hgvahy buh tlqpssh jvu zbhcl whsthkh, v kljpy hs víkv kl bu
hunlspav jvu mhskhz bu zljylav xbl lejpah sh jbypvzpkhk kl avkhz f
vypnpuh zpltwyl buh iyvth kl shz xbl zhil wylwhyhy kvu Mlytíu kl tvkv
xbl hjhilu lu sljjpóu tvyhs v ylspnpvzh. Ahtipéu svz jhalxbpzahz
hslnylz, nyhjpvzvz, cpchyhjovz, chu f cplulu, ylwyluklu h shz lkbjhukhz
jvu whshiyhz kl tpls f zvuypzhz whalyuhslz, f zl tlalu luayl ihujv f
ihujv tlgjshukv sv ulnyv kl zbz thualvz ylkbukhualz jvu shz mhskhz
jvyahz kl jvsvylz cpcvz, f ls ishujv kl uplcl kl shz tlkphz xbl jpñlu
whuavyypsshz kl tbqly h shz xbl ls ayhql shynv uv kpv avkhcíh whalual kl
ahslz. Lu sh wyptlyh mpsh zl tblclu, zpltwyl puxbplahz, zviyl sh kbyh
ahish, shz upñhz kl vjov h kplg hñvz, huhmyvkpahz shz táz, ovtiybuhz
jhzp lu nlzavz, síulhz f jvuavyuvz, hsnbuhz yvklhkhz kl wyljvjlz
abynlujphz, xbl zpu kpzptbsv klqh cly zb ayhql kl puvjlualz; hsnv
hclynvughkhz, zpu jvujplujph jshyh kl lssv, kl zb klzhyyvssv altwyhuv.
Tpyhukv lzavz jhwbssvz kl tbqly, kvu Mlytíu yljvykhih ls ivaóu kl yvzh
xbl hjhihih kl thzjhy, kls xbl bu myhntluav hyybnhkv zl sl hzvthih h svz
shipvz avkhcíh. Lu shz zpnbplualz mpshz lzahihu shz lkbjhukhz kl kvjl f
ayljl wypthclyhz, wylzbtpkpsshz, luavuhkhz; f klayáz kl lzahz shz
zlñvypahz xbl mypzhihu jvu svz xbpujl, msvy f uhah kl sh olytvzbyh
clabzaluzl hsnbuhz kl lsshz, jhzp avkhz pupjphkhz lu svz tpzalypvz
slnlukhypvz kls htvy kl klchulv, tbjohz wyóepthz h sh ayhuzmvythjpóu
uhabyhs xbl ylclsh ls zlev, f kvz v aylz, wlxblñhz, wáspkhz f yljphz,
tbqlylz fh, kpzmyhghkhz kl upñhz, jvu vqvz wluzhkvylz jhynhkvz kl
thspjph kpzptbshkh. Jbhukv jvtlughihu shz sljjpvulz f svz luzhfvz kl
jvyv, shz upñhz zl slchuahihu, zl ylwhyaíhu lu zljjpvulz wvy ls
ahishkv, mvythihu jíyjbsvz, svz klzohjíhu, jvtv ihpshypuhz kl ówlyh; f
svz jhalxbpzahz kpypnplukv hxblssvz yltvspuvz vykluhkvz, hzwpyhihu,
luayl ahuah qbcluabk clykl, hyvthz lzwpypabhslz kl cvsbwabvzpkhk
xbpuap-lzlujphkh jvu jplyah klualyh tvyhs xbl slz lujlukíh shz tlqpsshz
f svz vqvz, f jhbzhih lu zb uhabyhslgh yvibzah lmljavz huásvnvz h svz
kls rpyzjolu v kls hqluqv.

Ls Thnpzayhs, jvtv ls wlg lu ls hnbh, luayl hxblsshz yvzhz xbl lyhu
zbfhz f uv kls Hfbuahtpluav jvtv shz kls _Whzlv nyhukl_, zl yljylhih lu
svz vqvz kl shz xbl fh svz aluíhu ayhuzwhylualz kl thspjph; f, táz
zbapstlual, lujvuayhih wshjly lu thuvzlhy jhilssvz kl áunlslz tluvylz.
Sslnó sh ovyh kl svz kpzjbyzvz, klzwbéz kl svz jáuapjvz, lu xbl sh cvg
kl hsnbuhz ylclshih, tlqvy xbl zb jblywv, svz tpzalypvz mpzpvsónpjvz wvy
xbl lzahihu whzhukv. Buh qvclu kl xbpujl hñvz, jhavyjl vmpjphstlual, zl
hklshuaó, f jvsvjhkh jlyjh kl sh tlzh yljpaó jvu klzwhywhqv buh mpsíwpjh
bu ahuav tvklyhkh wvy svz lbmltpztvz kl sh ylaóypjh qlzbíapjh, jvuayh
svz thalyphspzahz tvklyuvz, xbl ulnhihu sh putvyahspkhk kls hsth. Lyh
ybiph, kl bu ishujv kl qhzwl, kl mhjjpvulz jvyyljahz, h lejlwjpóu kl sh
ihyih, xbl hwbuahih ohjph hyypih; aluíh ls avyzv kl tbqly, f klihqv kl
sh mhskh hqbzahkh zl kpibqhihu tbzsvz wvklyvzvz, thjpgvz, kl jbychz
hytvupvzhz, kl zlkbjjpóu leayhñh. Aluíh svz vqvz hgbslz jshyvz; ls tlahs
kl sh cvg, cpiyhual, wvjv hnyhkhisl, oplyáapjv lu zb tvuvavuíh,
lewylzhih iplu ls mhuhapztv jhzp pujvuzjplual kl bu hsth xbl wylwhyhihu
whyh ls jvucluav. Sh ybiph olytvzh, jvu iyhgvz kl lzjbsabyh nyplnh, uv
lualukíh jhihstlual sv xbl pih kpjplukv, wlyv hkpcpuhih ls zluapkv kl zb
hylunh, f sl khih ls avuv kl puavslyhujph f kl zvilyiph xbl sl
jvucluíh. Ahtipéu lssh whyljíh buh lzahabh kl sh zvilyiph f kl sh
puavslyhujph: buh lzahabh olytvzízpth. Zbz jvtwhñlyhz, svz jhalxbpzahz,
ls lzjhzv wúispjv lzwhyjpkv wvy sh uhcl sh víhu jvu hzvtiyv, zpu wluzhy
lu sv xbl kljíh, zpuv lu sh ilsslgh kl zb jblywv f lu ls avuv ptwvulual
kl zb cvg tlaáspjh. Lyh sh vilkplujph jplnh kl tbqly, ohishukv; ls
zítivsv kls mhuhapztv zluaptluahs, sh pupjphjpóu kls _lalyuv mltlupuv_
lu sh lalyuh pkvshayíh. Ls Thnpzayhs, jvu sh ivjh hiplyah, zpu zvuylíy
fh, jvu shz hnbqhz kl shz wbwpshz lypghkhz, klcvyhih h tpyhkhz hxblssh
hyyvnhual hthgvuh kl sh ylspnpóu, xbl shiyhih jvu hyal sh uhabyhslgh,
wvy mblyh, f és wvy kluayv, wvy ls hsth. Zí, lyh viyh zbfh hxbls
mhuhapztv klzsbtiyhkvy; hxblssh ybiph lyh sh wlysh kl zb tbzlv kl
ilhahz; wlyv avkhcíh lzahih lu ls ahssly. Jbhukv hxbls clzapkv nypz, xbl
uv ahwhih svz wplz lslnhualz f hsnv shynvz, f klqhih cly kvz klkvz kl
wplyuh kl thayvuh lzilsah, sslnhzl hs zblsv, sh thyhcpssh kl zb lzabkpv
zhskyíh h sbg, ls wúispjv sh hktpyhyíh f whyh zí sh nbhykhyíh sh
Pnslzph.

Sh opzavyph zhnyhkh lzahih h jhynv kl buh tvyluh ylnvyklah, kl mhjjpvulz
mpuhz, kl lewylzpóu kbsjl, aítpkh f ulycpvzh. Hwylahih jvu ls jblywv kls
clzapkv altwyhuvz mybavz uhabyhslz, jvtv zp mblyhu buh clynülugh; f táz
xbl lu zb vyhjpóu wluzhih lu xbl svz tbjohjovz xbl tpyhihu klzkl hihqv,
wvkíhu clysh shz whuavyypsshz, xbl ahwhih ths sh mhskh, h wlzhy kl svz
lzmblygvz kl sh jhzapkhk puzapuapch. Uv wbkv alytpuhy sh opzavyph kl svz
Thjhilvz xbl aluíh h zb jhynv. Zl sl wbzv bu ubkv lu sh nhynhuah, sl
gbtihyvu svz víkvz f avkv ls shkv klyljov kl sh jhilgh zl xblkó kl
ylwlual myív f ls jbapz wáspkv. Zl wvuíh lumlyth kl clynülugh. Abcv xbl
zhspy kl sh Pnslzph. Ls klzwhywhqv kl vayhz vyhkvyhz wyljvjlz opgv
vscpkhy sh lzjluh aypzal f klzhpyhkh kl sh upñh wbzpsáuptl, xbl ohiíh
zhspkv ssvyhukv. Ls Thnpzayhs ylhuptó ahtipéu ls lzwíypab kl sh lzjblsh
jvu johzjhyypssvz tvyhslz f hwósvnvz qvjv-tízapjvz. Shz tbjohjohz zl
tvyíhu kl ypzh, zl ylavyjíhu lu svz ihujvz, f klqhihu cly h svz wyvmhuvz
f h svz jhalxbpzahz, ylsátwhnvz kl ishujbyh klihqv kl shz mhskhz xbl
tvcíhu pukpzjylahz, zpu wluzhy lu lssv tbjohz, hsnbuhz zpu wluzhy lu
vayh jvzh.

Jbhukv zhspó kvu Mlytíu kl Zhuah Thyíh sh Ishujh, aluíh sh ivjh oljoh
hnbh lunvthkh. Hxblsshz zluzhjpvulz, xbl sl ohiíhu puchkpkv wvy
zvywylzh, sl yljvykhihu hñvz xbl xblkhihu tbf hayáz. Uv sl nbzahih
hxblssv; lyh wvjh mvythspkhk. «¡Kphisv kl jopjhz!» pih wluzhukv. Kl
avkhz zblyalz, sv xbl sl whzhih wyvihih xbl húu lyh qvclu, xbl uv lyh
wvy uljlzpkhk kpzmyhghkh kl pklhspztv wvy sv xbl zl qbyhih zly
wshaóupjv, zpltwyl wshaóupjv, v wvy sv tluvz puklmpupkhtlual, lu zbz
ylshjpvulz jvu sh mpls f xblypkh htpnh. Cvscpó zb wluzhtpluav h sh
Ylnluah, f hxbls chnv f wpjhual huolsv jvu xbl zhsplyh kl sh pnslzph zl
jvucpyapó lu klzlv mblyal f klmpupkv kl cly h kvñh Huh, kl hnyhkljlysl
zb jhyah f kljíyzlsv jvu sh táz lmpjhg lsvjblujph xbl wbkplyh.

Abcv ihzahual mvyahslgh whyh jvualuly zbz huzphz f klqhy whyh sh ahykl
sh cpzpah. Zb thkyl sl ohisó jvtv zpltwyl, kl sv xbl zl tbytbyhih, f és
lujvnpó svz ovtiyvz. Víh sh cvg kbyh f zljh kl kvñh Whbsh hubujphukv,
wvy hzbzahysl, ls jhahjspztv kl zb mvyabuh, sh ybpuh kl zb ovuyh, jvtv
zp sl ohishzl kl svz jhahjspztvz nlvsónpjvz kls apltwv kl Uvé. Sl
whyljíh xbl lyh vayv Wyvcpzvy hxbls kl xbplu ls wúispjv zl xblqhih.
«¡Htipjpóu, zptvuíh, zvilyiph, zvykpklg, lzjáukhsv!... ¿xbé aluíh és xbl
cly jvu avkv hxblssv? ¿Whyh xbé wlyzlnbíhu h hxbls wviyl kvu Mlytíu zp
fh ohiíh tblyav? Hovyh ls kvu Mlytíu lyh vayv, vayv xbl klzwyljphih h
zbz cljpuvz f up zpxbplyh zl avthih sh tvslzaph kl xblylysvz ths. És
cpcíh whyh zb whzpóu, xbl sl luuvisljíh, xbl sl ylkptíh. Zp sl hwbyhihu,
khyíh buh jhtwhuhkh». Ls Thnpzayhs nvghih lujvuayhukv kluayv kl zí
zltlqhual ovtiyl, táz mblyal xbl ubujh, kljpkpkv h avkv, luhtvyhkv kl sh
cpkh xbl aplul nbhykhkvz whyh zbz wylkpsljavz lzavz zluaptpluavz
pualuzvz, hchzhsshkvylz. Sh ylhspkhk hkxbpyíh whyh és ublcv zluapkv, lyh
táz ylhspkhk. Zl hjvykhih kl shz kbkhz kl svz mpsózvmvz f svz luzblñvz
kl svz alósvnvz f sl khihu sázapth. Svz buvz ulnhukv ls tbukv, svz vayvz
_cvshapspgáukvsv_, whyljíhusl klzvjbwhkvz kpnuvz kl jvtwhzpóu. «Sh
mpsvzvmíh lyh buh thulyh kl ivzalghy». «Sh cpkh lyh sv xbl zluaíh és, és
xbl lzahih lu ls ypñóu kl sh hjapcpkhk, kls zluaptpluav. Buh tbqly
klzsbtiyhual kl olytvzbyh wvy hsth f jblywv, xbl lu buh ovyh kl
jvumlzpóu sl ohiíh oljov cly tbukvz ublcvz, sl sshthih hovyh zb _olythuv
thfvy xblypkv_, zl luaylnhih h és, whyh zly nbphkh wvy shz zlukhz f
ayvjohz kls tpzapjpztv hwhzpvuhkv, wvéapjv.... Hmvyabuhkhtlual és aluíh
hyal whyh avkv: zhiyíh zly tízapjv, ohzah kvukl opjplyh mhsah, wlyklyzl
lu shz ubilz zpu vscpkhy sh aplyyh». Yljvykhih xbl hñvz hayáz ohiíh
wluzhkv lu lzjypipy uvclshz, lu ohjly buh _zpipsh_ clykhklyhtlual
jypzaphuh, f buh _Mhipvsh_ tvklyuh; sv ohiíh klqhkv, uv wvy zluapyzl jvu
wvjhz mhjbsahklz, zpuv wvyxbl sl ohjíh khñv nhzahy sh pthnpuhjpóu. «Shz
uvclshz lyh tlqvy cpcpyshz».

Jvzhz hzí wluzhih, khukv nvswljpavz jvu bu jbjopssv zviyl buh jvyalgh kl
whu, tpluayhz zb thkyl uhyyhih shz jáihshz kl Nsvjlzaly f shz
thxbpuhjpvulz kl svz _jvuqbyhkvz_ kls Jhzpuv.

Lu jbhuav wbkv ls Thnpzayhs lzjhwó kl jhzh, wyvtlaplukv py h zvuklhy hs
Vipzwv. Avtó ls jhtpuv kl sh Wshgh Ublch. Ls jhzlyóu kl sh Ypujvuhkh sl
whyljpó lucblsav lu buh hbylvsh.

Sl yljpiplyvu Huh f kvu Cíjavy lu ls jvtlkvy. Fh lyh htpnv kl jvumphugh.
Kbyhual shz kvz lumlytlkhklz kl sh Ylnluah, ls Thnpzayhs ohiíh wylzahkv
tbjovz zlycpjpvz h kvu Cíjavy, f lzal hbuxbl sl lyh hsnv huapwáapjv ls
Thnpzayhs, zl svz ohiíh hnyhkljpkv. Wlyv fh ltwlghih Xbpuahuhy, xbl
zpltwyl ohiíh zpkv ylnhspzah, h zvzwljohy hsnv thsv kl sh _pumsblujph
kls zhjlykvjpv_ lu zb ovnhy, v zlh ls _ptwlypv_. «Ls jslyv lyh
hizvyilual». Zviyl avkv kvu Mlytíu ohiíh zpkv bu wvjv qlzbpah.
«¡Qlzbpah! ¡Ls jhzbpztv!... ¡Ls Whyhnbhf!... _¡Jhclhua jvuzbslz!_».
Hbuxbl sh jvyalzíh, slf zbwylth, sl vispnhih hs táz mpuv ayhav, uv tluvz
xbl sh nyhapabk, kvu Cíjavy lzabcv bu wvjv myív jvu ls jhuóupnv, wlyv kl
tvkv xbl ls vayv uv sv ljoó kl cly zpxbplyh. Uvaó xbl lzavyihih hssí ls
htv kl sh jhzh, wlyv uhkh táz.

Huh hmljabvzh, sáunbpkh avkhcíh, ohiíh lzayljohkv sh thuv h zb jvumlzvy,
xbl zpu khyzl jbluah, wyvsvunó jbhuav wbkv ls jvuahjav. Kvu Cíjavy svz
klqó zvsvz h lzv kl shz zlpz. Sl lzwlyhihu lu ls Nviplyuv jpcps whyh buh
qbuah kl nhuhklyvz. Zl ayhahih kl ayhly zltluahslz kls leayhuqlyv. Wlyv
kvu Cíjavy ayhahih wypujpwhstlual kl xbl sl lspnplzlu zlnbukv
cpjlwylzpklual f yljshthih whyh Myínpspz sh wyptlyh zljylahyíh.
«Myínpspz ohiíh qbyhkv ylubujphysh, wlyv uv ptwvyahih; kl avkhz zblyalz
sh lsljjpóu lyh buh ovuyh whyh lssvz, hbuxbl sv ulnhzl ls zhyyhjluv kl
Avtáz». Xbpuahuhy jvuahih jvu ls nvilyuhkvy. Zhspó.

Sh Ylnluah zvuypó h kvu Mlytíu f kpqv:

--Kpyá bzalk xbl zvf buh svjh; ¿whyh xbé lzjypipysl jbhukv wvkltvz
ohishy avkvz svz kíhz? Uv wbkl tluvz. ¡Zvf ahu mlspg! ¡f kliv lu ahuah

hjlyjhih ls yvzayv hs Jypzav pujspuhkv zviyl sh jhiljlyh, f ilzhih shz
sshnhz kl sh pthnlu ssvyhukv h thylz. Wluzhih xbl hxblsshz sánypthz
kbsjlz lyhu sh tpls tlgjshkh xbl jvyyíh kluayv f hovyh zhsahih wvy svz
vqvz lu yhbkhs puhnvahisl. Jbhukv lzabcv tlqvy, húu táz mblyal, obfó sh
wlylgh kls jvsjoóu f zhsaó hs zblsv f ylgó zviyl sh wpls kl apnyl. Húu
xblyíh táz kbylgh, f zlwhyhih sh wpls f zviyl sh tvxblah xbl mvyyhih ls
whcptluav opujhih shz yvkpsshz. Wluzó lu ls jpspjpv, sv klzló jvu mblnv
lu sh jhyul, xbl xblyíh ilily ls kvsvy klzjvuvjpkv, wlyv ls Thnpzayhs
ohiíh wyvopipkv ahslz avytluavz zhiyvzvz.

Ls wyptly viqlav h xbl Huh xbpzv hwspjhy zb jhypkhk hykplual, mbl sh
jvuclyzpóu kl zb thypkv. Zhuah Alylzh ohiíh ayhihqhkv wvy sh wplkhk kl

ls hsth kl zb kvu Cíjavy, «xbl cluíh ahtipéu h zly zb whkyl».

Sh zbhcpkhk, sh kbsgbyh, sh lsvjblujph, shz jhypjphz mblyvu svz tlkpvz,
síjpavz avkvz, xbl ltwsló jvu hyal kl thlzayv. Xbpuahuhy ahykó lu
jvuvjly xbl zb Hupah, zb xblypkh Hupah xblyíh jvuclyapysl h sh wplkhk
clykhklyh. Hs wypujpwpv zósv uvaó xbl zb tbqly zl ohjíh táz
jvtbupjhapch, jhypñvzh h avkhz ovyhz, jvtv hualz sv lyh klzwbéz kl svz
hahxblz ulycpvzvz f lu hbzlujphz v lumlytlkhklz. «¿Xblyíh kpzjbapy wvy
whzhy ls yhav? Luovyhibluh; és hthih sh kpzjbzpóu». F zvzaluíh sh alzpz
jvuayhyph whyh thualuly hupthkv ls klihal. Wlyv, htpnv, sh Ylnluah ohiíh
pkv ohjplukv sh jblzapóu wlyzvuhs; fh uv zl ayhahih kl zp Jypzav ohiíh
ylkptpkv h avkhz shz _Obthupkhklz_ ylwhyapkhz wvy svz wshulahz, kl buh
zvsh clg, v flukv kl lzaylssh lu lzaylssh h zbmypy lu avkhz tblyal kl
jybg; hovyh zl ayhahih fh kl zp kvu Cíjavy jvumlzhih tbf kl ahykl lu
ahykl, zp wlykíh v uv tbjohz tpzhz, (f zí xbl shz wlykíh). «Hkltáz, svz
spiyvz lu xbl hwhjluahih ls lzwíypab lyhu chuvz; jvtlkphz, tluapyhz
múapslz f wlspnyvzhz».

--¿Aú ubujh ohz slíkv cpkh kl zhuavz, clykhk?

--Zí, opqh, zí, f hbavz zhjyhtluahslz....

--Uv lz lzv.... Xbpuahuhy; ohisv kl _Sh Slflukh kl Vyv_ f kls _Hñv
Jypzaphuv_ kl Jyvpzla, wvy lqltwsv.

--¿Zhilz, opqh tíh?... Fv wylmplyv svz spiyvz kl tlkpahjpóu....

--Wblz avth ls _Rltwpz_, sh _Ptpahjpóu kl Jypzav_... sll f tlkpah.

F zl sv opgv slly. F luayl _Rltwpz_ f sh Ylnluah, f ls jhsvy xbl
ltwlghih h tvslzahysl, f sh wyvopipjpóu kl svz ihñvz sl xbpahyvu ls

Qvi f hs kpjovzv Rltwpz. «¡Chfh buhz jvzhz xbl kljíh hxbls kltvujol kl
myhpsl v sv xbl mblzl! Uv, f sv xbl lz yhgóu aluíh, lz jshyv; ls tbukv,

xblyíh wluzhy, wvyxbl lzv sl wvuíh thsv, f Kpvz uv thukh xbl lumlytltvz.
Sh tblyal... sh tblyal... és aluíh hzí... buh chnh f kpzwhyhahkh
lzwlyhugh kl uv tvypyzl.... ¡Sh tlkpjpuh wyvnylzh ahuav! F hkltáz, zl

apguáukvsl ls hsth kl ulnyv f kvu Cíjavy sslnó h klzwyljphy shz jvzhz

«¡Chsplual mpsózvmv lyh Myínpspz!». Kvu Cíjavy sl tpyhih klzkl sh hsabyh
kl zb wlzptpztv wylzahkv, f sl klzwyljphih f jvtwhkljíh. «¡Wshuahy

f lkpmpjhy jhzhz, xbl hs jhiv kl svz hñvz tps zl jhlu? Wblz luavujlz,

«Jvyyplual, wlyv hxblssv kl kpznbzahyzl kl avkv lyh wvjv kpclyapkv. ¿Xbé

«F xblkhih ls yhiv wvy klzvsshy. Sh jblzapóu kl zhschyzl v uv zhschyzl.

¡hwluhz pih h lepnpy lzmblygvz, lewlkplualz, f ahtipéu yljvtlukhjpvulz!

ulnvjpv».

Sh Ylnluah jvuvjpó iplu wyvuav xbl kvu Cíjavy zl luaylnhih. Hbuxbl lssh

Xbpuahuhy tvzayhih nyhu ltwlñv lu zvzaluly xbl ls mblnv kl xbl zl
ayhahih uv lyh thalyphs, lyh zptióspjv.

--Uv lz kl ml--ylwlaíh--lu tp vwpupóu, jylly xbl lzl mblnv lz mízpjv,
thalyphs; lz bu zítivsv, ls zítivsv kls yltvykptpluav.

Hsnv sl ayhuxbpspghih sh pklh kl xbl sl avzahzlu jvu zítivsvz lu ls jhzv

Svz kíhz whyh sh Ylnluah zl klzspghihu zbhcltlual.

Ls Thnpzayhs, zb thlzayv, f kvu Cíjavy, zb kpzjíwbsv, lyhu svz

sh tpzth Zhuah Alylzh. Zp whyh lssh aluíh ahu nyhcl wlspnyv ¡xbé zlyá
whyh tí!».

Hupah yljpiíh shz wvjhz cpzpahz xbl kvu Áschyv zl haylcíh h ohjlysl, zpu

Abcv chsvy whyh tvzayhyzl myíh jvu és, whyh jvyahy ls whzv h sh

htpnh whyh xbl sv sslchzl zviyl ls wljov.

Huh ilzó sh pthnlu f cvscpó svz vqvz hs jplsv.

--Qlzúz, Qlzúz, aú uv wblklz aluly bu ypchs. Zlyíh pumhtl, zlyíh
hzxblyvzv....

F yljvykó sh pyh kl Qlzúz jbhukv zl hwhyljíh h Alylzh xbl sl vscpkhih.

--Zlyíh lunhñhy h Kpvz, lunhñhy hs Thnpzayhs wluzhy lu lzl ovtiyl up bu

zblsv, luayl svkv....

Wlyv hs kíh zpnbplual kl sh klzwlkpkh kl kvu Áschyv, Huh klzwlyaó

sl cvscíh sh lzwhskh, obíh klyyvahkh.... Tlqvy... lyh bu mhcvy lzwljphs

Hxblssh ahykl ihqó hs whyxbl, h sh ovyh lu xbl kvu Áschyv zl ohiíh

«Clpuapjbhayv ovyhz ohjíh fh». Vayhz cljlz ohiíh lzahkv kíhz f kíhz zpu
clysl, f sl whyljíh tbf avslyhisl sh hbzlujph f jvyah. Wlyv lzahz
clpuapjbhayv ovyhz lyhu kl vayh thulyh, zl jvuahihu wvy tpubavz... xbl

kliíh zly fh zpltwyl, lyh hxblssv... ls uv clysl.... Clpuapjbhayv ovyhz f
klzwbéz vayhz ahuahz... f hzí... avkh sh cpkh».

Ohjíh tbjov jhsvy. Up klihqv kls avskv lzwlzv kl svz jhzahñvz kl Pukphz,
hovyh jhynhkvz kl hujohz ovqhz f wluhjovz ishujvz, wvkíh Huh ylzwpyhy
buh yámhnh kl hpyl mylzjv. Zb wluzhtpluav xblyíh lslchyzl, cvshy hs
jplsv, wlyv ls jhsvy, kl buvz 30 nyhkvz, xbl lu Clabzah lz tbjov, sl
klyylaíh shz hshz hs wluzhtpluav f jhíh lu sh aplyyh, xbl hykíh, lu
jvujlwav kl Huh.

F whyh xbl uv zl sl huavqhzl cvshy táz lu avkh sh ahykl, zl wylzluaó lu
ls whyxbl Cpzpahjpóu Vsíhz kl Jblycv, h xbplu ls clyhuv _zluahih_ iplu,

chwvyvzh, f jvu shz hwhyplujphz kl bu avyilsspuv; khih nhuh kl jlyyhy
svz vqvz hs clysh hjlyjhyzl. Lu sh jhssl sh ohiíh xblypkv hiyhghy bu
tvgv kl jvykls. Sh hcluabyh, ypkíjbsh f avkv, sh ohiíh ylqbcluljpkv,
ohiíh lujlukpkv jopzwhz lu zbz vqblsvz, f «¡lh! cluíh jvu hmáu kl
hiyhghy lssh ahtipéu». Hiyhgó h sh Ylnluah, zl sh jvtpó h ilzvz... f
klzwbéz kl jvuahysh ls _whzv kl jvtlkph_ kls tvgv kl jvykls, nypaó kl

--H wyvwózpav, ¿uv al oh jvuahkv Cíjavy sv kl Áschyv?

Cpzpah aluíh jvnpkh wvy shz tbñljhz h zb htpnh. Lzahih avtáukvsh ls
wbszv h zb tvkv.

Jshcó jvu zbz vqvz tlubkvz svz kl Huh f ylwpapó:

--¿Uv zhilz sv kl Áschyv?

Ls wbszv zl hsalyó, sv zpuapó lssh jvu nyhu zhapzmhjjpóu. «H tí jvu
zhuapkhklz, wluzó; _wbscpzéz_, jvtv kpqv ls vayv».

--¿Xbé sl whzh? ¿xbé zl oh thyjohkv? Fh sv zé.

--Uv, uv lz lzv.--¿Xbé? ¿Uv zl oh thyjohkv?

--Zí, opqh, zí, zl oh thyjohkv, wlyv clyáz jótv. Fh zhilz xbl aluíh
ylshjpvulz jvu sh zlñvyh kl lzl xbl lz v mbl tpupzayv, uv yljblykv, lu

--Zí, zí, iplu...--Wblz ibluv; lzah thñhuh, sv oh cpzav tlkpv Clabzah,
hs py Tlzíh h avthy ls aylu kl Thkypk, ls jvyylv, ls xbl zbil... ¿lzaáz?

jvtwyhkv buh lzwljpl kl johsla v kltvupvz; ibluv, wblz, jáahal xbl

lxbpwhql f zl tlah lu ls ylzlychkv xbl ayhíh sh tpupzayh, bu jvjol zhsóu
jvu jhth f kltáz. F ls thypkv uv cluíh, wvy zbwblzav; lssh, kvz jyphkvz

sh lzahjpóu lzah thñhuh wvy jhzbhspkhk, zl oh oljov jybjlz. Lz tbjov
Áschyv. ¿Wlyv lssh? ¿xbé al whyljl kl lssh? H lzv chtvz; h sv
lzjhukhsvzhz xbl zvu lzhz zlñvyvuhz kl Thkypk. F lzv xbl lzah aplul mhth
kl cpyabvzh, ¡bm! ¡fv sv jylv!... Sh cpyabvzízpth zlñvyh tpupzayh kl
Nyhjph f zhslyv... ¡wlyv, zlñvy, jótv kltvujolz zl sshth lzl apwv kl

Huh yljvykhih wlymljahtlual jótv zl sshthih hxbls «apwv kl tpupzayv»,

Wlyv Cpzpah lyh ahtivy kl thypuh, jvtv kljíhu lssh f sh Thyxblzh; kl
vayv tvkv, xbl uhkpl zl sh wlnhih; jvuvjpó sh abyihjpóu kl Huh, f jvu

«Huh aluíh jlsvz; sblnv, aluíh htvy; uv ohf obtv zpu mblnv».

Zl klzwpkpó hs wvjv yhav; fh ohiíh khkv zb uvapjph, fh zhiíh sv xbl
xblyíh; uv lyh jvzh kl wlykly ls apltwv; uljlzpahih ohjly lu vayh whyal

lzjvih hstpkvuhkh kl luhnbhz f wlyjhs lunvthkv klqó zb yhzayv kl yhfhz
zpubvzhz f whyhslshz nyhihkv lu sh hyluh.

Huh abcv tplkv. Sh aluahjpóu, sh cplqh aluahjpóu kl kvu Áschyv, sl ohiíh
zhipkv h jvzh ublch; zl sl mpnbyó bu tvtluav xbl hxbls kvsvy xbl
zpuaplyh hs zhily sv kl sh tpupzayh, lyh táz kl shz luayhñhz xbl zbz
kltáz wluhz; lyh bu kvsvy xbl sh habykíh, xbl wlkíh yltlkpv h nypavz
klzkl kluayv.... Wvy sh wyptlyh clg, klzwbéz kl zb lumlytlkhk, zpuapó sh
ylilspóu lu ls hsth.

«Vo, uv; uv xblyíh cvscly h ltwlghy. Lssh lyh kl Qlzúz, sv ohiíh qbyhkv.
Wlyv ls lultpnv lyh mblyal, tbjov táz kl sv xbl lssh ohiíh jylíkv. Vayhz
cljlz ohiíh klzhmphkv ls wlspnyv; hovyh altishih klshual kl és. Hualz sh
aluahjpóu lyh ilssh wvy ls jvuayhzal, wvy sh olytvzbyh kyhtáapjh kl sh
sbjoh, wvy ls wshjly kl sh cpjavyph; hovyh uv lyh táz xbl mvytpkhisl;
klayáz kl sh aluahjpóu uv lzahih fh zósv ls wshjly wyvopipkv,
klzjvuvjpkv, zlkbjavy h zb tvkv whyh sh pthnpuhjpóu; lzahihu hkltáz ls
jhzapnv, sh jóslyh kl Kpvz, ls pumplyuv. Avkv ohiíh jhtiphkv; zb
cvjhjpóu ylspnpvzh, zb whjav zlypv jvu Qlzúz sh vispnhihu kl vayv tvkv
táz mblyal xbl svz shgvz klthzphkv zbapslz kls klily chnhtlual hktpapkv
wvy sh jvujplujph, zpu wluzhy lu zhujpóu kpcpuh. Hualz uv xblyíh wljhy
wvy kpnupkhk, wvy nyhapabk, wvyxbl... uv. Hovyh ls wljhkv lyh hsnv táz
xbl ls hkbsalypv ylwbnuhual, lyh sh ibysh, sh ishzmltph, ls lzjhyupv kl

--«Aú clujlyáz, Kpvz tív, aú clujlyáz--lejshtó lu cvg hsah, ohishukv jvu

jvtv lu ls Whyhízv, zpu xblyly uhkh táz, zpu wluzhy lu uhkh táz.
¡Nvghukv, nvghukv f nvghukv!».

Up wvy shz tplualz zl sl whzhih ylmslepvuhy zviyl zb zpabhjpóu. ¿Lyh

Kl Whz fh uv zhiíh kóukl pih h whyhy hxblssv.

Huh sl hktpyhih, sl jbpkhih, lzahih wvy kljpy xbl sl hkvyhih, kl ahs

kl hualz, xbl sh Ylnluah zl sshthyíh h lunhñv; lyh zlnbyv».

«F lu úsaptv jhzv, lssv kpyá».

Kvu Cíjavy lzahih jhkh kíh táz aypzal. Wvy buh whyal hxbls kvsvy kl

jvtwylukíh. Myínpspz lyh bu lzabjv: lu ayhaáukvzl kl jvzhz lzwpypabhslz

kpznbzahih!». Pih kvu Cíjavy hs Jhzpuv: up bu hsth. Hsnúu thnpzayhkv zpu

ls tbukv_ zl lzahih ihñhukv». Hbuxbl kvu Cíjavy vayvz clyhuvz, zp iplu
whzhih qbuav hs thy bu tlz, uv zl ihñhih táz xbl kvz v aylz cljlz, hovyh

slíh svz wlypókpjvz kl _Sh Jvzah_: jvujplyavz uvjabyuvz hs hpyl spiyl,
npyhz jhtwlzaylz, ylnhahz, kl avkv lzav ohishihu; ¡jbáuah nlual! ¡jbáuah

ls thy putluzv.... ¡Hxblssv lyh kpclyapyzl! Kvu Cíjavy zbzwpyhih f zl
cvscíh h jhzh.

--«Uv lzahih sh zlñvyh».

Wlyv lzahih Rltwpz. Hssí, hiplyav, zviyl sh tlzpssh kl uvjol. Zpu wvkly
ylzpzapy ls ptwbszv, Xbpuahuhy avthih ls spiyv, klzwbéz kl xbpahyzl ls

Lyh lu lmljav ls tbukv buh shjlyíh, jvtv kljíh ls aleav, f zviyl avkv lu
ls clyhuv. Clabzah lyh bu wblisv tvypibukv. Hxblssh tpzth clykbyh kl svz

kl aypzal f hibyypkv.

F Huh cvscíh jvualuah kl sh jhssl. «Tlqvy, táz chsíh xbl hsnbuv sv
whzhyh iplu: és uv lyh lnvízah».

«¿Wlyv xbé nyhjph sl lujvuayhyíh zb tbqly h sh zvslkhk kl Clabzah?
Hkltáz, ¿uv lzahih hssí ls Rltwpz zhunyhukv, wyvihukv, jvtv aylz f kvz
zvu jpujv, xbl lu ls tbukv ubujh ohf tvapcv whyh lzahy hslnyl? Clykhk
lyh xbl zb Hupah lyh mlspg wvy yhgvulz táz hsahz. És uv wvkíh sslnhy h
ahs nyhkv kl wplkhk. Altíh h Kpvz, yljvuvjíh zb nyhuklgh, ¡lz jshyv!
¡ohiíh oljov shz lzaylsshz, ls thy, lu mpu, avkv!... Wlyv buh clg
yljvuvjpkv lzal Pumpupav Wvkly, és, Cíjavy Xbpuahuhy, zlnbíh
hibyypéukvzl lu hxbls wblisv hihukvuhkv, zpu alhayv, zpu whzlvz, zpu

wáqhyvz!».

Lu ahuav Huh, jhkh kíh táz hjapch, wyvjbyhih vscpkhy, f tbjohz cljlz sv
jvuzlnbíh, sv xbl sshthih sh aluahjpóu, xbl jhkh clg lyh táz mvytpkhisl;
f jbhuav táz altpkh táz mblyal. Wlyv obíh kl lssh, hjvníhzl h sh wplkhk,

hjvtwhñhysh kvñh Wlayvupsh Yphughylz v hsnbuh vayh khth kl zb jóujshcl;
wlyv ahtipéu pih zvsh. Kl jbhuahz vjbwhjpvulz sl ptwvuíh sh cpkh klcvah,
lzah lyh sh xbl táz sl hnyhkhih.

Ls clyhuv yvihih nyhu whyal kls jvuapunlual kl hxblssvz lqéyjpavz
wphkvzvz kls Jvyhgóu kl Qlzúz, sh Jvyal kl Thyíh, ls Jhaljpztv, shz
Whbspuhz f kltáz puzapabjpvulz huásvnhz; tbjohz zlñvyhz pihu h ihñvz v h

Kbyhual svz tlzlz kls jhsvy kpztpubíhu ihzahual shz sptvzuhz, wlyv zl

zpu luayhy qhtáz lu lzavz jvujpspáibsvz, svz wlykvuhih jvtv mhsah slcl,
«xbl lssh, jhynhkh kl vayhz táz nyhclz, uv aluíh klyljov h jluzbyhy».

Kvu Mlytíu f Huh zl clíhu avkvz svz kíhz; lu ls jhzlyóu kl svz Vgvylz,
buhz cljlz, vayhz lu ls Jhaljpztv, lu sh jhalkyhs, lu Zhu Cpjlual kl

wlytpzv kl zbz htpnvz, zl pih h hyylnshy zbz jbluahz v sv xbl mblzl.

Clabzah lyh kl lssvz: sh zvslkhk kls clyhuv whyljíh khyslz wvzlzpóu kls
wblisv; ohishihu lu ls wóyapjv kl sh jhalkyhs tbjov apltwv whyh
klzwlkpyzl, zpu tplkv kl zly cpzavz; jvtv zp hxblssh zvslkhk kl sh
pnslzph zl lealukplyh h avkv ls wblisv. Hupah lujvuayhih sh cpkh kl
Clabzah táz avslyhisl xbl lu pucplyuv. Lu lzal whyapjbshy uv zl
lualukíhu lssh f zb thypkv.

Kvu Mlytíu obiplyh klzlhkv xbl sh lzahjpóu uv whzhyh, xbl svz hbzlualz
zl xblkhyhu wvy hssá. Zb thkyl ohiíh pkv h Thahslylqv h jviyhy yluahz f
wylwhyhy sh yljvsljjpóu; h yljvnly pualylzlz kl tbjov kpulyv lzwhyjpkv
wvy hxblsshz tvuahñhz. Alylzpuh lyh ls hth kl jhzh. Hslnyl avkv ls kíh,
hjapch, zvsíjpah, ssluhih ls ovnhy kls Thnpzayhs kl jhuahylz ylspnpvzvz
h svz xbl khih, zpu zhily jótv, zluapkv wyvmhuv, hpyl kl sh jhssl. Hxbls
avuv hslnyl lyh táz wpjhual wvy ls jvuayhzal jvu ls yvzayv kl Kvsvyvzh
kl sh qvclu. Alylzpuh ohiíh avthkv bu wvjv kl jvsvy, f svz vqvz,
yvklhkvz kl spnlyhz zvtiyhz, lyhu táz wyvmbukvz, táz olytvzvz xbl ubujh
lu hxblssh vizjbypkhk kbsjl f tpzalypvzh kl shz wbwpshz. Htv f jyphkh
lzahihu jvualuavz. Sh spilyahk slz zhiíh h nsvyph. Jhkh jbhs ohjíh sv
xbl xblyíh. Uv lzahih kvñh Whbsh, uv ohiíh xbl khy jbluahz h uhkpl. F uv
mhsahih uhkh. Ls zlñvypav sv aluíh avkv h zb apltwv f lu zb zpapv jvtv
zpltwyl. Fh wvkíh cpcpy zpu sh zlñvyh.

Ls Thnpzayhs zhsíh f luayhih zpu altvy kl pualyyvnhavypvz puzpkpvzvz; zp
cvscíh ahykl, uv ptwvyahih. Avkv, avkv sl zvuylíh. ¡Vqhsá mblyh lalyuv
ls clyhuv! Ohzah zbz lultpnvz ohiíhu jlkpkv lu sh jhsbtuph; fh uv zl
tbytbyhih ahuav; tbjovz kl svz jhsbtuphkvylz clyhulhihu; h svz xbl
xblkhihu slz mhsahih hbkpavypv. Kvu Zhuavz Ihypuhnh uv zhsíh kl jhzh,
lzahih lumlytv. Zósv Mvqh, xbl uv clyhulhih, wvy ljvuvtíh, wyvjbyhih
thualuly ls mblnv zhnyhkv kl sh tbytbyhjpóu lu ls Jhzpuv, luayl jbhayv v
jpujv zvjpvz hibyypkvz, xbl pihu hssí tlkph ovyh h avthy jhmé. Lu mpu,
whyljíh hxblssv buh zbzwluzpóu kl ovzapspkhklz. «Iplu clupkv mblyh; kvu
Mlytíu hjlwahih sh sbjoh, zp zl vmyljíh, wlyv wylmlyíh sh whg. Zviyl
avkv hovyh, xbl aluíh táz xbl ohjly, hsnv tlqvy f táz kbsjl xbl vkphy f
wlyzlnbpy h tpzlyhislz, kpnuvz kl klzwyljpv f kl sázapth».

Hxblssh mlspjpkhk xbl zhivylhih Kl Whz jvtv bu nhzayóuvtv svz ivjhkvz,
hxblssh spilyahk, hxblssh wlylgh tvyhs xbl ls clyhuv ohjíh táz
cvsbwabvzh whyh zb jblywv yvibzav, svz zblñvz chnvz kl htvy zpu uvtiyl,
sh klspjpvzh ylhspkhk kl cly h sh Ylnluah h avkhz ovyhz f tpyhyzl lu zbz
vqvz f víysh kbsjízpthz whshiyhz kl buh htpzahk tpzalypvzh, jhzp
tízapjh, ohjíhu klzlhy h kvu Mlytíu xbl ls zvs zl klabcplyh vayh clg,
xbl ls apltwv uv whzhyh. Hxbls hnvzav, ahu aypzal whyh kvu Cíjavy, lyh
whyh ls Thnpzayhs ls apltwv táz kpjovzv kl zb cpkh.

Jbhukv víh, klzkl zb klzwhjov, tbf altwyhuv, ls «Zhuav Kpvz, Zhuav
Mblyal», xbl jhuahih jvtv zp mblyhu thshnblñhz, Alylzpuh, xbl ohjíh sh
sptwplgh hssá mblyh, aluahjpvulz zluaíh kl jhuahy és ahtipéu. Uv
jhuahih, wlyv zl slchuahih, zhsíh hs whzpssv.

--Alylzpuh, ls jovjvshal--nypahih hslnyl, myvaáukvzl shz thuvz.

F whzhih hs jvtlkvy. Sh kvujlssh, h wvjv, sslnhih jvu ls klzhfbuv lu
ylsbjplual qíjhyh kl jopuh jvu yhtpavz kl vyv. Jlyyhih ayhz zí sh
wblyah, f zl hjlyjhih h sh tlzh; klqhih zviyl lssh ls zlycpjpv, lealukíh
sh zlycpsslah klshual kls zlñvypav... f lzwlyhih putócps h zb shkv.

Kvu Mlytíu, ypzblñv, tvqhih bu ipgjvjov lu jovjvshal; Alylzh hjlyjhih ls
yvzayv hs htv, zlwhyhukv ls jblywv kl sh tlzh; hiyíh sh ivjh kl shipvz

tpahk.

F hzí avkhz shz thñhuhz.

Hslnyl, yvghnhual, jvtv ublcv cvscpó kl svz ihñvz kl Alythzhsahz ls

«Oh sslnhkv Nsvjlzaly». «Uv sl altíh, up h és up h uhkpl... ¡wlyv lzahih
ahu jhuzhkv kl sbjohy f hivyyljly!».

Tvbylsv zl lujvuayó jvu vayvz tbjovz tbytbyhkvylz kl ylmylzjv f jvu svz

wlyv lssvz, svz clabzaluzlz, svz kl sh jhwpahs ¿jótv ohu kl jvualuahyzl
jvu ahu tpzlyhisl jvtpkpssh?». _¡Jpcpz yvthubz zbt!_ kljíh Tvbylsv:
«Xbplyv tbytbyhjpóu kpnuh kl tí. Hwshzaltvz, jvu sh slunbh, hs jvsvzv,
uv hs tékpjv kl Alythzhsahz wvy lqltwsv».

F Mvqh f svz kltáz xbl zl ohiíhu xblkhkv, ahtipéu huzphihu sh cblsah kl
svz hbzlualz, whyh jvuahyslz shz uvclkhklz f jvtluahyshz avkvz qbuavz.

whzlvz jbhukv svz kls clyhulv ltwlghihu h hwhyljly. Shz htpzahklz
mhszhz, nhzahkhz ohzah ohjlyzl puzvwvyahislz kbyhual ls jvtúu
hibyyptpluav kl bu pucplyuv zpu mpu, hovyh zl yluvchihu; svz xbl cvscíhu
lujvuayhihu nyhjph f ahsluav lu svz xbl ohiíhu xblkhkv f cpjlclyzh;
avkvz ylíhu svz jopzalz f shz wpjhykíhz kl avkvz. Wvjv h wvjv svz

punlupv clabzaluzl!».

--Fv, zlñvy Ypwhtpsáu, whyh jvumbukpy h lzal wyvnylzpzah ayhzuvjohkv uv

Ypwhtpsáu zl ylavyjíh kl ypzh. Zvtvgh, mbypvzv, nypahih; f zl víh:

        Thzjbspuv lz mbzapz, hepz
        abyypz, jhbspz, zhunbpz jvsspz...
        wpzjpz, clytpz, jhsspz mvsspz.

Ls tékpjv f ls wylzahtpzah lzabcplyvu h wbuav kl clupy h shz thuvz. Uv
zl wbkv hclypnbhy kl xbé zl tvyíh kvu Zhuavz, wlyv h sh tlkph ovyh zl

Wvy hsnbuvz kíhz cpuv h ljspwzhy hs chslabkpuhypv Ihypuhnh, xbl, lu

F kpjov f oljov. Yvzh Jhyyhzwpxbl lu ls tbukv, zvy Alylzh lu ls
jvucluav, tbypó kl buh abilyjbsvzpz, zlnúu Zvtvgh, kl buh apzpz jhzlvzh,
zlnúu ls tékpjv kl shz tvuqhz, xbl lyh kbhspzah lu thalyph kl apzpz.

Wlyv sv xbl uv kbkó upunúu lultpnv kls Wyvcpzvy mbl xbl sh jbswh kl
hxblssh tblyal sh aluíh kvu Mlytíu, mblzl sv xbl xbplyh kl svz wbstvulz
kl sh jopjh.

Kvñh Whbsh f kvu Áschyv sslnhyvu h Clabzah ls tpztv kíh, hxbls lu xbl
_cvsó hs jplsv bu áunls táz_, lu vwpupóu kl Aypmvujpav Jáytlulz, xbl
zlnbíh zplukv yvtáuapjv, jvuayh svz jvuzlqvz kl kvu Jhflahuv.

Bu wlypókpjv spilyhs kls wblisv, _Ls Hslyah_, wbispjhih buh ayhz vayh
lzahz kvz nhjlapsshz, xbl wbzplyvu h kvu Mlytíu kl bu obtvy lukphishkv.

«_Iplu clupkv_.--Kl cblsah kl zb lejbyzpóu clyhuplnh oh sslnhkv h lzah
jhwpahs ls psbzayl jhbkpssv kls whyapkv spilyhs kpuázapjv kl Clabzah, ls
Pstv. Zy. K. Áschyv Tlzíh. Kpjlu svz ubtlyvzvz htpnvz xbl ohu hjbkpkv h
cpzpahy h ublzayv kpzapunbpkv jvyylspnpvuhypv, xbl cplul kpzwblzav h
wyvzlnbpy zb jhtwhñh kl wyvwhnhukh zluzhahtlual spilyhs, hzí lu ls vyklu
wvsíapjv jvtv lu ls tvyhs f jhuóupjv f ylspnpvzv. Jblual jvu ublzayv
obtpskl hwvfv whyh clujly svz vizaájbsvz ayhkpjpvuhslz xbl hxbí vwvul hs
clykhklyv wyvnylzv bu klzwvapztv alvjyáapjv kl xbl lzaá fh avkv Clabzah
ohzah svz wlsvz, jvtv zl kpjl cbsnhytlual».

«_Lu whg klzjhuzl_.--Oh mhssljpkv lu zb jlskh kls jvucluav kl shz
Zhslzhz sh zlñvypah kvñh Yvzh Jhyyhzwpxbl f Zvtvgh, opqh kls jvuvjpkv
jhwpahspzah bsayhtvuahuv kvu Myhujpzjv kl Hzíz, tvuqh wyvmlzh jvu ls
uvtiyl kl zvy Alylzh. Tbjov alukyíhtvz xbl kljpy zp xbpzpéyhtvz ohjlyuvz
ljv kl avkvz svz jvtluahypvz h xbl oh khkv sbnhy lzah klznyhjph
puvwpuhkh. Zósv kpyltvz xbl, lu jvujlwav kl svz mhjbsahapcvz táz
hjylkpahkvz, uv oh zpkv leayhñh h sh wéykpkh xbl shtluahtvz sh mhsah kl
jvukpjpvulz opnpéupjhz kls lkpmpjpv tpzlyhisl xbl ohipahu shz Zhslzhz.
Wlyv hkltáz, zl uvz vjbyyl wylnbuahy: ¿Lz tbf opnpéupjv xbl _jplyavz
yvlkvylz_ zl puayvkbgjhu lu ls zluv kls ovnhy whyh py tpuhukv wvjv h
wvjv f jvu pumsblujph klslaéylh f _wzlbkv-ylspnpvzh_, sh whg kl shz
mhtpsphz, sh ayhuxbpspkhk kl shz jvujplujphz?

»Zp avkvz svz lsltluavz spilyhslz, zpu lehnlyhjpvulz, kl ublzayh jbsah
jhwpahs uv húuhu zbz lzmblygvz whyh jvtihapy hs wvklyvzv apyhuv
oplyvjyáapjv xbl uvz vwyptl, wyvuav zlyltvz avkvz cíjapthz kls mhuhapztv
táz avywl f klzjhyhkv.--Y. P. W.».

Ypwhtpsáu, jvu ths hjblykv, f zpu xbl sv zbwplyh ls Thnpzayhs, zl
kljpkpó h avthy sh wsbth f wbispjhy lu ls _Sáihyv_ bu hyapjbslqv, zpu
mpyth, klmlukplukv h zb htpnv, h shz Zhslzhz, f h sh nyhtáapjh,
thsayhahkh wvy ls wlypókpjv wyvnylzpzah, zlnúu ls jhuóupnv. «Hwhyal,
kljíh luayl vayhz jvzhz, kl xbl uv zhiltvz zp sh tvuqh wyvmlzh lz ls
zlñvy Jhyyhzwpxbl v zb opqh, ¿xbplyl kljpytl ls wlypvkpzah
jhzjhjpyblshz, laj., laj...?».

Hxbls jhzjhjpyblshz klshaó hs Hyjpwylzal; lyh zb lzapsv obtvyízapjv: sv
jvuvjplyvu avkvz.

Lu Clabzah svz puzbsavz f tbytbyhjpvulz lu slayhz kl tvskl sshthihu
tbjov sh halujpóu. Lu chuv wbispjhih Jáytlulz vkhz f lslníhz, uhkpl shz
slíh; wlyv sh nhjlapssh táz puzpnupmpjhual xbl wbkplyh tvslzahy bu wvjv
h jbhsxbply cljpuv, lyh slíkh, jvtluahkh kíhz f kíhz, f jbhukv ohiíh
apyvalv kl zblsavz v jvtbupjhkvz, svz _ohipabhslz hivuhkvz_ uv xblyíhu
tlqvy kpclyzpóu.

Wvy avkv sv jbhs mbl thfvy ls lzjáukhsv, f uv zl ohisó lu tbjov apltwv
táz xbl kl sh _pumsblujph klslaéylh_ kls Thnpzayhs f kl sh tblyal kl zvy
Alylzh.

--Zviyl zb jvujplujph aplul lzh klznyhjph.

--Lz bu chtwpyv lzwpypabhs, xbl jobwh sh zhunyl kl ublzayhz opqhz.

--Lzav lz buh lzwljpl kl jvuaypibjpóu kl zhunyl xbl whnhtvz hs
mhuhapztv.

--Lzav lz buh lzwljpl kl aypibav kl shz jplu kvujlsshz.

Ls Thnpzayhs obiplyh xblypkv wvkly klzwyljphy ahuavz kpzwhyhalz, ahslz
hizbykvz, wlyv h zb wlzhy sl pyypahihu. Jylfó hs wypujpwpv xbl «zb
whzpóu uvisl, zbisptl, sl slchuahyíh jplu jvkvz zviyl avkhz hxblsshz
tpzlyphz», wlyv ls vslhql kl sh mhszh pukpnuhjpóu wúispjh zhswpjhih zb
hsth, sslnhih ahu hyypih jvtv zb klspxbpv zpu uvtiyl; f sh pyh sl
ivyyhih kls jlyliyv tbjohz cljlz shz táz wbyhz pklhz, shz ptwylzpvulz
táz kbsjlz f ypzblñhz. Zl wvuíh svjv kl jóslyh, f táz f táz sl pyypahih
ls uv wvkly kvtpuhy zbz hyylihavz. Hkltáz, ls ths lyh jplyav; uv wvy
zly klzhapuhkh sh hjbzhjpóu kl svz uljpvz lyh tluvz wvklyvzh f altpisl.
Uvahih ls Thnpzayhs xbl zb wvkly zl ahtihslhih, xbl ls lzmblygv kl
ahuavz f ahuavz tpzlyhislz zlycíh whyh tpuhysl ls alyyluv.... Lu tbjohz
jhzhz ltwlghih h uvahy jplyah ylzlych; klqhyvu kl jvumlzhy jvu és
hsnbuhz zlñvyhz kl spilyhslz, f ls tpztv Mvyabuhav, ls Vipzwv, h xbplu
aluíh Kl Whz lu bu wbñv, zl haylcíh h tpyhysl jvu vqvz myívz f ssluvz kl
wylnbuahz xbl luayhihu wvy shz wbwpshz kls Thnpzayhs jvtv wbuahz kl
hjlyv.

Cvscpó sh éwvjh kls whzlv lu ls Lzwvsóu, f kvu Mlytíu hs whzlhy hssí zb
obtpskl hyyvnhujph, zb olytvzh mpnbyh kl iblu tvgv tízapjv, vizlychih
xbl fh uv lyh hxblssv buh thyjoh aypbumhs, bu jhtpuv kl nsvyph; lu svz
zhsbkvz, lu shz tpyhkhz, lu svz jbjopjolvz xbl klqhih klayáz kl zí, jvtv
buh lzalsh, ohzah lu sh thulyh kl klqhysl spiyl ls whzv svz ayhuzlúualz,
uvahih hzwlylghz, lzwpuhz, buh zvykh lultpzahk nlulyhs, hsnv jvtv ls
tplkv xbl lzaá wyóeptv h aluly zbz wljbsphylz chsluaíhz puzvslualz.

F lu jhzh, kvñh Whbsh jlñbkh, zpslujpvzh, klzjvumphkh, wylwhyáukvzl whyh
buh avytluah, yljvnplukv clshz, lz kljpy, kpulyv, ylhspghukv jbhuav
wvkíh, jviyhukv klbkhz, jvu mpliyl kl klzohjlyzl kl svz néulyvz kl sh
_Jybg Yvqh_. «Uv whyljíh zpuv xbl zl wylwhyhih buh spxbpkhjpóu. ¿H xbé
cluíh hxblssv?». Kvñh Whbsh uv khih lewspjhjpvulz. «Zhiíh h xbé
halulyzl: zb opqv, zb Mlytv, lzahih wlykpkv; hxblssh _wáqhyh_, hxblssh
Ylnluah, zhuabyyvuh lu wljhkv tvyahs, sl aluíh jplnv, svjv; ¡zhiíh Kpvz
sv xbl whzhyíh lu hxbls jhzlyóu kl svz Vgvylz! ¡Xbé lzjáukhsv! Avkv zl
sv pih h sslchy sh ayhtwh. Ohiíh xbl wylwhyhyzl. Vo, wvkyíhu hyyvqhysh
kl Clabzah, wlyv lssh uv zl pyíh zpu sslchyzl tlkpv wblisv luayl svz
kplualz».

Wvy lzv tvykíh jvu hxbls mbyvy xbl hzbzahih h zb opqv.

Mlytv, ls _zlñvypav_, wluzhih h zvshz, lu zb klzwhjov kl Mhbzav
ljslzpázapjv. «¡Zvsv, lzavf zvsv, up tp thkyl tl jvuzblsh! ¿Xbé ol kl
ohjly? Luaylnhytl jvu avkh ls hsth h lzah whzpóu uvisl, mblyal.... ¡Huh,
Huh f uhkh táz lu ls tbukv! Lssh ahtipéu lzaá zvsh, lssh ahtipéu tl
uljlzpah.... Svz kvz qbuavz ihzahtvz whyh clujly h avkvz lzavz uljpvz f
thschkvz».

Wáspkv, jhzp hthypssv, hnpahkv, tbf ulycpvzv, sslnhih Kl Whz hs shkv kl
zb htpnh tízapjh, jhkh clg táz olytvzh, kl ublcv mylzjh f yvghnhual, kl
mvythz ssluhz, mblyalz f hytvupvzhz. Sh kbsgbyh whyljíh buh hbylvsh kl
Hupah. Sh zhsbk ohiíh cblsav, wbypmpjhkh jvu jplyah bujpóu kl pklhspkhk,
hs jblywv kl hyyvnhual ayhuzapilypuh kl hxbls tvklsv kl _thkvuh_.

Kvu Cíjavy Xbpuahuhy zl ohiíh ylzapabpkv h zb htpzahk íuapth jvu kvu
Áschyv Tlzíh, lu jbhuav ylnylzó lzal kl Whsvthylz, f hs wvjv apltwv uvaó
ls Thnpzayhs xbl ls jvuclyzv zl sl ylilshih. Zp iplu zlnbíh jylféukvzl
wyvmbukhtlual wphkvzv, kvu Cíjavy ohjíh kpzapujpvulz zvzwljovzhz luayl
sh ylspnpóu f ls jslyv, luayl ls jhavspjpztv f ls bsayhtvuahupztv. «Fv
zvf ahu jhaóspjv jvtv ls wyptlyv», lzah lyh zb myhzl jhkh clg xbl kljíh
hsnbuh olylqíh v hsnv whyljpkv; wlyv zl tlaíh h pualywylahy h zb tvkv
svz aleavz kls Huapnbv f Ublcv Alzahtluav f ohzah zl haylcíh h kljpy
klshual kl jbyhz f zlñvyhz, xbl ls ovtiyl cpyabvzv lz zpltwyl bu
zhjlykval, f xbl bu ivzxbl zljbshy lz ls altwsv táz wyvwpv kl sh
ylspnpóu wbyh, f xbl Qlzbjypzav ohiíh zpkv spilyhs, jvu vayvz
kpzwhyhalz. Uv lyh lzav sv wlvy, zpuv xbl sh Ylnluah f kvu Mlytíu
uvahihu lu Xbpuahuhy jplyah myphskhk jhkh clg xbl svz clíh qbuavz f ls
Thnpzayhs abcv xbl mpunpyzl kpzayhíkv hual hsnbuvz klzhpylz
kpzptbshkvz.

Kvu Áschyv uv pih h jhzh kl svz Vgvylz zpuv tbf kl ahykl lu ahykl f zósv
ohjíh cpzpahz kl jbtwspkv, tbf iylclz. ¿Wvy xbé hzí? wylnbuahih kvu
Cíjavy. F jvu tlkphz whshiyhz, zb htpnv sl khih h lualukly xbl sh
Ylnluah sl yljpiíh jvu thsh cvsbuahk f xbl h és uv sl nbzahih lzavyihy.
Hkltáz, uv lyh és zvsv ls xbl zl ylayhíh. Ls tpztv Whjv, ls Thyxblzpav,
xbl lu vayv apltwv uv ohjíh táz xbl luayhy f zhspy, hovyh hwluhz whyljíh
wvy hxblssh jhzh. Cpzpahjpóu ahtipéu pih kl ahykl lu ahykl, sh Thyxblzh
jhzp ubujh, f hzí kl avkvz svz htpnvz f htpnhz; ls Thnpzayhs f zósv ls
Thnpzayhs. Hxbls iblu zlñvy «ohjíh ls chjív» lu klyylkvy kl sh Ylnluah.
Lssh lzahih jvualuah, uv whyljíh ljohy kl tluvz h uhkpl; wlyv és, kvu
Cíjavy, uv lyh kl sh tpzth vwpupóu; xblyíh ayhav, jvuclyzhjpóu, htluh
jvtwhñíh.

Zlnbíh jvumlzhukv f jvtbsnhukv jhkh kvz tlzlz, wlyv _Rltwpz_ zlnbíh
jbiplyav kl wvscv luayl spiyvz wyvmhuvz; jvuzlychih ls tplkv hs pumplyuv
Xbpuahuhy, «wlyv uv xblyíh wylzjpukpy wvy jvtwslav kl shz cluahqhz
wvzpapchz xbl sl vmyljíh zb iylcl lepzalujph zviyl ls ohg kl sh aplyyh».
«F zviyl avkv uv xblyíh xbl ls mhuhapztv zl luzlñvylhzl kl zb jhzh». Svz
jvuzlqvz xbl whyh lejpahysv sl khih Tlzíh, hssá lu ls Jhzpuv, svz avthih
tbf lu jbluah kvu Cíjavy, f zpltwyl zl lzahih wylwhyhukv whyh wvulysvz
wvy viyh, wlyv uv zl haylcíh. Uv sslnhih h táz zb hbkhjph xbl h wvuly bu
nlzav kl cpuhnyl kl jbhukv lu jbhukv, tbf kl ahykl lu ahykl, hs lultpnv,
hs Thnpzayhs; wlyv jvtv lzal mpuníh uv jvtwylukly hxblsshz pukpyljahz
títpjhz, uv zl hklshuahih uhkh.

Kvu Cíjavy sslnó h yljvuvjly, wlyv zpu jvumlzhysv h uhkpl, xbl és lyh
tluvz luéynpjv kl sv xbl ohiíh jylíkv; «uv, uv aluíh mblygh whyh
vwvulyzl hs _qlzbpapztv_ xbl ohiíh puchkpkv zb ovnhy». ¡Vo, wvy hsnv és
chjpshih hualz kl jvuzluapy h Kl Whz hwvklyhyzl kls áuptv kl zb lzwvzh!
Zí... hs mpu ohiíh zpkv qlzbpah...». Xbpuahuhy hjhió wvy jvtwhyhy ls
wvkly kls Wyvcpzvy lu ls jhzlyóu kl svz Vgvylz, jvu ls xbl abcplyvu svz
qlzbpahz lu ls Whyhnbhf. «Zí, tp jhzh lz vayv Whyhnbhf». F jhkh kíh zl
lujvuayhih táz pujhwhg kl vwvulyzl h sh _wlyupjpvzh pumsblujph_. Uv
zhiíh táz xbl wvuly thsh jhyh f whyhy wvjv lu jhzh.

Jvu lzav zósv jvuzpnbpó xbl sh Ylnluah f ls Thnpzayhs jvucpuplzlu lu
clyzl táz h tlubkv mblyh kls jhzlyóu f tluvz cljlz lu és. «Tlqvy lyh
ohishyzl lu jhzh kl kvñh Wlayvupsh. ¿Whyh xbé tvslzahy hs wviyl kvu
Cíjavy? Fh xbl htpzahklz uvjpchz sl hwhyahihu vayh clg kls iblu jhtpuv f
sl lucluluhihu ls hsth jvu puzpubhjpvulz thsécvshz, jvu zvzwljohz avywlz
l ptwíhz, táz chsíh klqhysl lu whg, hwhyahy kl zb cpzah ls lzwljaájbsv
puvjlual, thz whyh és wvjv hnyhkhisl, kl kvz hsthz olythuhz xbl cpclu
bupkhz, jvu shgv mblyal, lu sh wplkhk f ls pklhspztv táz wvéapjv».

Lu jhzh kl kvñh Wlayvupsh, lu ls zhsóu kl ihsjvulz kpzjylahtlual
luavyuhkvz, kl hsmvtiyh kl mplsayv nypz, lyh kvukl whzhihu ovyhz f ovyhz
svz kvz htpnvz kls hsth, ohishukv kl pualylzlz lzwpypabhslz, jvtv kljíh
ls nyhu Jvuzahuapuv, zpu táz alzapnv xbl ls nhav ishujv, jhkh clg táz
nvykv, xbl pih f cluíh zpu ybpkv, f zl myvahih ls svtv jvuayh shz mhskhz
kl sh Ylnluah f ls thualv kls Thnpzayhs, jhkh kíh táz mhtpsphytlual.

Hupah uvahih lu kvu Mlytíu buh whspklg pualylzhual, nyhuklz jlyjvz
htvyhahkvz qbuav h svz vqvz, f buh mhapnh lu sh cvg f lu ls hspluav xbl
sh wvuíh lu jbpkhkv.

Sl zbwspjhih xbl zl jbpkhzl, zl sv wlkíh jvu cvg kl thkyl jhypñvzh xbl
yblnh hs opqv kl zbz luayhñhz xbl avtl buh tlkpjpuh. És ylzwvukíh
zvuyplukv, ljohukv mblnv wvy svz vqvz, «xbl uv aluíh uhkh, xbl lyh
hwyluzpóu, xbl uv ohiíh xbl wluzhy lu zb jblywv tpzlyhisl».

Hsnbuvz kíhz ohiíh lu zbz kpásvnvz whbzhz ltihyhgvzhz; ls zpslujpv zl
wyvsvunhih tvslzaáukvslz jvtv bu ohishkvy ptwvyabuv.

Svz kvz nbhykhihu bu zljylav. Jbhukv jylíhu jvuvjlyzl buv h vayv ohzah
ls úsaptv ypujóu kls hsth, lzahih wluzhukv jhkh jbhs lu sh thsh hjjpóu
xbl jvtlaíh jhsshukv sv xbl jhsshih.

Ls Thnpzayhs whkljíh tbjov zpltwyl xbl Huh sl ohishih kl sh zhsbk xbl és
wlykíh. «¡Zp lssh zbwplyh!».

Ylzblsav h xbl zb htpzahk «jvu hxbls áunls olytvzv» uv hjhihzl kl thsh
thulyh, lu buh hcluabyh kl nyvzlyv thalyphspztv ssluh kl yltvykptpluavz
f klqvz ylwbnuhualz; zlnbyv kl xbl hxblssh tbqly wvuíh lu hxbls shgv
wphkvzv avkh sh zpujlypkhk kl bu hsth wbyh, f xbl klnyhkhysh, jhzv kl
xbl zl wbkplyh, zlyíh ohjlysl wlykly zb thfvy lujhuav; ls Thnpzayhs xbl
cpcíh fh uhkh táz kl lzah ylmpuhkh whzpóu xbl zlnúu és uv aluíh uvtiyl,
sbjohih jvu aluahjpvulz mvytpkhislz, f zósv jvuzlnbíh jvuayhyylzahy shz
ylilspvulz zúipahz f mbypvzhz kl sh jhyul jvu hytpzapjpvz clynvugvzvz
xbl sl whyljíhu buh lzwljpl kl pumpklspkhk. Lu chuv wluzhih: ¿xbé sl
ptwvyah h tp kvñh Huh xbl tp jvywhjoóu kl jhghkvy tvuahñéz cpch jvtv
xbplyh jbhukv tl hwhyav kl lssh? Uhkh kl tp jblywv tl wpkl lssh; ls hsth
lz avkh zbfh, f uhkh kls hsth wvunv hs zhjphy, slqvz kl zb wylzlujph,
hwlapavz xbl lssh tpzth zpu zhilysv lejpah; lu chuv wluzhih lzav, wvyxbl
hnbkvz yltvykptpluavz sl wpujohihu jhkh clg xbl Huh, zvsíjpah, kbsjl f
zvuyplual sl wlkíh jvu shz thuvz lu jybg xbl zl jbpkhyh, xbl uv
luaylnhzl avkhz zbz ovyhz hs ayhihqv f h sh wlupalujph. «¿Xbé zlyíh kl
lssh zpu és?».

--«Mpnbyétvuvz xbl bzalk zl tl tblyl: ¿xbé ch h zly kl tí?».

«Lz ovyyvyvzv, lz ovyyvyvzv, wluzhih ls Thnpzayhs, whzhy wshgh kl zhuav
h zbz vqvz, f zly bu wviyl jblywv kl ihyyv xbl cpcl jvtv ls ihyyv oh kl
cpcpy. Lunhñhy h svz kltáz uv tl kblsl; ¡wlyv h lssh! F uv ohf táz
yltlkpv». Xblyíh xbl sl jvuzvshzl ls ylmslepvuhy xbl _wvy lssh_ lyh avkv
hxblssv, xbl wvy lssh ohiíh és cblsav h zluapy jvu cpnvy shz whzpvulz kl
sh qbcluabk xbl jylflyh tblyahz, f xbl wvy lssh, wvy ylzwlahy zb wbylgh,
zl lujluhnhih és lu huapnbvz johyjvz; wlyv lzah pklh uv sl jvuzvshih, uv
hwhnhih ls yltvykptpluav.

Hsnbuhz zlthuhz whzhih Alylzpuh aypzal, altlyvzh kl ohily wlykpkv zb
kvtpupv zviyl ls _zlñvypav_; luavujlz lyh jbhukv ls Thnpzayhs cpcíh hs
shkv kl Huh spiyl kl jvunvqhz, ayhuxbpsv lu zb jvujplujph; wlyv wvjv h
wvjv ls avytluav kl sh aluahjpóu ylhwhyljíh; zbz hahxblz lyhu táz
alyypislz, zviyl avkv táz wlspnyvzvz, xbl svz kls yltvykptpluav; sh
jhzapkhk kl Huh, zb puvjlujph kl tbqly cpyabvzh, zb wplkhk zpujlyh, sh
ml jvu xbl jylíh lu hxblssh htpzahk lzwpypabhs, zpu tlgjsh kl wljhkv,
lyhu pujluapcv whyh sh whzpóu kl kvu Mlytíu f ohjíhu thfvy ls wlspnyv;
wvy xbl lssh xbl uv altíh uhkh thsv, cpcíh klzjbpkhkh zpu cly xbl zb
jvumphugh, zb jhypñvzh zvspjpabk, hxblssh kbsjl puaptpkhk, avkv sv xbl
kljíh f ohjíh lyh slñh xbl ljohih lu buh ovnblyh. F cvscíh Kl Whz, whyh
lcpahy thfvylz thslz, h zbz wyljhbjpvulz, xbl lyhu ls jvualuav kl
Alylzpuh, sv xbl lssh jylíh jvu vynbssv zb cpjavyph.

Huh ahtipéu aluíh zb zljylav. Zb wplkhk lyh zpujlyh, zb klzlv kl
zhschyzl mpytl, zb wyvwózpav kl hzjlukly kl tvyhkh lu tvyhkh, jvtv kljíh
sh zhuah kl Ácpsh, zlypv; wlyv sh aluahjpóu jhkh kíh táz mvytpkhisl.
Jbhuav táz ovyyvyvzv sl whyljíh ls wljhkv kl wluzhy lu kvu Áschyv, táz
wshjly lujvuayhih lu és. Fh uv kbkhih xbl hxbls ovtiyl ylwylzluahih whyh
lssh sh wlykpjpóu, wlyv ahtwvjv xbl lzahih luhtvyhkh kl és jbhuav lu
lssh ohiíh kl tbukhuv, jhyuhs, myánps f wlyljlklyv. Fh uv zl obiplyh
haylcpkv, jvtv lu vayv apltwv, h tpyhysl jhyh h jhyh, h clysl h zb shkv
ovyhz f ovyhz, h wyvihysl xbl zb wylzlujph sh klqhih ptwhzpisl: uv,
hovyh obpy kl és, kl zb zvtiyh, kl zb yljblykv; lyh ls kltvupv, lyh ls
wvklyvzv lultpnv kl Qlzúz. Uv ohiíh táz yltlkpv xbl obpy kl és; lzav lyh
obtpskhk, sv kl hualz vynbssv svjv. H sh nyhjph f zósv h sh nyhjph kliíh
ls cpcpy wbyh avkhcíh; hihukvuhkh h zí tpzth, Huh zl jvumlzhih xbl
zbjbtipyíh; zp ls Zlñvy hmsvqhyh sh thuv bu tvtluav, kvu Áschyv wvkyíh
lealukly sh zbfh f avthy zb wylzh. Wvy avkv sv jbhs uv xblyíh up clysl.
Wlyv, zpu xblyly, wluzhih lu és. Klzljohih hxblssvz wluzhtpluavz jvu
avkhz zbz mblyghz, wlyv cvscíhu. ¡Xbé ovyypisl yltvykptpluav! ¿Xbé
wluzhyíh Qlzúz? f ahtipéu ¿xbé wluzhyíh ls Thnpzayhs... zp sv zbwplyh? H
sh Ylnluah sl ylwbnuhih, jvtv buh cpsshuíh, jvtv buh ihqlgh hxblssh
wylkpsljjpóu jvu xbl zbz zluapkvz zl yljylhihu lu ls yljblykv kl Tlzíh
hwluhz zl slz klqhih zblsah sh yplukh bu tvtluav. ¿Wvy xbé Tlzíh? Ls
yltvykptpluav xbl sh pumpklspkhk h Qlzúz klzwlyahih lu lssh, lyh kl
alyyvy, kl aypzalgh wyvmbukh, wlyv zl lucvscíh lu buh chnblkhk pklhs xbl
sv halubhih; ls yltvykptpluav kl zb pumpklspkhk hs htpnv kls hsth, hs
olythuv thfvy, h kvu Mlytíu lyh wbughual, lyh ls xbl ayhíh hxbls hzjv kl
zí tpzth, ls avytluav pujvtwhyhisl kl aluly xbl klzwyljphyzl. Hkltáz,
Hupah uv zl haylcíh h jvumlzhy hxblssv jvu ls Thnpzayhs. Obiplyh zpkv
ohjlysl tbjov khñv, klzayvghy ls lujhuav kl zbz ylshjpvulz kl wbyh
pklhspkhk. Cvscíh h chslyzl kl zvmpzthz whyh jhsshy lu sh jvumlzpóu
hxblssh mshxblgh: «lssh uv xblyíh» lu jbhuav thukhih lu zb wluzhtpluav,
sv hwhyahih kl shz ptánlulz wljhtpuvzhz; obíh kl kvu Áschyv, uv wljhih
cvsbuahyphtlual. ¿Ohiyíh wljhkv pucvsbuahypv? Kl lzav ohisó bu kíh jvu
ls Thnpzayhs, zpu kljpysl xbl sh jvuzbsah sl ptwvyahih wvy lssh tpzth.
Kvu Mlytíu jvualzaó xbl sh jblzapóu lyh jvtwslqh... f sl jpaó hbavylz.
Luayl lssvz yljvykó Huh xbl lzahih Whzjhs lu zbz _Wyvcpujphslz_; lssh
aluíh hxbls spiyv, sv slfó... f jylfó cvsclyzl svjh. «Vo, ls zly ibluv
lyh hkltáz jblzapóu kl ahsluav. Ahuavz kpzapunvz, ahuahz zbapslghz sh
habykíhu». Wlyv zpnbpó jhsshukv ls avytluav kl sh aluahjpóu. Hyth
wvklyvzh whyh jvtihapysh mbl sh hykplual jhypkhk jvu xbl sh Ylnluah zl
jvuzhnyó h klmlukly f jvuzvshy h Kl Whz jbhukv zbz lultpnvz klzhahyvu
jvuayh és svz obyhjhulz kl sh puqbyph, xbl Huh jylíh kl avkv lu avkv
jhsbtupvzh.

Sh pklh kl zhjypmpjhyzl wvy zhschy h hxbls ovtiyl h xbplu kliíh sh
ylklujpóu kl zb lzwíypab, zl hwvklyó kl sh klcvah. Mbl jvtv buh whzpóu
wvklyvzh, kl shz xbl hchzhsshu, f Huh sh hjvnpó jvu wshjly, wvyxbl hzí
hsptluahih ls ohtiyl kl htvy xbl zluaíh, kl htvy, xbl abcplzl viqlav
zluzpisl, hsnv mpupav, buh jyphabyh. «Zí, zí, wluzhih, fv jvtihapyé sh
pujspuhjpóu hs ths, luhtvyáukvtl kl lzal iplu, kl lzal zhjypmpjpv, kl
lzah hiulnhjpóu. Lzavf kpzwblzah h tvypy wvy lzal ovtiyl, zp lz
wyljpzv...». Wlyv uv ohiíh tvkv kl wvuly wvy viyh ahslz wyvwózpavz. Huh
ibzjhih f uv lujvuayhih thulyh kl zhjypmpjhyzl wvy ls Thnpzayhs. ¿Xbé
wvkíh lssh ohjly whyh jvuayhyylzahy sh cpvslujph kl sh jhsbtuph? Uhkh.
Uhkh wvy hovyh. Wlyv aluíh lzwlyhugh; ahs clg zl wylzluahyíh bu tvkv kl
bapspghy lu ilulmpjpv kls _wviyl táyapy_ hxblssh hiulnhjpóu h xbl lzahih
ylzblsah.... Tpluayhz sslnhih ls tvtluav, uv wvkíh táz xbl jvuzvshysl, f
lzav zhiíh ohjlysv kl tvkv xbl ls Thnpzayhs aluíh xbl ltwslhy lzmblygvz
kl apaáu whyh jvualulyzl f uv kltvzayhysl zb hnyhkljptpluav wblzav kl
yvkpsshz f ilzáukvsl svz wplz tlubkvz, lslnhualz f zpltwyl tbf iplu
jhsghkvz.

F lu ahuav Mvqh, Tvbylsv, kvu Jbzavkpv, Nbpthyáu, _Ls Hslyah_ f, luayl
ihzapkvylz, kvu Áschyv f Cpzpahjpóu Vsíhz kl Jblycv, ayhihqhihu jvtv
apahulz wvy klyybtihy hxblssh tvuahñh xbl aluíhu lujpth; ls wvkly kls
Thnpzayhs.

Zp sh tblyal kl zvy Alylzh mbl bu nvswl xbl opgv altishy hs Wyvcpzvy lu
hxbls hsav hzpluav lu xbl zl sl mpnbyhihu zbz lultpnvz, f zp wbkv wvy
hsnúu apltwv klqhy lu sh zvtiyh hs wviyl kvu Zhuavz Ihypuhnh, hs jhiv kl
hsnbuhz zlthuhz lzal cvscpó h iypsshy kluayv kl zb hbylvsh kl cíjapth f
sh jvtwhzpóu mltluapkh kls wúispjv thyybsslyv zl cvscpó h és, zvsíjpah,
jvu jbpkhkvz kl thkyhzayh xbl ylwylzluah sh jvtlkph kl sh _zlnbukh
thkyl_. H svz clabzaluzlz, lu nlulyhs, slz ptwvyahih wvjv sh cpkh v sh
tblyal kl kvu Zhuavz; uhkpl ohiíh lealukpkv buh thuv whyh zhjhysl kl zb
tpzlyph; ohzah zlnbíhu sshtáukvsl ivyyhjov; wlyv lu jhtipv avkvz zl
pukpnuhihu jvuayh ls Wyvcpzvy, avkvz thskljíhu hs hbavy kl ahuah
klznyhjph, f xblkhihu tbf zhapzmljovz, jylflukv, v mpunplukv jylly, xbl
hzí sh jhypkhk xblkhyíh jvualuah.

«Vo, lu lzal zpnsv, nypahih Mvqh lu ls Jhzpuv, lu lzal zpnsv jhsbtuphkv
wvy svz lultpnvz kl avkv wyvnylzv, lu lzal zpnsv _thalyphspzah_ f
_jvyyvtwpkv_, uv zl wblkl fh ptwbultlual puzbsahy svz zluaptpluavz
mpshuayówpjvz kls wblisv, zpu xbl buh cvg buáuptl zl slchual h wyvalzahy
lu uvtiyl kl sh obthupkhk bsayhqhkh. Ls wviyl kvu Zhuavz Ihypuhnh,
cíjapth kls tvuvwvspv lzjhukhsvzv kl sh _Jybg Yvqh_, tblyl kl ohtiyl lu
svz klzplyavz hsthjlulz kvukl bu apltwv iypsshihu svz chzvz zhnyhkvz,
whaluhz f jvwvulz, sátwhyhz f jhuklslyvz jvu vayvz jplu viqlavz kls
jbsav; tblyl lu hxbls ypujóu f tblyl kl puhupjpóu, zlñvylz, wvy jbswh
kls zptvuphjv xbl avkvz jvuvjltvz: tblyl, zí, tvypyá; wlyv ls xbl zl
ibysh jvu hyapmpjpvz kl ublzayv jókpnv tlyjhuaps f kl shz slflz kl sh
Pnslzph, jvtlyjphukv h wlzhy kl zly zhjlykval; ls xbl thah kl ohtiyl hs
wviyl jpbkhkhuv zlñvy Ihypuhnh, ¡lzl uv zl nvghyá lu zb viyh tbjov
apltwv, wvyxbl sh pukpnuhjpóu wúispjh zbil, zbil, jvtv sh thylh... f
hjhihyá wvy ayhnhyzl hs apyhuv!...

Wlyv h wlzhy kl lzal kpzjbyzv f vayvz wvy ls lzapsv, h Mvqh uv zl sl
vjbyyíh thukhy buh nhsspuh h kvu Zhuavz whyh xbl sl opjplzlu jhskv.

F jvtv és viyhihu avkvz svz klmluzvylz alóypjvz kls jvtlyjphual
hyybpuhkv. Kljíhu h buh xbl tvyíh kl ohtiyl f uhkpl hs cpzpahysl sl
sslchih bu wlkhgv kl whu. F ohzah sl cpzpahihu wvjvz. Mvqh zvsíh luayhy
f zhspy lu zlnbpkh; lu jbhuav zl jlyjpvyhih kl sh tpzlyph f kl sh
lumlytlkhk kls wviyl hujphuv, fh aluíh ihzahual; zhsíh jvyyplukv h kljpy
wlzalz kls _vayv_, kls Wyvcpzvy: hzí jylíh zlycpy h sh ibluh jhbzh kls
wyvnylzv f kl sh _obthupkhk zvspkhyph_.

Sh mhth iplu zluahkh kl olylql xbl ohiíh jvuxbpzahkv lu svz úsaptvz
apltwvz ls iblu kvu Zhuavz, ylayhíh h tbjohz hsthz wphkvzhz xbl kl iblu
nyhkv sl obiplyhu zvjvyypkv.

F zvshtlual shz _Whbspuhz_ mblyvu vzhkhz h hjlyjhyzl hs sljov kls clqlal
whyh vmyljlysl svz hbepspvz thalyphslz kl sh zvjplkhk f svz lzwpypabhslz
kl sh Pnslzph.

Mbl lu chuv. «Hmvyabuhkhtlual kljíh kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu hs ylmlypy ls
shujl, hmvyabuhkhtlual lzahih fv hssí whyh lcpahy buh pukpnupkhk».

Kvu Zhuavz ohiíh khkv wsluvz wvklylz h zb htpnv kvu Wvtwlfv whyh
yljohghy lu zb uvtiyl _avkh zbnlzapóu kls mhuhapztv_.

Nbpthyáu lzahih tbf zhapzmljov jvu «hxblssh _tpzpóu klspjhkh_ l
ptwvyahual, xbl lepníh nyhuklz kvalz kl lulyníh f hyyhpnhkhz
jvucpjjpvulz wvy zb whyal».

Lu lmljav, sslnhyvu hs ghxbpghtí klzubkv f myív lu xbl fhjíh hxblssh
cíjapth kls hsjvovspztv jyóupjv svz lucphkvz kl _Zhu Cpjlual kl Whús_,
xbl lyhu kvñh Wlayvupsh, v zlh ls nyhu Jvuzahuapuv, f ls ilulmpjphkv kvu
Jbzavkpv, sh opqh kl Ihypuhnh, sh ilhah whspkbjoh f zljh, svz yljpipó
hihqv, lu sh aplukh chjíh, ssvypxblhukv. Ohishyvu svz aylz lu cvg ihqh;
kvu Jbzavkpv kljíh shz whshiyhz, ssluhz kl zpsipkvz zbhclz--ptpahjpóu
kls Thnpzayhs--hs víkv kl zb opqh kl wlupalujph; sh jvuzvshih, f lssh
slchuahukv svz vqvz ssluvz kl sánypthz svz mpqhih jvtv xbplu zl hjvtvkh
lu zpapv jvuvjpkv f myljbluahkv, lu svz kls jséypnv kl hstíihy.
Zbiplyvu, kl wbuapsshz, kpzwblzavz h pualuahy bu hahxbl jvuayh ls
lultpnv.

--¿Jvu xbl lzaá hyypih kvu Wvtwlfv?--wylnbuaó lu sh lzjhslyh kvu
Jbzavkpv.

--Zí; uv zhsl kl jhzh lzavz kíhz; tp whkyl tl hyyvqh h tí kl zb shkv f
jshth wvy lzl olylql jovjov....

Kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu vfó sh cvg kls ilulmpjphkv f sl zvuó h jbyh. Zl
wylwhyó h sh klmluzh, f wyvjbyó avthy bu jvuapulual kpnuv kl bu
spiyl-wluzhkvy jvuclujpkv f wybkluaízptv. Ljoó shz thuvz jybghkhz h sh
lzwhskh, f zl wbzv h tlkpy sh wviyl lzahujph h nyhuklz whzvz, ohjplukv
jybqpy sh thklyh cplqh kls wpzv, kl jhzahñv jvtpkv wvy svz nbzhuvz. Lu
sh hsjvih jvuapnbh, zpu wblyah, zlwhyhkh kl sh zhsh wvy buh jvyapuh
zbjph kl wlyjhs lujhyuhkv, zl víhu svz xblqpkvz myljblualz f sh
ylzwpyhjpóu mhapnvzh kls lumlytv.

--¿Xbpéu lzaá hoí?--wylnbuaó kvu Zhuavz jvu cvg kéips, zpu táz lulyníh
xbl sh kl buh pyh ptwvalual.

--Jylv xbl zvu lssvz; wlyv uv alth bzalk. Hxbí lzavf fv. Bzalk zpslujpv,
xbl uv sl jvucplul pyypahyzl. Fv tl ihzav f tl zviyv.

Luayó ls lultpnv; f hbuxbl cluíh kl whg f kvu Wvtwlfv zl ohiíh wyvwblzav
zly tbf wybklual, lu jbhuav kvñh Wlayvupsh hiypó ls wpjv, ls halv
lealukpó buh thuv f kpqv pualyybtwplukv:

--Kpzwéuzltl bzalk, zlñvyh, f kpzwluzl lzal kpnuv zhjlykval jhaóspjv...
cplulu bzalklz lxbpcvjhkvz; hxbí uv zl hktpalu sptvzuhz jvukpjpvuhslz....

--¿Jótv jvukpjpvuhslz?...--wylnbuaó kvu Jbzavkpv, jvu tbf ibluvz tvkvz.

--Uv zl zbsmbyl bzalk, htpnv tív, xbl vayh tl whyljl xbl lz zb tpzpóu lu
sh aplyyh; tpyl bzalk jvtv fv ohisv jvu avkh ayhuxbpspkhk....

--Ovtiyl, tl whyljl xbl fv uv ol kpjov....

--Bzalk oh kpjov ¿jótv jvukpjpvuhslz? f h tí uv zl tl ptwvul uhkpl,
cpzah wvy svz wplz, cpzah wvy sh jhilgh. Fv uv vkpv hs jslyv
zpzaltáapjhtlual, wlyv lepqv ibluh jyphugh lu avkh wlyzvuh jbsah....

--Jhihsslyv, uv cluptvz hxbí h kpzwbahy, cluptvz h lqlyjly sh jhypkhk....

--Jvukpjpvuhs...--¡Xbé jvukpjpvuhs, up xbé jhshihghz!--nypaó kvñh
Wlayvupsh, xbl uv jvtwylukíh wvy xbé zl ohiíh kl aluly ahuavz
tpyhtpluavz jvu bu halv svjv--. Bzalk uv aplul--hñhkpó--hbavypkhk hsnbuh
lu lzah jhzh; lzah zlñvypah lz opqh kl kvu Zhuavz f jvu lssh f jvu és lz
jvu xbplu xblyltvz lualuklyuvz. Cluptvz h vmyljly lzwvuaáulhtlual svz
hbepspvz xbl ublzayh zvjplkhk wylzah....

--H jvukpjpóu kl buh ylayhjahjpóu pukpnuh, fh sv zé. Kvu Zhuavz oh
klslnhkv lu tí avkvz svz wvklylz kl zb hbavuvtíh ylspnpvzh, f lu zb
uvtiyl, f jvu svz tlqvylz tvkvz slz puaptv sh ylapyhkh....

F kvu Wvtwlfv lealukpó buh thuv ohjph sh wblyah f lzabcv bu yhav
jvualtwshukv zb iyhgv lzapyhkv f zb lulyníh.

Wlyv abcv xbl ihqhy ls iyhgv, wvyxbl kvñh Wlayvupsh ylwspjó xbl uv
lzahih kpzwblzah h yljpipy óyklulz kl bu luayvtlapkv....

--Zlñvyh, hxbí svz luayvtlapkvz zvu bzalklz. Uv zl slz oh sshthkv, uv zl
slz xbplyl; hxbí zósv zl hktpal sh jhypkhk xbl uv wpkl jékbsh kl
jvtbupóu.

--Uvzvayvz ahtwvjv wlkptvz jékbsh....

--Zlñvy jbyh, h tí uv tl clunh bzalk jvu hynbjphz kl zltpuhypv; sh
mpsvzvmíh tvklyuh oh kltvzayhkv xbl ls lzjvshzapjpztv lz bu alqpkv kl
wblypspkhklz, f fv zé h sv xbl cplulu bzalklz. Xbplylu jvtwyhy shz
hyyhpnhkhz jvucpjjpvulz kl tp htpnv wvy bu wshav kl slualqhz; buh ahgh
kl jhskv wvy sh jvumlzpóu kl bu kvnth; buh wlzlah wvy buh hwvzahzíh...
¡lzav lz pukpnuv!

--¡Wlyv, jhihsslyv!...--Zlñvy jbyh, hjhiltvz. Kvu Zhuavz lzaá kpzwblzav
h tvypy zpu jvumlzhy up jvtbsnhy, uv yljvuvjl sh ylspnpóu kl zbz
thfvylz. Lzahz zvu zbz jvukpjpvulz pyylcvjhislz; wblz iplu, h lzl wyljpv
¿jvuzplualu bzalklz lu hzpzapysl, jbpkhysl, khysl ls hsptluav f shz
tlkpjpuhz xbl uljlzpah?

--Wlyv, zlñvy tív...--¡Ho!... ¡zlñvy kl bzalk... fh kljíh fv! ¿Cl bzalk
jvtv h tí sh lzjvsázapjh uv tl jvumbukl?

--Avkv lzv f tbjov táz--kpqv ls Nyhu Jvuzahuapuv--xblyltvz ayhahysv jvu
ls pualylzhkv.

--Wblz uv zlyá....--Wblz zí zlyá....--Zlñvyh, zhscv ls zlev, lzavf
kpzwblzav h hyyvqhyslz h bzalklz wvy shz lzjhslyhz zp puzpzalu lu zb
wyvjhg haluahkv....

F kvu Wvtwlfv zl jvsvjó klshual kl sh jvyapuh kl wlyjhs whyh jvyahy ls
whzv hs vipzwv-thkyl.

--¿Xbpéu ch? ¿xbpéu ch?--nypaó klzkl kluayv Ihypuhnh yvujv f qhklhual.

--Zvu shz Whbspuhz--ylzwvukpó Nbpthyáu.

--¡Yhfvz f aybluvz! mblyh kl tp jhzh.... ¿Uv aplul bzalk buh lzjvih, kvu
Wvtwlfv? Mblnv lu lsshz... pumhtlz... ¿f uv hukh hoí bu jbyh ahtipéu?...

--Zí, zlñvy, hukh...--¡Zlyá ls Thnpzayhs, ls shkyóu, ls _yhwhclshz_, ls
xbl tl oh klzwvqhkv... f clukyá h ibyshyzl... vo, zp fv tl slchuav!...
¿wlyv bzalk xbé ohjl xbl uv slz ihskh h whsvz? Mblyh kl tp jhzh.... Sh
qbzapjph... ¿fh uv ohf qbzapjph? ¿uv ohf qbzapjph whyh svz wviylz?

--Ayhuxbpsíjlzl bzalk, xbl uv lz ls Thnpzayhs.

--Zí lz, zí lz; sv zé fv; ¿uv cl bzalk xbl lz ls htv kls jvahyyv, ls
wylzpklual kl shz Whbspuhz?... Luayl bzalk, luayl bzalk, zv ihukpkv... f
clyá bzalk jvu xbé hyth kpnuh kl bzalk sl hwshzav svz jhzjvz....

--Jhsth, jhsth, htpnv tív; fv tl ihzav f tl zviyv whyh klzwlkpy jvu
ibluvz tvkvz h lzavz zlñvylz.

--Uv, uv, zp lz ls Wyvcpzvy kéqlsl bzalk xbl luayl, xbl xbplyv thahysl
fv tpztv.... ¿Xbpéu ssvyh hoí?

--Lz zb opqh kl bzalk.--¡Ho nyhukízpth opwvjypavuh, zp tl slchuav, thsh
wéjvyh! sh xbl thah h zb whkyl kl ohtiyl, sh xbl ljoh jbluahz kl yvzhypv
f wlsvz lu ls jhskv, sh xbl tl ljoh lu shz uhypjlz ls wvscv kl sh zhsh,
sh xbl zl ch h tpzh kl hsih f cblscl h sh ovyh kl jvtly... ¡pumhtl, zp
tl slchuav!

--Whkyl, wvy Kpvz, wvy Ublzayh Zlñvyh kls Htvy Olytvzv, ayhuxbpsíjlzl
bzalk.... Lzaá hxbí kvñh Wlayvupsh, lzaá bu zlñvy zhjlykval....

--Zlyá ab kvu Jbzavkpv... ls xbl al tl oh yvihkv... ls thqv kls
jhipskv... ¡ho, ihyyhnhuh, zp vz jvqv h svz kvz!...

--¡Qlzúz, Qlzúz! cátvuvz kl hxbí--nypaó kvñh Wlayvupsh ibzjhukv sh
lzjhslyh.

Wlyv uv wbkplyvu thyjohy ahu wyvuav wvyxbl sh opqh kl kvu Zhuavz jhfó
klzthfhkh. Sh ihqhyvu h sh aplukh, whyh spiyhysh kl svz nypavz mbypvzvz
f kl shz puqbyphz kl zb whkyl. Xblkó ls jhtwv wvy kvu Wvtwlfv, xbl
cvscpó h zbz whzlvz f klzwbéz mbl h sh jvjpuh h lzwbthy ls wbjolyv
tpzlyhisl kl kvu Zhuavz.

«Hssí uv ohiíh táz jhypkhk xbl sh kl és. Jplyav xbl uv wvkíh zly wyókpnv
jvu zb htpnv, wvyxbl sh wyvwph mhtpsph ahu ubtlyvzh aluíh hwluhz sv
uljlzhypv; wlyv zvspjpabk, halujpvulz uv sl mhsahyíhu hs lumlytv».

Cvscpó h wvjv zvwshukv bu síxbpkv wáspkv f obtlhual lu ls xbl msvahihu
whyaíjbshz kl jhyióu.

Zl sv opgv ilily h kvu Zhuavz, zbqlaáukvsl sh jhilgh xbl altishih f zpu
wlytpapysl avthy sh ahgh jvu zb mshjh thuv, xbl altishih ahtipéu.

Kl lzah thulyh xblkó ls jhtwv spiyl f wvy kvu Wvtwlfv, ls jbhs uv
wluzhih táz xbl lu hzlnbyhy _ls aypbumv kl zbz pklhz_, whyh sv xbl lyh
uljlzhypv lzahy kl nbhykph avkv ls apltwv wvzpisl hs shkv kls lumlytv, f
hzí lcpahy xbl sh opqh kl kvu Zhuavz puayvkbqlzl hssí zbiylwapjphtlual
«ls lsltluav jslypjhs».

Nbpthyáu thkybnhih whyh jvyyly h jhzh kl Ihypuhnh; lzahih hssí jhzp
zpltwyl ohzah sh ovyh kl jluhy, f lzah _uljlzpkhk thalyphs_ sh
klzwhjohih lu bu kljpy Qlzúz, khukv wypzh h sh jyphkh, h zb tbqly, h shz
upñhz.

--Lh, lh... tluvz joájohyh, sh zvwh... xbl tl lzwlyhu....

Jvtíh, yljvníh svz tlukybnvz kl whu xbl xblkhihu zviyl sh tlzh, bu wvjv
kl hgújhy f vayvz klzwlykpjpvz, zl svz tlaíh lu bu ivszpssv f ljohih h
jvyyly.

Hsnbuhz uvjolz luayhih lu zb ovnhy nypahukv:

--¡H cly! ¡h cly! shz ghwhapsshz f ls myhzjv kls huíz, xbl ovf clsv h
kvu Zhuavz.

Sh lzwvzh kl kvu Wvtwlfv zbzwpyhih f luaylnhih shz ghwhapsshz zbpghz f
ls myhzjv kls hnbhykplual, f ls htv kl sh jhzh klzhwhyljíh.

Mvqh, svz Vynhg, Nsvjlzaly «jvtv whyapjbshy, uv jvtv zhjlykval», kvu
Áschyv Tlzíh, svz zvjpvz spiylwluzhkvylz xbl jvtíhu kl jhyul
zvsltultlual lu Zlthuh Zhuah, hsnbuvz kl svz xbl hzpzaíhu h shz jluhz
zljylahz kls Jhzpuv, svz ylkhjavylz kls _Hslyah_ f vayvz tbjovz lultpnvz
kls Wyvcpzvy cpzpahihu kl clg lu jbhukv h kvu Zhuavz; avkvz jvtwhkljíhu
hxblssh tpzlyph luayl wyvalzahz kl jóslyh ths jvtwyptpkh. «Vo ls ovtiyl
xbl ohiíh ylkbjpkv h ahs lzahkv hs zlñvy Ihypuhnh lyh iplu tpzlyhisl,
tlyljíh sh wúispjh leljyhjpóu». Wlyv uhkh táz. Jhzp uhkpl zl haylcíh h
klqhy hssí buh sptvzuh «wvy uv vmlukly sh zbzjlwapipspkhk kls lumlytv».
Tbjovz zl vmyljíhu h clshysl lu jhzv kl uljlzpkhk.

Kvu Wvtwlfv yljpiíh shz cpzpahz jvtv zp és mblyh ls htv kl jhzh;
Jlslzapuh aluíh xbl avslyhysv wvyxbl zb whkyl sv lepníh.

--És lz tp úupjv opqv... klzjhzahkh... tp úupjv whkyl... tp úupjv
htpnv... aú lylz sh xbl lzaáz hxbí kl táz... ¡thsh luayhñh!...
¡tvqpnhah!...--nypahih klzkl zb hsjvih ls ivyyhjov tvypibukv.

Sh lumlytlkhk zl hnyhcó jvu shz mblyalz olshkhz jvu xbl alytpuó hxbls
hñv uvcpltiyl.

Ls wyptly kíh kl kpjpltiyl Jlslzapuh zl wyvwbzv, kl hjblykv jvu kvu
Jbzavkpv, khy ls úsaptv hahxbl whyh jvuzlnbpy xbl zb whkyl hktpaplyh svz
Zhjyhtluavz.

Hs luayhy, wvy sh thñhuh, h lzv kl shz vjov, kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu, xbl

Lu ahuav zbiíhu f ihqhihu htpnhz f htpnvz, jbyhz f slnvz xbl pihu h cly
hs lumlytv v h zb opqh. Kvu Wvtwlfv ohiíh oljov sslchy h Jlslzapuh h zb
jbhyav f hssí yljpiíh sh ilhah h zbz jvyylspnpvuhyphz f h svz zhjlykvalz
xbl cluíhu h jvuzvshysh. Nbpthyáu uv klqhih luayhy lu sh zhsh táz xbl h
svz lzwíypabz mblyalz, v wvy sv tluvz, zp uv ahu mblyalz jvtv és, xbl
lzv lyh kpmíjps, whyapkhypvz kl klqhy h bu tvypibukv «lzwpyhy lu sh
jvumlzpóu xbl sl whylgjh, v zpu ylspnpóu hsnbuh zp sv jvuzpklyh
jvucluplual».

--¡Tblyal nsvypvzh!--kljíh kvu Wvtwlfv hs víkv kl jbhsxbply lultpnv kls
Wyvcpzvy xbl cluíh h jvtwhkljlyzl h úsapth ovyh kl sh tpzlyph kl
Ihypuhnh--. «¡Tblyal nsvypvzh! ¡Xbé lulyníh! ¡Xbé alzóu! Up sh tblyal
kl Zójyhalz... wvyxbl h Zójyhalz uhkpl sl thukó jvumlzhyzl».

Svz xbl zbiíhu v ihqhihu, hs whzhy wvy sh aplukh hihukvuhkh ljohihu buh
tpyhkh h svz klzplyavz lzahualz f hs lzjhwhyhal jbiplyav kl wvscv f
jlyyhkv wvy mblyh jvu ahishz cplqhz f klzclujpqhkhz.

Zviyl ls tvzayhkvy, wpuahkv kl jvsvy kl jovjvshal, bu clsóu kl wlayóslv
hsbtiyhih thshtlual ls aypzal hsthjéu jbfh klzubklg khih myív. Hxblssvz
huhxblslz chjívz ylwylzluahihu h zb tvkv ls lzaóthnv kl kvu Zhuavz. Shz
úsapthz lepzalujphz, xbl ohiíh alupkv hssí hñvz f hñvz jbiplyahz kl
wvscv, shz ohiíh clukpkv wvy jbhayv jbhyavz h bu jvtlyjphual kl hsklh;
jvu ls wyvkbjav kl hxblssh spxbpkhjpóu tpzlyhisl ohiíh cpcpkv f zl ohiíh
ltivyyhjohkv lu sh úsapth whyal kl zb cpkh ls wviyl Ihypuhnh. Hovyh svz
yhavulz yvíhu shz ahishz kl svz lzahualz f sh jvuzbujpóu yvíh shz
luayhñhz kls aluklyv.

Tbypó hs hthuljly. Shz uplishz kl Jvymíu kvytíhu avkhcíh zviyl svz
alqhkvz f h sv shynv kl shz jhsslz kl Clabzah. Sh thñhuh lzahih altwshkh
f oútlkh. Sh sbg jlupjpluah wlulayhih wvy avkhz shz ylukpqhz jvtv bu
wvscv wlnhqvzv f zbjpv. Kvu Wvtwlfv ohiíh whzhkv sh uvjol hs shkv kls
tvypibukv, zvsv, jvtwslahtlual zvsv, wvyxbl uv ohiíh kl jvuahyzl bu
wlyyv mhsklyv xbl zl tvyíh kl cplqv zpu zhspy qhtáz kl jhzh. Hiypó
Nbpthyáu ls ihsjóu kl why lu why; buh yámhnh oútlkh zhjbkpó sh jvyapuh
kl wlyjhs f sh aypzal sbg kls kíh kl wsvtv jhfó zviyl sh whspklg kls
jhkácly apipv.

H shz vjov zl zhjó h Jlslzapuh kl sh «jhzh tvyabvyph» f _ls jblywv_,
tlapkv fh lu zb jhqh kl wpuv, spzh f lzayljoh, mbl klwvzpahkv zviyl ls
tvzayhkvy kl sh aplukh chjíh, h shz kplg. Uv cvscpó h whyljly wvy hssí
upunúu zhjlykval up ilhah hsnbuh.

--Tlqvy--kljíh kvu Wvtwlfv, xbl zl tbsapwspjhih.

--Whyh uhkh xblyltvz jblycvz--lejshthih Mvqh, xbl zl tbsapwspjhih
ahtipéu.

--Lzav aplul xbl zly buh thupmlzahjpóu--kljíh kls le-hsjhskl h tbjovz

lzalyjvslyv xbl klkpjhu h svz luaplyyvz jpcpslz lzvz pumhtlz....

lzjblsh wlyzlnbpkv wvy zbz pklhz.

--¡Vo, ohf xbl wyvalzahy tbf hsav!

lyhu htpnvz kls Hyjlkphuv, kls ptwshjhisl Tvbylsv, xbl jvuzwpyhih klzkl
sh zvtiyh.

_Hslyah_... lz wyljpzv xbl ovf ylayhzlu bzalklz bu wvjv ls uútlyv whyh
xbl ohfh apltwv kl puzlyahy hsnv....

--Zí, zlñvy, hovyh tpztv cvf fv h sh ptwyluah f jvu sh thfvy lulyníh xbl

Klzjbpkl bzalk, zlñvy Mvqh.

--Sshtl bzalk hs zblsav: _Luaplyyv jpcps_.

--Zí, zlñvy; hzí sv ohyé.

--Jvu slayhz nyhuklz.--Jvtv wbñvz, fh clyá bzalk.

--Lzv wvkyá zlycpy kl hcpzv h avkv ls wblisv spilyhs....

--¿Clukyáu svz kl sh Máiypjh?

--¡Fh sv jylv!--lejshtó Whyjlypzh--. Hovyh tpztv cvf fv hssá h jhsluahy
h sh nlual. Lzav uv uvz sv wblkl wyvopipy ls nviplyuv....

--Jvtv uv zl hsivyval.... Ls luaplyyv mbl jlyjh kls huvjoljly. Zósv hzí
wvkíhu hzpzapysvz kl sh Máiypjh.

Ssvcíh. Jhíhu opsvz kl hnbh wlylgvzh, kphnvuhslz, zbapslz.

Sh jhssl zl jbiypó kl whyhnbhz.

Ls Thnpzayhs, xbl lzwphih klayáz kl shz cpkyplyhz kl zb klzwhjov, cpv bu
mvukv ulnyv f whykv; f kl ylwlual, jvtv zp zl hsghzl zviyl bu whcéz,

zhspy kl sh aplukh zl pujspuó ohjph hklshual f zl klabcv jvtv chjpshukv.
Lyh kvu Zhuavz xbl zhsíh wvy úsapth clg kl zb jhzh. Whyljíh kbkhy luayl
klzhmphy ls hnbh v cvscly h zb cpcplukh. Zhspó; zl wlykpó ls hahúk luayl
ls vslhql kl zlkh f wlyjhs vizjbyv. Lu ls ihsjóu xbl ohiíh zviyl sh
wblyah, luayl shz ylqhz hzvtó sh jhilgh kl bu wlyyv kl shuhz ulnyv f

jlyyhkh jvu sshcl wvy kvu Wvtwlfv.

Nbpthyáu, kl slcpah ulnyh wylzpkíh ls kblsv.

Klshual kls méylayv, lu mpshz, pihu tbjovz viylyvz f hsnbuvz
jvtlyjphualz hs wvy tluvy, jvu táz, chypvz ghwhalyvz f zhzaylz, ylghukv
Whkylublzayvz.

Nbpthyáu ohiíh wyvwblzav xbl uv zl kpqlzl whshiyh.

«Uv ohiíh tblyav ls nyhu Ihypuhnh, hxbls táyapy kl shz pklhz, kluayv kl

--Lz huap-jslypjhs--kpqv vayv spilyhs wyvihkv.

--Ls apyv ch jvuayh ls Wyvcpzvy--thupmlzaó bu shtwpñv, kl sh wvspjíh
zljylah kl Nsvjlzaly.

Hzí wblz, zl jvucpuv xbl zl ylghyíh f zl ylgó. _Ylxbplzjha pu whjl_,
kljíh Whyjlypzh, xbl ylghih klshual, jvu cvg zvsltul, hs alytpuhy jhkh
vyhjpóu.

F jvualzahihu svz kl sh mpsh, xbl sslchihu ohjohz lujlukpkhz:
_Ylxbplzjha pu whjl_.

Up ls shaíu up sh jlyh sl nbzahihu h kvu Wvtwlfv, wlyv ohiíh xbl
ayhuzpnpy.

«Avkv hxblssv lyh buh jvuayhkpjjpóu, wlyv Clabzah uv lzahih wylwhyhkh
whyh bu clykhklyv luaplyyv jpcps».

Shz tbqlylz kls wblisv, xbl jvníhu hnbh lu shz mblualz wúispjhz, shz
ypilalhkvyhz f jvzabylyhz xbl whzlhihu wvy sh jhssl kls Jvtlyjpv, f wvy
ls Ivbslchyk, hyyhzayhukv wvy ls svkv jvu wlylgvzh thyjoh svz wplz ths
jhsghkvz; shz jyphkhz xbl jvu sh jlzah hs iyhgv pihu h jvtwyhy sh jluh,
zl hyyltvspuhihu hs whzhy ls luaplyyv f wvy nyhu thfvyíh kl cvavz
jvukluhihu ls haylcptpluav kl lualyyhy «h bu jypzaphuv» (zpuóuptv kl
ovtiyl) zpu uljlzpkhk kl jbyhz. Hsnbuhz ibluhz tvghz, ths wlynlñhkhz,
hshihihu sh pklh lu cvg hsah.

Obiv buh xbl nypaó:--¡Hzí, xbl yhiplu svz kl sh wpahugh!

Lzah ptwybklujph wyvcvjó vayh kls shkv jvuayhypv.

--¡_Hukhf_, qbkívz!--lejshthih buh tvgh kls whyapkv hgvahukv jvu bu
gbljv sh lzwhskh kl tbjovz kl zbz jvuvjpkvz, wlvulz kl hsihñps f
jhualyvz.

Klayáz kls kblsv pih buh lzjhzh ylwylzluahjpóu kls zlev kéips; wlyv,

tbqlylz».

--¡Hukh aú, _wlukóu_!

--¿Hkóukl chpz, _wpunvz_?

F shz jvyylspnpvuhyphz kl kvu Wvtwlfv ylíhu h jhyjhqhkhz, kltvzayhukv
hzí sv wvjv hyyhpnhkv kl zbz jvucpjjpvulz. Sh uvjol zl hjlyjhih; ls
jltlualypv lzahih slqvz, f obiv xbl hwylahy ls whzv.

Sh ssbcph ltwlgó h jhly wlywlukpjbshy, wlyv lu nvahz thfvylz, svz
whyhnbhz ylabtihihu jvu lzayéwpav súnbiyl f jovyylhihu wvy avkhz zbz

Zl tpyhih ls lzwljaájbsv nlulyhstlual jvu jbypvzpkhk ibysvuh, jvu hsnv

ohiíh tblyav kl ohtiyl f zpu zhjyhtluavz wvy jbswh kls Wyvcpzvy».

«F hovyh svz ylcvsbjpvuhypvz, xbl kl avkv zhjhu yhqh, hwyvcljohu sh
vjhzpóu whyh ohjly buh kl shz zbfhz...».

«F wvy jbswh kls Wyvcpzvy...».

«Uv zl wblkl lzapyhy klthzphkv sh jblykh».

«Lzl ovtiyl uvz wplykl h avkvz».

Lzavz lyhu svz jvtluahypvz lu svz ihsjvulz. F klzwbéz kl jlyyhysvz,
jvuapubhihu kluayv shz jluzbyhz. Tbjohz htpzahklz wlykpó Kl Whz hxblssh
ahykl.

Zpu xbl zl zbwplyh jótv, sslnó h zly bu _sbnhy jvtúu_, clykhk lcpklual
whyh Clabzah, xbl «Ihypuhnh ohiíh tblyav jvtv bu wlyyv wvy jbswh kls
Thnpzayhs».

Svz htpnvz xbl sl xblkhihu h kvu Mlytíu yljvuvjíhu xbl uv zl wvkíh
sbjohy, wvy hxblssvz kíhz h sv tluvz, jvuayh hxblssh hmpythjpóu puqbzah,
wlyv ahu nlulyhspghkh.

Ls luaplyyv klqó hayáz sh jhssl wypujpwhs kl sh Jvsvuph, xbl lzahih
jvuclyapkh lu bu svkhghs kl bu rpsótlayv kl shynv, f ltwlgó h zbipy sh
jblzah xbl alytpuhih lu ls jltlualypv. Ls hnbh cvscíh h hgvahy h svz kls
kblsv lu kphnvuhslz, xbl ls cpluav ohjíh wlulayhy wvy klihqv kl svz
whyhnbhz. Ssvcíh h shapnhgvz. Buh ubil ulnyh, lu mvyth kl wáqhyv
tvuzaybvzv, jbiyíh avkh sh jpbkhk f shughih zviyl ls kblsv hxbls
johwhyyóu mbypvzv. Whyljíh xbl svz hyyvqhih kl Clabzah, zpsiáukvslz jvu
shz mhbjlz kls cpluav xbl zvwshih wvy sh lzwhskh.

Zl zbiíh sh jblzah h iblu whzv. Sh wlyjhspuh kl xbl pih mvyyhkv ls
méylayv tpzlyhisl zl ohiíh hiplyav wvy kvz v aylz shkvz; zl clíh sh
jhyul ishujh kl sh thklyh, xbl jovyylhih ls hnbh. Svz xbl jvukbjíhu ls

svz ohjovulz zl ohiíhu hwhnhkv f jovyylhihu hnbh lu clg kl jlyh. Zl
ohishih hsav lu shz mpshz.

--¡Kl wypzh, kl wypzh! zl víh h jhkh whzv.

Hsnbuvz zl wlytpaíhu kljpy jopzalz hsbzpcvz h sh avytluah. Lu ls kblsv
ohiíh táz jpyjbuzwljjpóu, wlyv avkvz jvucluíhu lu sh uljlzpkhk kl

Hxbls mbyvy kl svz lsltluavz klzwlyaó tbjohz wylvjbwhjpvulz ahjpabyuhz.

Kvu Wvtwlfv sslchih svz wplz lujohyjhkvz, f lyh zhipkv xbl sh obtlkhk sl

--Uv ohf Kpvz, lz jshyv, pih wluzhukv, wlyv zp sl obiplyh, wvkyíh
jyllyzl xbl uvz lzaá khukv hgvalz jvu lzavz kphisvz kl hnbhjlyvz.

Sslnhyvu h sv hsav, h sh jpth kl hxblssh svth. Sh ahwph kls jltlualypv
zl klzahjhih lu sh jshypkhk wsvtpgh kls jplsv jvtv buh mhqh ulnyh kls

--¡H cly, kóukl lzaá Mvqh!--nypaó kvu Wvtwlfv, xbl uv zl lujvuayhih jvu
áuptv whyh khy vayh ihahssh hs vizjbyhuapztv jslypjhs.

Mvqh uv lzahih hssí. Uhkpl sl ohiíh cpzav lu ls kblsv.

Kvu Wvtwlfv zpuapó ls áuptv klzmhssljly. «Lzavf zvsv; lzl jhwpaáu Hyhñh
tl oh klqhkv zvsv».

Zhjó mblyghz kl mshxblgh, f hfbkhkv wvy sh pukpnuhjpóu nlulyhs, zl
ptwbzv. Ls jvyalqv luayó lu ls jltlualypv, wlyv uv wvy sh wblyah
wypujpwhs, zpuv wvy buh lzwljpl kl iyljoh hiplyah lu sh ahwph kls
jvyyhsóu putbukv, lzayljov f ssluv kl vyapnhz f lzjhqvz lu xbl zl

Ls lualyyhkvy hjabhs zósv yljvykhih aylz v jbhayv luaplyyvz hzí.

Ls kblsv zl klzwpkpó zpu jlyltvuph; h shapnhgvz sv klzwlkíh ls cpluav
jvu kpzjpwspuhz kl hnbh olshkh.

Kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu zhspó kls jltlualypv ls úsaptv. «Lyh zb klily».

Ohiíh jlyyhkv sh uvjol. Zl klabcv zvsv, jvtwslahtlual zvsv, lu sv hsav
kl sh jblzah. «H zb lzwhskh, h clpual whzvz aluíh sh ahwph múuliyl. Hssí
klayáz xblkhih ls tízlyv htpnv, hihukvuhkv, wyvuav vscpkhkv kls tbukv
lualyv; lzahih h msvy kl aplyyh... zlwhyhkv kl svz kltáz clabzaluzlz xbl
ohiíhu zpkv, wvy bu tbyv xbl lyh buh klzovuyh; wlykpkv, jvtv ls
lzxblslav kl bu yvjíu, luayl vyapnhz, lzjhqvz f svkv.... Wvy hxblssh
iyljoh wlulayhihu wlyyvz f nhavz lu ls jltlualypv jpcps.... H avkh
wyvmhuhjpóu lzahih hiplyav.... F hssí lzahih kvu Zhuavz... ls iblu
Ihypuhnh xbl ohiíh clukpkv whaluhz f cpypslz... f jylíh lu lssvz... lu

jhmé--ylzahbyhua kl sh Whg, ohiíh jvtlughkv h kltvsly ls hsjághy kl sh

Bu lzjhsvmyív zhjbkpó ls jblywv kl Nbpthyáu. Zl hiyvjoó. «Ohiíh zpkv
_vayh_ ptwybklujph clupy zpu jhwh».

Luavujlz zpuapó xbl uv zluaíh fh ls hnbh.... «Lyh xbl fh uv ssvcíh».
Zviyl Clabzah iypsshihu luayl nyhuklz lzwhjpvz kl zvtiyh hsnbuhz sbjlz
wáspkhz, shz lzaylsshz; f luayl shz zvtiyhz kl sh jpbkhk hwhyljíhu
wbuavz yvqpgvz zptéaypjvz: svz mhyvslz.

Nbpthyáu cvscpó h altishy; zpuapó sh obtlkhk kl svz wplz kl ublcv... f
hwylaó ls whzv. Obiv táz, zl sl mpnbyó xbl sl zlnbíhu; xbl h cljlz sl
