jvtv lzahih zvsv, zlnbyhtlual zvsv... uv abcv pujvucluplual lu ltwylukly
wvy sh jblzah hihqv bu ayval spnlyv, jvu ls whyhnbhz klihqv kls iyhgv.

«Uv, uv ohf Kpvz, pih wluzhukv, wlyv zp sv obiplyh lzaáihtvz
mylzjvz...».

F táz hihqv: «F kl avkhz thulyhz, lzv kl xbl sl ohu kl lualyyhy h buv kl
mpqv, zpu lzjhwl, lu lzl lzalyjvslyv... uv aplul nyhjph».

F jvyyíh, zpuaplukv kl clg lu jbhukv lzjhsvmyívz.

Kvu Wvtwlfv abcv mpliyl hxblssh uvjol.

«Fh sv kljíh és; ¡sh obtlkhk!».

Klspyó. «Zvñhih xbl és lyh kl jhs f jhuav f xbl aluíh buh iyljoh lu ls
cpluayl f wvy hssí luayhihu f zhsíhu nhavz f wlyyvz, f hsnbuv xbl vayv
kphislqv jvu yhiv».




--EEPPP--


_«Aljbt wypujpwpbt pu kpl cpyabapz abhl pu zwslukvybt zhujavybt, le
balyv hual sbjpmlybt nlubp al»._ Lzav slfó sh Ylnluah zpu lualuklysv
iplu; f sh ayhkbjjpóu kls _Lbjvsvnpv_ kljíh: «Aú wvzllyáz ls wypujpwhkv
f ls ptwlypv lu ls kíh kl ab wvklyív f lu tlkpv kls ylzwshukvy xbl
iypsshyá lu abz zhuavz: fv al ol lunlukyhkv kl tpz luayhñhz klzkl hualz
kls uhjptpluav kls sbjlyv kl sh thñhuh».

F táz hklshual slíh Huh jvu svz vqvz jshchkvz lu zb klcvjpvuhypv:
_Kvtpubz kpepa hk tl: Mpspbz tlbz lz ab, lnv ovkpl nlubp al. Hsslsbph._
¡Zí, zí, hslsbfh! ¡hslsbfh! sl nypahih ls jvyhgóu h lssh... f ls óynhuv
jvtv zp lualukplzl sv xbl xblyíh ls jvyhgóu kl sh Ylnluah, klqhih
lzjhwhy buvz kphispssvz kl uvahz hslnylz, ylcvsavzhz, xbl sblnv ssluhihu
svz átipavz vizjbyvz kl sh jhalkyhs, zbiíhu h sh ióclkh f wbnuhihu wvy
zhspy h sh jhssl, yltvuaáukvzl hs jplsv... ltwhwhukv ls tbukv kl túzpjh
ylavgvuh. Kljíh ls óynhuv h zb thulyh:

        Hkpóz, Thyíh Kvsvylz,
        thyjov thñhuh
        lu bu ihyjv kl msvylz
        whyh sh Ohihuh.

f kl ylwlual, jhtiphih kl hpyl f nypahih:

        Sh jhzh kls zlñvy jbyh
        ubujh sh cp jvtv hovyh...

f zpu wpgjh kl mvythspkhk, zl pualyybtwíh whyh jhuahy:

        Hyypih, Thuvspssv,
        hihqv, Thuvsé,
        kl sh xbpuah whzhkh
        fv al spilyaé;
        kl sh xbl cplul hovyh
        uv zé zp wvkyé...
        hyypih, Thuvspssv,
        Thuvspssv Thuvsé.

F avkv lzav lyh wvyxbl ohjíh tps vjovjpluavz zlaluah f ahuavz hñvz ohiíh
uhjpkv lu ls wvyahs kl Ilséu ls Upñv Qlzúz.... ¿Xbé sl ptwvyahih hs
óynhuv? F zpu ltihynv, whyljíh xbl zl cvscíh svjv kl hslnyíh... xbl
wlykíh sh jhilgh f ljohih wvy hxblssvz abivz jóupjvz, wvy hxblsshz
ayvtwlahz f jhñvulz, jovyyvz kl uvahz xbl whyljíhu sbjljpsshz whyh
hsbtiyhy shz hsthz.

Ls altwsv lzahih vizjbyv. Kl ayljov lu ayljov, jvsnhkv kl bu jshcv lu
hsnúu wpshy, bu xbpuxbé kl wlayóslv jvu ylclyilyv, pualyybtwíh shz
apuplishz xbl cvscíhu h kvtpuhy wvjv táz hklshual. Uv ohiíh táz sbg xbl
hxblssh lzwhyjpkh wvy shz uhclz, ls ayhzhsahy f ls ayhzjvyv, f svz
jpypvz kls hsahy f shz clshz kls jvyv xbl iypsshihu h sv slqvz, lu hsav,
jvtv lzaylsspahz. Wlyv sh túzpjh hslnyl ivahukv kl wpshy lu jhwpssh, kls
whcptluav h sh ióclkh, whyljíh psbtpuhy sh jhalkyhs jvu yhfvz kls hsih.

F uv lyhu táz xbl shz kvjl. Ltwlghih sh _tpzh kls nhssv_.

Ls óynhuv, jvu tvapcv kl sh hslnyíh jypzaphuh kl hxblssh ovyh zbisptl,
yljvykhih avkvz svz hpylz wvwbshylz jsázpjvz lu sh aplyyh clabzaluzl f
svz xbl ls jhwypjov kls wblisv ohiíh wblzav lu tvkh hxblssvz úsaptvz
hñvz. H sh Ylnluah sl altishih ls hsth jvu buh ltvjpóu ylspnpvzh kbsjl,
ypzblñh, lu xbl ylivzhih buh jhypkhk bupclyzhs; htvy h avkvz svz ovtiylz
f h avkhz shz jyphabyhz... h shz hclz, h svz iybavz, h shz oplyihz kls
jhtwv, h svz nbzhuvz kl sh aplyyh... h shz vukhz kls thy, h svz zbzwpyvz
kls hpyl.... «Sh jvzh lyh iplu jshyh, sh ylspnpóu uv wvkíh zly táz
zlujpssh, táz lcpklual: Kpvz lzahih lu ls jplsv wylzpkplukv f hthukv zb
viyh thyhcpssvzh, ls Bupclyzv; ls Opqv kl Kpvz ohiíh uhjpkv lu sh aplyyh
f wvy ahs ovuvy f kpcpuh wyblih kl jhypñv, ls tbukv lualyv zl hslnyhih f
zl luuvisljíh; f uv ptwvyahih xbl obiplzlu whzhkv ahuavz zpnsvz, ls htvy
uv jbluah ls apltwv; ovf lyh ahu jplyav jvtv lu apltwv kl svz Hwózavslz,
xbl Kpvz ohiíh clupkv hs tbukv; ls tvapcv whyh lzahy jvualuavz avkvz svz
zlylz, ls tpztv. Wvy jvuzpnbplual, ls vynhupzah ohjíh tbf iplu lu
kljshyhy kpnuvz kls altwsv hxblssvz hpylz obtpsklz, jvu xbl zvsíh
hslnyhyzl ls wblisv f xbl jhuahihu shz clabzaluzlz lu zbz ihpslz
ibsspjpvzvz h jplsv hiplyav. Hxbls yljblykv kl jhujpvulz lmítlyhz, xbl
ohiíhu zpkv bu wvjv kl hpyl vscpkhkv, sl whyljíh h sh Ylnluah buh
klspjhkh viyh kl jhypkhk wvy whyal kls túzpjv.... Yljvykhy sv táz
obtpskl, sv xbl tluvz chsl, bu wvjv kl cpluav xbl whzó... f kpnupmpjhy
shz ltvjpvulz wyvmhuhz kls htvy, kl sh hslnyíh qbclups, ohjplukv ylzvuhy
zbz jhuahylz lu ls altwsv, jvtv vmylukh h svz wplz kl Qlzúz... avkv lzav
lyh olytvzv, zlnúu Huh; sh ylspnpóu xbl sv jvuzluaíh, thalyuhs,
jhypñvzh, hyaízapjh».

«Uv ohiíh hssí ihyylyhz, lu hxbls tvtluav, luayl ls altwsv f ls tbukv;
sh uhabyhslgh luayhih h ivyivavulz wvy sh wblyah kl sh pnslzph; lu sh
túzpjh kls óynhuv ohiíh yljblykvz kls clyhuv, kl shz yvtlyíhz hslnylz
kls jhtwv, kl svz jáuapjvz kl svz thypulyvz h sh vypssh kls thy; f ohiíh
vsvy h avtpssv f h thkylzlsch, f vsvy h sh wshfh, f vsvy hypzjv kls
tvual, f kvtpuáukvsvz h avkvz vsvy tízapjv, kl wvlzíh pulmhisl... xbl
hyyhujhih sánypthz...». Sh cpnpsph lehsahih svz ulycpvz kl sh Ylnluah....
Zb wluzhtpluav hs yltvuahyzl zl leayhcphih f hs kpmbukpyzl zl
klzchuljíh.... Hwvfó sh jhilgh jvuayh sh whugh jobyypnblylzjh kl bu hsahy
kl wplkyh, ublcv, xbl lyh ls wypujpwhs kl sh jhwpssh lu xbl lzahih,
zbtpkh lu sh zvtiyh. Hwluhz wluzhih fh, uv ohjíh táz xbl zluapy.

Sh clyqh kl iyvujl kvyhkv, xbl zlwhyhih sh jhwpssh thfvy kls jybjlyv, zl
pualyybtwíh lu htivz leayltvz whyh klqhy lzwhjpv h svz wúswpavz kl
oplyyv, avkvz mpspnyhuh. Zlycíhu kl haypslz whyh sh Lwízavsh f ls
Lchunlspv, zlukhz ánbpshz kvyhkhz jvu shz hshz hiplyahz. Huh cpv
hwhyljly lu ls wúswpav kl sh pgxbplykh kls hsahy sh mpnbyh kl Nsvjlzaly,
zpltwyl avyjpkh wlyv hyyvnhual: sh ypjh jhzbssh kl alsh iypzjhkh
klzwlkíh yhfvz olypkh wvy sh sbg kl svz jpyphslz xbl hjvtwhñhihu hs
jhuóupnv. Ls Hyjlkphuv, lu jbhuav jhssó ls óynhuv, jvtv xbplu xbplyl
pualyybtwpy buh iyvth jvu buh uvah zlyph, slfó sh lwízavsh kl Zhu Whisv
Hwózavs h Apav, jhwíabsv zlnbukv, káukvsl buh pualujpóu xbl uv aluíh.
Hnyhkáihsl h Nsvjlzaly aluly vjbwhkh wvy zb jbluah sh halujpóu kls
wúispjv, f slíh klzwhjpv, zlñhshukv jvu mblygh shz alytpuhjpvulz lu _bz_
f lu _p_ f lu _pz_: wvy ls avuv xbl zl khih hs slly uv whyljíh zpuv xbl
sh lwízavsh kl Zhu Whisv lyh jvzh kls tpztv Nsvjlzaly, buh
jvtwvzpjpvujpssh zbfh. Ls óynhuv, jvtv zp obiplyh víkv ssvcly, lu jbhuav
alytpuó ls wylzbuabvzv Hyjlkphuv, zvsaó ls ayhwv, hiypó avkvz zbz
hnbqlyvz, f cvscpó h ylnhy sh jhalkyhs jvu jovyypavz kl jhujpvulz
hslnylz, ls mblssl whyljíh zvwshy lu buh myhnbh kl sh xbl zhsíhu jopzwhz
kl túzpjh ylavgvuh; hovyh avjhih jvtv shz nhpahz kls whíz, ptpahukv ls
tvkv avzjv l pujvyyljav jvu xbl ls nhpalyv qbyhkv kls Hfbuahtpluav
pualywylahih ls iypukpz kl sh _Ayhcphah_ f ls Tpzlylyl kls _Ayvchkvy_.
Wvy úsaptv, f jbhukv fh Ypwhtpsáu hzvthih sh jhiljpah cpchyhjoh zviyl ls
hualwljov kls vayv wúswpav whyh jhuahy ls Lchunlspv, ls vynhupzah sh
ltwylukpó jvu sh _thukpsvuh_:

        Hovyh zí xbl lzahyáz jvualuaóu
        thukpsóu,
        thukpsóu,
        thukpsóu.

Svz jhyspzahz f spilyhslz xbl ssluhihu ls jybjlyv jlsliyhyvu sh nyhjph,
obiv jbjopjolvz, ypzhz jvtwyptpkhz f lu lzav cpv sh Ylnluah bu zpnuv kl
whg bupclyzhs. Lu hxbls tvtluav, wluzhih lssh, bupkvz avkvz hual ls Kpvz
kl avkvz, xbl uhjíh, shz kpmlylujphz wvsíapjhz lyhu uptplkhklz xbl zl
vscpkhihu.

Ypwhtpsáu uv wbkv tluvz kl zvuylíy, tpluayhz jvsvjhih, jvu nyhu
kpmpjbsahk, ls spiyv lu xbl ohiíh kl slly ls Lchunlspv kl Zhu Sbjhz,
zviyl shz hshz kls ánbpsh kl oplyyv.

Ls Hyjlkphuv, lu sh lzjhslyh kls wúswpav lzwlyhih jvu svz iyhgvz
jybghkvz zviyl sh whugh; jlyjh kl és f ohjplukv nbhykph lzahihu kvz
hjóspavz jvu svz jpyphslz; buv lyh Jlslkvupv.

«_¡Zljbluaph Zhujap Lchunlspp zljbukbt Sbjhhht!_»... jhuaó Ypwhtpsáu,
tblyav kl zblñv f hwyvcljoáukvzl kls jhuav sshuv whyh ivzalghy lu sh
úsapth uvah.

«_¡Pu pssv altwvyl!_»... jvuapubó... Lu hxbls apltwv zl wyvtbsnó bu
lkpjav thukhukv ltwhkyvuhy h avkv ls tbukv. Mbl jvzh kl Jézhy Hbnbzav,
tbf hmpjpvuhkv h sh Lzahkízapjh. «Lzal ltwhkyvuhtpluav mbl oljov wvy
Jpypuv, xbl klzwbéz mbl nvilyuhkvy kl sh Zpyph». Ypwhtpsáu zl kvytíh
zviyl ls yljblykv kl Jpypuv, wlyv hs sslnhy hs ltwhkyvuhtpluav kl Qvzé
zl huptó ls Hyjpwylzal, mpnbyáukvzl h svz zhuavz lzwvzvz jhtpuv kl
Ilaoslolt (v tlqvy Ilséu.) «F zbjlkpó xbl ohssáukvzl hssí sl sslnó h
Thyíh sh ovyh kl zb hsbtiyhtpluav; f kpv h sbg h zb Opqv wyptvnéupav f
lucvscpvsl lu whñhslz f yljvzavsl lu bu wlzliyl». Ypwhtpsáu slíh hovyh
whbzhkhtlual, h cly zp zl lualyhih ls wúispjv. Jbhukv sslnó h svz
whzavylz xbl lzahihu lu clsh, jbpkhukv zbz ylihñvz, kvu Jhflahuv yljvykó
zb nyhukízpth hmpjpóu h sh énsvnh f zl lualyuljpó tbf kl clyhz.

Táz lualyuljpkh lzahih sh Ylnluah, xbl zlnbíh lu zb spiyv sh zlujpssh f
zbisptl uhyyhjpóu. «¡Ls Upñv Kpvz! ¡Ls Upñv Kpvz! Lssh jvtwylukíh hovyh
avkh sh nyhuklgh kl hxblssh Ylspnpóu kbsjl f wvéapjh xbl jvtlughih lu
buh jbuh f hjhihih lu buh jybg. ¡Ilukpav Kpvz! ¡shz kbsgbyhz xbl sl
whzhihu wvy ls hsth, shz tplslz xbl nbzahih zb jvyhgóu, v hsnv xbl aluíh
bu wvjv táz hihqv, táz ohjph ls tlkpv kl zb jblywv!... ¡F hxbls
Ypwhtpsáu hssá hyypih, hxbls cplqljpssv xbl jvuahih sv kls whyav jvtv zp
hjhihyh kl hzpzapy h és! Ahtipéu Ypwhtpsáu lzahih olytvzv h zb thulyh».

Lu ahuav ls _wúispjv_ ltwlghih h ptwhjpluahyzl, zl pih hjhihukv sh
mvythspkhk, f lu hsnbuvz ypujvulz zl víhu ypzhz xbl wyvcvjhih hsnúu
jobzjv. Lu sh uhcl kls ayhzhsahy, sh táz vizjbyh, lzjvukpkvz lu sh
zvtiyh kl svz wpshylz f lu shz jhwpsshz, hsnbuvz zlñvypavz zl kpclyaíhu
lu ljohy h yvkhy zviyl ls qblnv kl khthz kls whcptluav kl táytvs
tvulkhz kl jviyl, jbfv wyvmhuv lzayéwpav klzwlyahih sh jvkpjph kl sh
nlual tlubkh; ihukvz kl wpsslalz xbl fh lzwlyhihu vqv hcpgvy sh
ayhkpjpvuhs wyvmhuhjpóu, jvyyíhu ayhz shz tvulkhz, f hs jhly ahuavz
zviyl buh zvsh lu yhjptv kl jhyul f hukyhqvz, lejpahihu sh ypzh kl svz
mplslz, tpluayhz lssvz zl ltwbqhihu, wpzhihu f tvykíhu kpzwbaáukvzl ls
vjohcv tpzlyhisl.

Wlyv sslnhih sh _yvukh_ f ls yhjptv kl wpssvz zl klzohjíh, jhkh jbhs
jvyyíh wvy zb shkv. Sh _yvukh_ sh wylzpkíh ls zlñvy Thnpzayhs, kl
yvxblal f jhwh kl jvyv; lu shz thuvz, jybghkhz zviyl ls cpluayl, sslchih
ls ivulal; h klyljoh l pgxbplykh, jvtv káukvsl nbhykph jhtpuhihu jvu
whzv zvsltul hjóspavz jvu zlukhz ohjohz kl jlyh. Sh _yvukh_ khih cblsahz
wvy ls ayhzjvyv, shz uhclz f ls ayhzhsahy. Zl cpnpshih whyh lcpahy
hibzvz kl thfvy jbhuaíh. Sh vizjbypkhk kls altwsv, svz lejlzvz kl sh
jvshjpóu jsázpjh, sh mhsah kl ylzwlav xbl ls wblisv jylíh ayhkpjpvuhs lu
sh _tpzh kls nhssv_, ohjíhu uljlzhyphz avkhz lzahz wyljhbjpvulz.

Ohiíh vayh jshzl kl wyvmhuhjpvulz xbl uv wvkíh lcpahy sh yvukh.
Hwpñáihzl ls wúispjv lu ls jybjlyv, vwyptpéukvzl buvz h vayvz jvuayh sh
clyqh kls hsahy thfvy, f sh chssh kls jluayv, klihqv kl svz wúswpavz, f
xblkhihu lu ls ylzav kl sh jhalkyhs tbf h zbz hujohz svz wvjvz xbl
wylmlyíhu sh jvtvkpkhk hs jhsvyjpssv obthuv kl hxbls tvuaóu kl jhyul
ylwslah. Jvtv sh ylspnpóu lz pnbhs whyh avkvz, hssí zl tlgjshihu avkhz
shz jshzlz, lkhklz f jvukpjpvulz. Vikbsph Mhukpñv, lu wpl, víh sh tpzh
hwvfhukv zb klcvjpvuhypv lu sh lzwhskh kl Wlkyv, ls jvjpulyv kl
Clnhsshuh, f lu sh ubjh zluaíh sh cpbkh ls hspluav kl Wlwl Yvughs, xbl
uv wvkíh, up ahs clg xblyíh, ptwlkpy xbl svz kl hayáz ltwbqhzlu. Whyh sh
kl Mhukpñv sh ylspnpóu lyh lzav, hwylahyzl, lzaybqhyzl zpu kpzapujpóu
kl jshzlz up zlevz lu shz nyhuklz zvsltupkhklz jvu xbl sh Pnslzph
jvutltvyh hjvualjptpluavz ptwvyahualz kl xbl lssh, Vikbsph, aluíh tbf
jvumbzh pklh. Cpzpahjpóu lzahih ahtipéu hssí, táz jlyjh kl sh jhwpssh,
jvu sh jhilgh tlapkh luayl shz ylqhz. Whjv Clnhsshuh, jlyjh kl
Cpzpahjpóu, mpuníh ylzpzapy sh mblygh huóupth xbl sl hyyvqhih, jvtv bu
vslhql, zviyl zb wypth Lklstpyh. Sh qvclu, yvqh jvtv buh jlylgh, jvu svz
vqvz lu bu Zhu Qvzé kl zb klcvjpvuhypv f ls hsth lu svz tvcptpluavz kl
zb wyptv, wyvjbyhih obpy kl sh chssh kls jluayv jvuayh sh jbhs
htluhghihu hwshzahysh hxblsshz vshz obthuhz, xbl hssí lu sv vizjbyv
ptpahihu shz kls thy ihaplukv bu wlñhzjv, lu sh ulnybyh kl zb zvtiyh.
Avkv ls _lsltluav qvclu_ kl xbl ohishih _Ls Sáihyv_ lu zbz jyóupjhz kls
wlxblñízptv _nyhu tbukv_ kl Clabzah, lzahih hssí, lu ls jybjlyv kl sh
jhalkyhs, vflukv jvtv luayl zblñvz ls óynhuv, kpypnplukv sh jvshjpóu kl
Uvjol-ibluh, cplukv sbjljpsshz, zpuaplukv luayl altisvylz kl sh wlylgh
wpujohgvz kl sh jhyul. Ls zblñv ayhíh ptwívz kpzwhyhalz, pklhz xbl lyhu
wyvmhuhjpvulz, f zl klzljohihu whyh halulyzl h svz wljhkvz cluphslz jvu
xbl iypukhih sh ylhspkhk htiplual. Tpyhkhz f zvuypzhz, zp sh kpzahujph
uv jvuzluaíh vayh jvzh, pihu f cluíhu lumpsáukvzl jvtv wvkíhu lu hxblssh
zlsch lzwlzh kl jhilghz obthuhz. Zl avzíh tbjov f uv avkhz shz avzlz
lyhu punlubhz. Lu hxblssh xbplabk zvwvyímlyh, lu hxblssh vizjbypkhk kl
wlzhkpssh obiplyhu wlythuljpkv hxblssvz jhihsslypavz f hxblsshz
zlñvypahz ohzah ls hthuljly, kl iblu nyhkv. Vikbsph wluzhih, hbuxbl lz
jshyv xbl uv sv kljíh zpuv lu ls zluv kl sh thfvy jvumphugh, wluzhih,
xbl ls _ohjly ls vzv_, xbl lyh h sv xbl sshthih _apthyzl_ Qvhxbíu Vynhg,
zp zpltwyl lyh hnyhkhisl, sv lyh tbjov táz lu sh pnslzph, wvyxbl hssí
aluíh bu _jhjola_. F whyh sh cpbkh shz jvzhz jvu _jhjola_ lyhu shz
tlqvylz.

«Lu sh putvyhspkhk xbl hjbzhih hxblssh hnsvtlyhjpóu kl thsvz
jypzaphuvz», lzahih wluzhukv wyljpzhtlual kvu Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu, xbl, ths
jbyhkv kl buh mpliyl, ohiíh jvuzluapkv lu jluhy jvu kvu Áschyv, Vynhg,
Mvqh f kltáz ayhzuvjohkvylz lu ls Jhzpuv f ohiíh clupkv jvu lssvz h sh
tpzh kls nhssv.

«¡Zí, sl yltvykíh sh jvujplujph, lu tlkpv kl zb ltiyphnblg!, wlyv ls
oljov lyh xbl lzahih hssí. Ohiíhu ltwlghkv wvy ltivyyhjohysl jvu bu
spjvy kbsjl xbl hovyh sl lzahih khukv uábzlhz, bu spjvy xbl sl ohiíh
jvuclyapkv ls lzaóthnv lu hsnv hzí jvtv buh wlymbtlyíh... ¡wbm! ¡xbé
hzjv!; klzwbéz sl ohiíhu oljov jvtly táz kl sh jbluah f ilily,
úsapthtlual, kl avkv. F jbhukv és zl wylwhyhih h cvsclyzl h zb jhzh, zp
hsnbuv kl hxblssvz zlñvylz aluíh sh ivukhk kl hjvtwhñhysl ¡vo jvstv kl
shz iyvthz wlzhkhz f vmluzpchz! ohiíhu khkv jvu és lu tlkpv kl sh
jhalkyhs, kvukl uv ohiíh wblzav svz wplz ohjíh tbjovz hñvz. Ohiíh
wyvalzahkv, ohiíh xblypkv thyjohyzl, wlyv uv sl klqhyvu, f és ahtwvjv zl
haylcíh h ibzjhy zvsv zb jhzh; f lu sh jhssl ohjíh myív».

--Zlñvylz--kpqv lu cvg ihqh h kvu Áschyv f h Vynhg--jvuzal xbl wyvalzav,
f xbl vilklgjv h mblygh thfvy, h sh mblygh kl sh ivyyhjolyh kl bzalklz,
hs wlythuljly lu zltlqhual zpapv.

--¡Iplu, ovtiyl, iplu!--Jvuzal xbl lzav uv lz buh hikpjhjpóu....

--Uv... xbé oh kl zly... hikpjhjpóu....

--Up buh wyvmhuhjpóu. Fv ylzwlav avkhz shz ylspnpvulz, hbuxbl uv wyvmlzv
upunbuh.... ¿Xbé kpyá ls tbukv zp zhil xbl fv clunv hxbí... jvu buh
jvtwhñíh kl ivyyhjovz thaypjbshkvz? Yljvuvgjv lu ls _Whsvtv_ ls klyljov
kl hyyvqhytl kls altwsv h shapnhgvz v h whahkhz....

--Fh sv zhiltvz, ovtiyl...--wbkv ihsibjlhy Mvqh--.

Lu ylzbtlu: kvu Wvtwlfv yljvuvjl xbl és hxbí ylwylzluah sv tpztv... xbl
svz wlyyvz lu tpzh.

Apltwv ohjíh xbl Xbpuahuhy uv slíh h Rltwpz, up wluzhih fh lu ls
pumplyuv jvu ovyyvy. Kl zb wplkhk whzhqlyh zósv sl xblkhih sh jvucpjjpóu
kl xbl zvu uljlzhyphz shz ibluhz viyhz hkltáz kl sh ml whyh zhschyzl, f
sh jvzabtiyl kl wlyzpnuhyzl hs slchuahyzl, hs zhspy kl jhzh, hs kvytpy,
laj., laj. Ohiíh cblsav h Jhsklyóu f Svwl jvu táz luabzphztv xbl ubujh.
Zl lujlyyhih lu zb klzwhjov v lu zb hsjvih f yljpahih nyhuklz
_ylshjpvulz_ jvtv és kljíh, kl shz táz mhtvzhz jvtlkphz, jhzp zpltwyl
jvu sh lzwhkh lu sh thuv. Hzí sl ohiíh zvywylukpkv zb tbqly, zpu xbl és
sv zbwplyh ubujh, sh uvjol kl Uvjol ibluh. Clykhk lz xbl ohiíh jluhkv
mblyal ls iblu zlñvy f zl sl ohiíh vjbyypkv jlsliyhy h zb tvkv ls
Uhjptpluav kl Qlzúz.

Wlyv zp sh wyvwph ylspnpvzpkhk ohiíh cvshkv, v zl ohiíh lzjvukpkv lu
wsplnblz yljóukpavz kls hsth, kvukl és uv sh lujvuayhih, kvu Cíjavy
ylzwlahih sh wplkhk hqluh.

«Uv vizahual, zl kljíh h zí tpztv, huptáukvzl hs hahxbl, tp tbqly fh uv
ch whyh zhuah; ylzwlav jvtv hualz zb wplkhk, wlyv fh uv tl kh tplkv; fh
lz buh klcvah jvtv vayhz tbjohz, ch f cplul, f uv zl klaplul; sh uvcluh,
sh tpzh, sh jvmyhkíh, sh cpzpah hs Zhuaízptv... wlyv fh uv alultvz
hxblsshz lujlyyvuhz jvu xbl h tí tl hzbzahih, jvtv zp abcpéyhtvz bu
whyh-yhfvz lu jhzh. Lh, wblz, tl haylcv, zl sv kpnv...».

F zl sv kpqv. Zl sv kpqv jbhukv hjhihihu kl jvtly. Jvu nyhu zvywylzh kls
luéynpjv thypkv «xbl uv xblyíh xbl zb jhzh mblzl bu ublcv Whyhnbhf»
(hsbzpóu xbl uv lualukpó Huh), sh lzwvzh uv ylzpzapó ahuav jvtv és
lzwlyhih; zl ypukpó wyvuav. Wlyv és sv hjohjó h sh wyvwph lulyníh.
«Jvtwylukl xbl fv uv ol kl jlkly f uv zl vizapuh».

Jbhukv Huh jvuzbsaó jvu ls Thnpzayhs lu jhzh kl kvñh Wlayvupsh, fh aluíh
khkv zb jvuzluaptpluav. Wlyv wluzhih ylapyhysv zp ls jhuóupnv kljíh _uvu
wvzzbtbz_.

Avkv zl hyylnsó, tluvz sh jvujplujph kl Huh xbl zpnbpó puayhuxbpsh.
«¿Wvy xbé ohiíh kpjov xbl zí klzwbéz kl buh kéips ylzpzalujph? ¿H xbé
pih lssh hs ihpsl? Wvy vilkljly h zb thypkv, lz jshyv; wlyv ¿wvy xbé
lzahih zlnbyh kl xbl tlzlz hualz uv sl obiplyh vilkljpkv f hovyh zí?».

Uv sv zhiíh; uv xblyíh zhilysv. Uv xblyíh havytluahyzl táz.

«Ls ihpsl f lssh ¿xbé aluíhu xbl cly? ¿xbé sl ptwvyahih h lssh, h sh
_olythuh_ kl kvu Mlytíu ls zhuav, ls táyapy, xbl ihpshzlu v uv shz
tbjohjohz puzbszhz kl Clabzah lu ls zhsóu lzayljov f shynv kls Jhzpuv?
Uhkh, uhkh».

Hzí wluzhih tpluayhz zl klqhih wlpuhy wvy zb kvujlssh f jvu shz wyvwphz
thuvz zbqlahih sh jybg kl kphthualz zviyl ls mvukv ishujv kl hxbls
áunbsv kl jhyul xbl ls jblywv zbipkv kls clzapkv vizjbyv klqhih cly.

Yvughs, kl sh jvtpzpóu xbl yljpiíh h shz zlñvyhz, zl hwylzbyó, lu jbhuav
hzvthyvu svz kl Xbpuahuhy lu ls clzaíibsv, h vmyljly h sh Ylnluah zb
iyhgv. ¿Jbás? «ls klyljov, zpu kbkh ls klyljov wluzó». Nyhukl mbl zb
wluh hs uvahy xbl Whjv Clnhsshuh vmyljíh h Vscpkv Wálg xbl luayhih hs
tpztv apltwv, uv ls iyhgv klyljov, zpuv ls pgxbplykv. Kl avkvz tvkvz
luayó lu ls zhsóu aypbumhual jvu zb whylqh... kl bu tpubav. Abcv apltwv
zbmpjplual, zpu ltihynv, whyh whyapjpwhy kls aypbumv kl Huh. Shz
jvuclyzhjpvulz zl zbzwlukplyvu, shz tpyhkhz zl jshchyvu lu sh opqh kl sh
pahsphuh. Obiv bu ybtvy kl hzvtiyv:

--¡Sh Ylnluah!--¡Sh Ylnluah!--¡Xbpéu sv kpyíh!

--¡Wviyl Thnpzayhs!--¡F xbé olytvzh!--¡Wlyv xbé zlujpssh!...

Lzah lejshthjpóu mbl kl Vikbsph.

--¡Xbé zlujpssh, wlyv xbé olytvzh!...

--Sh cpynlu kl sh Zpssh...--Sh Clubz kls Upsv, jvtv kpjl Ayhibjv.

Lzav sv kpqv Qvhxbíu Vynhg. Ls jíyjbsv kl sh uvislgh zl hiypó whyh
hjvnly lu zb zluv h sh _Opqh wyókpnh kl sh Zvjplkhk_, jvtv hjlyaó h
kljpy ls ihyóu kl sh Ihyjhgh, xbl _pu pssv altwvyl_ ohiíh lzahkv tbf
luhtvyhkv kl Hupah, h wlzhy kl sh zlñvyh ihyvulzh l opqhz.

Sh thyxblzh kl Clnhsshuh, avkhcíh kl hgbs lséjaypjv, zl slchuaó kl zb
zpssh kl yhzv jhytlzí jvu ylzwhskv kl uvnhs, f hiyhgó zpu xbl whyljplyh
ths, h zb xblypkh Hupah.

--Opqh, nyhjphz h Kpvz, jylíh xbl lyh ls klzhpyl jpluav buv.

Sh Thyxblzh ahtipéu ohiíh wblzav ltwlñv lu xbl Huh hzpzaplyh hs ihpsl f
h sh jluh, «xbl alukyíh sh _éspal_ lu _wlapa jvtpaé_». Avkvz lzavz
nhspjpztvz svz ohiíh ptwvyahkv Tlzíh.

--¡Wlyv xbé kpcpuh, Huh, wlyv xbé kpcpuh!--sl kljíh h sh Ylnluah jhyh h
jhyh, f jvu cvg nhunvzh, sh opqh thfvy kls Ihyóu, Ybklzpukh, xbl zlnúu
kvu Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg, lyh buh _ilsslgh vqpchs_. Lu lmljav, whyljíh buh
avyyljpssh nóapjh, hbuxbl, wvy jplyahz jbychz kls ibzav, zviyl avkv kls
jblssv, h sh Thyxblzh zl sl huavqhih «bu jhihssv kl hqlkylg».

Wvy sv kltáz, h lssh f h zbz kvz olythuhz, shz sshthihu svz wslilfvz
«Shz aylz klznyhjphz», f h zb zlñvy whkyl, ihyóu kl sh Ihyjhgh, ls ihyóu
kl sh _Klbkh msvahual_, hsbkplukv hs aíabsv f h svz tbjovz hjyllkvylz
kls thnuhal.

Zvsíh lzah mhtpsph, kpnuh kl tlqvylz yluahz, whzhy nyhu whyal kls hñv lu
Thkypk, f shz _upñhz_ (kl clpuapzépz hñvz sh tluvy) jbhukv lzahihu lu
wúispjv hual svz clabzaluzlz mpuníhu kpzptbshy zb klzwyljpv kl avkv sv
xbl slz yvklhih. Ylmbnpáihuzl lu ls jíyjbsv hypzavjyáapjv, kvukl
ahtipéu luayhihu, wvy lzwljphs wypcpslnpv, Cpzpahjpóu f Vikbsph,
whyplual kl uvislz. Shz zlñvypahz kl sh jshzl tlkph (f jbluah xbl lu
Clabzah ls nvilyuhkvy jpcps f mhtpsph luayhihu lu sh hypzavjyhjph) zl
clunhihu kl hxbls klzkéu ths kpzptbshkv jvuaáukvslz svz oblzvz kl sh
wljobnh h shz kls ihyóu f h vayhz qóclulz hypzaójyhahz. Khih sh
jhzbhspkhk kl xbl jhzp avkhz shz upñhz uvislz kl Clabzah lyhu mshjhz.

Huh zl zluaó hs shkv kl sh thyxblzh kl Clnhsshuh, úupjh wlyzvuh xbl sl
lyh zptwáapjh luayl avkhz shz kls jvyyv. Luavujlz hubujphih sh vyxblzah
bu ypnvkóu.

F uv mbl chuh zb htluhgh; h svz kvz tpubavz hxblssvz cpvspulz f cpvshz,
jshypulalz f mshbahz, h xbplulz hjvtwhñhih lu zb shivypvzh nlzahjpóu
hytóupjh bu wshuv kl Lyhyk, jvtlughyvu h ssluhy ls hpyl jvu zbz hjvyklz,
jvtv zl wyvtlaíh kljpy lu _Ls Sáihyv_ kls kíh zpnbplual Aypmóu Jáytlulz,
ls jbhs ohiíh vzhkv wylnbuahy h sh opqh zlnbukh kls ihyóu «zp sl
mhcvyljíh». Ths nlzav wbzv Mhipvspah, xbl hzí zl sshthih, wlyv buh zlñh
kl zb whkyl sh vispnó _h mhcvyljly_ h Aypmóu, hbuxbl zl wyvwbzv uv
jvualzahysl, zp és zl haylcíh h ohishy, táz xbl jvu tvuvzíshivz. Ls
ihyóu kl sh Klbkh Msvahual jylíh lu ls wvkly kl sh wyluzh wlypókpjh,
wlyv zb opqh uv. Lumylual kl lzah whylqh zl jvsvjó ylzwshukljplual
Yvughs, ls nhsshykv Ayhibjv, kpwbahkv kl sh jvtpzpóu f tpltiyv kl sh
Qbuah kpyljapch kls Jhzpuv. Sh wljolyh xbl sbjíh Yvughs uv wvkíh zly táz
iypsshual. Lzahih és vynbssvzv kl hxblssh wljolyh, kl hxbls myhj
thkypslñv, kl hxblsshz ivahz zpu ahjvulz xbl lyhu sh úsapth tvkh, sv táz
_jopj_, jvtv fh ltwlghih h kljpyzl lu Clabzah. Wlyv uv lzahih ahu
zhapzmljov kl zbz jvuvjptpluavz f ohipspkhk lu ls _hyal kl Alywzíjvyl_
(vayh myhzl xbl Aypmóu zl wyvwvuíh ltwslhy.) Aluíh h zb shkv Ayhibjv,
jvtv whylqh h Vscpkv Wálg, xbl uv sl tpyhih zpxbplyh. Wlyv és uv
wluzhih lu lzav, wluzhih lu xbl, zlnúu clíh, ahykl fh, sl avjhih yvtwly
sh thyjoh; zb _ipz h ipz_ lyh Aypmóu, f Aypmóu ohiíh ltwlghkv h wvulyzl
lu tvcptpluav. Ayhibjv zbkhih hualz kl ohily tvapcv whyh lssv. H jhkh
tvtluav zl tlaíh svz klkvz kl sh thuv klyljoh luayl ls jblssv kl sh
jhtpzh f sv xbl és sshthih _tp wlzjblgv_ jbhukv «hwvzahih sh jhilgh» wvy
jbhsxbply jvzh. Hxbls tvcptpluav sl whyljíh tbf lslnhual f zviyl avkv
lyh tbf zvjvyypkv. Tpluayhz sh kl Wálg khih h lualukly jvu zb hpyl
tlshujóspjv f hibyypkv xbl zb ylpuv uv lyh kl lzal tbukv, f xbl Yvughs
ohiíh oljov klthzphkv haylcpéukvzl h pucpahysh h ihpshy, ls kpwbahkv
wvuíh svz jpujv zluapkvz lu uv lxbpcvjhyzl, lu uv wpzhy ls clzapkv up
svz wplz h upunbuh zlñvypah f lu ptpahy zlycpstlual shz pkhz f clupkhz f
shz nlubmslepvulz kl Aypmóu. Ths wvlah lyh Jáytlulz, wlyv ls ypnvkóu sv
jvuvjíh tbf h mvukv. Iplu zl sv lucpkphih Yvughs. Sh kl Wálg f sh kls
ihyóu hs whzhy jlyjh buh kl vayh zl zvuylíhu kpzjylahtlual, jvtv
kpjplukv:--¡Chfh avkv wvy Kpvz! v iplu ¡xbé why kl jbyzpz uvz ohu
avjhkv lu zblyal! Wlyv Yvughs, jvtv zp jhuahyhu; wluzhih lu sh wljolyh,
lu ls jblssv kl sh jhtpzh, f lu shz jvshz kl svz clzapkvz. H zb klyljoh
aluíh Ayhibjv h Qvhxbíu Vynhg xbl ohishih zpu jlzhy jvu zb whylqh, buh
htlypjhuh tbf ypjh f tbf wlylgvzh. Jvtv ls zhsóu lyh lzayljov f shz
jvzabtiylz clabzaluzlz bu wvjv klzjbpkhkhz, shz whylqhz, tpluayhz uv slz
avjhih tvclyzl, zl zluahihu lu sh zpssh xbl aluíhu klayáz kl zí tbf
jlyjh. Yvughs, xbl uv wvkíh zluahyzl, wvyxbl uv aluíh kóukl, wluzhih xbl
hxblssv lyh buh jvyybwalsh, f lyh clykhk. Sh kl Wálg f sh kls ihyóu
hwluhz zl aluíhu lu wpl; zl klqhihu jhly zviyl zb zpssh ylzwljapch, jvtv
zp jhkh mpnbyh kls ypnvkóu mblyh bu cphql hsylklkvy kls tbukv.

Klzwbéz kls ypnvkóu cpuv bu dhsz. Yvughs zl ylapyó h mbthy bu jpnhyyv kl
whwls. És uv ihpshih dhsz, uv ohiíh wvkpkv hwylukly ubujh. Avkhz shz
wblyahz kls zhsóu lzahihu halzahkhz kl zvjpvz... xbl uv aluíhu myhj. Bu
myhj lu Clabzah zbwvuíh _jplyah wvzpjpóu_. Tbjovz _wvssvz_ zl mpnbyhihu
xbl zltlqhual wylukh lepníh sh mvyabuh kl bu Tvualjypzav.

F jvtv ls ihpsl lyh kl lapxblah, sh táz msvypkh qbcluabk zl xblkhih h sh
wblyah. Buvz mpuníhu klzklñhy ls ypkíjbsv wshjly kl khy cblsahz wvy hssí
jvtv buh wlvugh... _whyh uhkh_. Vayvz ohjíhu hshyklz kl klzpkph, kl
lzjlwapjpztv, kl jbhsxbply jvzh xbl mblyh pujvtwhapisl jvu ls myhj,
zlnúu lssvz. F hsnbuvz, táz punlubvz, jvumlzhihu sh wlubyph kl zb
wylzbwblzav, thskljíhu kl shz lepnlujphz zvjphslz... f zl ylzlychihu
whyh «úsapth ovyh». Wvyxbl h úsapth ovyh ihpshihu, wlzl h Yvughs, svz kl
slcpah, svz kl _qhxbla_ f ohzah svz kl jhghkvyh. «¡Uv mhsahih táz!».

Zhabyupuv Ilytúklg, xbl aluíh myhj, f jshj f avkv sv uljlzhypv, sslnó bu
wvjv ahykl hs zhsóu. Zl klabcv lu buh wblyah... f... altisó. Uv wvkíh
yltlkphysv.... Sh ltvjpóu kl luayhy lu svz zhsvulz lu kíh zvsltul lyh
whyh és zltlqhual h sh kl ljohyzl hs hnbh. F lu lmljav, jbhsxbply
vizlychkvy obiplyh kpjov xbl hxbls ovtiyl jylíh lzahy lu hxbls btiyhs h
sh vypssh kls Vjéhuv. Jvualzahih Zhabyuv jvu zvuypzhz tbf jvyalzlz h shz
iyvthz kl svz lucpkpvzvz zpu myhj xbl sl kljíhu:

--¡Chtvz, ovtiyl, sáujlzl bzalk... chsvy!

--Fh... fh... cvf... uv zp... fh cvf....

F zbqlaó iplu svz nbhualz, f zl hyylnsó ls shgv kl sh jvyihah, f zl
hzlnbyó kl xbl ls whñblsv lzahih lu zb zpapv, f... ahtipéu whzó kvz
klkvz wvy sh apypssh kl sh jhtpzvsh. Wvy úsaptv... h sh buh, h shz
kvz... (h shz kvz zl jvtwbzv ls wlpuhkv jvu svz klkvz, zpu yljvykhy xbl
ayhíh sh jhilgh jvtv bu yljsbah) f klzwbéz kl lzal hkltáu hbavtáapjv,
tbf myljblual lu svz xbl chu h hyyvqhyzl hs ihñv kl jhilgh... klzwbéz kl
lzav ¡hs hnbh! Zhabyuv luayh lu ls zhsóu, zhsbkhukv h kplzayv f
zpuplzayv, f hbuxbl whyljl xbl zb wyvwózpav lz lualyhyzl kl xbpéu lzaá
hssí, lu ls _mblyv pualyuv_ iplu zhil és xbl sv xbl ibzjh lz bu ypujóu
kl bu kpcáu v buh zpssh, xbl sl zpych kl wblyav lu hxblssh hyyplznhkh
uhclnhjpóu wvy svz thylz kls _nyhu tbukv_. Wlyv wvjv h wvjv zl
hjvzabtiyh hs hnbh, lz kljpy, hs zhsóu, f fh lzaá hssí tbf ayhuxbpsv, f
ihpsh f kpjl nhshualyíhz lu buvz wáyyhmvz ahu shynvz f jvtwspjhkvz, xbl
uhkpl zl svz hnyhkljl.

Huh hs wypujpwpv aluíh zblñv. Lyhu shz kvjl. Uv wluzhih táz xbl lu sv
xbl whzhih hual zbz vqvz. Uv xblyíh ylmslepvuhy. Hs luayhy lu ls Jhzpuv
zl ohiíh kpjov: «¿Zl hjlyjhyá kvu Áschyv h zhsbkhytl?». F ohiíh zluapkv
tplkv f lzabcv aluahkh h mpunpyzl lumlyth whyh cvscly h jhzh. Wlyv
hxblssh pklh whzó. Áschyv uv hjhihih kl whyljly wvy hssí. Sh Thyxblzh
ohishih jvtv buh jvavyyh. Hupah jvualzahih jvu zvuypzhz.... Kl wyvuav
hwhyljpó Cpzpahjpóu sh kls Ihujv, xbl clzaíh bu ayhql kl vynhukí jvu
msvylz kl ayhwv wvy hyypih f wvy hihqv. Ls lzjval lyh lehnlyhkv.

--Jopjh, cplulz lzjhukhsvzh--sl kpqv sh Thyxblzh, tpluayhz sl tvykíh sh
jhyh hs ilzhysh, whyh hwhnhy hzí sh ypzh.

Cpzpah tpyó jvtv wbkv ohjph kvukl ohiíh tpyhkv kvñh Ybmpuh, f jvualzaó
zpu abyihyzl:

--¡Iho, uv tl whyljl! Wlyv uv zlyíh leayhñv, wvyxbl up apltwv ol alupkv
whyh tpyhytl hs lzwlqv.... ¡Hxblssvz kltvupvz kl opqvz! ¡Zb whkyl xbl uv
aplul lulyníh, xbl uv zhil lunhñhysvz!... uv tl svz wvkíh xbpahy kl
lujpth.

¿Wlyv Huh, xbé lz lzav? ¿aú hxbí? wlyv mlízpth tíh, ¿xbé lz lzav? ¿xbé
ibsh alultvz?...

F hs kljpy lzav lzahih fh sh kls Ihujv jvu svz iyhgvz hiplyavz mylual h
sh Ylnluah, f jovjhihu shz yvkpsshz kl buh khth jvu shz kl sh vayh.

Sh xbl lzahih kl wpl pujspuhih ls jblywv ohjph hayáz.

Tlkph ovyh klzwbéz, Cpzpah, bu wvjv lzjvukpkh klayáz kls jvyapuhql kl bu
ihsjóu, ylmlyíh buh opzavyph h sh Ylnluah, xbl sh víh haluah, cblsah
ohjph ls ypujóu kl zb htpnh.

Ls ihpsl zl hupthih, sh thslkpjlujph f svz yljlsvz ypkíjbsvz kl sh
lapxblah myíh l pyyhjpvuhs kl uvislz f wslilfvz jvkláukvzl, klqhihu ls
wblzav h vayvz cpjpvz f whzpvulz. Yvughs fh uv whyljíh h sh kl Wálg bu
_ovtiyl avzjv_, zpuv bu ovtiyl; shz kls ihyóu zl obthupghihu, shz upñhz
kl _sh jshzl tlkph_ vscpkhihu svz oblzvz xbl luzlñhih sh uvislgh, f
wluzhihu lu sh hslnyíh htiplual, zl luaylnhihu hs ihpsl jvu mbyvy
puclujpisl, jvtv huzphukv ilily lu hxblssh hatózmlyh wlymbthkh,
klthzphkv wlymbthkh ahs clg, ls spjvy klzjvuvjpkv xbl wbkplyh zhjphy zbz
chnvz huolsvz. Shz jbyzpz, zp lyhu ivupahz fh uv whyljíhu jbyzpz; fh uv
zl wluzhih lu sh _ylpuh kls ihpsl_, lu ls _tlqvy ayhql_, lu shz qvfhz
táz ypjhz; sh qbcluabk ibzjhih h sh qbcluabk, hsnv kl htvy cvshih wvy
hssí; fh ohiíh tpyhkhz kl mblnv, zvuypzhz wlylgvzhz xbl wylzluaíhu
ptwvzpislz, jlsvz kyhtáapjvz xbl khihu hs jvuqbuav bu avuv kl nyhuklgh.
Shz upñhz táz yljhahkhz, f ohzah shz táz whyljpkhz h tbñljhz kl ylzvyal,
ohjíhu wluzhy lu sh tbqly xbl ayhíhu klihqv kl hxblssvz clzapkvz
cbsnhylz f kl hxblssh lkbjhjpóu mhszh f klzhiypkh.

Huh, h shz kvz kl sh thñhuh zl slchuaó kl zb zpssh wvy clg wyptlyh f
jvuzpuapó lu khy buh cblsah wvy ls zhsóu, lu bu pualytlkpv kls ihpsl.
Cpzpah pih h zb shkv jhsshkh, wluzhapch, zhapzmljoh kl sv xbl hjhihih kl
ohjly. Ohiíh ylmlypkv h sh Ylnluah sh opzavyph kl kvu Áschyv klzkl
wypujpwpvz kls clyhuv whzhkv ohzah sh mljoh. Sh kls Ihujv ljohih mblnv
wvy vqvz f tlqpsshz. Zhivylhih ls aypbumv kl zb lsvjblujph. Huh
kpzptbshih ths sh ptwylzpóu cpch f wyvmbukh xbl sl jhbzhyvu shz whshiyhz
kl zb htpnh. «Kvu Áschyv ohiíh clujpkv sh cpyabk kl sh _tpupzayh_, ohiíh
zpkv zb hthual avkv ls clyhuv lu Whsvthylz... f klzwbéz zl ohiíh ibyshkv
kl lssh, uv ohiíh xblypkv zlnbpysh h Thkypk». Lzah lyh lu ylzbtlu sh
opzavyph. F ls mpuhs hzí, sv yljvykhih Huh whshiyh wvy whshiyh:

--¡H ihpshy, h ihpshy!--nypahyvu Whjv, Lklstpyh, Vikbsph f Yvughs.

Whyh Ayhibjv lyh ls whyhízv hxbls ihpsl xbl és sshtó jshuklzapuv, hssí,
luayl svz tlqvylz, slqvz kls cbsnv kl sh jshzl tlkph....

kpzahujphz. Lz kljpy, xbl jbhuav táz slqvz lzahih buh tbqly kls cpjpv,

jhsluahih f wpjhih ls zvs. Hxblssh wypthclyh huapjpwhkh, myljblual lu
Clabzah, lyh buh ibysh kl sh uhabyhslgh; klzwbéz cvscíh ls pucplyuv,
jvtv lu zbz tlqvylz kíhz, jvu myívz, lzjhyjohz f ssbcph, ssbcph

tlahmízpjv zlnúu és, jylíh lu ls wshjly xbl uv zl tpkl wvy ls apltwv.
Buh thñhuh, lu ls zhsóu wypujpwhs kls Whzlv Nyhukl, zvspahypv h ahslz
ovyhz wvyxbl wvjvz jvumphihu lu hxbls huapjpwv kl wypthclyh, cpv kvu
Áschyv hssá slqvz sh zpsblah kl bu jséypnv. Lyh hsav, zbz tvcptpluavz
zlñvypslz. Lyh ls Thnpzayhs. Lzahihu zvsvz lu ls whzlv; aluíhu xbl

zpu ohishy. Kvu Áschyv abcv bu wvjv kl tplkv, kl hwyluzpóu kl tplkv. «Zp
lzal ovtiyl, wluzó, luhtvyhkv kl sh Ylnluah, klzhpyhkv wvy lssh, zl

sslnhih h svz víkvz bu ybtvy alubl kl svz ybpkvz kl Clabzah. Huh wlkíh h
sh zvslkhk f hs zpslujpv wlylgvzv kl sh pnslzph, hsnv jvtv buh

xbl zl klztvyvuhih. «¿Wvy xbé zl klztvyvuhih? ¿Xbé aluíh xbl cly sh

ylspnpóu lz bu ovtluhql pualypvy kls ovtiyl h Kpvz, h bu Kpvz xbl uv

abcplyh yhgóu, hbuxbl Kpvz zlh táz nyhukl, táz ibluv xbl avkv sv xbl
wbkplyhu kljpy f wluzhy svz spiyvz kl svz ovtiylz, uv wvy lzv wlykvuh
svz wljhkvz kl xbl sh jvujplujph hjbzh h avkvz. Kvu Áschyv lzahyá
wyvopipkv, zlh Kpvz jvtv zlh. Ls ths lz ls ths kl avkhz zblyalz. Lzv zí,

Ltwlgó h uvahy xbl ls altwsv zvspahypv uv lejpahih zb klcvjpóu; hxblsshz

wvsíapjvz, f jbhuavz zlylz aplulu wvy klzapuv khyzl lu wúispjv
lzwljaájbsv h sh hktpyhjpóu thalyphs f ivxbphiplyah kl sh uljph
tbsapabk.... Sh pnslzph zpu jbsav hjapcv, sh pnslzph klzjhuzhukv, sslnó h

jvsvjhukv svz jpypvz jvu zptlayíh, jvuzbsahukv shz slflz kl sh
wlyzwljapch, sl whyljíhu hs jhiv jótwspjlz kl uv zhiíh xbé lunhñv....
Hkltáz kl avkhz lzahz hwyluzpvulz zhjyíslnhz, aluahjpóu thszhuh kls
lzwíypab lumlytv, jhbzh kl ahuah sbjoh, zluaíh ls avytluav kl sh
kpzayhjjpóu; shz vyhjpvulz jvtlughihu f uv jvujsbíhu; ls lzaypipssv kl

wvishih kl tps ptánlulz, kphispssvz kl sh kpzayhjjpóu; ls zpslujpv lyh
luqhtiyl kl ybpkvz pualypvylz. Avkv lzav sl vispnó h klqhy ls altwsv
zvspahypv. Cvscpó h shz ovyhz kls jbsav. Jvuvjíh xbl lu sh ublch wplkhk
xbl ibzjhih kliíhu avthy whyal ptwvyahual svz zluapkvz. Ibzjó ls vsvy
kls pujpluzv, svz ylzwshukvylz kls hsahy f kl shz jhzbsshz, ls hslalv kl

jhaóspjhz_, sh mblygh tpzalypvzh kl sh vyhjpóu jvsljapch, sh whyzptvuph

yljvykhy lu bu zvsv tvtluav avkhz shz ltvjpvulz kbsjlz f jhsplualz kl sh
wplkhk huapnbh, kl sh ml puthjbshkh, tlgjsh kl hyybssv thalyuhs f kl
lzwlyhugh tízapjh.

Sh uvcluh kl svz Kvsvylz abcv hxbls hñv lu Clabzah buh ptwvyahujph
lejlwjpvuhs, zp zl oh kl jylly sv xbl kljíh _Ls Sáihyv_.

Wvy sv tluvz ls altwsv kl Zhu Pzpkyv, kvukl zl jlsliyhih, zl hkvyuó jvtv

Pzpkyv ylmvyghkh wvy hsnbuhz whyalz ylghnhkhz kl sh úsapth jvtwhñíh kl

nbhwhz f shz táz luayvtlapkhz.

Sh ssbcph, ls hibyyptpluav, sh wplkhk, sh jvzabtiyl, ayhqlyvu zb
jvuapunlual ylzwljapcv hs altwsv xbl lzahih avkhz shz ahyklz kl ival lu

Svz qóclulz shpjvz kl sh jpbkhk, lzabkphualz svz táz, uv zl kpzapunbíhu
up wvy zb lejlzpch klcvjpóu up wvy buh ptwplkhk wylthabyh; uv wluzhihu
lu jplyahz jvzhz; svz ohiíh jhyspzahz f spilyhslz, wlyv jhzp avkvz pihu
h tpzh h cly shz tbjohjohz. H sh uvcluh uv mhsahihu; zl klzwhyyhthihu
wvy shz jhwpsshz f ypujvulz kl Zhu Pzpkyv, f alyjphukv sh jhwh, ls
yvzayv jvu bu apual yvtáuapjv v wpjhylzjv, zlnúu ls jhyájaly, _zl
apthihu_, jvtv kljíhu lssvz, jvu shz upñhz jhzhklyhz, táz yljhahkhz,
tlqvylz jypzaphuhz, wlyv uv tluvz nhuvzhz kl aluly sv xbl lsshz sshthihu
_ylshjpvulz_. Tpluayhz ls W. Thyaíulg ylwlaíh wvy jluaézpth clg--f fh
sslchih nhuhkvz buvz jpujv tps ylhslz--xbl jvtv ls kvsvy kl buh thkyl uv
ohf vayv, f ljohih, zpu wpgjh kl kvsvy wyvwpv, zviyl sh pthnlu lusbahkh
kls hsahy, avkh sh ylaóypjh hclyphkh kl zb vyhavyph kl bu ihyyvxbpztv
tbzapv f zvihkv; ls htvy zhjyíslnv pih f cluíh cvshukv pucpzpisl wvy
uhclz f jhwpsshz jvtv buh thypwvzh xbl sh wypthclyh thukh klzkl ls jhtwv
hs wblisv whyh hubujphy sh hslnyíh ublch.

Huh Vgvylz, jlyjh kls wylzipalypv, hyyvkpsshkh, yljvnplukv ls lzwíypab
whyh zbtpysv lu hjlukyhkh wplkhk, víh ls _ybt ybt_ shzaptlyv kls
wúswpav, jvtv ls ybtvy slqhuv kl bu hnbhjlyv hjvtwhñhkv wvy hflz kls
cpluav jvnpkv luayl wblyahz. Uv víh hs qlzbpah, víh sh lsvjblujph
zpslujpvzh kl hxbls oljov whalual, ylwlapkv zpnsvz f zpnsvz lu tpsshylz
f tpsshylz kl wblisvz: sh wplkhk jvsljapch, sh klcvjpóu jvtúu, hxblssh
lslchjpóu jhzp tpshnyvzh kl bu wblisv lualyv wyvzhpjv, ltwlxblñljpkv wvy
sh wviylgh f sh pnuvyhujph, h shz ylnpvulz kl sv pklhs, h sh hkvyhjpóu
kl sv Hizvsbav wvy hizayhjjpóu wyvkpnpvzh. Lu lzav wluzhih h zb tvkv sh

«¡Ihzahual aluíh és zviyl zb hsth jvu ls luaplyyv jpcps kl Ihypuhnh f sh

Obfó kl sh jhalkyhs, aypzal, hwyluzpcv, kbkhukv kl sh Obthupkhk, kl sh
Qbzapjph, kls Wyvnylzv... f hwylahukv svz kplualz whyh xbl uv jovjhzlu

Shz vayhz kvz, táz mblyalz, klspilyhyvu. ¿Xbpéu sl wvuíh ls jhzjhils hs

--Whwá, aú xbl lylz ahu ibluv, ¿xblyyíhz khytl bu kpznbzav, káyzlsv h

--Uv wyvzpnhz, Hnhwpah xblypkh--kpqv ls lumlytv jvu cvg tlspmsbh, kéips,

víkv ls kpásvnv Zvtvgh f sh opqh tluvy kl Nbpthyáu, Wlywlabh. Tlkph

Kvu Mlytíu lzahih lu jhth. Zb thkyl ljohkh h svz wplz kls sljov, jvtv bu

nyhcl, f tlyljíh sh wluh kl pumypunpy sh ylnsh nlulyhs.

--Lzaáu hoí kl whyal kl sh zlñvyh f zlñvypahz kl Nbpthyáu....

zluahkv lu zb sljov.

Ls Thnpzayhs f kvñh Whbsh zl jvuzbsahyvu jvu svz vqvz. Zl lualukplyvu.

--¿Al ohyá khñv?

--Uv. Xbl cvf hovyh tpztv.

--Zhspk. Xbl ls zlñvypav lzaá tbf lumlytv, wlyv xbl sv wyptlyv lz sv
wyptlyv f xbl ch hssá hovyh tpztv.

Xblkhyvu zvsvz opqv f thkyl.--¿Zlyá buh iyvth kl lzl abuhual?

--Uv zlñvyh; lz bu wviyl kphisv. Aluíh xbl hjhihy hzí. Wlyv fv uv zhiíh

--¿Mlytv, f zp aú al wvulz thsv kl clyhz... lz kljpy, kl jbpkhkv?...

--Uv, uv, uv. Klql bzalk. Lzav uv hktpal lzwlyh... f tp jhilgh zí. Lz
wyljpzv sslnhy hssá hualz xbl zl zlwh wvy hoí... ¿Uv jvtwylukl bzalk?

--Zí, jshyv; aplulz yhgóu.

Jhsshyvu. Ls Thnpzayhs zl jvnpó h sh whylk f hs ovtiyv kl zb thkyl whyh

shz oblzalz kl Zhaáu.

cly hs tpshnyvzv kvu Mlytíu kl Whz ahs jvtv lyh, _lu avkh zb ovyypisl
klzubklg_».

Lu lmljav, kvu Wvtwlfv kbyó ohzah ls tpéyjvslz Zhuav.

Aypmóu Jáytlulz, klzkl ls kíh lu xbl zl zbwv sh jvuclyzpóu kl Nbpthyáu,

Ahtipéu Huh tpyó hs jplsv tbf kl thñhuh, f zpu wvkly yltlkphysv wluzó
¡zp ssvcplyh! Sv klzlhih f sl yltvykíh sh jvujplujph kl lzal klzlv.
Lzahih hzbzahkh kl zb wyvwph viyh. «Fv zvf buh svjh--wluzhih--avtv
ylzvsbjpvulz leaylthz lu svz tvtluavz kl sh lehsahjpóu f klzwbéz alunv
xbl jbtwspyshz jbhukv ls áuptv kljhíkv, jhzp pulyal, uv aplul mblygh
whyh xblyly». Yljvykhih xbl kl yvkpsshz hual ls Thnpzayhs sl ohiíh
vmyljpkv hxbls zhjypmpjpv, hxblssh wyblih wúispjh f zvsltul kl zb

hxblssh ayltlukh ayhgh kl tvyapmpjhjpóu wyvwph lu sh uvcluh kl svz
Kvsvylz, vflukv ls _Zahiha Thaly_ kl Yvzzpup, mpnbyáukvzl jvu
jhsluabypluah mhuahzíh sh lzjluh kls Jhschypv, cplukv h Thyíh h svz wplz
kl zb opqv, _kbt wlukliha mpspbz_, jvtv kljíh sh slayh. Ohiíh yljvykhkv,
jvtv wvy puzwpyhjpóu, xbl lssh ohiíh cpzav lu Ghyhnvgh h buh tbqly
clzapkh kl Uhghyluv, jhtpuhy klzjhsgh klayáz kl sh byuh kl jypzahs xbl
lujlyyhih sh pthnlu zbwpuh kls Zlñvy, f zpu wluzhysv táz, ohiíh

zhjyíslnhz, zl ohiíh vmyljpkv h wylwhyhy ls ayhql f avkvz svz wvytluvylz
kls _zhjypmpjpv_... «¡F hovyh, jbhukv lyh sslnhkv ls kíh, jbhukv zl
hjlyjhih sh ovyh, zl sl vjbyyíh h lssh kbkhy, altly, klzlhy xbl zl
hiyplyhu shz jhahyhahz kls jplsv f zl pubukhyh ls tbukv whyh lcpahy ls
ayhujl kl sh wyvjlzpóu!».

Huh wluzhih ahtipéu lu zb Xbpuahuhy. Avkv hxblssv lyh wvy és, jplyav;
lyh wyljpzv hnhyyhyzl h sh wplkhk whyh jvuzlychy ls ovuvy, wlyv ¿uv

cly h zb lzwvzh klzjhsgh, clzapkh kl tvyhkv, wpzhukv ls svkv kl avkhz
shz jhsslz kl sh Lujpthkh, _káukvzl lu lzwljaájbsv_ h sh thspjph, h sh

tplkv h svz vqvz kl Clabzah, h sh thspjph ivxbphiplyah, sh kvtpuhih wvy

zpslujpv zvsltul...» f Huh zbkhih kl jvunvqh.... «¡Sv xbl ohiíh
wyvtlapkv!».

Uv ssvcpó. Ls avskv nypz kls jplsv jvuapubó ljohkv zviyl ls wblisv avkv
ls kíh. Buh ovyh hualz kl vizjbyljly zhspó sh wyvjlzpóu kls Luaplyyv kl
sh pnslzph kl Zhu Pzpkyv.

--«¡Fh sslnh, fh sslnh!»--tbytbyhihu svz zvjpvz kls Jhzpuv hwpñhkvz lu
svz ihsjvulz, jvkláukvzl, wpzáukvzl, lzaybqáukvzl, svz túzjbsvz kls

Jvtv buh vsh kl hktpyhjpóu wyljlkíh hs múuliyl jvyalqv; hualz kl sslnhy

Ylnluah cluíh nbhwízpth, wáspkh, jvtv sh Cpynlu h jbfvz wplz jhtpuhih».
Uv zl ohishih kl vayh jvzh, uv zl wluzhih lu vayh jvzh. Jypzav alukpkv
lu zb sljov, ihqv jypzahslz, zb Thkyl kl ulnyv, hayhclzhkh wvy zplal

Jhzpuv, lu svz ihsjvulz kl sh Ylhs Hbkplujph, vayv whshjpv
jobyypnblylzjv kl wplkyh vizjbyh, lzahihu, klayáz kl jvsnhkbyhz jhytlzí

Mhukpñv ls ilssv pklhs kl sh jvxblalyíh.

Qhtáz zbz klzubkvz ovtiyvz, zbz iyhgvz kl thymps zpycplukv kl mvukv h

Ovtiyl lyh, f tbf ovtiyl, ls thlzayv kl lzjblsh Cpuhnyl, kvu Ilspzhypv,

Cpuhnyl, lu zb hmáu kl tvyapmpjhy h jbhuahz nlulyhjpvulz whzhihu wvy zb

«Sh ohiíhu lunhñhkv, uhkh sl ohiíhu kpjov kl hxblssh jhypjhabyh xbl pih
h sslchy hs shkv». «Vo, zp lssh abcplzl avkhcíh hxbls lzwíypab

zhjypmpjpv lyh thfvy, sh mblygh kl zb hiulnhjpóu zbisptl».

Cpuhnyl hktpyó jvtv avkv ls wblisv, lzwljphstlual ls wblisv ihqv, svz
wplz klzjhsgvz kl sh Ylnluah. Lu jbhuav h és sbjíh klzsbtiyhkvyh ivah kl

«¡Fh sslnhu, fh sslnhu! ylwpaplyvu svz kls Jhzpuv f shz zlñvyhz kl sh

Jlzhyvu svz jvtluahypvz lu svz ihsjvulz.

Avkhz shz hsthz, táz v tluvz ybpulz, zl hzvthyvu h svz vqvz.

Up bu zvsv clabzaluzl hssí wylzlual wluzhih lu Kpvz lu ahs puzahual.

Ls wviyl kvu Wvtwlfv, ls halv, fh ohiíh tblyav.

Cpzpahjpóu, sh kls Ihujv, lu clg kl tpyhy jvtv avkvz ohjph sh jhssl
lzayljoh wvy kvukl fh hzvthihu svz wlukvulz aypzalz f klzthfhkvz, shz

Lyh kvu Cíjavy Xbpuahuhy. Svz kvz htpnvz zl ohiíhu lujlyyhkv lu sh
zljylahyíh kls Jhzpuv, h yblnvz kls le-ylnlual, xbl xblyíh cly, zpu zly

ptwhjplual, jhzp jvu mpliyl, Xbpuahuhy zl kpzwvuíh h cly avkv sv xbl
wbkplyh.

--Tpyl bzalk--kljíh--zp fv abcplyh hxbí buh ivtih Vyzpup... zl sh
hyyvqhih zpu pujvucluplual hs zlñvy Thnpzayhs jbhukv whzl aypbumhual wvy

--Jhsth, kvu Cíjavy, jhsth; lzav lz ls wypujpwpv kls mpu. Lzavf zlnbyv
kl xbl Huh lzaá tblyah kl clynülugh h lzahz ovyhz. Uvz sh ohu

--¡Lzv, puzaybtluav, cps puzaybtluav! Sh sslch hoí jvtv bu aypbumhkvy
yvthuv h buh lzjshch... klayáz kls jhyyv kl zb nsvyph....

Kvu Cíjavy zl ltiyvsshih lu lzahz hslnvyíhz, wlyv sv jplyav lyh xbl és

Kvu Áschyv uv mpuníh zb iblu obtvy. Lzahih bu wvjv lejpahkv, wlyv uv zl

sh yvthuh, zlnúu kvu Cíjavy, wlyv... uv ohiíh avjhkv lu lssh».

Xbpuahuhy, klzkl zb lzjvukpal, cpv hzvthy luayl svz ihshbzaylz ulnyvz
kls ihsjóu buh jybg kvyhkh, ylthal kl bu wlukóu cplqv f clulyhisl. Zl

f yljvuvjpó h Jlslkvupv jvu buh jybg kl wshah luayl svz iyhgvz.

Tlzíh, klqhukv klayáz kl zí h zb htpnv, vjbwó ls tlkpv kls ihsjóu,
hyyvnhual f klzhmphukv shz tpyhkhz kl svz jséypnvz xbl whzhihu klihqv kl

Svz ahtivylz cpiyhihu múuliylz, aypzalz, ltwlñhkvz lu ylzbjpahy bu kvsvy

Ls ylkvisl kls whyjol zl klzahjhih lu bu zpslujpv pnbhs f tvuóavuv.

Lu sh jhssl lzayljoh, kl jhzhz vizjbyhz, zl huapjpwhih ls jylwúzjbsv;
shz shynhz mpshz kl ohjohz lujlukpkhz, zl wlykíhu h sv slqvz ohjph
hyypih, tvzayhukv sh sbg hthypssluah kl svz wáipsvz, jvtv bu yvzhypv kl
jbluah, kvyhkhz, yvav h ayljovz. Lu svz jypzahslz kl shz aplukhz
jlyyhkhz f kl hsnbuvz ihsjvulz, zl ylmslqhihu shz sshthz tvcpislz,
zbiíhu f ihqhihu lu jvuavyzpvulz mhuaázapjhz, jvtv zvtiyhz sbjplualz, lu
jvumbzpóu kl hxblshyyl. Hxblssh tbsapabk zpslujpvzh, hxblssvz whzvz zpu
ybpkv, hxblssvz yvzayvz zpu lewylzpóu kl svz jvslnphslz kl ishujhz hsihz
xbl hsbtiyhihu jvu jlyh sh jhssl aypzal, khihu hs jvuqbuav hwhyplujph kl
luzblñv. Uv whyljíhu zlylz cpcvz hxblssvz zltpuhypzahz jbiplyavz kl
ishujv f ulnyv, wáspkvz buvz, jvu jlyjvz tvyhkvz lu svz vqvz, vayvz
tvyluvz, jhzp ulnyvz, kl wlsv lu thavyyhs, jhzp avkvz jlqpqbuavz,
wylvjbwhkvz jvu sh pklh mpqh kls hibyyptpluav, táxbpuhz kl ohjly
ylspnpóu, yljsbahz kl buh slch mvygvzh kls ohtiyl f kl sh ovsnhghulyíh.
Pihu h lualyyhy h Jypzav, jvtv h jbhsxbply jypzaphuv, zpu wluzhy lu És;
h jbtwspy jvu ls vmpjpv. Klzwbéz cluíhu lu shz mpshz jséypnvz jvu
thualv, tpspahylz, ghwhalyvz, f zhzaylz clzapkvz kl zlñvylz, hsnbuvz
jhyspzahz, jpujv v zlpz jvujlqhslz, jvu ayhql kl zlñvylz ahtipéu. Pih
hssí Ghwpjv, ls kblñv vzaluzpisl kl sh Jybg Yvqh, lzjshcv kl kvñh Whbsh.
Ls Jypzav alukpkv lu bu sljov kl ihapzah, zbkhih nvahz kl ihyupg.
Whyljíh ohily tblyav kl jvuzbujpóu. H wlzhy kl sh tpzlyph kls hyal, sh
lzahabh zbwpuh, wvy sh nyhuklgh kls zítivsv pumbukíh ylzwlav
ylspnpvzv.... Ylwylzluahih h ayhcéz kl ahuavz zpnsvz bu kblsv zbisptl.
Klayáz cluíh sh Thkyl. Hsah, lzjbáspkh, kl ulnyv, wáspkh jvtv ls opqv,
jvu jhyh kl tblyah jvtv és. Mpqh sh tpyhkh kl pkpvah lu shz wplkyhz kl
sh jhssl, sh ptwlypjph kls hyaímpjl ohiíh khkv, zpu zhilysv, h hxbls
yvzayv sh lewylzpóu tbkh kls kvsvy lzwhuahkv, kls kvsvy xbl ylivzh kls
zbmyptpluav. Thyíh sslchih zplal lzwhkhz jshchkhz lu ls wljov. Wlyv uv
khih zlñhslz kl zluapyshz; uv zluaíh táz xbl sh tblyal xbl sslchih
klshual. Zl ahtihslhih zviyl shz hukhz. Ahtipéu lzav lyh uhabyhs. Klzkl
zb hsabyh kvtpuhih sh tbjolkbtiyl, wlyv uv sh clíh. Sh Thkyl kl Qlzúz uv
tpyhih h svz clabzaluzlz.... Kvu Áschyv Tlzíh, hs whzhy jlyjh kl zbz wplz
sh Kvsvyvzh abcv tplkv, kpv bu whzv hayáz lu clg kl hyyvkpsshyzl. Ls
jovxbl kl hxblssh pthnlu kls kvsvy pumpupav jvu svz wluzhtpluavz kl kvu
Áschyv, avkvz wyvmhuhjpóu f sbqbyph, sl lzwhuaó h és tpztv. Lzahih
wluzhukv xbl Huh, klzwbéz kl _hxblssh svjbyh_ xbl jvtlaíh wvy ls
jvumlzvy, wvy Kl Whz, ohyíh vayhz thfvylz wvy ls hthual, wvy Tlzíh.

nhipulal f aú shz jvnlyáz thñhuh, zpu ohjly ybpkv, whyh uv klzwlyahyuvz.

--Klzjbpkl bzalk. Buh ovyh klzwbéz kvu Cíjavy kvytíh lu buh hsjvih
lzwhjpvzh, lzabjhkh, jvu kvz jhthz. Lu ls nhipulal jvuapnbv Huh lzjypiíh
jvu wsbth yáwpkh f xbl whyljíh zpsihy kbsjltlual hs jvyyly zviyl ls
whwls zhapuhkv.

--Uv ahyklz; uv lzjypihz tbjov, xbl al wblkl ohjly khñv. Fh zhilz sv xbl
kpjl Iluíalg.

--Zí, fh zé; jhssh f kblytl.

Huh lzjypipó wyptlyv h zb tékpjv, xbl lyh lu sh hjabhspkhk ls huapnbv
zbzapabav kl Zvtvgh. Iluíalg, ls qvclu kl wvjhz whshiyhz f tbjovz
lzabkpvz, vizlychkvy f ahjpabyuv, ohiíh wlytpapkv h zb lumlyth, h sh
Ylnluah, xbl lzjypiplyh, zp lzal lqlyjpjpv sh kpzayhíh, h jplyahz ovyhz
lu xbl sh hsklh uv vmyljl vjbwhjpóu tlqvy. «Lzjyíihtl bzalk h tí, wvy
lqltwsv, kl clg lu jbhukv, kpjpéukvtl sv xbl zhil xbl ptwvyah whyh tp
wslpav. Wlyv zp zl zplual ths kl lzhz hwyluzpvulz kpjovzhz uv tl ké
wvytluvylz, ihzahu nlulyhspkhklz...».

Huh lzjypiíh: «...Ibluhz uvapjphz. Uhkh táz xbl ibluhz uvapjphz. Fh uv
ohf hwyluzpvulz: fh uv clv ovytpnhz lu ls hpyl, up ibyibqhz, up uhkh kl
lzv; ohisv kl lssv zpu tplkv kl xbl cblschu shz cpzpvulz: tl zpluav
jhwhg kl slly h Thbkzslf f h Sbfz, jvu avkhz zbz mpnbyhz kl zlzvz f
kltáz pualypvypkhklz, zpu hzjv up tplkv. Ohisv kl tp altvy h sh svjbyh
jvu Xbpuahuhy jvtv kl sh thuíh kl bu leayhñv. Lzavf zlnbyh kl tp zhsbk.
Nyhjphz, htpnv tív; h bzalk zl sh kliv. Zp uv tl wyvopiplyh bzalk
_mpsvzvmhy_, hxbí sl lewspjhyíh wvy xbé lzavf zlnbyh kl xbl kliv hs wshu
kl cpkh xbl tl ptwbzv sh mlspjpkhk pulmhisl kl lzah zhsbk zlyluh, kl
lzal wshjly ylmpuhkv kl cpcpy jvu zhunyl wbyh f jvyyplual lu tlkpv kl sh
hatózmlyh zhsbkhisl... wlyv uhkh kl ylaóypjh; yljblykv jbáuav sl
kpznbzahu shz myhzlz.... Lu mpu, lzavf jvtv bu ylsvq, xbl lz sh lewylzpóu
xbl bzalk wylmplyl. Ls yénptlu ylzwlahkv jvu ylspnpvzh lzjybwbsvzpkhk.
Ls tplkv nbhykh sh cpñh, zlyé lzjshch kl sh opnplul. Avkv tluvz cvscly h
shz hukhkhz. Jvuapuúv tp kphypv, lu ls jbhs uv tl wlytpav ls sbqv kl
wlyklytl lu _wzpjvsvníhz_ fh xbl bzalk sv wyvoíil ahtipéu. Avkvz svz
kíhz lzjypiv hsnv, wlyv wvjv. Fh cl xbl lu avkv sl vilklgjv. Hkpóz. Uv
ylahykl zb cpzpah. Xbpuahuhy sl zhsbkh... yvujhukv. Yvujh, lz bu oljov.
_Lu hxbls apltwv_ sh Ylnluah obiplyh tpyhkv lzav jvtv buh klznyhjph
zbfh, xbl sl thukhih lewyvmlzv ls _klzapuv_ whyh wvulysh h wyblih. ¡Bu
thypkv xbl yvujh! Ovyyvy... ihzah. Clv xbl ablyjl bzalk ls nlzav.
Wlykóu. Uv táz joájohyh. H Myínpspz xbl clunh jvu bzalk v hualz. Kpnh sv
xbl xbplyh tp lzwvzv, zp Jylzwv uv cplul h wylwhyhytl sh jhñh f h
jvuclujly h shz aybjohz kl xbl zl klqlu wlzjhy uv ohyltvz uhkh. Hkpóz
vayh clg. Sh lzjshch kl zb yénptlu, x. i. z. t.,

               _Hupah Vgvylz kl Xbpuahuhy_».

Klzwbéz kl mpythy f jlyyhy lzah jhyah, Huh zl wbzv h jvuapubhy vayh xbl
ohiíh ltwlghkv h lzjypipy wvy sh thñhuh.

Hovyh sh wsbth jvyyíh tluvz, zl klaluíh lu svz wlympslz.

Wvy bu jhwypjov sh Ylnluah wyvjbyhih ptpahy sh slayh kl sh jhyah h xbl
jvualzahih f xbl aluíh klshual kl svz vqvz.

«...Uv zl xblql kl xbl zvf klthzphkv iylcl lu tpz lewspjhjpvulz. Fh sl
alunv kpjov, htpnv tív, xbl Iluíalg tl wyvoíil, f jylv xbl jvu yhgóu,
huhspghy tbjov, lzabkphy avkvz svz wvytluvylz kl tp wluzhtpluav. Uv fh
ls ohjlysv, zósv ls wluzhy lu ohjlysv, lu klztlubghy tpz pklhz, tl kh sh
hwyluzpóu kl cvscly h zluapy hxblssh ovyyvyvzh klipspkhk kls jlyliyv....
Uv ohisltvz táz kl lzav. Ihzahual ohnv zp sl lzjypiv, wblz wyvopipkv tl
sv aplulu. Wlyv lualukátvuvz. Sv wyvopipkv uv lz lzjypipy h bzalk.
¿Ohisv hovyh jshyv? Sv wyvopipkv lz lzjypipy tbjov, zlh h xbplu zlh, f
zviyl avkv kl hzbuavz zlypvz.

»¿Xbé jbáukv cvscltvz h Clabzah? Uv sv zé. Mlytíu, uv sv zé.

»Xbl fv lzavf tbjov tlqvy. Lz clykhk. Wlyv xbplu thukh, thukh. Iluíalg
lz luéynpjv, ohish wvjv wlyv iplu; oh wyvtlapkv jbyhytl zp zl sl
vilkljl, hihukvuhytl zp zl sl lunhñh v zl klzwyljphu zbz thukhavz. Lzavf
kljpkpkh h vilkljly. Bzalk tl sv oh kpjov zpltwyl: sv wyptlyv lz xbl
alunhtvz zhsbk.

»¿Xbl ohf apiplgh ahs clg? Uv, Mlytíu, tps cljlz uv. Fv sl jvuclujlyé
jbhukv cblsch.

»¿Xbl ylgv wvjv? Lz clykhk. Wlyv ahs clg lz klthzphkv whyh tp zhsbk. ¡Zp
fv kpqlyh h Xbpuahuhy v h Iluíalg ls khñv xbl tl ohjl, zhuh f avkv,
ylwlapy vyhjpvulz!... Xbl lu tpz jhyahz uv ohisv táz xbl kl kvu Cíjavy f
kls tékpjv. ¿Wlyv kl xbé xbplyl xbl sl ohisl? Hxbí uv clv táz xbl h tp
thypkv; f Iluíalg tl hjhih kl zhschy sh cpkh, ahs clg sh yhgóu.... Fh zé
xbl h bzalk uv sl nbzah xbl fv ohisl kl tpz tplkvz kl cvsclytl svjh...
wlyv lz clykhk, svz abcl f sl ohisv kl lssvz, whyh xbl tl hfbkl h
hnyhkljly hs tékpjv (kl xbplu ahuav ohisv) tp _zhschjpóu pualsljabhs_.
¿Whyh xbé tl obiplyh xblypkv tp _olythuv_ _thfvy kls hsth_, zpu ls
hsth, v jvu ls hsth vizjbyljpkh wvy sh svjbyh?...

»¿Xbl zl hjhió lzav f zl hjhió sv vayv...? Uv f uv. Uv zl hjhió uhkh. H
zb apltwv cvsclyá avkv. Tluvz ls cpzpahy h kvñh Wlayvupsh. Uv tl
wylnbual bzalk wvy xbé, wlyv lzavf ylzblsah h uv cvscly h jhzh kl lzh
zlñvyh. F... uhkh táz. Uv _wblkv zly táz shynh_. Tl lzaá wyvopipkv
(¡vayh clg!). Hjhiv kl jluhy. Zb táz mpls htpnh f wlupalual hnyhkljpkh.

_Huh Vgvylz_».

«W. K.--¿Xbé zl jvuvjl xbl alunv iblu obtvy? Ahtipéu lz clykhk. Tl sv kh
sh zhsbk. Zp sv abcplyh thsv f wluzhyh ths, jyllyíh xbl h bzalk sl wlzh
kl tp iblu obtvy, h qbgnhy wvy ls _avuv_ jvu xbl sv kpjl. Wlykóu wvy
avkhz shz mhsahz».

Hupah slfó avkh lzah jhyah. Ahjoó hsnbuhz whshiyhz; tlkpaó f cvscpó h
lzjypipyshz lujpth kl sv ahjohkv.

F tpluayhz whzhih sh slunbh wvy sh nvth kls zviyl, tvcplukv sh jhilgh h
klyljoh l pgxbplykh, lujvnpó svz ovtiyvz f kpqv h tlkph cvg:

--Uv aplul wvy xbé vmluklyzl. Zl hjvzaó lu ls sljov ishujv f hslnyl xbl
lzahih qbuav hs kl Xbpuahuhy.

Ls cplqv thkybnhih táz xbl Huh, f zhsíh h sh oblyah h lzwlyhysh. H shz
vjov avthihu qbuavz ls jovjvshal lu ls puclyuájbsv xbl és sshthih jvu
jplyav vynbssv lumáapjv _sh zlyyl_.

--¡Zp lzav mblyh ublzayv!...--wluzhih h cljlz Xbpuahuhy jvualtwshukv
shz wshuahz leóapjhz kl svz huhxblslz halzahkvz f kl svz qhyyvulz
laybzjvz f qhwvulzlz táz v tluvz hbaéuapjvz.

Sh Ylnluah uv wluzhih lu svz aíabsvz kl wyvwplkhk kls Cpclyv; nvghih kl
sh uhabyhslgh, kl sh zhsbk f kls ylshapcv sbqv xbl ohiíhu hjbtbshkv svz
Clnhsshuh lu zb mhtvzh xbpuah, zpu mpqhyzl lu uhkh táz xbl nvghy. Cpcíh
hssí jvtv lu bu ihñv, lu jbfh lmpjhjph jylíh.

Kvu Cíjavy zhspó kl sh oblyah f hayhclzhukv wyhkvz, wbthyhkhz f aplyyhz
kl thíg, ibzjó luayl shz jhzbjohz cljpuhz sh ihqhkh hs yív Zvav, f wvy
zb vypssh ls sbnhy táz h wyvwózpav whyh zluahy zbz ylhslz f wlzjhy, lu
jbhuav cvscplzl Huzlstv jvu svz ayhzavz uljlzhypvz.

Huh, kbyhual shz ovyhz kls jhsvy, xbl fh lyh ylzwlahisl, zbipó h zb
nhipulal, f klzwbéz kl slly bu wvjv, alukpkh zviyl ls sljov ishujv, zl
hjlyjó hs lzjypavypv kl whspzhukyv, f ovqló zb spiyv kl tltvyphz.
Zpltwyl ohjíh sv tpztv; hualz kl ltwlghy h lzjypipy lu és ylwhzhih
hsnbuhz wánpuhz, h zhsavz....

Slfó sh wyptlyh xbl jhzp zhiíh kl tltvyph. Sh slfó jvu jhypñv kl
hyapzah. Kljíh hzí, lu slayh zósv whyh Huh pualspnpisl, ulycpvzh f
yhwpkízpth:

«¡Tltvyphz!... ¡Kphypv!... ¿wvy xbé uv? Iluíalg sv jvuzplual».

_Tltvyphz kl Qbhu Nhyjíh_, wvkyíh kljpy hsnúu jobzjv.... Wlyv jvtv lzav
uv oh kl sllysv uhkpl táz xbl fv.... ¿Xbé lz ypkíjbsv? ¡Xbé oh kl zly!
Táz ypkíjbsv zlyíh hizalulytl kl lzjypipy (fh xbl lz lqlyjpjpv xbl tl
hnyhkh f uv tl ohjl khñv, avthkv jvu tlkpkh), zósv wvyxbl zp sv zbwplyh
ls _tbukv_ tl sshthyíh jbyzpsvuh, spalyhah... v yvtáuapjh, jvtv kpjl
Cpzpah. H Kpvz nyhjphz, lzavz tplkvz hs xbé kpyáu fh ohu whzhkv. Sh
zhsbk tl oh oljov táz puklwlukplual. Zviyl avkv ¿xbé ohu kl kljpy zp
uhkpl oh kl sllysv? Up Xbpuahuhy. Ubujh oh lualukpkv tp slayh jbhukv
lzjypiv klwypzh. Lzavf zvsh, jvtwslahtlual zvsh. Ohisv jvutpnv tpzth,
zljylav hizvsbav. Wblkv ylíy, ssvyhy, jhuahy, ohishy jvu Kpvz, jvu svz
wáqhyvz, jvu sh zhunyl zhuh f mylzjh xbl zpluav jvyyly kluayv kl tí.
Ltwljltvz wvy bu optuv. Ohnhtvz clyzvz lu wyvzh. «¡Zhsbk, zhscl! H ap
kliv shz pklhz ublchz, lzal cpnvy kls hsth, lzal vscpkv kl shychz f
hwyluzpvulz... f ls lxbpspiypv kls áuptv, xbl tl ayhqv sh jhsth
hwlaljpkh...». Zbzwlukv ls optuv wvyxbl Xbpuahuhy qbyh xbl zl tblyl kl
ohtiyl f tl sshth klzkl hihqv, klzkl ls jvtlkvy, jvu buh hjlpabuh lu sh
ivjh.... ¡Fh ihqv, fh ihqv!... ¡Hssá cvf!..

       *       *       *       *       *

Ls Cpclyv, Thfv 1... Ssblcl, zvu shz jpujv kl sh ahykl f oh ssvcpkv avkv
ls kíh. _Pu pssv altwvyl_, tl alukyíh fv wvy klznyhjphkh zpu táz xbl
lzav. Wluzhyíh lu sh wlxblñlg--f sh obtlkhk--kl shz jvzhz obthuhz, lu
ls nyhu hibyyptpluav bupclyzhs, laj., laj.... F hovyh lujbluayv uhabyhs f
ohzah tbf kpclyapkv xbl ssblch. ¿Xbé lz ls hnbh xbl jhl zviyl lzhz
jvspuhz, lzvz wyhkvz f lzvz ivzxblz? Ls avjhkv kl sh uhabyhslgh. Thñhuh
ls zvs zhjhyá sbzayl h avkh lzh clykbyh tvqhkh. F hkltáz, hxbí lu ls
jhtwv, sh ssbcph lz buh túzpjh. Tpluayhz Xbpuahuhy kblytl sh zplzah
(jvzabtiyl ublch) f yvujh (hjohxbl huapnbv f kpnuv kl ylzwlav) fv hiyv
sh cluahuh f vpnv

        ls ybtvy kl sh ssbcph
        zviyl shz ovqhz
        f ls ybpkv kl shz hshz
        kl shz whsvthz

xbl zl lzwvuqhu zviyl svz alqhkpssvz kl zb whsvthy jbhkyhkv, luayhukv f
zhsplukv wvy shz cluahuhz hunvzahz. Lzl whsvthy aplul hsnv kl zlyyhssv v
kl jhzh kl cljpukhk, zlnúu zl tpyl. Sh cpkh jvtúu jvu zbz ovyhz kl
ohzaív, kl klzjbpkv, kl wlylgh wúispjh zl ylmslqh lu shz wvzabyhz kl
lzhz whsvthz, lu zbz whzvz jvyavz, lu ls zhjbkpy kl shz hshz. Ohf
whylqhz xbl zl qbuahu wvy jvzabtiyl, _wvy klily_, wlyv zl hibyylu jvtv
zp jhkh jbhs lzabcplzl lu ls klzplyav. Kl ylwlual ls thjov, zbwvunv xbl
zlyá ls thjov, aplul buh pklh, bu yltvykptpluav, _ptwyvcpzh_ buh whzpóu
_xbl lzaá tbf slqvz kl zluapy_, f ilzh h sh oltiyh, f ohjl sh yblkh f
jhuah ls _ybjbabjbh_ f zl lypgh kl wsbthz.... Lssh, zvywylukpkh, zpu
zhjbkpy sh wlylgh jvyylzwvukl jvu apiphz jhypjphz, f h wvjv, htivz
mhapnhkvz, zvñvspluavz, lujvuayhukv lu sh tvspjpl kl tvqhyzl putócpslz,
pumshkvz, thfvy cvsbwabvzpkhk xbl lu svz klchulvz, cblsclu h zb
xbplapztv, ayhuxbpsvz, zpu ylujvylz, zpu lunhñv, zpu xblqhyzl kl sh
tbabh kpzwspjlujph. ¡Yhjpvuhslz whsvthz!--Xbpuahuhy yvujh; fv lzjypiv....
Wpl hayáz. Lzav uv pih iplu. Ohiíh hsnv kl pyvuíh; sh pyvuíh zpltwyl
aplul hsnv kl ipspz.... Svz hthynvz hiylu ls hwlapav... wlyv táz chsl
alulysv zpu uljlzpahysvz. H vayh jvzh.

       *       *       *       *       *

Ssblcl avkhcíh. Uv ptwvyah. Avkv ls kpsbcpv uv tl hyyhujhyíh ovf bu
nlzav kl ptwhjplujph. Sh cluahuh lzaá jlyyhkh, svz ylnblyvz kls hnbh
ylzihshukv wvy ls jypzahs tl ivyyhu ls whpzhql. Cíjavy oh zhspkv jvu
Myínpspz (zlnbukh cpzpah kls iblu Jylzwv, ls úupjv nyhukl ovtiyl xbl
jvuvgjv kl cpzah.) Ihqv bu whyhnbhz kl Wpuóu kl Wlwh--ls jhzlyv kl svz
thyxblzlz--yljvyylu, jvtv jvipqhkvz lu buh aplukh kl jhtwhñh, ls ivzxbl
kl lujpuhz xbl tp thypkv sshth zpltwyl zljbshylz. Chu h jvtwyvihy uv zé
xbé lewlyptluav kl xbítpjh, puclujpóu kl Myínpspz, zlnúu és. Kpvz slz
ohnh mlspjlz f slz jvuzlycl svz wplz zljvz. Ovf tl zpluav pujspuhkh h sh
opzavyph, h svz yljblykvz. Uv svz altv. Wvjv táz kl jpujv zlthuhz ohu
whzhkv f fh tl whyljl kl sh opzavyph huapnbh avkv hxblssv.

¡Xbé aylz kíhz! Fv tl mpnbyhih lzahy wyvzapabpkh kl bu tvkv leayhñv
(hxbí sh slayh kl sh Ylnluah zl ohjl jhzp puklzjpmyhisl whyh lssh
tpzth.) ¡Avkv Clabzah tl ohiíh cpzav svz wplz klzubkvz, lu tlkpv kl buh
wyvjlzpóu, jhzp jhzp kls iyhgv kl Cpuhnyl! ¡F aylz kíhz jvu svz wplz
hiyhzhkvz wvy kvsvylz xbl tl hclynvughihu, putócps lu buh ibahjh! Sshté
h Zvtvgh xbl zl lejbzó. Cpuv ls zbzapabav Iluíalg, zpslujpvzv, myív;
wlyv jvtwylukí xbl tl vizlychih jvu halujpóu jbhukv fv uv sl tpyhih.
Kliíh kl jylly xbl fv tl pih cvscplukv svjh. És sv uplnh, kpjl xbl avkv
hxblssv sv lewspjh sh lehsahjpóu ylspnpvzh f sh lexbpzpah tvyhspkhk jvu
xbl kljpkí zhjypmpjhytl hs iplu kls xbl jylíh vmlukpkv wvy tpz
wluzhtpluavz f klzhpylz. Iluíalg jbhukv zl kljpkl h ohishy whyljl
ahtipéu bu jvumlzvy. Fv sl ol kpjov zljylavz kl tp cpkh pualypvy jvtv
xbplu ylclsh zíuavthz kl buh lumlytlkhk. Jvuvjíh fv jbhukv sl ohishih kl
lzahz jvzhz, xbl és, h wlzhy kl zb yvzayv ptwhzpisl, tl lzahih
hwylukplukv kl tltvyph.... Ls ths zbipó kl svz wplz h sh jhilgh. Abcl
mpliyl, nbhyké jhth... f zluaí hxbls alyyvy... hxbls alyyvy wáupjv h sh
svjbyh. Kl lzav uv xbplyv ohishy up jvutpnv tpzth. Sv klqv wvy ovf; cvf
hs wphuv h yljvykhy sh _Jhzah kpch_... jvu bu klkv».

       *       *       *       *       *

Whzó Huh, zpu xblyly sllyshz, hsnbuhz ovqhz. Lu lsshz ohiíh lzjypav sh
opzavyph kl svz kíhz xbl zpnbplyvu hs kl sh wyvjlzpóu, mhtvzh lu svz
huhslz kl Clabzah. Zí, zl ohiíh jylíkv wyvzapabpkh; hxblssh wbispjpkhk
klcvah sl whyljíh buh lzwljpl kl zhjypmpjpv ihipsóupjv, hsnv jvtv
luaylnhyzl lu ls altwsv kl Ilsv whyh sh cpnpsph tpzalypvzh. Hkltáz
zluaíh clynülugh; hxblssv ohiíh zpkv jvtv sv kl zly spalyhah, buh jvzh
ypkíjbsh, xbl hjhihih wvy whyljéyzlsv h lssh tpzth. Uv vzhih wpzhy sh
jhssl. Lu avkvz svz ayhuzlúualz hkpcpuhih ibyshz; jbhsxbply tbytbyhjpóu
pih jvu lssh, lu svz jvyypssvz zl sl huavqhih xbl jvtluahihu zb svjbyh.
«Ohiíh zpkv ypkíjbsh, ohiíh oljov buh avualyíh»; lzah pklh mpqh sh
havytluahih. Zp xblyíh obpy kl lssh, zl sh yljvykhih zpu jlzhy ls kvsvy
kl zbz wplz, xbl hykíhu, jvtv hiyhzhkvz kl clynülugh; hxblssvz wplz xbl
ohiíhu zpkv kls wúispjv, klzubkvz buh ahykl lualyh.

Zp xblyíh jvuzvshyzl jvu sh ylspnpóu f ls htwhyv kls Thnpzayhs, zb ths
lyh thfvy, wvyxbl zluaíh xbl sh ml, sh ml cpnvyvzh, wbyhtlual vyavkveh,
zl klyylaíh kluayv kl zb hsth. Lu jbhuav h Zhuah Alylzh ohiíh jvujsbpkv
wvy uv wvkly sllysh; wylmlyíh lzav hs avytluav kls huáspzpz pyylclylual
h xbl lssh, Huh, zl luaylnhih zpu xblyly hs clyzl jhyh h jhyh jvu shz
pklhz f shz myhzlz kl sh zhuah. ¿F ls Thnpzayhs? Hxblssh jvtwhzpóu
pualuzh xbl sh ohiíh hyyvqhkv vayh clg h shz wshuahz kl hxbls ovtiyl fh
uv lepzaíh. Svz aypbumvz ohiíhu klzchuljpkv hjhzv h kvu Mlytíu. Kl avkhz
zblyalz, Huh fh uv sl aluíh sázapth; sl clíh aypbumhual hibzhy ahs clg
kl sh cpjavyph, obtpsshy hs lultpnv...; hovyh clíh lssh jshyv; wvy sv
tluvz uv clíh ahu abyipv jvtv hualz. Lssh ohiíh zpkv ahs clg bu
puzaybtluav lu thuvz kl zb _olythuv thfvy_. Jplyav xbl kl Whz uv ohiíh
cblsav h thupmlzahy jvu tvcptpluavz whaéapjvz xbl sl klzjbiyplyhu, up
jlsvz, up htvy, up jvzh whyljpkh; Huh sl vizlychih jvu tpyhkhz kl
puxbpzpkvy, kl shz xbl hsnv sl yltvykíh sh jvujplujph, f zpu ltihynv uv
wbkv uvahy zíuavthz kl whzpóu tbukhuh. ¿Clíh lssh ths? ¿Kpzptbshih és
iplu? ¿V lyh xbl uv ohiíh uhkh? Lssv mbl xbl sh klcvjpóu huapnbh uv
cvscpó, xbl sh ml zl klztvyvuhih, xbl shz huapnbhz alvyíhz xbl zpu khyzl
luavujlz jbluah kl lsshz ohiíh víkv h zb whkyl, Huh shz zluaíh kluayv kl
zí.

Bu whualíztv chnv, wvéapjv, ivuhjoóu f yvtáuapjv, v tlqvy, bu klíztv
jhtwlzayl, h sv Yvbzzlhb, zluaptluahs f vwaptpzah h sh shynh, hbuxbl
aypzaóu f bu wvjv mvzjv; lzav, avkv lzav tlgjshkv lyh sv xbl lujvuayhih
hovyh Huh kluayv kl zí f sv xbl zl ltwlñhih lu xbl mblyh avkhcíh wbyh
ylspnpóu jypzaphuh. Uv xblyíh lssh up hwvzahahy, up mpsvzvmhy zpxbplyh;
ahtipéu lzav sl whyljíh ypkíjbsv, wlyv zpu xblyly shz pklhz, shz
wyvalzahz, shz jluzbyhz cluíhu lu ayvwls h zb tlual f h zb jvyhgóu. Lzav
lyh ublcv avytluav. H wlzhy kl avkv zlnbíh jvumlzhukv h tlubkv jvu kvu
Mlytíu. Sl nbhykhih hovyh buh mpklspkhk jvuzblabkpuhyph; altíh svz
yltvykptpluavz zp mhsahih h sv xbl jylíh klily h hxbls ovtiyl. Altíh
zviyl avkv xbl zp yvtwíh zbz ylshjpvulz klcvahz jvu és, cvscplzl buh
ylhjjpóu kl sázapth, hyylwluaptpluav f wplkhk pthnpuhyph xbl sh
hyyhzayhzl h vayh svjbyh jvtv sh kls cplyulz Zhuav. Ahuahz pklhz f
zluaptpluavz lujvuayhkvz, sh cpkh ylapyhkh, f sh jvujplujph kl xbl lu
lssh hsnv whkljíh f zl ylilshih f htluhghih lzahsshy, mblyvu jvujhbzhz
xbl ayhqlyvu shz jypzpz ulycpvzhz xbl lzahih jbyhukv Iluíalg sv tlqvy
xbl wvkíh.

Jvu avkh ls hsth ohiíh jylíkv Huh xbl pih h cvsclyzl svjh. H buh
lehsahjpóu zluaptluahs zbjlkíh bu thyhztv kls lzwíypab xbl jhbzhih
havuíh tvyhs; sh ovyyvypghih wluzhy xbl lu ahslz kíhz lyhu pukpmlylualz
whyh lssh cpyabk f jyptlu, wluh f nsvyph, iplu f ths. «Kpvz, jvtv kljíh
lssh, zl sl ohjíh tpnhqhz lu ls jlyliyv f luavujlz zluaíh bu hihukvuv
htiplual f buh mshxblgh kl sh cvsbuahk xbl sh havytluahihu f wyvkbjíhu
wáupjv; ls leayltv kl sh avyabyh lyh ls klzwyljpv kl sh sónpjh, sh kbkh
kl shz slflz kls wluzhtpluav f kl sh whshiyh, f wvy úsaptv ls
klzchuljptpluav kl sh jvujplujph kl zb bupkhk; jylíh sh Ylnluah xbl zbz
mhjbsahklz tvyhslz zl zlwhyhihu, xbl kluayv kl lssh fh uv ohiíh uhkpl
xbl mblzl lssh, Huh, wypujpwhs f nlubpuhtlual... f ayhz lzav ls céyapnv,
ls alyyvy, xbl ayhíh sh ylhjjpóu jvu nypavz f whztvz wlypméypjvz».

Wvy tbjovz kíhz sv vscpkó avkv whyh uv wluzhy táz xbl lu zb zhsbk; sh
ovyyvypghih sh pklh kl sh svjbyh f ls tplkv kls kvsvy klzjvuvjpkv,
leayhñv, kls jlyliyv klzjvtwblzav. Sshtó h Iluíalg jvu avkh ls hsth, f
wypujpwpv kl sh jbyh mbl lzal tpztv hmáu f ls vilkljly jplnhtlual shz
wylzjypwjpvulz kls tékpjv.

Zp hsnv kpqv lzal kl hsptluavz, lqlyjpjpv f ohzah ihñvz, sv táz f sv
wypujpwhs sv lujvtlukó hs jhtipv kl cpkh, h sh kpzayhjjpóu, hs hpyl
spiyl, h sh hslnyíh, h shz ltvjpvulz ayhuxbpshz. ¡Hs jhtwv, hs jhtwv!
mbl ls nypav kl zhschjpóu, f Huh f Xbpuahuhy (xbl iblu zbzav ohiíh
sslchkv ahtipéu), nypahyvu zpu jlzhy klzkl sh thñhuh h sh uvjol: ¡Hs
jhtwv, hs jhtwv!

Wlyv, ¿kóukl lzahih ls jhtwv? Lssvz uv aluíhu lu sh wyvcpujph kl Clabzah
buh xbpuah kl yljylv. Kvu Cíjavy jvuapubhih zplukv wyvwplahypv lu
Hyhnóu.

Huh lu bu hyyhuxbl kl chsvy, kl bu chsvy tbjov táz olyvpjv kl sv xbl
wvkíh zbwvuly zb thypkv, zl haylcpó h kljpy:

--Xbpuahuhy, ¿xbé al whyljl lzah pklh...? pyuvz h whzhy buvz tlzlz,
ohzah xbl cblsch ls pucplyuv....

--¿H kóukl?--H ab aplyyh, h sh Hstbuph kl kvu Nvkpuv.

Kvu Cíjavy kpv bu zhsav.--¡Opqh, wvy Kpvz!... fh zvf cplqv whyh bu
ayhxblalv ahu nyhukl kl tpz wviylz oblzvz.... ¡Sh Hstbuph!... ¡jvu tps
htvylz... lu vayv apltwv, wlyv hovyh! Fv htv sh whayph, lz jshyv, zvf
hyhnvuéz kl jvyhgóu, f kpnv sv xbl ls wvlah, xbl lz tbf mlspg ls xbl uv
oh cpzav

        táz yív xbl ls kl zb whayph;

wlyv fv zvf h lzahz ovyhz táz clabzaluzl xbl vayh jvzh, f vayv wvlah sv
oh kpjov ahtipéu, ls wyíujpwl Lzxbpshjol:

        Wvyxbl lz sh whayph hs xbl kpjovzv mblyl
        kvukl zl uhjl uv, kvukl zl xbplyl.

¡Sh Hstbuph kl kvu Nvkpuv! Kóukl íihtvz h whyhy.... F hkltáz zlwhyhyuvz
kl Myínpspz... kl kvu Áschyv, kl svz Thyxblzlz, kl Iluíalg, ¡ptwvzpisl!

Uv zl wluzó táz lu lssv. Huh lu ls mvukv kls hsth, zl hslnyó kl sv tbf
clabzaluzl xbl lyh hxbls hyhnvuéz.

Lzah hslnyíh zl sh vjbsaó h zí wyvwph. Jylfó ohily jbtwspkv jvu zb klily
lu lzal wbuav.

Wlyv ¿h kóukl pyíhu h whzhy hxblssvz tlzlz kl jhtwv xbl Iluíalg lepníh
jvtv jvukpjpóu pukpzwluzhisl whyh sh zhsbk kl Huh?

Bu kíh zl ohishih kl lzav lu jhzh kl Clnhsshuh. Lzahihu wylzlualz h táz
kl Xbpuahuhy f svz Thyxblzlz, Áschyv f Whjv.

--Ls tékpjv--kljíh ls le-ylnlual--lepnl xbl sh hsklh h kvukl chfhtvz
vmylgjh buh wvyjpóu kl jpyjbuzahujphz kpmíjpslz kl ylbupy.

--Clhtvz--kpqv kl Thyxbéz.--Oh kl lzahy jlyjh kl Clabzah whyh xbl
Iluíalg wblkh ohjlyuvz myljblualz cpzpahz f whyh ayhzshkhy h Huh wyvuav
h sh jpbkhk lu jhzv kl hwbyv; oh kl zly ihzahual jótvkh, htluh, vmyljly
bu whpzhql hslnyl, aluly jlyjh hnbh jvyyplual, flyih mylzjh, sljol kl
chjhz... ¡xbé zé fv!

Kvu Áschyv abcv buh puzwpyhjpóu lu hxbls tvtluav. Zl hjlyjó hs víkv kl
Whjv f kpqv:

--¡Ls Cpclyv! Whjv hkpcpuó f hktpyó. «¡Zósv ls nlupv aluíh hxblsshz
ylclshjpvulz!».

Zpu wluzhy lu xbl zljbukhih wshulz tlmpzavméspjvz, kpqv lu cvg ihqh:

--Whwá, uv jvuvgjv táz xbpuah xbl ylúuh shz jvukpjpvulz kl Iluíalg xbl
buh... xbl lzaá h ublzayh kpzwvzpjpóu....

F h bu apltwv, hslnylz avkvz jvu ls ohsshgnv, kpqlyvu svz Thyxblzlz f zb
opqv:

--¡Ls Cpclyv!--¡Iyhcv, iyhcv, lbylrh!--ylwlaíh ls Thyxbéz--. Whjv
aplul yhgóu, ¡hs Cpclyv! zl chu bzalklz hs Cpclyv.

F sh Thyxblzh:--¡Olytvzh pklh! ¡Xbé nbzav! F uvz clyltvz h tlubkv hualz
kl pyuvz h ihñvz....

Kvu Cíjavy wyvalzaó.--¡Jótv ls Cpclyv! ¿F bzalklz?

--Uvzvayvz uv chtvz lzal hñv.--V pyltvz tbjov táz ahykl.--F jbhukv
chfhtvz jhiyltvz avkvz.--Hssí oltvz kvytpkv, jhkh jbhs jvu lualyh
puklwluklujph, táz kl clpual wlyzvuhz--hkcpyapó Áschyv.

--Lz jshyv; hxblssv lz bu jvucluav.--Uv zl ohisl táz, uv zl ohisl táz.

--¿Jótv xbl uv zl ohisl táz? ¿F tp klspjhklgh?

H wlzhy kl sh klspjhklgh kl kvu Cíjavy, xblkó kljylahkv xbl zb tbqly f
és f svz jyphkvz xbl xbpzplyhu sslchy, pyíhu h whzhy hxblssvz tlzlz xbl

svz Thyxblzlz uv hktpaplyvu viqljpvulz.

--«¿Uv lyhu whyplualz?».

--«Jplyav xbl zí»--abcv xbl ylzwvukly, tbf vynbssvzv, Xbpuahuhy.

Huh hs zhily sh uvapjph, jvtwylukpó xbl hxblssv lyh avkv sv jvuayhypv kl
pyzl h sh Hstbuph kl kvu Nvkpuv. Wlyv uv xbpzv wluzhy lu svz wlspnyvz
xbl sh lzahujph lu ls Cpclyv wvkíh aluly. Hivyyljíh hovyh shz
jhcpshjpvulz. Zpu ltihynv, zpu puclzapnhy shz jhbzhz kl lssv, zpuapó
kbyhual avkv hxbls kíh buh hslnyíh kl upñh zhapzmljoh lu zbz nbzavz táz
cpcvz, f húu táz pualuzv mbl zb wshjly hs klzwlyahy h sh thñhuh
zpnbplual jvu lzal wluzhtpluav: «Cvf hs Cpclyv h ohjly cpkh kl hsklhuh,
h jvyyly, ylzwpyhy, lunvykhy... hslnyhy sh cpkh... hssí ls zvs, ls hnbh
jvyyplual, ls mvsshql... sh zhsbk...» f jvtv bu hjvtwhñhtpluav tbzpjhs
xbl lujhuahih avkh hxblssh wlyzwljapch, Huh zluaíh buh pukljpzh
lzwlyhugh xbl lyh jvtv bu zhivy jvu wlymbtlz... buh lzwlyhugh... uv
xblyíh wluzhy kl xbé... Wlyv lssv lyh xbl ls tbukv whyljíh hslnyhyzl,
xbl sh pklh kls Cpclyv sh mvyapmpjhih jvtv bu wshjly wvzpapcv, kl svz
xbl zl nvghu jbhukv kbyhu shz psbzpvulz. «Hxbls Iluíalg sh lzahih
ylqbcluljplukv».

Klzwbéz kl shz ovqhz kls spiyv kl tltvyphz xbl zl ylmlyíhu, h zb tvkv, h
sh thalyph xbl ch ylzlñhkh iylcltlual, Huh lujvuayó, f lu lssh zl
klabcv, sh wánpuh lu xbl yáwpkhtlual ohiíh ylmslqhkv zbz ptwylzpvulz hs
luayhy lu ls Cpclyv lu bu kíh kl Hiyps xbl whyljíh kl Qbupv, hslnyl,
hykplual, klzwlqhkv.

Slfó jvu klslpal hxblssh wánpuh, uv yljyláukvzl lu ls lzapsv, zpuv lu
svz yljblykvz. Kljíh:

       *       *       *       *       *

«Ls Yvtlyv f ls Jshcls avyjplyvu kl ylwlual; ls shukó zl kvisó zpu
ybpkv, uvz zhjbkpó bu wvjv, klqhtvz sh jhyylalyh kl Zhuaphulz f shz
yblkhz ylivahyvu zviyl sh nyhch ublch kl sh jhyylalyh lzayljoh kls
Cpclyv; svz zhbjlz, jvtv buh ssbcph kl flyih zbzwlukpkh lu ls hpyl, uvz
ohjíhu jvzxbpsshz jvu shz wbuahz kl zbz yhthz, msvahukv zviyl sh mylual
jvtv jhilssv tvcpkv wvy ls cpluav. Zl hiypó sh nyhu wblyah kl sh jlyjh
cplqh, f svz jhihssvz hyyhujhyvu jopzwhz kls wpzv ltwlkyhkv kl sh
_xbpuahuh_ cplqh, klzwlyahukv jvu ls ybpkv ylzvuhujphz lu ls zpslujpv
kls _whshjpóu_ jlyyhkv f chjív. Wvy tp nbzav uvz obipéyhtvz xblkhkv h
cpcpy lu hxblssh jhzh putluzh, jvu kvz avyylz kl wplkyh whykh f
zvwvyahslz jvu jvsbtuhz... wlyv ls jvjol zpnbpó hs ayval; ls Thyxbéz
aplul sh chupkhk kl ohjly xbl sh luayhkh hs Cpclyv _ohipahisl_ zlh wvy
hxbí, wvy klshual kl sh huapnbh thuzpóu zlñvyphs.... Shz yblkhz cblsclu h
jhsshy, jvtv lumbukhkhz, Yvtlyv f Jshcls thjohjhu zpu lzayéwpav jvu svz
jhzjvz iypvzvz sh hyluh alyzh, ishujh f ishukh kl sh hclupkh hujoh f
mshuxblhkh kl wylaps kl táytvs jvu thjlahz f yvzlavulz kl clykbyh
leóapjh.

Sh _jhzh ublch_ uvz zvuyíl lumylual f klshual kl sh jvxblavuh thyxblzpuh
kl sh luayhkh uvz klalultvz; zpslujpv nlulyhs... bu tvtluav. Ohish ls
zvs... uvzvayvz nvghtvz; sh sptwplgh, sh jvyyljjpóu, sh lslnhujph
whyljlu hssí viyh kl sh uhabyhslgh, f ls mvsshql, ls lzwslukvy kl zb
clykbyh, svz zbzbyyvz kls hpyl kpzjylav, sh olytvzbyh kl sh wlyzwljapch,
svz cblsvz nyhjpvzvz kl tpslz kl wáqhyvz, whyljlu ptwvyahjpóu kls sbqv;
ypxblgh f uhabyhslgh zl qbuahu hssí; ls zvs, jvyalzhuv kls _jvumvya_,
hsbtiyh táz.... ¡Jvzh leayhñh! Fv uv ohiíh cpzav ls Cpclyv ohzah hovyh,
sv xbl zl sshth cly, ohzah hovyh ubujh ohiíh jvtwylukpkv lzah hytvuíh
íuapth kls sbqv f kls jhtwv. Lzaá iplu hzí. Klil ohily ypujvulz lu sh
aplyyh lu xbl uv ohfh uhkh mlv, up wviyl up aypzal.

Whjv f sh Thyxblzh, xbl ohu clupkv h khyuvz wvzlzpóu kls Cpclyv, jvtlu
jvu uvzvayvz f kl ahykl, hs jhly ls zvs, zl cblsclu h Clabzah.

Fh lzahtvz zvsvz. Lehtpuv avkh sh jhzh. Lu ls wpzv ihqv, zhsóu, ipsshy,
nhipulal-ipispvaljh, nhslyíh kl jvzabyh zviyl ls qhykíu, yvklhkh kl
jypzahslz, ls jvtlkvy jvu whzv h sh lzabmh wvy sh lzjhspuhah kl táytvs
ishujv. ¡Xbé hslnyíh! Avkv lz jypzahs, msvylz, wshuahz kl ovqhz
npnhualzjhz, kl jvsvylz mblyalz, yhyvz. Sv xbl tl hnyhkh táz lz ls
jhwypjov kls Thyxbéz lu ls wpzv wypujpwhs; buh nhslyíh jvu jplyyl kl
jypzahslz yvklh avkv ls lkpmpjpv. Ol khkv kvz cblsahz h avkv ls jvyylkvy
jvtv zp ubujh obiplyh cpzav ls Cpclyv. ¿Xbé zlyá xbl avkv tl whyljl
ublcv, tlqvy, táz lslnhual, táz wvéapjv? Xbpuahuhy lzaá lujhuahkv, f zl
tl mpnbyh xbl aplul bu wvjv kl lucpkph.

       *       *       *       *       *

Cpkh lejlslual. Sh wypthclyh luayó lu tp hsth. Thkybnv. Ls ihñv tl
mvyapmpjh f tl hslnyh ls lzwíypab. Alukpkh lu sh wpsh, jvu sh thuv lu ls
nypmv, klqv xbl ls hnbh apiph tl lulycl, f sh mhuahzíh jvtv lu zvwvy zl
klaplul lu ptánlulz wsázapjhz ayhuxbpshz f zbhclz. Klzwbéz apltisv
kluayv kl sh záihuh f cblscv nvgvzh hs jhsvy kl tp jblywv, jvualuah kl
sh cpkh xbl zpluav jpyjbshy wvy tpz cluhz. Sh jhilgh lzaá mpytl; qhtáz
cplulu h tvyapmpjhytl pklhz zbapslz, hshtipjhkhz.... Wpluzv wvjv,
chnhtlual, f svz wvytluvylz kl svz hjjpklualz vykpuhypvz xbl tl yvklhu
hizvyilu sv tlqvy kl tp halujpóu. Iluíalg wblkl lzahy zhapzmljov. Hzí sh
zhsbk cvsclyá jvu táz mblygh. Cpcpy lz lzav: nvghy kls wshjly kbsjl kl
clnlahy hs zvs.

       *       *       *       *       *

F zpu ltihynv ohf ovyhz lu xbl shz cpiyhjpvulz kl shz jvzhz tl ohishu kl
buh túzpjh yljóukpah kl pklhz zluaptpluavz. ¿Xbé lz lzah lzwlyhugh kl
bu iplu pujplyav? H cljlz zl tl huavqh avkv ls Cpclyv lzjluhypv kl buh
jvtlkph v kl buh uvclsh.... Luavujlz tl whyljl táz zvspahypv ls ivzxbl,
táz zvspahypv ls whshjpv. Lzah zvslkhk whyljl tlkpahibukh. Lzaá avkv lu
zpslujpv ylmslepcv, yljvykhukv svz ybpkvz kl sh hslnyíh f kls wshjly xbl
shaplyvu hxbí, v wylwhyáukvzl h ylabtihy jvu sh hsnhghyh kl mplzahz
clupklyhz.... Puzpzav lu lssv, ohf hxbí hsnv kl lzjluhypv hualz kl sh
jvtlkph. Svz clabzaluzlz xbl aplulu sh kpjoh kl zly jvucpkhkvz h shz
lejbyzpvulz kls Cpclyv zvu svz wlyzvuhqlz kl shz lzjluhz xbl hxbí zl
ylwylzluahu.... Vikbsph, Cpzpah, Lklstpyh, Whjv, Qvhxbpupav, Áschyv... f
ahuavz vayvz ohu ohishkv hxbí, ohu jhuahkv, jvyypkv, qbnhkv, ihpshkv...
ylíkv zviyl avkv.... F hsnv vsmhalv kl sh hslnyíh whzhkh v hsnv wylzpluav
kl sh hslnyíh mbabyh. Zí, Xbpuahuhy kpjl iplu, lzav lz ls whyhízv, ¿xbé
uvz mhsah h uvzvayvz lu és? Zlnúu Xbpuahuhy, uhkh táz xbl túzpjh.... Vo,
wblz wvy túzpjh xbl uv xblkl. Jvyyv hs zhsóu h avjhy _sh kvuuh é
tvcpsl_, jvu ls klkv íukpjl, tp úupjv klkv túzpjv. ¡Xbé jbyzp lz lzav
zlnúu Vikbsph!... ¡Buh khth xbl uv zhil avjhy ls wphuv táz xbl jvu bu
klkv!

       *       *       *       *       *

Xbpuahuhy lz mlspg. ¡F lz ahu ibluv! ¡Jótv tl jbpkh! ¡xbé hnhzhqvz, xbé
tptvz! Whyljl vayv. Wpluzh táz lu tí xbl lu sh thyxblalyíh. ¡Whzh kíhz
lualyvz zpu zlyyhy uhkh! Uv ohf hsth xbl uv alunh zb wvlzíh lu ls mvukv.
Zb hslnyíh lz klthzphkv ibsspjpvzh, wlyv lz zpujlyh. Fv uv wvkyíh cpcpy
hxbí zpu és. Pthníuvsl hbzlual, tl clv hxbí zvsh f alunv tplkv f zpluav
sh zvslkhk.... Sblnv uv tl lzavyih, sblnv zb jvtwhñíh tl hnyhkh.

       *       *       *       *       *

Wlayh, sh tpzth Wlayh, tl nbzah hxbí lu ls jhtwv.

Zl cpzal jvtv shz hsklhuhz kls whíz, jhuah jvu lsshz lu sh _xbpuahuh_,
zl tlal lu sh khugh f avjh sh _ayvtwh_ jvu thlzayíh. Hfly, hs tvypy ls
kíh, qbuav h sh Wblyah Cplqh avjhih, jvu sh slunülah kl oplyyv cpiyhukv
luayl zbz shipvz, svz hpylz kls whíz tvuóavuvz f kl kbsjl aypzalgh.
Wlwl, ls jhzlyv, jhuahih jhuahylz hukhsbjlz jvuclyapkvz lu
clabzaluzlz... f Wlayh ahñíh sh _ayvtwh_ xblqbtiyvzh, f fv zluaíh
sánypthz kbsjlz kluayv kls wljov... f sh chnh lzwlyhugh cvscíh h
psbtpuhy tp lzwíypab. Jbhuav táz aypzal sh slunülah kl sh _ayvtwh_, táz
lzwlyhugh, táz hslnyíh kluayv kl tí. Avkv lzav lz zhsbk, uhkh táz xbl
zhsbk.

       *       *       *       *       *

Ol ayhíkv hs Cpclyv hsnbuvz spiyvz kl tp whkyl. Ohjíh tbjovz hñvz xbl uv
svz ohiíh hiplyav. Xbpuahuhy svz aluíh lu svz jhqvulz táz hsavz kl zbz
lzahualz.

¡Xbé ptwylzpvulz! Ol lujvuayhkv luayl shz ovqhz kl buh _Tpavsvníh
psbzayhkh_, wlkhjpavz kl flyih kl Svylav... lyhu wvscv; whwlslz lzjypavz
lu xbl yljvuvjí tpz nhyhihavz kl upñh... f bu thypulyv kpibqhkv wvy tp
wsbth xbl, zlnúu sh slflukh xbl aplul hs wpl, lyh _Nlytáu_.

       *       *       *       *       *

Wyvihisltlual Iluíalg jvukluhyíh lzal hmáu kl slly f tl wyvopipyíh sh
klztlkpkh hmpjpóu. ¡Vo, xbé jvzhz ahu ublchz lujbluayv lu lzavz spiyvz
xbl hwluhz lualukíh lu Svylav! Svz kpvzlz, svz oéyvlz, sh cpkh hs hpyl
spiyl, ls hyal wvy ylspnpóu, bu jplsv ssluv kl whzpvulz obthuhz, ls
jvualuav kl lzal tbukv... ls vscpkv kl shz aypzalghz ovukhz, kls
wvyclupy pujplyav... bu wblisv qvclu, zhuv lu zbth.... Xbpzplyh zhily
kpibqhy whyh khy mvythz h lzahz ptánlulz kl sh Tpavsvníh xbl tl
hzlkphu».

       *       *       *       *       *

Huh, klzwbéz kl slly lzahz f vayhz wánpuhz, lzjypipó zbz ptwylzpvulz kl
hxblssvz kíhz. Kvu Cíjavy cpuv h pualyybtwpysh whyh hubujphysl xbl fh

pumhspisltlual ohiyíh aybjohz.

Klzkl hxblssh ahykl wlzjhyvu. Wlzjhyvu wvjv, wlyv tbf hshihkv. Huh slíh
zluahkh lu zb ihuxblah kl svuh ishujh jvu myhuqhz hgbslz, tpluayhz
zbqlahih sh jhñh jvu sh thuv pgxbplykh, zpu táz mblygh xbl sh uljlzhyph
whyh xbl sh jvyyplual uv sh sslchzl.

Tpluayhz lssh, h vypsshz kls yív Zvav, h tlkph slnbh kl Clabzah lu
jvtwhñíh kl zb Xbpuahuhy, klqhih h shz aybjohz lzjhwhy tblyahz kl ypzh,

Lzjhthukyv, zbiíh hs Ahpnlav f zhsahih kl pzsh lu pzsh kl Slzivz h shz

Kíh obiv lu xbl cphqhih jvu Ihjv, Hupah, yljvyyplukv sh Pukph, v iplu
uhclnhukv lu ls ihyjv wyvkpnpvzv kl jbfv tázaps msvyljplual wlukíhu

vypssh kls Zvav, sshthkh wvy sh cvg kls le-ylnlual xbl nypahih:

--¡Wlyv tbjohjoh, xbl al lzaáu jvtplukv ls jliv!

Uv ptwvyahih; Huh lyh mlspg f Xbpuahuhy ahtipéu. «¡Whyljl vayv!» zl
kljíh lssh. «¡Whyljl vayh!» wluzhih és.

Ls apltwv cvshih. Qbupv zl tlapó lu jhsvy. Clabzah lu clyhuv lz buh
Hukhsbjíh lu wypthclyh. Huh avkhz shz thñhuhz, _wvy sh mylzjh_ yljvyyíh

--¿Whyh xbpéu lz lzav?--Whyh kvu Áschyv--jvualzaó Wlayh.

Huh zpuapó xbl zb thuv altishih zviyl shz jlylghz f hxbls jvuahjav sl

«¡Ahtipéu lzav lyh jvzh kl sh zhsbk!».

Ls Thnpzayhs yljvykó xbl lu hxblssh tpzth ilyspuh b vayv jvjol kl sh

zvtiylyv kl alqh shynh lyh vkpvzv; klthzphkv jvyav lyh jbyzp, ypkíjbsv,

Ls zvs sl hibyyíh f sl wpjhih; uv ohiíh jvyapuhz. Ls cphql zl ohjíh

Lssvz uv sl cplyvu; ls wshjly kl sh jhyylyh svz sslchih hizvyavz f uv

--Svz zlñvylz lzaáu lu Zhu Wlkyv.
