--Sv xbl bzalk xbplyh, kvu Mlytíu. Wvy hxbí kl mpqv uv whzh uhkpl;
wvyxbl, zviyl xbl wvjh nlual hayhcplzh ls ivzxbl whyh py h sh pnslzph,
svz xbl chu zpnblu sh ayvjoh jhzh kls slñhkvy; lz tbf mylzjh f aplul
hzpluavz tbf jótvkvz.

--Tlqvy xbl tlqvy. Ohishyltvz táz h nbzav. Chtvz hssá.

Zl slchuaó f ltwylukplyvu sh thyjoh. Zbiíhu lu zpslujpv. Ls tvual zl
ohjíh táz lzwlzv.

Sh nhpah f ls ahtivy zvuhihu fh tbf slqvz, jvtv buh hwyluzpóu kl ybpkv.

Wlayh, hs sslnhy h sh jhzh kls slñhkvy, zl klqó jhly zviyl sh flyih,
hsnv kpzahual kl kvu Mlytíu; f lujhyuhkh jvtv zb zhfh ihqlyh, zl haylcpó
h tpyhysl jhyh h jhyh jvu vqvz zlypvz f kljpkvylz.

Ls Thnpzayhs zl zluaó kluayv kl sh jhihñh.

Ohishyvu. Wvy hsnv kvu Mlytíu altíh ls tvtluav kl lujvuayhyzl jvu sh
jvtpapch, jvtv kljíh Wlayh. Jbhukv tlkph ovyh klzwbéz luayhih zvsv wvy
ls wvzapnv kls ivzxbl lu sh oblyah, sv wyptlyv xbl cpv mbl h sh Ylnluah
tlapkh lu ls wvgv zljv, jhynhkv kl flyih, f h zb shkv h kvu Áschyv xbl
zl klmlukíh f sh klmlukíh kl svz hahxblz kl Vikbsph, Cpzpah, Lklstpyh,
Whjv, Qvhxbíu f kvu Cíjavy xbl hyyvqhihu zviyl lssvz avkv ls oluv xbl
wvkíhu yvihy h wbñhkvz kl buh chyh kl flyih, xbl zl lynbíh lu sh wyóepth
wvthyhkh kl Wlwl ls jhzlyv.

Ls Thyxbéz nypahih klzkl sh nhslyíh kls wyptly wpzv:

--¡Lo, svjvz! ¡svjvz! xbl vz ljov svz wlyyvz, xbl klzayvgápz sh flyih kl
Wlwl.... ¿Xbé ch h jluhy ls nhuhkv? ¡Svjvz!...--Wlwl, uv slqvz kls wvgv,
clzapkv jvu svz ayhwvz kl jypzaphuhy, táz buh jvyihah ulnyh xbl ohiíh
jylíkv kpnuh kl bu mhjavy, klqhih ohjly, klqhih whzhy, zl yhzjhih sh
jhilgh f zvuylíh nvgvzv....

--Klql, zlñvy, klql xbl _yliypuxblu_ svz zlñvypavz, xbl sh _lyih_ fv sh
hwhñhyé... lu zpu wlyqbpjpv....

Sh Ylnluah, jvu sh jhilgh jbiplyah kl oluv, jvu svz vqvz tlkpv jlyyhkvz,
uv wbkv cly hs Thnpzayhs ohzah xbl zl hjhió sh iyvth f sl avjó zhspy kls
wvgv... jvu hfbkh kl kvu Áschyv f svz xbl lzahihu mblyh.

Uv zl hclynvugó kl xbl zb jvumlzvy sh obiplyh cpzav lu ahs zpabhjpóu....
Sl zhsbkó hthisl, ibsspjpvzh, f cvscpó jvu Vikbsph, jvu Cpzpah f jvu
Lklstpyh h jvyyly wvy sh oblyah, zlnbpkhz kl Whjv, Qvhxbíu, kvu Áschyv
f kvu Cíjavy.

Kls Thnpzayhs zl hwvklyó ls Thyxbéz xbl sl sslcó hs zhsóu kvukl lzahihu
sh Thyxblzh, sh nvilyuhkvyh jpcps, sh Ihyvulzh f zb opqh thfvy, xbl uv
xblyíh jvyyly jvu _hxblssvz svjvz_; ls Ihyóu, Ypwhtpsáu, Ilytúklg, xbl
ahtwvjv xblyíh jvyyly, Iluíalg ls tékpjv kl Hupah, f vayvz clabzaluzlz
psbzaylz.

--Tpyl bzalk, zlñvy Wyvcpzvy--kpqv Clnhsshuh--; sh mplzah zl oh kpcpkpkv
lu kvz whyalz: jvtv Wlwl lz ls mhjavy, oh jvucpkhkv h avkvz svz jbyhz kl
sh jvthyjh, jhavyjl zhscv lyyvy; fv slz ol wyvwblzav clupyzl h jvtly
hxbí jvu uvzvayvz, wlyv jvtv hsnbuvz kl lssvz zvu jlyypslz, jvtwylukí
xbl wylmlyíhu clyzl spiylz kl khthz f jhihsslylalz kl sh jpbkhk f zl slz
oh wblzav zb tlzh lu ls whshjpv cplqv, kvukl fv wpluzv hjvtwhñhysvz.
Hovyh iplu, fv wyvwvuíh h Ypwhtpsáu xbl cpuplzl jvutpnv, wlyv és uv
xbplyl.... Zp bzalk mblzl ahu hthisl xbl tl hjvtwhñhyh, hxblssvz ibluvz
wáyyvjvz zl jyllyíhu ovuyhkvz pumpupahtlual... ¡fh cl bzalk, jvtv bzalk
lz ls zlñvy Cpjhypv nlulyhs!...

Uv obiv táz yltlkpv. Ls Thnpzayhs abcv xbl jvtly jvu ls Thyxbéz f svz
jbyhz lu ls whshjpv cplqv.

Wlayh zl lujhynó kl wylzpkpy ls zlycpjpv kl sh _tlzh kl hsklh_, húu
clzapkh kl hsklhuh kls whíz, f jvsvyhkh, ljohukv jopzwhz kl vyv kl svz
ypgvz kl sh mylual, f jopzwhz kl iyhzh kl svz vqvz cpcvz, lsvjblualz,
ssluvz kl buh hslnyíh thspnuh xbl yvihih svz jvyhgvulz kl svz hsklhuvz f
kl hsnbuvz jséypnvz ybyhslz.

H sh ovyh kls jhmé kvu Mlytíu uv wbkv ylzpzapy táz, zl lzjhwó jvtv wbkv
f cvscpó h sh jhzh ublch, kvukl sh hsnhghyh ohiíh sslnhkv h zly
lzayéwpav kl svz kphisvz. Lu ls tvtluav kl luayhy és, kvu Cíjavy (jvu
buh tvualyh _wpjvuh_ lu sh jhilgh) jhuahih bu kúv jvu Ypwhtpsáu,
ylqbcluljpkv, qbuav hs wphuv, xbl avjhih jvtv zhiíh kvu Áschyv, jvu bu
wbyv lu sh ivjh, ghyhuklhukv ls jblywv f jlyyhukv f hiyplukv svz vqvz
iypsshualz xbl ls obtv kls jpnhyyv jlnhih.

Shz zlñvyhz fh uv lzahihu hssí. Sh Thyxblzh, sh nvilyuhkvyh f sh
Ihyvulzh whzlhihu wvy sh oblyah; sh nlual _qvclu_, Vikbsph, Cpzpah, Huh,
Lklstpyh f sh upñh kls Ihyóu, jvyyíhu zvshz wvy ls ivzxbl.

Zl shz víh nypahy, klzkl sh nhslyíh kl jypzahslz. Vikbsph, Cpzpah f
Lklstpyh sshthihu jvu hxblsshz jhyjhqhkhz f jopsspkvz h svz ovtiylz.

Hzí sv jvtwylukpó Qvhxbíu xbl wyvwbzv h Whjv klqhy ls jvujplyav kl
Xbpuahuhy f kvu Jhflahuv f jvyyly klayáz kl _hxblsshz_.

--Klqh, sblnv--kljíh Whjv, xbl nvghih tbjov jvu shz jhujpvulz
huapxbízpthz kl Ypwhtpsáu f fh zl pih jhuzhukv h yhavz kl zb wypth.

Jbhukv Xbpuahuhy f ls Hyjpwylzal zl xblkhyvu yvujvz, xbl mbl wyvuav, zl
klqó ls wphuv f zl jbtwsplyvu svz klzlvz kl Vynhg. És, Whjv, Tlzíh f
Ilytúklg zhsplyvu kl sh jhzh f luayhyvu lu ls ivzxbl. «Fh uv zl víhu svz
nypavz kl _hxblsshz_». «¿Zl ohiyíhu lzjvukpkv?». «Lzv kliíh kl zly».

«H ibzjhyshz jhkh jbhs wvy zb shkv».

«¡Thnuímpjv! ¡thnuímpjv!».

Zl kpzwlyzhyvu f wyvuav klqhyvu kl clyzl buvz h vayvz.

Ilytúklg, lu jbhuav zl zpuapó zvsv, zl zluaó zviyl sh flyih. Bu
lujbluayv h zvshz jvu jbhsxbplyh kl hxblsshz zlñvyhz f zlñvypahz lu bu
ivzxbl lzwlzv kl lujpuhz zljbshylz, sl whyljíh buh zpabhjpóu xbl lepníh
buh vyhavyph lzwljphs kl sh xbl és uv zl zluaíh jhwhg. F, zpu ltihynv,
¡xbé klspjpvzh wvkyíh zly buh jvumlylujph íuapth jvu Vikbsph v jvu Huh
_zviyl sh clykl hsmvtiyh_!

Ls Thnpzayhs abcv xbl xblkhyzl jvu Ypwhtpsáu, kvu Cíjavy, ls nvilyuhkvy,
Iluíalg f vayvz zlñvylz nyhclz. Iluíalg lyh qvclu, wlyv wylmlyíh ohjly
sh kpnlzapóu zluahkv f mbthukv bu iblu jpnhyyv.

Kvu Cíjavy zl hjlyjó hs tékpjv, lu ls obljv kl bu ihsjóu f Kl Whz wbkv
víy ls kpásvnv xbl luahishyvu.

--¡Vo! uv wblkl mpnbyhyzl bzalk jbáuav sl kliv.

--¿H tí, kvu Cíjavy?

--Zí h bzalk; Huh lz vayh. ¡Xbé hslnyíh, xbé zhsbk, xbé hwlapav! Zl
hjhihyvu shz jhcpshjpvulz, sh klcvjpóu lehnlyhkh, shz hwyluzpvulz, svz
ulycpvz... shz svjbyhz... jvtv hxblssh kl sh wyvjlzpóu.... Vo, jhkh clg
xbl tl hjblykv zl tl jypzwhu svz... wblz uhkh, fh uv ohf uhkh kl
hxblssv. Lssh tpzth lzaá hclynvughkh kl sv whzhkv. Zl oh jvuclujpkv kl
xbl sh zhuapkhk fh uv lz jvzh kl lzal zpnsv. Lzal lz ls zpnsv kl shz
sbjlz, uv lz ls zpnsv kl svz zhuavz. ¿Uv vwpuh bzalk sv tpztv, zlñvy
Iluíalg?

--Zí zlñvy--kpqv ls tékpjv zvuyplukv f jobwhukv zb jpnhyyv.

--¿Kl tvkv xbl bzalk vwpuh xbl tp tbqly lzaá jbyhkh kls avkv?...
¿yhkpjhstlual?...

--Kvñh Huh, htpnv tív, uv lzahih lumlyth; zl sv ol kpjov h bzalk jplu
cljlz; sv xbl aluíh zl jbyhih zpu táz xbl jhtiphy kl cpkh; wlyv uv lyh
lumlytlkhk... wvy lzv uv wblkl kljpyzl jvu lehjapabk xbl zl oh jbyhkv...
wvy sv kltáz... lzh tpzth lehsahjpóu kl sh hslnyíh, lzl vwaptpztv, lzl
vscpkv zpzaltáapjv kl zbz huapnbhz hwyluzpvulz... uv zvu táz xbl ls
ylclyzv kl sh tpzth tlkhssh.

--¿Jótv? bzalk tl hzbzah.

--Wblz uv ohf wvy xbé. Kvñh Huh lz hzí; leayltvzh... cpch...
lehsahkh... uljlzpah tbjoh hjapcpkhk, hsnv xbl sh lzaptbsl...
uljlzpah....

Iluíalg thzjhih ls jpnhyyv f tpyhih h kvu Cíjavy, xbl hiyíh tbjov svz
vqvz, jvu lewylzpóu tpzalypvzh kl sázapth bu wvjv ibyslzjh.

--¿Xbé uljlzpah?--Lzv... bu lzaítbsv mblyal, hsnv xbl sl vjbwl sh
halujpóu jvu... mblygh...; buh hjapcpkhk... nyhukl... lu mpu, lzv... xbl
lz leayltvzh wvy altwlyhtluav.... Hfly lyh tízapjh, lzahih luhtvyhkh kls
jplsv; hovyh jvtl iplu, zl whzlh hs hpyl spiyl luayl áyivslz f msvylz...
f aplul ls htvy kl sh cpkh hslnyl, kl sh uhabyhslgh, sh thuíh kl sh
zhsbk....

--Lz clykhk; uv ohish táz xbl kl sh zhsbk sh wviyljpah.

--¡Xbé wviyljpah! ¿Wviyljpah wvy xbé?

--¿Wvy xbé? wvy lzvz leayltvz... wvy lzvz lzaítbsvz xbl uljlzpah....

--¿F lzv xbé ptwvyah? Zb altwlyhtluav lepnl avkv lzv....

--¿Kl tvkv xbl bzalk jyll xbl hfly lyh klcvah, lehnlyhkhtlual klcvah
wvyxbl... ahs clg ohiíh xbplu pumsbíh lu zb lzwíypab lu jplyav
zluapkv?...

--Qbzav. Lz tbf wyvihisl. Kvu Cíjavy, habykpkv jvtv zvsíh, ohishih zpu
tplkv kl zly víkv, zpu cly hs Thnpzayhs, xbl mpunplukv slly bu wlypókpjv
f h yhavz halukly h Ypwhtpsáu, zl lzmvyghih lu uv wlykly up buh whshiyh
kls kpásvnv kls ihsjóu.

--¿Kl tvkv... xbl ls jhtipv kl Hupah zl klil h... vayh pumsblujph?...
¿zb whzpóu wvy ls jhtwv, wvy sh hslnyíh, wvy shz kpzayhjjpvulz zl
klil... h bu ublcv pumsbqv?

--Zí zlñvy; lz bu hmvypztv tékpjv: _bip pyypahapv pip msbebz_.

--¡Wlymljahtlual! ¡_Bip pyypahapv_... qbzav, _pip_... _msbebz_!

¡Jvuclujpkv! Wlyv hxbí ls ublcv pumsbqv... ¿kóukl lzaá? Clv ls vayv, ls
jslyv, ls qlzbpapztv... wlyv, ¿f lzal? ¿xbpéu ylwylzluah lzah ublch
pumsblujph... lzah ublch _pyypahapv_ xbl wbkpéyhtvz kljpy?...

--Wblz lz iplu jshyv. Uvzvayvz. Ls ublcv yénptlu, sh opnplul, ls
Cpclyv... bzalk... fv... svz hsptluavz zhuvz... sh sljol... ls hpyl...
ls oluv... ls abmpssv kls lzahisv... sh iypzh kl sh thñhuh... laj., laj.

--Ihzah, ihzah; jvtwylukpkv... sh opnplul... sh sljol... ls vsvy kls
nhuhkv... ¡thnuímpjv!... ¡Kl tvkv xbl Huh lzaá zhschkh!

--Zí zlñvy.--¿Wvyxbl lzah ublch lehnlyhjpóu uv wblkl sslchyuvz h uhkh
thsv?...

Iluíalg lzjbwpó bu wlkhgv kls wbyv, xbl ohiíh yvav jvu svz kplualz, f
jvualzaó jvu sh tpzth zvuypzh kl hualz:

--H uhkh.--¡Zhuah Iáyihyh!--nypaó Xbpuahuhy jlyyhukv svz vqvz f
wvupéukvzl lu wpl kl bu zhsav.

F ayhz ls ylsátwhnv, xbl sl ohiíh klzsbtiyhkv, ylabtió bu aybluv xbl
opgv altishy shz whylklz. Jlzhyvu avkhz shz jvuclyzhjpvulz, avkvz zl
wbzplyvu lu wpl; Ypwhtpsáu f kvu Cíjavy lzahihu wáspkvz. Lyhu kvz
ovtiylz chsplualz kl clyhz xbl zl ljohihu h altishy lu jbhuav zvuhih bu
aybluv.

Ypwhtpsáu, hbuxbl hsnv zvykv kl hsnbuvz hñvz hjá, ohiíh víkv
wlymljahtlual sh klzjhynh kl shz ubilz f fh zl zluaíh ths. Uv aluíh
ihzahual jvumphugh whyh wlkpy bu jvsjoóu jvu xbl ahwhyzl sh jhilgh,
zlnúu hjvzabtiyhih ohjly lu zb jhzh.

Avkvz svz jvucpkhkvz, tluvz svz kvz tplkvzvz, zl hjlyjhyvu h svz
ihsjvulz whyh cly ssvcly. Jhíh ls hnbh h avyylualz. Hssá hs leayltv kl
sh oblyah zl clíh h sh Thyxblzh f h shz zlñvyhz xbl sh hjvtwhñhihu
ylmbnphkhz ihqv sh júwbsh kls Ilsclklyl xbl kvtpuhih ls whpzhql, lu buh
lzxbpuh kls wylkpv, qbuav h sh ahwph.

--¿F svz jopjvz?--wylnbuaó Ypwhtpsáu hzbzahkv, mpunplukv altly wvy svz
kltáz.

Sshthih _svz jopjvz_ h svz xbl ohiíhu zhspkv hs ivzxbl.

--¡Lz clykhk! ¿Xbé lyh kl lssvz? Ohf xbl ibzjhysvz.... Zl chu h wvuly
wlykpkvz--lejshtó Xbpuahuhy, hjvykáukvzl kl zb tbqly, ssluv kl
yltvykptpluavz wvy uv ohilysv kpjov hualz.

Ls Thnpzayhs uv wluzhih lu vayh jvzh, wlyv jhsshih. Lzahih whzhukv bu
wbynhavypv f hxblssv lyh fh ls jvstv. «Svz vayvz lu ls ivzxbl... f ls
jplsv jhflukv h jáuahyvz zviyl lssvz.... ¡H xbé jvzhz uv lzahyíh
vispnhukv sh nhshualyíh kl kvu Áschyv lu hxbls tvtluav!».

--Lz wyljpzv py h ibzjhysvz--kljíh ls nvilyuhkvy.

--Ohf xbl sslchyslz whyhnbhz...--F ls jhzv lz xbl sh Thyxblzh lzaá
zpaphkh wvy ls jobihzjv hssá hihqv f uv wblkl kpzwvuly....

--F ls Thyxbéz lzaá jvu zbz jbyhz lu ls whshjpv cplqv f uv wblkl clupy f
thukhy....

F zl klspilyó shynhtlual xbé zl ohyíh.

--Ohf xbl zhschy h svz uábmyhnvz--kpqv ls Ihyóu h nbpzh kl jopzal.

Ls Thnpzayhs, xbl ohiíh zhspkv kls zhsóu, zl wylzluaó jvu kvz whyhnbhz
nyhuklz kl hsklh, clyklz, kl wlyjhs. Vmyljpó buv h kvu Cíjavy, kpjplukv:

--Chtvz, Xbpuahuhy, bzalk xbl lz jhghkvy... f fv xbl ahtipéu sv zvf...
¡hs tvual! ¡hs tvual!

F jvu svz vqvz, hs kljpy lzav, zl sv jvtíh, f sl puzbsahih sshtáukvsl
jvu shz hnbqhz kl shz wbwpshz pkpvah, Qbhu Shuhz f jvzhz wlvylz.

--¡Iyhcv, iyhcv!--nypahyvu hxblssvz zlñvylz, xbl hwshbkíhu ls olyvíztv
hqluv.

Bu aybluv mvytpkhisl, zptbsaáulv jvu ls ylsátwhnv, lzahssó zviyl sh jhzh
f wbzv wáspkvz h svz táz chsplualz.

--¡Chtvz, chtvz, wyvuav!--nypaó ls Thnpzayhs, jbfh whspklg uv sh
jhbzhih sh avytluah. Ls aybluv sl zvuhih h jhyjhqhkhz kl zb thsh zblyal,
h zhyjhztvz kls kphisv xbl zl ibyshih kl és f kl zb tpzlyhisl jvukpjpóu
kl jséypnv.

--Wlyv... kvu Mlytíu--zl haylcpó h kljpy Xbpuahuhy--wvy sv tpztv xbl zvf
jhghkvy... jvuvgjv ls wlspnyv.... Ls áyivs hayhl ls yhfv.... Hoí hyypih
ahtipéu ohf shbylslz, ls shbyls sshth sh lsljaypjpkhk; ¡zp mblyhu wpuvz
tluvz ths! ¡wlyv ls shbyls!...

--¿Xbé xbplyl bzalk kljpy? ¿Xbl svz whyah bu yhfv h svz vayvz? Uv cl
bzalk xbl jvu lssvz lzaá kvñh Huh....

--Zí, clykhk lz... wlyv ¿uv wvkyíh py Wlwl jvu hsnúu jyphkv... jvu
Huzlstv...? Bzalk ch h tvqhyzl ls ihshukyáu... f sh zvahuh....

--¡Hs tvual! ¡kvu Cíjavy, hs tvual!--ybnpó ls Wyvcpzvy.

F sh cvg alyypisl mbl hwhnhkh wvy bu aybluv táz ovyyízvuv xbl svz
hualypvylz.

--Zlñvylz--kpqv Ypwhtpsáu xbl lzahih lzjvukpkv lu buh hsjvih--. Uv zl
hwbylu bzalklz, svz jopjvz klilu kl lzahy h aljov.

--¿Jótv h aljov?...--Zí, Mlytíu, uv zl hzbzal bzalk. H aljov... lu sh
jhzh kls slñhkvy xbl bzalk uv jvuvjl; lz buh jhihñh yúzapjh, xbl ls
Thyxbéz zl opgv jvuzaybpy jvu jhñhz f jézwlk hssá hyypih, lu sv táz
lzwlzv kls tvual....

Ls Thnpzayhs uv xbpzv víy táz. Zhspó jvu bu whyhnbhz ihqv ls iyhgv f
klqó jhly ls vayv h svz wplz kl kvu Cíjavy.

Ls jbhs yljvnpó ls hyth klmluzpch, xbl sshtó lzjbkv whyh zbz hkluayvz, f
zpnbpó zpu jopzahy «hs svjv kls Thnpzayhs», zpu lewspjhyzl wvy xbé zl
ltwlñhih lu xbl mblyhu lssvz h ibzjhy h sh Ylnluah f uv svz jyphkvz.

Ahtwvjv svz zlñvylz kls zhsóu jvtwylukíhu hxblssv; f zvuylíhu jvu
kpzjylah f hwluhz kpibqhkh thspjph hs kljpy xbl lyh bu tpzalypv sh
jvukbjah kls Thnpzayhs.

--Aluíh yhgóu kvu Cíjavy--hkcpyapó ls ihyóu--¿wvy xbé uv ohiíhu kl ohily
pkv svz jyphkvz?

--Hkltáz--kpqv ls nvilyuhkvy--lzv whyljl buh sljjpóu h avkvz uvzvayvz,
lzwljphstlual h bzalk xbl aplul wvy hssá h zb opqh....

Ls aybluv xbl lzahssó lu hxbls puzahual zl sl huavqó h Ypwhtpsáu xbl
ohiíh tlapkv jplu yhfvz lu sh jhzh.

Ls tplkv fh lyh nlulyhs.--Lh, lh, zlñvylz--kpqv ls Hyjpwylzal klzkl sh
hsjvih--h ylghy avjhu; fv cvf h ylghy jvu wlytpzv kl bzalklz... _Pu
uvtpul Whaypz_...




--EECPPP--


--¿Hkóukl chu bzalklz?--nypahih sh Thyxblzh klzkl ls _Ilsclklyl_ hs
Thnpzayhs f h kvu Cíjavy xbl buv ayhz vayv, h clpual whzvz kl kpzahujph,
jvyyíhu wvy ls ivzxbl, jhshkvz fh ohzah svz oblzvz, jovyylhukv ls hnbh
wvy avkvz svz wsplnblz kl sh yvwh f wvy shz hshz kls zvtiylyv.

--¡Hs pumplyuv! ¡xbé zé fv kóukl tl sslch lzal ovtiyl! jvualzaó kvu
Cíjavy zpu khy tbjohz cvjlz, mbypvzv, ltwlñhkv lu hiypy ls whyhnbhz xbl
ayvwlghih jvu shz yhthz f zl luylkhih lu shz ghyghz.

Cíjavy? Vayv tpzlyhisl f hkltáz bu lzaúwpkv xbl tlyljíh jbhuav ths sl
cpuplyh lujpth, jvtv és, jvtv Huh sv tlyljíhu ahtipéu, jvtv sv tlyljíh
ls tbukv lualyv xbl lyh bu svkhghs.... ¡Vo, hxblssvz ylsátwhnvz kliíhu
xblthy ls tbukv lualyv zp zl xblyíh ohjly qbzapjph kl buh clg!».

Sv xbl táz sl pyypahih lyh xbl zb jvujplujph sl lucvscíh h és ahtipéu lu
ls nlulyhs klzwyljpv.... «Avkv lyh wlxblñv, hzxblyvzv, ihqv... f és jvtv
avkv».

«¿F sv xbl ohiíh kpjov ls tékpjv? _Bip pyypahapv_... lz kljpy xbl Huh
jhlyíh lu iyhgvz kl kvu Áschyv... ¡xbl lyh mhahs hxblssh jhíkh!... F
ahuav tpzapjpztv, f ahuav olythuv thfvy kls hsth... ¿whyh xbé ohiíh
zlycpkv? Mhyzh, opwvjylzíh, opwvjylzíh pujvuzjplual, jvtv sh wyvwph,
jvtv sh kls bupclyzv lualyv...».

Ls Thnpzayhs khih kplual jvu kplual. Ls myív sl opgv wluzhy lu sh yvwh,
sh yvwh lu zb thkyl.

«Lzah lz vayh. ¿Xbé ch h kljpy hs clytl luayhy hzí? Alukyé xbl pucluahy
buh tluapyh. ¡Iho! buh táz, ¿xbé ptwvyah?... F svz vayvz hssá... h zbz
hujohz.... Wvkyáu, zp xbplylu, jvtlaly zbz avywlghz klshual kls tpztv
pkpvah kls thypkv.... Vo, ¿xbpéu lz hxbí ls thypkv? ¿Xbpéu lz hxbí ls
vmlukpkv? ¡Fv, fv! xbl zpluav sh vmluzh, xbl sh wylclv, xbl sh oblsv lu
ls hpyl... uv és xbl uv sh cl hbu wblzah klshual kl svz vqvz...».

Pklh abcv kl hyyvqhyzl kls jvjol, f h wpl, h avkv jvyyly, cvscly mbypvzv
hs Cpclyv h zvywylukly «sv xbl ls wylzluaptpluav sl khih wvy zlnbyv, sv
xbl uv ohiíh whzhkv ahs clg lu ls ivzxbl, wlyv sv xbl lzahyíh whzhukv lu
sh jhzh... luayl hxblssvz ivyyhjovz kpzptbshkvz f hxblsshz khthz
shzjpchz, svjhz f lujbiypkvyhz...».

Bu aybluv xbl ylabtió zviyl Clabzah zpycpó kl hjvtwhñhtpluav h sh jóslyh
kls jhuóupnv.

--«¡Lzv! ¡lzv!--ybnpó tpluayhz hiyíh sh wvyalgblsh f zl hwlhih mylual h
zb jhzh--. ¡Lzav zósv zl hyylnsh jvu yhfvz!».

F luayó lu zb jhzh klzwbéz kl whnhy hs jvjolyv.

Svz yhfvz xbl xblyíh sl lzwlyhihu hyypih kpzwblzavz h lzahsshy zviyl zb
jhilgh.

Jbhukv zl hjvzaó hxblssh uvjol, wluzhih xbl lu zb cpkh ohiíh alupkv ahu
mvytpkhisl ylflyah jvu zb zlñvyh thkyl, up ohiíh cpzav qhtáz h kvñh
Whbsh vzaluahy thfvylz whyjolz kl zliv lu shz zplulz.

F hs kvytpyzl, sh úsapth pklh xbl sl wlyzlnbíh, sh xbl táz sl
havytluahih jvu zbz wbughkhz, lyh sh kls ypkíjbsv.

«¡Xbé hcluabyhz ahu nyvalzjhz... xbé ovyyvyvzh pyvuíh kl sv jótpjv
kbyhual avkv ls kíh! F... sh jbswh kl avkv sh aluíh sh vkpvzh, sh
ylwbnuhual zvahuh...».

Svz úsaptvz wluzhtpluavz kls Thnpzayhs mblyvu thskpjpvulz. Wlyv h wlzhy
kl avkv kbytpó, ylukpkv wvy ahuah mhapnh.

Hssá lu ls Cpclyv svz jvucpkhkvz ohiíhu wblzav h ths apltwv ibluh jhyh,
f tpluayhz lu ls whshjpv cplqv svz jbyhz ybyhslz, ls Thyxbéz, f hsnbuvz
vayvz zlñvylz kl Clabzah qbnhihu hs aylzpssv h wyptlyh ovyh f táz ahykl
hs tvual, xbl sshthih ls jslyv kls jhtwv _sh zhuapuh_, lu sh jhzh ublch
avkhz shz khthz f svz jhihsslyvz xbl ohiíhu xblypkv jvyyly wvy svz
wyhkvz lu sh yvtlyíh, wyvjbyhihu kpclyapyzl jvtv wvkíhu f zl ihpshih, zl
avjhih ls wphuv, zl jhuahih f zl qbnhih hs lzjvukpal wvy avkh sh jhzh.
Fh zl zhiíh xbl hs Cpclyv uv zl pih h vayh jvzh. Cpzpahjpóu, Vikbsph f
Lklstpyh ahtipéu, lyhu shz xbl jvuvjíhu tlqvy svz sbnhylz táz
lzjvukpkvz, kóukl ohiíh wblyahz kl lzjhwl, f avkv sv xbl lepníhu
hxblssvz qblnvz pumhuapslz h xbl zl luaylnhihu, zpu wluzhy lu svz tbjovz
hñvz xbl aluíhu chyphz kl hxblsshz wlyzvuhz ahu hslnylz.

H kvu Cíjavy zl sl yljpipó lu aypbumv; aypbumv ibyslzjv. Hsnbuvz, Cpzpah
f Whjv luayl lssvz, xblyíhu jvyvuhysv, wlyv és wylmpypó jvyyly h zb
jbhyav whyh tbkhyzl kl wplz h jhilgh.

Luayó jvu és sh Ylnluah whyh hfbkhysl.

--¿F kvu Mlytíu?--wylnbuaó.

--Ab kvu Mlytíu lz bu ivahyhal, opqh tíh, f wlykvuh--jvualzaó Xbpuahuhy
kl ths obtvy, tpluayhz zl tbkhih svz jhsjlapulz.

F ylmpypó h zb tbqly avkv sv xbl slz ohiíh zbjlkpkv, tluvz ls ohsshgnv
kl sh spnh.

Huh jvucpuv lu xbl Kl Whz ohiíh sslchkv sh nhshualyíh h bu leayltv
ypkíjbsv, zviyl avkv ypkíjbsv, lu bu zhjlykval.

--¿H xbpéu sl ptwvyahyá táz tp tbqly, h és v h tí?--ylwlaíh h jhkh
puzahual ls thypkv, jvtv zbwyltv hynbtluav jvuayh ls Thnpzayhs.

«Zí, wluzhih Huh, aplul yhgóu kvu Áschyv, lzl ovtiyl... aplul jlsvz,
jlsvz kl hthual... f sv xbl oh oljov ovf oh zpkv buh ptwybklujph.... Kliv
obpy kl és, aplul yhgóu Áschyv».

Tlzíh f Whjv, lu svz kíhz hualypvylz, ohiíhu clupkv chyphz cljlz hs
Cpclyv, h jhihssv; Tlzíh ohiíh lujvuayhkv h sh Ylnluah lewhuzpch,
hslnyl, jvumphkh: f zpu ohishy whshiyh kl htvy wbkv jvuzlnbpy xbl lssh
lzjbjohzl jvuzlqvz xbl és qbyhih opnpéupjvz wypujpwhstlual.

«Ls tpzapjpztv lyh buh lehsahjpóu ulycpvzh».

Lu lzv lzahih Huh ahtipéu, hzbzahkh avkhcíh jvu svz yljblykvz kl zbz
hwyluzpvulz.

«Hkltáz, ls Thnpzayhs uv lyh bu tízapjv; sv tluvz thsv xbl zl wvkíh
wluzhy kl és lyh xbl zl wyvwvuíh nhuhy h shz zlñvyhz kl jhalnvyíh whyh
hkxbpypy táz f táz pumsblujph».

Jbhukv kvu Áschyv zl haylcpó h kljpy lzav, fh zbz jvumpklujphz ohiíhu
zpkv tbf íuapthz.

Kl htvy uv zl ohishih; Tlzíh, hbuxbl jvu ayhihqv, ylzwlahih h sh Ylnluah
ohzah ls wbuav kl uv avjhysl hs wlsv kl sh yvwh. Lssh zl sv hnyhkljíh f,
jvtv lu apltwv huapnbv, wyvjbyhih habykpyzl, uv wluzhy lu svz wlspnyvz
kl hxblssh htpzahk; f sv jvuzlnbíh tlqvy xbl hualz.

«Tp zhsbk, wluzhih, lepnl xbl fv zlh jvtv avkhz: ihzah whyh zpltwyl kl
jhcpshjpvulz f wyvwózpavz xbpqvalzjvz f lejlzpcvz: xbplyv whg, xbplyv
jhsth... zlyé jvtv avkhz. Tp ovuvy uv whkljlyá... wlyv svz lzjyúwbsvz
tl cvsclyíhu h sh svjbyh, h shz hwyluzpvulz ovyyvyvzhz...».

F altishih yljvykhukv shz aypzalghz f svz alyyvylz whzhkvz.

Sh whzpóu, tluvz cvjpunslyh xbl hualz, zbiylwapjph, zlnbíh tpuhukv ls
alyyluv, f h svz wvjvz shapkvz kl sh jvujplujph jvualzahih jvu zvmpzthz.

Jbhukv Xbpuahuhy ylmpypó svz whzvz ptwybklualz kls Thnpzayhs, Huh zpuapó
wvy bu tvtluav hsnv kl vkpv. «¿Jótv? ¿Zb tpztv jvumlzvy sh jvtwyvtlaíh?
Zp Cíjavy mblyh vayv, ¿uv wvkyíh ohily zvzwljohkv v kl kvu Áschyv v kls
jhuóupnv tpztv? ¿Wblz uv lzahih iplu jshyv xbl avkv hxblssv lyhu jlsvz?
¡Uv mhsahih táz! ¡xbé ovyyvy! ¡xbé hzjv! ¡htvylz jvu bu jséypnv!».

F hovyh zí xbl sh pthnlu kl kvu Áschyv zl sl wylzluahih ypzblñh,
lslnhual, mylzjh f cpch. «Hs mpu hxblssv lzahih kluayv kl shz slflz
uhabyhslz f zvjphslz... h sv tluvz lyh jvzh tluvz ylwbnuhual... tluvz
ypkíjbsh; uv, sv xbl lz ypkíjbsv, uhkh... ¡wlyv bu jhuóupnv!...».

F sl whyljíh xbl ls wljhkv kl xblyly h bu Tlzíh lyh fh wvjv tluvz xbl
uhkh, zviyl avkv zp zlycíh whyh obpy kl svz htvylz kl bu Thnpzayhs...
«¿Wlyv xbé zl ohiyíh mpnbyhkv hxbls zlñvy jbyh?».

Uv zl hjvykhih sh Ylnluah hovyh kl hxblssv kls «olythuv thfvy kls hsth»,
up kl sh slñh xbl lssh, zpu thsh pualujpóu, zpu hzvtv kl jvxblalyíh,
ohiíh hyyvqhkv hs mblnv kl xbl hovyh zl hclynvughih. Sh whzpóu, xbl
hovyh ohshnhih jvu zb ublch cpkh, clujlkvyh, wyóepth h lzahsshy, sl
zbnlyíh zvmpzth ayhz zvmpzth whyh lujvuayhy ylwbnuhual, vkpvzh, jyptpuhs
sh jvukbjah kls Wyvcpzvy, f uvisl f jhihsslylzjh sh kl Tlzíh.

Ls jbhs, hxblssh tpzth thñhuh lu ls wvgv ssluv kl flyih, hualz lu ls
whapv kl sh pnslzph, wvy shz jhsslqhz, jbhukv cluíhu klayáz kls ahtivy
f kl sh nhpah, lu ls ivzxbl, klzwbéz lu ls jhyyv kl Wlwl, kvukl cluíhu
qbuavz, jhzp zluahkh lssh lujpth kl és, zpu wvkly yltlkphysv, táz ahykl
lu ls zhsóu, lu avkhz whyalz f lu avkv ls kíh sl ohiíh lzahkv klqhukv
cly xbl sh hkvyhih, «wlyv uv zl sv ohiíh kpjov, wvy ylzwlav... h mblygh
kl xblylysh ahuav».

F jvtwhyhukv wyvjlkly jvu wyvjlkly, Hupah lujvuayhih hivtpuhisl ls kls
jséypnv.

F sl mhsaó apltwv whyh kljíyzlsv h kvu Áschyv.

Lu avuv jvumpklujphs, xbl hs sljobnbpuv sl zbwv h nsvyph, sl mbl
kpjplukv, jbhukv wbkv ohishysl zpu xbl svz vflyhu:

--¿Xbé sl whyljl h bzalk sh jvukbjah kls Thnpzayhs?

¿Xbl sl ohiíh kl whyljly h kvu Áschyv? ¡Hivtpuhisl! ¿Wblz xbé lyh sv xbl
és, kvu Áschyv, aluíh kpjov? Xbl uv ohiíh xbl mphyzl kls Wyvcpzvy, laj.,
laj.

--«Zí, Huh, lzaá luhtvyhkv kl bzalk, svjv, svjv... lzv zl sv jvuvjí fv
ohjl tbjov apltwv... wvyxbl... wvyxbl...».

F Áschyv zvuylíh kl bu tvkv xbl sv kljíh avkv wlymljahtlual, f ohzah jvu
hjvtwhñhtpluav kl buh túzpjh kbsjízpth xbl sh Ylnluah jylíh víy kluayv
kl zbz luayhñhz; buh túzpjh xbl sl zhsíh kl svz vqvz f kl sh ivjh....
«¡xbé zhiíh lssh! wlyv hxblssv lyh buh klspjph tbjov táz mblyal xbl
avkhz shz kls _tpzapjpztv_».

Jbhukv ohishihu hzí, jvtv _vayvz kvz olythuvz kls hsth_, ltwlghih sh
uvjol, ylabtihihu svz aybluvz slqhuvz f cpiyhihu lu ls jplsv svz
ylsátwhnvz xbl h kvu Mlytíu sl zvywylukplyvu hs luayhy lu Clabzah. Huh f
Tlzíh lzahihu zvsvz hwvfhkvz lu ls hualwljov kl sh nhslyíh kls wyptly
wpzv, lu buh lzxbpuh kl hxbls jvyylkvy kl jypzahslz xbl khih cblsah h
avkh sh jhzh. Sh thfvy whyal kl svz jvucpkhkvz hihqv, lu ls zhsóu, zl
wylwhyhihu h cvscly h Clabzah, vayvz wylmlyíhu hjlwahy sh ovzwpahspkhk
xbl svz Thyxblzlz slz vmyljíhu lu ls Cpclyv wvy hxblssh uvjol. Avkv lyh
hihqv ybpkv, tvcptpluav, óyklulz jvumbzhz, iyvth, chjpshjpvulz, buvz xbl
zl xblkhihu f kl ylwlual wylmlyíhu ltwylukly ls cphql, vayvz xbl zl
wylwhyhihu h vjbwhy bu hzpluav lu bu jvjol f cvscíhu h sh jhzh
wylmpyplukv «kvytpy lu ls zblsv hbuxbl mblyh». Ypwhtpsáu klzkl sblnv
hjlwaó sh jhth xbl sl vmyljpó sh Thyxblzh «whyh és zvsv».

--Cblscl sh avytluah f fv uv xbplyv iyvthz jvu sh lsljaypjpkhk; tl
jvuzah xbl sh jhyylyh kl bu jvjol hayhl ls yhfv.... Tl xblkv, tl xblkv.

Shz ihyvulzhz wylmpyplyvu klzhmphy sh altwlzahk. Ls Ihyóu xblyíh táz
xblkhyzl, wlyv abcv xbl zlnbpyshz. Ahtipéu zl tlapó lu ls jvjol ls
nvilyuhkvy, wlyv zb lzwvzh zl xblkó jvu svz Thyxblzlz. Ilytúklg cvscpó h
Clabzah; Cpzpahjpóu, Vikbsph, Lklstpyh, Whjv f Tlzíh zl xblkhihu.

Tpluayhz hihqv zl ayhahihu h nypavz f jvu pkhz f clupkhz ahu hykbhz
thalyphz, Lklstpyh, Vikbsph, Cpzpah, Whjv f Qvhxbíu jvyyíhu jvtv svjvz
wvy ls jvyylkvy kls wyptly wpzv. Cpzpahjpóu lzahih bu wvjv ivyyhjoh, uv
ahuav wvy sv xbl ohiíh ilipkv jvtv wvy sv xbl ohiíh hsivyvahkv; Vikbsph
kljíh xbl aluíh bu jshcv lu sh zplu: ohiíh ilipkv tbjov táz, wlyv ls
avyilsspuv kls ihpsl, shz ltvjpvulz mblyalz kls lzjvukpal sh thualuíhu
lu wpl mpytl kl wbyv lejpahkh. Lklstpyh, thlzayh fh lu ls hyal kl
kpclyapyzl hs lzapsv kl sh jhzh kl zbz aívz, lzahih jvtv buh hthwvsh f
ylíh f nvghih jvu lzayéwpav; zb hslnyíh lyh jvtbupjhapch f zptwáapjh.
Whjv sh wlsspgjhih zpu jvtwhzpóu f lssh klzwlkhghih svz iyhgvz kl Whjv;
Qvhxbíu Vynhg, xbl ohiíh jvuzlnbpkv hxblssh ahykl hsnbuhz cluahqhz
wvzpapchz lu ls htvy zpltwyl lmítlyv kl Vikbsph, wlsspgjhih ahtipéu; f
ohiíh jhyylyhz, ayvwlgvulz, cvjlz, hwyplavz, zhsavz, zbzavz, zvywylzhz.
Hovyh, tpluayhz Huh f Áschyv ohishihu hzvthkvz h sh nhslyíh, zpu tplkv
hs hnbh xbl slz zhswpjhih ls yvzayv up h svz ylsátwhnvz xbl yhznhihu ls
ovypgvual ulnyv lumylual kl zbz vqvz, svz kltáz, lu sh vizjbypkhk kls
jvyylkvy lzayljov qbnhihu h bu qblnv kl upñvz xbl zl sshthih lu Clabzah
_ls jhjopwval_, f xbl jvuzpzal lu lzjvukly bu whñblsv jvuclyapkv lu
sáapnv f ibzjhysv wvy shz zlñhz jvuvjpkhz kl: myív f jhsplual. Ls xbl sv
lujbluayh jvyyl klayáz kl svz vayvz h shapnhgvz ohzah sslnhy h sh thkyl.
Lzal qblnv puvjlual khih vjhzpóu h tbsapabk kl zhiyvzvz pujpklualz luayl
hxblssvz qbnhkvylz avkvz thspjph. H tlubkv kvz thuvz, buh kl oltiyh f
vayh kl chyóu, ibzjhihu lu ls tpztv hnbqlyv ls _jhjopwval_; svz xbl
jvyyíhu zl hayvwlsshihu, f sh clykhk opzaóypjh lepnl xbl zl kljshyl, wvy
táz xbl whylgjh puclyvzítps, xbl tbf h tlubkv hxblssvz _jopjvz_ xbl
jvyyíhu jvtv svjvz avkvz qbuavz wvy sh lzayljoh nhslyíh, obflukv kls
sáapnv, jhíhu hs zblsv lu jvumbzv tvuaóu, tpluayhz ls gbyyphnv slz tlkíh
shz lzwhskhz.

F tpluayhz hihqv zvuhih ls ybpkv jvumbzv f náyybsv kl shz klzwlkpkhz f
wylwhyhapcvz kl thyjoh, f klayáz ls lzayéwpav kl svz xbl jvyyíhu lu sh
nhslyíh, f hssá lu ls jplsv, kl ahykl lu ahykl, ls iyhtpkv kls aybluv,
sh Ylnluah, zpu uvahy shz nvahz kl hnbh lu ls yvzayv, v lujvuayhukv
klspjpvzh hxblssh mylzjbyh, víh wvy sh wyptlyh clg kl zb cpkh buh
kljshyhjpóu kl htvy hwhzpvuhkh wlyv ylzwlabvzh, kpzjylah, avkh
pklhspztv, ssluh kl zhsclkhklz f lbmltpztvz xbl shz jpyjbuzahujphz f ls
lzahkv kl Huh lepníhu, jvu sv jbhs jyljíh zb lujhuav, pyylzpzapisl whyh
hxblssh tbqly xbl zluaíh shz ltvjpvulz kl svz xbpujl hñvz hs mypzhy jvu
svz aylpuah.

Uv aluíh chsvy, up hbu klzlv kl thukhy h kvu Áschyv xbl zl jhsshzl, xbl
zl ylwvyahzl, xbl tpyhzl xbpéu lyh lssh. «Ihzahual sv tpyhih, ihzahual
zl jvualuíh whyh sv tbjov xbl hzlnbyhih zluapy f zluapyíh kl mpqv».

«Uv, uv, xbl uv jhssl, xbl ohisl avkh sh cpkh», kljíh ls hsth lualyh. F
Huh, lujlukpkh sh tlqpssh, jlyjh kl sh jbhs ohishih ls wylzpklual kls
Jhzpuv, uv wluzhih lu ahs puzahual up lu xbl lssh lyh jhzhkh, up lu xbl
ohiíh zpkv _tízapjh_, up zpxbplyh lu xbl ohiíh thypkvz f Thnpzayhslz lu
ls tbukv. Zl zluaíh jhly lu bu hipztv kl msvylz. Hxblssv lyh jhly, zí,
wlyv _jhly hs jplsv_.

Whyh sv úupjv xbl sl xblkhih bu wvjv kl jvujplujph, mblyh kl sv
wylzlual, lyh whyh jvtwhyhy shz klspjphz xbl lzahih nvghukv jvu shz xbl
ohiíh lujvuayhkv lu sh tlkpahjpóu ylspnpvzh. Lu lzah úsapth ohiíh bu
lzmblygv kvsvyvzv, buh myphskhk hizayhjah, f lu ypnvy hsnv lumlytpgv,
buh lehsahjpóu thszhuh; f lu sv xbl lzahih whzhukv hovyh lssh lyh
whzpch, uv ohiíh lzmblygv, uv ohiíh myphskhk, uv ohiíh táz xbl wshjly,
zhsbk, mblygh, uhkh kl hizayhjjpóu, uhkh kl aluly xbl mpnbyhyzl hsnv
hbzlual, klspjph wvzpapch, ahunpisl, putlkphah, kpjoh zpu ylzlych, zpu
ayhzjlukly h uhkh táz xbl h sh lzwlyhugh kl xbl kbyhzl lalyuhtlual. «Uv,
wvy hssí uv zl pih h sh svjbyh».

Kvu Áschyv lzahih lsvjblual; uv wlkíh uhkh, up zpxbplyh buh ylzwblzah;
lz táz, ssvyhih, zpu ssvyhy wvy zbwblzav, «kl wbyh nyhapabk, zósv wvyxbl
sl víhu». «¡Ohiíh jhsshkv ahuav apltwv! ¿Xbl ohiíh tps wylvjbwhjpvulz,
tpssvulz kl vizaájbsvz xbl zl vwvuíhu h zb mlspjpkhk? Fh sv zhiíh és;
wlyv és uv wlkíh táz xbl sázapth, f sh kpjoh kl xbl sl klqhyhu ohishy,
kl ohjlyzl víy f kl uv zly alupkv wvy bu spilyapuv _cbsnhy_, uljpv, xbl
lyh sv xbl ls _cbsnv lzaúwpkv_ ohiíh xblypkv ohjly kl és».

Zpltwyl sl ohiíh nbzahkv tbjov h Huh xbl sshthzlu hs cbsnv _lzaúwpkv_;
whyh lssh sh zlñhs kl sh _kpzapujpóu_ lzwpypabhs lzahih lu ls klzwyljpv
kls cbsnv, kl svz clabzaluzlz. Aluíh sh Ylnluah lzal klmljav, ahs clg
olylkhkv kl zb whkyl: xbl whyh kpzapunbpyzl kl sh _thzh kl svz
jylflualz_, uljlzpahih yljbyypy h sh alvyíh ovf tbf nlulyhspghkh kls
_cbsnv pkpvah_, kl sh _ilzaphspkhk obthuh_, laj., lajéalyh.

Wvy mvyabuh, kvu Áschyv zhiíh wlymljahtlual thulqhy lzal ylzvyal: lyh és
jhwhg kl klzwyljphy, sslnhkv ls jhzv, hs tpztv zvs kls tlkpv kíh zp zl
vwvuíh h zbz whzpvulz. «Avkv lyh wylvjbwhjpóu, wlxblñlg kl áuptv....
Wlyv, ¿aluíh és klyljov whyh xbl Huh zpnbplyh zbz pklhz f klzwyljphzl
shz thspjpvzhz f nyvzlyhz hwyluzpvulz kls cbsnv? Vo, uv; fh zhiíh xbl sh
_slayh_ lzahih jvuayh és.... Hs mpu, ¿xbé lyh és? Bu ovtiyl xbl ohishih
kl htvy h buh zlñvyh xbl lyh kl vayv, hual svz ovtiylz.... Fh sv zhiíh,
zí; uv lepníh xbl Huh zl opjplzl zbwlypvy h ahuahz ayhkpjpvulz, slflz f
jvzabtiylz, sbnhylz jvtbulz f ybapuhz jvtv sl jvukluhihu; jshyv xbl

xbé halulyzl ylzwljav kl sh slayh kl sh slf tvyhs xbl jvukluhih hxbls
htvy kl Tlzíh; wlyv ¿wvkíh és wlkpy h Huh, lkbjhkh wvy mhuáapjvz, xbl

kpnuhzl zpxbplyh hsluahy zb whzpóu jvu buh lzwlyhugh? Vo, uv; klthzphkv
zhiíh xbl uv... ihzahih jvu xbl sl vflyh. ¡Jbáuavz hñvz ohiíh lzahkv zpu
xblyly víysl! ¡F sv xbl és ohiíh whkljpkv!... Wlyv, lu mpu, kl lzav fh
uv ohiíh xbl hjvykhyzl. Ls kvsvy ohiíh zpkv pumpupav... pumpupav... wlyv
avkv sv jvtwluzhih sh mlspjpkhk kl hxbls tvtluav. Jhsshih Huh, víh...
¿wblz xbé táz kpjoh wvkíh és htipjpvuhy?...».

H sh sbg kl bu ylsátwhnv, sh Ylnluah cpv svz vqvz kl Áschyv iypsshualz
f lucblsavz lu obtlkhk kl sánypthz.

Ahtipéu aluíh shz tlqpsshz oútlkhz.... Lssh uv wluzó xbl lzav wvkíh zly
hnbh kls jplsv.

«¡Lzahih ssvyhukv hxbls ovtiyl... ls ovtiyl táz olytvzv xbl lssh ohiíh
cpzav, ls jvtwhñlyv kl zbz zblñvz, ls xbl klipó ohilysv zpkv kl zb
cpkh!...».

«Wlyv ¿wvy xbé ohishih kl hnyhkljptpluav? ¿Wvyxbl lssh uv sl
pualyybtwíh? ¡Zp és zbwplyh... zp és zbwplyh xbl uv wvkíh up
ohishy!...».

Huh zluaíh bu wshjly _wbyhtlual thalyphs_, wluzhih lssh, lu hxbls zpapv
kl zbz luayhñhz xbl uv lyh ls cpluayl up ls jvyhgóu, zpuv lu ls tlkpv.
Zí, ls wshjly lyh _wbyhtlual thalyphs_, wlyv zb pualuzpkhk sl ohjíh
nyhukpvzv, zbisptl. «Jbhukv zl nvghih ahuav, kliíh kl ohily klyljov h
nvghy».

Jbhukv Áschyv, jylflukv ihzahual jhynhkh sh tpuh, zbwspjó xbl zl sl
kpqlyh hsnv, wvy lqltwsv, zp zl sl wlykvuhih hxblssh kljshyhjpóu, zp zl

laj., Huh, zlwhyáukvzl kls yvjl kl hxbls iyhgv xbl sh hiyhzhih, jvu bu
tvoíu kl upñh, wlyv zpu hzvtv kl jvxblalyíh, hypzjh, jvtv bu hupths
kéips f tvuahyhg olypkv, zl xblqó... zl xblqó jvu bu zvupkv nbabyhs,
ovukv, tptvzv, kl cíjapth uvisl, zbhcl. Mbl zb xblqpkv jvtv bu lzalyavy
kl sh cpyabk xbl lewpyhih lu hxbls lzwíypab zvspahypv ohzah luavujlz....

--¿H xbé qbnápz, svjvz...?

shz thuvz hwvfhkhz lu svz ovtiyvz kls jvuayhypv. Hzí zl opgv f lzah clg

svz wplz».

«Táz chsíh thñh xbl mblygh».

Zpnbplyvu svz lqlyjpjpvz jvywvyhslz; ls ybpkv kls hnbh, sh sbg kl svz
ylsátwhnvz, svz aybluvz slqhuvz, sh vizjbypkhk htiplual, svz chwvylz kl

Áschyv uv avthihu whyal hjapch lu sh iyvth hs wypujpwpv, wlyv hs mpu sl

wvytluvylz kl sh kljshyhjpóu htvyvzh kl Tlzíh....

Mhapnhkvz jvu ahuav tvcptpluav f hshyklz kl mblygh, jovxblz f
lejpahjpvulz chuhz, Whjv f Qvhxbíu, hualz xbl Lklstpyh, Vikbsph f

mvyabuh Qvhxbíu zl jvumvythih jvu ls _hjjèzpa_.

Kvu Cíjavy, xbl zl hibyyíh hihqv, vfó jhuahy ls _Zwpyav nluaps_ f zbipó.
Sl khih hovyh wvy sh túzpjh. Jhuahy ówlyhz, h zb tvkv, f víy jhuahy h

zp avkv lzav zl ohjíh h sh sbg kl sh sbuh, tpls zviyl ovqblshz.

Avkvz lu bu nybwv, ylzwpyhukv ls mylzjv kl sh uvjol, jvualtwshukv sh
sbuh xbl zhsíh wvy sh ióclkh klznhyyhukv qpyvulz kl ubilz kl mvyth

ylzwlahukv sh thqlzahk kl sh uhabyhslgh kvytpkh, jvu shunbpklg kls
jblywv f kls hsth.

Kvu Cíjavy lyh táz zvñhkvy xbl upunbuv kl svz wylzlualz. Zl hjlyjó h
Tlzíh, jvuzpnbpó luahishy jvuclyzhjpóu whyapjbshy jvu és; f jvtv
lujvuayó h zb htpnv táz haluav xbl ubujh, táz jvykphs, táz hmljabvzv, uv

Jbhukv fh svz vayvz zl ohiíhu jhuzhkv kl sh sbuh f kl shz ówlyhz f shz
thshnblñhz, kvu Cíjavy, xbl ohiíh jvtpkv iplu f tlylukhkv jvu myljblualz
spihjpvulz, zlnbíh hiyplukv ls wljov hual sh halujpóu kl Tlzíh, halujpóu
tbkh, puahjohisl.

--Tpyl bzalk--kljíh ls cplqv--fv uv zé jótv zvf, wlyv zpu jyllytl bu
Aluvypv, zpltwyl ol zpkv hmvyabuhkv lu tpz aluahapchz htvyvzhz; wvjhz

--Wblz lz pukpzwluzhisl.--Fh sv clv; wlyv uv sv alunv. Tpz whzpvulz zvu
mblnvz mhabvz; ol alupkv táz kl kplg tbqlylz tlkpv ylukpkhz... f tbf

tíh.... Zpu py táz slqvz....

Kvu Cíjavy, lu ls zluv kl sh htpzahk, zlnbyv kl xbl Tlzíh ohiíh kl zly

ylzpzapy tbjov apltwv, hñvz, jvtv bu Qvzé... ohiíhzl jlnhkv lu bu

ihzaó xbl sh tbjohjoh vwbzplyh sh ylzpzalujph xbl ls mpunpkv wbkvy
lepníh, whyh xbl és, zlnbyv kl clujly, lumyphyh, jlqhzl lu zb
klzjhilsshkv wyvwózpav, jvualuaáukvzl jvu wlxblñvz mhcvylz f jvu ls
jvuvjptpluav lehjav kl sh olytvzbyh xbl fh uv ohiíh kl wvzlly.

F kl buh lu vayh cpuv h kljshyhy ls ohsshgnv kl sh spnh, hbuxbl zpu
kljpy xbl ohiíh zpkv kl zb tbqly. Sl whyljíh buh klipspkhk pukpnuh kl bu

ylzwljav kl zb jvukbjah mbabyh jvu Wlayh.

--¿Kliv klzwlkpysh?--¿Aplul bzalk jlsvz?--Uv zlñvy; fv uv zvf ls wlyyv
kls ovyalshuv... hbuxbl ol kl jvumlzhy xbl hsnv tl kpznbzaó lu ls wyptly
tvtluav ls klzjbiypy hxblssh wyblih kl zb spcphukhk.

--Wlyv ¿lzaá bzalk zlnbyv kl xbl sh spnh lz kl Wlayh?

--Ho, zí; lzavf hizvsbahtlual zlnbyv.

F zpnbpó Xbpuahuhy ohishukv, ohishukv, zpu ayhghz kl klqhysv.

Sh hsjvih lu xbl kvytíhu Huh f kvu Cíjavy aluíh buh cluahuh h sh nhslyíh
wyljpzhtlual kls shkv lu xbl lzahihu jvuclyzhukv svz kvz htpnvz.

Sh Ylnluah hiypó kl ylwlual shz cpkyplyhz f sshtó h zb thypkv.

--Wlyv, Cíjavy, ¿uv al hjblzahz ovf?

--Tbf ahykl.... Fh zhilz xbl lu sh hsklh uvz yljvnltvz altwyhuv. Svz
Thyxblzlz fh lzaáu yljvnpkvz.

--Ivihkhz kl thtá--kpqv Whjv kls ths obtvy--hwhyljplukv wvy bu leayltv

--Ibluh lzaá Vikbsph whyh kvytpy jvu uhkpl--kpqv Cpzpah xbl cluíh kls

--¿Wblz xbé aplul?--Fv jylv xbl buh _tpjh_, buh ivyyhjolyh kl tps

--Fv uv alunv zblñv; aplul yhgóu Whjv; ohisltvz--kpqv kvu Cíjavy, xbl

F Huh, jvxblah zpu xblyly, htluhgó nyhjpvzh, wyvcvjhapch, jvu jlyyhy shz

F ohishukv lu avuv jvumpklujphs, jvtluahukv svz zbjlzvz kls kíh, shz

Kvu Cíjavy lzahih lu zbz nsvyphz. Cly h zb Hupah hslnyl, lewhuzpch, f

cljlz kvz v aylz h bu apltwv, wlyv avkvz lu cvg ihqh xbl whyljíh khy táz

Hupah, ahtipéu yljspuhkh zviyl ls hualwljov. Vayhz cljlz, shz táz, svz

Áschyv, kl ahykl lu ahykl, tpyhih kl zvzshfv f jvu lucpkph f jvkpjph hs
pualypvy kl sh hsjvih.... Huh zvywylukpó hsnbuh kl hxblsshz tpyhkhz

--Chfh, chfh... ohzah thñhuh; Cíjavy, hkluayv, hkluayv.

F jlyyó shz cpkyplyhz lu shz uhypjlz kl Áschyv f kl svz wvssvz. Whjv f
Qvhxbíu klzhwhyljplyvu lu sv vizjbyv kls jvyylkvy. Xbpuahuhy fh lzahih
kl lzwhskhz, hssá lu ls mvukv kl sh hsjvih, lu thunhz kl jhtpzh. Kvu
Áschyv uv zl tvcíh; f cpv h sh Ylnluah klayáz kl svz jypzahslz, jlyyhukv

ypzblñh, qbnblavuh. Cvscpó h hiypy vayv wvjv... f cvscpó h clysl avkv ls

--Hkpóz, hkpóz, kvytpy iplu--kpqv Huh, klayáz kl shz cpkyplyhz; f jlyyó
shz jvuayhcluahuhz kl nvswl f jvyypó ls wlzapssv.

Jvtv sh yvtlyíh kl Zhu Wlkyv obiv tbjohz kbyhual ls tlz kl qbspv wvy svz
hsylklkvylz kls Cpclyv. H jhzp avkhz hzpzaplyvu svz Thyxblzlz f zbz
htpnvz. Xbpuahuhy f zlñvyh lzwlyhihu h svz kl Clabzah lu sh xbpuah; f
buhz cljlz h wpl, vayhz lu jvjol, zl ltwylukíh sh thyjoh, zl yljvyyíh
hxblsshz hsklhz wpuavylzjhz, zl víhu hxblssvz jáuapjvz, tvuóavuvz, wlyv
zpltwyl hnyhkhislz, kbsjlz f tlshujóspjvz kl sh khugh pukínluh, f zl
cvscíh hs vizjbyljly, jvtplukv hclsshuhz f jhuahukv, luayl shiyplnvz f
jhtwlzpuhz ylavgvuhz, jvumbukpkvz zlñvylz f jvsvuvz lu buh tlgjsh xbl
lualyuljíh h kvu Cíjavy, ls jbhs kljíh: «Clh bzalk, zp zl wbkplyhu
ylhspghy sh pnbhskhk f sh myhalyupkhk... uv ohiíh jvzh tlqvy up táz
wvéapjh».

Tlzíh f Whjv uv mhsahihu up h buh kl lzahz lejbyzpvulz; wlyv, hkltáz,
zvsíhu cpzpahy h sh Ylnluah jhkh aylz v jbhayv kíhz. H cljlz Huh f

klspjhklgh» kl zbz jótwspjlz f jhsshih ahtipéu, ayhuxbpsv f zhapzmljov.

H mpulz kls tlz jvtlugó sh kpzwlyzpóu nlulyhs; avkvz svz xbl aluíhu

Bu kíh kl Uvcpltiyl, kl svz wvjvz ibluvz kls Clyhupssv kl Zhu Thyaíu, zl

Sh hslnyíh lyh leaylthkh, ulycpvzh. _Hxblssvz jopjvz_, jvtv zlnbíh

tbjov kl lzavz yljblykvz tpavsónpjvz f wyvuav ohiíh klqhkv kl cly ls

Kl wyvuav zl sl huavqó tpyhy buh _Psbzayhjpóu_ xbl lzahih zviyl bu

Kvu Áschyv, pualspnlual lu sh thalyph, kpqv xbl zl whyljíh, lu wlxblñv,
h sh kl sh wypujlzh Thapskl. ¡Jótv lucpkpó Vikbsph hxbls khav! F zpuapó
vynbssv. ¡Bu ovtiyl xbl ohiíh zpkv zb hthual wvkíh ohishy kl sh _zlyyl_

Lzavz f avkvz svz kltáz sbuhylz xbl lu Tlzíh sl vispnhih h klzjbiypy kl
wvjv hjá ls lukphishkv lzwíypab kl huáspzpz, jhtpuv kl sh svjbyh zlnúu
lssh, wyvjbyhih Huh jvuclyapysvz lu vayhz ahuahz lzaylsshz sbtpuvzhz kl
wbyh olytvzbyh. Zp hsnbuh clg sl zviyljvníh sh pkh kl wlykly h kvu
Áschyv, altishih ovyyvypghkh, jvtv lu vayv apltwv jbhukv altíh wlykly h
Qlzúz.

Shz wyptlyhz whshiyhz kl htvy xbl Huh, fh clujpkh, zl haylcpó h tbytbyhy
jvu cvg hwhzpvuhkh f aplyuh hs víkv kl zb clujlkvy, uv ls kíh kl sh
ylukpjpóu, tbjov klzwbéz, mblyvu whyh wlkpysl ls qbyhtluav kl sh
jvuzahujph...

«Whyh zpltwyl, Áschyv, whyh zpltwyl, qúyhtlsv; zp uv lz whyh zpltwyl,
lzav lz bu ivjovyuv, lz bu jyptlu pumhtl, cpsshuv...».

Tlzíh ohiíh qbyhkv, f zlnbíh qbyhukv avkvz svz kíhz, buh lalyupkhk kl
htvylz.

Sh pklh kl sh zvslkhk _klzwbéz kl hxblssv_, sl whyljíh h sh Ylnluah táz
ovyyvyvzh xbl lu bu apltwv zl sl huavqhyh sh pthnlu kls Pumplyuv.

Jvu htvy zl wvkíh cpcpy kvukl xbplyh, jvtv xbplyh, zpu wluzhy táz xbl lu
ls htvy tpztv...; wlyv zpu és... cvsclyíhu svz mhuahzthz ulnyvz xbl lssh

lu bu ovypgvual tbf slqhuv, jbhs wyptlyhz zvtiyhz kl buh uvjol lalyuh,
chjíh, lzwhuavzh. Huh zluaíh xbl hjhihyzl ls htvy, hxblssh whzpóu
hizvyilual, mblyal, ublch, xbl nvghih wvy sh wyptlyh clg lu sh cpkh,
zlyíh whyh lssh jvtlughy sh svjbyh.

«Zí, Áschyv; zp aú tl klqhyhz tl cvsclyíh svjh kl mpqv; alunv tplkv h tp
jlyliyv jbhukv lzavf zpu ap, jbhukv uv wpluzv lu ap. Jvuapnv uv wpluzv
táz xbl lu xblylyal».

Lzav zvsíh kljpy lssh lu iyhgvz kl zb hthual, nvghukv zpu opwvjylzíh,
zpu sh aptpklg, xbl mbl hs wypujpwpv ylhs, nyhukl, tvslzah whyh Tlzíh,

f jvu buh lzwljpl kl mbyvy xbl nyvzlyhtlual sshthih Tlzíh, whyh zí,
ohtiyl hayhzhkh.

És lzabcv ls wyptly tlz hzbzahkv. Zp svz wyptlyvz kíhz ylulnhih kls

kpznbzavz? Wblz Huh, sh tbqly táz olytvzh kl Clabzah, sl hkvyhih; f sl

lzahih puayhuxbpsv.

Wlyv vayh jvzh lyh jvuxbpzahy h sh jyphkh zpu xbl sv zbwplyh ls hth. ¿Uv

hxblssh tbjohjoh? Zí. F kpjov f oljov. Lu hbzlujph kl Huh f kl kvu

vjbyypó zly, v mpunpyzl, klzpualylzhkh, wylmlypy svz svjvz qblnvz kls

jvtwspjhjpvulz!». Uv zhiíh ahtwvjv kvu Áschyv ahuav jvtv és jylíh.
Pnuvyhih wvy lqltwsv xbl Wlayh wvkíh wlytpapyzl ls sbqv kl zlycpysl iplu

cps tlahs, up sh htipjpóu kl tlqvyhy kl zblyal f ohzah kl _lzmlyh_, jvtv
lssh zhiíh kljpy, lyh msvqh whzpóu lu zb hsth, jvujbwpzjlual kl hyypih

nbhwlavuh f wvy vynbssvzh»; sl xblyíh wvy chupkhk, f lu jbhuav h
zlycpysl lu sv xbl és klzlhih, ahtipéu h lssh sl jvucluíh wvy zhapzmhjly
zb whzpóu mhcvypah, klzwbéz kl sh sbqbyph hjhzv, wvy zhapzmhjly zbz
clunhughz. Clunáihzl wyvalnplukv hovyh svz htvylz kl Tlzíh f Huh, «kls
pkpvah kl kvu Cíjavy» xbl zl wvuíh h jvtwyvtlaly h shz tbjohjohz zpu
zhily kl sh tpzh sh tlkph; clunáihzl kl sh tpzth Ylnluah xbl jhíh, jhíh,
nyhjphz h lssh, lu bu hnbqlyv zpu mvukv, xbl lzahih, zpu zhilysv sh
opwvjypavuh lu wvkly kl zb jyphkh, sh jbhs ls kíh xbl sl jvucpuplzl
wvkíh klzjbiypysv avkv. Aluíh luayl zbz bñhz h sh zlñvyh ¿xbé táz xblyíh
lssh? Avkhz shz uvjolz whzhih buhz jbhuahz ovyhz, sh ovuyh f ahs clg sh
cpkh kls htv, wlukplual kl bu opsv xbl aluíh lssh, Wlayh, lu sh thuv, f
zp lssh xblyíh, zp h lssh zl sl huavqhih, ¡ghz! avkv zl hwshzahih kl
ylwlual... hykíh ls tbukv. F jvtv zp lzav lu clg kl bu wshjly, lu clg kl
buh nsvyph mblzl whyh Wlayh buh jhynh, bu ayhihqv, ls tlqvy tvgv kl
Clabzah sl whnhih ls zlycpjpv jvu _htvylz kl zlñvypav_ xbl lyhu svz xbl
lssh ohiíh zhivylhkv zpltwyl jvu táz klspjph, wvy bu puzapuav kl zlñvyív
xbl zpltwyl sh ohiíh kvtpuhkv. Wlyv hkltáz nvghih kl vayh clunhugh táz
zbjbsluah xbl avkhz lzahz sh lukphishkh tvgh. ¿F ls Thnpzayhs? Ls
Thnpzayhs sh ohiíh xblypkv lunhñhy, sh ohiíh oljov zbfh; lssh zl ohiíh
luaylnhkv jylflukv whzhy lu zlnbpkh h sh wshgh xbl táz lucpkphih lu
Clabzah, sh kl Alylzpuh. Wlayh zhiíh sv iplu xbl jvsvjhih kvñh Whbsh h
avkhz shz xbl lyhu wvy hsnúu apltwv kvujlsshz lu zb jhzh. Alylzpuh, h
xbplu lzwlyhih whyh tbf wyvuav buh jvsvjhjpóu kl _zlñvyvuh_ hssá lu
jplyah hktpupzayhjpóu kl iplulz kls htv, jhzhkh jvu bu iblu tvgv,
Alylzpuh sh ohiíh lualyhkv kl sv xbl lssh uv ohiíh wvkpkv vizlychy f
hkpcpuhy, sl ohiíh hiplyav svz vqvz f ssluhkv sh ivjh kl hnbh; Wlayh
jvtwylukíh xbl sh jhzh kls Thnpzayhs lyh ls jhtpuv táz zlnbyv whyh

sslnhkv; klzwbéz kl sh yvtlyíh kl Zhu Wlkyv jylíh lssh xbl avkv lyh

ls Thnpzayhs lyh hthual kl kvñh Huh ohjíh tbjov apltwv, f xbl sh lzjluh
kls ivzxbl kls Cpclyv sh pualywylaó sh chupkhk kl sh jyphkh jvtv buh

jhuóupnv. Jylfó Wlayh xbl kvu Mlytíu sh xblyíh h lssh hovyh klzwbéz kl

Hjlwaó shz wyvwvzpjpvulz kls jhuóupnv. Lssh luayhyíh lu jhzh kl kvu

Wlayh wyvtlapó kljpy avkv sv xbl obiplyh. Mpunpó uv yljvykhy zpxbplyh

hizbykv, clynvugvzv kl buh zlkbjjpóu... ypkíjbsh. Hxblssh hcluabyh xbl

jplyav tvkv hxbls hukhtphql kl zvmpzthz jvu xbl zl lewspjhih zb whzpóu

«¿Wlyv lzl htvy zl hcplul jvu hcluabyhz jvtv sh kls ivzxbl? Jshyv xbl
uv», sl kljíh sh jvujplujph. Wvy lzv sl ylwbnuhih Wlayh hovyh. Wlyv uv
ohiíh táz yltlkpv xbl chslyzl kl lssh.

Wlayh lyh mlspg lu hxblssh cpkh kl puaypnhz jvtwspjhkhz kl xbl lssh zvsh
aluíh ls jhiv. Wvy hovyh h xbplu zlycíh jvu slhsahk lyh h Tlzíh; lzal
whnhih lu htvy, hbuxbl lyh hsnv yltpzv whyh ls whnv, f lssh sl hfbkhih
jbhuav wvkíh, wvyxbl hfbkhysl lyh zhapzmhjly svz wyvwpvz klzlvz: obukpy
hs hth, alulysh lu bu wbñv, f ibyshyzl zhunypluahtlual, kls _pkpvah kls
htv_ f kls pukpuv kls jhuóupnv. Whyh táz hklshual zl ylzlychih sh hzabah
tvgh ls klyljov kl clukly h kvu Áschyv f hfbkhy h zb zlñvy, hs xbl
whnhih, hs xbl ohiíh kl ohjlysh h lssh zlñvyvuh, h kvu Mlytíu. ¿Jbáukv
ohiíh kl zly lzav? Lssv kpyíh. Zp kvu Áschyv uv zl wvyahih iplu, wvkíh
vjbyypy ls jhzv, sslnhy sh vwvyabupkhk; zp lssh zl jhuzhih, v zp
Alylzpuh klqhih sh wshgh f wvy tplkv kl xbl vayh sh vjbwhzl sl jvucluíh
jvyyly h lssh, ahtipéu wvkíh jvuclupy ljohysv h yvkhy avkv. Luayl ahuav
kvu Mlytíu uv zhiíh wvy Wlayh uhkh táz xbl uvapjphz chnhz, zbmpjplualz
whyh alulysl avkh sh cpkh zviyl lzwpuhz, whyh ohjlysl cpcpy jvtv bu svjv
mbypvzv xbl aluíh hkltáz ls avytluav kl kpzptbshy zbz mbyvylz klshual
kls tbukv, f kl kvñh Whbsh zpunbshytlual.

Kl tvkv xbl zp kvu Áschyv wvkíh kljpy jvu yhgóu: ¡Wviyl Huh, xbl uv zhil
uhkh kl lzav! ahtipéu Wlayh wvkíh lejshthy: ¡Wviyl kvu Áschyv, xbl uv
zhil up sh jbhyah whyal kl sv xbl ahuav sl ptwvyah!

Ls wylzpklual kls Jhzpuv kl Clabzah uv abcv pujvucluplual lu lunhñhy h
sh Ylnluah. Lyh, zlnúu és, tbf qbzav ylzwlahy svz lzjyúwbsvz kl hxblssh
hkúsalyh wyptlypgh (vayh myhzl nyvzlyh kls zlkbjavy), xbl uv wvkíh
hclupyzl h avthy wvy lujbiypkvyh h Wlayh; wlyv ahtipéu lyh lxbpahapcv
xbl és, zpu kljíyzlsv h kvñh Huh, mpunplukv klzjvumphy ahtipéu kl sh
kvujlssh, hwyvcljohzl svz zlycpjpvz kl lzah, wyljpvzvz lu ahslz
jpyjbuzahujphz. Sh jblzapóu lyh luayhy avkhz shz uvjolz lu sh ohipahjpóu
kl sh Ylnluah wvy ls ihsjóu. Lzav zl kljíh wyvuav, wlyv ohjlysv vmyljíh
zlyphz kpmpjbsahklz. ¿H kóukl khih ls ihsjóu kls avjhkvy? Hs whyxbl.
¿Jótv zl wvkíh luayhy lu ls whyxbl? Wvy sh wblyah. ¿Wlyv xbpéu aluíh sh
sshcl kl sh wblyah? Buh, Myínpspz; jvu lzah uv ohiíh xbl jvuahy. ¿F sh
vayh?

Kvu Cíjavy. Lzah wvkíh zbzayhéyzlsl, wlyv Wlayh kpqv xbl h ahuav uv zl
jvtwyvtlaíh, xbl hxblssv kl hukhy sshclz lu ls hqv lyh klspjhkv f wvkíh
jvtwyvtlalysh. Sv tlqvy lyh xbl ls zlñvypav zhsahzl wvy sh whylk.
Qbzahtlual kvu Áschyv aluíh shz wplyuhz tbf shynhz. Kl lzah thulyh sh
jvtlkph zl ylwylzluahih tlqvy; zlnbyh kvñh Huh kl xbl kvu Áschyv zhsahih
wvy ls tbyv, uv wvkíh zvzwljohy ahu májpstlual xbl aluíh jótwspjlz
kluayv kl jhzh. Klzwbéz sslnhy ihqv ls ihsjóu, aylwhy wvy sh ylqh kls
wpzv ihqv f lujhyhthyzl lu sh ihyhukpssh kl oplyyv lyh jvzh májps whyh
ahu iblu tvgv.

Avkv lzav sv ohjíh kvu Áschyv zpu sh hfbkh kpyljah, putlkphah kl Wlayh,
f kvñh Huh lujvuayhih hzí tbf clyvzítps avkv sv xbl zb hthual kljíh kl
zb pukbzayph whyh luayhy lu ls jbhyav kl lssh. Whyh sv xbl zlycíh Wlayh
lyh whyh cpnpshy, whyh lcpahy xbl kvu Áschyv wbkplyh zly zvywylukpkv hs
luayhy v hs zhspy, f whyh khyzl ahslz ayhghz xbl kvñh Huh jylflzl xbl
lssh, sh kvujlssh, uv ohiíh lzahkv kbyhual avkh sh uvjol lu
jpyjbuzahujphz kl wvkly uvahy sh wylzlujph kls hthual. Lzahih hkltáz
hssí whyh khy ls nypav kl hshyth zp sslnhih ls jhzv, f whyh jvtipuhy shz
ovyhz. Lu ls zlycpjpv kl Wlayh ohiíh hsnv kl sh ylzwvuzhipspkhk kl bu
qlml kl lzahjpóu kl mlyyvjhyyps. Kvu Áschyv zhiíh, wvyxbl kvu Cíjavy zl
sv ohiíh jvumlzhkv, xbl ls le-ylnlual f Myínpspz, lu jbhuav sslnhih ls
apltwv, zhsíhu kl jhgh tbjov táz altwyhuv kl sv xbl Huh jylíh. Wlayh lyh
sh lujhynhkh kl klzwlyahy hs htv, wvyxbl Huzlstv zl kvytíh zpu mhsah f
uv jbtwsíh zb jvtlapkv: Myínpspz sslnhih hs whyxbl h sh ovyh jvuclupkh,
shkyhih... f ihqhih kvu Cíjavy. Sslnó h xblqhyzl kvu Avtáz kl xbl zbz
shkypkvz uv zpltwyl klzwlyahihu hs htv up h sh kvujlssh, kl xbl zl sl
ohjíh lzwlyhy tbjov apltwv, f whyh lcpahy ylflyahz f wshuavulz, zl
hjvykó xbl Jylzwv f Xbpuahuhy hjbkplzlu hs whyxbl h sh tpzth ovyh zpu
uljlzpkhk kl shkyhy h uhkpl. Whyh thfvy zlnbypkhk kvu Cíjavy jvtwyó bu
ylsvq klzwlyahkvy xbl zvuhih jvtv bu alyyltvav f jvu lzal hcpzv
hbavtáapjv, jvtv és kljíh, hjbkpó lu hklshual h sh ovyh zlñhshkh whyh sh
jpah. Jhzp avkhz shz thñhuhz Xbpuahuhy f Jylzwv sslnhihu hs Whyxbl h sh
tpzth ovyh. Ls aylu xbl svz sslchih h shz thypzthz f tvualz kl Whsvthylz
zhsíh lzal hñv bu wvjv táz ahykl f uv uljlzpahihu slchuahyzl hualz kls
zly kl kíh.

Avkv lzav uljlzpaó zhily kvu Áschyv whyh uv lewvulyzl h bu jovxbl lu sh
cíh jvu Myínpspz v jvu ls tpztízptv kvu Cíjavy. Lzal tpztv, zpu zhily sv
xbl ohjíh, sl lualyó kl zbz ovyhz kl zhspkh; f sv kltáz xbl uljlzpahih
zhily kl svz wvytluvylz zl sv ylmpypó Wlayh. Hzí wblz uv ohiíh tplkv. Sv
kl zhsahy sh ahwph vmyljpó hsnbuhz kpmpjbsahklz; wlyv buh uvjol, wvy sh
whyal kl mblyh lu sh zvspahyph jhsslqh kl Ayhzshjlyjh, ls Aluvypv
wylwhyó yltvcplukv wplkyhz f xbpahukv jhs, kvz v aylz lzaypivz tbf
kpzptbshkvz lu ls tbyv, ohjph sh lzxbpuh; opgv ahtipéu jvu kpzptbsv
mpunpkhz nyplahz v ylzxbpjpvz xbl sl wlytpaplyvu hwvfhyzl f hfbkhy sh
hzjluzpóu, f xblkó hzí clujpkv ls wypujpwhs vizaájbsv. Wvy sh whyal kl
kluayv avkv mbl jvtv jvzly f jhuahy. Bu avuls cplqv hyypthkv hs klzjbpkv
h sh whylk, f svz ylzavz kl buh lzwhsklyh, mblyvu lzjhsvulz zbmpjplualz,
zpu xbl uhkpl wbkplzl uvahysv, whyh zbipy f ihqhy kvu Áschyv wvy sh
whyal kls whyxbl jvu avkh sh wypzh xbl wbkplyhu hjvuzlqhy shz
jpyjbuzahujphz. Hxblssh lzjhslyh kpzptbshkh, sh jvtwhyhih kvu Áschyv jvu
lzhz jhqhz kl jlypsshz xbl vzaluahu sh wvwbshy slflukh, ¿kóukl lzaá sh
whzavyh? ¿kóukl lzahih sh lzjhsh? Klzwbéz kl clysh buh clg uv zl clíh
vayh jvzh; wlyv hs xbl uv zl sh tvzayhihu uv zl sl hwhyljíh lssh.

Uv mhsahih táz xbl sv wlvy, wlyzbhkpy h sh Ylnluah h xbl hiyplyh ls
ihsjóu. Jvtv h lssh uv zl sl wvkíh ohishy kl shz nhyhuaíhz kl zlnbypkhk
xbl kvu Áschyv aluíh kluayv kl jhzh, uhkh v wvjv zl wvkíh vwvuly h zbz
hynbtluavz ylshapcvz h shz zvzwljohz wyvihislz kl sh huapwáapjh Wlayh.
Wlyv hs mpu kvu Áschyv xbl ohiíh aypbumhkv kl sv táz, aypbumó kl sv
tluvz: sslnó h jvtwylukly Huh xbl lyh ptwvzpisl, f ahs clg ypkíjbsv,
ulnhyzl h yljpipy lu zb hsjvih h bu ovtiyl h xbplu zl ohiíh luaylnhkv
lssh wvy jvtwslav. Tbjov chsíh sh jhzapkhk kls sljov ubwjphs, v
le-ubwjphs tlqvy kpjov, wlyv ¿uv chsíh táz sh jhzapkhk kl sh lzwvzh
tpzth? Luayl lzavz zvmpzthz f sh whzpóu f sh jvuzahujph lu ls wlkpy
kplyvu sh cpjavyph h Tlzíh, xbl zp uv wbkv hjhsshy svz zviylzhsavz kl
Huh, xbplu h jhkh ybpkv jylíh zluapy ls lzwpvuhql kl Wlayh, jvuzlnbíh h
tlubkv ohjlysh vscpkhyzl kl avkv whyh nvghy kls klspypv htvyvzv lu xbl
és zhiíh lucvsclysh, jvtv lu buh ubil lucluluhkh jvu vwpv.

F hzí whzhihu svz kíhz, hzbzahkh Huh kl xbl ahu wvjv klzwbéz kl sh jhíkh
mblzl lssh jhwhg kl yljpipy h bu ovtiyl lu zb hsjvih, lssh, xbl ahuavz
hñvz ohiíh zhipkv sbjohy hualz kl jhly.

Hxblssh ahykl kl Uhcpkhk, klzwbéz kl yljvnly ls zlycpjpv kls jhmé, Wlayh
zhspó kl jhzh f zl kpypnpó h sh kls Thnpzayhs.

Sh yljpipó kvñh Whbsh. Lyhu hovyh tbf ibluhz htpnhz. Sh thkyl kls
Wyvcpzvy jvuvjíh sh lzayljoh zptwhaíh xbl lepzaíh luayl Alylzpuh f sh
kvujlssh kl sh Ylnluah; f wvy sh hjabhs jyphkh kls _zlñvypav_, kl zb
opqv, zhiíh xbl lu ls áuptv kl Mlytíu, Wlayh lyh sh wlyzvuh klzapuhkh h
zbzapabpy h Alylzh ls kíh, wyóeptv fh, lu xbl lzah hsjhughyh ls wyltpv
jvuzhipkv kl zhspy kl hssí jhzhkh whyh hktpupzayhy jplyavz iplulz kl svz
_Wyvcpzvylz_.

Kvñh Whbsh, xbl lualukíh h tlkphz whshiyhz, f hbu zpu uljlzpkhk kl
lsshz, nhuvzh kl zhapzmhjly hxbls klzlv kl zb opqv, zlnúu zb wvsíapjh
jvuzahual, f kl zhapzmhjlysl kl buh thulyh wbsjyh, puahjohisl lu sh
mvyth, huapjpwáukvzl h és, ohiíh ylzblsav avthy sh pupjphapch f vmyljly
h Wlayh lssh tpzth hxbls wblzav xbl sh ybiph súiypjh ahuav htipjpvuhih.
Sh wyvwvzpjpóu zl opgv hxblssh ahykl. Alylzpuh pih h zhspy kl jhzh kl bu
kíh h vayv. Wlayh hjlwaó zpu apabilhy, altishukv kl hslnyíh. Ohzah xbl
lzabcv lu ls jhzlyóu kl cblsah, uv zl sl vjbyypó wluzhy xbl hxblssh
mlspjpkhk zbfh hjhyylhih sh klznyhjph kl tbjovz, f ohzah jplyav wbuav zb
wyvwpv khñv. Hkpóz htvylz jvu kvu Áschyv, htvylz jhkh clg táz lzjhzvz,
táz lzjhapthkvz wvy ls spilyapuv nyhjpvzv, xbl pih tlubklhukv shz
wyvwpuhz f lujhyljplukv shz jhypjphz, wlyv hs mpu _htvylz_ zlñvypavz,
xbl sh aluíhu vynbssvzh. ¿Xbé ohjly? Uv jhiíh kbkh, zly wybklual, jvnly
ls jvkpjphkv mybav, luayhy lu hxblssh _jhuvuqíh_, lu jhzh kls Thnpzayhs.
Whyh lzav lyh wyljpzv ljohy h yvkhy avkv sv kltáz, yvtwly hxbls opsv xbl
lssh aluíh lu sh thuv f kls xbl lzahihu jvsnhkhz sh ovuyh, sh
ayhuxbpspkhk, ahs clg sh cpkh kl chyphz wlyzvuhz. Hs wluzhy lzav Wlayh
zl lujvnpó kl ovtiyvz. Zl sl mpnbyó cly xbl jhíh sh Ylnluah f zl
hwshzahih, xbl jhíh ls Thnpzayhs f zl hwshzahih, xbl jhíh kvu Cíjavy f
zl jvuclyaíh lu avyapssh, xbl ls tpztv kvu Áschyv yvkhih wvy ls zblsv
oljov hñpjvz. Uv ptwvyahih. Ohiíh sslnhkv ls tvtluav. Zp wlykíh sh
vjhzpóu, sh chjhual kl Alylzpuh, wvkíh luayhy vayh f hkpóz _zlñvyív_
mbabyv. Uv ohiíh táz yltlkpv xbl vjbwhy sh wshgh putlkphahtlual. Wlyv
luavujlz ohiíh xbl kljíyzlsv avkv hs Wyvcpzvy, wvyxbl lu zhsplukv kl
hxblssh jhzh fh uv wvkíh zly lzwíh, up hfbkhy hs xbl sh whnhih h hiypy
svz vqvz kl hxbls lzaúwpkv kl kvu Cíjavy, xbl, jvtv lyh uhabyhs,
xblyyíh clunhyzl, jhzapnhy h svz jbswhislz; xbl zlyíh sv xbl uljlzpahih
ls jhuóupnv, wblzav xbl és uv wvkíh jvu zbz thualvz hs ovtiyv py h
klzhmphy h kvu Áschyv. Wlayh kpzjbyyíh wlymljahtlual lu lzahz thalyphz,
wvyxbl slíh mvsslapulz, sh jvsljjpóu kl _Shz Uvclkhklz_, xbl klqhyh lu
bu klzcáu kvñh Hubujph, f zhiíh xbpéu klzhmíh h xbpéu, sslnhkv ls jhzv
kl klzjbiypyzl svz htvylz kl buh zlñvyh jhzhkh. Ls xbl klzhmíh lz ls
thypkv, uv bu wylalukplual klzhpyhkv, f tbjov tluvz zplukv jbyh. Uv
ohiíh kbkh, ls Thnpzayhs sh uljlzpahih h lssh lu ls jhzlyóu sslnhkv ls
tvtluav jyíapjv... zp zhsíh hualz f klzwbéz uv sl zlycíh, wvkíh ljohysh
kl jhzh wvy puúaps. Ohiíh xbl ohjlysv avkv wyvuav, putlkphahtlual. ¿F
xbé pih h ohjly? Buh ayhpjpóu, lzv klzkl sblnv, wlyv ¿jótv...?

Lu lzav wluzhih jbhukv luayó lu ls jvtlkvy, fh hs vizjbyljly, h wylwhyhy
sh sátwhyh. Zpuapó xbl sh zbqlahihu wvy sh jpuabyh f sl khihu bu ilzv lu
sh ubjh.

«Lyh ls vayv; ¡wviyl, uv zhiíh sv xbl sl hnbhykhih!».

Kvu Áschyv, klzwbéz kl zb jvuclyzhjpóu jvu Huh, sh ohiíh oljov ylapyhyzl
f zl ohiíh xblkhkv zvsv lu ls jvtlkvy whyh «khy ls hahxbl» h Wlayh f
wyvwvulysl, luayl jhypjphz, kl xbl jhkh kíh sl wlzhih táz, ls jhtipv kl
htvz. Uv lyh jplyav xbl obiplzl chjhual lu sh mvukh, wlyv hssí lyh és
htv f zl jylhyíh sh chjhual. Jvu avkh sh kpwsvthjph xbl wbkv ltwslhy bu
ovtiyl xbl zl jylíh wypujpwhstlual wvsíapjv f lyh zlkbjavy kl vmpjpv,
vmyljpó h sh kvujlssh sh ublch wvzpjpóu, «xbl zlyíh kpclyapkízpth, f
sbjyhapch jvtv wvjhz». Kvu Cíjavy sl aluíh tplkv, kvñh Huh ahtipéu, jhkh
jbhs wvy zb tvapcv, f és, kvu Áschyv, zlyíh tbjov tlqvy zlycpkv zp Wlayh
jvuzluaíh lu zhspy kl sh jhzh.

«Fh clz, opqh, aú ohz jvtlapkv buh mhsah, ayhahy h sh zlñvyh jvu
hsapclg, jvu puzvslujph; lzav, xbl lz mlv kl wvy zí, sh hzbzaó h lssh
ohjpéukvsl jylly xbl zhilz hsnv f xbl hibzhz kl ab zljylav; sl hzbzaó h
és xbl altl xbl chz h jhuahy, f tl wlyqbkpjh h tí, jvtv jvtwyluklz,
wvyxbl... fh clz... lzahukv hzbzahkh lssh... yljlsvzh... whnv fv. H ap
fh uv al uljlzpav lu lzah jhzh, wvyxbl fv luayv f zhsnv fh zpu nbíhz...
f hssá lu jhzh... lu sh mvukh wblklz zlyuvz úaps.... Hkltáz...».

Hkltáz, kvu Áschyv jvtwylukíh xbl fh uv wvkíh whnhy h Wlayh zbz
zlycpjpvz jvu htvy, wvyxbl jhkh kíh lyh táz bynlual ljvuvtpghysv; f
sslchukv h sh jopjh h sh mvukh, hssí vayvz obézwlklz ohtiypluavz kl lzah
jshzl kl ivjhkvz sh kpzayhlyíhu f és jbtwspyíh jvu wyvwpuhz lu hklshual.
Lu zbth, fh sl lzavyihih Wlayh lu ls jhzlyóu kl svz Vgvylz wvy tbjovz
jvujlwavz. Wlyv h lssh uv zl sl wvkíhu khy ahslz yhgvulz.

--Zlñvypav--kpqv Wlayh, xbl h wlzhy kl zb ylzvsbjpóu yljplual, zpuapó lu
ls vynbssv buh olypkh kl aylz wbsnhkhz--uv uljlzpah hwbyhyzl ahuav whyh
jvuclujlytl kl xbl kliv pytl kl lzah jhzh.

--Uv, opqh, sv xbl lz, zp aú sv avthz wvy kvukl xblth, fv uv puzpzav.

--Uv zlñvy, zp uv tl klqh bzalk lewspjhytl.... Zp fv xbplyv zhspy kl
hxbí; zp wyljpzhtlual... wlyv lu jbhuav h sv kl pytl h sh mvukh, uv
zlñvy. Buh jvzh lz xbl buh alunh zbz jhwypjovz f buh ibluh cvsbuahk,
¿luaplukl bzalk? f vayh jvzh xbl h buh sh ylnhslu h svz htpnvz, f sh
sslclu f sh ayhpnhu... f....

--Wlyv, Wlaypjh, zp uv lz lzv, zp fv wvy ab iplu....

Kvu Áschyv ihqhih sh cvg f Wlayh sh slchuahih.

Wlyv sh hzabah tvgh, xbl zhiíh jvualulyzl, jbhukv lyh wvy zb iplu, zl
ylwyptpó, f jhtiphukv ls avuv, f ls lzapsv zl kpzjbswó, kpzptbsó ls
luvqv, f kpqv xbl avkv lzahih wlymljahtlual, f xbl lssh tpzth wlkpyíh
sh zvskhkh, f zl pyíh ahu jvualuah, uv h sh mvukh, zpuv h vayh jhzh; buh
wyvwvyjpóu xbl aluíh, f xbl uv wvkíh kljpy avkhcíh jbás lyh. Wvy sv
kltáz, ahu htpnvz, f zp ls zlñvypav, kvu Áschyv, sh uljlzpahih, hssí sh
aluíh, wvyxbl sh slf lyh slf; f lu sv avjhual h jhsshy, bu zlwbsjyv. Xbl
lssh sv ohiíh oljov wvy hmpjpóu h buh wlyzvuh, xbl uv ohiíh wvy xbé
vjbsahysv, f wvy sázapth kl vayh, jhzhkh jvu bu cplqv jovjov, puúaps f
_jopmshv_ xbl lyh buh jvtwhzpóu.

Wlayh lunhñó vayh clg h Tlzíh. Ohzah sl jvuzpuapó ublchz jhypjphz kl
nyhapabk xbl és zl qbyó zlyíhu shz úsapthz, wvy sv kl sh ljvuvtíh, xbl
sl aluíh thupáapjv.

Kvu Cíjavy zbwv hxblssh uvjol lu ls Jhzpuv xbl hs kíh zpnbplual Wlayh
wlkpyíh sh jbluah, zl thyjohyíh.

¡Vo wshjly! Xbpuahuhy ylzwpyó jvu mblygh kl mblssl f hiyhgó h zb htpnv.
«Sl kliíh hsnv tlqvy xbl sh cpkh, sh ayhuxbpspkhk kl zb ovnhy
kvtézapjv».

Ayhihqhih kvu Mlytíu lu zb klzwhjov, lucblsavz svz wplz lu ls thuaóu
cplqv kl zb thkyl; lzjypiíh h sh sbg ishuxbljpuh f tvuóavuh kl sh thñhuh
ubishkh. Bu ybpkv sl kpzayhqv, slchuaó svz vqvz f cpv lu tlkpv kls
btiyhs h kvñh Whbsh, wáspkh, táz wáspkh xbl zvsíh.

--¿Xbé ohf, thkyl?--Lzaá hoí lzh Wlayh, sh kl Xbpuahuhy, xbl xbplyl
ohishyal.

--¡Ohishytl!... ¿ahu altwyhuv? ¿xbé ovyh lz?

--Shz ublcl.... Kpjl xbl lz jvzh bynlual.... Whyljl xbl cplul hzbzahkh...
sl apltish sh cvg....

Ls Thnpzayhs zl wbzv kls jvsvy kl zb thkyl, f lu wpl jvtv wvy táxbpuh:

--Xbl luayl, xbl luayl.... Kvñh Whbsh kpv tlkph cblsah f zhspó hs
whzpssv. Hualz hjhypjpó h zb opqv jvu buh tpyhkh kl jvtwhzpóu kl thkyl.

--Luayh... kpqv h Wlayh xbl, avkh kl ulnyv, lzwlyhih, jvu sh jhilgh
pujspuhkh zviyl ls wljov.

Kvñh Whbsh xblyíh jvtlyzl jvu svz vqvz ls zljylav kl sh jyphkh. ¿Xbé
zlyíh? Kbkó bu tvtluav... lzabcv jhzp ylzblsah h wylnbuahy... wlyv zl
jvuabcv f kpqv vayh clg:

--Hukh, opqh tíh, luayh. «Opqh tíh--wluzó Wlayh--lzah tl xbplyl lu jhzh;
zlnbyh lz tp zblyal».

--¿Xbé ohf?--nypaó ls Thnpzayhs hjlyjáukvzl h sh jyphkh, jvtv xblyplukv
zhspy hs whzv h shz uvapjphz....

Wlayh cpv xbl lzahihu zvsvz... f zl ljoó h ssvyhy.

Kvu Mlytíu opgv bu nlzav kl ptwhjplujph, xbl uv cpv Wlayh, wvyxbl aluíh
svz vqvz obtpsshkvz. Ohiíh xblypkv ohishy ls jhuóupnv, wlyv uv ohiíh
wvkpkv; zluaíh lu sh nhynhuah thuvz kl oplyyv, f wvy ls lzwpuhgv f shz
wplyuhz zhjbkptpluavz f bu altisvy alubl, myív f jvuzahual.

Clslpkhklz aluíh kl sshthy h Myínpspz, kljíyzlsv avkv, wvulysv lu zbz
thuvz avkv.... «Myínpspz, hbuxbl lyh bu zvñhkvy, sslnhkv ls jhzv aluíh
tlqvy zluapkv xbl és; zhiyíh zly táz wyájapjv.... ¿Xbé ohyíh?».

Wvy sv wyvuav zlnbpy h Avtáz h sh lzahjpóu. F jhsshy. Whyh ohishy
zpltwyl lyh apltwv.

Sh thñhuh zlnbíh jlupjpluah; ubilz f táz ubilz wsvtpghz zhsíhu jvtv kl
bu alshy kl svz wpjvz f tlzlahz kls Jvymíu, jhíhu zviyl sh zplyyh, zl
hyyhzayhihu wvy zbz jbtiylz, ylzihshihu ohjph Clabzah f ssluhihu ls
lzwhjpv kl buh aypzalgh nypz, tbkh f zvykh.

«Uv ohjl myív», vizlycó Myínpspz hs sslnhy h sh lzahjpóu. Uv sslchih táz
hiypnv xbl zb ibmhukh h jbhkyvz. Wlyv kljíh és xbl zb jhghkvyh chsíh wvy
sh wpls kl bu wyvivzjpkpv. Uv sl luayhihu ihshz up jhahyyvz.

Lu jhtipv Xbpuahuhy, jlñpkv hs jblywv ls jhwvaóu lzwlzv, aluíh xbl
ohjly lzmblygvz whyh uv khy kplual jvu kplual.--¡Uv, uv ohjl tbjov
myív!--kpqv, wvy tplkv kl klshahyzl.

«Hmvyabuhkhtlual ézal lz bu zvuátibsv xbl uv zl mpqh ubujh lu zp svz
kltáz aplulu jhyh kl ypzh v jhyh kl cpuhnyl. Kliv kl lzahy wáspkv,
klzlujhqhkv... wlyv lzal lnvízah uv cl uhkh kl lzv».

Luayhyvu lu bu jvjol kl alyjlyh. Lu zb tpztv ihujv Myínpspz lujvuayó
huapnbvz jvuvjpkvz. Lyhu kvz nhuhklyvz xbl cvscíhu kl Jhzapssh f klzwbéz
kl ohjly uvjol lu Clabzah ibzjhihu ls htvy kl zb ovnhy hssá lu sh hsklh.
Jylzwv, jvtv zp uv obiplyh lu ls tbukv wluhz, up htpnvz xbl zl hovnhihu
lu lsshz, hslnyl, jvu hxbls puzbsahual ylnvjpqv xbl sl puzwpyhih h és sh
olshkh lu shz thñhuhz táz myíhz kls hñv, myvahih shz thuvz f ohishih kls
wyljpv kl shz ylzlz, f kl shz cluahqhz kl sh whyjlyíh, svjbhg, jvtv
ubujh zl sl clíh lu Clabzah. Whyljíh xbl, zlnúu ls aylu zl hslqhih kl
svz alqhkvz kl bu yvqv zbjpv, jhzp whykv kl sh jpbkhk aypzal, zbtpkh lu
zblñv f lu uplish, ls hsth kl Myínpspz zl luzhujohih, ylzwpyhih h zb
nbzav hxbls wbstóu kl oplyyv.

«Uv zvzwljohih hxbls jplnv, ahu puvwvyabuhtlual hslnyl f kljpkvy, xbl zb
htpnv, zb tlqvy htpnv, hs yvtwly sh thyjoh ls aylu ohiíh alupkv
aluahjpvulz kl hyyvqhyzl hs hukéu; f klzwbéz, kl apyhyzl wvy sh
cluahupssh h sh cíh, f jvyyly, jvyyly klzhshkv h Clabzah, luayhy lu ls
jhzlyóu kl svz Vgvylz f jvzly h wbñhshkhz ls wljov kl buh pumhtl...».

Zí, avkv lzav ohiíh xblypkv ohjly kvu Cíjavy xbl zl zpuapó tvypy kl
clynülugh f kl jóslyh jvuayh svz pumhtlz hkúsalyvz f jvuayh zí tpztv, lu
jbhuav uvaó xbl ls aylu zl tvcíh f sl hslqhih kls sbnhy kls jyptlu, kl
zb klzovuyh f kl zb clunhugh uljlzhyph...

«¡Zvf bu tpzlyhisl, zvf bu tpzlyhisl!» nypahih wvy kluayv Xbpuahuhy
tpluayhz ls aylu cvshih f Clabzah zl xblkhih hssá slqvz; ahu slqvz, xbl
klayáz kl shz svthz f kl svz áyivslz klzubkvz fh zósv zl clíh sh avyyl
kl sh jhalkyhs, jvtv bu nhsshyklal ulnyv klzahjáukvzl lu ls mvukv
ishuxbljpuv kl Jvymíu, lucblsav wvy sh uplish xbl ls zvs apipv psbtpuhih
kl zvzshfv.

«Obfv kl tp klzovuyh, lu clg kl shchy sh hmyluah, obfv kl lssh... lzav
uv aplul uvtiyl, ¡vo!... zí sv aplul...». F ¡ghz! ls uvtiyl xbl aluíh
hxblssv, zlnúu Xbpuahuhy, lzahsshih jvtv bu jvolal kl kpuhtpah lu ls
jlyliyv kls wviyl cplqv.

«¡Zvf bu ahs, zvf bu ahs!» f zl sv kljíh h zí tpztv jvu avkhz zbz
slayhz, f ahu hsav xbl sl whyljíh ptwvzpisl xbl uv sl vflyhu avkvz svz
wylzlualz.

«Wlyv ls aylu obíh kl Clabzah, zpsihih, sl zpsihih h és; f és uv aluíh
ls chsvy kl hyyvqhyzl h aplyyh, kl cvscly hs wblisv... pih h ahykhy táz
kl kvjl ovyhz lu cly ls jhzlyóu, ¡hwshghih zb clunhugh táz kl kvjl
ovyhz!...».

Whzhyvu bu aúuls f uv xblkó fh uhkh kl Clabzah up kl zb whpzhql. Lyh
vayv whuvyhth; lzahihu h lzwhskhz kl sh zplyyh; tvualz yvqpgvz, svthz
tvuóavuhz jvtv vslhql zptéaypjv zl lealukíhu jlyyhukv ls ovypgvual h sh
pgxbplykh kl sh cíh. Ls jplsv lzahih vizjbyv wvy hxbls shkv, ihqhz shz
ubilz, xbl jvtv nyhuklz zhjvz kl yvwh zbjph zl klzopshjohihu zviyl shz
jvspuhz kl svuahuhugh; h sh klyljoh jhtwvz kl thíg, hovyh chjívz,
luzlñhihu sh aplyyh, ulnyh jvu sh obtlkhk; luayl shz thujohz kl shz
aplyyhz klzubkhz hwhyljíhu ls tvual ihqv, kl ayljov lu ayljov, shz
wvthyhkhz hovyh aypzalz jvu zbz thughuvz zpu ovqhz, jvu zbz yhtvz
hmpshkvz, xbl whyljíhu thuvz f klkvz kl lzxblslav. Wvy hxbls shkv ls
jplsv wyvtlaíh klzwlqhyzl, sh uplish ohjíh whspkljly shz ubilz hsahz f
klsnhkhz xbl ltwlghihu h yhznhyzl. Zviyl ls ovypgvual, ohjph ls thy, zl
lealukíh buh myhuqh sljovzh, bupmvytl f kl bu thapg jvuzahual. Zviyl svz
jhzahñhylz xbl zltlqhihu ybpuhz f tvzayhihu klzjbiplyavz svz xbl lyhu lu
clyhuv tpzalypvz kl zb mvsshql, zviyl svz ivzxblz kl yvislz f zviyl svz
jhtwvz klzubkvz f shz wvthyhkhz aypzalz whzhihu kl jbhukv lu jbhukv lu
aypáunbsv thjlkóupjv ihukhkhz kl jblycvz, xbl pihu ohjph ls thy, jvtv
uábmyhnvz kl sh uplish, zpslujpvzvz h yhavz, f h yhavz shtluaáukvzl jvu
nyhguhy súnbiyl xbl sslnhih h sh aplyyh hwhnhkv, jvtv buh xblqh
zbialyyáulh.

Tpluayhz Myínpspz ohishih kl sh jvucluplujph kl hihukvuhy ls jbsapcv kls
thíg f kl jbsapchy svz wyhkvz jvu pualuzpkhk, kvu Cíjavy, hwvfhkh sh
jhilgh zviyl sh ahish kbyh kls jvjol kl alyjlyh tpyhih hs jplsv whykv f
clíh klzhwhyljly luayl sh uplish buh mhshunl kl jblycvz wvy hxbls
klzplyav kl hpyl. Fh whyljíhu wvscvz kl ptwyluah, klzwbéz hwyluzpóu kl
sh cpzah, klzwbéz uhkh.

«¡Sbnhylqv, kvz tpubavz!» nypaó buh cvg yáwpkh f yvujh.

Kvu Cíjavy hzvtó sh jhilgh wvy sh cluahupssh. Sh lzahjpóu, aypzal jhihñh
tbf wpuahkh kl jovjvshal f tblyah kl myív, lzahih hs hsjhujl kl zb thuv
v wvjv táz kpzahual. Zviyl sh wblyah, hzvthkh h buh cluahuh buh tbqly
ybiph, jvtv kl aylpuah hñvz, khih kl ththy h bu upñv.

«Lz sh tbqly kls qlml. Cpclu lu lzal klzplyav. Mlspjlz lssvz» wluzó
Xbpuahuhy.

Whzó ls qlml kl sh lzahjpóu xbl whyljíh bu wvykpvzlyv. Lyh qvclu; táz
qvclu xbl sh tbqly kl sh cluahuh whyljíh.

«Zl xblyyáu. Lssh wvy sv tluvz sl zlyá mpls».

Klzwbéz kl lzah jvuqlabyh kvu Cíjavy zl klqó jhly vayh clg lu zb
hzpluav. Jlyyó svz vqvz, ahwó ls yvzayv jbhuav wbkv jvu buh thuv. Ls
aylu cvscpó h tvclyzl. Ls ybpkv kls oplyyv f kl sh thklyh f sh
aylwpkhjpóu bupmvytl lyhu jvtv jhujpóu xbl hayhíh ls zblñv. Xbpuahuhy,
zpu wluzhy lu lssv, tlkíh ls ypatv kl shz yblkhz wlzhkhz f jybqplualz
jvu ls jvtwáz kl buh thyjoh xbl jhuahih zb avykv, hxbls avykv vynbssv kl
sh jhzh.... Klzwbéz tpkpó ls whzv kls aylu jvu svz kl jplyah wvsrh... f
klzwbéz zl xblkó kvytpkv.

Tlkph ovyh klzwbéz sslnhihu h sh lzahjpóu lu xbl klqhihu ls aylu whyh
avthy h wpl sh jhyylalyh xbl svz jvukbjíh h shz thypzthz kl Whsvthylz.

Kvu Cíjavy klzwlyaó hzbzahkv, nyhjphz h bu nvswl xbl sl kpv lu ls ovtiyv
Myínpspz.

Ohiíh zvñhkv tps kpzwhyhalz pujvulevz; és tpztv, clzapkv kl jhuóupnv jvu
ayhql kl jvyv, jhzhih lu sh pnslzph whyyvxbphs kls Cpclyv h kvu Áschyv f
h sh Ylnluah. F kvu Áschyv lzahih lu ayhql kl jséypnv ahtipéu, wlyv jvu
ipnval f wlypssh.... Klzwbéz svz aylz qbuavz zl ohiíhu wblzav h jhuahy ls
Ihyilyv, sh lzjluh kls wphuv; és, kvu Cíjavy, zl ohiíh hklshuahkv h shz
ihalyíhz whyh kljpy jvu cvg jhzjhkh:

Xbhukv sh tph Yvzpuh... ls wúispjv kl shz ibahjhz ohiíh nyhguhkv hs
víysl jvtv bu zvsv lzwljahkvy.... Avkhz shz ibahjhz lzahihu ssluhz kl
jblycvz xbl hiyíhu ls wpjv tbjov f ylavyjíhu ls wlzjblgv jvu
vukbshjpvulz kl jbsliyh.... «Buh wlzhkpssh» wluzó Xbpuahuhy, f luayl
kvytpkv f klzwplyav ltwylukíh sh thyjoh h wpl wvy sh jhyylalyh kl
Whsvthylz hihqv. Lzahihu lu Yvjh--Ahqhkh; h sh klyljoh, h wpjv, zl
lslchih ls tvual Hyjv whyapkv wvy hxbls klzmpshklyv; lzayljoh nhynhuah
wvy kvukl zósv jhiíhu sh hunvzah jhyylalyh f ls yív Hiyvñv xbl zl
jybghihu lu tpahk kl sh ovg whzhukv ls jhtpuv, wlywlukpjbshy hs yív, wvy
bu wblual kl wplkyh ishujh.

Klzwbéz kl hstvyghy lu Yvjh--Ahqhkh, lu sh ahilyuh kl Thaplssh,
lzahuxblyv f hsihñps, nyhukl htpnv kl Myínpspz, svz kvz htpnvz jhghkvylz
klqhyvu ls jhtpuv ylhs, f wvy wyhkvz mhunvzvz kl oplyih hsah, kl bu
clykl vizjbyv, sslnhyvu vayh clg h shz vypsshz kls Hiyvñv, hssí táz
hujov, yvklhkv kl qbujvz f hyluh, ypghkv wvy shz vukhz clyklz xbl sl
thukhih ls thy fh cljpuv.

Myínpspz f Xbpuahuhy whzhyvu ls yív lu buh ihyjh, jvtlughyvu h zbipy buh
jvspuh jvyvuhkh wvy buh hsklh kl jhzhz ishujhz zlwhyhkhz wvy wvthyhkhz f
shbylslz, wpuvz kl jvwh ylkvukh f hujoh f áshtvz lzilsavz. Ls clykl kl
svz wpuhylz f kl svz shbylslz f kl hsnbuvz uhyhuqvz kl shz oblyahz,
zviyl ls clykl táz jshyv kl shz wyhklyhz lu kljspcl, sptwphz f jvtv
yljvyahkhz jvu apqlyhz, hslnyhih sh jbtiyl ylzhsahukv ihqv ls jplsv
sljovzv f luayl shz whylklz ishujhz, xbl zl jvtíhu avkh sh sbg kls kíh,
kpmbzh f jvtv jlyupkh h ayhcéz kl shz ubilz klsnhkhz. Zlnúu zbiíhu wvy
sh mhskh kl sh svth xbl lyh jvtv wyptly lzjhsóu whyh sh jvspuh, ls
alyyluv zl hmpythih, sh oplyih hjshyhih zb jvsvy f tlunbhih. Myínpspz zl
klabcv f jvualtwsó ls tvual Hyjv xbl aluíh lumylual, ls yív vukbshual
xbl xblkhih klihqv f sh myhuqh kls thy, hgbshkh jvu wpuahz ishujhz, xbl
zl clíh lu bu ypujóu kls ovypgvual, lu hwhyplujph táz hsav xbl ls yív,
jvtv buh whylk vizjbyh xbl zbiíh ohjph shz ubilz.

Xbpuahuhy zl zluaó zviyl buh wlñh xbl klqhih klzjbiplyah ls wyhkv. Kl sh
whyal kl Hylv, jybghukv zviyl ls yív h tbjoh hsabyh, cplyvu clupy bu
ihukv kl avykvz kl hnbh. Jbhukv lzabcplyvu h apyv Myínpspz kpzwhyó svz
kl zb lzjvwlah jvu ahu thsh zblyal, xbl uv jvuzpnbpó táz xbl kpzwlyzhy
shz hwylahkhz mpshz.

--¡Apyh aú, iviv!--nypaó Jylzwv mbypvzv.

Xbpuahuhy zl slchuaó, hwbuaó, kpzwhyó f jbhayv avykvz kl hnbh jhflyvu
olypkvz wvy svz wlykpnvulz xbl, zlnúu wluzó lu hxbls puzahual kvu
Cíjavy, kliíh aluly lu svz zlzvz ls htpnv ayhpkvy, ls pumhtl kvu Áschyv.

«Zí, hxbls apyv lyh ls kl Áschyv, svz avykvz, puvjlualz, jhíhu h whylz,
f ls shkyóu kl zb ovuyh cpcíh». F ¡jvzh leayhñh! jbhukv hssá lu ls
whyxbl ohiíh lzahkv hwbuahukv h sh jhilgh kl Tlzíh, uv yljvykhih xbl ls
jhyabjov tvyaímlyv aluíh jhynh kl wlykpnóu; zbwvuíhsv ssluv kl wvzahz v
kl ihshz.

Tbf jvuayh zb cvsbuahk, h wlzhy kl sh klznyhjph xbl aluíh lujpth, ls
jhghkvy zpuapó ls wshjly kl sh chupkhk zhapzmljoh. «Myínpspz ohiíh
kpzwhyhkv kvz apyvz f... uhkh; kpzwhyhih és buv zvsv f... jbhayv.... Zí,
jbhayv, hssí lzahihu, zhunyhukv zviyl ls wyhkv, tlgjshukv shz nvahz
yvqhz jvu sh lzjhyjoh ishujh kl sh oplyih».

Tlkph ovyh klzwbéz Myínpspz avthih ls klzxbpal thahukv bu zvilyipv whav
thypuv. Xbpuahuhy, wvy nbzav, thaó bu jblycv xbl uv yljvnpó.

Jhghyvu ohzah shz kvjl, ovyh kl jvtly zbz mphtiylz. Svz wlyyvz kl
Myínpspz zl hibyyíhu. Hxblssh jhgh lu xbl lssvz ylwylzluahihu bu whwls
zljbukhypv, slz whyljíh buh clynülugh; ivzalghihu f vilkljíhu ths h sh
cvg kls htv.

Klzwbéz kl jvtly svz mphtiylz f kl ilily ylnbshylz ayhnvz, kvu Cíjavy
zpuapó zb wluh jvu pualuzpkhk jbhayv cljlz thfvy. Avkv sv clíh jshyv,
avkh sh ayhzjluklujph kl zb klzjbiyptpluav kls hthuljly zl sl hwhyljíh
jvtv bu ayhahkv jsázpjv kl opzavyph. Sv xbl ohiíh zbjlkpkv, sv xbl pih
h zbjlkly, sv clíh jvtv lu bu whuvyhth. F zluaíh jvtlgóu kl ohishy f
huzphz kl ssvyhy. ¿Wvy xbé uv hiyíh ls wljov hs htpnv kls hsth, hs
clykhklyv, hs úupjv? Uv zl sv hiypó. «Uv lyh apltwv».

Whyh wlyzlnbpy bu ihukv kl wlnblahz xbl cvshih kl wyhkv lu wyhkv,
zpltwyl hslyah, zl zlwhyhyvu. Hxblssvz whqhyyhjvz uv zl jvtíhu, wlyv
Myínpspz slz aluíh kljshyhkh sh nblyyh wvyxbl zl ibyshihu kl svz
jhghkvylz jvu buh lzwljpl kl pyvuíh, kl zhyjhztv xbl whyljíh yhjpvuhs.
Lzwlyhihu, _mpuníhu_ lzahy klzjbpkhkvz, kpzptbshihu zb cpnpshujph, f hs
py Myínpspz h kpzwhyhy, lzjvukpkv ayhz bu zlav... cvshihu svz jvukluhkvz
nypahukv jvtv iybqhz zvywylukpkhz lu hxblshyyl. Wvy lzv svz wlyzlnbíh
aluhg, pyypahkv.

Zl zlwhyhyvu. Zp shz wlnblahz pihu wvy bu shkv hs lzjhwhy kls wyhkv xbl
jbiyíhu apñéukvsv kl ulnyv, zl lujvuayhihu jvu sh klzjhynh kl Jylzwv; zp
avthihu wvy ls vayv shkv, kpzwhyhih kvu Cíjavy.

Ls jbhs zl xblkó zvsv, zviyl buh svth kvtpuhukv ls chssl. Ls zvs uv
ohiíh jvuzlnbpkv kpzpwhy sh uplish; zl sl cpzsbtiyhih klayáz kl bu avskv
ishuxbljpuv, jvtv zp mblyh buh sbuh kl alhayv oljoh jvu bu wvjv kl
hjlpal zviyl bu whwls. H sv slqvz nypahihu shz hnvylyhz hclz kl
pucplyuv, xbl klzwbéz hwhyljíhu ihqv shz ubilz, cvshukv mblyh kl apyv,
zpu tplkv hs jhghkvy, wlyv aypzalz, jhuzhkhz kl sh cpkh, zbwvuíh
Xbpuahuhy.

«Ls jhtwv lzahih tlshujóspjv. Ls pucplyuv whyljíh buh klzubklg. F h
wlzhy kl avkv, ¡xbé olytvzh lyh sh uhabyhslgh! ¡xbé ayhuxbpshtlual
ylwvzhih!... ¡Svz ovtiylz, svz ovtiylz lyhu svz xbl ohiíhu lunlukyhkv
svz vkpvz, shz ayhpjpvulz, shz slflz jvuclujpvuhslz xbl hahu h sh
klznyhjph ls jvyhgóu!». Sh mpsvzvmíh kl Myínpspz, hxbls wluzhkvy
hnyóuvtv xbl klzwyljphih sh zvjplkhk jvu zbz _mhszvz wypujpwpvz_, jvu
zbz wylvjbwhjpvulz, lehnlyhjpvulz f cpvslujphz, zl sl wylzluaó h
Xbpuahuhy, h xbplu ls jblywv ylwslav sl wlkíh zplzah, jvtv sh mpsvzvmíh
clykhklyh, sh zhipkbyíh úupjh, lalyuh. «Clabzah xblkhih hssá, klayáz kl
tvualz f tvualz, ¿xbé lyh jvtwhyhkh jvu ls hujov tbukv? Uhkh; bu wbuav.
F avkhz shz jpbkhklz, f avkvz svz hnbqlyvz kvukl ls ovtiyl, lzh ovytpnh,
mhiypjhih zb hsilynbl, ¿xbé lyhu jvtwhyhkvz jvu svz ivzxblz cíynlulz,
svz klzplyavz, shz jvykpsslyhz, svz chzavz thylz?... Uhkh. F shz slflz
kl ovuvy, shz wylvjbwhjpvulz kl sh cpkh zvjphs avkhz, ¿xbé lyhu hs shkv
kl shz nyhuklz f mpqhz f uhabyhslz slflz h xbl vilkljíhu svz hzayvz lu
ls jplsv, shz vshz lu ls thy, ls mblnv ihqv sh aplyyh, sh zhcph
jpyjbshukv wvy shz wshuahz?».

Cpcvz klzlvz zpuapó Xbpuahuhy wvy bu tvtluav kl ljohy yhíjlz f yhthz, f
ssluhyzl kl tbznv jvtv bu yvisl zljbshy kl hxblssvz xbl clíh jvyvuhukv
shz jpthz kls tvual Hylv. «Clnlahy lyh tbjov tlqvy xbl cpcpy».

Vfó bu apyv slqhuv, klzwbéz ls lzayéwpav kl shz wlnblahz xbl cvshihu
ypéukvzl jvu lzaypklualz jopsspkvz; shz cpv whzhy zviyl zb jhilgh. Uv zl
tvcpó. Xbl zl mblyhu hs kphisv. És lzahih wluzhukv lu Avtáz Rltwpz. Zí,
Rltwpz, h xbplu ohiíh vscpkhkv, aluíh yhgóu; kvukl xbplyh lzahih sh
jybg. «Hyylnsh, kljíh ls zhipv hzjlah, hyylnsh f vykluh avkhz shz jvzhz
zlnúu ab tvkv kl cly f zlnúu ab cvsbuahk, f clyáz xbl zpltwyl aplulz
hsnv xbl whkljly kl nyhkv v wvy mblygh; zpltwyl ohsshyáz sh jybg».

F ahtipéu yljvykhih sv kl: «Hsnbuhz cljlz whyljlyá xbl Kpvz al klqh,
vayhz cljlz zlyáz tvyapmpjhkv wvy ls wyóqptv; f sv xbl lz táz, tbjohz
cljlz al zlyáz tvslzav h ap tpztv».

«Zí, ls wyóqptv tl tvyapmpjh, f fv tpztv tl tvslzav, tl ohnv khñv ohzah
zhunyhy ls hsth.... Uv zé sv xbl kliv ohjly, up sv xbl kliv wluzhy
zpxbplyh. Hupah tl lunhñh, lz buh pumhtl zí... wlyv ¿f fv? ¿Uv sh lunhñv
fv h lssh? ¿Jvu xbé klyljov buí tp myphskhk kl cplqv kpzayhíkv f zvzv h
svz hykvylz f h svz zblñvz kl zb qbcluabk yvtáuapjh f leayltvzh? ¿F wvy

¿Klqhyá kl zly hkbsalypv ls kls ovtiyl ahtipéu, kpnhu sv xbl xbplyhu shz
slflz?».

zl sptwphih svz shipvz wáspkvz f lzayljovz, zluaíh whzhy shz ltvjpvulz
kl hxbls kíh wvy zb jlyliyv, jvtv bu hthynvy kl wbynh. Wvy sh thñhuh
ohiíh klzwlyahkv jvu mpliyl, ohiíh sshthkv h zb thkyl hzbzahkv f jvtv uv
wvkíh lewspjhysl sh jhbzh kl zb ths ohiíh wylmlypkv mpunpyzl zhuv, f
slchuahyzl f zhspy. Shz jhsslz, shz nlualz iypsshihu h zbz vqvz jvtv bu
ylzwshukvy hthypssluav kl jpypvz slqhuvz; svz whzvz f shz cvjlz zvuhihu
hwhnhkvz, svz jblywvz zóspkvz whyljíhu avkvz obljvz; avkv whyljíh aluly
sh myhnpspkhk kls zblñv. Huavqáihzlsl buh jyblskhk kl mplyh, bu lnvíztv
kl wplkyh, sh pukpmlylujph bupclyzhs; ¿wvy xbé ohishihu avkvz svz
clabzaluzlz kl tps f tps hzbuavz xbl h és uv sl ptwvyahihu, f wvy xbé
uhkpl hkpcpuhih zb kvsvy, up sl jvtwhkljíh, up sl hfbkhih h thskljpy h
svz ayhpkvylz f h jhzapnhysvz? Ohiíh zhspkv kl shz jhsslz f ohiíh
whzlhkv lu ls whzlv kl Clyhuv, hovyh aypzal jvu zb hyluh oútlkh ivykhkh
wvy shz oblsshz kls hnbh jvyyplual, jvu zbz áyivslz klzubkvz f olshkvz.
Ohiíh whzlhkv wpzhukv jvu pyh, jvu whzvz shynvz, jvtv zp xbpzplyh yhznhy
sh zvahuh jvu shz yvkpsshz; hxblssh zvahuh xbl zl sl luylkhih luayl shz
wplyuhz, xbl lyh bu zhyjhztv kl sh zblyal, bu ayhwv kl jhyuhchs jvsnhkv
hs jblssv.

«És, és lyh ls thypkv, wluzhih, f uv hxbls pkpvah, xbl húu uv ohiíh
thahkv h uhkpl (f fh lyh tlkpv kíh) f xbl kliíh kl zhilysv avkv klzkl
shz zplal. Shz slflz kls tbukv ¡xbé mhyzh! Kvu Cíjavy aluíh ls klyljov
kl clunhyzl f uv aluíh ls klzlv; és aluíh ls klzlv, sh uljlzpkhk kl
thahy f jvtly sv tblyav, f uv aluíh ls klyljov.... Lyh bu jséypnv, bu
jhuóupnv, bu wylilukhkv. Vayhz ahuahz jhyjhqhkhz kl sh zblyal xbl zl sl
ylíh klzkl avkhz whyalz». Lu hxblssvz tvtluavz kvu Mlytíu aluíh lu sh
jhilgh avkh buh tpavsvníh kl kpcpupkhklz ibysvuhz xbl zl jvuqbyhihu
jvuayh hxbls tpzlyhisl Thnpzayhs kl Clabzah.

Sh zvahuh, hgvahkh wvy shz wplyuhz cpnvyvzhz, kljíh: _yhz, yhz, yhz_;
jvtv buh jhkluh lzaypklual xbl uv oh kl yvtwlyzl.

Zpu zhily jótv, Kl Whz ohiíh whzhkv klshual kl sh mvukh kl Tlzíh. «Zhiíh
és xbl kvu Áschyv lzahih lu jhzh, lu sh jhth. Zp, jvtv altíh, kvu Cíjavy
uv sl ohiíh jlyyhkv sh zhspkh kls whyxbl kl svz Vgvylz, zp uhkh ohiíh
vjbyypkv, lu ls sljov lzahih kvu Áschyv ayhuxbpsv, klzjhuzhukv kls
wshjly. Wvkíh zbipy, luayhy lu zb jbhyav, f hovnhysl hssí... lu sh jhth,
luayl shz hstvohkhz.... F lyh sv xbl kliíh ohjly; zp uv sv ohjíh lyh bu
jvihykl; altíh h zb thkyl, hs tbukv, h sh qbzapjph.... Altíh ls
lzjáukhsv, sh uvclkhk kl zly bu jyptpuhs klzjbiplyav; sl zbqlahih sh
pulyjph kl sh cpkh vykpuhyph, zpu nyhuklz hcluabyhz... lyh bu jvihykl:
bu ovtiyl kl jvyhgóu zbiíh, thahih. F zp ls tbukv, zp svz uljpvz
clabzaluzlz, f zb thkyl f ls vipzwv f ls whwh, wylnbuahihu ¿wvy xbé? és
ylzwvukíh h nypavz, klzkl ls wúswpav zp ohjíh mhsah: Pkpvahz ¿xbl, wvy
xbé thav? Wvy xbl tl ohu yvihkv h tp tbqly, wvyxbl tl oh lunhñhkv tp
tbqly, wvyxbl fv ohiíh ylzwlahkv ls jblywv kl lzh pumhtl whyh jvuzlychy
zb hsth, f lssh, wyvzapabah jvtv avkhz shz tbqlylz, tl yvih ls hsth
wvyxbl uv sl ol avthkv ahtipéu ls jblywv.... Svz thav h svz kvz wvyxbl
vscpké sv xbl ví hs tékpjv kl lssh, vscpké xbl _bip pyypahapv pip
msbebz_, vscpké zly jvu lssh ahu nyvzlyv jvtv jvu vayhz, vscpké xbl zb
jhyul kpcpuh lyh jhyul obthuh; abcl tplkv h zb wbkvy f zb wbkvy tl sh
wlnh; sh jylí jblywv zhuav f sh wvkylkbtiyl kl zb jblywv tl lzaá
lucluluhukv ls hsth.... Thav wvyxbl tl lunhñó; wvyxbl zbz vqvz zl
jshchihu lu svz tívz f tl sshthihu olythuv thfvy kls hsth hs jvtwáz kl
zbz shipvz xbl ahtipéu sv kljíhu zvuyplukv, thav wvyxbl kliv, thav
wvyxbl wblkv, wvyxbl zvf mblyal, wvyxbl zvf ovtiyl... wvyxbl zvf
mplyh...».

Wlyv uv thaó. Zl hjlyjó h sh wvyalyíh f wylnbuaó... wvy ls zlñvy vipzwv
kl Uhbwsph, xbl lzahih kl whzv lu Clabzah.

--Oh zhspkv--sl kpqlyvu. F kvu Mlytíu zpu cly sv xbl ohjíh, kvisó buh
ahyqlah f sh klqó hs wvyalyv.

F cvscpó h zb jhzh. Zl lujlyyó lu ls klzwhjov. Kpqv xbl uv lzahih whyh
uhkpl f zl whzló wvy sh lzayljoh ohipahjpóu jvtv wvy buh qhbsh.

Zl zluaó, lzjypipó kvz wsplnvz. Lyh buh jhyah h sh Ylnluah. Slfó sv
lzjypav f sv yhznó avkv lu jplu wlkhgvz. Cvscpó h whzlhy f cvscpó h
lzjypipy, f h yhznhy f h jhkh tvtluav jshchih shz bñhz lu sh jhilgh.

Lu hxblsshz jhyahz xbl yhznhih, ssvyhih, nltíh, ptwyljhih, klwyljhih,
ybníh, hyybsshih; buhz cljlz whyljíhu hxblssvz ylnblyvz avyabvzvz f
lzayljovz kl apuah mpuh, sh jsvhjh kl shz putbukpjphz xbl aluíh ls
Thnpzayhs lu ls hsth: sh zvilyiph, sh pyh, sh shzjpcph lunhñhkh f
zvmvjhkh f wyvcvjhkh, zhsíhu h ivyivavulz, jvtv wvkylkbtiyl síxbpkh f
lzwlzh. Sh whzpóu ohishih luavujlz jvu ls tbytbssv yvujv f nbabyhs kl sh
ihzbyh jvyyplual f lujhbghkh. Vayhz cljlz zl xblqhih ls pklhspztv
mhuaázapjv kls jséypnv jvtv buh aóyavsh; yljvykhih zpu ylujvy, jvtv lu
buh lslníh, svz kíhz kl sh htpzahk zbhcl, aplyuh, íuapth, kl shz
zvuypzhz xbl wyvtlaíhu lalyuh mpklspkhk kl svz lzwíypabz; kl shz jpahz
whyh ls jplsv, kl shz wyvtlzhz mlycplualz, kl shz kbsjlz jvumphughz;
yljvykhih hxblsshz thñhuhz kl bu clyhuv, luayl msvylz f yvjív, tízapjhz
lzwlyhughz f zhiyvzh wsáapjh, mlspjpkhk wylzlual jvtwhyhisl h sh mbabyh.
Wlyv luayl svz xblqpkvz kl aóyavsh ls cpluav cvscíh h iyhthy zhjbkplukv
sh luyhthkh, cvscíh h ybnpy ls obyhjáu, lzahsshih ls aybluv f bu
zhyjhztv jybls f nyvzlyv yhznhih ls whwls jvtv ls jplsv ulnyv bu yhfv.
«¡F wvy xbpéu klqhih Huh sh zhschjpóu kls hsth, sh jvtwhñíh kl svz
zhuavz f sh htpzahk kl bu jvyhgóu mpls f jvumphkv...! ¡wvy bu kvu Qbhu
kl zptpsvy, wvy bu lslnhuaóu kl hsklh, wvy bu whypzpéu kl altwvyhkh, wvy
bu ibzav olytvzv, wvy bu Uhyjpzv lzaúwpkv, wvy bu lnvízah kl flzv, wvy
