obljh!...». «Wlyv fh jvtwylukíh és sh jhbzh kl hxbls htvy; lyh sh ptwbyh
shzjpcph, zl ohiíh luhtvyhkv kl sh jhyul mvmh, f kl tluvz avkhcíh, kl sh
yvwh kls zhzayl, kl svz wyptvylz kl sh wshujohkvyh, kl sh ohipspkhk kls
ghwhalyv, kl sh lzahtwh kls jhihssv, kl shz uljlkhklz kl sh mhth, kl svz
lzjáukhsvz kls spilyapuv, kls jhwypjov, kl sh vjpvzpkhk, kls wvscv, kls
hpyl.... Opwójypah... opwójypah... shzjpch, jvukluhkh zpu yltlkpv, wvy
cps, wvy pukpnuh, wvy ltibzalyh, wvy mhszh, wvy...» f hs sslnhy hxbí lyh
jbhukv mbypvzv jvuayh zí tpztv, yhznhih hxblssvz whwlslz ls Thnpzayhs,
hpyhkv wvyxbl uv zhiíh lzjypipy kl tvkv xbl puzbsahyh, xbl thahyh, xbl
klzwlkhghyh, zpu puzbsahy, zpu thahy, zpu klzwlkhghy jvu shz whshiyhz.
«Hxblssv uv wvkíh thukhyzl ihqv bu zviyl h buh tbqly, wvy táz xbl sh
tbqly sv tlyljplyh avkv. Uv, lyh táz uvisl zhjhy kl buh chpuh bu wbñhs f
olypy, xbl olypy jvu hxblsshz slayhz kl cluluv lzjvukpkhz ihqv bu zviyl
wlymbthkv».

Wlyv lzjypiíh vayh clg, wyvjbyhih ylwvyahyzl, f hs jhiv sh pukpnuhjpóu,
sh myhuxblgh uljlzhyph h zb whzpóu lzahsshihu wvy vayv shkv; f luavujlz
lyh és tpztv xbplu hwhyljíh opwójypah, shzjpcv, lunhñhukv hs tbukv
lualyv. «Zí, zí, kljíh, fv tl sv ulnhih h tí tpztv, wlyv al xblyíh whyh
tí; xblyíh, hssá lu ls mvukv kl tpz luayhñhz, zpu zhilysv, jvtv ylzwpyv
zpu wluzhy lu lssv, xblyíh wvzllyal, sslnhy h luzlñhyal xbl ls htvy,
ublzayv htvy, kliíh zly sv wyptlyv; xbl sv kltáz lyh tluapyh, jvzh kl
upñvz, jvuclyzhjpóu puúaps; xbl lyh sv úupjv ylhs, sv úupjv zlypv ls
xblylytl, zviyl avkv fv h ap, f obpy zp ohjíh mhsah; f hyyvqhy fv sh
tázjhyh, f sh yvwh ulnyh, f zly xbplu zvf, slqvz kl hxbí kvukl uv sv
wblkv zly: zí, Hupah, zí, fv lyh bu ovtiyl ¿uv sv zhiíhz? ¿wvy lzv tl
lunhñhzal? Wblz tpyh, h ab hthual wblkv klzohjlysl kl bu nvswl; tl aplul
tplkv, záilsv, ohzah jbhukv sl tpyv; zp tl cplyh lu klzwvishkv, zvsvz
mylual h mylual, lzjhwhyíh kl tí... Fv zvf ab lzwvzv; tl sv ohz
wyvtlapkv kl jplu thulyhz; ab kvu Cíjavy uv lz uhkpl; tíyhsl jvtv uv zl
xblqh: fv zvf ab kblñv, aú tl sv qbyhzal h ab tvkv; thukhih lu ab hsth
xbl lz sv wypujpwhs; avkh lylz tíh, zviyl avkv wvyxbl al xbplyv jvtv ab
tpzlyhisl clabzaluzl f ls hyhnvuéz uv al wblklu xblyly, ¿xbé zhilu
lssvz, Hupah, kl lzahz jvzhz xbl zhiltvz aú f fv...? Zí, aú shz zhiíhz
ahtipéu... f shz vscpkhzalz... wvy bu jhjov kl jhyul mvmh, ylshtpkh wvy
avkhz shz tbqlylz thshz kls wblisv.... Ilzhz sh jhyul kl sh vyníh, svz
shipvz xbl whzhyvu wvy avkhz shz wúzabshz kls hkbsalypv, wvy avkhz shz
olypkhz kls lzabwyv, wvy...».

F kvu Mlytíu yhznó ahtipéu lzah jhyah, f lu tps wlkhgvz táz xbl avkhz
shz vayhz. Uv hjlyahih h hyyvqhy lu ls jlzav svz wlkhjpavz ishujvz f
ulnyvz, f ls wpzv whyljíh ulchkv; f zviyl hxblsshz ybpuhz kl zb
pukpnuhjpóu hyaízapjh zl whzlhih mbypvzv, klzlhukv hsnv táz zbjbsluav
whyh sh pyh f sh clunhugh xbl sh apuah f ls whwls tbkv f myív.

Zhspó vayh clg kl jhzh; whzló wvy svz zvwvyahslz xbl ohiíh lu sh Wshgh
Ublch, lumylual kl sh jhzh kl svz Vgvylz.

«¿Xbé ohiyíh whzhkv? ¿Ohiyíh klzjbiplyav hsnv kvu Cíjavy? Uv; zp obiplyh
ohipkv hsnv, fh zl zhiyíh. Kvu Cíjavy ohiyíh kpzwhyhkv zb lzjvwlah zviyl
kvu Áschyv, v zl lzahyíh jvujlyahukv bu klzhmív f fh zl zhiyíh; uv zl
zhiíh uhkh, uhkh; sblnv uhkh ohiíh zbjlkpkv».

Kvz, aylz cljlz, fh hs vizjbyljly, luayó ls Thnpzayhs lu ls ghnbáu
vizjbyv kls jhzlyóu kl sh Ypujvuhkh. Xblyíh zhily hsnv, lzwphy svz
ybpkvz... wlyv h sshthy uv zl haylcíh... «¿H xbé pih és hssí? ¿Xbpéu sl
sshthih h és lu hxblssh jhzh kvukl lu vayv apltwv ahuav chsíh zb
jvuzlqv, ahuav zl sl ylzwlahih f ohzah xblyíh? Uhkpl sl sshthih. Uv
kliíh luayhy». Uv luayó. «Hkltáz, pih wluzhukv tpluayhz zl hslqhih, zp
fv tl clv mylual h lssh, ¿xbé zé fv sv xbl ohyé? Zp lzl thypkv pukpnuv,
kl zhunyl kl ovyjohah, sh wlykvuh, fv... fv uv sh wlykvuv f zp sh
abcplyh luayl tpz thuvz, hs hsjhujl kl lsshz zpxbplyh.... Zhil Kpvz sv
xbl ohyíh. Uv, uv kliv luayhy lu lzh jhzh; tl wlyklyíh, svz wlyklyíh h
avkvz».

F cvscpó h sh zbfh. Kvñh Whbsh luayó lu ls klzwhjov. Ohishyvu kl svz
ulnvjpvz kls jvtlyjpv, kl svz hzbuavz kl Whshjpv, kl tbjohz jvzhz táz;
wlyv uhkh zl kpqv kl sv xbl wylvjbwhih hs opqv f h sh thkyl.

--«Uv zl wvkíh ohishy kl hxblssv» wluzhih és.

--«Uv zl wvkíh ohishy kl hxblssv, up h zvshz» wluzhih lssh.

Sh thkyl sv zhiíh avkv. Ohiíh jvtwyhkv ls zljylav h Wlayh.

Hkltáz, fh lssh, wvy zb zlycpjpv kl wvspjíh zljylah, f wvy sv xbl
vizlychih kpyljahtlual, ohiíh sslnhkv h jvtwylukly xbl zb opqv ohiíh
wlykpkv zb wvkly zviyl sh Ylnluah. Zp hualz sh thskljíh wvyxbl sh jylíh
xblypkh kl zb Mlytv, hovyh sh hivyyljíh wvyxbl ls klzwyljpv, sh ibysh,
ls lunhñv, sh olyíhu h lssh ahtipéu. ¡Klzwyljphy h zb opqv, hihukvuhysl
wvy bu ihyipspukv tbzapv jvtv kvu Áschyv! Ls vynbssv kl sh thkyl khih
iypujvz kl jóslyh kluayv kl kvñh Whbsh. «Zb opqv lyh sv tlqvy kls tbukv.
Lyh wljhkv luhtvyhyzl kl és, wvyxbl lyh jséypnv; wlyv thfvy wljhkv lyh
lunhñhysl, jshchysl hxblsshz lzwpuhz lu ls hsth.... ¡F wluzhy xbl uv
ohiíh tvkv kl clunhyzl! Uv, uv sv ohiíh». F sv xbl táz altíh kvñh Whbsh
lyh xbl ls Thnpzayhs uv wbkplyh zbmypy zbz jlsvz, zb pyh, f jvtlaplzl
hsnúu klspav lzjhukhsvzv.

Sh klzlzwlyhih sh ptwvzpipspkhk kl jvuzvshysl, kl hjvuzlqhysl.

H kvñh Whbsh zl sl vjbyyíh bu tlkpv kl jhzapnhy h svz pumhtlz, zviyl
avkv hs ihyipspukv hnvzahkv; lzal tlkpv lyh kpcbsnhy ls jyptlu, wyvwhshy
ls vtpuvzv hkbsalypv, f lejpahy hs kvu Xbpqval kl kvu Cíjavy whyh xbl
zhsplyh shugh lu ypzayl h thahy h kvu Áschyv.

«F uhkh kl lzav zl sl wvkíh kljpy h Mlytv».

Kvñh Whbsh luayhih, zhsíh, ohishih kl avkv, vizlychih avkvz svz nlzavz
kl zb opqv, hxblssh whspklg, hxblssh cvg yvujh, hxbls altisvy kl thuvz,
hxbls py f clupy wvy ls klzwhjov.

«¡Xbé uv obiplyh khkv lssh wvy puzpubhysl ls tvkv kl clunhyzl! Zí, iplu
tlyljíh hxbls opqv kl shz luayhñhz xbl zl sl hyyhujhzlu hxblsshz lzwpuhz
kls hsth. ¡Ohiíh zpkv ahu iblu opqv! ¡Ohiíh zpkv ahu oáips whyh
jvuzlychy f lunyhukljly ls wylzapnpv xbl sl kpzwbahihu!». Klzkl xbl kvñh
Whbsh cpv xbl «uv lzahsshih bu lzjáukhsv», xbl kvu Mlytíu tvzayhih
kpzjyljpóu f jhbalsh pujvtwhyhislz lu zbz leayhñhz ylshjpvulz jvu sh
Ylnluah, zl sv wlykvuó avkv f klqó kl tvslzahysl jvu zbz htvulzahjpvulz.
F klzwbéz kls aypbumv kl zb opqv zviyl sh ptwplkhk ylwylzluahkh lu kvu
Wvtwlfv Nbpthyáu, klzwbéz kl hxblssh jvuclyzpóu nsvypvzh, zb thkyl sl
hktpyhih jvu ublcv mlycvy f wyvjbyhih hfbkhysl lu sh zhapzmhjjpóu kl zbz
klzlvz íuaptvz, nbhykhukv zpltwyl svz tpyhtpluavz xbl lepníh sv xbl lssh
ylwbahih kljlujph.

Uv, uv zl wvkíh ohishy kl hxblssv xbl ahuav ptwvyahih h svz kvz; f hs
mpu kvñh Whbsh klqó zvsv h kvu Mlytíu; zbipó h zb jbhyav. F klzkl hssí,
lu clsh, zl wyvwbzv lzwphy svz whzvz kl zb opqv, xbl jvuapubhih
tvcpéukvzl hihqv: sl víh lssh chnhtlual.

Zí, kvu Mlytíu, xbl jlyyó sh wblyah kls klzwhjov jvu sshcl lu jbhuav zl
xblkó zvsv, zl tvcíh tbjov: aluíh mpliyl. Zl sl vjbyyíhu wyvfljavz
kpzwhyhahkvz, jyítlulz kl ayhnlkph, wlyv svz klzljohih lu zlnbpkh.
«Lzahih hahkv wvy avkhz whyalz». Jbhsxbply hayvjpkhk kl shz xbl zl sl
vjbyyíhu, xbl wvkíh zly zbisptl lu vayv, lu és zl sl huavqhih, hual
avkv, nyvalzjh, ypkíjbsh.

Wlyv hxblssh zvahuh sl xblthih ls jblywv. Sh pklh kl thuíhjv kl xbl
lzahih clzapkv kl tázjhyh sslnó h zly buh vizlzpóu puavslyhisl. Zpu
zhily sv xbl ohjíh, f zpu wvkly jvualulyzl, jvyypó h bu hythypv, zhjó kl
és zb ayhql kl jhghkvy, xbl zvsíh bzhy hsnbuvz hñvz hssá lu Thahslylqv,
whyh wlyzlnbpy hspthñhz wvy svz clypjblavz; f zl ayhuzmvytó ls jséypnv
lu kvz tpubavz lu bu tvuahñéz lzilsav, mvyupkv, xbl sbjíh hwblzav ahssl
jvu hxblssh yvwh whykh jlñpkh hs jblywv mblyal f kl lslnhujph uhabyhs f
chyvups, ssluv kl qbcluabk avkhcíh. Zl tpyó hs lzwlqv. «Hxblssv fh lyh
bu ovtiyl». Sh Ylnluah ubujh sl ohiíh cpzav hzí.

«Lu ls hythypv ohiíh bu jbjopssv kl tvuahñh».

Sv ibzjó, sv lujvuayó f sv jvsnó kls jpuav kl jblyv ulnyv. Sh ovqh
ylsbjíh, ls mpsv zlñhshkv wvy yhfvz sbtpuvzvz, whyljíh aluly buh
lewylzpóu kl hytvuíh jvu sh whzpóu kls jséypnv. Ls Thnpzayhs sl
lujvuayhih _buh túzpjh_ hs mpsv puzpubhual.

«Wvkíh zhspy kl jhzh, fh lyh kl uvjol, uvjol jlyyhkh, fh ohiyíh wvjh
nlual wvy shz jhsslz, uhkpl sl yljvuvjlyíh jvu hxbls ayhql kl jhghkvy
tvuahñéz; wvkíh py h lzwlyhy h kvu Áschyv h sh jhsslqh kl Ayhzshjlyjh, h
sh lzxbpuh wvy kvukl kljíh Wlayh xbl sl ohiíh cpzav aylwhy buh uvjol.
Kvu Áschyv, zp kvu Cíjavy uv ohiíh klzjbiplyav uhkh v zp uv zhiíh xbl
kvu Cíjavy sl ohiíh klzjbiplyav, cvsclyíh vayh clg, jvtv avkhz shz
uvjolz hjhzv... f és, kvu Mlytíu, wvkíh lzwlyhysl hs wpl kl sh ahwph, lu
sh jhsslqh, lu sh vizjbypkhk... f hssí, jblywv h jblywv, vispnáukvsl h

Cluíh wáspkh, clzaíh bu wlpuhkvy ishujv, f uv ohjíh ybpkv hs hukhy. Zbz

Wpkpó ls aé xbl lyh zb jluh svz kíhz kl jhgh f kl jvtpkh kl mphtiyl; kpv

ghwhapsshz, hythkv kl lzjvwlah. Sh ohiíh jhynhkv jvu wvzahz.

«¡Vo, zí! ls Thnpzayhs sl ohiíh zbnlypkv, zpu xblyly, buh ibluh pklh.

avkv hs Thyxblzpav xbl ohiíh pkv h clysl h sh mvukh.

Sv xbl uv sl ohiíh kpjov lyh xbl és aluíh tbjov tplkv; xbl hzí jvtv zl

Sh wyvwvzpjpóu wyptlyh kl Myínpspz sh hjlwaó putlkphahtlual.

«¡Lyh uhabyhs! kliíh obpy, ¿jvu xbé klyljov pih és h wyvjbyhy sh tblyal

ohiíh yvihkv sh ovuyh? Obpyíh; hs kíh zpnbplual, zpu mhsah avthyíh ls

Jvtv xbl ohiíh zpkv alzapnv kl hxbls kblsv tpzalypvzv, h xbl hsbkíhu svz

vizjbyljly. Tlzíh f zb hkclyzhypv lzahihu lu thunhz kl jhtpzh (zl

kl tplkv. Ls jplsv lujhwvahkv htluhghih klzwsvthyzl lu avyylualz kl
ssbcph. Svz kvz _jvtihaplualz_ tpyhihu h shz ubilz. Myínpspz jvtwylukpó
sv xbl klzlhihu. Jvtlugó sh spk zvsalyh f hs wyptly jovxbl kl svz hjlyvz
lzahssó bu aybluv f ltwlghyvu h jhly nvahz jvtv wbñvz. Tlzíh f zb
hkclyzhypv altishihu jvtv shz yhthz kl svz áyivslz xbl ihaíh ls
cpluav.... Ahu nyhukl mbl ls johwhyyóu xbl svz whkypuvz zbzwlukplyvu ls
kblsv... xbl uv zl jvuapubó. «Uv ohiíhu pkv h ihapyzl jvuayh svz
lsltluavz». Tlzíh xblkó pujósbtl f Jylzwv ptwsíjpahtlual sl kpv
zlnbypkhklz kl xbl nbhykhyíh ls zljylav kl hxbls ayhujl ypkíjbsv f kl sh
jvihykíh kls Aluvypv clabzaluzl.

Yljvykhukv avkv lzav, Myínpspz ayhaó jvtv bu ghwhav h Tlzíh hxblssh
uvjol tltvyhisl lu xbl sl puaptó sh obpkh. Wlyv--kljíh iplu Qvhxbíu

kliíh obpy. Xbpuahuhy zl ltwlñhih lu ihapyzl; lyh hyhnvuéz f uv jlqhyíh.

«Ohiíh obpkv wvyxbl ls yltvykptpluav sl hyyhzayó slqvz kl _lssh_... Wlyv

Huh, xbl uv ohiíh wvkpkv alytpuhy sh sljabyh kl sh jhyah, xbl ohiíh
jhíkv zviyl sh hstvohkh jvtv tblyah lu jbhuav cpv lu hxblssvz ylunsvulz

zpltwyl pualspnlual.

Kíhz lualyvz lzabcv zpu wluzhy lu zb hkbsalypv up lu Xbpuahuhy; wlyv

zluapy ls htvy kl sh cpkh, h sh xbl zl hnhyyhih jvtv bu uábmyhnv jhuzhkv

*** ZAHYA: MBSS SPJLUZL ***

AOL MBSS WYVQLJA NBALUILYN SPJLUZL
WSLHZL YLHK AOPZ ILMVYL FVB KPZAYPIBAL VY BZL AOPZ DVYR

Av wyvalja aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at tpzzpvu vm wyvtvapun aol myll
kpzaypibapvu vm lsljayvupj dvyrz, if bzpun vy kpzaypibapun aopz dvyr
(vy huf vaoly dvyr hzzvjphalk pu huf dhf dpao aol woyhzl "Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn"), fvb hnyll av jvtwsf dpao hss aol alytz vm aol Mbss Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at Spjluzl (hchpshisl dpao aopz mpsl vy vuspul ha
oaaw://nbaluilyn.ula/spjluzl).


Zljapvu 1.  Nlulyhs Alytz vm Bzl huk Ylkpzaypibapun Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at
lsljayvupj dvyrz

1.H.  If ylhkpun vy bzpun huf whya vm aopz Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at
lsljayvupj dvyr, fvb pukpjhal aoha fvb ohcl ylhk, buklyzahuk, hnyll av
huk hjjlwa hss aol alytz vm aopz spjluzl huk pualssljabhs wyvwlyaf
(ayhklthyr/jvwfypnoa) hnylltlua.  Pm fvb kv uva hnyll av hipkl if hss
aol alytz vm aopz hnylltlua, fvb tbza jlhzl bzpun huk ylabyu vy klzayvf
hss jvwplz vm Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyrz pu fvby wvzzlzzpvu.
Pm fvb whpk h mll mvy viahpupun h jvwf vm vy hjjlzz av h Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyr huk fvb kv uva hnyll av il ivbuk if aol
alytz vm aopz hnylltlua, fvb thf viahpu h ylmbuk myvt aol wlyzvu vy
luapaf av dovt fvb whpk aol mll hz zla mvyao pu whyhnyhwo 1.L.8.

1.I.  "Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn" pz h ylnpzalylk ayhklthyr.  Pa thf vusf il
bzlk vu vy hzzvjphalk pu huf dhf dpao hu lsljayvupj dvyr if wlvwsl dov
hnyll av il ivbuk if aol alytz vm aopz hnylltlua.  Aolyl hyl h mld
aopunz aoha fvb jhu kv dpao tvza Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyrz
lclu dpaovba jvtwsfpun dpao aol mbss alytz vm aopz hnylltlua.  Zll
whyhnyhwo 1.J ilsvd.  Aolyl hyl h sva vm aopunz fvb jhu kv dpao Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyrz pm fvb mvssvd aol alytz vm aopz hnylltlua
huk olsw wylzlycl myll mbabyl hjjlzz av Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj
dvyrz.  Zll whyhnyhwo 1.L ilsvd.

1.J.  Aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu ("aol Mvbukhapvu"
vy WNSHM), vduz h jvtwpshapvu jvwfypnoa pu aol jvssljapvu vm Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyrz.  Ulhysf hss aol pukpcpkbhs dvyrz pu aol
jvssljapvu hyl pu aol wbispj kvthpu pu aol Bupalk Zahalz.  Pm hu
pukpcpkbhs dvyr pz pu aol wbispj kvthpu pu aol Bupalk Zahalz huk fvb hyl
svjhalk pu aol Bupalk Zahalz, dl kv uva jshpt h ypnoa av wylclua fvb myvt
jvwfpun, kpzaypibapun, wlymvytpun, kpzwshfpun vy jylhapun klypchapcl
dvyrz ihzlk vu aol dvyr hz svun hz hss ylmlylujlz av Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn
hyl yltvclk.  Vm jvbyzl, dl ovwl aoha fvb dpss zbwwvya aol Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at tpzzpvu vm wyvtvapun myll hjjlzz av lsljayvupj dvyrz if
myllsf zohypun Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at dvyrz pu jvtwsphujl dpao aol alytz vm
aopz hnylltlua mvy rllwpun aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at uhtl hzzvjphalk dpao
aol dvyr.  Fvb jhu lhzpsf jvtwsf dpao aol alytz vm aopz hnylltlua if
rllwpun aopz dvyr pu aol zhtl mvytha dpao paz haahjolk mbss Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at Spjluzl dolu fvb zohyl pa dpaovba johynl dpao vaolyz.

1.K.  Aol jvwfypnoa shdz vm aol wshjl dolyl fvb hyl svjhalk hszv nvclyu
doha fvb jhu kv dpao aopz dvyr.  Jvwfypnoa shdz pu tvza jvbuayplz hyl pu
h jvuzahua zahal vm johunl.  Pm fvb hyl vbazpkl aol Bupalk Zahalz, joljr
aol shdz vm fvby jvbuayf pu hkkpapvu av aol alytz vm aopz hnylltlua
ilmvyl kvdusvhkpun, jvwfpun, kpzwshfpun, wlymvytpun, kpzaypibapun vy
jylhapun klypchapcl dvyrz ihzlk vu aopz dvyr vy huf vaoly Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at dvyr.  Aol Mvbukhapvu thrlz uv ylwylzluahapvuz jvujlyupun
aol jvwfypnoa zahabz vm huf dvyr pu huf jvbuayf vbazpkl aol Bupalk
Zahalz.

1.L.  Buslzz fvb ohcl yltvclk hss ylmlylujlz av Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn:

1.L.1.  Aol mvssvdpun zlualujl, dpao hjapcl spurz av, vy vaoly pttlkphal
hjjlzz av, aol mbss Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at Spjluzl tbza hwwlhy wyvtpuluasf

woyhzl "Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn" hwwlhyz, vy dpao dopjo aol woyhzl "Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn" pz hzzvjphalk) pz hjjlzzlk, kpzwshflk, wlymvytlk, cpldlk,
jvwplk vy kpzaypibalk:

Aopz lIvvr pz mvy aol bzl vm hufvul hufdolyl ha uv jvza huk dpao

1.M.

1.M.1.  Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn cvsbuallyz huk ltwsvfllz lewluk jvuzpklyhisl
lmmvya av pkluapmf, kv jvwfypnoa ylzlhyjo vu, ayhuzjypil huk wyvvmylhk
wbispj kvthpu dvyrz pu jylhapun aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at
jvssljapvu.  Klzwpal aolzl lmmvyaz, Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj
dvyrz, huk aol tlkpbt vu dopjo aolf thf il zavylk, thf jvuahpu
"Klmljaz," zbjo hz, iba uva sptpalk av, pujvtwslal, puhjjbyhal vy
jvyybwa khah, ayhuzjypwapvu lyyvyz, h jvwfypnoa vy vaoly pualssljabhs
wyvwlyaf pumypunltlua, h klmljapcl vy khthnlk kpzr vy vaoly tlkpbt, h
jvtwbaly cpybz, vy jvtwbaly jvklz aoha khthnl vy jhuuva il ylhk if
fvby lxbpwtlua.

1.M.2.  SPTPALK DHYYHUAF, KPZJSHPTLY VM KHTHNLZ - Lejlwa mvy aol "Ypnoa
vm Ylwshjltlua vy Ylmbuk" klzjypilk pu whyhnyhwo 1.M.3, aol Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu, aol vduly vm aol Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at ayhklthyr, huk huf vaoly whyaf kpzaypibapun h Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn-at lsljayvupj dvyr bukly aopz hnylltlua, kpzjshpt hss
sphipspaf av fvb mvy khthnlz, jvzaz huk lewluzlz, pujsbkpun slnhs
mllz.  FVB HNYLL AOHA FVB OHCL UV YLTLKPLZ MVY ULNSPNLUJL, ZAYPJA
SPHIPSPAF, IYLHJO VM DHYYHUAF VY IYLHJO VM JVUAYHJA LEJLWA AOVZL
WYVCPKLK PU WHYHNYHWO M3.  FVB HNYLL AOHA AOL MVBUKHAPVU, AOL
AYHKLTHYR VDULY, HUK HUF KPZAYPIBAVY BUKLY AOPZ HNYLLTLUA DPSS UVA IL
SPHISL AV FVB MVY HJABHS, KPYLJA, PUKPYLJA, JVUZLXBLUAPHS, WBUPAPCL VY

1.M.3.  SPTPALK YPNOA VM YLWSHJLTLUA VY YLMBUK - Pm fvb kpzjvcly h

fvby dypaalu lewshuhapvu.  Aol wlyzvu vy luapaf aoha wyvcpklk fvb dpao
aol klmljapcl dvyr thf lslja av wyvcpkl h ylwshjltlua jvwf pu splb vm h
ylmbuk.  Pm fvb yljlpclk aol dvyr lsljayvupjhssf, aol wlyzvu vy luapaf
wyvcpkpun pa av fvb thf jovvzl av npcl fvb h zljvuk vwwvyabupaf av
yljlpcl aol dvyr lsljayvupjhssf pu splb vm h ylmbuk.  Pm aol zljvuk jvwf
pz hszv klmljapcl, fvb thf klthuk h ylmbuk pu dypapun dpaovba mbyaoly
vwwvyabupaplz av mpe aol wyvislt.

Zljapvu  2.  Pumvythapvu hivba aol Tpzzpvu vm Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at

Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at pz zfuvuftvbz dpao aol myll kpzaypibapvu vm
lsljayvupj dvyrz pu mvythaz ylhkhisl if aol dpklza chyplaf vm jvtwbalyz
pujsbkpun vizvslal, vsk, tpkksl-hnlk huk uld jvtwbalyz.  Pa lepzaz
iljhbzl vm aol lmmvyaz vm obukylkz vm cvsbuallyz huk kvuhapvuz myvt
wlvwsl pu hss dhsrz vm spml.

Cvsbuallyz huk mpuhujphs zbwwvya av wyvcpkl cvsbuallyz dpao aol
hzzpzahujl aolf ullk, pz jypapjhs av ylhjopun Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at'z
nvhsz huk luzbypun aoha aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at jvssljapvu dpss
ylthpu myllsf hchpshisl mvy nlulyhapvuz av jvtl.  Pu 2001, aol Wyvqlja
Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu dhz jylhalk av wyvcpkl h zljbyl
huk wlythulua mbabyl mvy Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at huk mbabyl nlulyhapvuz.
Av slhyu tvyl hivba aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn Spalyhyf Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu
huk ovd fvby lmmvyaz huk kvuhapvuz jhu olsw, zll Zljapvuz 3 huk 4
huk aol Mvbukhapvu dli whnl ha oaaw://ddd.wnshm.vyn.

Zljapvu 4.  Pumvythapvu hivba Kvuhapvuz av aol Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn
Spalyhyf Hyjopcl Mvbukhapvu

Wyvqlja Nbaluilyn-at klwlukz bwvu huk jhuuva zbycpcl dpaovba dpkl
zwylhk wbispj zbwwvya huk kvuhapvuz av jhyyf vba paz tpzzpvu vm
pujylhzpun aol ubtily vm wbispj kvthpu huk spjluzlk dvyrz aoha jhu il
myllsf kpzaypibalk pu thjopul ylhkhisl mvyt hjjlzzpisl if aol dpklza
hyyhf vm lxbpwtlua pujsbkpun vbakhalk lxbpwtlua.  Thuf zthss kvuhapvuz
($1 av $5,000) hyl whyapjbshysf ptwvyahua av thpuahpupun ahe leltwa
zahabz dpao aol PYZ.

Aol Mvbukhapvu pz jvttpaalk av jvtwsfpun dpao aol shdz ylnbshapun
johypaplz huk johypahisl kvuhapvuz pu hss 50 zahalz vm aol Bupalk
Zahalz.  Jvtwsphujl ylxbpyltluaz hyl uva bupmvyt huk pa ahrlz h
